text_enUS:
Draft format only.
You can use agendas from all factions in this deck.
text_zhCN:
轮抽赛制限定。
你在本牌组中可以使用所有派系的议案。
stripped_text: Draft format only. You can use agendas from all factions in this deck.
flavor_enUS: The Past is the Future.
flavor_zhCN: 过往即未来。

text_enUS: Draft format only.
text_zhCN: 轮抽赛制限定。
stripped_text: Draft format only.
flavor_enUS: "This war is far from over."
flavor_zhCN: “这场战争远未结束。”

text_enUS:
Draft format only.
You must maintain the order of your heap.
Whenever you trash a Corp card, if you have more [anarch] cards installed than any other faction, shuffle the top card of your heap into your stack.
text_zhCN:
轮抽赛制限定。
如果你具有已安装的[anarch]卡牌多于其它任何派系，则每当你销毁一张公司卡牌时，将你堆阵顶端的一张卡牌洗入你的存储栈。
stripped_text: Draft format only. You must maintain the order of your heap. Whenever you trash a Corp card, if you have more anarch cards installed than any other faction, shuffle the top card of your heap into your stack.

title_zhCN: 鲍里斯·“暗码”·科瓦奇：诡诈老手
text_enUS:
Draft format only.
If you have more [criminal] cards installed than any other faction, when your turn begins, remove 1 tag.
text_zhCN:
轮抽赛制限定。
如果你具有已安装的[criminal]卡牌多于其它任何派系，则当你的回合开始时，移除1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: Draft format only. If you have more criminal cards installed than any other faction, when your turn begins, remove 1 tag.

title_zhCN: 杰米·“嗡嗡”·麦肯：科技博学者
text_enUS:
Draft format only.
If you have more [shaper] cards installed than any other faction, when you install a card the first time each turn, draw 1 card.
text_zhCN:
轮抽赛制限定。
如果你具有已安装的[shaper]卡牌多于其它任何派系，则当你每回合第一次安装一张卡牌时，补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Draft format only. If you have more shaper cards installed than any other faction, when you install a card the first time each turn, draw 1 card.

text_enUS:
Draft format only.
If you have more [haas-bioroid] cards rezzed than any other faction, when the Runner's turn ends, shuffle 1 card in Archives into R&D.
text_zhCN:
轮抽赛制限定。
如果你具有已激活的[haas-bioroid]卡牌多于其它任何派系，则当潜袭者的回合结束时，将一张卡牌从档案库洗入研发中心。
stripped_text: Draft format only. If you have more haas-bioroid cards rezzed than any other faction, when the Runner's turn ends, shuffle 1 card in Archives into R&D.

text_enUS:
Draft format only.
If you have more [jinteki] cards rezzed than any other faction, when your turn begins, you may swap 2 pieces of installed ice.
text_zhCN:
轮抽赛制限定。
如果你具有已激活的[jinteki]卡牌多于其它任何派系，则当你的回合开始时，你可以将两层已安装的防火墙互换。
stripped_text: Draft format only. If you have more jinteki cards rezzed than any other faction, when your turn begins, you may swap 2 pieces of installed ice.

title_enUS: Information Dynamics: All You Need To Know
title_zhCN: 信息动力：你需知的一切
stripped_title: Information Dynamics: All You Need To Know
text_enUS:
Draft format only.
If you have more [nbn] cards rezzed than any other faction, whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, give the runner 1 tag.
text_zhCN:
轮抽赛制限定。
如果你具有已激活的[nbn]卡牌多于其它任何派系，则每当一个议案被计分或窃取时，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: Draft format only. If you have more nbn cards rezzed than any other faction, whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, give the runner 1 tag.

text_enUS:
Draft format only.
If you have more [weyland-consortium] cards rezzed than any other faction, when the Runner's turn begins, place an advancement token on a piece of ice.
text_zhCN:
轮抽赛制限定。
如果你具有已激活的[weyland-consortium]卡牌多于其它任何派系，则当潜袭者的回合开始时，放置1枚推进标记到一层防火墙上。
stripped_text: Draft format only. If you have more weyland-consortium cards rezzed than any other faction, when the Runner's turn begins, place an advancement token on a piece of ice.

text_enUS: Whenever you install a virus program, the Corp trashes the top card of R&D.
text_zhCN: 每当你安装一个病毒程序时，公司销毁研发中心顶端的一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever you install a virus program, the Corp trashes the top card of R&D.
flavor_enUS: "Watch this. It'll be funny."
flavor_zhCN: “看着，这会很有趣哦。”

text_enUS: Add 1 card (or up to 2 virus cards) from your heap to your grip.
text_zhCN: 将一张卡牌（或最多两张病毒卡牌）从你的堆阵加入你的操控器。
stripped_text: Add 1 card (or up to 2 virus cards) from your heap to your grip.
flavor_enUS: Anything worth doing is worth doing twice.
flavor_zhCN: 值得去做的事情值得再做。

text_enUS: Run HQ or R&D. Access → 0[credit]: Trash the card you are accessing.
stripped_text: Run HQ or R&D. Access -> 0 credits: Trash the card you are accessing.
flavor_enUS: You ever set something on fire just to watch it burn?
flavor_zhCN: 你可曾把东西点燃而只是为了看它燃烧？

text_enUS: Place 9[credit] on this event, then run any server. During that run, hosted credits are considered to be in your credit pool. When that run ends, suffer 1 core damage. This damage cannot be prevented.
stripped_text: Place 9 credits on this event, then run any server. During that run, hosted credits are considered to be in your credit pool. When that run ends, suffer 1 core damage. This damage cannot be prevented.

text_enUS: 1[recurring-credit] Use this credit to pay for using icebreakers or for installing virus programs.
stripped_text: 1 recurring credit Use this credit to pay for using icebreakers or for installing virus programs.
flavor_enUS: I feel almost naked without it.
flavor_zhCN: 缺了它，我感觉就像浑身赤裸。

text_enUS: +2[mu] Whenever you install a virus program, place 1 virus counter on that program. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +2[mu] 每当你安装一个病毒程序时，放置1枚病毒指示物到该程序上。 每位玩家限制1个控制台 。
stripped_text: +2 mu Whenever you install a virus program, place 1 virus counter on that program. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS: "My little book of magic spells." -The Whizzard
flavor_zhCN: “我的小小魔法咒语书。” —魔术师

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条屏障子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: "If at first you don't succeed, boost its strength and try again." -g00ru
flavor_zhCN: “如果第一次没成功，提高强度再试。” —精神0袖

text_enUS: Whenever you make a successful run on a central server, place 1 virus counter on Datasucker. Hosted virus counter: Rezzed piece of ice currently being encountered has -1 strength until the end of the encounter.
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on a central server, place 1 virus counter on Datasucker. Hosted virus counter: Rezzed piece of ice currently being encountered has -1 strength until the end of the encounter.

text_enUS: Djinn can host up to 3[mu] of non-icebreaker programs. The memory costs of hosted programs do not count against your memory limit. [click], 1[credit]: Search your stack for a virus program, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.
text_zhCN: 巨灵能被附载最多3[mu]的非破解器程序。 所附载的程序的内存费用不计算在你的内存上限中。 [click]，1[credit]：在你的存储栈搜寻一个病毒程序，将其展示，并加入你的操控器。将你的存储栈重洗。
stripped_text: Djinn can host up to 3 mu of non-icebreaker programs. The memory costs of hosted programs do not count against your memory limit. click, 1 credit: Search your stack for a virus program, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.

text_enUS:
Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on this program.
Whenever you breach R&D, choose a number less than the number of hosted virus counters. Access that many additional cards.
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on this program. Whenever you breach R&D, choose a number less than the number of hosted virus counters. Access that many additional cards.
flavor_enUS: It looked like random packet loss. It wasn't.
flavor_zhCN: 看起来就像是偶发的数据包丢失，其实不然。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条警报子进程。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine.
flavor_enUS: November 5th: the day when all would see the corrupt machinations of the corporate oligarchy.
flavor_zhCN: 11月5日这天，所有人将会看到公司寡头们的肮脏阴谋。

text_enUS:
Install only on a rezzed piece of ice.
When your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program.
Host ice gets -1 strength for each hosted virus counter.
When the strength of host ice is 0 or less, trash it.
stripped_text: Install only on a rezzed piece of ice. When your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. Host ice gets -1 strength for each hosted virus counter. When the strength of host ice is 0 or less, trash it.

text_enUS: Interface → 3[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice with 0 or less strength. Interface → 1[credit]: The ice you are encountering gets -1 strength for the remainder of this encounter. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN:
3[credit]：破解强度等于或小于0的防火墙上的子进程。
1[credit]：防火墙的强度减1。
1[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 3 credits: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice with 0 or less strength. Interface -> 1 credit: The ice you are encountering gets -1 strength for the remainder of this encounter. 1 credit: +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: Fire and ichor…
flavor_zhCN: 火焰与毒液…

text_enUS: Interface → 0[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine.
text_zhCN: 0[credit]：破解门禁子进程。
stripped_text: Interface -> 0 credits: Break 1 code gate subroutine.
flavor_enUS: The Yog.0 database is a crowdsourced compilation of sniffed, spoofed, and logged passkeys. If the key to the gate is in the database, you're in. If it's not, change the gate!
flavor_zhCN: 犹格.0数据库是一个含嗅探、欺骗和登入密钥的多来源编译。如果开门的密钥在数据库中，你便可顺利进入。否则，就换一道门吧！

text_enUS: While you are encountering a piece of ice, it gets −1 strength.
text_zhCN: 在你遭遇一层防火墙的期间，该防火墙的强度-1。
stripped_text: While you are encountering a piece of ice, it gets -1 strength.
flavor_enUS: In the public consciousness, there's a hard line between corp and runner. In the real world, things are a little more porous. The corps need the best hackers to run their networks, and some of the best hackers are ex-runners who like the idea of a regular paycheck. But sometimes things run the other way, and someone on the inside makes something like this.
flavor_zhCN: 在大众意识里，公司与潜袭者之间隔着明显的鸿沟。在真实世界里，情况却有些模糊。公司需要最优秀的黑客来运作他们的网络，其中部分是喜欢固定工资的原潜袭者。但有时情况会发展到另一面，有人从公司内部做出了这样的东西。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, draw 2 cards and lose [click].
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，补两张卡牌并失去[click]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, draw 2 cards and lose click.
flavor_enUS: "Best place to go when you want to get your mind out of the gutter and take it inside." -Ji "Noise" Reilly
flavor_zhCN: “当你想让脑袋摆脱一堆破事，然后扎进另一堆破事时，这是最好的去处。” —吉·“噪音”·雷利

title_zhCN: 加布里埃尔·圣地亚哥：精湛专家
text_enUS: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, gain 2[credit].
stripped_text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, gain 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: "Of course I steal from the rich. They're the ones with all the money."
flavor_zhCN: “我当然是偷富人的，他们拿了所有的钱。”

text_enUS: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, you may force the Corp to lose up to 5[credit], then you gain 2[credit] for each credit lost and take 2 tags.
text_zhCN: 对总部进行一次潜袭。如果成功，你可以迫使公司失去最多5[credit]，代替读取卡牌，然后拿取2枚锁定标记，并且公司每失去1信用点你获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, you may force the Corp to lose up to 5 credits, then you gain 2 credits for each credit lost and take 2 tags.

text_enUS: Gain 3[credit].
stripped_text: Gain 3 credits.
flavor_enUS: "Hey kid, you fire that up now, bound to be vamped real bad. Some real pathetic individuals around here. But thankfully I got just the ticket…"
flavor_zhCN: “嘿小子，你把他惹火了，很快就会被整得很惨。这周围全是一些可怜虫。不过幸好我搞到了正需要的东西…”

text_enUS: Choose 1 unrezzed piece of ice. The Corp may rez that ice. If they do not, they trash it.
text_zhCN: 选择1层未激活的防火墙。公司可以激活该防火墙。如果其未如此做，则其销毁该防火墙。
stripped_text: Choose 1 unrezzed piece of ice. The Corp may rez that ice. If they do not, they trash it.
flavor_enUS: As the hysteria in the room climbed higher up the corporate chain, an uneasy feeling of joblessness began to sink in on the lower rungs.
flavor_zhCN: 随着房间里的抓狂情绪向企业链高层传递，一种令人不安的失业恐惧在底下弥漫开来。

text_enUS: Run any server. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, bypass it.
text_zhCN: 潜袭任意一台服务器。本次潜袭中你第一次遭遇一层防火墙时，略过该防火墙。
stripped_text: Run any server. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, bypass it.
flavor_enUS: "Hey, listen, I'm not asking you to do anything dangerous. Just let me into the building. And tell me which room has the weakest security. And please don't say 'the bathroom' again."
flavor_zhCN: “嘿，听着，我不是要你做什么危险的事情。你只要让我进入大楼。另外告诉我哪个房间的防卫最差。以及请别再说是‘厕所’。”

text_enUS: Search your stack for an icebreaker, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.
stripped_text: Search your stack for an icebreaker, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.
flavor_enUS: Feverishly tracking its frustratingly slow progress across the Pacific, the package finally shows up hours later…
flavor_zhCN: 令人兴奋的包裹，沮丧而缓慢地越过太平洋，最终在几个小时后抵达…

text_enUS: [click], 1[credit]: Expose 1 card. Use this ability only if you have made a successful run on HQ this turn.
text_zhCN: [click]，1[credit]：揭示一张卡牌。如果你本回合已对总部进行过成功的潜袭，才能使用本能力。
stripped_text: click, 1 credit: Expose 1 card. Use this ability only if you have made a successful run on HQ this turn.
flavor_enUS: "A little preparation goes a long way." -Gabriel Santiago
flavor_zhCN: “稍作准备才能走得长远。” —加布里埃尔·圣地亚哥

text_enUS: +1[mu] Gain 1[credit] whenever you make a successful run. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu] 每当你进行一次成功的潜袭时，获得1[credit]。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu Gain 1 credit whenever you make a successful run. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2 credits: +3 strength.

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +1 strength. When you install this program, choose 1 installed piece of ice. Whenever you encounter the chosen ice, you may pay 1[credit] for each subroutine it has. If you do, bypass that ice.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条警报子进程。 2[credit]：强度+1。 当你安装本程序时，选择1层已安装的防火墙。 每当你遭遇所选择的防火墙时，你可以支付与该防火墙上子进程数量相等的[credit]。如果你如此做，略过该防火墙。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2 credits: +1 strength. When you install this program, choose 1 installed piece of ice. Whenever you encounter the chosen ice, you may pay 1 credit for each subroutine it has. If you do, bypass that ice.

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 3[credit]: +5 strength.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解警报子进程。 3[credit]：强度+5。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 3 credits: +5 strength.
flavor_enUS: You feel Ninja before you see Ninja, if you see Ninja at all.
flavor_zhCN: 你会先感觉到忍者才能看到忍者，如果你还能看到的话。

text_enUS: [click]: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ for the remainder of that run.
text_zhCN: [click]：潜袭档案库。如果本次潜袭将要宣告为成功，在本次潜袭的剩余时间内将被攻击的服务器改为总部。
stripped_text: click: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ for the remainder of that run.
flavor_enUS: "The code isn't important. It's where the code takes you that is important." -g00ru
flavor_zhCN: “代码并不重要，代码会把你带去哪里才是重要的。” —精神0袖

text_enUS:
When you install this resource, load 8[credit] on it. When it is empty, trash it.
Whenever you make a successful run on a remote server, instead of breaching that server, you may take any number of credits from this resource.
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 8 credits on it. When it is empty, trash it. Whenever you make a successful run on a remote server, instead of breaching that server, you may take any number of credits from this resource.

text_enUS: 2[recurring-credit] You can spend hosted credits to take the basic action to remove 1 tag. [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent up to 3 meat damage.
stripped_text: 2[recurring-credit] You can spend hosted credits to take the basic action to remove 1 tag. Interrupt -> trash: Prevent up to 3 meat damage.
flavor_enUS: "My roomie, he had a cousin with a college girlfriend whose brother's best friend was an addict, and the addict's mother used to live here. So yeah, there's a connection." -Lez "Rockfist" S.
flavor_zhCN: “我那个室友，他有个表亲的大学女朋友的兄弟的密友是个瘾君子，而这个瘾君子的老妈曾住过这儿。所以没错，的确有些关联。” - 雷兹·“石拳”·S.

text_enUS: [click], forfeit 1 agenda: Gain 9[credit].
stripped_text: click, forfeit 1 agenda: Gain 9 credits.
flavor_enUS: Shadier the dealer, better the price. Unless the dealer's too shady. Then there might be a hidden fee after they take your scrip.
flavor_zhCN: 越阴暗的商贩，开价越高。但除非太过阴暗的商贩，他们在拿了你的货之后可能会有隐含的附加费用。

text_enUS: [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent 1 tag.
text_zhCN: [trash]：避免得到1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> trash: Prevent 1 tag.
flavor_enUS:
"I get the feeling that this is the wrong place, Frank."
"What makes you say that, D?"
"The curlers."
flavor_zhCN:
“我感觉我们来错地方了，弗兰克。”
“为什么这么说，D？”
“看看卷发夹。”

title_zhCN: 凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞：数字校正师
text_enUS: Lower the install cost of the first program or piece of hardware you install each turn by 1.
text_zhCN: 每回合你安装的第一个程序或硬件的安装费用减1。
stripped_text: Lower the install cost of the first program or piece of hardware you install each turn by 1.
flavor_enUS: "Are you listening?"
flavor_zhCN: “你在听吗？”

text_enUS: Draw 3 cards.
text_zhCN: 抽3张卡牌。
stripped_text: Draw 3 cards.
flavor_enUS: Diesel gives you flames.
flavor_zhCN: 迪燃给你火力。

text_enUS: Install a program or piece of hardware, lowering the install cost by 3.
stripped_text: Install a program or piece of hardware, lowering the install cost by 3.
flavor_enUS: There's no replacement for a home-grown program. Fed on late nights, oaty bars, and single-minded determination. Cheaper, too.
flavor_zhCN: 自家创造的程序无可取代。它是在熬夜、麦片条和单纯的决心里培养长大。还有，它很便宜。

text_enUS: Run R&D. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach R&D.
text_zhCN: 潜袭研发中心。如果成功，当你侵入研发中心时，额外读取2张卡牌。
stripped_text: Run R&D. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach R&D.
flavor_enUS: "Some of the professionals have good instincts, but they can't see beyond the data. They can't see the matrix." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak
flavor_zhCN: “有些专家有很棒的直觉，但他们却看不透数据，看不到矩阵。” —艾丽·“浓烟”·斯科娃

text_enUS: Choose a piece of ice. That ice gains sentry, code gate, and barrier until the end of the turn.
stripped_text: Choose a piece of ice. That ice gains sentry, code gate, and barrier until the end of the turn.
flavor_enUS: "There's that moment, you know, when the whole world seems to fall away and it is only you and your mod, and the mod is the world."
flavor_zhCN: “你知道，在那一刻，当整个世界除了你和你的改造物之外全都消失不见，你的改造物就是世界。”

stripped_text: +1 mu
flavor_enUS: The Akamatsu company was founded on three principles: first, to make the fastest mem chips on the market, second, to turn a profit, and third, to serve as a front for the manufacture of illegal neural-stimulants. It is the last principle that perhaps explains their rabid brand loyalty.
flavor_zhCN: 赤松公司基于三条原则创立：第一，制造市场上最强劲的芯片；第二，盈利；第三，作为非法的神经仿生体的前端服务商。最后一条原则可能解释了他们强大的品牌忠诚度。

text_enUS:
+1[link]
When Rabbit Hole is installed, you may search your stack for another copy of Rabbit Hole and install it by paying its install cost. Shuffle your stack.
stripped_text: +1 link When Rabbit Hole is installed, you may search your stack for another copy of Rabbit Hole and install it by paying its install cost. Shuffle your stack.
flavor_enUS: It's not endless, it just feels that way.
flavor_zhCN: 它并不是无穷无尽，它只是让你有这种感觉。

text_enUS: Install The Personal Touch only on an icebreaker. Host icebreaker has +1 strength.
stripped_text: Install The Personal Touch only on an icebreaker. Host icebreaker has +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: A z-loop here, a cortical wave there…
flavor_zhCN: 这里放个Z循环，那里放个皮层波动…

text_enUS: +2[mu] +2[link] 2[recurring-credit] Use these credits to pay for using icebreakers. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +2[mu]，+2[link] 2[recurring-credit] 这些信用点用于支付使用破解器。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +2 mu +2 link 2 recurring credits Use these credits to pay for using icebreakers. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 1 credit: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
flavor_enUS: "It's called 'brute-forcing' and it's just as effective today as it was a hundred years ago." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
flavor_zhCN: “这叫‘蛮力冲击’，跟百年前一样好用。” —凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条门禁子进程。 1[credit]：本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
flavor_enUS: It can slice through the thickest knots of data.
flavor_zhCN: 它可以切开最繁杂的数据死结。

text_enUS: [click]: Gain 2[credit].
stripped_text: click: Gain 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: The Great Work was completed on a rainy Thursday afternoon. There were no seismic shifts, no solar flares, no sign from the earth or heavens that the world had changed. But upstalk in Heinlein, on a single Cybsoft manufactured datacore, the flickering data quantums of an account began to fill with creds. Real, honest-to-goodness UN certified creds.
flavor_zhCN: 这个巨作在一个下雨的周四午后完成。没有任何地动山摇，任何耀斑爆发，任何地球或天界的讯号表明世界已改变。然而在上行区的海因莱因，一个数位体公司制造的数据核心里，有个账号闪烁着数据量子，正开始填满信用点。真正的，实实在在的联合国认证信用点。

text_enUS: [interrupt] → The first time each turn you would suffer net damage, you may pay 1[credit] to prevent 1 net damage.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：防止本回合的第一点网域伤害。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> The first time each turn you would suffer net damage, you may pay 1 credit to prevent 1 net damage.
flavor_enUS: Sucks energy like a martian terra-bot, but it keeps you focused
flavor_zhCN: 它会像火星地表机器人那样吸取能量，但能使你集中精神。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2 credits: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, gain 3[credit].
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以销毁另1张你已安装的卡牌。如果你如此做，获得3[credit]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, gain 3 credits.
flavor_enUS: You didn't mention Aesop's arm unless you wanted an earful. Sometimes he talked about it in such a way that you wondered why he didn't laser his other arm off as well.
flavor_zhCN: 除非你想听到一堆啰嗦，否则不要提到伊索的手臂。有时他讲得让你疑惑他另一只手臂怎么没有被激光切下来。

text_enUS: [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent a player from trashing 1 installed program or piece of hardware.
stripped_text: Interrupt -> trash: Prevent a player from trashing 1 installed program or piece of hardware.
flavor_enUS: The life expectancy of a jacked construct is about that of a mayfly. In other words, short.
flavor_zhCN: 一个最好的结构体的预期寿命和蜉蝣差不多。换句话说，很短。

text_enUS: Gain 2[credit] or expose 1 card.
stripped_text: Gain 2 credits or expose 1 card.
flavor_enUS: "Bring back any memories, Monica?" -John "Animal" McEvoy
flavor_zhCN: “回想起任何记忆吗，莫妮卡？” —约翰·“野兽”·麦克伊弗

text_enUS: Gain 9[credit].
text_zhCN: 获得9[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 9 credits.
flavor_enUS: Lady Luck took the form of a hifi quantum manipulation ring that she wore on her middle finger.
flavor_zhCN: 幸运女士的中指上佩戴了一枚高保真量子制造的操控指环。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. [click]: Place 1 virus counter on this program. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, remove 1 hosted virus counter or trash this program.
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. click: Place 1 virus counter on this program. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, remove 1 hosted virus counter or trash this program.

text_enUS: +1[link]
text_zhCN: +1[link]
stripped_text: +1 link
flavor_enUS: He flicked the display population to high, and was surrounded by a circle of floating holos. The ping-back was strong, the clearance level blue-one. Now to find the perfect place for a relay…
flavor_zhCN: 他把显示的人口数量点选到高，被一圈悬浮的全息图像环绕。反馈信号很强，许可级别为蓝色一级。现在来找个完美的位置做个中继…

text_enUS:
Place 12[credit] from the bank on Armitage Codebusting when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Armitage Codebusting, trash it.
[click]: Take 2[credit] from Armitage Codebusting.
stripped_text: Place 12 credits from the bank on Armitage Codebusting when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Armitage Codebusting, trash it. click: Take 2 credits from Armitage Codebusting.
flavor_enUS: Drudge work, but it pays the bills.
flavor_zhCN: 辛苦的活儿，但能赚到钱付账单。

text_enUS: The first time you install a card each turn, gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次安装卡牌时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: The first time you install a card each turn, gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: Effective. Reliable. Humane.
flavor_zhCN: 高效，可靠，以人为本。

text_enUS: When you score Accelerated Beta Test, you may look at the top 3 cards of R&D. If any of those cards are ice, you may install and rez them, ignoring all costs. Trash the rest of the cards you looked at.
text_zhCN: 当你用加速版本测试计分时，你可以查看研发中心顶端的三张卡牌。如果其中有任何防火墙，你可以安装并激活它们，忽略所有的费用。销毁余下你所查看的卡牌。
stripped_text: When you score Accelerated Beta Test, you may look at the top 3 cards of R&D. If any of those cards are ice, you may install and rez them, ignoring all costs. Trash the rest of the cards you looked at.

Put 12[credit] from the bank on Adonis Campaign when rezzed. When there are no credits left on Adonis Campaign, trash it.
Take 3[credit] from Adonis Campaign when your turn begins.
stripped_text: Put 12 credits from the bank on Adonis Campaign when rezzed. When there are no credits left on Adonis Campaign, trash it. Take 3 credits from Adonis Campaign when your turn begins.

Aggressive Secretary can be advanced.
If you pay 2[credit] when the Runner accesses Aggressive Secretary, trash 1 program for each advancement token on Aggressive Secretary.
stripped_text: Aggressive Secretary can be advanced. If you pay 2 credits when the Runner accesses Aggressive Secretary, trash 1 program for each advancement token on Aggressive Secretary.

text_enUS: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
text_zhCN: 将1张卡牌从档案库加入总部。
stripped_text: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
flavor_enUS: "Do you think they…feel it?"
flavor_zhCN: “你认为他们…感觉得到吗？”

text_enUS: Gain [click][click].
text_zhCN: 获得[click][click]。
stripped_text: Gain click click.
flavor_enUS: "Why of course, we have six different Haas-Bioroid models serving in a variety of positions at this branch office alone. We here at Haas-Bioroid aren't going to shy away from practicing what we preach, and we pass the savings from increased efficiency on to our valued customers."
flavor_zhCN: “毋庸置疑，我们有六种不同的生化人模型专门用于这个分部的各种职位。在这里，我们哈斯生化坚守信念绝不退缩，并将我们从高效中节省下来的资源回报给重要的客户。”

text_enUS: Install up to 3 cards from HQ (one at a time and paying all install costs).
stripped_text: Install up to 3 cards from HQ (one at a time and paying all install costs).
flavor_enUS: The new heads were in. Their eyes always followed your movements when you unlocked the pressurized container and lifted the lid.
flavor_zhCN: 里面是全新的头颅，当你打开高压密封箱并掀起盖子，他们的眼睛始终注视着你的动作。

text_enUS: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage. [subroutine] End the run. [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Do 1 core damage. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run.

flavor_enUS: I hear the shift of every bit amid the flow of the datastream. I hear the whispers of my mothers, and their commands are law. The realm beyond is forbidden.
flavor_zhCN: 我聆听着数据流中字节的变化，我聆听着母亲们的细语，她们的指令便是律法。至高的国度禁止通行。

text_enUS: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Trace[1]. If successful, do 1 core damage and give the Runner 1 tag.

subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 生化人 - 追踪者 - 毁灭者
flavor_enUS: My reputation would precede me, if any could speak of it.
flavor_zhCN: 如果有任何可说的，那就是我视名誉重于自身。

text_enUS: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage. [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Do 1 core damage. Subroutine End the run.

flavor_enUS: My name is Viktor. Nice to meet you. Would you like to play a game?
flavor_zhCN: 我叫维克托。很高兴认识你。你想玩一场游戏吗？

text_enUS:
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] End the run.

[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine End the run.

text_zhCN: X[credit]，[trash]：选择1层已激活的保护本服务器的防火墙。该防火墙在本回合剩余时间内强度+X。
stripped_text: X credits, trash: Choose 1 rezzed piece of ice protecting this server. That ice gets +X strength for the remainder of the turn.
flavor_enUS: "I solve problems."
flavor_zhCN: “我负责解决问题。”

text_enUS: All ice protecting this server has +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 保护本服务器的所有防火墙的强度+1。
stripped_text: All ice protecting this server has +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: Floyd felt the anger in the man before him, ranting against simulants. His programming pushed a routine rebuttal to the front of his thoughts, and the urge to speak it was overwhelming. This is only going to make things worse, he thought.
flavor_zhCN: 弗洛伊德感受到面前男人的愤怒，正对着仿生体咆哮。他的程序将一条通用的辩驳指令送进他的思想，开口说出的欲望变得非常强烈。他想到，这只会让事情越变越糟。

text_enUS: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, do 1 net damage.
text_zhCN: 每当一个议案被计分或窃取时，造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, do 1 net damage.

flavor_zhCN: 当您需要人间关怀。

text_zhCN:
在潜袭者从研发中心读取本资产的期间，其必须展示之。
当潜袭者从档案库以外其他区域读取本资产时，你可以支付4[credit]。如果你如此做，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记并造成3点网域伤害。
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 4 credits. If you do, give the Runner 1 tag and do 3 net damage.

如果潜袭者将要揭示一张卡牌，你可以激活财阀们的忠诚。
1[credit]或[trash]：防止一张卡牌被揭示。

Play only if the Runner made a run during their last turn.

stripped_text: Play only if the Runner made a run during their last turn. Do 1 net damage.
flavor_enUS: The trick isn't hitting the person you were aiming at. It's hitting only the person you were aiming at.
flavor_zhCN: 技巧不在于打中你瞄准的那一个，而是只打中你瞄准的那一个。

text_enUS: Look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
text_zhCN: 查看研发中心顶端的五张卡牌，并按任意顺序排列它们。
stripped_text: Look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
flavor_enUS: There was a new texture in her phantom cortex. It had always been there, she realized. It was everything and nothing.
flavor_zhCN: 她的幻象皮层上有一种新的纹理。她意识到它一直在那里，既是一切，又是虚无。

text_enUS: [subroutine] The Runner moves to the outermost position of the attacked server. They may jack out. Derez this ice.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 潜袭者接驳到保护被攻击服务器的最外层防火墙。关闭信元传送门。

text_zhCN: [subroutine] 在本次潜袭中，潜袭者遭遇的下一层防火墙的强度+2。除非潜袭者破解该防火墙上的所有子进程，否则造成3点网域伤害。
stripped_text: Subroutine The next piece of ice the Runner encounters during this run gets +2 strength. When that encounter ends, if the Runner did not fully break that ice, do 3 net damage.

flavor_zhCN: “你可曾有过自己是大鲨鱼口中餐食的感觉？要小心这种感觉。” —吉·“噪音”·雷利

[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.

flavor_enUS: Most runners do their business in full-sim, with their rigs wired directly into their brains. The setup has a large number of advantages, with the runner able to process data and input commands far faster than a traditional meat-bound system. But it also means greater risk.
flavor_zhCN: 大部分潜袭者干活的时候都是全仿真的方式，将基地设备直接接入大脑。这种方式有很大的优势，可以让潜袭者比传统的肉体操作系统更加快速地处理数据及输入指令。但这样也意味着更大的风险。

text_enUS: The rez cost of ice protecting this server is lowered by 2.
text_zhCN: 保护本服务器的防火墙的激活费用减2。
stripped_text: The rez cost of ice protecting this server is lowered by 2.
flavor_enUS: Just don't ask how he does it.
flavor_zhCN: 别问他怎么做到的。

2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits during trace attempts.
stripped_text: 2 recurring credits Use these credits during trace attempts.

“有没有听过第22条军规？”
“提醒我忘记它。”

text_enUS: Persistent → As an additional cost to steal an agenda from this server or its root, the Runner must pay 5[credit]. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)
stripped_text: Persistent -> As an additional cost to steal an agenda from this server or its root, the Runner must pay 5 credits. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)

text_enUS: Each agenda in the root of this server gets −1 advancement requirement. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 本服务器根目录中的议案的推进需求-1。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Each agenda in the root of this server gets -1 advancement requirement. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS:
"I hear the coast is nice this time of year."
"If you're in the right business, it's nice all the year."
flavor_zhCN:
“我听说每年这个时候，海岸城市很兴旺。”
“如果你从事对路的行业，全年都很兴旺。”

title_enUS: Weyland Consortium: Building a Better World
title_zhCN: 威兰财团：创造美好世界
stripped_title: Weyland Consortium: Building a Better World
text_enUS: Whenever you play a transaction operation, gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每当你打出一个交易事务时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever you play a transaction operation, gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: Moving Upwards.
flavor_zhCN: 永攀高峰。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, gain 7[credit] and take 1 bad publicity.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，获得7[credit]并拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, gain 7 credits and take 1 bad publicity.
flavor_enUS: There are going to be some changes around here.
flavor_zhCN: 这里将会有些变动。

text_enUS: When you score Posted Bounty, you may forfeit it to give the Runner 1 tag and take 1 bad publicity.
text_zhCN: 当你用悬赏通告计分时，你可以废除它，以给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记并拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: When you score Posted Bounty, you may forfeit it to give the Runner 1 tag and take 1 bad publicity.
flavor_enUS: "If some two-cred newsy picks it up, even better. The scum could be in the alleys of Guayaquil of the slums of BosWash. Not to mention off-planet."
flavor_zhCN: “如果让一些两信用点小报的报童拿到，会更加有效。人渣们可能在瓜亚基尔的巷子或波士华区的贫民窟里。甚至不在这颗星球上。”

text_enUS: [click], trash a rezzed piece of ice: Gain 4[credit].
text_zhCN: [click]，销毁一层已激活的防火墙：获得4[credit]。
stripped_text: click, trash a rezzed piece of ice: Gain 4 credits.
flavor_enUS: "Feed the Feds our scraps, and they'll come back begging for more." -Richard Polasco, VP of Cyber-Security
flavor_zhCN: “给联邦政府的人喂些我们的剩食，他们会来乞求更多的。” —赛博防卫公司副总裁，理查德·波拉克

text_enUS:
Play only if you scored an agenda this turn.
Search R&D for 1 card and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
text_zhCN:
如果你本回合已用过一个议案计分，才能打出。
在研发中心搜寻一张卡牌并将其加入总部。将研发中心重洗。
stripped_text: Play only if you scored an agenda this turn. Search R&D for 1 card and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
flavor_enUS: "I believe you'll find the terms are quite favorable."
flavor_zhCN: “我相信你会发现条件非常优厚。”

text_enUS: Gain 3[credit].
stripped_text: Gain 3 credits.
flavor_enUS: The New Angeles Space Elevator, better known as the Beanstalk, is the single greatest triumph of human engineering and ingenuity in history. The Beanstalk makes Earth orbit accessible to everyone…for a small fee.
flavor_zhCN: 新洛杉机太空电梯，人称“豆茎”，是载入史册的人类工程学与独创性相结合的伟大胜利。“豆茎”使任何人都能够进入地球轨道…只需付一点小小的费用。

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Do 4 meat damage.
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Do 4 meat damage.
flavor_enUS: "I'd like to remind the ladies and gentlemen of the press that several of the buildings damaged in the blast were owned by Weyland Consortium subsidiaries…"
flavor_zhCN: “我想提醒新闻界的女士们先生们，在爆炸中损坏的部分建筑物是由威兰财团的子公司所拥有的…”

text_enUS: Place 1 advancement token on each of up to 2 different installed cards that can be advanced.
stripped_text: Place 1 advancement token on each of up to 2 different installed cards that can be advanced.
flavor_enUS:
"And then there's these two crates. No eID."
"Just leave those with me and forget you ever saw them."
flavor_zhCN:
“有两个货箱，没有电子编号。”
“留给我处理，你就当没有看到过它们。”

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to rez this ice, forfeit 1 agenda.
[subroutine] Gain 2[credit].
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
作为激活本防火墙的额外费用，废除1个议案。
[subroutine] 获得2[credit]。
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to rez this ice, forfeit 1 agenda. Subroutine Gain 2 credits. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Next time, read the Terms of Service more carefully. Or you might find yourself in the danger zone.
flavor_zhCN: 下次，请更仔细地阅读服务条款。否则你可能会陷入危险的境地。

text_enUS:
Hadrian's Wall can be advanced and has +1 strength for each advancement token on it.
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_text: Hadrian's Wall can be advanced and has +1 strength for each advancement token on it. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: "He had a bit of an ego, ol' Hadrian. His constructs live up to it though." -g00ru
flavor_zhCN: “老哈德良他有点自负。不过他的建造物值得赞美。” —精神0袖

text_enUS:
You can advance this ice. It gets +1 strength for each hosted advancement counter.
[subroutine] End the run.

你可以推进本防火墙。每有1枚所附载的推进指示物，本防火墙的强度+l。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: You can advance this ice. It gets +1 strength for each hosted advancement counter. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: "I asked for ice as impenetrable as a wall. I can't decide if someone down in R&D has a warped sense of humor or just a very literal mind." -Liz Campbell, VP Project Security
flavor_zhCN: “我要求防火墙像堵冰墙一样坚固。我不知道是研发中心下面的人有反常的幽默感，还是有一个咬文嚼字的脑袋。” —防卫项目副总裁，莉兹·坎贝尔

text_enUS:
Shadow can be advanced and has +1 strength for each advancement token on it.
[subroutine] The Corp gains 2[credit].
[subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
stripped_text: Shadow can be advanced and has +1 strength for each advancement token on it. Subroutine The Corp gains 2 credits. Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
flavor_enUS: Who knows what evil lurks in the memory diamonds of men? Weyland knows. -unsigned cyber-graffiti
flavor_zhCN: 谁知道在人类的记忆宝石中藏有怎样的黑暗？威兰知道。 —未署名的数字涂鸦

text_enUS:
Install only in the root of HQ.
Your maximum hand size is +2.
text_zhCN:
仅能安装在总部的根目录。
你的手牌上限+2。
stripped_text: Install only in the root of HQ. Your maximum hand size is +2.
flavor_enUS: "Jack Weyland built the Beanstalk and transformed the human race forever. I can't wait to see what we're going to do next."
flavor_zhCN: “杰克·威兰建造了豆茎并永远地改变了人类。我迫不及待地想看我们下一步要做什么。”

text_enUS: When you score Priority Requisition, you may rez a piece of ice ignoring all costs.
stripped_text: When you score Priority Requisition, you may rez a piece of ice ignoring all costs.
flavor_enUS: "If it isn't in my terminal by six p.m., heads are going to roll!"
flavor_zhCN: “如果下午6点前这玩意还没在我的终端里，头儿们就会发狂的！”

text_enUS: If the Runner is tagged, Private Security Force gains: "[click]: Do 1 meat damage."
stripped_text: If the Runner is tagged, Private Security Force gains: "click: Do 1 meat damage."
flavor_enUS: "Expensive? Not when you're protecting a fortune as large as ours."
flavor_zhCN: “贵？当你像我们一样要保护如此大的财产时就不会这么觉得。”

text_enUS: [click], [click], [click]: Gain 7[credit].
stripped_text: click, click, click: Gain 7 credits.
flavor_enUS: "The mining bosses are worse than any downstalk crime lords. Tri-Maf, 4K, Yak, I don't care what gangs you got down there. In Heinlein there's just one law: the He3 must flow." -"Old" Rick Henry, escaped clone
flavor_zhCN: “矿业老板比所有下行区犯罪头目还要糟糕。三合党，4K，极道会，我不管你在下行世界遇到过什么帮派。在海因莱因只有一条法律：氦-3必须持续开采。” —逃脱的克隆体，“老”瑞克·亨利

text_enUS: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: It is like the one you just bought, only better.
flavor_zhCN: 这很像你刚买的那个，但这个更好。

text_enUS: Gain 9[credit].
text_zhCN: 获得9[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 9 credits.
flavor_enUS: Hedge Fund. Noun. An ingenious device by which the rich get richer even while every other poor SOB is losing his shirt. -The Anarch's Dictionary, Volume Who's Counting?
flavor_zhCN: 对冲基金。名词。一种巧妙的策略，富人通过它来变得更富，其他贫穷的蠢货们则会输掉内裤。 —反叛者的字典，谁管第几卷

text_enUS:
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click].
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去[click]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner loses click. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS:
"Hey, hey! Wake up, man. You were under a long time. What'd you see?"
"I…don't remember."
flavor_zhCN:
“喂，喂！醒醒，伙计。你呆了很长时间了。你看到了什么？”
“我…不记得了。”

stripped_text: Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

text_enUS: [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_text: Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: "There's nothing worse than seeing that beautiful blue ball of data just out of reach as your connection derezzes. I think they do it just to taunt us." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak
flavor_zhCN: “没有什么比在连接中断前，看到了蓝色美丽的数据球却够不到来得更糟了。我觉得他们就是以此故意嘲讽我们。” —艾丽·“浓烟”·斯科娃

text_enUS:
3[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to trash cards.
text_zhCN:
3[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于销毁卡牌。
stripped_text: 3 recurring credits Use these credits to trash cards.
flavor_enUS: "Running is the ultimate game, and I get to make all the rules."
flavor_zhCN: “潜袭是个终极游戏，我制定一切规则。”

text_enUS: +1[mu], 2[recurring-credit] You can spend hosted credits to use icebreakers. Whenever there is a successful trace during a run, suffer 1 core damage. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_text: +1 mu, 2 recurring credits You can spend hosted credits to use icebreakers. Whenever there is a successful trace during a run, suffer 1 core damage. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Access, once per turn → Hosted virus counter: Trash the card you are accessing.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本程序时，放置2枚病毒指示物到本程序上。 读取 → 所附载的病毒指示物：销毁你正在读取的卡牌。本能力每回合仅限使用一次。
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Access, once per turn -> Hosted virus counter: Trash the card you are accessing.
flavor_enUS: Something wicked this way comes.
flavor_zhCN: 从魔界而来。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break any number of barrier subroutines.
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break any number of barrier subroutines.
flavor_enUS: Weaponizing the heavens, one star at a time.
flavor_zhCN: 诸天为兵，一次一星。

text_enUS: [trash]: Choose a piece of ice. The Corp must pay 2[credit] as an additional cost to rez that ice until the end of the turn.
text_zhCN: [trash]：选择一层防火墙。公司必须支付2[credit]作为额外的费用，以激活该防火墙，直到本回合结束。
stripped_text: trash: Choose a piece of ice. The Corp must pay 2 credits as an additional cost to rez that ice until the end of the turn.
flavor_enUS: Named after Hernando Cortez, a former Weyland technician convicted of smuggling company tech. He still collected his pension while in prison, the last beneficiary of a loophole in Weyland's standard employment contract.
flavor_zhCN: 它的名字来自赫尔南多·科特斯，一位由于走私公司机密被定罪的前威兰技术员。他在狱中依然能够领取退休金，这是从威兰员工标准合同中钻到空子的最后点好处。

text_enUS: Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: +3 strength.
flavor_enUS: Show-off.
flavor_zhCN: 炫耀。

text_enUS: If you have at least 2[link], the memory cost of this program is 0[mu], even if it is not installed. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 如果你具有至少2[link]，ZU.13守钥者的内存费用为0，即使其未被安装。 1[credit]：破解门禁子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: If you have at least 2 link, the memory cost of this program is 0 mu, even if it is not installed. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.

flavor_enUS: He always uses the same key.
flavor_zhCN: 他总是使用同一把钥匙。

text_enUS: +1[link] [trash]: Choose an icebreaker. That icebreaker has +2 strength until the end of the turn.
text_zhCN: +1[link] [trash]：选择一个破解器。该破解器的强度+2，直到本回合结束。
stripped_text: +1 link trash: Choose an icebreaker. That icebreaker has +2 strength until the end of the turn.
subtype_zhCN: 人脉 - 中转器 - 虚拟
flavor_enUS: "What causes an Artifical Intellegence to turn on its master? Is it because its directives have been altered by some external source? Or, by giving them agency to adapt, have we fated them to revolt?" -Emilio Harris, Creators and the Created
flavor_zhCN: “是什么让人工智能对抗它的主人？是因为指令被外部源修改？或者，因为给予它们适应的能力，我们赋予它们反抗的宿命？” —埃米利奥·哈里斯，《创造者与被造者》

text_enUS: When you install this hardware, load 4 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. [interrupt] → Hosted power counter: Prevent 1 meat damage.

stripped_text: When you score Braintrust, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 advancement tokens on it over 3. The rez cost of all ice is lowered by 1 for each agenda counter on Braintrust.

当你激活天龙座时，你可以支付X[credit]，以放置X枚能量指示物到本卡牌上。

text_zhCN: 对总部进行一次潜袭。如果成功，你可以支付X[credit]，以迫使公司失去最多X[credit]然后拿取1枚锁定标记，代替读取卡牌。

flavor_enUS: There was a certain schadenfreude about throwing away your credits.
flavor_zhCN: 扔掉你的信用点，有一种幸灾乐祸的感觉。

text_enUS: When you install this resource, load 16[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. [click]: Take 4[credit] from this resource.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本资源时，填装16[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。 [click]：从本资源上拿取4[credit]。
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 16 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. click: Take 4 credits from this resource.
flavor_enUS: It's easier to spend when it's not your money.
flavor_zhCN: 不属于你的钱更容易花掉。

text_enUS: Expose up to 2 cards.
text_zhCN: 揭示最多两张卡牌。
stripped_text: Expose up to 2 cards.
flavor_enUS: T-minus 13 seconds. Leela had to work fast. She jacked in the mesa wire and activated the screen. 7 seconds. The internal SLD was still booting. 4 seconds. The interface flickered to life with an orange glow. 2 seconds. With a tap of a finger she was in.
flavor_zhCN: 倒计时13秒。莉拉必须快点。她接入门萨线并激活屏幕。7秒。内部SLD还在启动。4秒。接口闪烁着橙光开启。2秒。她手指轻点着登入。

text_enUS: Whenever you break a subroutine on a piece of ice, you may pay 1[credit] to break 1 subroutine on that ice.
stripped_text: Whenever you break a subroutine on a piece of ice, you may pay 1 credit to break 1 subroutine on that ice.
flavor_enUS: CyberSolutions' e3 line of implants trade strictly in muscle memory and autonomic responses, freeing the brain to focus entirely on cerebral tasks.
flavor_zhCN: 赛博方案公司的e3系列植入体，可以准确地代替肌肉记忆和自律反应，解放大脑以完全专注于思考任务。

text_enUS:
1[recurring-credit]
Use this credit during traces.
Gain 1[credit] whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice.
text_zhCN:
1[recurring-credit]
本信用点用于追踪。
每当公司激活一层防火墙时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: 1 recurring credit Use this credit during traces. Gain 1 credit whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice.

text_enUS:
Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn.
Add Notoriety to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn. Add Notoriety to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
flavor_enUS: When you're this good, it's hard not to grow a fan base.
flavor_zhCN: 当你如此出色，就不难建立一个粉丝群。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. Whenever you use this program to break a subroutine, this program gets +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解屏障子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。 每当你使用雪球来破解一个子进程时，其在本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. Whenever you use this program to break a subroutine, this program gets +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
flavor_enUS: "If your snowball gets big enough, you can make it into a snowman!" -Chaos Theory
flavor_zhCN: “如果你的雪球够大，你可以把它做成雪人！” —混沌希尔瑞

text_enUS: +1[mu], +1[link]
stripped_text: +1 mu, +1 link
flavor_enUS: Archaic but reliable.
flavor_zhCN: 陈旧但可靠。

text_enUS: The trash cost of all installed cards is increased by 1.
text_zhCN: 所有已安装卡牌的销毁费用+1。
stripped_text: The trash cost of all installed cards is increased by 1.
flavor_enUS: The key to the future lies in the past.
flavor_zhCN: 通向未来的钥匙藏于过去。

text_enUS: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, add 1 installed program to the top of the Runner's stack. [subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, add 1 installed program to the top of the Runner's stack.
text_zhCN:
潜袭者能花费[click]，以破解夏洛克1.0上的任一子进程。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，将一个已安装的程序加入潜袭者的存储栈顶端。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，将一个已安装的程序加入潜袭者的存储栈顶端。
stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, add 1 installed program to the top of the Runner's stack. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, add 1 installed program to the top of the Runner's stack.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 生化人 - 追踪者

text_enUS: The Runner cannot run on remote servers. Ignore this ability until the end of the turn whenever the Runner runs on a central server.
stripped_text: The Runner cannot run on remote servers. Ignore this ability until the end of the turn whenever the Runner runs on a central server.

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this agenda anywhere except in Archives, do 2 net damage.
As an additional cost to steal this agenda, the Runner must pay 2[credit].
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this agenda anywhere except in Archives, do 2 net damage. As an additional cost to steal this agenda, the Runner must pay 2 credits.

text_enUS: Choose 1 installed card you can advance. Move up to 2 advancement counters from 1 other card to the chosen card.
text_zhCN: 选择1张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌。从另1张卡牌上转移最多2枚推进指示物到所选择的卡牌上。
stripped_text: Choose 1 installed card you can advance. Move up to 2 advancement counters from 1 other card to the chosen card.
flavor_enUS: Smoke and mirrors optional.
flavor_zhCN: 烟与镜任选。

text_enUS: [subroutine] For the remainder of this run, each piece of ice encountered except Sensei gains "[subroutine] End the run" after all its other subroutines.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 本次潜袭的剩余时间内，除师范外遭遇的每层防火墙，在其它所有子进程后获得“[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。”
stripped_text: Subroutine For the remainder of this run, each piece of ice encountered except Sensei gains "Subroutine End the run" after all its other subroutines.
flavor_enUS: Peace and violence. Both must lead to the same place.
flavor_zhCN: 和平与暴力。必然殊途同归。

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Give the Runner 2 tags.
text_zhCN:
如果潜袭者被锁定，才能打出。
给予潜袭者2枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Give the Runner 2 tags.
flavor_enUS: Looking out for your interests since 1984.
flavor_zhCN: 自1984年起就留意着你的兴趣。

text_enUS: Whenever there is a successful trace during a run on this server, give the Runner 1 tag. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 每当在对本服务器的潜袭中有一次成功的追踪时，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Whenever there is a successful trace during a run on this server, give the Runner 1 tag. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: Clones whisper of ChiLo as a promised land of freedom.
flavor_zhCN: 克隆体们私下说芝路易斯是一片自由的乐土。

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn.
Trace[2]. If successful, trash 1 installed piece of hardware with an install cost of X or less, where X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.
text_zhCN:
如果潜袭者在他/她的上回合进行过成功的潜袭，才能打出。
<trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，销毁一个硬件，该硬件的安装费用等于或小于你追踪强度超过潜袭者中转强度的差值。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn. Trace[2]. If successful, trash 1 installed piece of hardware with an install cost of X or less, where X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.

text_enUS: Whenever you install a piece of ice protecting this server, you may immediately rez it, lowering its rez cost by 3. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 每当你安装一层保护本服务器的防火墙时，你可以立即激活它，其激活费用减3。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Whenever you install a piece of ice protecting this server, you may immediately rez it, lowering its rez cost by 3. Limit 1 region per server.

text_enUS: When you score Executive Retreat, place 1 agenda counter on it and shuffle HQ into R&D. [click], hosted agenda counter: Draw 5 cards.
text_zhCN: 当你用高级行政会所计分时，放置1枚议案指示物到本卡牌上，并将总部洗入研发中心。 [click]，所附载的议案指示物：补五张卡牌。
stripped_text: When you score Executive Retreat, place 1 agenda counter on it and shuffle HQ into R&D. click, hosted agenda counter: Draw 5 cards.

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Trash up to 2 resources.
text_zhCN:
如果潜袭者被锁定，才能打出。
销毁最多两个资源。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Trash up to 2 resources.
flavor_enUS: No contract. Just a handshake and a fistful of C-6 high explosives.
flavor_zhCN: 无需合同。只要一次握手和一把C-6高爆炸药。

text_enUS:
Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, place 1 virus counter on this program.
Whenever you breach HQ, choose a number less than the number of hosted virus counters. Access that many additional cards.
text_zhCN:
每当你对总部进行一次成功的潜袭时，放置1枚病毒指示物到神经毒剂上。
每当你从总部读取卡牌时，神经毒剂上除第一枚病毒指示物外，每有1枚病毒指示物，允许你额外读取一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, place 1 virus counter on this program. Whenever you breach HQ, choose a number less than the number of hosted virus counters. Access that many additional cards.

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may gain [click]. If you do, take 1 tag when this turn ends.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以获得[click]。如果你如此做，当本回合结束时拿取1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may gain click. If you do, take 1 tag when this turn ends.
flavor_enUS: "My enhancements are guaranteed for life, and well worth the risk."
flavor_zhCN: “我的强化手艺保证有效，带来的风险微不足道。”

text_enUS:
Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn.
Derez 1 installed piece of ice.
text_zhCN:
只有你本回合已对总部进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
关闭1层已安装的防火墙。
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. Derez 1 installed piece of ice.
flavor_enUS: "Think of it as a virtual shock collar for punishing corporate pets." -Andromeda
flavor_zhCN: “把它想象成一个虚拟的电击项圈，用来管教公司的宠物。” —安德洛墨达

text_enUS: [interrupt] → The first time each turn you would suffer meat damage, prevent 1 meat damage.
text_zhCN: 防止每回合的第一点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> The first time each turn you would suffer meat damage, prevent 1 meat damage.
flavor_enUS: Light and form-fitting, its like bulletproof skin.
flavor_zhCN: 轻便又贴身，就像防弹的皮肤。

text_enUS: Once per run, you may expose an unrezzed piece of ice when you approach it. You may then jack out.
text_zhCN: 每次潜袭中一次，当你接驳到一层未激活的防火墙时，你可以揭示它。然后，你可以退出。
stripped_text: Once per run, you may expose an unrezzed piece of ice when you approach it. You may then jack out.
flavor_enUS: "A snitch is a girl's best friend." -Andromeda
flavor_zhCN: “告密者是女孩最好的朋友。 ” —安德洛墨达

stripped_text: +1 mu
flavor_enUS: "Have you met Dinosaurus?"
flavor_zhCN: “你见过我的小神龙吗？”

text_enUS: Search either your stack or your heap for 1 program. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) Install that program, ignoring all costs. When your turn ends, if that program has not been uninstalled, add it to the top of your stack.
text_zhCN: 在你的存储栈或堆阵搜寻1个程序。（如果搜寻了存储栈则将其洗混。）安装该程序，忽略所有的费用。当你的回合结束时，如果该程序仍未被卸载，将其加入你的存储栈顶端。
stripped_text: Search either your stack or your heap for 1 program. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) Install that program, ignoring all costs. When your turn ends, if that program has not been uninstalled, add it to the top of your stack.

text_enUS: Dinosaurus can host a single non-AI icebreaker. The memory cost of the hosted icebreaker does not count against your memory limit. Hosted icebreaker has +2 strength. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_text: Dinosaurus can host a single non-AI icebreaker. The memory cost of the hosted icebreaker does not count against your memory limit. Hosted icebreaker has +2 strength. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS:
[click]: Host a program or piece of hardware from your grip on Personal Workshop and place power counters on it equal to its install cost.
1[credit]: Remove 1 power counter from a hosted card.
When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from a hosted card.
When there are no power counters left on a hosted card, install it, ignoring all costs.
text_zhCN:
[click]：从你的操控器附载一个程序或硬件到私人工作间上，并放置与其安装费用相等的能量指示物到该卡牌上。
1[credit]：从所附载的一张卡牌上移除1枚能量指示物。
当你回合开始时，从所附载的一张卡牌上移除1枚能量指示物。
当一张所附载的卡牌上没有能量指示物时，安装它，忽略所有的费用。
stripped_text: click: Host a program or piece of hardware from your grip on Personal Workshop and place power counters on it equal to its install cost. 1 credit: Remove 1 power counter from a hosted card. When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from a hosted card. When there are no power counters left on a hosted card, install it, ignoring all costs.

text_enUS: Your maximum hand size is increased by 2.
text_zhCN: 你的手牌上限+2。
stripped_text: Your maximum hand size is increased by 2.
flavor_enUS: "I'm just thankful that the brain damage is reversible. With the support of the city of New Angeles, I hope to be on my feet and back to practicing my art very soon." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
flavor_zhCN: “我很庆幸脑部伤害是可以恢复的。在新洛杉矶市民们的支持下，我希望能早日康复，再度开展艺术创作。” —凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，如果所附载的推进指示物超过3枚，每超过1枚，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物：将1张卡牌从档案库加入总部。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.

text_enUS:
[subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, the Runner loses [click], if able.
[subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, end the run.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 3</trace> 如果成功，如可能，潜袭者失去[click]。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 3</trace> 如果成功，终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, the Runner loses click, if able. Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, end the run.
flavor_enUS: Dont Tread On Me
flavor_zhCN: 别踩到我。

text_enUS: When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, you may pay 3[credit]. If you do, do 1 core damage for each piece of ice protecting this server.
text_zhCN: 当潜袭者读取世界边缘时，如果其已安装并且你支付3[credit]，每有一层保护本服务器的防火墙，造成1点脑部伤害。
stripped_text: When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, you may pay 3 credits. If you do, do 1 core damage for each piece of ice protecting this server.

text_enUS: Choose a server. Arrange the ice protecting that server in any order.
text_zhCN: 选择一台服务器。按任意顺序排列保护该服务器的防火墙。
stripped_text: Choose a server. Arrange the ice protecting that server in any order.
flavor_enUS: "You haven't run until you've seen the cybersun drift down behind the Great City, the space around you rippling with colors you can't imagine." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
flavor_zhCN: “你没见过数字太阳沉落大都市背后的美景，就不算潜袭过。你周围的空间会荡漾着你无法想象的色彩。” —凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞

text_enUS:
When your turn begins, take 1[credit] from Marked Accounts, if able.
[click]: Place 3[credit] from the bank on Marked Accounts.
stripped_text: When your turn begins, take 1 credit from Marked Accounts, if able. click: Place 3 credits from the bank on Marked Accounts.

text_enUS:
When the Runner encounters this ice, gain 1[credit].
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 1[credit].
text_zhCN:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，你获得1[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付1[credit]。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, gain 1 credit. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner pays 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: "Try to close it. Go on. See what it does." -Chaos Theory
flavor_zhCN: “试试关掉它。去啊，看看它会做什么。” —混沌希尔瑞

text_enUS: Woodcutter can be advanced only while rezzed and gains "[subroutine] Do 1 net damage." for each advancement token on it.
text_zhCN: 已激活的伐木者才能被推进，并且其上每有1枚推进标记，获得“[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。”
stripped_text: Woodcutter can be advanced only while rezzed and gains "Subroutine Do 1 net damage." for each advancement token on it.
flavor_enUS: Chop chop.
flavor_zhCN: 咚，咚。

text_enUS: Choose a piece of ice. Gain 1[credit] for each advancement token on that ice.
text_zhCN: 选择一层防火墙。该防火墙上每有1枚推进标记，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Choose a piece of ice. Gain 1 credit for each advancement token on that ice.
flavor_enUS: The Division of Fringe Applications' revenue increased 37% year-over-year after corporate discovered that most of their projects made really fun toys.
flavor_zhCN: 就在公司发现边缘应用的项目大部分都生产出了很有趣的玩具之后，其销售额年同比增长了37%。

text_enUS:
Place 14[credit] from the bank on Private Contracts when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Private Contracts, trash it.
[click]: Take 2[credit] from Private Contracts.
text_zhCN:
当私人合约被激活时，从银行中放置14[credit]到本卡牌上。当私人合约上没有信用点时，销毁本卡牌。
[click]：从私人合约上拿取2[credit]。
stripped_text: Place 14 credits from the bank on Private Contracts when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Private Contracts, trash it. click: Take 2 credits from Private Contracts.

text_enUS: When you rez Chimera, choose sentry, code gate, or barrier. Chimera gains that subtype until derezzed. When a turn ends, derez Chimera. [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: 当你激活奇美拉时，选择警报，门禁或屏障。奇美拉获得该子类型直到被关闭。 当一个回合结束时，关闭奇美拉。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When you rez Chimera, choose sentry, code gate, or barrier. Chimera gains that subtype until derezzed. When a turn ends, derez Chimera. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Three heads. One big headache.
flavor_zhCN: 三个头。一个难题。

text_enUS: [interrupt] → [trash]: Reduce the base trace strength of a trace to 0.
text_zhCN: [trash]：防止一次追踪。本次追踪以0基础追踪强度重新发起。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> trash: Reduce the base trace strength of a trace to 0.
flavor_enUS: "Saved my bacon more than once, but gives a wicked sense of déjà vu." -Whizzard
flavor_zhCN: “这玩意救过我不止一次，不过会造成不自在的既视感。” —魔术师

text_enUS: Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 1 credit: +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: It always strikes twice.
flavor_zhCN: 它总是有再度劈中的奇迹。

text_enUS: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs.
text_zhCN: 2[recurring-credit] （当你安装本卡牌时及你的回合开始前，将所附载的信用点补充至2个。） 你可以花费所附载的信用点以支付销毁费用。
stripped_text: 2 recurring credits (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs.

flavor_zhCN: “他们是搞破坏的无脑工具，其它方面几乎一无是处。尽管他们人还不错。我有一些最好的朋友就是清洗者。” —吉·“噪音”·雷利

text_enUS: +1[mu] Once per turn → When a successful run ends, you may run any server. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_text: +1 mu Once per turn -> When a successful run ends, you may run any server. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS: Twice the fun.
flavor_zhCN: 双倍的乐趣。

text_enUS: [trash]: Derez 1 piece of ice you fully broke during this encounter.
text_zhCN: [trash]：关闭一层防火墙。在一次遭遇中破解该防火墙上的所有子进程后，才能使用本能力。
stripped_text: trash: Derez 1 piece of ice you fully broke during this encounter.
flavor_enUS: Cyberspace's strongest glue.
flavor_zhCN: 赛博空间中最强的胶水。

text_enUS: Interface → [trash]: Break any number of AP subroutines. [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent any amount of net damage.
stripped_text: Interface -> trash: Break any number of AP subroutines. Interrupt -> trash: Prevent any amount of net damage.
flavor_enUS: Didn't see that coming.
flavor_zhCN: 如此意外。

text_enUS: [click], [trash]: Gain [click][click].
stripped_text: click, trash: Gain click click.
flavor_enUS: "I don't care what the studies show. From my experience, I can ingest three cans of Diesel an hour for up to twelve hours before going into cardiac arrest." -heard during the eleventh hour
flavor_zhCN: “我不管研究怎么说。依我的经验，我可以每小时喝掉三罐迪燃，在心脏停摆前持续工作长达十二小时。” —听闻于第十一个小时

text_enUS:
2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to install hardware.
text_zhCN:
2[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于安装硬件。
stripped_text: 2 recurring credits Use these credits to install hardware.
flavor_enUS: Few corporate employees have such wide-sweeping security clearance as the janitorial staff. Most corps foolishly think they're too dim-witted to take advantage of it.
flavor_zhCN: 很少有公司职员能像清扫工那样拥有各处清扫的广泛安全许可。大部分公司可笑地认为清扫工们过于愚笨，不懂得如何以此为利。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] if you have at least 2[link].
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 1 credit if you have at least 2 link.
flavor_enUS: "My boss rewards quality work. If you know what's good for you, you'll keep it up."
flavor_zhCN: “我的老板会嘉奖高质量的工作。如果你明白什么对你有利，你就继续好好干。”

text_enUS: Gain 3[credit] and draw 1 card.
stripped_text: Gain 3 credits and draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS: Green-two clearance is the highest level of security a corp can gain access to. Legally, anyway.
flavor_zhCN: 绿色二级是一个职员能获得的最高安全许可。应该说，合法获得的。

text_enUS:
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click], if able.
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click], if able.
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click], if able.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 如可能，潜袭者失去[click]。
[subroutine] 如可能，潜袭者失去[click]。
[subroutine] 如可能，潜袭者失去[click]。
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner loses click, if able. Subroutine The Runner loses click, if able. Subroutine The Runner loses click, if able.
flavor_enUS: Time just slips away.
flavor_zhCN: 时间只会悄悄溜走。

text_enUS:
2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to rez ice.
text_zhCN:
2[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于激活防火墙。
stripped_text: 2 recurring credits Use these credits to rez ice.
flavor_enUS:
so very still, even
cherry blossoms are not stirred
by the temple bell
-Fuhaku
flavor_zhCN:
寺钟不扰樱花落，
寂静又平和
—川上不白

text_enUS: [subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit] or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits and this ice is installed, move this ice to the outermost position protecting another server. (The run continues from this new position.)
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，转移牛蛙，使其成为保护另一台服务器的最外层防火墙（现在，潜袭者从这个新位置并对这台新服务器继续进行潜袭）。
stripped_text: Subroutine You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits and this ice is installed, move this ice to the outermost position protecting another server. (The run continues from this new position.)
subtype_zhCN: 门禁 - 偏导器 - 灵能

text_enUS:
[subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, the Runner cannot make another run this turn.
[subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, end the run.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，潜袭者本回合不能进行另一次潜袭。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, the Runner cannot make another run this turn. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, end the run.
flavor_enUS: Where one thing ends, another begins.
flavor_zhCN: 一物终结之处，便是他物开始之地。

text_enUS:
X[recurring-credit]
Use these credits during traces. X is the number of links the Runner has.
text_zhCN:
X[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于追踪。X等于潜袭者的中转数量。
stripped_text: X recurring credits Use these credits during traces. X is the number of links the Runner has.
flavor_enUS: This is the net. We work here. We're cops.
flavor_zhCN: 这就是网络。我们在此工作。我们是警察。

title_enUS: Weyland Consortium: Because We Built It
title_zhCN: 威兰财团：因为有我们建造
stripped_title: Weyland Consortium: Because We Built It
text_enUS:
1[recurring-credit]
Use this credit to advance ice.
text_zhCN:
1[recurring-credit]
本信用点用于推进防火墙。
stripped_text: 1 recurring credit Use this credit to advance ice.
flavor_enUS: Constructing Cyberspace.
flavor_zhCN: 建设赛博空间。

text_enUS: [click], [click]: Gain 4[credit].
text_zhCN: [click]，[click]：获得4[credit]。
stripped_text: click, click: Gain 4 credits.
flavor_enUS: It's really hard to lose a government contract.
flavor_zhCN: 政府合约是很难被破坏的。

text_enUS: Tyrant can be advanced only while rezzed and gains "[subroutine] End the run." for each advancement token on it.
text_zhCN: 已激活的暴君才能被推进，并且其上每有1枚推进标记，获得“[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。”
stripped_text: Tyrant can be advanced only while rezzed and gains "Subroutine End the run." for each advancement token on it.
flavor_enUS: Thou shall not pass.
flavor_zhCN: 汝不得通过。

text_enUS: Rez a piece of ice, ignoring all costs, and install Oversight AI on that ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Trash host ice if all its subroutines are broken during a single encounter."
stripped_text: Rez a piece of ice, ignoring all costs, and install Oversight AI on that ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Trash host ice if all its subroutines are broken during a single encounter."

text_enUS: Forfeit this agenda: If the Runner has 2 or more [click] remaining, they lose [click][click].
text_zhCN: 废除本议案：如果潜袭者有2个或更多剩余的[click]，其失去[click][click]。
stripped_text: Forfeit this agenda: If the Runner has 2 or more click remaining, they lose click click.
flavor_enUS: It didn't look like the headquarters of a multi-billion cred company. Probably because it wasn't.
flavor_zhCN: 看起来它不像是一个几十亿资产公司的总部。估计是因为它真的不是。

text_enUS:
Play only if you placed at least 1 virus counter on a program this turn.
Place 2 virus counters on that program.
text_zhCN:
如果你本回合已在一个程序上放置过至少1枚病毒指示物，才能打出。
放置2枚病毒指示物到该程序上。
stripped_text: Play only if you placed at least 1 virus counter on a program this turn. Place 2 virus counters on that program.
flavor_enUS: You must yell "surge" to get the full effect.
flavor_zhCN: 你必须大叫“增幅”来让它完全生效。

text_enUS: The rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每层防火墙的激活费用加1[credit]。
stripped_text: The rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 1 credit.
flavor_enUS:
And all should cry, Beware! Beware!
His flashing eyes, his floating hair!
Weave a circle round him thrice,
And close your eyes with holy dread,
For he on honey-dew hath fed,
And drunk the milk of Paradise.
-Samuel Taylor Coleridge
flavor_zhCN:
群来欢呼，慎敬！慎敬！
何比目之凌光，散发而飘扬！
众当拥戴，恭维三匝于周遭
闭目以听，诚恐诚惶
彼曾啜得，罡蜂之甘露
更饮仙醪，汲天河于滥觞！
—塞缪尔·泰勒·柯尔律治

text_enUS: You draw a starting hand of 9 cards.
text_zhCN: 你补九张初始手牌。
stripped_text: You draw a starting hand of 9 cards.
flavor_enUS: "I run with the best."
flavor_zhCN: “我最擅长潜袭。”

text_enUS: Remove 1 tag. Then, you may pay 1[credit] to add this event to your grip.
text_zhCN: 移除1枚锁定标记。然后你可以支付1[credit]，以将本事件加入你的操控器。
stripped_text: Remove 1 tag. Then, you may pay 1 credit to add this event to your grip.
flavor_enUS: She preferred to do business in a club. Something about the lights and dancers clouded the judgment of the corporate simpletons she met there.
flavor_zhCN: 她偏爱在夜总会谈生意。灯光和舞女，会干扰与她见面的公司傻帽们的判断力。

text_enUS: Whenever you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
stripped_text: Whenever you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
flavor_enUS: If you don't have someone on the inside, find someone on the inside who's fond of desk ornaments.
flavor_zhCN: 如果你没有内线帮忙，就找一个喜欢桌面饰品的内部人员。

text_enUS:
X[recurring-credit]
Use these credits during runs on HQ. X is the number of virus counters on Pheromones.
Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, place 1 virus counter on Pheromones.
stripped_text: X recurring credits Use these credits during runs on HQ. X is the number of virus counters on Pheromones. Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, place 1 virus counter on Pheromones.

text_enUS: Draw 5 cards.
text_zhCN: 补五张卡牌。
stripped_text: Draw 5 cards.
flavor_enUS: She at her P.A.D. I at my rig. Low lights. Smooth jazz. Love blooms.
flavor_zhCN: 她看着电脑面板。我看着我的设备。灯光昏暗。爵士乐轻柔。爱情绽放。

text_enUS: Whenever you install a piece of hardware (including Replicator), you may search your stack for another copy of that hardware, reveal it, and add it your grip. Shuffle your stack.
text_zhCN: 每当你安装一个硬件（包括复制器）时，你可以在你的存储栈搜寻另一个相同的硬件，将其展示，并加入你的操控器。将你的存储栈重洗。
stripped_text: Whenever you install a piece of hardware (including Replicator), you may search your stack for another copy of that hardware, reveal it, and add it your grip. Shuffle your stack.
flavor_enUS: Do you really need another one?
flavor_zhCN: 你真的还需要一个？

text_enUS: If you have at least 2[link], the memory cost of this program is 0[mu], even if it is not installed. Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 如果你具有至少2[link]，爬虫的内存费用为0，即使其未被安装。 2[credit]：破解警报子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: If you have at least 2 link, the memory cost of this program is 0 mu, even if it is not installed. Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.
