flavor_enUS:
"The itsy bitsy spider went up the data spout…"
-Chaos Theory
flavor_zhCN: “小蜘蛛爬呀爬，爬到数据水管上…” —混沌希尔瑞

text_enUS:
Play only if you stole an agenda this turn.
Choose a server. The Corp trashes 1 piece of ice protecting that server.
text_zhCN:
如果你本回合已窃取过一个议案，才能打出。
选择一台服务器。公司销毁一层保护该服务器的防火墙。
stripped_text: Play only if you stole an agenda this turn. Choose a server. The Corp trashes 1 piece of ice protecting that server.
flavor_enUS: Early permutations of the kraken proved to be insatiable, ice-devouring marauders. Not much has changed.
flavor_zhCN: 早期海怪的阵势表明它们是群饕餮无厌、吞噬冰墙的怪物。至今没什么大改变。

text_enUS: You cannot use this resource more than once per turn. [click]: Place 3[credit] on this resource. [click]: Take all credits from this resource.
stripped_text: You cannot use this resource more than once per turn. click: Place 3[credit] on this resource. click: Take all credits from this resource.
flavor_enUS: "You aren't the only type of runner in New Angeles."
flavor_zhCN: “你并不是新洛杉矶唯一的一类潜袭者。”

text_enUS:
Place 16[credit] from the bank on Eve Campaign when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Eve Campaign, trash it.
When your turn begins, take 2[credit] from Eve Campaign.
text_zhCN:
当伊芙营销计划被激活时，从银行中放置16[credit]到本卡牌上。当伊芙营销计划上没有信用点时，销毁本卡牌。
当你的回合开始时，从伊芙营销计划上拿取2[credit]。
stripped_text: Place 16 credits from the bank on Eve Campaign when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Eve Campaign, trash it. When your turn begins, take 2 credits from Eve Campaign.

text_enUS: Shuffle 1 card from HQ into R&D.
text_zhCN: 将一张卡牌从总部洗入研发中心。
stripped_text: Shuffle 1 card from HQ into R&D.
flavor_enUS: Also known as "development hell."
flavor_zhCN: 又称“开发者地狱”。

text_enUS: [subroutine] The Runner cannot jack out for the remainder of this run. Trash Whirlpool.
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner cannot jack out for the remainder of this run. Trash Whirlpool.
flavor_enUS: "This ice sucks." -g00ru
flavor_zhCN: “这防火墙太扯了。” —精神0袖

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, do 1 net damage. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 每当潜袭者对本服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，造成1点网域伤害。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, do 1 net damage. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: Despite its appearance, the Hokusai Grid is the most notorious research facility at Jinteki.
flavor_zhCN: 不管看起来如何，北斋网阵是人间会社最声名狼藉的研究设施。

text_enUS: [subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, look at the top X cards of the stack, where X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength. Trash 1 of those cards and arrange the rest in any order.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，查看潜袭者存储栈顶端的数张卡牌，其数量等于你追踪强度超过他/她中转强度的差值。销毁其中一张卡牌，并按任意顺序排列余下的卡牌。
stripped_text: Subroutine Trace[2]. If successful, look at the top X cards of the stack, where X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength. Trash 1 of those cards and arrange the rest in any order.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 追踪者 - 观察者
flavor_enUS: Sniff.
flavor_zhCN: 嗅嗅。

text_enUS: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, Trace[5]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. If unsuccessful, trash Bernice Mai.
stripped_text: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, Trace[5]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. If unsuccessful, trash Bernice Mai.
flavor_enUS: Keeping tabs on the world, one screen at a time.
flavor_zhCN: 屏幕一个接一个，密切关注全世界。

text_enUS: Salvage can be advanced only while rezzed and gains “[subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.” for each advancement token on it.
text_zhCN: 已激活的打捞者才能被推进，并且其上每有1枚推进标记，获得“[subroutine] <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。”
stripped_text: Salvage can be advanced only while rezzed and gains Subroutine Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. for each advancement token on it.
flavor_enUS: You're not in Kansas anymore.
flavor_zhCN: 你已经不再在堪萨斯了。

text_enUS:
2[recurring-credit]
You can spend hosted credits to take the basic action to advance cards in the root of or protecting this server.
text_zhCN:
2[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于推进本服务器内或保护本服务器的卡牌。
stripped_text: 2 recurring credits You can spend hosted credits to take the basic action to advance cards in the root of or protecting this server.
flavor_enUS: "A job done once is a job done right."
flavor_zhCN: “一次性完成工作才可谓正确地完成工作。”

text_enUS: Trace[7]. If successful, trash 1 virtual resource or 1 link.
text_zhCN: 追踪 7 如果成功，销毁一个虚拟资源或一个中转器。
stripped_text: Trace[7]. If successful, trash 1 virtual resource or 1 link.
flavor_enUS: "It's kind of like an anagram." -designer Phoenix
flavor_zhCN: “有点像个变位词。” —设计师菲尼克斯

text_enUS: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, you may install 1 program from your heap, ignoring all costs.
text_zhCN: 潜袭档案库。如果成功，你可以从你的堆阵安装1个程序，忽略所有的费用，代替侵入档案库。
stripped_text: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, you may install 1 program from your heap, ignoring all costs.

text_enUS:
Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 subroutine.
X is equal to the number of hosted virus counters.
When your turn begins, you may pay 1[credit] to place 1 virus counter on this program.
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 subroutine. X is equal to the number of hosted virus counters. When your turn begins, you may pay 1 credit to place 1 virus counter on this program.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 智能模块 - 病毒

text_enUS:
Install only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn.
If you are tagged, Data Leak Reversal gains "[click]: The Corp trashes the top card of R&D."
text_zhCN:
如果你本回合已对中央服务器进行过成功的潜袭，才能安装。
如果你被锁定，数据逆流器获得“[click]：公司销毁研发中心顶端的一张卡牌。”
stripped_text: Install only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn. If you are tagged, Data Leak Reversal gains "click: The Corp trashes the top card of R&D."
flavor_enUS: A two-way solution to a one-way problem, the data leak reversal, or DLR for short, is a misnomer. There is no actual reversal of data, only the creation of a parallel peer-to-peer link with the initial source.
flavor_zhCN: 数据逆流，简称DLR，是个解决单向问题的双向对策，但这其实是个误称。实际上它并没有逆转数据，只是向初始来源建立了一条平行的点对点连接。

text_enUS: Interface → 0[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, trash this program.
stripped_text: Interface -> 0 credits: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, trash this program.
flavor_enUS: Do you believe in faeries?
flavor_zhCN: 你相信有仙灵吗？

text_enUS: [click]: Draw 2 cards. When you do, add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack.
stripped_text: click: Draw 2 cards. When you do, add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack.
flavor_enUS:
"We're always happy to help, Mr. Santiago."
"I appreciate it, Mr. Li."
"We'll be in touch. And, Gabriel…"
"Yes?"
"Don't leave town."
flavor_zhCN:
“我们始终乐意提供帮助，圣地亚哥先生。”
“非常感谢，李先生。”
“我们会保持联系，另外，加布里埃尔…”
“怎么？”
“不要离开城市。”

text_enUS: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
stripped_text: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
flavor_enUS: A little corporate restructuring is necessary once in a while.
flavor_zhCN: 隔段时间来一次小小的公司重组是有必要的。

text_enUS: Whenever you breach R&D, access 1 additional card.
stripped_text: Whenever you breach R&D, access 1 additional card.
flavor_enUS: Works best at your own desk.
flavor_zhCN: 在你自己桌上工作的效果最好。

text_enUS:
Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on Deep Thought.
If there are at least 3 virus counters on Deep Thought, it gains "When your turn begins, you may look at the top card of R&D."
text_zhCN:
每当你对研发中心进行一次成功的潜袭时，放置1枚病毒指示物到沉思者上。
如果沉思者具有至少3枚病毒指示物，其获得“当你的回合开始时，你可以查看研发中心顶端的一张卡牌。”
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on Deep Thought. If there are at least 3 virus counters on Deep Thought, it gains "When your turn begins, you may look at the top card of R&D."

2[credit]：避免1枚锁定标记。
当你窃取一个议案时，销毁新洛杉矶市政厅。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> 2[credit]: Prevent 1 tag. When you steal an agenda, trash this resource.
flavor_enUS: "New Angeles is the jewel of modern civilization, and its government the envy of nations." -Mayor Wells
flavor_zhCN: “新洛杉矶是现代文明的瑰宝，其政府让他国羡慕不已。” —市长威尔斯

text_enUS: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] End the run. [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: 失去[click]：破解1条本防火墙上的子进程。只有潜袭者可以使用本能力。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run.

flavor_zhCN: “这违反了规则。创造者会发怒的。”

text_enUS: As an additional cost to make a run on this server, the Runner must spend [click]. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 作为对本服务器进行一次潜袭的额外费用，潜袭者必须花费[click]。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to make a run on this server, the Runner must spend click. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: Known for luxury hoppers and a delectable sauerkraut.
flavor_zhCN: 以豪华飞跃车和美味酸泡菜而闻名。

text_enUS: You can advance this asset. [click], [trash]: Do 3 net damage. Use this ability only if there are 4 or more hosted advancement counters.
text_zhCN: 你可以推进本资产。 [click]，[trash]：造成3点网域伤害。只有所附载的推进指示物有4枚或更多时，才能使用本能力。
stripped_text: You can advance this asset. click, trash: Do 3 net damage. Use this ability only if there are 4 or more hosted advancement counters.
flavor_enUS: "I will serve you…for a time."
flavor_zhCN: “我会为您服务…一阵子。”

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner approaches a piece of ice protecting this server, you may swap that ice with 1 piece of ice from HQ. (The new ice is installed unrezzed.) If you do, the Runner may jack out. Use this ability only once per run.
text_zhCN: 每次潜袭中一次，当潜袭者接驳到一层保护本服务器的防火墙时，你可以将该防火墙与总部中的一层防火墙互换。新防火墙被安装为未激活的状态。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner approaches a piece of ice protecting this server, you may swap that ice with 1 piece of ice from HQ. (The new ice is installed unrezzed.) If you do, the Runner may jack out. Use this ability only once per run.
flavor_enUS: "Looks like someone is being naughty…"
flavor_zhCN: “看起来有人不听话…”

title_zhCN: 网际传媒：世界是你们的*
text_enUS: Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
text_zhCN: 你的手牌上限+1。
stripped_text: Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
flavor_enUS: *Some restrictions may apply. Scan this card to find out more.
flavor_zhCN: *可能有部分限制条件，扫描本卡牌以发现更多讯息。

text_enUS:
When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 hosted advancement counters past 3.
This agenda is worth 1 more agenda point for each hosted agenda counter.
text_zhCN:
当你将本议案计分时，如果所附载的推进指示物超过3枚，每超过2枚，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。
每有1枚所附载的议案指示物，本议案的价值增加1点议案分数。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 hosted advancement counters past 3. This agenda is worth 1 more agenda point for each hosted agenda counter.

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner stole an agenda during their last turn.
Trace[6]. If successful, give the Runner X tags. X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded their link strength.
text_zhCN:
如果潜袭者在他/她的上回合窃取过一个议案，才能打出。
<trace>追踪 6</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者数枚锁定标记，其数量等于你追踪强度超过他/她中转强度的差值。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner stole an agenda during their last turn. Trace[6]. If successful, give the Runner X tags. X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded their link strength.

text_enUS: [subroutine]Trace[6]. If successful, trash 1 piece of hardware, do 2 meat damage (cannot be prevented), and end the run.
stripped_text: Subroutine Trace[6]. If successful, trash 1 piece of hardware, do 2 meat damage (cannot be prevented), and end the run.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 追踪者 - 杀伤
flavor_enUS: A bright light blossomed, and then the console went dark. That's when she smelled smoke.
flavor_zhCN: 一道亮光绽放，随后控制台熄灭。这时她闻到了烟味。

text_enUS: If the Runner is tagged, Dedicated Response Team gains "Whenever a successful run ends, do 2 meat damage."
stripped_text: If the Runner is tagged, Dedicated Response Team gains "Whenever a successful run ends, do 2 meat damage."
flavor_enUS: They don't call them dedicated for nothing.
flavor_zhCN: 他们被称为专属不是没有原因。

text_enUS: [subroutine] Trace[0]. If successful, the Runner trashes 1 program.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] <trace>追踪 0</trace> 如果成功，潜袭者销毁一个程序。
stripped_text: Subroutine Trace[0]. If successful, the Runner trashes 1 program.
flavor_enUS: "If I had to describe the bugs in one word, it would be '****ing annoying.'" -Whizzard
flavor_zhCN: “如果非要我用一个词描述这虫子，那将是'他X的烦人'。” —魔术师

text_enUS: If you have at least 7[credit] when you score Corporate War, gain 7[credit]; otherwise, lose all credits in your credit pool.
text_zhCN: 如果当你用公司大战计分时，你具有至少7[credit]，获得7[credit]；否则，失去你信用池中所有的信用点。
stripped_text: If you have at least 7 credits when you score Corporate War, gain 7 credits; otherwise, lose all credits in your credit pool.
flavor_enUS: There were several ways to win a corporate war. One of them was to bring out the bazookas.
flavor_zhCN: 有许多方法可以赢得公司大战。其中一种是拿出火箭炮。

text_enUS: Your maximum hand size is equal to the number of credits in your credit pool.
text_zhCN: 你的手牌上限等于你信用池中信用点的数量。
stripped_text: Your maximum hand size is equal to the number of credits in your credit pool.
flavor_enUS: The densest information cluster in the galaxy.
flavor_zhCN: 银河系中最密集的信息群。

title_zhCN: 生命定制所：专为成功设定
text_enUS: You cannot include Jinteki cards in this deck.
text_zhCN: 你在本牌组中不能包含[jinteki]卡牌。
stripped_text: You cannot include Jinteki cards in this deck.
flavor_enUS: The Once and Future Android.
flavor_zhCN: 永恒不变的安卓。

text_enUS: Before taking your first turn, you may install up to 3 pieces of ice, with no more than a single piece of ice per server. Draw until you have 5 cards in HQ.
text_zhCN: 在你开始第一个回合前，你可以安装最多三层防火墙，其中每台服务器的防火墙不多于一层。你将总部补到五张卡牌。
stripped_text: Before taking your first turn, you may install up to 3 pieces of ice, with no more than a single piece of ice per server. Draw until you have 5 cards in HQ.

text_enUS:
When you score this agenda, you may create a new remote server by installing up to 3 cards from HQ and/or Archives in the root of and/or protecting that server, ignoring all install costs.
Limit 1 per deck.
text_zhCN:
当你用总裁哈斯的宠儿计划计分时，你可以建立一台新的远程服务器，从总部和/或档案库安装最多三张卡牌（每次一张）到该服务器内和/或保护该服务器，忽略所有的安装费用。
每套牌组限制1张。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, you may create a new remote server by installing up to 3 cards from HQ and/or Archives in the root of and/or protecting that server, ignoring all install costs. Limit 1 per deck.

text_enUS: Place 3 agenda counters on Efficiency Committee when you score it. [click], hosted agenda counter: Gain [click][click]. You cannot advance cards for the remainder of this turn.
text_zhCN: 当你用效率委员会计分时，放置3枚议案指示物到本卡牌上。 [click]，所附载的议案指示物：获得[click][click]。本回合的剩余时间内你不能推进卡牌。
stripped_text: Place 3 agenda counters on Efficiency Committee when you score it. click, hosted agenda counter: Gain click click. You cannot advance cards for the remainder of this turn.

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, place 3 agenda counters on it. Hosted agenda counter: The rezzed piece of bioroid ice the Runner is approaching gains "[subroutine] End the run." after all its other subroutines for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: 当你用奥丁计划计分时，放置3枚议案指示物到本卡牌上。 所附载的议案指示物：选择当前被接驳的一层已激活的生化人防火墙。本次潜袭的剩余时间内，该防火墙在其它所有子进程后获得“[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。”
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 3 agenda counters on it. Hosted agenda counter: The rezzed piece of bioroid ice the Runner is approaching gains "Subroutine End the run." after all its other subroutines for the remainder of this run.

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner suffers at least 1 core damage, do 1 net damage.
text_zhCN: 每当潜袭者受到至少1点脑部伤害时，造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner suffers at least 1 core damage, do 1 net damage.
flavor_enUS: "Why limit our best assets to our own servers? The enemy doesn't stay passively at home, waiting for us to come to him. Why should we?" -Director Haas
flavor_zhCN: “为何要把我们最好的资产局限在我们自己的服务器上？敌人可不会被动地呆在家，等着我们去找他。我们何必呢？” —总裁哈斯

text_enUS:
Place 1 power counter on Alix T4LB07 whenever you install a card.
[click],[trash]: Gain 2[credit] for each power counter on Alix T4LB07.
text_zhCN:
每当你安装一张卡牌时，放置1枚能量指示物到阿历克斯T4LB07上。
[click]，[trash]：阿历克斯T4LB07上每有1枚能量指示物，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Place 1 power counter on Alix T4LB07 whenever you install a card. click,trash: Gain 2 credits for each power counter on Alix T4LB07.
flavor_enUS: The Alix model was based on a successful hedge fund manager but she had a tendency to burn out. Literally.
flavor_zhCN: 阿历克斯模型基于一位成功的对冲基金经理，但她有燃尽的倾向。字面意思。

text_enUS:
You can advance this asset.
When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, you may pay 3[credit] to do X core damage. X is equal to the number of hosted advancement counters.
text_zhCN:
你可以推进本资产。
当潜袭者读取已安装的本资产时，你可以花费3[credit]，以造成X点核心伤害。X等于所附载的推进指示物的数量。
stripped_text: You can advance this asset. When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, you may pay 3 credits to do X core damage. X is equal to the number of hosted advancement counters.

text_enUS:
You get +1 allotted [click] for each of your turns.
When this asset is trashed from anywhere while being accessed, add it to the Runner's score area as an agenda worth 2 agenda points.
text_zhCN:
你在你的回合有一个额外的[click]用来花费。
如果总裁哈斯在读取时被销毁，将她加入潜袭者的分数区，作为一个价值2点议案分数的议案。
<errata>勘误自FAQ 3.1</errata>
stripped_text: You get +1 allotted click for each of your turns. When this asset is trashed from anywhere while being accessed, add it to the Runner's score area as an agenda worth 2 agenda points.

title_zhCN: 哈斯生态屋型人工智能
text_enUS: You can advance this asset if it is unrezzed. Once per turn → [click], hosted advancement counter: Gain [click][click].
text_zhCN: 未激活的哈斯生态屋型人工智能才能被推进。 [click]，所附载的推进标记：获得[click][click]。每回合仅能使用一次本能力。
stripped_text: You can advance this asset if it is unrezzed. Once per turn -> click, hosted advancement counter: Gain click click.

text_enUS:
Thomas Haas can be advanced.
[trash]: Gain 2[credit] for each advancement token on Thomas Haas.
text_zhCN:
托马斯·哈斯能被推进。
[trash]：托马斯·哈斯上每有1枚推进标记，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Thomas Haas can be advanced. trash: Gain 2 credits for each advancement token on Thomas Haas.
flavor_enUS: Thomas, the director's son, has been carefully groomed to inherit the corporation since before he was born. His favorite pastime appears to be disappointing his mother.
flavor_zhCN: 托马斯，总裁的儿子，从他出生前就被精心培养以备继承公司。而他最中意的消遣似乎就是让他母亲失望。

text_enUS: Rez a piece of bioroid ice, ignoring all costs, and install Bioroid Efficiency Research on that ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Trash Bioroid Efficiency Research and derez host ice if all of its subroutines are broken during a single encounter."
text_zhCN: 激活一层生化人防火墙，忽略所有的费用，并将生化人效率研究安装到该防火墙上，作为所附载的状态指示物，规则文字为“在一次遭遇中，如果被附载的防火墙上的所有子进程被破解，销毁生化人效率研究并关闭被附载的防火墙。”
stripped_text: Rez a piece of bioroid ice, ignoring all costs, and install Bioroid Efficiency Research on that ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Trash Bioroid Efficiency Research and derez host ice if all of its subroutines are broken during a single encounter."

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner made an unsuccessful run during their last turn.
Gain 7[credit].
text_zhCN:
如果潜袭者在他/她的上回合进行过失败的潜袭，才能打出。
获得7[credit]。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner made an unsuccessful run during their last turn. Gain 7 credits.
flavor_enUS: Success is defined by the safety of data, not the safety of potential intruders.
flavor_zhCN: 成功是由数据安全来定义的，而非潜在入侵者的安全。

text_enUS: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage and end the run. [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
潜袭者能花费[click][click]，以破解海姆达尔2.0上最多2个子进程。
[subroutine] 造成1点脑部伤害。
[subroutine] 造成1点脑部伤害并终止本次潜袭。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Lose click click: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Do 1 core damage. Subroutine Do 1 core damage and end the run. Subroutine End the run.
subtype_zhCN: 屏障 - 生化人 - 杀伤
flavor_enUS: The realm beyond is still forbidden.
flavor_zhCN: 至高的国度依然禁止通行。

text_enUS: [subroutine] You may install and rez a piece of bioroid ice from HQ or Archives, ignoring all costs, placing it directly behind Howler. If you do, derez that piece of ice and trash Howler after the run is completed.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 你可以从总部或档案库安装并激活一层生化人防火墙，忽略所有的费用，将其直接放置在嚎叫者的后方。如果你如此做，在本次潜袭完成后，关闭该防火墙并销毁嚎叫者。
stripped_text: Subroutine You may install and rez a piece of bioroid ice from HQ or Archives, ignoring all costs, placing it directly behind Howler. If you do, derez that piece of ice and trash Howler after the run is completed.
flavor_enUS: "Yeah. It made a loud noise, I got scared, and I jacked out. I still think I made the right decision." -g00ru
flavor_zhCN: “没错，它发出巨大的吼声。我被吓到了，然后退出。我依然觉得我做了正确的决定。” —精神0袖

text_enUS: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, do 1 core damage and give the Runner 1 tag.
text_zhCN:
潜袭者能花费[click][click]，以破解女座头市2.0上最多2个子进程。
[subroutine] 销毁一个程序。
[subroutine] 销毁一个程序。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 3</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记并造成1点脑部伤害。
stripped_text: Lose click click: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, do 1 core damage and give the Runner 1 tag.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 生化人 - 毁灭者 - 追踪者
flavor_enUS: The game has changed.
flavor_zhCN: 游戏变了。

text_enUS: [subroutine] You may install 1 piece of ice from HQ protecting this server, ignoring the install cost.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 你可以从总部安装一层防火墙作为保护本服务器的最外层防火墙，忽略所有的安装费用。
stripped_text: Subroutine You may install 1 piece of ice from HQ protecting this server, ignoring the install cost.
flavor_enUS: Sometimes you just have to guess.
flavor_zhCN: 有时候你就得猜。

text_enUS: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Hosted power counter: Do 1 core damage. [subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, place 1 power counter on this ice. [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: 潜袭者能花费[click][click]，以破解维克托2.0上最多2个子进程。 所附载的能量指示物：造成1点脑部伤害。 [subroutine] 追踪 2 如果成功，放置1枚能量指示物到维克托2.0上。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Lose click click: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Hosted power counter: Do 1 core damage. Subroutine Trace[2]. If successful, place 1 power counter on this ice. Subroutine End the run.
subtype_zhCN: 门禁 - 生化人 - 追踪者 - 杀伤

text_enUS: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] If the Runner has lost [click] to break a subroutine during this run, do 1 core damage. [subroutine] If the Runner has lost [click] to break a subroutine during this run, do 1 core damage.
text_zhCN:
潜袭者能花费[click]，以破解劫1.0上的任一子进程。
[subroutine] 在本次潜袭中，如果潜袭者花费过至少一个[click]来破解子进程，造成1点脑部伤害。
[subroutine] 在本次潜袭中，如果潜袭者花费过至少一个[click]来破解子进程，造成1点脑部伤害。
stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine If the Runner has lost click to break a subroutine during this run, do 1 core damage. Subroutine If the Runner has lost click to break a subroutine during this run, do 1 core damage.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 生化人 - 杀伤
flavor_enUS: A mind of meat! How does it work?
flavor_zhCN: 血肉组成的头脑！它是怎么运作的？

text_enUS: Awakening Center can host bioroid ice (each piece is installed facedown, ignoring all install costs). Whenever the Runner passes all of the ice protecting this server, you may rez a piece of ice on Awakening Center, lowering the rez cost by 7[credit], to force the Runner to encounter it. Trash that ice after the run is completed.
text_zhCN: 觉醒的中枢能被附载生化人防火墙（每层防火墙牌面朝下安装，忽略所有的安装费用）。 每当潜袭者通过保护本服务器的所有防火墙时，你可以激活觉醒的中枢上的一层防火墙，其激活费用减7[credit]，以迫使潜袭者遭遇它。在本次潜袭完成后，销毁该防火墙。
stripped_text: Awakening Center can host bioroid ice (each piece is installed facedown, ignoring all install costs). Whenever the Runner passes all of the ice protecting this server, you may rez a piece of ice on Awakening Center, lowering the rez cost by 7 credits, to force the Runner to encounter it. Trash that ice after the run is completed.

text_enUS: [interrupt] → When a subroutine would be broken on a piece of bioroid ice protecting this server, you may rez this upgrade. [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent 1 subroutine from being broken on a piece of bioroid ice protecting this server.
text_zhCN: 如果潜袭者将要破解保护本服务器的生化人防火墙上的一个子进程，你可以激活提尔之手。 [trash]：防止保护本服务器的生化人防火墙上的一个子进程被破解。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> When a subroutine would be broken on a piece of bioroid ice protecting this server, you may rez this upgrade. Interrupt -> trash: Prevent 1 subroutine from being broken on a piece of bioroid ice protecting this server.

text_enUS: [click], [click]: Gain 3[credit].
text_zhCN: [click]，[click]：获得3[credit]。
stripped_text: click, click: Gain 3 credits.
flavor_enUS: Sell the dream-show them how very much they want to be rich, and they'll convince themselves that someday, they will be. How can they revolt against their future selves? -the New Gospel of Wealth
flavor_zhCN: 推销梦想—向他们展示他们多么想变得富有，于是他们就会说服自己总有一天，梦想会成真。他们怎么会厌恶将来的自己呢？ —《财富之新福音书》

text_enUS: [click], 1[credit]: Search R&D for a piece of ice, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
text_zhCN: [click]，1[credit]：在研发中心搜寻一层防火墙，将其展示，并加入总部。将研发中心重洗。
stripped_text: click, 1 credit: Search R&D for a piece of ice, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
flavor_enUS: "Just another factory, making good corporate drones for the machine. Their CS department is the best in the world, though." -g00ru
flavor_zhCN: “又一个工厂，为机器制造出良好的公司苦力。虽然，他们的计算机科学系是世界上最好的。” —精神0袖

text_enUS:
Gain 2[credit] when your turn begins.
Trash Server Diagnostics when you install a piece of ice.
text_zhCN:
当你的回合开始时，获得2[credit]。
当你安装一层防火墙时，销毁服务器诊断学。
stripped_text: Gain 2 credits when your turn begins. Trash Server Diagnostics when you install a piece of ice.
flavor_enUS: "There's only a 5% chance this could result in a general failure."
flavor_zhCN: “这只有5%的几率会导致通用故障。”

text_enUS: [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: The principle behind ice is not to keep everyone out, but to let only some people in. This ice denies entry on all but a select few ports that might change with the time of day or picosecond of connection. If you don't know what port to use, you're not getting in. Period.
flavor_zhCN: 防火墙的基本原则不是挡住所有人，而是只让一些人进来。这个防火墙隔绝了一切，除了一些特定的、会随着一天的时刻或皮秒间的连接而变换的接口。如果你不知道使用哪个接口，你就不能进入。完毕。

text_enUS:
[subroutine] The Runner must pay 2[credit], if able. If the Runner cannot pay 2[credit], end the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 如可能，潜袭者必须支付2[credit]。如果潜袭者不能支付2[credit]，终止本次潜袭。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner must pay 2 credits, if able. If the Runner cannot pay 2 credits, end the run. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: "Cheap, off-the-shelf data protection. Cheap for them, that is. Not for us." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak
flavor_zhCN: “廉价而现成的数据保护方法。廉价是相对他们而言，就是说，并不是对我们。” —艾丽·“浓烟”·斯科娃

title_zhCN: 芮尔·“姬特”·佩德拉：超凡入圣
text_enUS: The first time each turn you encounter a piece of ice, it gains code gate for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次遭遇一层防火墙时，该防火墙在本次潜袭的剩余时间内获得门禁。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you encounter a piece of ice, it gains code gate for the remainder of this run.
flavor_enUS: "I was not; I was; I am not; I am all."
flavor_zhCN: “我不曾存在；我曾存在；我不再存在；我即存在。”

text_enUS: The first copy of each program in this deck does not count against your influence limit.
text_zhCN: 本牌组中每个程序的第一张不计算在你的影响力上限中。
stripped_text: The first copy of each program in this deck does not count against your influence limit.
flavor_enUS: "New technology destroys the old."
flavor_zhCN: “新技术淘汰旧技术。”

text_enUS: Whenever you install a program from your heap, draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: 每当你从你的堆阵安装一个程序时，补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever you install a program from your heap, draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS: "I can make that work."
flavor_zhCN: “我可以解决。”

text_enUS: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, rearrange any number of ice protecting all servers. (Do not rez or derez any ice or change the number of ice protecting any server.)
text_zhCN: 对总部进行一次潜袭。如果成功，重新排列保护所有服务器的任意数量的防火墙（不能激活或关闭防火墙），代替读取卡牌。重新排列后，保护每台服务器的防火墙数量必须与之前的相同。
stripped_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, rearrange any number of ice protecting all servers. (Do not rez or derez any ice or change the number of ice protecting any server.)

text_enUS: Run any server. If successful, instead of breaching that server, remove up to 3 advancement counters from 1 card in the root of or protecting the attacked server.
text_zhCN: 进行一次潜袭。如果成功，从被攻击服务器内或保护被攻击服务器的一张卡牌上移除最多3枚推进标记，代替读取卡牌。
stripped_text: Run any server. If successful, instead of breaching that server, remove up to 3 advancement counters from 1 card in the root of or protecting the attacked server.
flavor_enUS: Wheeeee!
flavor_zhCN: 喂哦～～！

text_enUS: Trash up to 5 programs from your grip. Gain 2[credit] for each program trashed.
text_zhCN: 从你的操控器销毁最多五个程序。每销毁一个程序，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Trash up to 5 programs from your grip. Gain 2 credits for each program trashed.
flavor_enUS: "Idealism's great, but it don't keep you in soybeef tacos." -Matt "TheMerc" Thomas
flavor_zhCN: “理想本身很棒，但不能让你一直有烧牛肉炸玉米卷。” —马特·“佣兵”·托马斯

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, trash 1 installed program.
 Install 1 program from your grip or heap, paying X[credit] less. X is equal to the install cost of the program you trashed.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本卡牌的额外费用，销毁一个已安装的程序。
从你的操控器或堆阵安装一个程序，该程序的安装费用减少和所销毁程序的安装费用相等的费用。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, trash 1 installed program. Install 1 program from your grip or heap, paying X credits less. X is equal to the install cost of the program you trashed.
flavor_enUS: One man's trash.
flavor_zhCN: 彼之所弃。

text_enUS: Shuffle your grip and heap into your stack. Draw 5 cards. Remove Levy AR Lab Access from the game instead of trashing it.
text_zhCN: 将你的操控器和堆阵洗入你的存储栈。补五张卡牌。将接入利维前景实验室移出游戏，代替销毁它。
stripped_text: Shuffle your grip and heap into your stack. Draw 5 cards. Remove Levy AR Lab Access from the game instead of trashing it.
flavor_enUS: Spend too much time in the AR Lab and someone might notice. Unless you're the head of it, that is.
flavor_zhCN: 在前景实验室呆太久会引人注意。就是说，除非你是主任。

text_enUS: +3[mu] When you install this hardware, install up to 3 programs from your grip, paying 4[credit] less for each. [interrupt] → Trash 1 program from your grip: Prevent 1 core damage or 1 net damage. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +3[mu] 当你安装巨岩时，从你的操控器安装最多三个程序，每个程序的安装费用减4[credit]。 从你的操控器销毁一个程序：防止1点脑部伤害或网域伤害。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +3 mu When you install this hardware, install up to 3 programs from your grip, paying 4 credits less for each. Interrupt -> Trash 1 program from your grip: Prevent 1 core damage or 1 net damage. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: [interrupt] → 3[credit]: Prevent 1 net damage. [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent up to 2 core damage.
text_zhCN:
3[credit]：防止1点网域伤害。
[trash]：防止最多2点脑部伤害。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> 3 credits: Prevent 1 net damage. Interrupt -> trash: Prevent up to 2 core damage.
flavor_enUS: It still hurts, a bit, the first time. The second time, you feel nothing at all. But don't push your luck.
flavor_zhCN: 第一次，还是会有些疼。第二次，你会毫无感觉。不过别再碰运气。

text_enUS: [trash]: Install a program from your heap (paying the install cost).
text_zhCN: [trash]：从你的堆阵安装一个程序（支付安装费用）。
stripped_text: trash: Install a program from your heap (paying the install cost).
flavor_enUS: It is good practice to backup the backup.
flavor_zhCN: 给备份做备份是个好习惯。

text_enUS:
Omni-drive can host a single program of 1[mu] or less. The memory cost of the hosted program does not count against your memory limit.
1[recurring-credit]
Use this credit to pay for using the hosted program.
text_zhCN:
全能驱动器能被附载一个等于或小于1[mu]的程序。所附载的程序的内存费用不计算在你的内存上限中。
1[recurring-credit]
本信用点用于支付使用所附载的程序。
stripped_text: Omni-drive can host a single program of 1 mu or less. The memory cost of the hosted program does not count against your memory limit. 1 recurring credit Use this credit to pay for using the hosted program.

text_enUS: When you install this program, you may spend any number of credits to place that many power counters on it. This program gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter, and it can only interface with ice of exactly equal strength. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本程序时，你可以支付X[credit]，以放置X枚能量指示物到本程序上。 每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，本程序的强度+1，且本程序只能与强度与其相等的防火墙对接。 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条子进程。
stripped_text: When you install this program, you may spend any number of credits to place that many power counters on it. This program gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter, and it can only interface with ice of exactly equal strength. Interface -> 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine.
flavor_enUS: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think.
flavor_zhCN: 我们的想法塑造我们；我们变成我们的想法。

text_enUS: 1[recurring-credit] Use this credit to pay for using icebreakers.
text_zhCN: 1[recurring-credit] 本信用点用于支付使用破解器。
stripped_text: 1 recurring credit Use this credit to pay for using icebreakers.
flavor_enUS: "No line that they lay could catch a shadow on the wall…"
flavor_zhCN: “它们设下的丝线，无法捕捉墙上的暗影…”

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +5 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解警报子进程。 1[credit]：强度+5。仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的信用点来使用本能力。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1 credit: +5 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.
flavor_enUS: "…and once the shadow rises, the curtain shall fall." -revenant
flavor_zhCN: “…而当暗影升起，则帷幕将落。” —亡魂

text_enUS:
Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on Chakana.
If there are at least 3 virus counters on Chakana, the advancement requirement of all agendas is increased by 1.
text_zhCN:
每当你对研发中心进行一次成功的潜袭时，放置1枚病毒指示物到印加十字符上。
如果印加十字符具有至少3枚病毒指示物，所有议案的推进需求+1。
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on Chakana. If there are at least 3 virus counters on Chakana, the advancement requirement of all agendas is increased by 1.

text_enUS: When you install this program, choose a server. Use this program only during runs on the chosen server. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解门禁子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。 当你安装赛博密码集时，选择一台服务器。赛博密码集仅能在对所选择服务器的潜袭中使用。
stripped_text: When you install this program, choose a server. Use this program only during runs on the chosen server. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.

text_enUS: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs of assets.
text_zhCN: 2[recurring-credit] （当你安装本卡牌时及你的回合开始前，将所附载的信用点补充至2个。） 你可以花费所附载的信用点以支付资产的销毁费用。
stripped_text: 2 recurring credits (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs of assets.
flavor_enUS: Perfect for flooding servers.
flavor_zhCN: 淹没服务器的完美之选。

text_enUS: 2[credit], [trash]: Search your stack for 1 program. Install it. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.)
text_zhCN: 2[credit]，[trash]：在你的存储栈中搜寻1个程序。安装之。（在搜寻存储栈后将其洗混。）
stripped_text: 2 credits, trash: Search your stack for 1 program. Install it. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.)
flavor_enUS: "Make sure you tell the source code which executable you want it to compile into. One time I left my rig for a couple of minutes, and when I came back all of my files had been replaced with cat vids." -The Professor
flavor_zhCN: “确保你跟源代码交代过，你希望它编译成怎样的可执行文件。有次我离开设备几分钟，回来时所有文件已被替换成了小猫的视频。” —教授

text_enUS:
2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to install programs (you cannot use Sahasrara to install a program that trashes Sahasrara).
text_zhCN:
2[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于安装程序（你不能使用头顶轮来安装一个会销毁头顶轮的程序）。
stripped_text: 2 recurring credits Use these credits to install programs (you cannot use Sahasrara to install a program that trashes Sahasrara).
flavor_enUS: Out there, the thousand-petaled lotus symbolizes detachment from illusion. In here, it is the birthplace of a higher consciousness. Something infinitely pure.
flavor_zhCN: 在那里，千叶莲花象征超脱幻象。在这里，它是更高阶意识的起源地。它是无限纯净。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解屏障子进程。 2[credit]：本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2 credits: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
flavor_enUS: "The Incans believed that the sun god resided in the Haman Pacha, the upper realm of the cosmos. They just didn't know that the Haman Pacha hadn't been discovered yet." -The Professor
flavor_zhCN: “印加人相信太阳神居住在哈南帕查，宇宙中的上层国度。他们只是不知道哈南帕查尚未被发现。” —教授

text_enUS: [click]: Gain 1[credit] and draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: [click]：获得1[credit]并抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: click: Gain 1 credit and draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS: Sometimes it doesn't matter how expensive your rig is, or how many credits are in your account, or even your skill as a runner. Most of the time, a simple handshake and a name are all you need.
flavor_zhCN: 有时你的装备如何昂贵，你的账户中如何有钱，甚至你作为潜袭者的技能如何都不重要。通常，你只需简单地握个手，报上大名。

text_enUS:
+1[link]
Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
text_zhCN:
+1[link]
你的手牌上限+1。
stripped_text: +1 link Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
flavor_enUS: Some people have their own satellite receiver. Others have their own satellite.
flavor_zhCN: 有些人有他们自己的卫星接收器。还有些有他们自己的卫星。

text_enUS:
Whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice, place 1[credit] on Ice Analyzer.
You may use credits on Ice Analyzer to install programs.
stripped_text: Whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice, place 1 credit on Ice Analyzer. You may use credits on Ice Analyzer to install programs.
flavor_enUS: "If you know the source code you can write to beat it, or just rejigger it a little and make it yours. That works, too." -Exile
flavor_zhCN: “如果你了解源代码，你可以编码并击败它，或者通过微调来变为己用。这也是可行的。” —流亡者

text_enUS: Run any server. When that run ends, if it was successful, gain 5[credit].
text_zhCN: 潜袭任意一台服务器。当本次潜袭结束时，如果潜袭成功，获得5[credit]。
stripped_text: Run any server. When that run ends, if it was successful, gain 5 credits.
flavor_enUS: The data was better than she could have ever imagined. This Santiago fellow really knew what he was doing. She began to imagine the havoc she could wreak at the upcoming charity dinner…
flavor_zhCN: 数据比她想的还要好。这个叫圣地亚哥的家伙果然明白怎么做。她开始想象自己在接下来的慈善晚宴上的大肆破坏…

text_enUS:
When you install this resource, load 8[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
When your turn begins, take 2[credit] from this resource.
text_zhCN:
当你安装本资源时，填装8[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。
当你的回合开始时，从本资源上拿取2[credit]。
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 8 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. When your turn begins, take 2 credits from this resource.
flavor_enUS: "We say 'cyber-terrorist', they hear 'underground celebrity.'" -Michael Muhama, professional expert
flavor_zhCN: “我们说‘数字罪犯’，他们听到‘非法明星’。” —专业人士，迈克尔·穆哈马

text_enUS: [click], [click], [trash]: Play an event from your heap (paying its play cost).
text_zhCN: [click]，[click]，[trash]：从你的堆阵打出一个事件（支付打出费用）。
stripped_text: click, click, trash: Play an event from your heap (paying its play cost).
flavor_enUS: Just me, a cup of YucaBean, and last night's Hong Kong Trunk sniffed packets. I call that a good morning.
flavor_zhCN: 只有我，一杯雅豆咖啡以及昨晚从香港主信道上截获的数据包。我称之为一个美好的早晨。

text_enUS:
The advancement requirement of all agendas is increased by 1.
As an additional cost to steal an agenda, you must pay 3[credit].
Trash The Source when an agenda is scored or stolen.
text_zhCN:
所有议案的推进需求+1。
作为窃取一个议案的额外费用，你必须支付3[credit]。
当一个议案被计分或窃取时，销毁线人。
stripped_text: The advancement requirement of all agendas is increased by 1. As an additional cost to steal an agenda, you must pay 3 credits. Trash The Source when an agenda is scored or stolen.
flavor_enUS: A dangerous game, but well worth playing.
flavor_zhCN: 一场危险的游戏，但你值得参与。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Forfeit an agenda. If you do, give the Corp 1 bad publicity.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，花费[click]。
废除一个议案。如果你如此做，给予公司1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Forfeit an agenda. If you do, give the Corp 1 bad publicity.
flavor_enUS: "Bioroid intrusion isn't impossible, despite the bluster of Haas-Bioroid. But it is dangerous." -Noise
flavor_zhCN: “尽管哈斯生化夸下海口，不过生化人叛乱并非不可能。只是这非常危险。” —噪音

text_enUS: [click]: Host this program on the outermost piece of ice protecting a central server. Whenever you make a successful run while this program is hosted on a piece of ice, host it on the next inward piece of ice. If you cannot, trash this program and install 1 other Caïssa program from your grip or heap, ignoring all costs.
text_zhCN: [click]：将兵附载到保护一台中央服务器的最外层防火墙上。 当兵附载在一层防火墙上时，每当你进行一次成功的潜袭时，如可能，转移兵到当前被附载防火墙的后一层防火墙；否则，以销毁兵代替，并从你的操控器或堆阵安装一个西洋棋程序，忽略所有的费用。 勘误自FAQ 3.0.1
stripped_text: click: Host this program on the outermost piece of ice protecting a central server. Whenever you make a successful run while this program is hosted on a piece of ice, host it on the next inward piece of ice. If you cannot, trash this program and install 1 other Caissa program from your grip or heap, ignoring all costs.

text_enUS: While this program is hosted on ice, the rez cost of each piece of ice protecting this server is increased by 2. [click]: Host this program on a piece of ice that is not hosting a Caïssa program. If this program is hosted on ice, its [click] ability can only be used to host it on ice protecting the same server or in the same position as its current host ice. (Count positions from the innermost ice.)
text_zhCN: [click]：将车附载到一层未被西洋棋附载的防火墙上。如果车已附载，则仅能再附载到保护本服务器的另一层防火墙上，或保护其它服务器相同位置（从最内层位置计算）的防火墙上。 保护本服务器的每层防火墙的激活费用+2。
stripped_text: While this program is hosted on ice, the rez cost of each piece of ice protecting this server is increased by 2. click: Host this program on a piece of ice that is not hosting a Caissa program. If this program is hosted on ice, its click ability can only be used to host it on ice protecting the same server or in the same position as its current host ice. (Count positions from the innermost ice.)

text_enUS: As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click]. Search your stack for a connection, reveal it, and add it to your grip. You may install that connection (paying its install cost). Shuffle your stack.
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Search your stack for a connection, reveal it, and add it to your grip. You may install that connection (paying its install cost). Shuffle your stack.

text_enUS:
Whenever the Corp spends a [click] to draw 1 card or gain 1[credit] (not through a card ability), place 1 virus counter on Gorman Drip v1.
[click], [trash]: Gain 1[credit] for each virus counter on Gorman Drip v1.
text_zhCN:
每当公司花费[click]（不通过卡牌能力）来补一张卡牌或获得1[credit]时，放置1枚病毒指示物到戈尔曼水滴V1上。
[click]，[trash]：戈尔曼水滴V1上每有1枚病毒指示物，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever the Corp spends a click to draw 1 card or gain 1 credit (not through a card ability), place 1 virus counter on Gorman Drip v1. click, trash: Gain 1 credit for each virus counter on Gorman Drip v1.
flavor_enUS: Simple in principle, a drip virus drains fractions of currency from their accounts into yours.
flavor_zhCN: 原理很简单，水滴病毒会从他们的账户把资金碎片吸入你的账户。

text_enUS: 1[recurring-credit] Use this credit to pay for using decoders.
text_zhCN: 1[recurring-credit] 本信用点用于支付使用解码模块。
stripped_text: 1 recurring credit Use this credit to pay for using decoders.
flavor_enUS: "I originally designed it for someone else, but it was so useful I decided to keep it for myself." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
flavor_zhCN: “一开始我是为别人设计的这个，但它太好用了，所以我决定自己留着。” —凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞

text_enUS: Whenever you pass a piece of unrezzed ice, you may trash False Echo. If you do, the Corp must rez that ice or add it to HQ.
text_zhCN: 每当你通过一层未激活的防火墙时，你可以销毁虚假回声。如果你如此做，公司必须激活该防火墙或将其加入总部。
stripped_text: Whenever you pass a piece of unrezzed ice, you may trash False Echo. If you do, the Corp must rez that ice or add it to HQ.
flavor_enUS: "What if this ice wants to be free?" -Rielle "Kit" Peddler
flavor_zhCN: “如果这防火墙想得到自由呢？” —芮尔·“姬特”·佩德拉

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may look at the top card of your stack.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以查看你存储栈顶端的一张卡牌。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may look at the top card of your stack.
flavor_enUS: Normal people-sane people-do not embark on a life of cybercrime. Who can say what motivates the deranged mind? An imagined slight, personal failings blamed on external forces, or the ever-popular lust for money? -Michael Muhama, Musings on Cybercrime
flavor_zhCN: 正常的人—理智的人—是不会从事数字犯罪的。谁能说清是什么驱动着疯狂的头脑？想象中的被轻视，归咎于外因的个体挫败，抑或是对金钱永无止尽的渴望？ —迈克尔·穆哈马，《数字犯罪沉思录》

text_enUS:
The first time you make a successful run each turn, draw 1 card.
The first time you make an unsuccessful run each turn, take 1 tag.
stripped_text: The first time you make a successful run each turn, draw 1 card. The first time you make an unsuccessful run each turn, take 1 tag.
flavor_enUS: "I've been logging online with babes all day. Don't worry, the connections are clean. I guarantee it."
flavor_zhCN: “我整天都在线和这些妞儿们聊呢。别担心，关系很清白，我保证。”

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, the Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards for each hosted advancement counter past 4. If the Runner trashes at least 1 card this way, take 1 bad publicity.
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, the Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards for each hosted advancement counter past 4. If the Runner trashes at least 1 card this way, take 1 bad publicity.
flavor_enUS: Who wants to start a war?
flavor_zhCN: 谁想开战？

text_enUS: NEXT Bronze has +1 strength for each rezzed piece of NEXT ice. [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_text: NEXT Bronze has +1 strength for each rezzed piece of NEXT ice. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: NEXT Design's ice provides the discerning business with a suite of ice that creates a daunting security presence for intruders.
flavor_zhCN: 次级方案的防火墙产品是一套让入侵者望而却步的安全防火墙，为您提供慧眼之选。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Reveal up to 5 cards in HQ. Gain 2[credit] for each card you revealed this way.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
展示总部中的最多5张卡牌。你每以此法展示1张卡牌，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Reveal up to 5 cards in HQ. Gain 2 credits for each card you revealed this way.
flavor_enUS: When Miranda Rhapsody showed up with a teacup giraffe, suddenly everybody wanted one.
flavor_zhCN: 当米兰达·瑞普瑟迪展示出茶具般大小的长颈鹿时，顿时人人都想要一只。

text_enUS:
1[credit]: Add Himitsu-Bako to HQ.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_text: 1 credit: Add Himitsu-Bako to HQ. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Himitsu-Bako is a simple ice barrier that appears as a digital puzzle box. What makes it special is the ease with which it can be uninstalled and installed in a different server, throwing up barriers in unexpected places and giving any intruder a curious feeling of déjà vu.
flavor_zhCN: 奥秘箱是一个看起来类似数字化谜盒的普通屏障防火墙。特殊的地方在于它能随意地卸载并安装到另一台服务器，在出其不意的位置架起屏障，给予入侵者一种奇特的既视感。

text_enUS: When you score Character Assassination, trash 1 resource (cannot be prevented).
text_zhCN: 当你用人格谋杀计分时，销毁一个资源（不能被防止）。
stripped_text: When you score Character Assassination, trash 1 resource (cannot be prevented).
flavor_enUS: "The thing about journalism is there's always a better story around the corner. Soon, they smelled blood elsewhere, and the world forgot about me. But I didn't forget." -The Professor
flavor_zhCN: “新闻工作的要诀就是在街头巷尾总能找到更好的故事。很快，他们就会在别处发现热点，然后世界就忘了你。但我并没有忘记。” —教授

text_enUS: [click]: Draw 2 cards. Remove Jackson Howard from the game: Shuffle up to 3 cards from Archives into R&D.
text_zhCN: [click]：补两张卡牌。 将杰克逊·霍华德移出游戏：将最多三张卡牌从档案库洗入研发中心。
stripped_text: click: Draw 2 cards. Remove Jackson Howard from the game: Shuffle up to 3 cards from Archives into R&D.
flavor_enUS: "It is my job to ensure our creations are the perfect companions and edutainment for tomorrow's consumers."
flavor_zhCN: “确保我们的产品成为未来消费者们最佳的伴侣和教育娱乐方式，是我的职责。”

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Trace[2]. If successful, reveal the grip. Trash up to X resources and/or events revealed this way, where X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength. If unsuccessful, take 1 bad publicity.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
<trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，展示潜袭者的操控器，并从中销毁数张资源和/或事件，其数量最多为你追踪强度超过潜袭者中转强度的差值。如果失败，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Trace[2]. If successful, reveal the grip. Trash up to X resources and/or events revealed this way, where X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength. If unsuccessful, take 1 bad publicity.

text_enUS: Place 2 agenda counters on Geothermal Fracking when you score it. [click], hosted agenda counter: Gain 7[credit] and take 1 bad publicity.
text_zhCN: 当你用地热液压计分时，放置2枚议案指示物到本卡牌上。 [click]，所附载的议案指示物：获得7[credit]并拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: Place 2 agenda counters on Geothermal Fracking when you score it. click, hosted agenda counter: Gain 7 credits and take 1 bad publicity.
flavor_enUS: Pumping water into deep sea thermal vents produced huge amounts of energy. A profitable side effect.
flavor_zhCN: 把水灌入深海的地热口会产生大量能量。一种有利可图的副作用。

text_enUS:
When you rez Swarm, take 1 bad publicity.
Swarm can be advanced and gains "[subroutine] Trash 1 program unless the Runner pays 3[credit]." for each advancement token on it.
text_zhCN:
当你激活群集时，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
群集能被推进，并且其上每有1枚推进标记，获得“[subroutine] 销毁一个程序，除非潜袭者支付3[credit]。”
stripped_text: When you rez Swarm, take 1 bad publicity. Swarm can be advanced and gains "Subroutine Trash 1 program unless the Runner pays 3 credits." for each advancement token on it.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 毁灭者 - 非法

text_enUS: Purge virus counters.
text_zhCN: 清除病毒指示物。
stripped_text: Purge virus counters.
flavor_enUS: Your free trial expired. Upgrade to the full version?
flavor_zhCN: 您的免费试用已经过期。是否升级到完整版？

text_enUS:
When you rez Grim, take 1 bad publicity.
[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
text_zhCN:
当你激活犬灵时，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
[subroutine] 销毁一个程序。
stripped_text: When you rez Grim, take 1 bad publicity. Subroutine Trash 1 program.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 毁灭者 - 非法
flavor_enUS: "The Grim of legend was one of many so-called 'black dog' myths common to Gaelic and English-speaking communities. What's fascinating is that it has propagated to the network, where it lives on as a program that, or so the story goes, hunts for the unwary." -The Professor
flavor_zhCN: “传说中的犬灵是众多'黑狗'神话中的一例，常见于盖尔语和英语社会群体。有意思的是，当它被传播到网上，作为一个程序存在时，它仍像故事里写的那样，继续猎捕着粗心大意的人。” —教授

text_enUS: Host ice gets -2 strength. [click]: Host this program on a piece of ice that is not hosting a Caïssa program. If this program is hosted on ice protecting a central server, its [click] ability can only be used to host it on ice protecting a remote server. If this program is hosted on ice protecting a remote server, its [click] ability can only be used to host it on ice protecting a central server.
text_zhCN: [click]：将象附载到一层未被西洋棋附载的防火墙上。如果象已附载，并且象在保护远程服务器的防火墙上，则仅能再附载到保护中央服务器的防火墙上；如果象在保护中央服务器的防火墙上，则仅能再附载到保护远程服务器的防火墙上。 被附载的防火墙的强度减2。
stripped_text: Host ice gets -2 strength. click: Host this program on a piece of ice that is not hosting a Caissa program. If this program is hosted on ice protecting a central server, its click ability can only be used to host it on ice protecting a remote server. If this program is hosted on ice protecting a remote server, its click ability can only be used to host it on ice protecting a central server.

text_enUS:
Scheherazade can host any number of programs.
Whenever you install a program on Scheherazade, gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN:
山鲁佐德能被附载任意数量的程序。
每当你安装一个程序到山鲁佐德上时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Scheherazade can host any number of programs. Whenever you install a program on Scheherazade, gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: Installing 1001 programs puts you in the hacker hall of fame, or would if such an institution actually existed.
flavor_zhCN: 安装1001个程序你就会入选黑客名人堂，假如真有这么个制度。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, gain 2[credit] and lose [click].
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，获得2[credit]并失去[click] 。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 2 credits and lose click.
flavor_enUS: Noise decided to go back to school. He applied for research grants at fifteen of the most prestigious universities. Then he hacked in and approved his applications. Breakfast time.
flavor_zhCN: 噪音决定回到学校，他向十五家最著名的大学中申请科研津贴。然后他潜袭进去并且批准了自己的申请。该吃早饭了。

text_enUS: Make a run. You may jack out when you encounter the first piece of ice.
text_zhCN: 进行一次潜袭。当你遭遇第一层防火墙时，你可以退出。
stripped_text: Make a run. You may jack out when you encounter the first piece of ice.
flavor_enUS: Just like in the real world, sometimes it is best to send in the clone to do the dirty work.
flavor_zhCN: 就像现实世界那样，有时最好还是让克隆体来干脏活。

text_enUS: Whenever you pass a piece of ice, you may trash Copycat. If you do, choose another rezzed copy of that piece of ice protecting any server. The run continues as if you had just passed the chosen piece of ice (you are now running from the new position).
text_zhCN: 每当你通过一层防火墙时，你可以销毁拷贝者。如果你如此做，选择保护任意服务器的另一层已激活的相同的防火墙。潜袭继续进行，如同你刚通过所选择的防火墙（现在，你从这个新位置继续潜袭）。
stripped_text: Whenever you pass a piece of ice, you may trash Copycat. If you do, choose another rezzed copy of that piece of ice protecting any server. The run continues as if you had just passed the chosen piece of ice (you are now running from the new position).
flavor_enUS: The copycat function should be used with extreme caution, or you might end up on the wrong side of cyberspace.
flavor_zhCN: 使用拷贝者的功能必须非常谨慎，否则你可能进入赛博空间的错误区间。

text_enUS: Interface → 3[credit]: Break up to 3 code gate subroutines. 3[credit]: +5 strength.
text_zhCN: 3[credit]：破解最多3个门禁子进程。 3[credit]：强度+5。
stripped_text: Interface -> 3 credits: Break up to 3 code gate subroutines. 3 credits: +5 strength.
flavor_enUS: It's efficient as all hell, for certain very large values of "efficient". The whale avatar is either a nice touch or a tragic misapplication of programmer man-hour, depending on who you ask. -BT's Guide to Icebreaking
flavor_zhCN: 就相当大尺度的“高效”而言，它高效得不得了。这鲸鱼的化身究竟是个很棒的工具，还是个浪费编程者时间与精力的悲剧，这取决于你问的谁。 —无名氏的防火墙破解指南。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Reveal the top card of your stack. You may install that card, lowering the install cost by 10[credit], if able; otherwise, trash it.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，花费[click]。
展示你存储栈顶端的一张卡牌。如可能，你可以安装该卡牌，其安装费用减10[credit]；否则，销毁它。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Reveal the top card of your stack. You may install that card, lowering the install cost by 10 credits, if able; otherwise, trash it.
flavor_enUS: "I've got a surprise for you."
flavor_zhCN: “我有个惊喜给你。”

text_enUS: Whenever you make a successful run on Archives, instead of breaching Archives, you may add 1 faceup card from Archives to the top of R&D.
text_zhCN: 每当你对档案库进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以在档案库选择一张面朝上的卡牌并将其加入研发中心顶端，代替读取卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on Archives, instead of breaching Archives, you may add 1 faceup card from Archives to the top of R&D.
flavor_enUS: "Why is data deleted? Maybe they don't want it to be found. Or maybe it's just useless. The useless data is the kind you want." -The Professor
flavor_zhCN: “为何数据被删除了？也许是他们不希望它被发现。或者只是数据没用了。没用的数据就是你想要的东西。” —教授

text_enUS: 1[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 1 hosted credit.) You can spend hosted credits to play events.
text_zhCN: 1[recurring-credit] （当你安装本卡牌时及你的回合开始前，将所附载的信用点补充至1个。） 你可以花费所附载的信用点以打出事件。
stripped_text: 1 recurring credit (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 1 hosted credit.) You can spend hosted credits to play events.
flavor_enUS: A VoicePAD is a personal access device with most of its functions ripped out. Just about all it's good for is making voice-calls and managing your contacts. The only reason to even have one is for its anonymity, which for a certain kind of person is all the reason one needs.
flavor_zhCN: 声控面板是一种移除了大部分功能的个人登陆设备。它全部的优点就是拨打语音电话和管理你的联系人。使用它的唯一原因就是它的匿名性，对于某些人来说这就是全部的需求。

text_enUS:
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner spends [click][click].
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 3[credit].
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner trashes 1 installed program.
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner suffers 1 core damage.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者花费[click][click]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付3[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者销毁一个已安装的程序。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者承受1点脑部伤害。
stripped_text: Subroutine End the run unless the Runner spends click click. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner pays 3 credits. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner trashes 1 installed program. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner suffers 1 core damage.

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner installed a resource during their last turn.
Trace[2]. If successful, add 1 installed resource to the top of the stack. If unsuccessful, take 1 bad publicity.
text_zhCN:
如果潜袭者在他/她的上回合安装过资源，才能打出。
<trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，将一个已安装的资源加入潜袭者的存储栈顶端。如果失败，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner installed a resource during their last turn. Trace[2]. If successful, add 1 installed resource to the top of the stack. If unsuccessful, take 1 bad publicity.

text_enUS:
When you score Clone Retirement, you may remove 1 bad publicity.
When the Runner steals Clone Retirement, the Corp takes 1 bad publicity.
text_zhCN:
当你用克隆体退役计分时，你可以移除1枚负面声誉标记。
当潜袭者窃取克隆体退役时，公司拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: When you score Clone Retirement, you may remove 1 bad publicity. When the Runner steals Clone Retirement, the Corp takes 1 bad publicity.
flavor_enUS: "They call it 'retirement'. I call it 'euthanasia'." -Ken "Express" Tenma
flavor_zhCN: “他们称其为'退役'，我称其为'安乐死'。” —肯·“快车”·天马

text_enUS: The Runner cannot break subroutines on this ice using AI programs. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed AI program. [subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
text_zhCN: 潜袭者不能使用智能模块程序破解本防火墙上的子进程。 [subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的智能模块程序。 [subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: The Runner cannot break subroutines on this ice using AI programs. Subroutine Trash 1 installed AI program. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 杀伤 - 毁灭者
flavor_enUS: Writing a program that can pass the Turing test is easy. The Gibson-Akamatsu test is a higher bar, and the only AIs to clear it thus far have been the androids. Even some humans have been known to fail.
flavor_zhCN: 编写一个能通过图灵测试的程序很简单。吉布森-赤松测试才是更高标准，迄今为止唯一能通过的人工智能都是安卓人。甚至有人类也未能通过的情况。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Place up to 2 advancement tokens on a card that can be advanced.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
放置最多2枚推进标记到一张能被推进的卡牌上。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Place up to 2 advancement tokens on a card that can be advanced.
flavor_enUS: He signed for it, hand shaking in anticipation.
flavor_zhCN: 他签了字，满怀期待地握了手。

text_enUS:
When you rez Muckraker, take 1 bad publicity.
[subroutine] Trace[1]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
[subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
[subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
[subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.
text_zhCN:
当你激活揭发者时，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 1</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 3</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 如果潜袭者被锁定，终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When you rez Muckraker, take 1 bad publicity. Subroutine Trace[1]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine End the run if the Runner is tagged.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 追踪者 - 非法

text_enUS: [interrupt] → Whenever you would do meat damage, increase that damage by 1.
stripped_text: Interrupt -> Whenever you would do meat damage, increase that damage by 1.
flavor_enUS: "I use bioroids because I can wipe their memories or just blow their brains out when the job is done. No witnesses means no witnesses."
flavor_zhCN: “我雇生化人是因为能在任务完成后清除他们的记忆，或者直接打爆他们的脑袋。没有证据就是没有证据。”

text_enUS: When you rez Elizabeth Mills, remove 1 bad publicity. [click], [trash]: Trash 1 location. Take 1 bad publicity.
stripped_text: When you rez Elizabeth Mills, remove 1 bad publicity. click, trash: Trash 1 location. Take 1 bad publicity.
flavor_enUS: "It's not personal. Urban renewal is a necessity of the modern world. It's always someone's home, yours is no different."
flavor_zhCN: “这并非针对谁。城区革新在现代世界具有必要性。它总会是什么人的家园，是你的也并无特别。”

text_enUS:
Install only in a remote server.
The Runner cannot initiate a run on this server.
Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on HQ, trash Off the Grid.
text_zhCN:
仅能安装在远程服务器。
潜袭者不能对本服务器发起潜袭。
每当潜袭者对总部进行一次成功的潜袭时，销毁隔绝网络。
stripped_text: Install only in a remote server. The Runner cannot initiate a run on this server. Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on HQ, trash Off the Grid.

text_enUS: When you score Profiteering, take up to 3 bad publicity. Gain 5[credit] for each bad publicity taken.
text_zhCN: 当你用暴利计分时，拿取最多3枚负面声誉标记。每拿取1枚负面声誉标记，获得5[credit]。
stripped_text: When you score Profiteering, take up to 3 bad publicity. Gain 5 credits for each bad publicity taken.
flavor_enUS: It was surprisingly easy to make creds…if you didn't care about how you made them.
flavor_zhCN: 赚信用点出奇的简单…如果你不在意赚钱方式的话。

text_enUS: Gain 15[credit].
text_zhCN: 获得15[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 15 credits.
flavor_enUS: There are many names for those in the Administration Department. But if you like your job, you just refer to them as "sir" and "ma'am".
flavor_zhCN: 行政部门的那些人有许多称呼。不过如果你珍视自己的工作，那就称他们为“先生” 和“夫人”。

text_enUS: The first piece of ice the Corp rezzes each turn costs 1[credit] more to rez.
text_zhCN: 每回合公司激活的第一层防火墙的激活费用加1[credit]。
stripped_text: The first piece of ice the Corp rezzes each turn costs 1 credit more to rez.
subtype_zhCN: 半机械人 - 转基因人
flavor_enUS: "Analyzing the board won't help. Your mistake was thinking we're playing the same game."
flavor_zhCN: “分析棋局没有帮助。你错就错在以为我们在进行同一盘游戏。”

text_enUS: +3[mu] Use the MU on Deep Red only for Caïssa programs. Whenever you install a Caïssa program, you may trigger its [click] ability without spending [click]. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +3[mu] 深红上的内存单元仅用于西洋棋程序。 每当你安装一个西洋棋程序时，你可以触发其[click]能力，无须花费[click]。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +3 mu Use the MU on Deep Red only for Caissa programs. Whenever you install a Caissa program, you may trigger its click ability without spending click. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on host ice. [click]: Host this program on a piece of ice that is not hosting a Caïssa program. If this program is hosted on ice, its [click] ability cannot be used to host it on the next inward or outward piece of ice.
text_zhCN: 2[credit]：破解被附载的防火墙子进程。 [click]：将马附载到一层未被西洋棋附载的防火墙上。如果马已附载，则仅能再附载到除当前被附载防火墙的前一层或后一层以外的防火墙上。
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 subroutine on host ice. click: Host this program on a piece of ice that is not hosting a Caissa program. If this program is hosted on ice, its click ability cannot be used to host it on the next inward or outward piece of ice.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 智能模块 - 西洋棋 - 木马
flavor_enUS: 'Maneuver warfare' is a doctrine that advocates keeping an enemy off-balance. It works just as well in cyberspace as in reality.
flavor_zhCN: “机动作战”理论倡导让敌人猝不及防。它在赛博空间和现实世界一样有用。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Make a run. During this run, the Corp must pay X[credit] as an additional cost to rez each piece of ice, where X is the rez cost of that ice.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，花费[click]。
进行一次潜袭。在本次潜袭中，公司必须支付X[credit]作为额外的费用，以激活每层防火墙，X等于该防火墙的激活费用。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Make a run. During this run, the Corp must pay X credits as an additional cost to rez each piece of ice, where X is the rez cost of that ice.

text_enUS: [click]: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, you may reveal all cards in HQ.
text_zhCN: [click]：对总部进行一次潜袭。如果成功，你可以展示总部中的所有卡牌，代替读取卡牌。
stripped_text: click: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, you may reveal all cards in HQ.
flavor_enUS: Knowing is half the battle. The easy half, anyway.
flavor_zhCN: 洞察是战斗成功的一半，但只是简单的那一半。

text_enUS: When your turn ends, gain 1[credit] if you made a successful run this turn; otherwise, trash Grifter.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合结束时，如果你本回合进行过成功的潜袭，获得1[credit]；否则，销毁骗徒。
stripped_text: When your turn ends, gain 1 credit if you made a successful run this turn; otherwise, trash Grifter.
flavor_enUS: With modern secretaries, incoming data can be filtered, sorted, tagged, and even sold without the intervention of a human user. In fact, given the zettabytes of data that might flood into a rig on a successful run, a human user could be considered useless ornamentation.
flavor_zhCN: 借助现代化的助理，数据可以在没有人脑介入的情况下被过滤、分类、标识，甚至出售。实际上，考虑到一次成功的潜袭中会有数以泽计字节的数据涌入基地，人脑用户可以被视为无用的摆设。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解门禁子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: The core of the grid. A blinding sphere of light, teeming with energy, crackling with flame. Beyond were only twinkling bits of data in a field of darkness. No hacker dared approach the core, except one. He came back with a flare of code, a torch that burned with the fire of the core itself. The dark places of cyberspace were dark no more, and the legend of g00ru was born.
flavor_zhCN: 网阵的核心。一个炫目的光球，能量充盈，火焰熊熊。黑暗领域里唯有数据的字节闪烁着。从未有黑客敢接近这核心，除一人外。他归来时带着闪耀的代码，带着由核心之焰点燃的火炬。赛博空间不再黑暗，精神0袖的传说诞生。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, reveal the top card of R&D. The Corp may draw that card.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，展示研发中心顶端的一张卡牌。公司可以补该卡牌。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, reveal the top card of R&D. The Corp may draw that card.
flavor_enUS: Looks can be deceiving.
flavor_zhCN: 外表是会骗人的。

text_enUS: Whenever the Corp takes bad publicity, breach HQ. You cannot access cards in the root of HQ during this breach. [trash]: Expose 1 card.
text_zhCN:
每当公司拿取至少1枚负面声誉标记时，从总部读取一张卡牌。
[trash]：揭示一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever the Corp takes bad publicity, breach HQ. You cannot access cards in the root of HQ during this breach. trash: Expose 1 card.
flavor_enUS:
"Flint? He's a burnout. A useless, alcoholic waste of Department time and money." -Louis Blaine, NAPD Detective.
"One of the best detectives on my PI list." -Richard Harrison, NAPD Captain.
flavor_zhCN:
“弗林特？他是个废物。无能、酗酒，还浪费部门的时间和金钱。” —新洛杉矶警察局警探路易斯·布莱恩
“我的私人调查员列表上最棒的警探之一。” —新洛杉矶警察局长官理查德·哈里森

text_enUS: [click]: Add 1 of your installed cards to HQ.
text_zhCN: [click]：将一张你已安装的卡牌加入总部。
stripped_text: click: Add 1 of your installed cards to HQ.
flavor_enUS: Even with a virtual ball, it is considered rude not to yell "Fore!"
flavor_zhCN: 就算是虚拟的球，如果不说“前面当心！”也会被认为不礼貌。

text_enUS: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] The Runner cannot access more than 1 card during this run. [subroutine] The Runner cannot access more than 1 card during this run.
stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine The Runner cannot access more than 1 card during this run. Subroutine The Runner cannot access more than 1 card during this run.
flavor_enUS: I'm not here to play games. The game is over.
flavor_zhCN: 我不是来玩游戏的。游戏结束了。

text_enUS: Look at the top 3 cards of R&D. If any of those cards are operations, you may play them (paying their play cost), ignoring any additional costs. Trash the rest of the unplayed cards you looked at.
text_zhCN: 查看研发中心顶端的三张卡牌。如果其中有任何事务，你可以打出它们（支付它们的打出费用），忽略任何额外的费用。销毁余下你所查看的未打出的卡牌。
stripped_text: Look at the top 3 cards of R&D. If any of those cards are operations, you may play them (paying their play cost), ignoring any additional costs. Trash the rest of the unplayed cards you looked at.
flavor_enUS: "I'm getting a reading that is…off the charts. No, it crashed the charts. That counts as off, right?"
flavor_zhCN: “我看到一个读数，它…超出了记录。不，它碾压了记录。这也记为超出，对吧？”

text_enUS: When you score Unorthodox Predictions, choose sentry, code gate or barrier. Subroutines on ice of the chosen type cannot be broken until the beginning of your next turn.
text_zhCN: 当你用异法占卜计分时，选择警报，门禁或屏障。所选择子类型防火墙上的子进程不能被破解，直到你的下回合开始。
stripped_text: When you score Unorthodox Predictions, choose sentry, code gate or barrier. Subroutines on ice of the chosen type cannot be broken until the beginning of your next turn.

text_enUS: The first time the Runner spends 1 or more [click] during their turn, gain 2[credit]. If those [click] were spent to take an action, the first time during that action a run on this server begins, pay 2[credit].
stripped_text: The first time the Runner spends 1 or more click during their turn, gain 2 credits. If those click were spent to take an action, the first time during that action a run on this server begins, pay 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: As beautiful as it is dangerous. And it's plenty dangerous.
flavor_zhCN: 它的美丽一如它的危险。而它极其危险。

text_enUS: When the Runner's turn begins, give them 1 tag unless they pay 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 当潜袭者的回合开始时，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记，除非他/她支付1[credit]。
stripped_text: When the Runner's turn begins, give them 1 tag unless they pay 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: Who watches the watcher? Probably another camera.
flavor_zhCN: 谁来监视监视者？估计是另一个摄像头。

text_enUS: When the Runner encounters Snoop, reveal all cards in the Runner's grip. Hosted power counter: Reveal all cards in the Runner's grip. Trash 1 of those cards. [subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, place 1 power counter on Snoop.
text_zhCN: 当潜袭者遭遇窥视者时，展示潜袭者操控器中的所有卡牌。 所附载的能量指示物：展示潜袭者操控器中的所有卡牌。销毁其中一张卡牌。 [subroutine] 追踪 3 如果成功，放置1枚能量指示物到窥视者上。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters Snoop, reveal all cards in the Runner's grip. Hosted power counter: Reveal all cards in the Runner's grip. Trash 1 of those cards. Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, place 1 power counter on Snoop.

text_enUS: Ireress gains "[subroutine] The Runner loses 1[credit]" for each bad publicity you have.
text_zhCN: 你每有1枚负面声誉标记，国事委局获得“[subroutine] 潜袭者失去1[credit]。”
stripped_text: Ireress gains "Subroutine The Runner loses 1 credit" for each bad publicity you have.
flavor_enUS: Say it really fast.
flavor_zhCN: 快速念出来。

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner made a run during their last turn.
Trash any number of cards from the top of R&D. The Runner trashes an installed program or piece of hardware with an install cost equal to or less than the number of cards you trashed this way.
text_zhCN:
如果潜袭者在他/她的上回合进行过潜袭，才能打出。
销毁研发中心顶端的X张卡牌。潜袭者销毁一个已安装的并且安装费用等于或小于X的程序或硬件。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner made a run during their last turn. Trash any number of cards from the top of R&D. The Runner trashes an installed program or piece of hardware with an install cost equal to or less than the number of cards you trashed this way.

text_enUS:
When the Runner fully breaks this ice, trash it.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
在一次遭遇中，如果纸墙上的所有子进程被破解，销毁纸墙。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When the Runner fully breaks this ice, trash it. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: It folds under pressure.
flavor_zhCN: 它受压即折。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Install a non-operation card from Archives or HQ, ignoring the install cost.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
从档案库或总部安装一张非事务卡牌，忽略所有的安装费用。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Install a non-operation card from Archives or HQ, ignoring the install cost.
flavor_enUS: "They're the only labor cheaper than clones."
flavor_zhCN: “他们是唯一比克隆体便宜的劳动力。”

text_enUS: [click]: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, look at the top 3 cards of R&D. Trash 1 of those cards, then the Corp shuffles R&D.
text_zhCN: [click]：对研发中心进行一次潜袭。如果成功，查看研发中心顶端的三张卡牌，代替读取卡牌。销毁其中一张卡牌，无须费用（即使该卡牌不能被正常销毁），并且公司将研发中心重洗。
stripped_text: click: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, look at the top 3 cards of R&D. Trash 1 of those cards, then the Corp shuffles R&D.
flavor_enUS: The instructions claim that it sifts the most important data. 'Important', it has been found, is a highly relative term.
flavor_zhCN: 说明宣称它能筛选出最为重要的数据。“重要”，大家都知道，是个非常相对性的词语。

text_enUS:
When the Corp's turn begins, take 1 tag if you have no tags.
When your turn begins, give the Corp 1 bad publicity if they have no bad publicity.
text_zhCN:
当公司的回合开始时，如果你没有锁定标记，拿取1枚锁定标记。
当你的回合开始时，如果公司没有负面声誉标记，给予公司1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: When the Corp's turn begins, take 1 tag if you have no tags. When your turn begins, give the Corp 1 bad publicity if they have no bad publicity.
flavor_enUS: "They call me a terrorist to scare people. If they want to find terrorists, maybe they should start by looking in the mirror." -Reina Roja
flavor_zhCN: “他们称我为恐吓人民的恐怖分子。如果他们真的想找恐怖分子，或许应该先照照镜子。” —雷娜·罗娅

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Remove up to 2 tags and draw 3 cards.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，花费[click]。
移除最多2枚锁定标记并补三张卡牌。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Remove up to 2 tags and draw 3 cards.
flavor_enUS: Pros don't need to call their lawyer. Pros have their secretary rigged to do it for them if they ever go off-grid.
flavor_zhCN: 专业人士不需要叫他们的律师。就算在离线的时候，也有早已备好的助理来替他们完成。

text_enUS:
Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn.
The Corp may take 2 bad publicity. If they do not, whenever you would take damage until your next turn begins, prevent all of that damage.
text_zhCN:
如果你本回合已对总部进行过成功的潜袭，才能打出。
防止所有的伤害，直到你的下回合开始，除非公司拿取2枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. The Corp may take 2 bad publicity. If they do not, whenever you would take damage until your next turn begins, prevent all of that damage.
flavor_enUS: "Care to have a look?"
flavor_zhCN: “有兴趣看一下吗？”

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解[credit]警报子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: The first credited icebreaker was nothing more than a unique script to bypass the security calls on a Gibson 3 Data Sentry. Garrote has over 20,000 times the data as that first breaker, but the idea remains the same: cut off the power source from the network, and then smash on through.
flavor_zhCN: 有据可查的第一个破解器只是一段特别的脚本，能够通过吉布森3型数据警报的防卫机制。绞刑拥有的数据是第一个破解器的20000倍，但理念相同：切断动力核心和网络的联系，然后完全粉碎它。

text_enUS: Whenever you install an icebreaker, that icebreaker has +1 strength until the end of the turn.
text_zhCN: 每当你安装一个破解器时，该破解器的强度+1，直到本回合结束。
stripped_text: Whenever you install an icebreaker, that icebreaker has +1 strength until the end of the turn.
flavor_enUS: LLDS Unlimited was born the day two designers answered the question "Why doesn't anyone make Diesel for computers?"
flavor_zhCN: 在两名设计师解答“为何没人生产电脑用的迪燃？”的那天，LLDS无限公司诞生。

text_enUS: Interface → [trash]: Break any number of destroyer subroutines. 1[credit]: +2 strength.
text_zhCN: [trash]：破解任意数量的毁灭者子进程。 1[credit]：强度+2。
stripped_text: Interface -> trash: Break any number of destroyer subroutines. 1 credit: +2 strength.
flavor_enUS: "One-shot icebreakers are popular among many of my protégés. They don't have the patience for the hunt." -The Professor
flavor_zhCN: “一次性的破解器在我的许多门徒中很流行。他们缺乏狩猎的耐心。” —教授

text_enUS: [click]: Trash any number of cards from your grip. For each trashed card of which you have another copy installed, draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: [click]：从你的操控器销毁任意数量的卡牌。每销毁一张与你已安装卡牌相同的卡牌，补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: click: Trash any number of cards from your grip. For each trashed card of which you have another copy installed, draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS: "Once you have achieved perfection, what's next?" -The Professor
flavor_zhCN: “臻于完美之后，接下来是什么？” —教授

text_enUS: When your turn begins, lose [click]. Ignore any additional costs on each double event you play.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，失去[click]。 忽略你打出的每个双重事件任何额外的费用。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, lose click. Ignore any additional costs on each double event you play.
flavor_enUS: "I like to say 'Traditional values for a modern time.' War in space and life made by human hands, machines smart enough to ask if they have souls…Religion is as important and relevent now as at any time in human history. We must rise to meet the new challenges. And we must have faith."
flavor_zhCN: “我喜欢称之为'现代世界的传统价值'。看看太空与生命中那些人类自己挑起的战争，还有足以智能到探求自己是否有灵魂的机器…宗教在当下和人类历史上任何时期一样地重要和必要。我们必须起身面对新的挑战。我们必须有所信仰。”

text_enUS:
Place 3 power counters on Rex Campaign when it is rezzed. When there are no power counters left on Rex Campaign, trash it and either remove 1 bad publicity or gain 5[credit].
When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from Rex Campaign.
text_zhCN:
当雷克斯营销计划被激活时，放置3枚能量指示物到本卡牌上。当雷克斯营销计划上没有能量指示物时，销毁本卡牌，并移除1枚负面声誉标记或获得5[credit]。
当你的回合开始时，从雷克斯营销计划上移除1枚能量指示物。
stripped_text: Place 3 power counters on Rex Campaign when it is rezzed. When there are no power counters left on Rex Campaign, trash it and either remove 1 bad publicity or gain 5 credits. When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from Rex Campaign.

text_enUS:
When you rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity.
[subroutine] Do 1 core damage.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
当你激活芬里斯时，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
[subroutine] 造成1点脑部伤害。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity. Subroutine Do 1 core damage. Subroutine End the run.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 杀伤 - 非法
flavor_enUS: As reported cases of brain damage in veterans rise, mind/machine interface devices are subject to increased public scrutiny. That certain programs can cause irreparable harm to users has gone from fringe theory to accepted truth.
flavor_zhCN: 随着有关退伍军人脑部伤害的报告日益增多，人机接口受到了更严格的公开审查。特定程序将对用户造成无法挽回的伤害，这种说法从边缘理论变为了被认可的事实。

text_enUS:
Install only in the root of HQ.
1[credit]: Draw 1 card. Use this ability only during a run on HQ.
text_zhCN:
仅能安装在总部的根目录。
1[credit]：补一张卡牌。仅能在对总部的潜袭中使用本能力。
stripped_text: Install only in the root of HQ. 1 credit: Draw 1 card. Use this ability only during a run on HQ.
flavor_enUS: The button didn't seem to do anything. So he pushed it again. And again. And again.
flavor_zhCN: 按钮好像没有任何效果。于是他再一次按下。再一次。再一次。

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this asset, do 1 net damage.
text_zhCN:
如果电击！从研发中心被读取，潜袭者必须展示它。
当潜袭者读取电击！时，造成1点网域伤害，即使其未被安装。
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this asset, do 1 net damage.

text_enUS:
[subroutine] End the run unless the Corp pays 1[credit].
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
stripped_text: Subroutine End the run unless the Corp pays 1 credit. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.
flavor_enUS: "It's ice so dangerous it has safety protocols. Think about that." -g00ru
flavor_zhCN: “这个防火墙太危险，以至于它有安全条款。仔细想想吧。” —精神0袖

text_enUS:
