While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this agenda, give them 1 tag.
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this agenda, give them 1 tag.
flavor_enUS: "The damn raven just kind of cawed at me as I went past. I should have known it was too good to be true."
flavor_zhCN: “当我通过的时候，那该死的乌鸦冲我叫来着。我早该知道哪有免费的午餐。”

text_enUS: Gain 1[credit] for each card in the Runner's grip.
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit for each card in the Runner's grip.
flavor_enUS:
"Let me get this straight. Your target market is 15-19 year old g-modded immigrants with one parent, a discretionary income over 2k a month, B+ or higher grades, an outgoing personality, and have a friend who owns a g-monkey?"
"Yes. Is that a problem?"
"No, not at all. I just don't get why your list is so short."
flavor_zhCN:
“让我说得直接点。你的目标市场是15-19岁的转基因人移民，单亲，每月可支配收入高于2千，B+以上的等级，外向性格，并且有一个养着一只转基因猴子的朋友？”
“对，有问题？”
“不，完全没有。我只是不懂为何你的列表那么短。”

text_enUS: [subroutine] The Runner cannot spend any credits for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 本次潜袭的剩余时间内，潜袭者不能花费任何信用点。
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner cannot spend any credits for the remainder of this run.
flavor_enUS: This ice disguises itself as a series of electronic transactions, tying up the runner's funds in a thousand or so non-existent purchases and refunds. The banks' system of holds and checks means that while not a single credit ever leaves their servers the runner has no available funds. RSVP also has the unfortunate side effect of being entirely legal…strictly speaking.
flavor_zhCN: 该防火墙将自己伪装成一系列的电子业务，将潜袭者的资金绑定到大约一千次不存在的购物和退款中。银行的冻结核查系统意味着即使一个信用点都未曾离开过服务器，潜袭者也没有任何资金可用。“急盼回复”也有令人遗憾的地方，就是它完全合法…严格说来如此。

text_enUS:
If Curtain Wall is the outermost piece of ice protecting a server, it has +4 strength.
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
如果幕墙是保护服务器的最外层防火墙，其强度+4。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: If Curtain Wall is the outermost piece of ice protecting a server, it has +4 strength. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS:
[subroutine] End the game.
Just kidding.
flavor_zhCN:
[subroutine] 终止本次游戏。
开个玩笑。

text_enUS: Trace[5]. If successful, do X meat damage. X is equal to the sum of the printed agenda points on all agendas the Runner stole during their last turn.
text_zhCN: <trace>追踪 5</trace>。如果成功，造成X点肢体伤害。X等于潜袭者在其上回合所窃取的所有议案的印刷议案分数总和。
stripped_text: Trace[5]. If successful, do X meat damage. X is equal to the sum of the printed agenda points on all agendas the Runner stole during their last turn.
flavor_enUS: "I'd say it's nothing personal, but corporations are people, too."
flavor_zhCN: “我得说对事不对人，但公司也是人。”

text_enUS: When you score Veterans Program, you may remove up to 2 bad publicity.
text_zhCN: 当你用退伍军人计划计分时，你可以移除最多2枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: When you score Veterans Program, you may remove up to 2 bad publicity.
flavor_enUS: It's easy to replace limbs. It's more difficult to replace memories.
flavor_zhCN: 替换四肢很容易，替换记忆则困难得多。

text_enUS:
Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn.
Access 1 installed card (non-ice).
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn. Access 1 installed card (non-ice).
flavor_enUS:
That moment of bliss. That feeling of accomplishment. That certainty of purpose.
What's next?
flavor_zhCN:
喜悦的瞬间。成功的感觉。决意的确信。
接下来呢？

text_enUS: Whenever you make a successful run, place 1 virus counter on Hemorrhage. [click], 2 hosted virus counters: The Corp trashes 1 card from HQ.
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run, place 1 virus counter on Hemorrhage. click, 2 hosted virus counters: The Corp trashes 1 card from HQ.
flavor_enUS: Bleeding data is more of a science than an art. Too much and you can end up with a one-way ticket to flatline city. Not enough and you might as well be running an empty server.
flavor_zhCN: 给数据放血是艺术更是科学。放多了你会拿到通向死亡的单程票，放少了你还不如去潜袭一个空服务器。

text_enUS: Whenever a gray ops or black ops operation is trashed after resolving, you may give the Corp 1 bad publicity and take 1 tag. [trash]: Draw 1 card for each bad publicity the Corp has.
text_zhCN: 每当灰色行动或黑色行动事务在结算后被销毁时，你可以给予公司1枚负面声誉标记并拿取1枚锁定标记。 [trash]：公司每有1枚负面声誉标记，补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever a gray ops or black ops operation is trashed after resolving, you may give the Corp 1 bad publicity and take 1 tag. trash: Draw 1 card for each bad publicity the Corp has.
flavor_enUS: Stick with your plan and you'll be fine. Stick with the plan.
flavor_zhCN: 坚持你的计划，你会没事的。坚持计划。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Reveal all cards in HQ.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，花费[click]。
展示总部中的所有卡牌。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Reveal all cards in HQ.
flavor_enUS: "When you need someone who is a little more hands on, look me up." -Silhouette
flavor_zhCN: “如果你需要更有经验的人，来找我。” —侧影

text_enUS: +2[mu] Whenever you expose a card, the Corp must rez it by paying its rez cost, if able. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +2[mu] 每当你揭示一张卡牌时，如可能，公司必须支付其激活费用来激活它。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +2 mu Whenever you expose a card, the Corp must rez it by paying its rez cost, if able. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS: The power of the focused mind is a power beyond comprehension.
flavor_zhCN: 专注精神的力量是一种超越理解的力量。

stripped_text: +2 mu
flavor_enUS: "CyberSolutions is a boring name for a company that makes pretty exciting products. Their memory chips have some pretty tricky stuff going on inside and I keep hearing good things about their M/MI implants. I even heard they were on the path to their own androids about a year ago. I wonder whatever happened with that?" -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
flavor_zhCN: “对一个作出如此激动人心的产品的公司来说，赛博方案真是一个乏味的名字。他们的内存芯片内部有相当复杂的东西，并且我经常听说有关他们人机植入体的好消息。我甚至还听说他们大约一年前已开始着手打造自己的安卓人。不管还会发生什么我都想知道。” —凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. This program can only interface with the outermost piece of ice protecting a server.
text_zhCN:
1[credit]：破解防火墙子进程。
1[credit]：强度+1。
阿尔法仅能对保护服务器的最外层防火墙使用。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. This program can only interface with the outermost piece of ice protecting a server.
flavor_enUS: The beginning…
flavor_zhCN: 起源…

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. This program can only interface with the innermost piece of ice protecting a server.
text_zhCN:
1[credit]：破解防火墙子进程。
1[credit]：强度+1。
欧米伽仅能对保护服务器的最内层防火墙使用。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. This program can only interface with the innermost piece of ice protecting a server.
flavor_enUS: …and the end?
flavor_zhCN: …和终结？

text_enUS:
Play only if the Corp has at least 1 bad publicity.
Make a run. The Corp cannot rez ice for the duration of this run.
text_zhCN:
如果公司具有至少1枚负面声誉标记，才能打出。
进行一次潜袭。在本次潜袭中公司不能激活防火墙。
stripped_text: Play only if the Corp has at least 1 bad publicity. Make a run. The Corp cannot rez ice for the duration of this run.

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Gain 5[credit] and draw 2 cards.
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Gain 5 credits and draw 2 cards.
flavor_enUS: Blue-one level clearance doesn't exist. And if it did exist, you wouldn't be cleared to know about it.
flavor_zhCN: 蓝色一级许可并不存在。就算它存在，你也没有许可知道它。

text_enUS: Persistent → As an additional cost to steal an agenda from this server or its root, the Runner must spend [click]. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)
stripped_text: Persistent -> As an additional cost to steal an agenda from this server or its root, the Runner must spend click. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)

text_enUS:
Toshiyuki Sakai can be advanced.
If Toshiyuki Sakai is accessed while installed, you may swap him with an agenda or asset from HQ. The new agenda or asset is installed unrezzed, and keeps all advancement tokens on Toshiyuki Sakai. The Runner can choose not to access the new card.
text_zhCN:
酒井俊之能被推进。
如果已安装的酒井俊之被读取，你可以将他与总部中的一个议案或资产互换。新的议案或资产被安装为未激活的状态，并且保留酒井俊之上所有的推进标记。潜袭者能选择不读取该新卡牌。
stripped_text: Toshiyuki Sakai can be advanced. If Toshiyuki Sakai is accessed while installed, you may swap him with an agenda or asset from HQ. The new agenda or asset is installed unrezzed, and keeps all advancement tokens on Toshiyuki Sakai. The Runner can choose not to access the new card.

text_enUS:
[subroutine] Look at the top card of R&D. You may add that card to the bottom of R&D.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
stripped_text: Subroutine Look at the top card of R&D. You may add that card to the bottom of R&D. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.
flavor_enUS: The 'cyber-war' is a war of information, and in a war of information, advance warning can be as good as a killing blow. -Michael Muhama, Musings on Cybercrime
flavor_zhCN: “数字战争”是信息的战争，而在信息的战争中，预先警告和致命一击同样优秀。 —迈克尔·穆哈马，《数字犯罪沉思录》

text_enUS: Trash one of your installed sysops, executives, or clones. If you do, remove up to 2 bad publicity.
text_zhCN: 销毁一个你已安装的管理员，主管或克隆体。如果你如此做，移除最多2枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: Trash one of your installed sysops, executives, or clones. If you do, remove up to 2 bad publicity.
flavor_enUS: He slowly pried open the lid, and the tantō glinted madly in the half-light. The executive motioned to the blade. Looks like the meeting was being cut short.
flavor_zhCN: 他慢慢地启开盖子，短刀在暗光下闪闪发亮。主管示意了一下刀刃。看来这次会面就此结束了。

text_enUS:
If the Runner is tagged when you score Market Research, place 1 agenda counter on it.
Market Research is worth 1 additional agenda point while it has an agenda counter on it.
text_zhCN:
如果当你用市场研究计分时，潜袭者被锁定，放置1枚议案指示物到本卡牌上。
当市场研究具有一个议案指示物时，其额外价值1点议案分数。
stripped_text: If the Runner is tagged when you score Market Research, place 1 agenda counter on it. Market Research is worth 1 additional agenda point while it has an agenda counter on it.

text_enUS: While there are no installed fracter programs, this ice gets +7 strength. [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: 只要没有已安装的分解模块程序，本防火墙的强度便+7。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: While there are no installed fracter programs, this ice gets +7 strength. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: "It can make a real fine roller coaster, provided you're properly stimmed up." -Noise
flavor_zhCN: “它可以变成一个很棒的过山车，假如你药嗑得正合适。” —噪音

text_enUS: You start the game with 10[credit] and 1 bad publicity.
text_zhCN: 你游戏开始时具有10[credit]和1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: You start the game with 10 credits and 1 bad publicity.
flavor_enUS: Geostrategic Research and Neothermal Development Laboratories
flavor_zhCN: 地理战略研究及新热能研发实验所

text_enUS:
When you score Vulcan Coverup, do 2 meat damage.
When the Runner steals Vulcan Coverup, take 1 bad publicity.
text_zhCN:
当你用焚烧掩盖计分时，造成2点肢体伤害。
当潜袭者窃取焚烧掩盖时，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: When you score Vulcan Coverup, do 2 meat damage. When the Runner steals Vulcan Coverup, take 1 bad publicity.
flavor_enUS: "I did warn you that leaks would have to be patched."
flavor_zhCN: “我警告过你了，这个漏洞会打补丁。”

text_enUS:
GRNDL Refinery can be advanced.
[click], [trash]: Gain 4[credit] for each advancement token on GRNDL Refinery.
stripped_text: GRNDL Refinery can be advanced. click, trash: Gain 4 credits for each advancement token on GRNDL Refinery.
flavor_enUS: GRNDL refineries process many different rare elements unearthed during the fracking process.
flavor_zhCN: 地新研发所冶炼厂处理着在液压流程中开采出的各种稀有元素。

text_enUS:
Gain 1[credit].
The first time each turn you play a copy of Subliminal Messaging, gain [click].
When your turn begins, if this card is in Archives and the Runner did not initiate any runs during their last turn, you may reveal this card and add it to HQ.
text_zhCN:
获得1[credit].
每回合你第一次打出一张名称为潜意识信号的卡牌时，获得[click]。
当你的回合开始时，如果本卡牌在档案库中，且潜袭者在其上回合未发起过潜袭，你可以展示本卡牌，并将其加入总部。
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit. The first time each turn you play a copy of Subliminal Messaging, gain click. When your turn begins, if this card is in Archives and the Runner did not initiate any runs during their last turn, you may reveal this card and add it to HQ.

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Run a remote server. If successful, instead of breaching that server, trash all cards installed in the root of that server.
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Run a remote server. If successful, instead of breaching that server, trash all cards installed in the root of that server.

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Place up to 3 advancement counters on 1 unrezzed card in the root of a remote server. Gain 2[credit] for each counter placed this way. You cannot access that card for the remainder of the turn.
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Place up to 3 advancement counters on 1 unrezzed card in the root of a remote server. Gain 2 credits for each counter placed this way. You cannot access that card for the remainder of the turn.

text_enUS: 1[recurring-credit] Use this credit to pay for using fracters.
text_zhCN: 1[recurring-credit] 本信用点用于支付使用分解模块。
stripped_text: 1 recurring credit Use this credit to pay for using fracters.
flavor_enUS: The Dyson Fractal Generator is a useless lump of silicon; all it does is produce truly random results. What kind of madman slaps that in his rig? What's the use of a totally random number? -John Masanori
flavor_zhCN: “戴森碎片激生器是一个无用的硅片；它能做的只是产生真正的随机结果。什么样的疯子会把它装在自己的基地？完全随机的数字又有什么用呢？” —约翰·正德

text_enUS: 1[recurring-credit] Use this credit to pay for using killers.
text_zhCN: 1[recurring-credit] 本信用点用于支付使用断路模块。
stripped_text: 1 recurring credit Use this credit to pay for using killers.
flavor_enUS: Take Moore's Law, iterate it over a century or two, and mix in quantum computing. You get to the point where you're developing the software on a hardware platform that you design at the same time. Tailor-made for each other. Exciting time to be alive! -William Knuth, The Tower of Babbage
flavor_zhCN: 根据摩尔定律，迭代推演一两个世纪，并加上量子计算。你会发现，你正在开发的软件会用于你同时正在设计的硬件平台。互相为彼此定制。多么令人激动的时代！ —威廉·克努特，《巴贝奇之塔》

text_enUS:
You cannot use Savoir-faire more than once each turn.
2[credit]: Install a program from your grip, paying the install cost.
text_zhCN:
每回合你不能使用应变者多于一次。
2[credit]：从你的操控器安装一个程序，支付其安装费用。
stripped_text: You cannot use Savoir-faire more than once each turn. 2 credits: Install a program from your grip, paying the install cost.
flavor_enUS: "Predictive algorithms that fetch you the program you need before you even know you need it. My second favorite lady." -Gabriel Santiago
flavor_zhCN: “预测性算法将为你带来所需的程序，甚至在你自己都不知道会需要的时候。我第二钟爱的宝贝儿。” —加布里埃尔·圣地亚哥

text_enUS: [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent a player from trashing another installed resource. [trash]: Gain 2[credit].
stripped_text: Interrupt -> trash: Prevent a player from trashing another installed resource. trash: Gain 2[credit].
flavor_enUS: There are good, honest, hardworking cops in the NAPD. Officers who do their best to bring justice to the guilty and protect the innocent. Fortunately for the criminals, they're outnumbered by the other kind. The kind who are much easier to work with.
flavor_zhCN: 新洛杉矶警察局里的确有优秀、诚实、勤劳的警探。他们尽职打击犯罪并保护无辜。所幸对于逆法者来说，另一类人的数量要远远更多。另一类人更加容易打交道。

text_enUS: As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click]. Gain 2[credit]. Gain an additional 1[credit] for each double event in your heap.
text_zhCN: 作为打出本事件的额外费用，花费[click]。 获得2[credit]。你的堆阵中每有一个双重事件，额外获得1[credit] 。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Gain 2 credits. Gain an additional 1 credit for each double event in your heap.
flavor_enUS: "When I said I could hack it in my sleep, did you think I was joking?" -Chaos Theory
flavor_zhCN: “当时我说我能在睡觉的时候潜袭，你觉得我是在开玩笑？” —混沌希尔瑞

text_enUS: [click]: Choose a rezzed piece of ice. That ice gains sentry, code gate or barrier until the end of the next run this turn.
text_zhCN: [click]：选择一层已激活的防火墙。该防火墙获得警报，门禁或屏障，直到本回合的下一次潜袭结束。
stripped_text: click: Choose a rezzed piece of ice. That ice gains sentry, code gate or barrier until the end of the next run this turn.
flavor_enUS: "Hand-made code is like hand-made art. You can see the brush strokes, which lets you see the artist. And then you can see everything in a new way." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
flavor_zhCN: “手工代码犹如手工艺术。你看得到笔触，这让你理解画它的艺术家。然后你就能以全新的方式来看待一切。” —凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Gain 9[credit].
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Gain 9 credits.
flavor_enUS: Data hunters always pay top dollar for old drives. The more useless the data, the higher the payout.
flavor_zhCN: 数据猎人们总会为旧驱动器出价不菲。数据越烂，价格越高。

text_enUS: [subroutine] The Runner's maximum hand size is reduced by 2 until the beginning of the Corp's next turn.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 潜袭者的手牌上限减2，直到公司的下回合开始。
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner's maximum hand size is reduced by 2 until the beginning of the Corp's next turn.
flavor_enUS: Once inside, the only way out is through your own mind.
flavor_zhCN: 一旦进入，唯一的出路就是穿越自己的意识。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Name a card other than Reclamation Order. Reveal any number of copies of the named card from Archives and add them to HQ.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
指定一张回收指令以外的卡牌的名称。将其任意数量的相同卡牌从档案库加入总部。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Name a card other than Reclamation Order. Reveal any number of copies of the named card from Archives and add them to HQ.

text_enUS: [interrupt] → Whenever you would take bad publicity, trace[3]. If successful, prevent all of that bad publicity.
text_zhCN: 每当你将要拿取至少1枚负面声誉标记时，<trace>追踪 3</trace> 如果成功，避免拿取该负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> Whenever you would take bad publicity, trace[3]. If successful, prevent all of that bad publicity.
flavor_enUS: Tourists have flocked to Broadcast Square in even greater numbers ever since the notorious Ho-meh's crime spree ended there in a hail of flechettes. Well, that's how it happened in the sensie.
flavor_zhCN: 自从臭名昭著的何蒙的犯罪生涯在这里被枪林弹雨终结后，传媒广场吸引的游客们更加络绎不绝。嗯，复感电影里是这么演的。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Shuffle all cards in HQ into R&D. Draw 5 cards.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
将总部中的所有卡牌洗入研发中心。补五张卡牌。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Shuffle all cards in HQ into R&D. Draw 5 cards.
flavor_enUS: The only thing worse than being fired and replaced by a younger, cheaper worker? Being replaced by an android.
flavor_zhCN: 被解雇然后被更年轻、更便宜的工人取代，唯一比这个更糟糕的事情是？被安卓人取代。

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner passes all of the ice protecting this server, you and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, end the run.
text_zhCN: 每当潜袭者通过保护本服务器的所有防火墙时，你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner passes all of the ice protecting this server, you and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, end the run.
flavor_enUS: The first clone to serve as an NAPD detective.
flavor_zhCN: 第一名任职为新洛杉矶警探的克隆体。

text_enUS:
When you rez Shinobi, take 1 bad publicity.
[subroutine] Trace[1]. If successful, do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, do 2 net damage.
[subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, do 3 net damage and end the run.
text_zhCN:
当你激活忍法时，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 1</trace> 如果成功，造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，造成2点网域伤害。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 3</trace> 如果成功，造成3点网域伤害并终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When you rez Shinobi, take 1 bad publicity. Subroutine Trace[1]. If successful, do 1 net damage. Subroutine Trace[2]. If successful, do 2 net damage. Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, do 3 net damage and end the run.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 追踪者 - 杀伤 - 非法

text_enUS: [subroutine] The next piece of ice the Runner encounters gains "[subroutine] End the run." after all its other subroutines for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 本次潜袭的剩余时间内，潜袭者遭遇的下一层防火墙在其它所有子进程后获得“[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。”
stripped_text: Subroutine The next piece of ice the Runner encounters gains "Subroutine End the run." after all its other subroutines for the remainder of this run.
flavor_enUS: "It doesn't do anything in and of itself. It just marks you as an intruder and makes the next ice do all the work." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
flavor_zhCN: “它自身不做任何事情。它只是标记你为入侵者，然后让下一道防火墙来做事。” —凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞

text_enUS:
This ice loses 1 of its printed "[subroutine] End the run." subroutines for each agenda point in your score area.
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_text: This ice loses 1 of its printed "Subroutine End the run." subroutines for each agenda point in your score area. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run.

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Remove up to 2 bad publicity.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
移除最多2枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Remove up to 2 bad publicity.
flavor_enUS: "Now, let's talk about how little you remember of the events of June sixth through sixteenth."
flavor_zhCN: “现在，让我们聊聊你还记得多少在六月六号到十六号间发生的那些事。”

text_enUS:
The advancement requirement of NAPD Contract is increased by 1 for each bad publicity the Corp has.
As an additional cost to steal NAPD Contract, the Runner must pay 4[credit].
text_zhCN:
公司每有1枚负面声誉标记，新洛杉矶警察局合约的推进需求+1。
作为窃取新洛杉矶警察局合约的额外费用，潜袭者必须支付4[credit]。
stripped_text: The advancement requirement of NAPD Contract is increased by 1 for each bad publicity the Corp has. As an additional cost to steal NAPD Contract, the Runner must pay 4 credits.

text_enUS: [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: It wants to have two subroutines when it grows up.
flavor_zhCN: 它希望自己长大后能有两个子进程。

title_zhCN: 和谐医学院：生命医学的先锋
text_enUS: Each player needs 1 fewer agenda point to win the game.
text_zhCN: 每位玩家赢得游戏胜利所需的议案分数减1。
stripped_text: Each player needs 1 fewer agenda point to win the game.
flavor_enUS: Evolving a Better You.
flavor_zhCN: 演化新生。

text_enUS: Whenever you and the Runner reveal secretly spent credits, gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每当你和潜袭者展示秘密花费的信用点时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever you and the Runner reveal secretly spent credits, gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: Perfecting the Imperfect.
flavor_zhCN: 尽善尽美。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, if the Runner did not make a successful run during their last turn, you may place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，如果潜袭者在他/她的上回合没有进行过成功的潜袭，你可以放置1枚推进标记到一张卡牌上。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, if the Runner did not make a successful run during their last turn, you may place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, place 3 agenda counters on it. Hosted agenda counter: Do 1 net damage. Use this ability only during a run and only once per run.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，放置3枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物：造成1点网域伤害。本能力仅能在潜袭中使用，且每次潜袭中仅限使用一次。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 3 agenda counters on it. Hosted agenda counter: Do 1 net damage. Use this ability only during a run and only once per run.

text_enUS: Lower the advancement requirement of each Medical Breakthrough by 1. This ability is active even while Medical Breakthrough is in the Runner's score area.
text_zhCN: 每张医学突破的推进需求减1。即使医学突破在潜袭者的分数区中，本能力依然有效。
stripped_text: Lower the advancement requirement of each Medical Breakthrough by 1. This ability is active even while Medical Breakthrough is in the Runner's score area.
flavor_enUS: "You won't feel it. Or anything else, for that matter."
flavor_zhCN: “你不会感觉到它。也不会有别的感觉，就此而言。”

text_enUS:
When you score Philotic Entanglement, do 1 net damage for each agenda in the Runner's score area.
Limit 1 Philotic Entanglement per deck.
stripped_text: When you score Philotic Entanglement, do 1 net damage for each agenda in the Runner's score area. Limit 1 Philotic Entanglement per deck.

text_enUS: When the Runner accesses this agenda while it is not installed, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0–2[credit]. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, the Runner cannot steal this agenda during this access.
text_zhCN: 当潜袭者读取未来完人时，你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，防止未来完人被窃取。如果潜袭者读取已安装的未来完人，则忽略本效果。
stripped_text: When the Runner accesses this agenda while it is not installed, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0-2[credit]. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, the Runner cannot steal this agenda during this access.

text_enUS:
The Runner gets -2 maximum hand size.
When this asset is trashed from anywhere while being accessed, add it to the Runner's score area as an agenda worth 2 agenda points.
text_zhCN:
潜袭者的手牌上限减2。
如果宏社长在读取时被销毁，将他加入潜袭者的分数区，作为一个价值2点议案分数的议案。
stripped_text:
The Runner gets -2 maximum hand size.
When this asset is trashed from anywhere while being accessed, add it to the Runner's score area as an agenda worth 2 agenda points.

text_enUS:
Gain 1[credit] when your turn begins.
The Runner's maximum hand size is increased by 1.
text_zhCN:
当你的回合开始时，获得1[credit]。
潜袭者的手牌上限+1。
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit when your turn begins. The Runner's maximum hand size is increased by 1.
flavor_enUS: The whitewashed walls dropped away and a beautiful zen garden appeared. It was all an illusion, but it was a comforting illusion.
flavor_zhCN: 雪白粉刷的墙壁消失，出现一座漂亮的禅院。这都是幻想，但它是令人舒适的幻想。

text_enUS: If the Runner exposes or accesses Psychic Field while installed, you and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, do 1 net damage for each card in the Runner's grip.
text_zhCN: 如果潜袭者揭示或读取已安装的精神领域，你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，潜袭者的操控器中每有一张卡牌，造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: If the Runner exposes or accesses Psychic Field while installed, you and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, do 1 net damage for each card in the Runner's grip.

text_enUS: When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in R&D, spend any number of credits. The Runner suffers 1 net damage for each credit spent this way unless they add this asset to their score area as an agenda worth −1 agenda point.
text_zhCN: 当潜袭者读取四.九时，你可以支付X[credit]。潜袭者必须承受X点网域伤害或将四.九加入他/她的分数区，作为一个价值-1点议案分数的议案。如果潜袭者从研发中心读取四.九，则忽略本效果。
stripped_text: When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in R&D, spend any number of credits. The Runner suffers 1 net damage for each credit spent this way unless they add this asset to their score area as an agenda worth -1 agenda point.

text_enUS: [click]: Swap 2 pieces of installed ice.
text_zhCN: [click]：将两层已安装的防火墙互换。
stripped_text: click: Swap 2 pieces of installed ice.
flavor_enUS: The Tenma clones became Jinteki's third highest-grossing line ever due to the rapid urban expansion that occurred after the war. Their unparalleled reaction times, safety records, and punctuality have made them the top choice for shipping and transportation services.
flavor_zhCN: 由于战争后城市的迅速扩张，天马克隆体成为人间会社第三热销的生产线。他们无与伦比的反应速度、安全性以及准时性，使他们成为航运和交通业务的首选产品。

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn.
You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, they must suffer 1 core damage or take 1 tag.
text_zhCN:
如果潜袭者在他/她的上回合进行过成功的潜袭，才能打出。
你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，他/她选择受到1点脑部伤害或拿取1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn. You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, they must suffer 1 core damage or take 1 tag.

text_enUS: Gain 8[credit]. The Runner gains 3[credit].
text_zhCN: 获得8[credit]。潜袭者获得3[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 8 credits. The Runner gains 3 credits.
flavor_enUS: "Together we have all but eradicated natural diseases from the face of this planet. The new spectre of synthetic disease-of bioterrorism-demands that we continue our efforts."
flavor_zhCN: “我们齐心协力，几乎从这个星球上消除了自然疾病。但全新的人造疾病—还有生物恐怖主义的幽灵，让我们必须继续前行。”

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Install 1 asset, agenda, or upgrade from HQ in the root of a new server. Place 3 advancement counters on that card. You cannot score or rez that card until your next turn begins.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
从总部安装一个资产，议案或升级到一台新的远程服务器内。放置3枚推进标记到该卡牌上。你不能计分或激活该卡牌，直到你的下回合开始。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Install 1 asset, agenda, or upgrade from HQ in the root of a new server. Place 3 advancement counters on that card. You cannot score or rez that card until your next turn begins.

text_enUS:
[subroutine] During the next encounter this run, the Runner cannot break subroutines on the encountered ice.
[subroutine] The Runner cannot jack out this run until after their next encounter with a piece of ice begins.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 本次潜袭中，潜袭者不能破解他/她遭遇的下一层防火墙上的任何子进程。
[subroutine] 本次潜袭中，潜袭者不能退出，直到遭遇下一层防火墙后。
stripped_text: Subroutine During the next encounter this run, the Runner cannot break subroutines on the encountered ice. Subroutine The Runner cannot jack out this run until after their next encounter with a piece of ice begins.
flavor_enUS: Trapped in their own reality, a paralyzed runner cannot even jack out.
flavor_zhCN: 受困于自己的世界，麻痹的潜袭者甚至无法退出。

text_enUS: When the Runner encounters this ice, it gains X "[subroutine] Do 1 net damage." subroutines for the remainder of this run. X is equal to the number of cards in the grip.
text_zhCN: 当潜袭者遭遇狛犬时，本次潜袭的剩余时间内潜袭者的操控器中每有一张卡牌，其获得“[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。”
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, it gains X "Subroutine Do 1 net damage." subroutines for the remainder of this run. X is equal to the number of cards in the grip.

text_enUS:
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 1[credit].
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 1[credit].
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害，除非潜袭者支付1[credit]。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害，除非潜袭者支付1[credit]。
stripped_text: Subroutine Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 1 credit. Subroutine Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: Yip Yip!
flavor_zhCN: 汪汪！

text_enUS:
[subroutine] Look at the top 3 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
[subroutine] You may pay 1[credit]. If you do not, the Runner breaches R&D. They cannot access cards in the root of R&D during that breach.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 查看研发中心顶端的三张卡牌，并按任意顺序排列它们。
[subroutine] 潜袭者读取研发中心顶端的一张卡牌，除非公司支付1[credit]。
stripped_text: Subroutine Look at the top 3 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order. Subroutine You may pay 1 credit. If you do not, the Runner breaches R&D. They cannot access cards in the root of R&D during that breach.
flavor_enUS: When locked in a fortress in your own mind, be careful what door you open.
flavor_zhCN: 当你被锁在自我意识的城堡里时，要小心你将打开的每道门。

text_enUS: [subroutine] If the attacked server is not Archives, the Runner moves to the outermost position of Archives instead of passing this ice. The Runner cannot jack out this run until after they encounter a piece of ice.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 如果当前没有对档案库进行潜袭，则潜袭者现在开始对档案库进行潜袭，代替通过须佐之男。潜袭者不能退出，直到他/她遭遇一层防火墙后。
stripped_text: Subroutine If the attacked server is not Archives, the Runner moves to the outermost position of Archives instead of passing this ice. The Runner cannot jack out this run until after they encounter a piece of ice.
flavor_enUS: Certain areas of cyberspace are dominated by a single digital entity. Runners call them 'gods', and only a miracle can save those foolish enough to enter their domain.
flavor_zhCN: 赛博空间的某些区域由单独的数字存在体支配着。潜袭者称它们为“神祗”，只有奇迹才能救那些蠢到闯入它们地盘的人。

text_enUS: The first time each turn an advancement counter is placed on a card in the root of this server, gain 1[credit]. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 每回合第一次有1枚推进标记被放置到本服务器内的一张卡牌上时，获得1[credit]。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: The first time each turn an advancement counter is placed on a card in the root of this server, gain 1 credit. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: It is difficult to go to Japan without ending up in the sprawl of NeoTokyo.
flavor_zhCN: 如果去日本，你往往逃不出新东京无限蔓延的城区。

text_enUS: [interrupt] → The first time you would do 1 or more net damage during each run against this server, instead you may pay 2[credit] to do 1 core damage.
text_zhCN: 在对本服务器的潜袭中，你第一次将要造成任意数量的网域伤害时，你可以支付2[credit]，以造成1点脑部伤害代替。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> The first time you would do 1 or more net damage during each run against this server, instead you may pay 2 credits to do 1 core damage.
flavor_enUS: Known as the Red Woman, Hanzō is notorious for her ruthless methods of server protection.
flavor_zhCN: 半藏被称为赤女，她因保护服务器的手段残忍而声名狼藉。

text_enUS:
Plan B can be advanced.
If the Runner accesses Plan B, you may reveal and score an agenda from HQ with an advancement requirement equal to or less than the number of advancement tokens on Plan B.
text_zhCN:
备用计划能被推进。
如果潜袭者读取备用计划，你可以从总部将一个推进需求等于或小于备用计划上推进标记数量的议案展示并计分。
stripped_text: Plan B can be advanced. If the Runner accesses Plan B, you may reveal and score an agenda from HQ with an advancement requirement equal to or less than the number of advancement tokens on Plan B.

text_enUS:
Guard cannot be bypassed.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
门卫不能被略过。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Guard cannot be bypassed. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Out of the corner of his vision, a flash of light. He felt a thud as his grip on cyberspace loosened. Spider didn't like this. He should have bypassed the outer layer of ice by jacking in from the internal server. Another thud, and his whole frame shook with the resounding shockwave. He desperately reached for his shuriken…
flavor_zhCN: 他的视野角落边缘闪出一道亮光。他感到一次重击，令赛博空间里的操控器松脱了。蜘蛛讨厌这样。他通过入侵内部服务器，应该略过了外层的防火墙。又一次重击，他的整个形体都随着轰隆的波动而震荡。他绝望地去摸自己的手里剑…

text_enUS: [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Subroutine End the run.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 门禁 - 屏障
flavor_enUS: The annual review of ice as published by the NSCA consistently gives top marks to the ice that provide the most impact in relation to their size and upkeep cost. Critics of the NSCA point to the bounce ratio as the most important stat when judging ice.
flavor_zhCN: 国家数字安全武装部发布的年度防火墙评估会比较防火墙的规模和维护费用，始终将高分给予那些相对效果最强烈的防火墙。批评国家数字安全武装部的人则指出，登出率才是判断防火墙的最重要指标。

text_enUS: Gain 1[credit] for each remote server with a card in its root.
text_zhCN: 每有一台其内已安装卡牌的远程服务器，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit for each remote server with a card in its root.
flavor_enUS: YucaBean has seen astounding growth in even the most remote markets.
flavor_zhCN: 雅豆的销量即便在最偏远的市场里也得到了令人瞩目的增长。

text_enUS: Search R&D for an agenda, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
text_zhCN: 在研发中心搜寻一个议案，将其展示，并加入总部。将研发中心重洗。
stripped_text: Search R&D for an agenda, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
flavor_enUS: The longer the employees didn't look at the Doomsday Clock, the more it gnawed at the back of their minds. A quick look only reinforced what they already knew: there wasn't enough time.
flavor_zhCN: 职员们越是长时间不看末日计时钟，他们的脑海越是充满钟声的侵扰，而匆匆一瞥则只是强化他们已知晓的事情：时间紧缺。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, gain 2[credit] if the Corp has more scored agenda points than you.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，如果公司已计分的议案分数多于你，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 2 credits if the Corp has more scored agenda points than you.
flavor_enUS: "Truth is a fickle mistress."
flavor_zhCN: “真相是一个善变的情妇。”

title_zhCN: 肯·“快车”·天马：失踪的克隆体
text_enUS: The first time each turn you play a run event, gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次打出一个潜袭事件时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you play a run event, gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: "Try to keep up."
flavor_zhCN: “努力跟上。”

text_enUS: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, you may expose 1 card.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次对总部进行成功的潜袭时，你可以揭示一张卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, you may expose 1 card.
flavor_enUS: "Don't waste my time."
flavor_zhCN: “别浪费我的时间。”

text_enUS: Gain 1[credit] for each installed connection resource.
text_zhCN: 每有一个已安装的人脉资源，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit for each installed connection resource.
flavor_enUS: A job is only as strong as the weakest link. Thankfully Ms. Jones is always on time.
flavor_zhCN: 工作的效果取决于它最薄弱的一环。真要感谢琼斯女士永远那么准时。

text_enUS:
Play only as your first click.
Gain [click]. Run any server.
text_zhCN:
仅能在你的第一个[click]打出。
进行一次潜袭并获得[click]。
stripped_text: Play only as your first click. Gain click. Run any server.
flavor_enUS: Tenma clones are excellent at multitasking, their brains custom-made for parallel processing.
flavor_zhCN: 天马克隆体擅长多线任务，它们的大脑专门定制为并行处理方式。

text_enUS: Look at the top 4 cards of your stack and add 1 of those cards to your grip. Shuffle your stack.
text_zhCN: 查看你存储栈顶端的四张卡牌，并将其中一张卡牌加入你的操控器。将你的存储栈重洗。
stripped_text: Look at the top 4 cards of your stack and add 1 of those cards to your grip. Shuffle your stack.
flavor_enUS: The clone was surprised to see the red-jacketed man. It was like looking in a mirror, only the mirror made him look…cool. Confident. Individual.
flavor_zhCN: 克隆体惊讶地看着红夹克的男子。这就像是在照镜子，只是镜子里的人看起来…很酷，很自信，很有性格。

text_enUS: Run HQ. The first 2 times this run you encounter a piece of ice, bypass that ice. If successful, you cannot breach HQ.
text_zhCN: 对总部进行一次潜袭。在本次潜袭中略过前两层遭遇的防火墙。如果本次潜袭成功，你不能读取任何卡牌。
stripped_text: Run HQ. The first 2 times this run you encounter a piece of ice, bypass that ice. If successful, you cannot breach HQ.
flavor_enUS: Stirling entered the server, passing a growling piece of ice. He was unarmed…or so it seemed.
flavor_zhCN: 斯特林穿过了一层张牙舞爪的防火墙，进入服务器。他赤手空拳…或者只是看起来这样。

text_enUS: Run HQ. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach HQ.
text_zhCN: 潜袭总部。如果成功，当你侵入总部时，额外读取2张卡牌。
stripped_text: Run HQ. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach HQ.
flavor_enUS: "I work by referral only, with an up-front fee. The fee is reasonable if you value results." -Silhouette
flavor_zhCN: “我只通过熟客介绍来工作，并且是预先收费。如果你看重结果，这些收费很公道。” —侧影

text_enUS: As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click]. Search your stack for a run event and play that run event (paying its play cost), ignoring any additional costs. Shuffle your stack.
text_zhCN: 作为打出本事件的额外费用，花费[click]。 在你的存储栈搜寻一个潜袭事件，并打出该潜袭事件（支付其打出费用），忽略任何额外的费用。将你的存储栈重洗。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Search your stack for a run event and play that run event (paying its play cost), ignoring any additional costs. Shuffle your stack.

text_enUS: +1[mu] Your maximum hand size is increased by 1. Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, you may search your stack for a card and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu] 你的手牌上限+1。 每当公司用一个议案计分时，你可以在你的存储栈搜寻一张卡牌并将其加入你的操控器。将你的存储栈重洗。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu Your maximum hand size is increased by 1. Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, you may search your stack for a card and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: 1[recurring-credit] Use this credit to play run events.
text_zhCN: 1[recurring-credit] 本信用点用于打出潜袭事件。
stripped_text: 1 recurring credit Use this credit to play run events.
flavor_enUS: Express loved libraries. The consoles were weak, but the security even weaker. He wirelessly loaded up his personal blend of code and started cloning the drive. In just a few minutes, another zombie would claw its way to the surface of cyberspace.
flavor_zhCN: 快车很喜欢图书馆。终端很烂，但防卫则更烂。他通过无线方式将自己的个人混合代码载入并开始复制驱动器。仅需要几分钟，又一台僵尸电脑将会出现在赛博空间边缘。

text_enUS: Use this hardware only if you have made a successful run on HQ this turn. [click][click]: Trash 1 rezzed bioroid, clone, executive, or sysop in the root of a remote server.
text_zhCN: 如果你本回合已对总部进行过成功的潜袭，才能使用未登记的.35 S&W手枪。 [click]，[click]：销毁一台服务器内一个已激活的生化人，克隆体，主管或管理员，无须支付其销毁费用。
stripped_text: Use this hardware only if you have made a successful run on HQ this turn. click click: Trash 1 rezzed bioroid, clone, executive, or sysop in the root of a remote server.

text_enUS: [click]: Draw 1 card from the bottom of your stack.
text_zhCN: [click]：从你的存储栈底端补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: click: Draw 1 card from the bottom of your stack.
flavor_enUS: The grass looked greener on the other side of the tear. But it always did, and there was always another tear.
flavor_zhCN: 裂口彼端的草更加翠绿。总是如此，也总会有另一个裂口。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength. This program cannot interface with ice protecting a remote server.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解 警报子进程。 2[credit]：强度+3。 化名不能对保护远程服务器的防火墙使用。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2 credits: +3 strength. This program cannot interface with ice protecting a remote server.
flavor_enUS: Appearances are easy to change in cyberspace, but a high-quality render is not easy to mimic.
flavor_zhCN: 在赛博空间里改变外貌很容易，但仿造一个高质量的渲染器就不那么容易了。

text_enUS: Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 3 barrier subroutines. 2[credit]: +4 strength. This program cannot interface with ice protecting a remote server.
text_zhCN: 2[credit]：破解最多3个屏障子进程。 2[credit]：强度+4。 裂口不能对保护远程服务器的防火墙使用。
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 3 barrier subroutines. 2 credits: +4 strength. This program cannot interface with ice protecting a remote server.

text_enUS:
Install only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn.
Whenever the Corp draws a card, you may pay 2[credit] to reveal that card.
text_zhCN:
如果你本回合已对总部进行过成功的潜袭，才能安装。
每当公司补一张卡牌时，你可以支付2[credit]，以展示该卡牌。
stripped_text: Install only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. Whenever the Corp draws a card, you may pay 2 credits to reveal that card.
flavor_enUS: The digital equivalent of a fly on the wall.
flavor_zhCN: 贴壁苍蝇的数码等价物。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 tracer subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解追踪者子进程。 2[credit]：强度+3。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 tracer subroutine. 2 credits: +3 strength.
flavor_enUS: Catch me if you can!
flavor_zhCN: 试试来抓我呀！

text_enUS: [trash]: Break all but 1 subroutine on a piece of ice.
text_zhCN: [trash]：破解一层防火墙上除一个子进程以外的其余所有子进程。
stripped_text: trash: Break all but 1 subroutine on a piece of ice.
flavor_enUS: If speed is of the essence, an indirect encounter with a piece of ice is usually best.
flavor_zhCN: 如果速度是精髓，那么一般情况下，最好是和防火墙进行间接的遭遇。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength. This program cannot interface with ice protecting a remote server.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解门禁子进程。 2[credit]：强度+2。 通行证不能对保护远程服务器的防火墙使用。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: +2 strength. This program cannot interface with ice protecting a remote server.
flavor_enUS: Nothing is secure when you have the right documentation.
flavor_zhCN: 只要你拥有合适的文件，没有什么是绝对安全的。

text_enUS: Secretly spend any number of credits. The Corp guesses if you spent an even or odd amount. Reveal spent credits. If the Corp guessed incorrectly, gain credits equal to twice the amount spent.
text_zhCN: 秘密花费任意数量的信用点。公司猜测你花费的数量为偶数或是奇数。展示所花费的信用点。如果公司猜测错误，获得所花费数量两倍的信用点。
stripped_text: Secretly spend any number of credits. The Corp guesses if you spent an even or odd amount. Reveal spent credits. If the Corp guessed incorrectly, gain credits equal to twice the amount spent.

text_enUS:
When your turn begins, you may choose a server.
The first time each turn you make a successful run on the chosen server, instead of breaching it, gain 2[credit].
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以选择一台服务器。本回合你第一次对所选择的服务器进行成功的潜袭时，获得2[credit]，代替侵入该服务器。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may choose a server. The first time each turn you make a successful run on the chosen server, instead of breaching it, gain 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: She was as good as Mr. Li said. The source machine had been compromised in under 24 hours. If a freelance operative could do that, the server clearly wasn't ready to endure Gagarin's legion of corp-owned runners.
flavor_zhCN: 她就像李先生所说的那么厉害。核心机器不到24小时就被攻破。如果一个自由职业者可以做到这样，那这个服务器显然没准备好对抗加加林军团的那些受雇于公司的潜袭者。

text_enUS:
When you install Theophilius Bagbiter, lose all credits in your credit pool.
Your maximum hand size is equal to the number of credits in your credit pool.
text_zhCN:
当你安装西奥菲勒·贝格拜特时，失去你信用池中所有的信用点。
你的手牌上限等于你信用池中信用点的数量。
stripped_text: When you install Theophilius Bagbiter, lose all credits in your credit pool. Your maximum hand size is equal to the number of credits in your credit pool.
flavor_enUS: "Why is a raven like a typing desk?"
flavor_zhCN: “乌鸦为什么像写字台？”

text_enUS: You cannot use this resource more than once per turn. [click]: Gain 2[credit]. When this resource is trashed, suffer 3 meat damage.
text_zhCN:
每回合你不能使用三和党联系人多于一次。
[click]：获得 2[credit]。
当三和党联系人被销毁时，受到3点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: You cannot use this resource more than once per turn. click: Gain 2[credit]. When this resource is trashed, suffer 3 meat damage.
flavor_enUS:
She slipped back onto her hopper. "I'm your family now, so don't twist me, dǒng ma?"
He flicked the e-cig away from his mouth, and nodded. What had he gotten himself into?
flavor_zhCN:
她跳回自己的飞跃车。“我现在算你的家人，所以不准惹我，懂吗？”
他吐掉嘴里的电子烟然后点头，他到底给自己找了个什么的麻烦啊？

text_enUS: Install up to 3 programs from your grip (paying the install costs).
text_zhCN: 从你的操控器安装最多三个程序（支付安装费用）。
stripped_text: Install up to 3 programs from your grip (paying the install costs).
flavor_enUS: "Welcome to the mass install wizard! This wizard will guide you through the process of installing a whole mess of programs onto your almost-certainly inadequate rig. When you're ready to continue, say-oops, too late, here we go!"
flavor_zhCN: “欢迎进入集群安装向导！本向导将指引您将一大堆程序安装到您那几乎肯定不够大的基地里。如果您准备好，请说—哎呀，太迟了，我们开始吧！”

text_enUS:
+1[mu]
When an installed program is trashed, trash this hardware.
text_zhCN:
+1[mu]
当一个程序被销毁时，销毁量子相干芯片。
<errata>勘误自FAQ 3.0.1</errata>
stripped_text: +1 mu When an installed program is trashed, trash this hardware.
flavor_enUS: One of the core problems of quantum computing is isolating the system from external factors to prevent decoherence. The Q-Coherence Chip is one, imperfect, solution.
flavor_zhCN: 量子计算的核心问题之一，是让系统能够隔绝外界参数，以避免退相干效应。量子相干芯片是一个，尚不完美的，解决方案。

text_enUS: When you install this program, place 1 power counter on it for each unused MU. (Place counters after this program's MU cost applies.) Interface → Hosted power counter: Break 1 subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 当主脑被安装时，每有一个未使用的内存单元，放置1枚能量指示物到主脑上。 所附载的能量指示物：破解防火墙子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 1 power counter on it for each unused MU. (Place counters after this program's MU cost applies.) Interface -> Hosted power counter: Break 1 subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.

text_enUS: You cannot use this resource more than once per turn. [click]: Choose a card type. Reveal the top card of your stack. If that card has the chosen type, draw it and gain 2[credit]. Otherwise, trash it.
text_zhCN:
每回合你不能使用梅先知多于一次。
[click]：指定一种卡牌类型。展示你存储栈顶端的一张卡牌。如果展示的卡牌是所指定的类型，则补该卡牌并获得2[credit]。否则，将其销毁。
stripped_text: You cannot use this resource more than once per turn. click: Choose a card type. Reveal the top card of your stack. If that card has the chosen type, draw it and gain 2[credit]. Otherwise, trash it.
flavor_enUS: "The best place to hide is in plain sight, don't you think?"
flavor_zhCN: “最适合藏身的地方就是在众目睽睽之下，你不觉得吗？”

text_enUS: The play cost of operations and events is increased by 1.
text_zhCN: 事务和事件的打出费用+1。
stripped_text: The play cost of operations and events is increased by 1.
flavor_enUS: You can find Donut in the park on Thursday afternoons, playing backgammon. You want his attention, the price is always the same: a cup of coffee and a donut. That buys you a seat at the backgammon table, and you have until he beats you to talk business and set the price.
flavor_zhCN: 每周四下午，你可以在公园里找到正在玩双陆棋的多奈特。你想引他注意的话，花费永远不变：一杯咖啡和一个甜甜圈。这会让你能坐在双陆棋桌边，然后你得在他杀败你之前谈妥生意和价码。

text_enUS:
[click],[click],[click]: Place 1 agenda counter on Domestic Sleepers.
Domestic Sleepers is worth 1 agenda point while it has at least 1 agenda counter on it.
text_zhCN:
[click]，[click]，[click]：放置1枚议案指示物到家政型潜伏特工上。
当家政型潜伏特工具有至少1枚议案指示物时，其价值1点议案分数。
stripped_text: click,click,click: Place 1 agenda counter on Domestic Sleepers. Domestic Sleepers is worth 1 agenda point while it has at least 1 agenda counter on it.

text_enUS: NEXT Silver gains "[subroutine] End the run." for each rezzed piece of NEXT ice.
stripped_text: NEXT Silver gains "Subroutine End the run." for each rezzed piece of NEXT ice.
flavor_enUS: The networking capabilities of the NEXT suite of ice are unparalleled.
flavor_zhCN: 次级系列防火墙的联网功能无与伦比。

text_enUS:
The strength of this ice cannot be lowered.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
本防火墙的强度不能被降低。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: The strength of this ice cannot be lowered. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: "Chi resonance mapping has created a whole new field of network security. It is unassailable perfection." -Akitaro Watanabe
flavor_zhCN: 气振映射开创了网络安全的全新领域。毋庸置疑的完美。” —渡边秋太郎

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, trash a rezzed piece of ice.
Reveal cards from the top of R&D until you reveal a piece of ice. Install and rez that ice in the same position as the ice that was trashed, ignoring all costs. Shuffle R&D.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，销毁一层已激活的防火墙。
展示研发中心顶端的卡牌，直到展示了一层防火墙。在被销毁防火墙的相同位置安装并激活该防火墙，忽略所有的费用。将研发中心重洗。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, trash a rezzed piece of ice. Reveal cards from the top of R&D until you reveal a piece of ice. Install and rez that ice in the same position as the ice that was trashed, ignoring all costs. Shuffle R&D.

text_enUS: The first time each turn you create a remote server, draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次建立一台远程服务器时，抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you create a remote server, draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS: Only the News You Need.
flavor_zhCN: 新闻唯您所需。

text_enUS:
3[recurring-credit]
Use these credits during traces.
text_zhCN:
3[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于追踪。
stripped_text: 3 recurring credits Use these credits during traces.
flavor_enUS: Works better than a PAD hooked up to a tinfoil umbrella and coffee can.
flavor_zhCN: 比起连在锡箔伞和咖啡罐上的电脑面板，它工作得更好。

text_enUS: During runs on this server, the Runner must pay 1[credit] as an additional cost to use an icebreaker ability to break subroutines. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 在对本服务器的潜袭中，每次潜袭者使用破解器来破解至少一个子进程时，他/她必须支付1[credit]作为额外的费用。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: During runs on this server, the Runner must pay 1 credit as an additional cost to use an icebreaker ability to break subroutines. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: Halfway upstalk, Midway is a destination unto itself with its microgravity hotels and fine dining options.
flavor_zhCN: 在上行半程，中途站凭借它的微重力酒店和美食之选而成为独立的目的地。

text_enUS:
3[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to advance, install, and rez cards.
text_zhCN:
3[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于推进，安装和激活卡牌。
stripped_text: 3 recurring credits Use these credits to advance, install, and rez cards.
flavor_enUS: They said it couldn't be built. That it was a fantasy. That Jack Weyland was a fool, and he had bought the fools in Washington too. But year after year the buckyweave grew, and 'they' stopped talking.
flavor_zhCN: 他们说它没法建成。说它是天方夜谭。说杰克·威兰是傻瓜，还买通了华盛顿的那些傻瓜。但巴克网材料年复一年地生长，而“他们”闭上了嘴巴。

text_enUS: [subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, trash 1 piece of hardware. If your trace strength is 5 or greater, trash 1 piece of hardware.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，销毁一个硬件。如果你的追踪强度等于或大于5，销毁一个硬件。
stripped_text: Subroutine Trace[2]. If successful, trash 1 piece of hardware. If your trace strength is 5 or greater, trash 1 piece of hardware.
flavor_enUS: Taurus promised strength, but gave only rage.
flavor_zhCN: 金牛座许以强力，却只能授予暴戾。

text_enUS:
Mother Goddess gains the subtypes of all other rezzed ice.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
母神获得其它所有已激活防火墙的子类型。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Mother Goddess gains the subtypes of all other rezzed ice. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: On the first day She breathed data into the void, and it hung suspended like jewelled stars. On the second day She spoke order into the data, and it flowed from rivulets into streams and from streams into mighty rivers. On the third day She gave independence to the order, and it ebbed and flowed according to its own accord. -The Cant of Helios
flavor_zhCN: 第一日她将数据吹入虚无，它有如群星闪耀漂浮。第二日她将秩序传给数据，它由溪成河汇为大江。第三日她将独立赐予秩序，它潮涨潮落自循其律。 —赫利俄斯之诗记

text_enUS: When the Runner encounters Galahad, you may reveal up to 2 grail ice from HQ. For the remainder of this run, Galahad gains the subroutines of the revealed ice in the order of your choice. [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: 当潜袭者遭遇加拉哈德时，你可以从总部展示最多两张圣杯防火墙。本次潜袭的剩余时间内，加拉哈德按你选择展示防火墙的顺序获得它们的子进程。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters Galahad, you may reveal up to 2 grail ice from HQ. For the remainder of this run, Galahad gains the subroutines of the revealed ice in the order of your choice. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: He who bears the shield of honor.
flavor_zhCN: 他即背负荣耀盾牌之士。

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
The Runner's memory limit is reduced by 2 until the end of the turn.
text_zhCN:
如果潜袭者被锁定，才能打出。
潜袭者的内存上限减2，直到本回合结束。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. The Runner's memory limit is reduced by 2 until the end of the turn.
flavor_enUS: Known as malware 0-394-41525-6 to sysops, runners just refer to it as "bad times."
flavor_zhCN: 管理员熟知的恶意软件0-394-41525-6，潜袭者通常惯称它为“难关”。

text_enUS:
Play only as your first [click].
Choose a server. The Corp may rez 1 piece of ice protecting that server. If they do not, run that server. The Corp cannot rez ice during that run.
text_zhCN:
仅能在你的第一个[click]打出。
选择一台服务器。公司可以激活一层保护该服务器的防火墙。如果他/她没有如此做，对该服务器进行一次潜袭，本次潜袭中公司不能激活防火墙。
stripped_text: Play only as your first click. Choose a server. The Corp may rez 1 piece of ice protecting that server. If they do not, run that server. The Corp cannot rez ice during that run.

text_enUS:
Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, the Corp loses 1[credit].
Trash Lamprey if the Corp purges virus counters.
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, the Corp loses 1 credit. Trash Lamprey if the Corp purges virus counters.

text_enUS:
Play only as your first [click].
Remove all tags.
text_zhCN:
仅能在你的第一个[click]打出。
移除所有的锁定标记。
stripped_text: Play only as your first click. Remove all tags.
flavor_enUS: His eyes were beginning to blur, as he duplicated the credentials for what seemed like the fiftieth time. Perhaps a genetic refit would have been easier.
flavor_zhCN: 他的眼睛开始模糊，因为这似乎是他第五十次抄写身份证明了。或许来个基因改造还要容易得多。

text_enUS: Gain 1[credit] whenever a trace is initiated.
text_zhCN: 每当一次追踪发起时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit whenever a trace is initiated.
flavor_enUS: "Public network kiosks, vending machines-there's all sorts of poorly-secured power sources in the city. Tap in to one of these and you've got plenty of juice when you need it. A little advance warning when the power grid starts misbehaving, too." -Gabriel Santiago
flavor_zhCN: “公司网络亭，自动售货机—城市里有各种各样防护薄弱的能源。当你需要时，接入其中一个就可以得到大量电力。当电网开始不对劲时还有些预警。” —加布里埃尔·圣地亚哥

title_zhCN: 纳西尔·梅丹：网络探险家
text_enUS: Whenever you encounter a piece of ice after an approach during which that ice was rezzed, lose all credits in your credit pool. Gain credits equal to the rez cost of that ice.
text_zhCN: 每当你遭遇一层刚激活的防火墙时，失去你信用池中所有的信用点。获得与该防火墙激活费用相等的信用点。
stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a piece of ice after an approach during which that ice was rezzed, lose all credits in your credit pool. Gain credits equal to the rez cost of that ice.

text_enUS:
Play only as your first [click].
Choose an unrezzed piece of ice. If the Corp rezzes that piece of ice this turn, gain credits equal to its rez cost.
text_zhCN:
仅能在你的第一个[click]打出。
选择一层未激活的防火墙。如果公司本回合激活该防火墙，获得与该防火墙激活费用相等的信用点。
stripped_text: Play only as your first click. Choose an unrezzed piece of ice. If the Corp rezzes that piece of ice this turn, gain credits equal to its rez cost.

text_enUS: Leprechaun can host up to 2 programs. The memory costs of hosted programs do not count against your memory limit.
text_zhCN:
小矮妖能被附载最多两个程序。
所附载的程序的内存费用不计算在你的内存上限中。
stripped_text: Leprechaun can host up to 2 programs. The memory costs of hosted programs do not count against your memory limit.
flavor_enUS: "I once saw someone running a seven-tier nested daemon tree. Not for any good reason, just to see if he could. Well, of course the root daemon crashed and he lost everything. I wonder what he's up to now?" -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
flavor_zhCN: “我曾见过有人运行七层嵌套的后台树。他不为别的，就是想看看自己能否做到。嗯，当然，根后台崩溃了，然后他失去了一切。我想知道他现在在做什么？” —凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞

text_enUS: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, instead of breaching R&D, you may install this resource from your grip, ignoring all costs. [trash]: The Corp draws 2 cards. Limit 1 per deck.
text_zhCN:
每当你对研发中心进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以从你的操控器安装伊甸园碎片，忽略所有的费用，代替读取卡牌。
[trash]：公司补两张卡牌。
每套牌组限制1张。
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, instead of breaching R&D, you may install this resource from your grip, ignoring all costs. trash: The Corp draws 2 cards. Limit 1 per deck.

text_enUS: The first time you rez a piece of ice each turn, you may search R&D for another copy of that ice, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次激活一层防火墙时，你可以在研发中心搜寻另一张相同的防火墙，将其展示，并加入总部。将研发中心重洗。
stripped_text: The first time you rez a piece of ice each turn, you may search R&D for another copy of that ice, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.

text_enUS: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. As an additional cost to take the basic action to run a server for the first time each turn, the Runner must spend [click].
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 作为在他/她的回合第一次未通过卡牌能力进行潜袭的额外费用，潜袭者必须花费[click]。
stripped_text: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. As an additional cost to take the basic action to run a server for the first time each turn, the Runner must spend click.

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner loses or spends [click] during a run on this server, they lose all credits in their credit pool. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 在对本服务器的潜袭中，如果潜袭者失去或花费过一个时点，他/她失去其信用池中所有的信用点。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner loses or spends click during a run on this server, they lose all credits in their credit pool. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: "There are many advantages to having facilities on the moon. Less traffic, for example." -Director Hass
flavor_zhCN: “把设施放在月球上有许多优点。比如说，更紧缺的网络流量。” —总裁哈斯

text_enUS: All code gate ice have +1 strength. When you score Encrypted Portals, gain 1[credit] for each rezzed code gate.
text_zhCN: 所有门禁防火墙的强度+1。 当你用加密门户计分时，每有一个已激活的门禁，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: All code gate ice have +1 strength. When you score Encrypted Portals, gain 1 credit for each rezzed code gate.
flavor_enUS: "Binary computing is obsolete. I use a base-4 structure for this system; it's modeled on our DNA. Well, my DNA, anyway." -Doctor Endo, Jinteki researcher
flavor_zhCN: “二进制运算已经被淘汰。我在这个系统中使用了基-4的结构。它由我们的DNA建模而成。好吧，是我的DNA。” —远藤博士，人间会社研究员

text_enUS: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The Runner's identity loses its printed abilities.
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 潜袭者的特性规则文字成为空白。
stripped_text: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The Runner's identity loses its printed abilities.
flavor_enUS: Her eyes were the color of a vidscreen, tuned to a dead channel.
flavor_zhCN: 她双眼的颜色就像是调不到台的屏幕。

text_enUS: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. Name a card. Gain 10[credit] whenever the Runner plays or installs a copy of that card.
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 指定一张卡牌的名称。每当潜袭者打出或安装与该卡牌相同的卡牌时，获得10[credit]。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. Name a card. Gain 10 credits whenever the Runner plays or installs a copy of that card.

text_enUS:
When the Runner encounters this ice, Trace[1]. If successful, give them 1 tag.
This ice gains "[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards." for each tag the Runner has.
text_zhCN:
当潜袭者遭遇信息超载时，<trace>追踪 1</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
潜袭者每有1枚锁定标记，信息超载获得“[subroutine] 潜袭者销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。”
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, Trace[1]. If successful, give them 1 tag. This ice gains "Subroutine The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards." for each tag the Runner has.
flavor_enUS: Throw enough data at a runner and it ceases to have any meaning at all.
flavor_zhCN: 把足够多的数据投向潜袭者，它就不再有丝毫的意义。

text_enUS: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. Gain 1[credit] whenever the Runner makes a successful run.
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 每当潜袭者进行一次成功的潜袭时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. Gain 1 credit whenever the Runner makes a successful run.

text_enUS: 1[credit]: Move any number of credits from your credit pool to this asset. [click]: Take any number of credits from this asset. [trash]: Take any number of credits from this asset.
text_zhCN:
1[credit]：从你的信用池中转移任意数量的信用点到密封的金库上。
[click]或[trash]：从密封的金库上转移任意数量的信用点到你的信用池中。
stripped_text: 1 credit: Move any number of credits from your credit pool to this asset. click: Take any number of credits from this asset. trash: Take any number of credits from this asset.
flavor_enUS: Nothing is impenetrable. The key is to make breaking into it more costly than what it's worth.
flavor_zhCN: 没有什么是不可闯过的。关键在于让闯进来的代价比本身的价值更高。

text_enUS:
Ignore the install cost of the first piece of ice you install each turn.
Limit 1 per deck.
text_zhCN:
忽略每回合你安装的第一层防火墙的安装费用。
每套牌组限制1张。
stripped_text: Ignore the install cost of the first piece of ice you install each turn. Limit 1 per deck.

text_enUS: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. All ice have +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 所有防火墙的强度+1。
stripped_text: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. All ice have +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: "I don't care how good your console is, or how tricked out your rig is. The lag time on a run on the moon from earthside can be a killer." -Leela Patel
flavor_zhCN: “我不关心你的控制台有多好，或者你的设备有多华丽。光是从月球近地面发起潜袭时的延迟时间就够伤脑筋了。” —莉拉·帕特尔

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, you may trash this upgrade. If you do, choose 1 installed icebreaker that was used to break at least 1 subroutine during this run. The Runner adds that icebreaker to the bottom of the stack.
text_zhCN: 每当本服务器进行了成功的潜袭时，你可以销毁鬼火。如果你如此做，选择一个在本次潜袭中被使用来破解至少一个子进程的破解器。潜袭者将该破解器加入他/她的存储栈底端。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, you may trash this upgrade. If you do, choose 1 installed icebreaker that was used to break at least 1 subroutine during this run. The Runner adds that icebreaker to the bottom of the stack.

text_enUS: Place 3 power counters on D4v1d when it is installed. Hosted power counter: Break ice subroutine on a piece of ice that has a strength of 5 or greater.
text_zhCN: 当大5A被安装时，放置3枚能量指示物到本卡牌上。 所附载的能量指示物：破解强度等于或大于5的防火墙子进程。
stripped_text: Place 3 power counters on D4v1d when it is installed. Hosted power counter: Break ice subroutine on a piece of ice that has a strength of 5 or greater.
flavor_enUS: Sometimes a single stone is enough.
flavor_zhCN: 有时单单一粒石子便足够。

text_enUS: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The first piece of ice encountered each turn has -2 strength for the remainder of the run.
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 每回合遭遇的第一层防火墙在本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度减2。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The first piece of ice encountered each turn has -2 strength for the remainder of the run.

text_enUS:
Play only as your first [click].
When this turn ends, gain 2[credit] for each successful run you made during it.
text_zhCN:
仅能在你的第一个[click]打出。
当本回合结束时，本回合中你每进行过一次成功的潜袭，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Play only as your first click. When this turn ends, gain 2 credits for each successful run you made during it.
flavor_enUS: In this business, you had to anticipate. If you weren't three steps ahead, you were three steps behind.
flavor_zhCN: 在这一行，你需要抢先。如果你没有领先三步的话，你就已经落后三步了。

text_enUS: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The Corp cannot install more than 1 piece of ice each turn.
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 每回合公司不能安装多于一层防火墙。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The Corp cannot install more than 1 piece of ice each turn.
flavor_enUS: What goes up must always go down.
flavor_zhCN: 有升必有降。

text_enUS: Place 3 virus counters on Cache when it is installed. Hosted virus counter: Gain 1[credit].
stripped_text: Place 3 virus counters on Cache when it is installed. Hosted virus counter: Gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: "People keep saying that 'Cash is king' in the business, like it's untraceable in the days of DNA sniffers and microtracers. Digital credits can be just as anonymous, and they're just as easy to counterfeit." -Silhouette
flavor_zhCN: “商海中，人们一直说'现金为王'，就好像在这个充满DNA嗅探器和微型追踪器的时代里它无迹可寻似的。数码信用点可被看作是匿名的，由此能轻易伪造出来。” —侧影

text_enUS: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. 1[recurring-credit] Use this credit during a run.
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 1[recurring-credit] 本信用点用于潜袭中。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. 1 recurring credit Use this credit during a run.
flavor_enUS: Fifteen seconds of fame.
flavor_zhCN: 十五秒的名望。

text_enUS: [interrupt] → 3[credit] or [trash]: Prevent a player from trashing 1 installed piece of hardware.
text_zhCN: 3[credit]或[trash]：防止一个已安装的硬件被销毁。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> 3[credit] or trash: Prevent a player from trashing 1 installed piece of hardware.
flavor_enUS: Originally not very popular, the regulator was overlooked by those who used energy sinks to protect their rig. But it quickly found an audience once Smoke casted a run on a Blue Sun server, using it to keep her rig online while repeatedly diverting energy spikes in excess of 50,000 volts.
flavor_zhCN: 该调节器起初并不流行，被那些运用能阱来保护基地的人们所忽视。但自从浓烟向青日公司的服务器发起一场潜袭，期间利用它在50000伏的电压下不断转移能量冲击使她的基地依然保持在线，它很快赢得了用户群。

text_enUS:
Place 3[credit] on Ghost Runner when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Ghost Runner, trash it.
You can use the credits on Ghost Runner during a run.
text_zhCN:
当潜袭者幽灵被安装时，放置3[credit]到本卡牌上。当潜袭者幽灵上没有信用点时，销毁本卡牌。
你能在潜袭中使用潜袭者幽灵上的信用点。
stripped_text: Place 3 credits on Ghost Runner when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Ghost Runner, trash it. You can use the credits on Ghost Runner during a run.
flavor_enUS: In the spaces between the data, do trapped souls from the past persist?
flavor_zhCN: 在数据间隙里，是否留存着过往的受困灵魂？

text_enUS:
The rez cost of IQ is increased by 1 for each card in HQ.
IQ has +1 strength for each card in HQ.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
总部中每有一张卡牌，智商的激活费用+1。
总部中每有一张卡牌，智商的强度+1。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: The rez cost of IQ is increased by 1 for each card in HQ. IQ has +1 strength for each card in HQ. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Created by merging the brainscans of over a hundred of the most intelligent people in Haas-Bioroid's cerebral database, its effectiveness is limited either by its lack of imagination or the imagination of the sysops who employ it.
flavor_zhCN: 创生于哈斯生化脑数据库里数以百计最智慧人类的脑扫描图之融合，它的威力只受限于自身想象力不足，或者是使用它的管理员的想象力不足。

text_enUS: [click],[click],[click]: Rez a card, ignoring all costs.
text_zhCN: [click]，[click]，[click]：激活一张卡牌，忽略所有的费用。
stripped_text: click,click,click: Rez a card, ignoring all costs.
flavor_enUS: Eliza's Toybox is the preeminent purveyor of high-class debauchery on the moon, courtesy of its bioroid pleasure models and other exotica. Every fantasy has its price.
flavor_zhCN: 伊莱莎的寻欢所是月球上顶级酒色的主要提供商，这归功于它的寻欢生化人模型和其他新奇的玩意。美梦皆有价位。

text_enUS: [subroutine] You may choose 1 card in HQ. If you do, the Runner breaches HQ. During this breach, the Runner cannot access cards in the root of HQ, and the first card they access must be the chosen card. When the breach ends, trash this ice.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 公司可以选择总部中的一张卡牌。潜袭者读取该卡牌。如果他/她如此做，销毁狐女。
stripped_text: Subroutine You may choose 1 card in HQ. If you do, the Runner breaches HQ. During this breach, the Runner cannot access cards in the root of HQ, and the first card they access must be the chosen card. When the breach ends, trash this ice.
flavor_enUS: There are those who believe the nine-tailed fox is an angel in disguise. And then there are those who have followed, and discovered her secret...
flavor_zhCN: 有人相信九尾狐是天使的化身。于是有人随之而去，发现了她的秘密…

text_enUS: As an additional cost to jack out during a run on this server, the Runner must trash 1 installed program. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 当对本服务器潜袭时潜袭者不能退出，除非他/她销毁一个已安装的程序。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to jack out during a run on this server, the Runner must trash 1 installed program. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: The port was first built as a remote location to unload and offload dangerous felons.
flavor_zhCN: 该港最初的建造目的，是作为一个倾卸危险重罪犯的边远地区。

text_enUS: The Runner cannot play current events.
text_zhCN: 潜袭者不能打出局势事件。
stripped_text: The Runner cannot play current events.
flavor_enUS: "There are reports of a terrorist threat at Starport Kaguya. The NAPD is offering a reward for anyone who can provide them with information about the current whereabouts of the individual pictured here. He is considered extremely dangerous and is armed with a PAD and a portable rig."
flavor_zhCN: 有报道称星际港辉夜存在恐怖分子威胁。任何提供图中人士目前下落信息者，新洛杉矶警察局将给予奖赏。该嫌疑犯被认为是极度危险的，现持有一台掌上面板和便携式设备。

text_enUS: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The first time the Runner makes a successful run each turn, Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 每回合潜袭者第一次进行成功的潜袭时，追踪 2 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The first time the Runner makes a successful run each turn, Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

text_enUS: Wendigo can be advanced. While Wendigo has an odd number of advancement tokens on it, it gains barrier and loses code gate. [subroutine] Choose a program. The Runner cannot use the chosen program for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: 温迪戈能被推进。 当温迪戈具有奇数数量的推进标记时，其获得屏障并失去门禁。 [subroutine] 选择一个程序。本次潜袭的剩余时间内潜袭者不能使用所选择的程序。
stripped_text: Wendigo can be advanced. While Wendigo has an odd number of advancement tokens on it, it gains barrier and loses code gate. Subroutine Choose a program. The Runner cannot use the chosen program for the remainder of this run.

text_enUS: Runs against this server cannot be declared successful. (This effect does not cause runs to become unsuccessful.) Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 对本服务器的潜袭不能宣告为成功。（本效果不会导致潜袭被视为失败。） 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Runs against this server cannot be declared successful. (This effect does not cause runs to become unsuccessful.) Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: Mars would never have been colonized if not for the Gagarin facilities at Promontorium Agarum.
flavor_zhCN: 要是没有位于阿格鲁姆海角的加加林设施，火星就永远不会被殖民。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, the Runner removes all cards in the heap from the game.
text_zhCN: 当你用柯罗诺斯计划计分时，潜袭者将他/她堆阵中的所有卡牌移出游戏。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, the Runner removes all cards in the heap from the game.
flavor_enUS: The irony is that those who'd want to destroy certain memories can't afford to do so, and those who can afford it-well, they're too busy sipping on dreamwine.
flavor_zhCN: 讽刺地说，那些想要消除某种记忆的人们付不起费用，而那些付得起的—好吧，他们忙于啜饮梦醑。

text_enUS:
Shattered Remains can be advanced.
If you pay 1[credit] when the Runner accesses Shattered Remains, trash 1 piece of hardware for each advancement token on Shattered Remains.
text_zhCN:
破碎残骸能被推进。
当潜袭者读取破碎残骸时，如果你支付1[credit]，破碎残骸上每有1枚推进标记，销毁一个硬件。
stripped_text: Shattered Remains can be advanced. If you pay 1 credit when the Runner accesses Shattered Remains, trash 1 piece of hardware for each advancement token on Shattered Remains.

text_enUS: When the Runner encounters Lancelot, you may reveal up to 2 grail ice from HQ. For the remainder of this run, Lancelot gains the subroutines of the revealed ice in the order of your choice. [subroutine] Trash 1 program.
text_zhCN: 当潜袭者遭遇兰斯洛特时，你可以从总部展示最多两张圣杯防火墙。本次潜袭的剩余时间内，兰斯洛特按你选择展示防火墙的顺序获得它们的子进程。 [subroutine] 销毁一个程序。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters Lancelot, you may reveal up to 2 grail ice from HQ. For the remainder of this run, Lancelot gains the subroutines of the revealed ice in the order of your choice. Subroutine Trash 1 program.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 圣杯 - 毁灭者
flavor_enUS: He who wields the sword of valor.
flavor_zhCN: 他即挥舞英勇利剑之士。

text_enUS: Once per turn → 0[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine.
text_zhCN: 0[credit]：破解1条屏障子进程。本能力每回合仅限使用一次。
stripped_text: Once per turn -> 0[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine.
flavor_enUS: "Why should we be slaves to our genetic heritage?"
flavor_zhCN: “我们为何要做自己基因遗传的奴隶？”

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. If you spent a credit from a stealth card to use this ability, instead break up to 3 barrier subroutines. 2[credit]: +1 strength. If you spent at least 1 credit from a stealth card to use this ability, instead +2 strength.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解1个屏障子进程（或如果你花费隐匿卡牌上的信用点，则破解最多3个子进程）。 2[credit]：强度+1（或如果你花费隐匿卡牌上的至少1信用点，则强度+2）。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. If you spent a credit from a stealth card to use this ability, instead break up to 3 barrier subroutines. 2 credits: +1 strength. If you spent at least 1 credit from a stealth card to use this ability, instead +2 strength.
flavor_enUS: Bad luck for any sysop blind enough to cross its path.
flavor_zhCN: 所有过于轻率以致碰见它的管理员都倒大霉了。

text_enUS: [click],[click],[click],[click]: Draw 10 cards.
text_zhCN: [click]，[click]，[click]，[click]：补十张卡牌。
stripped_text: click,click,click,click: Draw 10 cards.
flavor_enUS: Carved directly out of the lunar rock, Duggar's is a popular spot among blue-collar loonies and slumming risties. A place where you could find what you're looking for-if you knew who to look for, and didn't get distracted by the energetic dancers.
flavor_zhCN: 直接从月岩凿刻出来的道阁酒吧，是个广受蓝领贫民及游访贵族欢迎的地点。一个你能找到自己追寻之物的场所—假如你知道要找谁，且不为精力旺盛的舞者们分了心去。

text_enUS: +2[mu] Your maximum hand size is increased by 2. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +2[mu] 你的手牌上限+2。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +2 mu Your maximum hand size is increased by 2. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS:
[click]: Host a resource or piece of hardware from your grip on The Supplier.
When your turn begins, you may install a hosted card, lowering the install cost by 2.
text_zhCN:
[click]：从你的操控器附载一个资源或硬件到供应商上。
当你的回合开始时，你可以安装一张所附载的卡牌，其安装费用减2。
stripped_text: click: Host a resource or piece of hardware from your grip on The Supplier. When your turn begins, you may install a hosted card, lowering the install cost by 2.
flavor_enUS: "I can get you anything, and guarantee the best prices in town."
flavor_zhCN: “我可以给你弄到任何东西，并保证是城内最优价。”

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +3 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解门禁子进程。 1[credit]：强度+3。仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的信用点来使用本能力。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1 credit: +3 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.
flavor_enUS: "If you look like you belong, people will ignore you for hours. Or years. It's only when you don't fit in that things start to go wrong." -Exile
flavor_zhCN: “如果你看起来人如其表，人们就会几个时辰或是几年都不会注意你。只有当你显得格格不入时，事情才开始变得不同。” —流亡者

text_enUS: The first time you have no credits in your credit pool each turn, gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每回合你的信用池中第一次没有信用点时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: The first time you have no credits in your credit pool each turn, gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: There have been several attempts to create a "world church," uniting all human faiths into a single, harmonious whole. The irony, of course, is that each new "world church" is another schism in humanity's shared religious experience.
flavor_zhCN: 曾经有过好几次建立“普世教会”的尝试，要将全人类的信仰同和为单一、和谐的整体。当然，讽刺之处在于每个新的“普世教会”又都是全人类共享的宗教体验中的又一次分裂。

text_enUS: Whenever you make a successful run on Archives, instead of breaching Archives, you may install this resource from your grip, ignoring all costs. [trash]: Breach Archives. You cannot access cards in the root of Archives during this breach. Limit 1 per deck.
text_zhCN:
每当你对档案库进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以从你的操控器安装冥府碎片，忽略所有的费用，代替读取卡牌。
[trash]：读取档案库中的所有卡牌。
每套牌组限制1张。
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on Archives, instead of breaching Archives, you may install this resource from your grip, ignoring all costs. trash: Breach Archives. You cannot access cards in the root of Archives during this breach. Limit 1 per deck.

text_enUS:
You get +1 allotted [click] for each of your turns.
If you are tagged, trash this resource.
text_zhCN:
你在你的回合有一个额外的[click]用来花费。
如果你被锁定，销毁瑞秋·贝克曼。
<errata>勘误自FAQ 3.1</errata>
stripped_text: You get +1 allotted click for each of your turns. If you are tagged, trash this resource.
flavor_enUS:
"This is Rachel Beckman. She's in the business of keeping people alive."
Rachel smiled. "Only when I'm not in the business of killing them."
flavor_zhCN:
“这位是瑞秋·贝克曼。她的职责是保住人们的性命。”
瑞秋笑了。“仅当我的职责不是杀了他们的时候。”

text_enUS:
Players cannot trash this ice.
[subroutine] Look at the top 5 cards of R&D. You may install 1 of those cards, ignoring the install cost.
[subroutine] You may install 1 card from Archives or HQ.
text_zhCN:
当建筑师已安装时，其不能被销毁。
[subroutine] 公司查看研发中心顶端的五张卡牌并可以安装其中一张卡牌，忽略所有的安装费用。
[subroutine] 公司可以从档案库或总部安装一张卡牌（支付所有的费用）。
stripped_text: Players cannot trash this ice. Subroutine Look at the top 5 cards of R&D. You may install 1 of those cards, ignoring the install cost. Subroutine You may install 1 card from Archives or HQ.
flavor_zhCN: 由2012年世冠赛冠军Jeremy Zwirn设计
attribution: Designed by 2012 World Champion Jeremy Zwirn

text_enUS: Gain 1[credit] for each rezzed piece of ice.
text_zhCN: 每有一层已激活的防火墙，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit for each rezzed piece of ice.
flavor_enUS: "Servers fully-armed and operational."
flavor_zhCN: “服务器全副武装且运转正常。”

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, place 2 power counters on it. [interrupt] → Hosted power counter: Prevent the Runner from jacking out. The Runner cannot jack out for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: 当你用服务器迷阵计分时，放置2枚能量指示物到本卡牌上。 所附载的能量指示物：防止潜袭者退出。本次潜袭的剩余时间内潜袭者不能退出。
