stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 2 power counters on it. Interrupt -> Hosted power counter: Prevent the Runner from jacking out. The Runner cannot jack out for the remainder of this run.

text_enUS: Ashigaru gains "[subroutine] End the run." for each card in HQ.
text_zhCN: 总部中每有一张卡牌，足轻获得“[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。”
stripped_text: Ashigaru gains "Subroutine End the run." for each card in HQ.
flavor_enUS: The way past is to go a different way.
flavor_zhCN: 通过的路子是换一条路走。

text_enUS: Hosted power counter: Do 1 net damage. Use this ability only during a run. [subroutine] Do 1 net damage. [subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, place 1 power counter on Mamba.
text_zhCN: 所附载的能量指示物：造成1点网域伤害。仅能在一次潜袭中使用本能力。 [subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。 [subroutine] 你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，放置1枚能量指示物到曼巴蛇上。
stripped_text: Hosted power counter: Do 1 net damage. Use this ability only during a run. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. Subroutine You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, place 1 power counter on Mamba.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 灵能 - 杀伤

text_enUS: You can advance this asset. [click], [trash]: The Runner loses 4[credit] for each hosted advancement counter.
text_zhCN: 你可以推进本资产。 [click]，[trash]：每有1枚所附载的推进指示物，潜袭者失去4[credit]。
stripped_text: You can advance this asset. click, trash: The Runner loses 4 credits for each hosted advancement counter.
flavor_enUS: Making a name for yourself has its perks. But it also makes you a target.
flavor_zhCN: 成名有它的好处。但是枪打出头鸟。

text_enUS: [subroutine] If the Runner is not tagged, they lose 1[credit]. If the Runner is tagged, they lose all credits in their credit pool and you trash this ice.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 潜袭者失去1[credit]，除非潜袭者被锁定。如果潜袭者被锁定，他/她失去其信用池中所有的信用点，并且公司销毁通用连接费。
stripped_text: Subroutine If the Runner is not tagged, they lose 1 credit. If the Runner is tagged, they lose all credits in their credit pool and you trash this ice.
flavor_enUS: "It's a small one-time fee, apparently. Only I've paid it seventeen times."
flavor_zhCN: “看起来，这是比小小的一次性费用。但是我已支付了十七回。”

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may add 1 rezzed card to HQ and gain credits equal to its rez cost.
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may add 1 rezzed card to HQ and gain credits equal to its rez cost.
flavor_enUS: Unlimited Energy. Reasonable Prices.
flavor_zhCN: 能源无限，价格公道。

text_enUS: Changeling can be advanced. While Changeling has an odd number of advancement tokens on it, it gains sentry and loses barrier. [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: 换生灵能被推进。 当换生灵具有奇数数量的推进标记时，其获得警报并失去屏障。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Changeling can be advanced. While Changeling has an odd number of advancement tokens on it, it gains sentry and loses barrier. Subroutine End the run.

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Trash any number of cards from HQ. Gain 2[credit] for each card trashed.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
从总部销毁任意数量的卡牌。每销毁一张卡牌，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Trash any number of cards from HQ. Gain 2 credits for each card trashed.
flavor_enUS: If the clones were nervous about living in a repurposed fuel tank, they never mentioned it.
flavor_zhCN: 如果说克隆体们担心会活在特制的油箱里，那么他们绝口不提。

text_enUS:
When your turn begins, you may add 1 card from Archives to the bottom of R&D.
Limit 1 per deck.
text_zhCN:
当你的回合开始时，你可以从档案库将一张卡牌加入研发中心底端。
每套牌组限制1张。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may add 1 card from Archives to the bottom of R&D. Limit 1 per deck.

text_enUS:
[click], [click]: Place 1 power counter on Docklands Crackdown.
The install cost of the first card the Runner installs each turn is increased by 1 for each power counter on Docklands Crackdown.
text_zhCN:
[click]，[click]：放置1枚能量指示物到镇压码头区上。
镇压码头区上每有1枚能量指示物，潜袭者每回合安装的第一张卡牌的安装费用+1。
stripped_text: click, click: Place 1 power counter on Docklands Crackdown. The install cost of the first card the Runner installs each turn is increased by 1 for each power counter on Docklands Crackdown.

text_enUS: Reveal the top 4 cards of your stack and trash all programs revealed. Gain 1[credit] for each program trashed, and add the rest of the revealed cards to your grip.
text_zhCN: 展示你存储栈顶端的四张卡牌并销毁所有展示的程序。每有一个程序被销毁，获得1[credit]，并将余下所展示的卡牌加入你的操控器。
stripped_text: Reveal the top 4 cards of your stack and trash all programs revealed. Gain 1 credit for each program trashed, and add the rest of the revealed cards to your grip.
flavor_enUS: "Knowledge comes in many different shapes and sizes." -Quetzal
flavor_zhCN: “知识是各色各样的。” —绿咬鹊

text_enUS: Your maximum hand size is increased by 1 for each copy of Origami installed.
text_zhCN: 每有一张已安装的折纸，你的手牌上限+1。
stripped_text: Your maximum hand size is increased by 1 for each copy of Origami installed.
flavor_enUS: The earliest instances of data folding were inspired by the traditional art of origami. Just as a crease pattern is the blueprint of a paper crane, there is a sequence to data that must be considered in order to achieve the greatest result.
flavor_zhCN: 数据折叠的最早实例受到折纸这门传统艺术的启发。就好比折痕展开图在折纸鹤时会作为模版一样，对数据也要仔细考虑前后序列才能达到最好的效果。

text_enUS: Whenever the Corp purges virus counters, if the Corp has at least 2[credit], they lose 2[credit].
text_zhCN: 每当公司清除病毒指示物时，如可能，他/她失去2[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever the Corp purges virus counters, if the Corp has at least 2 credits, they lose 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: "You should have known better than to scratch it…" -Quetzal
flavor_zhCN: “你早知道就不会去抓挠它了…” —绿咬鹊

text_enUS:
The first time you install a program from your grip during your turn, gain [click].
Trash Autoscripter if you make an unsuccessful run.
text_zhCN:
在你的回合中，你第一次从你的操控器安装一个程序时，获得[click]。
如果你进行了失败的潜袭，销毁自动脚本仪。
stripped_text: The first time you install a program from your grip during your turn, gain click. Trash Autoscripter if you make an unsuccessful run.
flavor_enUS: It practically runs itself, unless you're in a pinch.
flavor_zhCN: 它总是自主运行，除非你身处困境。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break any number of sentry subroutines. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card. 1[credit]: +7 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解任意数量的警报子进程。仅能花费隐匿 卡牌上的信用点来使用本能力。 1[credit]：强度+7。仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的信用点来使用本能力。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break any number of sentry subroutines. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card. 1 credit: +7 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.
flavor_enUS: Small. Compact. Easy to slip by monitoring programs and it can do some damage.
flavor_zhCN: 细小。轻巧。瞒得过监控程序并能造成些许破坏。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, trash an installed piece of hardware.
Gain credits equal to half the install cost of the trashed hardware (rounded down) and search your stack for a piece of hardware, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，销毁一个已安装的硬件。
获得等于销毁硬件安装费用一半数量（向下取整）的信用点，并在你的存储栈搜寻一个硬件，将其展示，并加入你的操控器。将你的存储栈重洗。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, trash an installed piece of hardware. Gain credits equal to half the install cost of the trashed hardware (rounded down) and search your stack for a piece of hardware, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.

text_enUS: +1[mu] Draw 1 card whenever the Corp creates a server. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu] 每当公司建立一台服务器时，补一张卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu Draw 1 card whenever the Corp creates a server. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS: "There is no better tool for charting the empty spaces of the net." -Nasir Meidan
flavor_zhCN: “测绘空白的网域空间，没有比这更好的工具了。” —纳西尔·梅丹

text_enUS: Place X power counters on Angel Arena when it is installed. When there are no power counters left on Angel Arena, trash it. Hosted power counter: Reveal the top card of your stack. You may add that card to the bottom of your stack.
text_zhCN: 当天使竞技场被安装时，放置X枚能量指示物到本卡牌上。当天使竞技场上没有能量指示物时，销毁本卡牌。 所附载的能量指示物：展示你存储栈顶端的一张卡牌。你可以将该卡牌加入你的存储栈底端。
stripped_text: Place X power counters on Angel Arena when it is installed. When there are no power counters left on Angel Arena, trash it. Hosted power counter: Reveal the top card of your stack. You may add that card to the bottom of your stack.
flavor_enUS: "Low gravity sports are wildly popular, so match-fixing has proven wildly profitable." -Leela Patel
flavor_zhCN: “低重力体育运动广受欢迎，因而操控赛果已被证实非常有赚头。” —莉拉·帕特尔

text_enUS: When you score Bifrost Array, you may trigger the "when scored" ability of another agenda that is not a copy of Bifrost Array in your score area.
text_zhCN: 当你用彩虹桥阵列计分时，你可以触发你分数区中另一个除彩虹桥阵列以外的议案的“计分时”能力。
stripped_text: When you score Bifrost Array, you may trigger the "when scored" ability of another agenda that is not a copy of Bifrost Array in your score area.
flavor_enUS: "'What does it do?' Whatever I bloody want it to do." -Director Haas
flavor_zhCN: “‘它能做什么？’任何我想得要命让它去做的。” —总裁哈斯

text_enUS: [subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, trash 1 program. If your trace strength is 5 or greater, trash 1 program.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，销毁一个程序。如果你的追踪强度等于或大于5，销毁一个程序。
stripped_text: Subroutine Trace[2]. If successful, trash 1 program. If your trace strength is 5 or greater, trash 1 program.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 追踪者 - 毁灭者
flavor_enUS: Sagittarius promised foresight, but brought only regret.
flavor_zhCN: 人马座许以远见，却只能招致悔念。

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner trashes a Corp card (including Hostile Infrastructure), do 1 net damage.
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner trashes a Corp card (including Hostile Infrastructure), do 1 net damage.
flavor_enUS: "If thou only knowest what it is to conquer, and knowest not what it is to be defeated; woe unto thee…" -Tokugawa Ieyasu
flavor_zhCN: “只知胜而不知败，必害其身…” —德川家康

text_enUS: [subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, do 1 net damage. If your trace strength is 5 or greater, do 1 net damage.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，造成1点网域伤害。如果你的追踪强度等于或大于5，造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: Subroutine Trace[2]. If successful, do 1 net damage. If your trace strength is 5 or greater, do 1 net damage.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 追踪者 - 杀伤
flavor_enUS: Gemini promised pleasure, but dealt only pain.
flavor_zhCN: 双子座许以满足，却只能施加痛楚。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, you may install and rez 1 asset or upgrade from HQ or Archives, ignoring all costs.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，你可以展示1个总部或档案库内的资产或升级。安装并激活该卡牌，忽略所有的费用。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, you may install and rez 1 asset or upgrade from HQ or Archives, ignoring all costs.
flavor_enUS: "We've received seventeen crates from ChiLo. We'll hit stores the same day we sign the license agreement."
flavor_zhCN: “我们已经收到了来自芝路易斯的十七箱货物。我们将在签好许可协议的当天在商店售卖。”

text_enUS: [interrupt] → The first time each turn you would draw any number of cards, increase the number of cards you will draw by 1. When you draw those cards, add 1 of them to the bottom of R&D.
text_zhCN: [interrupt] → 每回合你第一次将要抽任意数量的卡牌时，抽牌数量增加1张。当你抽这些卡牌时，将其中1张加入研发中心底端。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> The first time each turn you would draw any number of cards, increase the number of cards you will draw by 1. When you draw those cards, add 1 of them to the bottom of R&D.
flavor_enUS: "A new investment deal every morning! Grab the bull by the horns and take control of your future!"
flavor_zhCN: “每天一早都会有全新的投资交易！瞄准关键并掌控你的未来！”

text_enUS: All barrier ice have +1 strength. When you score Superior Cyberwalls, gain 1[credit] for each rezzed barrier.
text_zhCN: 所有屏障防火墙的强度+1。 当你用优等赛博墙计分时，每有一个已激活的屏障，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: All barrier ice have +1 strength. When you score Superior Cyberwalls, gain 1 credit for each rezzed barrier.
flavor_enUS: "Our new barriers will be built on the rubble of our enemies".
flavor_zhCN: “我们的新屏障将建立在敌人的残垣上。”

text_enUS:
When your turn begins, you may rez a card, lowering the rez cost by 1[credit].
1[credit],[trash]: Search R&D for an asset, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may rez a card, lowering the rez cost by 1 credit. 1 credit,trash: Search R&D for an asset, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
flavor_enUS: "Do it again, but this time I want to see you to enunciate less. Maybe let some spittle fly."
flavor_zhCN: “再来一遍，但这回我希望看到你咬字模糊点。或许来点唾沫横飞。”

text_enUS: Lycan can be advanced. While Lycan has an odd number of advancement tokens on it, it gains code gate and loses sentry. [subroutine] Trash 1 program.
text_zhCN: 狼人能被推进。 当狼人具有奇数数量的推进标记时，其获得门禁并失去警报。 [subroutine] 销毁一个程序。
stripped_text: Lycan can be advanced. While Lycan has an odd number of advancement tokens on it, it gains code gate and loses sentry. Subroutine Trash 1 program.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 毁灭者 - 变形
flavor_enUS: "It's weird. I hit the server again and it was like a totally different piece of ice was waiting for me. Lost my root daemon. I shouldn't have nested them seven deep."
flavor_zhCN: “太诡异了。我再次袭击服务器，却好像有层全然不同的防火墙在等着我。我的根后台报销了。我真不该将它们嵌套七层之多。”

text_enUS: Trace[3]. If successful, trash 1 connection. The Runner can take 1 tag to prevent this.
text_zhCN: 追踪 3 如果成功，销毁一个人脉。潜袭者能拿取1枚锁定标记以防止本效果。
stripped_text: Trace[3]. If successful, trash 1 connection. The Runner can take 1 tag to prevent this.
flavor_enUS: The last thing he saw was the tattoo of a strange beast on his captor's neck. It had a goat's head, the body of a lion, and the tail of a serpent. Then the bag was yanked over his head, and there was only darkness.
flavor_zhCN: 他最后看见的东西是捕手脖颈上异兽的纹身。它有着羊头，狮身以及蛇尾。接着他的头上就被扣了袋子，唯余一片黑暗。

text_enUS: When the Runner encounters Merlin, you may reveal up to 2 grail ice from HQ. For the remainder of this run, Merlin gains the subroutines of the revealed ice in the order of your choice. [subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
text_zhCN: 当潜袭者遭遇梅林时，你可以从总部展示最多两张圣杯防火墙。本次潜袭的剩余时间内，梅林按你选择展示防火墙的顺序获得它们的子进程。 [subroutine] 造成2点网域伤害。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters Merlin, you may reveal up to 2 grail ice from HQ. For the remainder of this run, Merlin gains the subroutines of the revealed ice in the order of your choice. Subroutine Do 2 net damage.
subtype_zhCN: 门禁 - 圣杯 - 杀伤
flavor_enUS: He who holds the staff of wisdom.
flavor_zhCN: 他即手执智慧魔杖之士。

text_enUS: You cannot use this upgrade more than once per turn. [click]: Place 3[credit] on this upgrade. [click]: Take all credits from this upgrade.
text_zhCN:
每回合你不能使用空壳公司多于一次。
[click]：放置3[credit]到空壳公司上。
[click]：从空壳公司上拿取所有的信用点。
stripped_text: You cannot use this upgrade more than once per turn. click: Place 3[credit] on this upgrade. click: Take all credits from this upgrade.

text_enUS: Your memory limit is equal to the number of cards in your grip. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: 你的内存上限等于你操控器中卡牌的数量。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: Your memory limit is equal to the number of cards in your grip. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS: "Sometimes you just need a brain in a jar." -g00ru
flavor_zhCN: “有时你仅需一个瓮中之脑。” —精神0袖

text_enUS: When you install this program, place 4 power counters on it. Interface → Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 当三头犬“古卓”H3被安装时，放置4枚能量指示物到本卡牌上。 所附载的能量指示物：破解最多2个警报子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 4 power counters on it. Interface -> Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 1 credit: +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: "He only likes to eat live meat." -MaxX
flavor_zhCN: “他只爱吃活食。” —麦斯X

title_zhCN: 莉拉·帕特尔：受训实用派
text_enUS: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, add 1 unrezzed card to HQ.
stripped_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, add 1 unrezzed card to HQ.
flavor_enUS: "I'd say I do it for the challenge, but the truth is it's not that hard."
flavor_zhCN: “我会说我做这个是为了挑战，但事实是这并不难。”

text_enUS: When you install this program, place 4 power counters on it. Interface → Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 当三头犬“雷克斯”H2被安装时，放置4枚能量指示物到本卡牌上。 所附载的能量指示物：破解最多2个门禁子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 4 power counters on it. Interface -> Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 1 credit: +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: "Useful for fetching all sorts of things…but you better have a treat ready if he likes it." -Iain Stirling
flavor_zhCN: “它能帮你取来各种东西…但假如它喜欢那东西，你最好有所对策。” —伊恩·斯特林

text_enUS:
Place 1[credit] on Zona Sul Shipping when your turn begins.
[click]: Take all credits from Zona Sul Shipping.
Trash Zona Sul Shipping if you are tagged.
text_zhCN:
当你的回合开始时，放置1[credit]到南区快运上。
[click]：从南区快运上拿取所有的信用点。
如果你被锁定，销毁南区快运。
stripped_text: Place 1 credit on Zona Sul Shipping when your turn begins. click: Take all credits from Zona Sul Shipping. Trash Zona Sul Shipping if you are tagged.
flavor_enUS: "They'll deliver anything to anywhere. Make sure to request air holes if you're shipping someone important, though."
flavor_zhCN: “他们能把任何东西送达任何地方。不过，假如你要运送某位重要人士，请务必要求提供透气孔。”

text_enUS:
1[recurring-credit]
Use this credit to install programs.
text_zhCN:
1[recurring-credit]
本信用点用于安装程序。
stripped_text: 1 recurring credit Use this credit to install programs.
flavor_enUS: Cybsoft started by designing games. Eventually they just redesigned the same game each year, and to combat piracy created a dedicated machine to play it. Profits grew ten-fold.
flavor_zhCN: 数位体公司由设计游戏起家。最终他们每年只是重新设计同一款游戏，并为了打击盗版创造出一款该游戏的专用机。利润暴涨十倍。

text_enUS: When you install this program, place 4 power counters on it. Interface → Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 4 power counters on it. Interface -> Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 1 credit: +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: "Its bytes are definitely worse than its bark." -Chaos Theory
flavor_zhCN: “它绝对是豆腐嘴刀子芯。” —混沌希尔瑞

text_enUS: Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, instead of breaching HQ, you may install this resource from your grip, ignoring all costs. [trash]: The Corp discards 2 cards from HQ at random. Limit 1 per deck.
text_zhCN:
每当你对总部进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以从你的操控器安装乌托邦碎片，忽略所有的费用，代替读取卡牌。
[trash]：公司从总部随机弃除两张卡牌。
每套牌组限制1张。
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, instead of breaching HQ, you may install this resource from your grip, ignoring all costs. trash: The Corp discards 2 cards from HQ at random. Limit 1 per deck.

text_enUS: When you score Helium-3 Deposit, place up to 2 power counters on a card with at least 1 power counter on it.
text_zhCN: 当你用氦-3仓储计分时，放置最多2枚能量指示物到一张具有至少1枚能量指示物的卡牌上。
stripped_text: When you score Helium-3 Deposit, place up to 2 power counters on a card with at least 1 power counter on it.
flavor_enUS: It takes power to create power.
flavor_zhCN: 产能需耗能。

text_enUS:
[subroutine] The Corp gains 1[credit] or draws 1 card.
[subroutine] The Corp gains 1[credit] or draws 1 card.
[subroutine] The Corp gains 1[credit] or draws 1 card.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 公司获得1[credit]或补一张卡牌。
[subroutine] 公司获得1[credit]或补一张卡牌。
[subroutine] 公司获得1[credit]或补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Subroutine The Corp gains 1 credit or draws 1 card. Subroutine The Corp gains 1 credit or draws 1 card. Subroutine The Corp gains 1 credit or draws 1 card.
flavor_enUS: Recycling the energy entering the system via a run is both responsible and economical.
flavor_zhCN: 回收被潜袭带入系统的能量既是负责任的，也是经济合算的。

text_enUS: [click]: Place 1 power counter on IT Department. Hosted power counter: Choose a rezzed piece of ice. That ice has +1 strength until the end of the turn for each power counter (including the one spent) on IT Department.
text_zhCN: [click]：放置1枚能量指示物到信息技术部上。 所附载的能量指示物：选择一层已激活的防火墙。信息技术部上每有1枚能量指示物（包括所花费的1枚），该防火墙的强度+1，直到本回合结束。
stripped_text: click: Place 1 power counter on IT Department. Hosted power counter: Choose a rezzed piece of ice. That ice has +1 strength until the end of the turn for each power counter (including the one spent) on IT Department.

text_enUS: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards. [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
潜袭者能花费[click]，以破解马库斯1.0上的任一子进程。
[subroutine] 潜袭者销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: The forge must never run cold.
flavor_zhCN: 锻炉永不可冷却。

text_enUS: The trash cost of each card is increased by 1 for each facedown card in Archives.
text_zhCN: 档案库中每有一张牌面朝下的卡牌，每张卡牌的销毁费用+1。
stripped_text: The trash cost of each card is increased by 1 for each facedown card in Archives.
flavor_enUS: Achieve the Impossible.
flavor_zhCN: 实现所谓不可能。

text_enUS: Gain 1[credit] whenever you create a server.
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit whenever you create a server.
flavor_enUS: A masterpiece of cloning and hardware technology, Jinteki created homo vacuo operae, commonly called "turtlebacks", to operate for long periods of time within a vacuum.
flavor_zhCN: 克隆技术与硬件技术之杰作，人间会社所创俗称“龟甲”的真空作业人员，可在真空环境下长期实行操作。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Rez 1 piece of ice for each tag the Runner has, ignoring all costs.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
潜袭者每有1枚锁定标记，激活一层防火墙，忽略所有的费用。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Rez 1 piece of ice for each tag the Runner has, ignoring all costs.

text_enUS: When the Runner encounters Troll, Trace[2]. If successful, the Runner must lose [click] or end the run.
text_zhCN: 当潜袭者遭遇巨魔时，<trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，潜袭者必须失去[click]或终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters Troll, Trace[2]. If successful, the Runner must lose click or end the run.
flavor_enUS: You gotta pay the troll toll to get in.
flavor_zhCN: 你得向巨魔交了过路费才能通过。

text_enUS: [subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. If your trace strength is 5 or greater, give the Runner 1 tag.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。如果你的追踪强度等于或大于5，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: Subroutine Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. If your trace strength is 5 or greater, give the Runner 1 tag.
flavor_enUS: Virgo promised love, but offered only jealousy.
flavor_zhCN: 处女座许以爱意，却只能供给猜忌。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to steal an agenda, the Runner must pay 2[credit] for each advancement token on that agenda.
Limit 1 per deck.
text_zhCN:
作为窃取一个议案的额外费用，被窃取的议案上每有1枚推进标记，潜袭者必须支付2[credit]。
每套牌组限制1张。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to steal an agenda, the Runner must pay 2 credits for each advancement token on that agenda. Limit 1 per deck.

text_enUS: [subroutine] The Runner cannot make another run this turn.
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner cannot make another run this turn.
flavor_enUS:
There drew he forth the brand Excalibur,
And o'er him, drawing it, the winter moon,
Brightening the skirts of a long cloud, ran forth
And sparkled keen with frost against the hilt:
For all the haft twinkled with diamond sparks,
Myriads of topaz-lights, and jacinth work
Of subtlest jewellery. -Lord Tennyson
flavor_zhCN:
彼掇圣剑，扬诸额前；
凛月皎皎，辉照锋缘；
首曜金刚芒，凌光若被霜；
黄晶紫瑙，簇妆柄上。
—丁尼生爵士

text_enUS: Remote server only. [trash]: Trash all cards installed in the root of or protecting this server. Trace[X], where X is equal to the number of cards trashed. If successful, do 3 net damage. Use this ability only during a run on this server.
text_zhCN:
仅能安装在远程服务器。
[trash]：销毁本服务器内或保护本服务器的所有卡牌，并<trace>追踪 X</trace> 如果成功，造成3点网域伤害。X等于销毁卡牌的数量。仅能在对本服务器的潜袭中使用本能力。
stripped_text: Remote server only. trash: Trash all cards installed in the root of or protecting this server. Trace[X], where X is equal to the number of cards trashed. If successful, do 3 net damage. Use this ability only during a run on this server.

text_enUS: When your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on Incubator. [click], [trash]: Move all virus counters from Incubator to another installed virus program.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，放置1枚病毒指示物到孵化器上。 [click]，[trash]：从孵化器上转移所有的病毒指示物到另一个已安装的病毒程序上。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on Incubator. click, trash: Move all virus counters from Incubator to another installed virus program.
flavor_enUS: "What terrors hatch in her dispossessed mind, waiting for their moment to be born? My money's on a double-helix rainbow with the head of a panda." -fakespeare
flavor_zhCN: “是怎样的惊惧在她飘零的内心中孕育，等待着诞生的契机？我赌那是熊猫头的双螺旋彩虹。” —假士比亚

text_enUS:
Whenever the Corp loses at least 1[credit], gain 1[credit].
Trash Ixodidae if the Corp purges virus counters.
text_zhCN:
每当公司失去至少1[credit]时，获得1[credit]。
如果公司清除病毒指示物，销毁硬蜱。
stripped_text: Whenever the Corp loses at least 1 credit, gain 1 credit. Trash Ixodidae if the Corp purges virus counters.
flavor_enUS: Digs in deeper than its Alabama counterpart.
flavor_zhCN: 比它在亚拉巴马州的现实版本掘得更深。

text_enUS: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may search your stack for 1 program. Install it, paying 3[credit] less for each piece of ice protecting R&D, and then take 1 tag.
text_zhCN: 对研发中心进行一次潜袭。如果成功，你可以在你的存储栈搜寻一个程序并安装它，代替读取卡牌。每有一层保护研发中心的防火墙，其安装费用减3，然后拿取1枚锁定标记。将你的存储栈重洗。
stripped_text: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may search your stack for 1 program. Install it, paying 3 credits less for each piece of ice protecting R&D, and then take 1 tag.

text_enUS: Draw 1 card whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice.
text_zhCN: 每当公司激活一层防火墙时，补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Draw 1 card whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice.
flavor_enUS: "All programs are connected. The data that runs through one runs through all." -Rielle "Kit" Peddler
flavor_zhCN: “所有的程序都是相连的。流经其一的数据亦将流经全体。” —芮尔·“姬特”·佩德拉

text_enUS: This program gets +1 strength for each unused MU. Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 code gate or 1 barrier subroutine.
text_zhCN: 每有一个未使用的内存单元，圣贤的强度+1。 2[credit]：破解门禁或屏障子进程。
stripped_text: This program gets +1 strength for each unused MU. Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 code gate or 1 barrier subroutine.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 解码模块 - 分解模块
flavor_enUS: δὶς ἐς τὸν αὐτὸν ποταμὸν οὐκ ἂν ἐμβαίης
flavor_zhCN: 万物流变，无物常驻；人不能两次踏进同一条河流。

text_enUS: Make a run. During this run, the Corp must pay X[credit] as an additional cost to rez the first unrezzed piece of ice approached.
text_zhCN: 进行一次潜袭。在本次潜袭中，公司必须支付X[credit]，作为激活所接驳的第一层未激活防火墙的额外费用。
stripped_text: Make a run. During this run, the Corp must pay X credits as an additional cost to rez the first unrezzed piece of ice approached.
flavor_enUS: "Sometimes it's helpful to remember that you're not the only one who loves money." -Gabriel Santiago
flavor_zhCN: “牢记你不是唯一爱钱的人有时候很有帮助。” —加布里埃尔·圣地亚哥

text_enUS: Gain 1[credit] whenever you jack out.
text_zhCN: 每当你退出时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit whenever you jack out.
flavor_enUS: The datastream slipped away, and it felt like being born for a second time, if only you could remember the first. A rush of air fills the lungs to bursting, and you gasp it out, coughing and choking as the dim lights of the room shine with the brilliance of a thousand suns.
flavor_zhCN: 数据流悄然消失，若你能记得初生，那这感觉便如再次新生。扑面而来的空气充斥肺中几欲爆裂，你喘息着吐气，在犹如千轮灿日的室内微光里不停呛咳。

text_enUS:
When you install this resource, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
When your turn begins, remove 1 hosted power counter and draw 2 cards.
text_zhCN:
当你安装本资源时，填装3枚能量指示物到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。
当你的回合开始时，移除1枚所附载的能量指示物并抽2张卡牌。
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. When your turn begins, remove 1 hosted power counter and draw 2 cards.

title_zhCN: 阿戈斯防卫所：安全无忧
text_enUS: Whenever the Runner steals an agenda, they must take 1 tag or suffer 2 meat damage.
text_zhCN: 每当潜袭者窃取一个议案时，他/她必须拿取1枚锁定标记或受到2点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner steals an agenda, they must take 1 tag or suffer 2 meat damage.
flavor_enUS: We Never Sleep.
flavor_zhCN: 永世警醒。

title_enUS: Gagarin Deep Space: Expanding the Horizon
stripped_title: Gagarin Deep Space: Expanding the Horizon
text_enUS: As an additional cost to access a card in the root of a remote server, the Runner must pay 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 作为读取远程服务器内一张卡牌的额外费用，潜袭者必须支付1[credit]。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to access a card in the root of a remote server, the Runner must pay 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: Sic Itur Ad Astra.
flavor_zhCN: 飞向群星。

title_enUS: Titan Transnational: Investing In Your Future
title_zhCN: 泰坦国际：投资你的未来
stripped_title: Titan Transnational: Investing In Your Future
text_enUS: Whenever you score an agenda, you may place 1 agenda counter on it.
text_zhCN: 每当你用一个议案计分时，你可以放置1枚议案指示物到该卡牌上。
stripped_text: Whenever you score an agenda, you may place 1 agenda counter on it.
flavor_enUS: The Way Forward.
flavor_zhCN: 一路向前。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, place 3 agenda counters on it. Once per turn → Hosted agenda counter: Place 1 advancement counter on an installed piece of ice you can advance.
text_zhCN: 当你用固件更新计分时，放置3枚议案指示物到本卡牌上。 所附载的议案指示物：放置1枚推进标记到一层能被推进的防火墙上。每回合仅能使用一次本能力。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 3 agenda counters on it. Once per turn -> Hosted agenda counter: Place 1 advancement counter on an installed piece of ice you can advance.

text_enUS:
Glenn Station can host a single card.
[click]: Host a card from HQ facedown on Glenn Station.
[click]: Add a card on Glenn Station to HQ.
text_zhCN:
格伦站能被附载一张卡牌。
[click]：从总部牌面朝下附载一张卡牌到格伦站上。
[click]：将格伦站上的一张卡牌加入总部。
stripped_text: Glenn Station can host a single card. click: Host a card from HQ facedown on Glenn Station. click: Add a card on Glenn Station to HQ.

text_enUS:
[click]: Gain 3[credit].
Limit 1 Government Takeover per deck.
text_zhCN:
[click]：获得3[credit]。
每套牌组限制1张。
stripped_text: click: Gain 3 credits. Limit 1 Government Takeover per deck.
flavor_enUS: It is essential to liberate a populace from tyranny before that tyranny takes root.
flavor_zhCN: 暴政扎根之前，必须将民众从中解放。

text_enUS: Place 1 agenda counter on High-Risk Investment when you score it. [click], hosted agenda counter: Gain 1[credit] for each credit in the Runner's credit pool.
text_zhCN: 当你用高风险投资计分时，放置1枚议案指示物到本卡牌上。 [click]，所附载的议案指示物：潜袭者的信用池中每有一个信用点，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Place 1 agenda counter on High-Risk Investment when you score it. click, hosted agenda counter: Gain 1 credit for each credit in the Runner's credit pool.
flavor_enUS: "Trust me. I know what I'm doing."
flavor_zhCN: “相信我，我知道我在做什么。”

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may move an advancement token from a piece of ice to an installed piece of ice that can be advanced.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以从一层防火墙上转移1枚推进标记到一层已安装并且能被推进的防火墙上。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may move an advancement token from a piece of ice to an installed piece of ice that can be advanced.
flavor_enUS: "With distributed systems, assets can be realigned with no loss of efficiency." -William Knuth, The Tower of Babbage
flavor_zhCN: “有了分布式系统，重组资产不再损失效能。” —威廉·克努特，《巴贝奇之塔》

text_enUS: Whenever you spend an agenda counter, gain 1[credit]. [trash] or any agenda counter: Gain 2[credit].
text_zhCN: 每当你花费一枚议案指示物时，获得1[credit]。 [trash]或任一议案指示物：获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever you spend an agenda counter, gain 1 credit. trash or any agenda counter: Gain 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: "This is a one-of-a-kind opportunity…"
flavor_zhCN: “这可是绝无仅有的机遇…”

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this asset, you may place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.
text_zhCN:

1[credit]：破解防火墙子进程。本次潜袭的剩余时间内你读取的卡牌不能多于0张。

text_enUS: Whenever an installed Corp card is trashed, place 1 virus counter on Gravedigger. [click], hosted virus counter: The Corp trashes the top card of R&D.
text_zhCN:
每当一张已安装的公司卡牌被销毁时，放置1枚病毒指示物到掘墓者上。
[click]，所附载的病毒指示物：公司销毁研发中心顶端的一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever an installed Corp card is trashed, place 1 virus counter on Gravedigger. click, hosted virus counter: The Corp trashes the top card of R&D.
flavor_enUS: "Once your sniffer finds the protocols the server uses to trash its own data, you can spoof those same protocols. It's quite the show." -Ji "Noise" Reilly
flavor_zhCN: “只要你的嗅探器找到了服务器用来销毁自身数据的协议，你就能仿冒出这样的协议，就会有好戏看了。” —吉·“噪音”·雷利

text_enUS: Place 1 virus counter on Hivemind when it is installed. Virus counters on Hivemind are considered to be hosted on all other virus programs for the purposes of card effects (and can be spent as if on them).
text_zhCN: 当蜂巢智能被安装时，放置1枚病毒指示物到本卡牌上。 蜂巢智能上的病毒指示物被视为附载在所有其它要求使用其卡牌效果的病毒程序上（并且能如同从它们上花费）。
stripped_text: Place 1 virus counter on Hivemind when it is installed. Virus counters on Hivemind are considered to be hosted on all other virus programs for the purposes of card effects (and can be spent as if on them).
flavor_enUS: "We built the network. But then the network evolved. Can we be sure that it is not alive?" -g00ru
flavor_zhCN: “我们建造了网络，可后来网络进化了，我们能确信它真不是生命吗？” —精神0袖

text_enUS: You can install virus programs onto this program. Limit 1 hosted program. The memory cost of the hosted program does not count against your memory limit. [interrupt] → Whenever virus counters would be purged, prevent 1 virus counter on the hosted program from being removed.
text_zhCN: 你可以附载一个病毒程序到元祖上。 所附载的程序的内存费用不计算在你的内存上限中。 每当病毒指示物被清除时，除所附载卡牌上的1枚病毒指示物，移除所有病毒指示物。
stripped_text: You can install virus programs onto this program. Limit 1 hosted program. The memory cost of the hosted program does not count against your memory limit. Interrupt -> Whenever virus counters would be purged, prevent 1 virus counter on the hosted program from being removed.

text_enUS: [interrupt] → Whenever you would access a card in Archives, you may instead remove it from the game. Use this ability only once each time you breach Archives.
text_zhCN: 每当你读取档案库中的卡牌时，你可以将档案库中的一张卡牌移出游戏，代替读取该卡牌。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> Whenever you would access a card in Archives, you may instead remove it from the game. Use this ability only once each time you breach Archives.
flavor_enUS: A black box that makes data disappear forever.
flavor_zhCN: 一个能让数据永远消失的小黑匣。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may trash another of your installed cards. If you do, draw 1 card or remove 1 tag.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以销毁另一张你已安装的卡牌。如果你如此做，补一张卡牌或移除1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may trash another of your installed cards. If you do, draw 1 card or remove 1 tag.
flavor_enUS: There was a sickly smell coming from his closet. He hoped it was only a mouse this time.
flavor_zhCN: “他的衣柜传来令人恶心的气味，他希望这回只是一只老鼠。”

text_enUS: +3[mu] Use the MU on MemStrips only for virus programs.
text_zhCN: +3[mu] 内存条上的内存单元仅用于病毒程序。
stripped_text: +3 mu Use the MU on MemStrips only for virus programs.
flavor_enUS: "The trick is remembering which virus you loaded onto which strip. That's why I draw emoji on 'em. Then I just have to remember which emoji stands for which virus." -Princess Space Kitten
flavor_zhCN: “技巧是记住每根条上你载入了什么病毒，所以我在上面画了表情符号，这样我只要记住每个表情代表什么符号就行了。” —太空喵公主

text_enUS: +1[mu] When your turn begins, if the Corp has cards in HQ equal to their maximum hand size, draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu] 当你的回合开始时，如果公司总部中的卡牌数量等于他/她的手牌上限，补一张卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu When your turn begins, if the Corp has cards in HQ equal to their maximum hand size, draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS: "Show me your faith without deeds, if you can."
flavor_zhCN: “将你没有行为的信心指给我看吧，若你可以。”

text_enUS: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, gain credits equal to the agenda points on that agenda.
text_zhCN: 每当一个议案被计分或窃取时，获得与该议案上议案分数相等的信用点。
stripped_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, gain credits equal to the agenda points on that agenda.
flavor_enUS: "They showed me that I wasn't broken. I am still a whole human, no matter how many limbs I lose. The golems are our enemy, as well as anyone who values efficiency and profit more than a human life." -Edward Kim
flavor_zhCN: “他们让我知道自己还未破碎。不论我失去多少肢体，我依旧是个完整的人类。那些机器傀儡，以及任何把效率和利益看得比人命还重要的家伙，都是我们的仇敌。” —爱德华·金

text_enUS:
Install only if the Corp has at least 1 bad publicity.
[click],[click],[click],[click],[trash]: Give the Corp 1 bad publicity.

如果公司具有至少1枚负面声誉标记，才能安装。
[click]，[click]，[click]，[click]，[trash]：给予公司1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: Install only if the Corp has at least 1 bad publicity. click,click,click,click,trash: Give the Corp 1 bad publicity.
flavor_enUS: Her heart beat faster as her reader illuminated the records. It was all there. The pod had not been reprogrammed since the 14th, which meant that this was a case of gross negligence.
flavor_zhCN: 随着阅读器照亮，她的心越跳越快。就在这儿，豆荚从14日起就未被重新编写过，表明这是一次重大过失。

text_enUS: [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent all damage. Trash all installed hardware, all installed non-virtual resources, and all cards from your grip. Lose all credits in your credit pool. Remove all tags.
text_zhCN: [trash]：防止所有的伤害。销毁所有已安装的硬件，所有已安装的非虚拟资源和你操控器中的所有卡牌。失去你信用池中所有的信用点。移除所有的锁定标记。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> trash: Prevent all damage. Trash all installed hardware, all installed non-virtual resources, and all cards from your grip. Lose all credits in your credit pool. Remove all tags.
flavor_enUS: "Don't worry, me. You won't have to vertical park." -Ji "Noise" Reilly
flavor_zhCN: “别担心，我。你不需要垂直停车。” —吉·“噪音”·雷利

text_enUS: When your turn begins, if there are 2 or more hosted power counters, remove all of them and suffer 1 core damage. This damage cannot be prevented. Otherwise, place 1 power counter on this resource and gain [click].
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，如果兴奋剂商贩具有2枚或更多的能量指示物，从兴奋剂商贩上移除所有能量指示物并受到1点脑部伤害（不能被防止）；否则，放置1枚能量指示物到兴奋剂商贩上并获得[click]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, if there are 2 or more hosted power counters, remove all of them and suffer 1 core damage. This damage cannot be prevented. Otherwise, place 1 power counter on this resource and gain click.
flavor_enUS: Her eyes were the color of dreams and disasters.
flavor_zhCN: 她的眸色如梦似祸。

text_enUS:
When your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on Virus Breeding Ground.
[click]: Move 1 virus counter on Virus Breeding Ground to another card with at least 1 virus counter on it.
text_zhCN:
当你的回合开始时，放置1枚病毒指示物到病毒繁育地上。
[click]：从病毒繁育地上转移1枚病毒指示物到另一张具有至少1枚病毒指示物的卡牌上。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on Virus Breeding Ground. click: Move 1 virus counter on Virus Breeding Ground to another card with at least 1 virus counter on it.
flavor_enUS: Scraps of code drifting around the network can congeal into pools of data. Within this primordial soup the code breaks, re-assembles, mutates. Evolves.
flavor_zhCN: 网域里漂浮的代码碎屑可以凝成数据池。代码在这原生汤里分裂，重组，变异。进化。

text_enUS: Add an installed program or piece of hardware to your grip.
text_zhCN: 将一个已安装的程序或硬件加入你的操控器。
stripped_text: Add an installed program or piece of hardware to your grip.
flavor_enUS: Runner software is notoriously scratch-built and under-tested, and the shadow net has no tech support. It works, mostly, but sometimes a fresh install is just the ticket.
flavor_zhCN: 众所周知，潜袭者软件都是粗制滥造而缺乏测试的，并且地下网络没有技术支持。通常，它能用，但有时候一次全新的安装是必要的。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may lose [click]. If you do, the first time you would take tags from now until your next turn begins, prevent 1 tag.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以失去[click]。如果你如此做，避免你将拿取的第一枚锁定标记，直到你的下回合开始。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may lose click. If you do, the first time you would take tags from now until your next turn begins, prevent 1 tag.
flavor_enUS: "By the time you add in all of the options, you've spent about three times the base price. Of course, a lot of the systems are supposed to make you safer - if you can keep track of them."

text_enUS: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] if you have 2 or more unused MU.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，如果你具有两个或更多未使用的内存单元，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 1 credit if you have 2 or more unused MU.
flavor_enUS: "Sometimes I like to make origami cranes out of old newsrags. It helps me think, putting it back on the subconscious. I figure it's the same principle for my rig – keep it busy and it makes me a few creds for my trouble." -Quetzal
flavor_zhCN: “有时我爱用废报纸来叠纸鹤。清空大脑释放潜意识，有助于我思考。我觉得这道理也适用于我的基地—让它保持忙碌，它就会给我赚点小钱来排忧解难。” —绿咬鹃

text_enUS:
The Corp cannot score an agenda during the same turn they installed that agenda.
When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this program.
text_zhCN:
公司不能在其安装议案的同一回合将该议案计分。
当公司清除病毒指示物时，销毁本程序。
stripped_text: The Corp cannot score an agenda during the same turn they installed that agenda. When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this program.

text_enUS: The first time you install a card each turn (including Paige Piper), you may search your stack for any number of copies of that card and add them to your heap. Shuffle your stack.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次安装一张卡牌（包括佩姬·派珀）时，你可以在你的存储栈搜寻任意数量的该卡牌，并将它们加入你的堆阵。将你的存储栈重洗。
stripped_text: The first time you install a card each turn (including Paige Piper), you may search your stack for any number of copies of that card and add them to your heap. Shuffle your stack.
flavor_enUS: "The Valley is littered with good ideas. You need the discipline to execute if you want to stay in my incubator."
flavor_zhCN: “生科谷里好主意泛滥。你要想留在我的育养所里，就得自觉执行。”

text_enUS: The first time each turn you lose [click] except by paying the trigger cost of a paid ability, gain [click].
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次失去[click]时，获得[click]。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you lose click except by paying the trigger cost of a paid ability, gain click.
flavor_enUS: Turns a night owl into an early bird!
flavor_zhCN: 把夜猫子变成早起鸟！

text_enUS: If you have at least 2[link], the memory cost of this program is 0[mu], even if it is not installed. This program gets +1 strength for each installed icebreaker. Interface → [trash]: Break up to 3 barrier subroutines.
text_zhCN: 如果你具有至少2[link]，长钉的内存费用为0，即使其未被安装。 每有一个已安装的破解器，长钉的强度+1。 [trash]：破解最多3个屏障子进程。
stripped_text: If you have at least 2 link, the memory cost of this program is 0 mu, even if it is not installed. This program gets +1 strength for each installed icebreaker. Interface -> trash: Break up to 3 barrier subroutines.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 分解模块 - 云

text_enUS: The first time you make a successful run each turn, the Corp reveals 1 card at random from HQ.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次进行成功的潜袭时，公司从总部随机展示一张卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time you make a successful run each turn, the Corp reveals 1 card at random from HQ.
flavor_enUS: Watch out fellas, this little lady's on the prowl!
flavor_zhCN: 当心了伙计们，这小姑娘正伺机下手！

text_enUS: Genetics also trigger the second time each turn their trigger condition is met.
text_zhCN: 基因在每回合第二次满足其触发条件时也触发。
stripped_text: Genetics also trigger the second time each turn their trigger condition is met.
flavor_enUS: "These g-mods haven't hit the consumer market yet, but I can hook you up."
flavor_zhCN: “这些转基因品尚未投放消费者市场，但我能为你牵线。”

text_enUS: The first time you take damage each turn, draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次承受伤害时，补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time you take damage each turn, draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS: Your heart deserves the best.
flavor_zhCN: 你的心脏配得上极品！

text_enUS: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The advancement requirement of each agenda is increased by 1 for each copy of that agenda in the Corp's score area.
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 每个议案在公司的分数区中每有一个相同的议案，其推进需求+1。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The advancement requirement of each agenda is increased by 1 for each copy of that agenda in the Corp's score area.

text_enUS: The first time you spend [click] to draw 1 card (not through a card ability) each turn, gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次花费[click]（不通过卡牌能力）来补一张卡牌时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: The first time you spend click to draw 1 card (not through a card ability) each turn, gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: Born for success!
flavor_zhCN: 为成功而生！

text_enUS: The rez cost of bioroid ice is lowered by 1 for each unspent click the Runner has.
text_zhCN: 潜袭者每有一个未使用的时点，生化人防火墙的激活费用减1。
stripped_text: The rez cost of bioroid ice is lowered by 1 for each unspent click the Runner has.
flavor_enUS: In the vast universe of memories, consciousness slumbers...
flavor_zhCN: 在记忆浩瀚的领域里，意识蛰伏着…

text_enUS: X is the number of rezzed NEXT ice. [subroutine] Do X net damage. [subroutine] Trash X programs.
text_zhCN: X等于已激活的次级防火墙的数量。 [subroutine] 造成X点网域伤害。 [subroutine] 销毁X个程序。
stripped_text: X is the number of rezzed NEXT ice. Subroutine Do X net damage. Subroutine Trash X programs.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 次级 - 杀伤 - 毁灭者
flavor_enUS: "God in Heinlein. What's next, NEXT Platinum?" -John Masanori
flavor_zhCN: “海因莱因的主啊。接下来是什么，次级白金？” —约翰·正则

title_zhCN: 人间生物科技：享你所想
text_enUS: Before taking your first turn, you may switch this identity with any copy of Jinteki Biotech. [click][click][click]: Flip this identity. Side: The Brewery: Jinteki Biotech When you flip this identity, do 2 net damage. Side: The Tank: Jinteki Biotech When you flip this identity, shuffle all cards in Archives into R&D. Side: The Greenhouse: Jinteki Biotech When you flip this identity, place 4 advancement counters on 1 installed card that you can advance.
text_zhCN: 在你开始第一个回合前，你可以将本卡牌与任意一张人间生物科技互换。 [click]，[click]，[click]：将本特性翻转。 牌面 酿坊：人间生物科技 当你翻转本特性时，造成2点网域伤害。 牌面 温室：人间生物科技 当你翻转本特性时，放置4枚推进标记到一张能被推进的卡牌上。 牌面 智库：人间生物科技 当你翻转本特性时，将档案库洗入研发中心。
stripped_text:
Before taking your first turn, you may switch this identity with any copy of Jinteki Biotech. click click click: Flip this identity.
Side: The Brewery: Jinteki Biotech
When you flip this identity, do 2 net damage.
Side: The Tank: Jinteki Biotech
When you flip this identity, shuffle all cards in Archives into R&D.
Side: The Greenhouse: Jinteki Biotech
When you flip this identity, place 4 advancement counters on 1 installed card that you can advance.
flavor_enUS:
The vats in Building C can create-and destroy-life itself.
The best and brightest genengineers spends their days in the Tank dreaming up a better world.
The Greenhouse was built to enhance natural beauty.
flavor_zhCN: 酿坊：C楼的液缸能创造—和毁灭—生命本身。 温室：温室为增进自然之美而建造。 智库：最优秀最聪慧的基因工程师们整日待在智库里，创想一个更美好的世界。

text_enUS: When you score Genetic Resequencing, you may place 1 agenda counter on an agenda in your score area.
text_zhCN: 当你用基因重测序计分时，你可以放置1枚议案指示物到你分数区中的一个议案上。
stripped_text: When you score Genetic Resequencing, you may place 1 agenda counter on an agenda in your score area.
flavor_enUS: "The best part of our work is that nothing is ever wasted. A gene that is useful once will surely be useful again." -Wong Ya Ching
flavor_zhCN: “我们工作的绝妙之处便是东西从不会浪费。一段曾经有用的基因必将再度有用。” —王雅青

text_enUS: [subroutine] Do 1 net damage for each unused MU the Runner has.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 潜袭者每有一个未使用的内存单元，造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: Subroutine Do 1 net damage for each unused MU the Runner has.
flavor_enUS: The more power a spike process can use, the harder it can hit. The really clever ones borrow the runner's own memory to iterate locally.
flavor_zhCN: 一个冲击进程使用的能量越多，它就打击得越猛。真正聪明的人借用潜袭者自己的内存进行本地迭代。

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner fully breaks a piece of ice protecting this server, they get -1 maximum hand size until the beginning of your next turn. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 每当潜袭者破解一层保护本服务器的防火墙上的所有子进程时，他/她的手牌上限减1，直到你的下回合开始。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner fully breaks a piece of ice protecting this server, they get -1 maximum hand size until the beginning of your next turn. Limit 1 region per server.

text_enUS: [subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag. If this run is successful, the Runner removes 1 tag.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。如果本次潜袭成功，潜袭者移除1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag. If this run is successful, the Runner removes 1 tag.
flavor_enUS: "It tracks you and logs you. If you get in you can just delete the log. But first you have to get in." -Gabriel Santiago
flavor_zhCN: “它跟踪你并记录你。如果你进去了，删除记录即可。但首先你得进去。” —加布里埃尔·圣地亚哥

text_enUS: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. As an additional cost to steal an agenda, the Runner must pay 2[credit].
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 作为窃取一个议案的额外费用，潜袭者必须支付2[credit]。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. As an additional cost to steal an agenda, the Runner must pay 2 credits.

text_enUS: [click]: Gain 2[credit].
text_zhCN: [click]：获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: click: Gain 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: Give a man money, and he is rich for a day. Teach a man how to invest, and he is rich for life.
flavor_zhCN: 授人以金，得享一日。授人以技，富裕一生。

text_enUS:
2[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability.
[subroutine] Gain 2[credit].
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
text_zhCN:
潜袭者能支付2[credit]，以破解谈判者上的任一子进程。
[subroutine] 公司获得2[credit]。
[subroutine] 销毁一个程序。
stripped_text: 2 credits: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Gain 2 credits. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program.
flavor_enUS: "Negotiation is an art, so never negotiate when you can intimidate instead." -Thiago Reyes, VP Strategic Operations
flavor_zhCN: “谈判是门艺术，所以在能去胁迫的时候，别去谈判。” —战略经营副总裁，迪亚戈·雷耶斯

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may trash Tech Startup. If you do, search R&D for an asset, reveal it, and install it. Shuffle R&D.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以销毁科技创业。如果你如此做，在研发中心搜寻一个资产，将其展示，并安装它。将研发中心重洗。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may trash Tech Startup. If you do, search R&D for an asset, reveal it, and install it. Shuffle R&D.
flavor_enUS: "Don't worry. If this one fails, we can start a new one tomorrow."
flavor_zhCN: “别担心。如果这个失败了，我们明天就能重新来过。”

text_enUS: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. As an additional cost to rez non-ice cards, the Corp must randomly trash a card from HQ.
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 作为激活非防火墙卡牌的额外费用，公司必须从总部随机销毁一张卡牌。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. As an additional cost to rez non-ice cards, the Corp must randomly trash a card from HQ.

text_enUS: Off-Campus Apartment can host any number of connections. Whenever you install a connection on Off-Campus Apartment, draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: 校外公寓能被附载任意数量的人脉。 每当你安装一个人脉到校外公寓上时，补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Off-Campus Apartment can host any number of connections. Whenever you install a connection on Off-Campus Apartment, draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS: Usually crashing with friends means sleeping on the couch. This time, it meant sleeping on a server farm.
flavor_zhCN: 借宿朋友家通常意味着睡长沙发。现在，这意味着睡服务器农场。

text_enUS: Install 1 resource from your grip, paying 3[credit] less.
text_zhCN: 从你的操控器安装1个资源，其安装费用减3[credit]。
stripped_text: Install 1 resource from your grip, paying 3 credits less.
flavor_enUS: "You can help Jinteki shape the future. Your future."
flavor_zhCN: “你能协助人间会社塑造未来。你的未来。”

text_enUS: When you install this hardware, place 4 power counters on it. [click], hosted power counter: Run any server. Whenever you would take tags during that run, prevent all of those tags.
text_zhCN: 当你安装寝室电脑时，放置4枚能量指示物到本卡牌上。 [click]，所附载的能量指示物：进行一次潜袭。本次潜袭的剩余时间内避免所有的锁定标记。
stripped_text: When you install this hardware, place 4 power counters on it. click, hosted power counter: Run any server. Whenever you would take tags during that run, prevent all of those tags.

text_enUS: The first time you install a card each turn, you may install another card of the same type from your grip (paying its install cost).
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次安装一张卡牌时，你可以从你的操控器安装另一张相同类型的卡牌（支付其安装费用）。
stripped_text: The first time you install a card each turn, you may install another card of the same type from your grip (paying its install cost).

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
If you have fewer cards in your grip than your maximum hand size, draw cards until you have cards in your grip equal to your maximum hand size.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，花费[click]。
如果你操控器中的卡牌数量少于你的手牌上限，补卡牌直到你操控器中的卡牌数量与你的手牌上限相等。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. If you have fewer cards in your grip than your maximum hand size, draw cards until you have cards in your grip equal to your maximum hand size.

text_enUS: +1[mu] The first time you play an event each turn, you may play another event (without spending a click) after the first one resolves. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu] 每回合你第一次打出一个事件时，你可以在其结算完后打出另一个事件（无须花费一个时点）。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu The first time you play an event each turn, you may play another event (without spending a click) after the first one resolves. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: This program gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: Place 1 power counter on this program.
text_zhCN: 学习指南上每有1枚能量指示物，其强度+1。 1[credit]：破解门禁子进程。 2[credit]：放置1枚能量指示物到学习指南上。
stripped_text: This program gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: Place 1 power counter on this program.
flavor_enUS: "Once you download the lecture source files, this program does a statistical analysis and distills the most important concepts." -Hayley Kaplan
flavor_zhCN: “只要你一下载讲课的源文件，这项程序就会进行统计分析并提取出最重要的概念。” —海莉·开普兰

text_enUS: Trash all programs hosted on London Library when your turn ends. [click]: Install a non-virus program from your grip on London Library, ignoring the install cost. [click]: Add a program on London Library to your grip.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合结束时，销毁附载在伦敦图书馆上的所有程序。 [click]：从你的操控器安装一个非病毒程序到伦敦图书馆上，忽略所有的安装费用。 [click]：将伦敦图书馆上的一个程序加入你的操控器。
stripped_text: Trash all programs hosted on London Library when your turn ends. click: Install a non-virus program from your grip on London Library, ignoring the install cost. click: Add a program on London Library to your grip.

text_enUS: [click], [click]: Search your stack for a piece of hardware, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.
text_zhCN: [click]，[click]：在你的存储栈搜寻一个硬件，将其展示，并加入你的操控器。将你的存储栈重洗。
stripped_text: click, click: Search your stack for a piece of hardware, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.
flavor_enUS: "There are whole generations of people who never move out of a megalopolis center. You should see the look on their face the first time they see the stars." -Professor Darren Fin, Astronomy
flavor_zhCN: “已经整整好几代人未曾离开大都会的中心了。你真该瞧瞧他们初次看见群星时的表情。” —达伦·芬，天文学教授

text_enUS:
When your turn begins, lose [click].
Your maximum hand size is increased by 5.
text_zhCN:
当你的回合开始时，失去[click]。
你的手牌上限+5。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, lose click. Your maximum hand size is increased by 5.
flavor_enUS: "So much to do. So little time."
flavor_zhCN: “要做的太多。时间却太少。”

text_enUS: When you score Research Grant, you may score another copy of Research Grant that is installed.
text_zhCN: 当你用科研经费计分时，你可以用另一张已安装的科研经费计分。
stripped_text: When you score Research Grant, you may score another copy of Research Grant that is installed.
flavor_enUS: "My research could make your corporation billions. And save lives, of course."
flavor_zhCN: “我的研究能为贵公司带来数十亿的利润。当然，也能拯救生命。”

text_enUS: Turing has +3 strength while protecting a remote server. The Runner cannot use AI programs to break subroutines on Turing. [subroutine] End the run unless the Runner spends [click][click][click].
stripped_text: Turing has +3 strength while protecting a remote server. The Runner cannot use AI programs to break subroutines on Turing. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner spends click click click.
flavor_enUS: Alan Turing laid the foundation for artificial intelligence by suggesting that you could teach a computer to be human.
flavor_zhCN: 通过提出将电脑教化为人类的理论，阿兰·图灵奠定了人工智能的基础。

text_enUS:
Crick has +3 strength while protecting Archives.
[subroutine] Install a card from Archives (paying its install cost).
text_zhCN:
当克里克保护档案库时，其强度+3。
[subroutine] 从档案库安装一张卡牌（支付其安装费用）。
stripped_text: Crick has +3 strength while protecting Archives. Subroutine Install a card from Archives (paying its install cost).
flavor_enUS: Crick and his colleagues ushered in modern genetics by mapping the structure of DNA.
flavor_zhCN: 通过描绘DNA的结构，克里克及其同事创立了现代遗传学。

text_enUS: Search R&D for up to X different sysops (by title), reveal them, and add them to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
text_zhCN: 在研发中心搜寻最多X个不同的管理员（根据名称），将它们展示，并加入总部。将研发中心重洗。
stripped_text: Search R&D for up to X different sysops (by title), reveal them, and add them to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
flavor_enUS: "My script can perform the Kobayashi algorithm in .12 seconds."
flavor_zhCN: “我的脚本能在0.12秒内完成小林算法。”

text_enUS: Cards cannot leave the Runner's heap for any reason.
text_zhCN: 卡牌不能因任何原因离开潜袭者的堆阵。
stripped_text: Cards cannot leave the Runner's heap for any reason.
flavor_enUS: Officially, there is no blacklist. That would be illegal. Unofficially, there is a list, and being on it can ruin a career.
flavor_zhCN: 人尽皆知，黑名单不存在。那是违法的。但鲜有人知，某个名单存在，而名列其上可能断送职业生涯。

text_enUS:
Gutenberg has +3 strength while protecting R&D.
[subroutine] Trace[7]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
text_zhCN:
当古腾堡保护研发中心时，其强度+3。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 7</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: Gutenberg has +3 strength while protecting R&D. Subroutine Trace[7]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
flavor_enUS: Johannes Gutenberg ignited the first Information Revolution by inventing the movable-type printing press.
flavor_zhCN: 通过发明西方活字印刷术，约翰尼斯·古腾堡引燃了第一次信息革命。

text_enUS: As an additional cost to play an event, if there is a copy of that event in the heap, the Runner must pay 2[credit].
text_zhCN: 作为打出一个在他/她的堆阵中有相同卡牌的事件的额外费用，潜袭者必须支付2[credit]。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play an event, if there is a copy of that event in the heap, the Runner must pay 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: The cost of an education is sometimes felt sharpest in the stomach.
flavor_zhCN: 求学的花费有时候最令人胃疼。

text_enUS:
Meru Mati has +3 strength while protecting HQ.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
当梅鲁·马蒂保护总部时，其强度+3。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Meru Mati has +3 strength while protecting HQ. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Meru Mati pushed the limits of physics by engineering the first buckyweave structure, a thousand-foot long wall.
flavor_zhCN: 通过建造首例巴克网结构，一面千呎长墙，梅鲁·马蒂突破了物理学的界限。

text_enUS: The rez cost of each card in the root of this server is lowered by 5. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 本服务器内的卡牌的激活费用减5。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: The rez cost of each card in the root of this server is lowered by 5. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: After the Big One, real estate value changed sharply. Some found that they had become owners of beachfront property. Others were underwater.
flavor_zhCN: 在大地震之后，房地产价值剧变。有些人发现他们已成为海滨物业的所有者。其余人的则被淹没。

text_enUS: Run Archives. If successful, whenever you would access a faceup piece of ice in Archives this run, you may instead trash 1 rezzed copy of that ice. Use this ability only once this run.
text_zhCN: 对档案库进行一次潜袭。如果成功，代替读取一层档案库中的防火墙，销毁一层已激活的与该防火墙相同的防火墙。
stripped_text: Run Archives. If successful, whenever you would access a faceup piece of ice in Archives this run, you may instead trash 1 rezzed copy of that ice. Use this ability only once this run.
flavor_enUS: The most potent scripts are indistinguishable from magic to the sysop on the other side.
flavor_zhCN: 对于彼端的管理员来说，最强力的脚本无异于魔法。

text_enUS:
When you install this hardware, suffer 1 core damage.
The trash cost of each Corp card is lowered by 1.
text_zhCN:
当你安装颅骨接口时，受到1点脑部伤害。
所有卡牌的销毁费用减1。
stripped_text: When you install this hardware, suffer 1 core damage. The trash cost of each Corp card is lowered by 1.
flavor_enUS: The implanted brain-machine interface, or "skulljack," is the single most common cybernetic enhancement that isn't a medical necessity.
flavor_zhCN: 植入式脑机接口，或称“颅骨接口”，是最为常见的非医疗必需的强化型义体。

text_enUS: +1[mu] Whenever you steal an agenda, you may swap that agenda with an agenda in the Corp's score area. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu] 每当你窃取一个议案时，你可以将该议案与公司分数区中的另一个议案互换。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu Whenever you steal an agenda, you may swap that agenda with an agenda in the Corp's score area. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: [interrupt] → Whenever you would suffer damage from a "when installed" ability on a piece of cybernetic hardware, prevent all of that damage.
text_zhCN: 防止所有安装义体时造成的肢体伤害和脑部伤害。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> Whenever you would suffer damage from a "when installed" ability on a piece of cybernetic hardware, prevent all of that damage.
flavor_enUS: Picking a chopper might be the last decision you make. If you find a good one, stick with her for life.
flavor_zhCN: 挑选改造师也许是你做的最后一个决定。如果你找到了一位好的，受用终身。

text_enUS:
When you install Titanium Ribs, suffer 2 meat damage.
You choose the card(s) from your grip to trash whenever you take damage (including the damage taken by installing Titanium Ribs).
text_zhCN:
当你安装钛金肋骨时，受到2点肢体伤害。
每当你承受伤害（包括安装钛金肋骨时承受的伤害）时，你选择将从你的操控器销毁的卡牌。
stripped_text: When you install Titanium Ribs, suffer 2 meat damage. You choose the card(s) from your grip to trash whenever you take damage (including the damage taken by installing Titanium Ribs).

text_enUS: If you have at least 2[link], the memory cost of this program is 0[mu], even if it is not installed. This program gets +1 strength for each installed icebreaker. Interface → [trash]: Break up to 3 code gate subroutines.
text_zhCN: 如果你具有至少2[link]，撬棍的内存费用为0，即使其未被安装。 每有一个已安装的破解器，撬棍的强度+1。 [trash]：破解最多3个门禁子进程。
stripped_text: If you have at least 2 link, the memory cost of this program is 0 mu, even if it is not installed. This program gets +1 strength for each installed icebreaker. Interface -> trash: Break up to 3 code gate subroutines.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 解码模块 - 云

text_enUS: When you install Net-Ready Eyes, suffer 2 meat damage. Whenever you initiate a run, choose an icebreaker. That icebreaker has +1 strength for the remainder of the run.
text_zhCN: 当你安装网备视眼时，受到2点肢体伤害。 每当你发起一次潜袭时，选择一个破解器。本次潜袭的剩余时间内该破解器的强度+1。
stripped_text: When you install Net-Ready Eyes, suffer 2 meat damage. Whenever you initiate a run, choose an icebreaker. That icebreaker has +1 strength for the remainder of the run.

text_enUS: [click]: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may choose 1 unrezzed non-ice card with no advancement counters on it. The Corp shuffles that card into R&D.
text_zhCN: [click]：对研发中心进行一次潜袭。如果成功，你可以选择一台服务器内一张未激活的并且不具有推进标记的非防火墙卡牌，代替读取卡牌。公司将该卡牌洗入研发中心。
stripped_text: click: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may choose 1 unrezzed non-ice card with no advancement counters on it. The Corp shuffles that card into R&D.
flavor_enUS: Sometimes progress means returning to the past.
flavor_zhCN: 有时进步意味着回到过去。

text_enUS:
You get +3 maximum hand size.
When you install this hardware, suffer 1 core damage.
text_zhCN:
当你安装护脑颅盔时，受到1点脑部伤害。
你的手牌上限+3。
stripped_text: You get +3 maximum hand size. When you install this hardware, suffer 1 core damage.
flavor_enUS: The skull is not one bone, but 22. The surgery is even more complex than it sounds.
flavor_zhCN: 颅骨不是一块骨头，而是由22块组成。这项手术甚至比听起来更复杂。

text_enUS: Each player's maximum hand size is reduced by 1.
text_zhCN: 每位玩家的手牌上限减1。
stripped_text: Each player's maximum hand size is reduced by 1.
flavor_enUS: Define Yourself.
flavor_zhCN: 定义自我。

text_enUS: The Runner's maximum hand size is reduced by 1.
text_zhCN: 潜袭者的手牌上限减1。
stripped_text: The Runner's maximum hand size is reduced by 1.
flavor_enUS: Cyber enhancements can be dangerous in the wrong hands.
flavor_zhCN: 强化型义体落入坏人手中会很危险。

text_enUS: [subroutine] The Runner trashes an installed piece of hardware. Trash Lab Dog.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 潜袭者销毁一个已安装的硬件。销毁实验室犬。
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner trashes an installed piece of hardware. Trash Lab Dog.
flavor_enUS: "Remember those FCC regulations about not creating harmful interference? No? Ah, before your time, I guess." -Cailan Heinrich, Senior Programmer
flavor_zhCN: “记得联邦通信委员会那些关于禁止创造有害接口的规定吗？不记得？啊，我想那是在你的年代以前吧。” —凯兰·海因里希，资深程序员

text_enUS: The trash cost of each card in the root of this server is increased by 3. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 安装在本服务器内的卡牌的销毁费用+3。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: The trash cost of each card in the root of this server is increased by 3. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: Built Oaktown tough.
flavor_zhCN: 筑奥克敦若磐石。

text_enUS: [trash]: Do 1 core damage. Use this ability only during a run against this server and only if the Runner has no unspent [click].
text_zhCN: [trash]：造成1点脑部伤害。仅能在对本服务器的潜袭中，并且潜袭者没有未花费的时点时使用本能力。
stripped_text: trash: Do 1 core damage. Use this ability only during a run against this server and only if the Runner has no unspent click.
flavor_enUS: "Bioroids recognize consciousness in others, but not in themselves."
flavor_zhCN: “生化人能识别出对方的意识，却无法识别出自己的。”

text_enUS: [subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, place 1 advancement token on an installed card and end the run.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，放置1枚推进标记到一张已安装的卡牌上并终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Subroutine You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, place 1 advancement token on an installed card and end the run.

text_enUS: [subroutine] The Runner cannot draw cards for the remainder of this turn.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 本回合的剩余时间内潜袭者不能补牌。
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner cannot draw cards for the remainder of this turn.
flavor_enUS: "When your communications are disrupted, you are isolated from your resources. An attack will surely follow." -The Playbook
flavor_zhCN: “当你的通讯被扰乱，你和你的资源隔离开来。一场袭击必然接踵而至。” —《战术手册》

text_enUS:
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] The Runner gains 5[credit].
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
[subroutine] 潜袭者获得5[credit]。
stripped_text: Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine The Runner gains 5 credits.
flavor_enUS: "A sysop is not just a cog in the corporate machine. They have dreams—and nightmares—just like the rest of us." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
flavor_zhCN: “管理员不仅仅是公司这台大机器里的小齿轮。他们也有梦想—和梦魇—同我们其他人一样。” —凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞

text_enUS: Install only faceup. (This agenda is neither rezzed nor unrezzed.) Whenever you advance this agenda, gain 2[credit]. If there are 5 or more hosted advancement counters (including the counter just placed), gain 3[credit] instead.
text_zhCN: 本议案仅能面朝上安装。（本议案不视为已激活或未激活。） 每当你推进本议案时，获得2[credit]。如果所附载的推进指示物有5枚或更多（包括刚放上去的那1枚），则改为获得3[credit]。
stripped_text: Install only faceup. (This agenda is neither rezzed nor unrezzed.) Whenever you advance this agenda, gain 2 credits. If there are 5 or more hosted advancement counters (including the counter just placed), gain 3 credits instead.

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to rez this asset, forfeit 1 agenda.
When your turn begins, you may trash 1 installed resource. Trashing a resource this way cannot be prevented.
text_zhCN:
作为激活本资产的额外费用，废除1个议案。
当你的回合开始时，你可以销毁1个已安装的资源。以此法销毁资源不能被防止。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to rez this asset, forfeit 1 agenda. When your turn begins, you may trash 1 installed resource. Trashing a resource this way cannot be prevented.
flavor_enUS: If you can't buy the city council, create a new city.
flavor_zhCN: 如果你不能买通市议会，那就新建一座城。

text_enUS:
When the Runner encounters Quicksand, place 1 power counter on Quicksand.
Quicksand has +1 strength for each power counter on it.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
当潜袭者遭遇流沙时，放置1枚能量指示物到流沙上。
流沙上每有1枚能量指示物，其强度+1。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters Quicksand, place 1 power counter on Quicksand. Quicksand has +1 strength for each power counter on it. Subroutine End the run.

text_enUS: Interface → Trash a card from your grip: Break 1 subroutine. Trash a card from your grip: +2 strength.
text_zhCN: 从你的操控器销毁一张卡牌：破解防火墙子进程。 从你的操控器销毁一张卡牌：强度+2。
stripped_text: Interface -> Trash a card from your grip: Break 1 subroutine. Trash a card from your grip: +2 strength.
flavor_enUS: The server was quiet that night. I closed my eyes, the low-hum of the datastream lulling me into a trance. When I opened them, the construct stood before me in the shape of a man, clad in light of many colors. His stature was impressive, and his saccharine voice wormed its way into my very soul.
flavor_zhCN: 是夜服务器沉寂。我闭上眼，数据流的低鸣使我心神恍惚。当我睁开眼，这人形的造物便伫立跟前，身披万色光芒。他的身型如此伟岸，他甜腻的嗓音悄然钻入我的灵魂深处。

text_enUS:
When you install Street Peddler, host the top 3 cards of your stack facedown on Street Peddler (you may look at these cards at any time).
[trash]: Install 1 card hosted on Street Peddler, lowering its install cost by 1.
text_zhCN:
当你安装街头小贩时，将你存储栈顶端的三张卡牌面朝下附载到街头小贩上（你可以在任意时刻查看这些卡牌）。
[trash]：安装一张附载在街头小贩上的卡牌，其安装费用减1。
stripped_text: When you install Street Peddler, host the top 3 cards of your stack facedown on Street Peddler (you may look at these cards at any time). trash: Install 1 card hosted on Street Peddler, lowering its install cost by 1.
flavor_enUS: "Whaddya buyin'?"
flavor_zhCN: “乃要买啥？”

title_zhCN: 阿曼德·“游魂”·沃克：科技之王
text_enUS: Whenever you use a [trash] ability, draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: 每当你使用一个[trash]能力时，补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever you use a trash ability, draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS: "Everything has a price."
flavor_zhCN: “凡物皆有价码。”

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Expose 1 card installed in the root of a remote server. If you do and that card is an asset or upgrade, trash it.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，花费[click]。
揭示一张安装在远程服务器内的卡牌。如果该卡牌是一个资产或升级，销毁该卡牌，无须费用。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Expose 1 card installed in the root of a remote server. If you do and that card is an asset or upgrade, trash it.

text_enUS: +1[link] [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent 1 tag. [trash]: Remove 1 tag. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[link] [trash]：避免或移除1枚锁定标记。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 link Interrupt -> trash: Prevent 1 tag. trash: Remove 1 tag. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS: Using the exact same rig as a million other people is just another form of security through anonymity.
flavor_zhCN: 和上百万人使用一模一样的基地，只是借助于匿名的又一种安全措施。

text_enUS: If you have at least 2[link], the memory cost of this program is 0[mu], even if it is not installed. This program gets +1 strength for each installed icebreaker. Interface → [trash]: Break up to 3 sentry subroutines.
text_zhCN: 如果你具有至少2[link]，尖刃的内存费用为0，即使其未被安装。 每有一个已安装的破解器，尖刃的强度+1。 [trash]：破解最多3个警报子进程。
stripped_text: If you have at least 2 link, the memory cost of this program is 0 mu, even if it is not installed. This program gets +1 strength for each installed icebreaker. Interface -> trash: Break up to 3 sentry subroutines.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 断路模块 - 云

text_enUS: Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, breach HQ. You cannot access cards in the root of HQ during this breach.
text_zhCN: 每当公司用一个议案计分时，从总部读取一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, breach HQ. You cannot access cards in the root of HQ during this breach.
flavor_enUS: Muertos has no fear of the law. Muertos is the law.
flavor_zhCN: 亡灵无惧法律。亡灵即是法律。

text_enUS:
When you install Muertos Gang Member, the Corp must derez a card.
When Muertos Gang Member is uninstalled, the Corp may rez a card, ignoring the rez cost.
[trash]: Draw 1 card.
text_zhCN:
当你安装亡灵帮成员时，公司必须关闭一张卡牌。
当亡灵帮成员被卸载时，公司可以激活一张卡牌，忽略激活费用。
[trash]：补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: When you install Muertos Gang Member, the Corp must derez a card. When Muertos Gang Member is uninstalled, the Corp may rez a card, ignoring the rez cost. trash: Draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS: La Señora de las Sombras giveth and taketh away.
flavor_zhCN: 死荫女士自有予夺。

text_enUS: When you install this program, choose barrier, code gate, or sentry. When your discard phase ends, add this program to your grip. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice that has the chosen subtype.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本程序时，选择屏障、门禁或或警报。 当你的弃牌阶段结束时，将本程序加入你的操控器。 对接 → 1[credit]：破解一层具有所选择的子类型的防火墙上的1条子进程。
stripped_text: When you install this program, choose barrier, code gate, or sentry. When your discard phase ends, add this program to your grip. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice that has the chosen subtype.

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may remove Hyperdriver from the game and gain [click][click][click].
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以将超驱动移出游戏并获得[click][click][click]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may remove Hyperdriver from the game and gain click click click.
flavor_enUS: "It doesn't actually bend time. It just feels like it. That's relativity." -Hayley Kaplan
flavor_zhCN: “它并没有真正地弯曲时间。只是感觉像而已。那就是相对论。” —海莉·开普兰

text_enUS:
Test Ground can be advanced.
[trash]: Derez 1 card for each advancement token on Test Ground.
text_zhCN:
试验场能被推进。
[trash]：试验场上每有1枚推进标记，关闭一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Test Ground can be advanced. trash: Derez 1 card for each advancement token on Test Ground.
flavor_enUS:
"Isn't this wrong?"
"Not legally. They didn't read the fine print."
flavor_zhCN:
“这不是非正当的吗？”
“法理上来说不是。他们没有阅读附属细则。”

text_enUS: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. [interrupt] → The first time each turn the Runner would suffer core damage, increase that damage by 1.
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 每回合潜袭者第一次承受脑部伤害时，他/她承受1点额外的脑部伤害。
stripped_text: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. Interrupt -> The first time each turn the Runner would suffer core damage, increase that damage by 1.

text_enUS:
Allele Repression can be advanced.
[trash]: Swap 1 card in HQ with 1 card in Archives for each advancement token on Allele Repression.
text_zhCN:
等位基因抑制能被推进。
[trash]：等位基因抑制上每有1枚推进标记，将总部中的一张卡牌与档案库中的一张卡牌互换。
stripped_text: Allele Repression can be advanced. trash: Swap 1 card in HQ with 1 card in Archives for each advancement token on Allele Repression.

text_enUS: [trash]: You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, resolve 1 subroutine on a rezzed piece of ice protecting this server. Use this ability only during a run on this server.
text_zhCN: [trash]：你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，结算一层已激活的保护本服务器的防火墙上的一个子进程。仅能在对本服务器的潜袭中使用本能力。
stripped_text: trash: You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, resolve 1 subroutine on a rezzed piece of ice protecting this server. Use this ability only during a run on this server.

text_enUS:
Exposé can be advanced.
[trash]: Remove 1 bad publicity for each advancement token on Exposé.
text_zhCN:
揭露报道能被推进。
[trash]：揭露报道上每有1枚推进标记，移除1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: Expose can be advanced. trash: Remove 1 bad publicity for each advancement token on Expose.
flavor_enUS: "Is your neighbor secretly a violent criminal? The answer to this chilling question and more, right after the break." -Shannon Claire, SSN 5
flavor_zhCN: “你的邻居背地里是个暴力罪犯吗？想要知道这可怕问题的回答及更多精彩内容，休息片刻，马上回来。” —香侬·克莱尔，SSN 5台

text_enUS:
[subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.
[subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 如果潜袭者被锁定，终止本次潜袭。
[subroutine] 如果潜袭者被锁定，终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Subroutine End the run if the Runner is tagged. Subroutine End the run if the Runner is tagged.
flavor_enUS: Pa-pa-pa-chinko!
flavor_zhCN: 扒-扒-扒-金宫！

text_enUS:
Install Underway Renovation faceup.
Whenever you advance Underway Renovation, trash the top card of the Runner's stack (or top 2 cards instead if there are 4 or more advancement tokens on Underway Renovation).
text_zhCN:
面朝上安装革新暗底区。
每当你推进革新暗底区时，销毁潜袭者存储栈顶端的一张卡牌（或如果革新暗底区具有4枚或更多的推进标记，则改为顶端的两张卡牌）。
stripped_text: Install Underway Renovation faceup. Whenever you advance Underway Renovation, trash the top card of the Runner's stack (or top 2 cards instead if there are 4 or more advancement tokens on Underway Renovation).

text_enUS: Contract Killer can be advanced. If there are at least 2 advancement tokens on Contract Killer, it gains: "[click], [trash]: Trash a connection or do 2 meat damage."
stripped_text: Contract Killer can be advanced. If there are at least 2 advancement tokens on Contract Killer, it gains: "click, trash: Trash a connection or do 2 meat damage."
flavor_enUS: "You want no questions asked, hire someone else. I have two: who and how much?"
flavor_zhCN: “你想要不提问题，那请另寻高手。我可有两个问题：杀谁，给多少？”

text_enUS:
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_text: Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: "Let me tell you a secret. There's no such thing as impenetrable ice. It has to allow access, or else why is the server on the Network in the first place? But that doesn't mean they have to make it easy." -g00ru
flavor_zhCN: “让我告诉你个秘密。没有坚不可摧的防火墙这回事。它得允许读取，不然服务器当初为何要放在网上？不过那并不意味着他们要弄得很简单。” —精神0袖

text_enUS: Ice protecting this server cannot be bypassed. Cards in the root of and/or protecting this server cannot be exposed. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 保护本服务器的防火墙不能被略过。 本服务器内或保护本服务器的卡牌不能被揭示。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Ice protecting this server cannot be bypassed. Cards in the root of and/or protecting this server cannot be exposed. Limit 1 region per server.

text_enUS: When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on Trope. [click], remove Trope from the game: Shuffle 1 card from your heap into your stack for each power counter on Trope.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，放置1枚能量指示物到桥段上。 [click]，将桥段移出游戏：桥段上每有1枚能量指示物，将一张卡牌从你的堆阵洗入你的存储栈。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on Trope. click, remove Trope from the game: Shuffle 1 card from your heap into your stack for each power counter on Trope.
flavor_enUS: "Did you ever notice how everything goes in cycles? The stuff that's cool now was cool before. That's why I keep copy of everything!" -Princess Space Kitten
flavor_zhCN: “你可曾注意到事物在不断地循环？现在很酷的东西以前就很酷。这就是我全都有备份的原因！” —太空喵公主

text_enUS: Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, they trash the top card of R&D.
text_zhCN: 每当公司用一个议案计分时，他/她销毁存储栈顶端的一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, they trash the top card of R&D.
flavor_enUS: Don't you hate it when you know everything before it's even out?
flavor_zhCN: 在其问世之前就知道了一切，你不反感吗？

text_enUS:
When your turn begins, lose 1[credit].
When the Corp's turn begins, draw 1 card.
text_zhCN:
当你的回合开始时，失去1[credit]。
当公司的回合开始时，补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, lose 1 credit. When the Corp's turn begins, draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS: "Just a bunch of knockoffs for the touristos. The real designer stuff isn't sold on the street."
flavor_zhCN: “只是一堆给观光咖的仿货。真正的策划药品可不会在街上开卖。”

text_enUS:
When you install Rolodex, look at the top 5 cards of your stack and arrange them in any order.
When Rolodex is trashed, trash the top 3 cards of your stack.
text_zhCN:
当你安装名片夹时，查看你存储栈顶端的五张卡牌，并按任意顺序排列它们。
当名片夹被销毁时，销毁你存储栈顶端的三张卡牌。
stripped_text: When you install Rolodex, look at the top 5 cards of your stack and arrange them in any order. When Rolodex is trashed, trash the top 3 cards of your stack.
flavor_enUS: "I told you to lose my number!"
flavor_zhCN: “我告诉过你要把我的号码弄丢！”

text_enUS: Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, add Fan Site to your score area as an agenda worth 0 agenda points.
text_zhCN: 每当公司用一个议案计分时，将粉丝网站加入你的分数区，作为一个价值0点议案分数的议案。
stripped_text: Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, add Fan Site to your score area as an agenda worth 0 agenda points.
flavor_enUS: Your life is not your own, once you become famous on the Net.
flavor_zhCN: 一旦你在网上出了名，你的生活就不再属于自己。

text_enUS:
Film Critic can host a single agenda.
Whenever you access an agenda, you may host that agenda on Film Critic (the agenda is no longer being accessed and is uninstalled).
[click],[click]: Add an agenda hosted on Film Critic to your score area.
text_zhCN:
影评家能被附载一个议案。
每当你读取一个议案时，你可以将该议案附载到影评家上（该议案不再视为被读取并且被卸载）。
[click]，[click]：将附载在影评家上的一个议案加入你的分数区。
