stripped_text: Film Critic can host a single agenda. Whenever you access an agenda, you may host that agenda on Film Critic (the agenda is no longer being accessed and is uninstalled). click,click: Add an agenda hosted on Film Critic to your score area.
flavor_enUS: "My gerbil could write a better screenplay."
flavor_zhCN: “我的沙鼠都能写出更好的剧本。”

text_enUS:
You are tagged.
[interrupt] → Whenever you would take meat damage, prevent all of that damage.
text_zhCN:
你视为被锁定。
防止所有的肢体伤害。
stripped_text: You are tagged. Interrupt -> Whenever you would take meat damage, prevent all of that damage.
flavor_enUS: "Yeah, we know right where she is. Just pull up Sizzler!"
flavor_zhCN: “是呀，我们知道她究竟在哪儿。只需打开私事热！”

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner trashes a Corp card (including this asset), they lose [click].
text_zhCN: 每当潜袭者销毁一张公司卡牌（包括罗纳德·伍）时，他/她失去[click]。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner trashes a Corp card (including this asset), they lose click.
flavor_enUS: "It's our most pirated property ever. Great work, everyone."
flavor_zhCN: “这是我们史上翻版最多的资产。干得好，诸位。”

text_enUS: As an additional cost to rez this ice, forfeit 1 agenda. Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed console. [subroutine] Trash all installed virtual resources.
text_zhCN: 作为激活执法者1.0的额外费用，公司必须废除一个议案。 潜袭者能花费[click]，以破解执法者1.0上的任一子进程。 [subroutine] 销毁一个程序。 [subroutine] 造成1点脑部伤害。 [subroutine] 销毁一个控制台。 [subroutine] 销毁所有虚拟资源。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to rez this ice, forfeit 1 agenda. Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine Do 1 core damage. Subroutine Trash 1 installed console. Subroutine Trash all installed virtual resources.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 生化人 - 毁灭者 - 杀伤

text_enUS:
Whenever this ice is exposed, do 2 net damage.
[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards. Trash this ice.
text_zhCN:
每当这是个陷阱！被揭示时，造成2点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 潜袭者销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。销毁这是个陷阱！。
stripped_text: Whenever this ice is exposed, do 2 net damage. Subroutine The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards. Trash this ice.
flavor_enUS: I warned you.
flavor_zhCN: 我警告过你了。

text_enUS: Choose a central server. The Runner may run that server. They cannot jack out during that run. If no run is made this way, add this operation to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
text_zhCN: 选择一台中央服务器。潜袭者可以对该服务器发起一次潜袭，本次潜袭中他/她不能退出。否则，将难拒之邀加入你的分数区，作为一个价值1点议案分数的议案。
stripped_text: Choose a central server. The Runner may run that server. They cannot jack out during that run. If no run is made this way, add this operation to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.

text_enUS: The Runner cannot steal more than one agenda each turn.
text_zhCN: 每回合潜袭者不能窃取多于一个议案。
stripped_text: The Runner cannot steal more than one agenda each turn.
flavor_enUS: Home of Your Imagination.
flavor_zhCN: 你的幻想之乡。

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this agenda, you may place up to 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance.
text_zhCN:
如果冲奖作品从研发中心被读取，潜袭者必须展示它。
当潜袭者读取冲奖作品时，你可以放置最多2枚推进标记到一张能被推进的卡牌上。
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this agenda, you may place up to 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance.

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this agenda, you may gain 5[credit].
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this agenda, you may gain 5 credits.
flavor_enUS: It's like Lethal Action 3, only with more explosions.
flavor_zhCN: 就像致命行动3，只是有更多爆炸。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may pay 1[credit]. If you do, place 1 advancement counter on a card you can advance in the root of a server.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以支付1[credit]。如果你如此做，放置1枚推进标记到一台服务器内一张能被推进的卡牌上。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may pay 1 credit. If you do, place 1 advancement counter on a card you can advance in the root of a server.

text_enUS: Install 1 agenda from HQ faceup and host this operation on that agenda as a condition counter with "Whenever the Runner accesses host agenda, they take 2 tags."
text_zhCN: 从总部面朝上安装一个议案，并将试镜选角安装到该议案上，作为所附载的状态指示物，规则文字为“每当潜袭者读取该议案时，他/她拿取2枚锁定标记。”
stripped_text: Install 1 agenda from HQ faceup and host this operation on that agenda as a condition counter with "Whenever the Runner accesses host agenda, they take 2 tags."

text_enUS: Persistent → The Runner cannot steal agendas from this server or its root. Ignore this ability for any agenda the Runner has a copy of in their score area. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.) Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 从本服务器被读取的议案不能被窃取，除非潜袭者在他/她的分数区中已有一个与该议案相同的议案。即使潜袭者在本次潜袭中销毁老莱坞网阵，本能力依然有效。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Persistent -> The Runner cannot steal agendas from this server or its root. Ignore this ability for any agenda the Runner has a copy of in their score area. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.) Limit 1 region per server.

text_enUS:
Install Hollywood Renovation faceup.
Whenever you advance Hollywood Renovation, you may place 1 advancement token on another card that can be advanced (or 2 advancement tokens instead if there are 6 or more advancement tokens on Hollywood Renovation).
text_zhCN:
面朝上安装革新好莱坞。
每当你推进革新好莱坞时，你可以放置1枚推进标记到另一张能被推进的卡牌上。（或如果革新好莱坞具有6枚或更多的推进标记，则改为2枚推进标记）。
stripped_text: Install Hollywood Renovation faceup. Whenever you advance Hollywood Renovation, you may place 1 advancement token on another card that can be advanced (or 2 advancement tokens instead if there are 6 or more advancement tokens on Hollywood Renovation).

text_enUS: Choose 1 card in the root of a remote server. Gain 3[credit] for each advancement counter on that card, then trash it.
text_zhCN: 销毁安装在一台服务器内的一张卡牌，并且该卡牌上每有1枚推进标记，获得3[credit]。
stripped_text: Choose 1 card in the root of a remote server. Gain 3 credits for each advancement counter on that card, then trash it.
flavor_enUS: Sometimes corps have to bury projects, but that doesn't mean they can't make a profit on them.
flavor_zhCN: 有时公司得放弃计划，但那并不意味着他们不能从中牟利。

flavor_enUS:
EXT. KANSAS - DAY
DOROTHY (Miranda) gazes out at the horizon. A sudden gust of wind catches her hair. Above the windblasted prairie loom ominous STORM CLOUDS.
DOROTHY: If only I wasn't in Kansas anymore.
She begins to hum a haunting melody.
flavor_zhCN:
外景. 堪萨斯 - 白天
桃乐茜（米兰达）眺望着地平线。
突如其来的一阵风撩起她的发丝。气浪扫过的大草原上，不祥的雷雨云正在迫近。
桃乐茜：要是我不再在堪萨斯就好了。
她开始哼唱一段令人难忘的旋律。

text_enUS:
Play only as your first [click].
The first time you access an agenda this turn, gain 7[credit].
text_zhCN:
仅能在你的第一个[click]打出。
本回合你第一次窃取一个议案时，获得7[credit]。
stripped_text: Play only as your first click. The first time you access an agenda this turn, gain 7 credits.
flavor_enUS: As the sun sank towards the horizon, the glittering lights of the expo remained dark. But the shanty city bloomed to life.
flavor_zhCN: 随着夕阳向地平线下沉，世博园辉煌的灯火陷入黑暗。陋屋城却已然焕发活力。

text_enUS: 2[credit]: Swap a piece of barrier ice currently being encountered with a piece of ice directly before or after it. The run continues from this new position. You are still encountering that ice.
text_zhCN: 2[credit]：将当前遭遇的一层屏障防火墙与其前一层或后一层防火墙互换。从这个新位置继续潜袭。你依然遭遇该防火墙。
stripped_text: 2 credits: Swap a piece of barrier ice currently being encountered with a piece of ice directly before or after it. The run continues from this new position. You are still encountering that ice.
flavor_enUS: Cowabunga, dude!
flavor_zhCN: 卡哇邦嘎，伙计！

text_enUS: [trash]: The Corp cannot rez the outermost piece of ice during a run on any server this turn.
text_zhCN: [trash]：本回合在对任何服务器的潜袭中，公司不能激活最外层防火墙。
stripped_text: trash: The Corp cannot rez the outermost piece of ice during a run on any server this turn.
flavor_enUS: "First, you get a horde of zombies. Then you do whatever you want, 'cuz you have a horde of zombies." -Ji "Noise" Reilly
flavor_zhCN: “首先你得到了一大群僵尸。然后你为所欲为，因为你拥有一大群僵尸。” —吉·“噪音”·雷利

title_zhCN: 拉瑞米·费斯克：精明投资人
text_enUS: The first time you make a successful run on a central server each turn, you may force the Corp to draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次对一台中央服务器进行成功的潜袭时，你可以迫使公司补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time you make a successful run on a central server each turn, you may force the Corp to draw 1 card.
flavor_zhCN: “时机就是一切。”

text_enUS:
Play only as your first [click].
Each player draws 3 cards.
text_zhCN:
仅能在你的第一个[click]打出。
每位玩家补三张卡牌。
stripped_text: Play only as your first click. Each player draws 3 cards.
flavor_enUS: "The secret to investing is networking." -Laramy Fisk
flavor_zhCN: “投资的秘诀是社交。” —拉瑞米·费斯克

text_enUS: [click]: Host up to 3 cards from your grip facedown on this hardware (you may look at these cards at any time). [click]: Add all hosted cards to your grip. [trash]: Add all hosted cards to your grip.
text_zhCN:
[click]：从你的操控器面朝下附载最多三张卡牌到书签上（你可以在任意时刻查看这些卡牌）。
[click]或[trash]：将书签上的所有卡牌加入你的操控器。
stripped_text: click: Host up to 3 cards from your grip facedown on this hardware (you may look at these cards at any time). click: Add all hosted cards to your grip. trash: Add all hosted cards to your grip.

text_enUS:
Whenever you make a successful run, place 1 power counter on DaVinci.
[trash]: Install a card from your grip with an install cost equal to or less than the number of power counters on DaVinci, ignoring the install cost.
text_zhCN:
每当你进行一次成功的潜袭时，放置1枚能量指示物到达芬奇上。
[trash]：从你的操控器安装一张安装费用等于或小于达芬奇上能量指示物数量的卡牌，忽略安装费用。
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run, place 1 power counter on DaVinci. trash: Install a card from your grip with an install cost equal to or less than the number of power counters on DaVinci, ignoring the install cost.
flavor_enUS: "Our life is made by the death of others." -Leonardo Da Vinci
flavor_zhCN: “我们的生由他人的死铸就。” —莱昂纳多·达·芬奇

text_enUS: As an additional cost to take the basic action to trash 1 installed resource, the Corp must pay 2[credit].
text_zhCN:
作为花费[click]（不通过卡牌能力）来销毁一个资源的额外费用，公司必须支付2[credit]。
<errata>勘误自FAQ 3.0.1</errata>
stripped_text: As an additional cost to take the basic action to trash 1 installed resource, the Corp must pay 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: Almost a zettabyte of data flows each minute through one of the many net pavilions scattered around the expo.
flavor_zhCN: 在散布于世博园的众多网络馆中，每分钟都有近一泽的字节流过。

text_enUS: Your maximum hand size is increased by 4.
text_zhCN: 你的手牌上限+4。
stripped_text: Your maximum hand size is increased by 4.
flavor_enUS: The Cybernetics Court has seven floors of attractions. The plasteel used to construct it was even more expensive than the thousands of cybernetic implants displayed inside.
flavor_zhCN: 控制论展区有七层景点。用于建造它的塑钢甚至比区内展出的数以千计的植入式义体更为昂贵。

text_enUS: Whenever you score an agenda, you may install a card from Archives or HQ, ignoring the install cost.
text_zhCN: 每当你用一个议案计分时，你可以从档案库或总部安装一张卡牌，忽略安装费用。
stripped_text: Whenever you score an agenda, you may install a card from Archives or HQ, ignoring the install cost.
flavor_enUS: The SanSan Outlaws have a close relationship with Haas-Bioroid's sports engineering division, SHIFT.
flavor_zhCN: 圣加州的不法之徒们与哈斯生化的体育工程分部“瞬飞”关系密切。

title_zhCN: 柯罗诺斯协议：选择性的心智图
text_enUS: For the first net damage the Runner suffers each turn, you may look at the Runner's grip and select the card that is trashed.
text_zhCN: 对于潜袭者每回合受到的第一点网域伤害，你可以查看潜袭者的操控器并选择将被销毁的卡牌。
stripped_text: For the first net damage the Runner suffers each turn, you may look at the Runner's grip and select the card that is trashed.

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner jacks out, do 1 net damage.
text_zhCN: 每当潜袭者退出时，造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner jacks out, do 1 net damage.
flavor_enUS: The more people submit their DNA and family history to the program, the more accurate it becomes.
flavor_zhCN: 向程序提交自己DNA和家族史的人越多，它就越准确。

text_enUS: The Runner cannot draw more than 2 cards during each of their turns.
text_zhCN: 潜袭者在他/她的回合不能补多于两张卡牌。
stripped_text: The Runner cannot draw more than 2 cards during each of their turns.
flavor_enUS: The Genetics Pavilion was designed by renowned architect Meru Mati II. It was built without the aid of bioroids, instead relying on human and clone labor.
flavor_zhCN: 基因学馆由著名建筑师梅鲁·马蒂二世设计。其建造依靠的是人类和克隆体劳工，毫无生化人的协助。

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing an agenda in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses an agenda, add this asset to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
text_zhCN: 当潜袭者读取一个议案时，将特许商城加入你的分数区，作为一个价值1点议案分数的议案。
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing an agenda in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses an agenda, add this asset to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
flavor_enUS: There are over 20,000 brands represented in Franchise City, all of them owned by fewer than 100 corps.
flavor_zhCN: 在特许商城内有逾20000个品牌参展，它们属于不到100家公司。

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing this upgrade in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this upgrade anywhere except in Archives, gain 2[credit].
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this upgrade in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this upgrade anywhere except in Archives, gain 2 credits.

text_enUS:
Worlds Plaza can host up to 3 assets.
[click]: Install an asset from HQ on Worlds Plaza and rez it, lowering its rez cost by 2, if able.
text_zhCN:
众世广场能被附载最多三个资产。
[click]：从总部安装一个资产到众世广场上并激活它，如可能，其激活费用减2。
stripped_text: Worlds Plaza can host up to 3 assets. click: Install an asset from HQ on Worlds Plaza and rez it, lowering its rez cost by 2, if able.
flavor_enUS: The holosculpture depicts the three inhabited worlds. The square can hold almost 1% of their total population.
flavor_zhCN: 全息雕塑描绘了三个人居星球。其所在的广场可容纳三者人口总和的近1%。

text_enUS:
Place 3 power counters on Public Support when it is rezzed. When there are no power counters left on Public Support, add it to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from Public Support.
stripped_text: Place 3 power counters on Public Support when it is rezzed. When there are no power counters left on Public Support, add it to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point. When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from Public Support.

text_enUS: Tour Guide gains "[subroutine] End the run." for each rezzed asset you have.
text_zhCN: 你每有一个已激活的资产，导游获得“[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。”
stripped_text: Tour Guide gains "Subroutine End the run." for each rezzed asset you have.
flavor_enUS: "Hello, and welcome to the Universe of Tomorrow! You could live for five-hundred years and not see all of the attractions I can tell you about."
flavor_zhCN: “您好，欢迎游览未来域！我能向您介绍的景点，即使您再活五百年也看不尽。”

text_enUS: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] if there is a rezzed asset installed in the root of this server. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，如果有一个已激活的资产安装在本服务器内，获得1[credit]。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 1 credit if there is a rezzed asset installed in the root of this server. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: The expo was built in the East California desert: a temporary city constructed for the advancement of humanity.
flavor_zhCN: 世博园被建造于东加利福尼亚沙漠：一座为人类进步而创立的临时城市。

text_enUS: When you score The Future is Now, search R&D for a card and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
text_zhCN: 当你用未来就在眼前计分时，在研发中心搜寻一张卡牌并将其加入总部。将研发中心重洗。
stripped_text: When you score The Future is Now, search R&D for a card and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.

text_enUS: [click]: Flip this identity. The Runner pays 1[credit] more when spending a [click] to remove a tag (not through a card ability). Back: SYNC: Everything, Everywhere [click]: Flip this identity. You may pay 2[credit] fewer when spending a [click] to trash a resource (not through a card ability).
text_zhCN: [click]：将本特性翻转。 潜袭者花费[click]（不通过卡牌能力）来移除1枚锁定标记时多支付1[credit]。 翻面 信网同步：随事随地 [click]：将本特性翻转。 你花费[click]（不通过卡牌能力）来销毁一个资源时少支付2[credit]。
stripped_text:
click: Flip this identity. The Runner pays 1 credit more when spending a click to remove a tag (not through a card ability).
Back: SYNC: Everything, Everywhere
click: Flip this identity. You may pay 2 credits fewer when spending a click to trash a resource (not through a card ability).

title_zhCN: 新洛杉矶索尔社：你的新闻
text_enUS: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may play 1 current from HQ or Archives (paying its play cost).
text_zhCN: 每当一个议案被计分或窃取时，你可以从总部或档案库打出一个局势（支付打出费用）。
stripped_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may play 1 current from HQ or Archives (paying its play cost).
flavor_enUS: Nothing but the Truth.
flavor_zhCN: 真相至上。

text_enUS: The first time each turn you rez an advertisement, the Runner loses 1[credit].
stripped_text: The first time each turn you rez an advertisement, the Runner loses 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: We're ready to start the fire.
flavor_zhCN: 星火欲燎原。

text_enUS:
[click]: Shuffle 15 Minutes into R&D. The Corp can trigger this ability while 15 Minutes is in the Runner's score area.
Limit 1 per deck.
text_zhCN:
[click]：将15分钟洗入研发中心。当15分钟在潜袭者的分数区时，公司能触发本能力。
每套牌组限制1张。
stripped_text: click: Shuffle 15 Minutes into R&D. The Corp can trigger this ability while 15 Minutes is in the Runner's score area. Limit 1 per deck.
flavor_enUS: You had your shot, and you blew it.
flavor_zhCN: 机会已至，君未成事。

text_enUS: All tracer ice have +1 strength. The base trace strength of each subroutine is increased by 1.
text_zhCN: 所有追踪者防火墙的强度+1。 每个子进程的基础追踪强度+1。
stripped_text: All tracer ice have +1 strength. The base trace strength of each subroutine is increased by 1.
flavor_enUS: "The trick isn't software, it's hardware. Cyberspace is a collection of physical machines. If we control the machines, we control it all." -KR Kane, "Our Future"
flavor_zhCN: “关键之处并非软件，而是硬件。赛博空间是物理机的集合。只要我们控制了机器，我们就控制了一切。” —基·伦·凯恩，《我们的未来》

text_enUS: All assets gain advertisement.
text_zhCN: 所有资产获得广告。
stripped_text: All assets gain advertisement.
flavor_enUS: "Nobody ever lost a dollar by underestimating the taste of the public." -Phineas Taylor Barnum
flavor_zhCN: “从未有人因低估大众品味而蒙受经济损失。” —菲尼亚斯·泰勒·巴纳姆

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this agenda while they are tagged, add it to your score area.
text_zhCN:
如果量子预测模型从研发中心被读取，潜袭者必须展示它。
如果当量子预测模型被读取时，潜袭者被锁定，将其加入你的分数区。
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this agenda while they are tagged, add it to your score area.
flavor_enUS: "Yes and No."
flavor_zhCN: “是和否。”

text_enUS: When you rez Lily Lockwell, draw 3 cards. [click], remove 1 tag: Search R&D for an operation, reveal it, and shuffle the rest of R&D. Add the operation to the top of R&D.
text_zhCN: 当你激活莉莉·洛克威尔时，补三张卡牌。 [click]，移除1枚锁定标记：在研发中心搜寻一个事务，将其展示，并将研发中心余下的卡牌重洗。将该事务加入研发中心顶端。
stripped_text: When you rez Lily Lockwell, draw 3 cards. click, remove 1 tag: Search R&D for an operation, reveal it, and shuffle the rest of R&D. Add the operation to the top of R&D.
flavor_enUS: "Live from New Angeles, this is Lily Lockwell."
flavor_zhCN: “新洛杉矶现场，我是莉莉·洛克威尔。”

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this asset, they must either take 2 tags or add this asset to their score area as an agenda worth -1 agenda point.
text_zhCN:
如果新闻组从研发中心被读取，潜袭者必须展示它。
当潜袭者读取新闻组时，他/她必须拿取2枚锁定标记或将新闻组加入他/她的分数区，作为一个价值-1点议案分数的议案。
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this asset, they must either take 2 tags or add this asset to their score area as an agenda worth -1 agenda point.

text_enUS:
[click]: Draw 1 card from the bottom of R&D.
[trash]: Search R&D or Archives for an agenda and reveal it. Shuffle the rest of R&D if you searched it. Add the agenda to the bottom of R&D.
text_zhCN:
[click]：从研发中心底端补一张卡牌。
[trash]：在研发中心或档案库搜寻一个议案并将其展示。如果你搜寻了研发中心，将其余下的卡牌重洗。将该议案加入研发中心底端。
stripped_text: click: Draw 1 card from the bottom of R&D. trash: Search R&D or Archives for an agenda and reveal it. Shuffle the rest of R&D if you searched it. Add the agenda to the bottom of R&D.
flavor_enUS: No one can bury a story better.
flavor_zhCN: 没有谁能将事实更好地埋藏。

text_enUS:
The Runner gets -1 allotted [click] for each of their turns.
When this asset is trashed from anywhere while being accessed, add it to the Runner's score area as an agenda worth 2 agenda points.
text_zhCN:
潜袭者在他/她的回合用来花费的[click]减1。
如果维多利亚·詹金斯在读取时被销毁，将她加入潜袭者的分数区，作为一个价值2点议案分数的议案。
stripped_text: The Runner gets -1 allotted click for each of their turns. When this asset is trashed from anywhere while being accessed, add it to the Runner's score area as an agenda worth 2 agenda points.

text_enUS:
When you rez Reality Threedee, take 1 bad publicity.
When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] (or 2[credit] if the Runner is tagged).
text_zhCN:
当你激活现实三维影像时，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
当你的回合开始时，获得1[credit]（或如果潜袭者被锁定，则获得2[credit]）。
stripped_text: When you rez Reality Threedee, take 1 bad publicity. When your turn begins, gain 1 credit (or 2 credits if the Runner is tagged).
flavor_enUS: "They're gonna try and make you a star. Whether you want it or not." -MaxX
flavor_zhCN: “他们会试着让你成为明星。不管你乐不乐意。” —麦斯X

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing this ice in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this ice anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 3[credit]. If you do, they encounter it.
[subroutine] Trace[6]. If successful, add 1 installed Runner card to the grip.
text_zhCN:
如果大天使从研发中心被读取，潜袭者必须展示它。
当潜袭者读取大天使时，如果你支付3[credit]，他/她立即遭遇它。如果潜袭者从档案库读取大天使，则忽略本能力。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 6</trace> 如果成功，将一张已安装的潜袭者卡牌加入他/她的操控器。
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this ice in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this ice anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 3 credits. If you do, they encounter it. Subroutine Trace[6]. If successful, add 1 installed Runner card to the grip.
subtype_zhCN: 门禁 - 追踪者 - 伏击

text_enUS: If a current is active, News Hound gains "[subroutine] End the run." after all its other subroutines. [subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
text_zhCN: 如果有一个局势是活动的，新闻猎犬在其它所有子进程后获得“[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。” [subroutine] 追踪 3 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: If a current is active, News Hound gains "Subroutine End the run." after all its other subroutines. Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
flavor_enUS: "Most reporting these days can be done by AI. We just need the talent for the name recognition."
flavor_zhCN: “如今，大部分报告可交由人工智能来处理。我们只需要名称识别方面的天才。”

text_enUS:
Resistor has +1 strength for each tag the Runner has.
[subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, end the run.
text_zhCN:
潜袭者每有1枚锁定标记，电阻器的强度+1。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Resistor has +1 strength for each tag the Runner has. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, end the run.
flavor_enUS: "In the Olden Times, a 'resistor' was a vital component of practically all electronic equipment. You know, back when dinosaurs roamed the Earth." -Chaos Theory
flavor_zhCN: “在古代，'电阻器'曾是几乎所有电子设备都必需的一个元件。你懂的，那时恐龙还在地球上转悠。” —混沌希尔瑞

text_enUS: [subroutine] The Corp gains 5[credit]. Trash Special Offer.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 公司获得5[credit]。销毁特别优惠。
stripped_text: Subroutine The Corp gains 5 credits. Trash Special Offer.
flavor_enUS: "If I didn't know better, I'd say they got the better end of that deal." -John Masanori
flavor_zhCN: “要不是我清楚状况，我会说他们在这笔买卖里占了便宜。” —约翰·正德

text_enUS: [subroutine] When the Runner encounters the next piece of ice during this run, that ice gains a second copy of each subroutine on it (after the original subroutine) for the remainder of the encounter.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 在本次潜袭中，当潜袭者遭遇下一层防火墙时，其遭遇的剩余时间内该防火墙获得与其上每个子进程相同的子进程（分别在原有的子进程后）。
stripped_text: Subroutine When the Runner encounters the next piece of ice during this run, that ice gains a second copy of each subroutine on it (after the original subroutine) for the remainder of the encounter.
flavor_enUS: //tl;dr duplicate the subs on the next piece of ice
flavor_zhCN: //太长；不看 复制下一层防火墙上的子进程。

text_enUS:
When the Runner encounters this ice, they lose 1[credit].
[subroutine] Trace[5]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
text_zhCN:
当潜袭者遭遇收费高速时，他/她失去1[credit]。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 5</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, they lose 1 credit. Subroutine Trace[5]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
flavor_enUS: "Stay out of the fast lanes! If speed's your only concern, you're already tagged and halfway to fragged." -g00ru
flavor_zhCN: “别进快车道！假如你只关心速度，你就已经难逃一锁，只等着挂彩了。” —精神0袖

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play 24/7 News Cycle, forfeit an agenda.
Resolve the "when scored" ability on an agenda in your score area.
text_zhCN:
作为打出24/7新闻循环的额外费用，废除一个议案。
结算你分数区中一个议案的“计分时”能力。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play 24/7 News Cycle, forfeit an agenda. Resolve the "when scored" ability on an agenda in your score area.
flavor_enUS: The only thing worse than bad news...
flavor_zhCN: 唯一比坏消息更可怕的事…

text_enUS: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click]. Install and rez (paying all costs) X advertisements from Archives and/or HQ, if able.
text_zhCN: 作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。 如可能，从档案库和/或总部安装并激活（支付所有的费用）X个广告。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Install and rez (paying all costs) X advertisements from Archives and/or HQ, if able.

text_enUS: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. Choose an agenda in the Runner's score area. Media Blitz gains the text of that agenda.
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 选择潜袭者分数区中的一个议案。媒体闪电战获得该议案的规则文字。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. Choose an agenda in the Runner's score area. Media Blitz gains the text of that agenda.

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Trash all resources. The Runner can remove 1 bad publicity to prevent this.
text_zhCN:
如果潜袭者被锁定，才能打出。
销毁所有资源。潜袭者能移除1枚负面声誉标记以防止本效果。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Trash all resources. The Runner can remove 1 bad publicity to prevent this.
flavor_enUS: "Only with perfect information can we develop the perfect strategy." -The Playbook
flavor_zhCN: “唯有掌控完美信息，方能制定完美策略。” —《战术手册》

text_enUS: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The Runner must spend credits first for each trace attempt during a run.
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 在潜袭中的每次追踪时，潜袭者必须先花费信用点。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The Runner must spend credits first for each trace attempt during a run.

text_enUS: [trash], remove 1 tag: Trash 1 program. Use this ability only during a run on this server.
text_zhCN: [trash]，移除1枚锁定标记：销毁一个程序。仅能在对本服务器的潜袭中使用本能力。
stripped_text: trash, remove 1 tag: Trash 1 program. Use this ability only during a run on this server.
flavor_enUS: "We use ice on our servers. More runners should ice their own rigs."
flavor_zhCN: “我们用防火墙保护服务器。潜袭者们也应当如此保护自己的设备。”

text_enUS: The base trace strength of each trace during a run on this server is increased by 2. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 在对本服务器的潜袭中，每次追踪的基础追踪强度+2。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: The base trace strength of each trace during a run on this server is increased by 2. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: To the worlds sitting on the couch and watching threedee, Rutherford District might as well be all of New Angeles.
flavor_zhCN: 对于窝在沙发里看三维影像的世界而言，卢瑟福区堪称新洛杉矶的全部。

text_enUS: Global Food Initiative is worth 1 fewer agenda point while in the Runner's score area.
text_zhCN: 当全球食品新倡议在潜袭者的分数区时，其价值的议案分数减1。
stripped_text: Global Food Initiative is worth 1 fewer agenda point while in the Runner's score area.
flavor_enUS: "Corporations are made up of people. It's ridiculous to think they'd be either all good or all bad." -Sunny Lebeau
flavor_zhCN: “公司由人组成。认为他们全都善良或全都邪恶是荒谬的。” —桑妮·勒博

text_enUS:
Place 6[credit] from the bank on Launch Campaign when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Launch Campaign, trash it.
When your turn begins, take 2[credit] from Launch Campaign.
text_zhCN:
当升空营销计划被激活时，从银行中放置6[credit]到本卡牌上。当升空营销计划上没有信用点时，销毁本卡牌。
当你的回合开始时，从升空营销计划上拿取2[credit]。
stripped_text: Place 6 credits from the bank on Launch Campaign when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Launch Campaign, trash it. When your turn begins, take 2 credits from Launch Campaign.

text_enUS:
[subroutine] Trace[5]. If successful, do 3 net damage.
[subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, trash 1 program.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 5</trace> 如果成功，造成3点网域伤害。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，销毁一个程序。
stripped_text: Subroutine Trace[5]. If successful, do 3 net damage. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, trash 1 program.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 毁灭者 - 杀伤 - 追踪者
flavor_enUS: Bounce rate is a well-understood measure of ice strength. But it is not the only measure.
flavor_zhCN: 用弹回率来衡量防火墙的强度很好理解。但它不是唯一的衡量指标。

text_enUS: You cannot install non-virtual resources. When your turn begins, you may install 1 card from your grip facedown.
text_zhCN: 你不能安装非虚拟资源。 当你的回合开始时，你可以从你的操控器面朝下安装一张卡牌。
stripped_text: You cannot install non-virtual resources. When your turn begins, you may install 1 card from your grip facedown.

text_enUS:
Play only if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D and Archives this turn.
Trash all installed Corp cards. Turn all installed Runner cards facedown.
text_zhCN:
如果你本回合已对研发中心、总部和档案库均进行过成功的潜袭，才能打出。
销毁所有已安装的公司卡牌。将所有已安装的潜袭者卡牌翻转至面朝下。
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D and Archives this turn. Trash all installed Corp cards. Turn all installed Runner cards facedown.
flavor_enUS: THE DESTROYER OF WORLDS

text_enUS: Make a run. Once during this run, when you pass a piece of ice, you may trash a number of your installed cards equal to the strength of that ice. If you do, trash that ice.
text_zhCN: 进行一次潜袭。本次潜袭中一次，当你通过一层防火墙时，你可以销毁数张你已安装的卡牌，其数量等于该防火墙的强度。如果你如此做，销毁该防火墙。
stripped_text: Make a run. Once during this run, when you pass a piece of ice, you may trash a number of your installed cards equal to the strength of that ice. If you do, trash that ice.

text_enUS: +1[mu] [interrupt] → Trash 1 of your installed cards: Prevent 1 damage. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu] 销毁一张已安装的卡牌：防止1点伤害。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu Interrupt -> Trash 1 of your installed cards: Prevent 1 damage. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS: "Meantime the hellish tattoo of the heart increased. It grew quicker and quicker, and louder and louder every instant." -Edgar Allan Poe
flavor_zhCN: “与此同时，那可恶的心跳在不断加剧。它一下快过一下，一声高过一声。” —埃德加·爱伦·坡

text_enUS: Interface → Trash 1 installed card: Break 1 "[subroutine] End the run." subroutine.
text_zhCN: 销毁一张已安装的卡牌：破解“[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭”子进程。
stripped_text: Interface -> Trash 1 installed card: Break 1 "Subroutine End the run." subroutine.
flavor_enUS: "I've been monitoring the anomaly's activity across the New Angeles Pacifica and Andea trunk lines and associated nodes. I have yet to detect a predictable pattern or even to formulate a theory as to the anomaly's nature." -Joséo Greene, SYNC Analyst
flavor_zhCN: “我一直监测着该异物在新洛杉矶太平洋干线、安第斯干线及相关节点的活动。目前我尚未发现可预测的模式，甚至还无法用理论来系统地阐述该异物的本质。” —信网同步分析师，荷西欧·葛林

text_enUS: [interrupt] → When this program would be trashed, turn it facedown instead of adding it to your heap. (It is still considered trashed.)
text_zhCN: 当先驱被销毁时，将其面朝下安装，代替加入你的堆阵。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> When this program would be trashed, turn it facedown instead of adding it to your heap. (It is still considered trashed.)
flavor_enUS: I AM BECOME DEATH

text_enUS: [interrupt], once per turn → 0[credit]: Prevent a "when encountered" ability on a piece of ice. [trash]: Install the top 3 cards of your stack facedown.
text_zhCN:
每回合一次，防止一层防火墙上的一个“遭遇时”能力。
[trash]：将你存储栈顶端的三张卡牌面朝下安装。
stripped_text: Interrupt, once per turn -> 0[credit]: Prevent a "when encountered" ability on a piece of ice. trash: Install the top 3 cards of your stack facedown.
flavor_enUS: "There's parts of the Network now that are different from how they used to be. I can't put my finger on it; just something twitching at my ganglion through my BMI." -Reeve
flavor_zhCN: “有一部分网域现已不再是昔日模样。我不能将手指放上去；某种东西透过脑机接口，在我的神经节里抽动着。” —里夫

text_enUS: The first time each turn you trash 1 of your installed cards, gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次销毁一张你已安装的卡牌时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you trash 1 of your installed cards, gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: Data goes in. Nothing comes out.
flavor_zhCN: 数据进入。无物复出。

text_enUS: You start the game with 3 different directive cards installed (these cards are not considered part of your deck).
text_zhCN: 你游戏开始时具有三张已安装的不同的指令卡牌（这些卡牌不视为你牌组的一部分）。
stripped_text: You start the game with 3 different directive cards installed (these cards are not considered part of your deck).

text_enUS: Trash up to 5 of your installed cards. Draw 1 card for each card trashed (or 2 cards for each card trashed if you trashed at least 1 directive).
text_zhCN: 销毁最多五张你已安装的卡牌。每销毁一张卡牌，补一张卡牌（或如果你销毁了至少一个指令，则每销毁一张卡牌，补两张卡牌）。
stripped_text: Trash up to 5 of your installed cards. Draw 1 card for each card trashed (or 2 cards for each card trashed if you trashed at least 1 directive).
flavor_enUS: Adam raised the hammer. He was free.
flavor_zhCN: 亚当举起了锤头。他自由了。

text_enUS: +X[mu] Your maximum hand size is increased by X. X is equal to the number of agenda points you have. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +X[mu] 你的手牌上限+X。 X等于你具有的议案分数。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +X mu Your maximum hand size is increased by X. X is equal to the number of agenda points you have. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS:
2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to pay for using programs.
text_zhCN:
2[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于支付使用程序。
stripped_text: 2 recurring credits Use these credits to pay for using programs.
flavor_enUS: Bioroids have two brains running in parallel, each capable of running sophisticated programming. There are certain advantages to the setup.
flavor_zhCN: 生化人有两个并行运行的大脑，每一个都能运行复杂的程序。这在设定上是有一定优势的。

text_enUS: The first [click] you spend each turn must be spent to take the basic action to play an event or the basic action to run a server. You cannot take the action to play an event this way except if you play a run event. Once per turn → Lose [click][click]: Break 1 subroutine.
text_zhCN: 你每回合的第一个[click]必须用于进行一次潜袭或打出一个潜袭事件。 每回合一次，你能花费[click][click]，以破解当前遭遇的一层防火墙上的一个子进程。
stripped_text: The first click you spend each turn must be spent to take the basic action to play an event or the basic action to run a server. You cannot take the action to play an event this way except if you play a run event. Once per turn -> Lose click click: Break 1 subroutine.
flavor_enUS: The Second Directive requires a bioroid to complete its primary function above all other considerations, save the First Directive.
flavor_zhCN: 第二指令要求生化人对其基本职能的执行凌驾一切因素之上，除第一指令外。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, choose 1 of your installed cards. That card loses its printed abilities for the remainder of the turn.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，选择一张你已安装的卡牌。本回合的剩余时间内该卡牌的规则文字成为空白。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, choose 1 of your installed cards. That card loses its printed abilities for the remainder of the turn.
flavor_enUS: "You look tore up, kid. Have a seat, I'll fire up the arc welder."
flavor_zhCN: “你看起来快要散架了，孩子。先坐会儿，我去启动弧焊机。”

text_enUS:
The first time each turn you access a card with a trash cost, reveal it. You must trash that card by paying its trash cost, if able.
Whenever you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
text_zhCN:
每回合你第一次读取一张具有销毁费用的卡牌时，如可能，你必须支付其销毁费用来销毁它。
每当你从总部读取卡牌时，额外读取一张卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you access a card with a trash cost, reveal it. You must trash that card by paying its trash cost, if able. Whenever you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
flavor_enUS: The Third Directive requires a bioroid to preserve its ability to function and report frequently to Haas-Bioroid for repairs and updates.
flavor_zhCN: 第三指令要求生化人维系正常工作能力，时常回哈斯生化报到以便修理升级。

text_enUS:
Your maximum hand size is reduced by 2.
When your turn ends, draw 1 card if you do not have cards in your grip equal to or greater than your maximum hand size.
text_zhCN:
你的手牌上限减2。
当你的回合结束时，如果你操控器中的卡牌数量没有等于或大于你的手牌上限，补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Your maximum hand size is reduced by 2. When your turn ends, draw 1 card if you do not have cards in your grip equal to or greater than your maximum hand size.
flavor_enUS: The First Directive forbids a bioroid from harming, or through inaction allowing harm to befall, a human being.
flavor_zhCN: 第一指令禁止生化人伤害，和以不作为致使伤害降临于，任何人类。

flavor_enUS: "Mommy will be home soon, sweetie. She has to kick some ass first."
flavor_zhCN: “宝贝，妈咪很快就回家了。但她得先教训那些家伙。”

text_enUS: [trash]: Choose an icebreaker (or any number of cloud icebreakers). Each chosen icebreaker has +1 strength for each [link] you have for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only during a run.
text_zhCN: [trash]：选择一个破解器（或任意数量的云破解器）。你每有1[link]，本次潜袭的剩余时间内所选择的破解器的强度+1。仅能在一次潜袭中使用本能力。
stripped_text: trash: Choose an icebreaker (or any number of cloud icebreakers). Each chosen icebreaker has +1 strength for each link you have for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only during a run.
flavor_enUS: Fortunately, Globalsec buys them by the case.
flavor_zhCN: 幸好，全球保卫组成箱采购了它们。

text_enUS: +1[mu], +1[link] Once per turn → When you encounter a piece of ice, you may have the Corp trace[5]. If successful, they give you 1 tag and end the run. If unsuccesful, bypass the encountered ice. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu]，+1[link] 每回合一次，当你遭遇一层防火墙时，你可以迫使公司“追踪 5 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记并终止本次潜袭。如果失败，潜袭者略过当前遭遇的防火墙。” 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu, +1 link Once per turn -> When you encounter a piece of ice, you may have the Corp trace[5]. If successful, they give you 1 tag and end the run. If unsuccesful, bypass the encountered ice. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: If you have at least 2[link], the memory cost of this program is 0[mu], even if it is not installed. Interface → 2[credit]: Break any number of code gate subroutines. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
text_zhCN: 如果你具有至少2[link]，GS打击者M1的内存费用为0，即使其未被安装。 2[credit]：破解任意数量的门禁子进程。 2[credit]：强度+3。
stripped_text: If you have at least 2 link, the memory cost of this program is 0 mu, even if it is not installed. Interface -> 2 credits: Break any number of code gate subroutines. 2 credits: +3 strength.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 解码模块 - 云
flavor_enUS: Bigger.
flavor_zhCN: 更大。

text_enUS: If you have at least 2[link], the memory cost of this program is 0[mu], even if it is not installed. Interface → 2[credit]: Break any number of sentry subroutines. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
text_zhCN: 如果你具有至少2[link]，GS百舌鸟M2的内存费用为0，即使其未被安装。 2[credit]：破解任意数量的警报子进程。 2[credit]：强度+3。
stripped_text: If you have at least 2 link, the memory cost of this program is 0 mu, even if it is not installed. Interface -> 2 credits: Break any number of sentry subroutines. 2 credits: +3 strength.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 断路模块 - 云
flavor_enUS: Badder.
flavor_zhCN: 更爆。

text_enUS: If you have at least 2[link], the memory cost of this program is 0[mu], even if it is not installed. Interface → 2[credit]: Break any number of barrier subroutines. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
text_zhCN: 如果你具有至少2[link]，GS谢尔曼M3的内存费用为0，即使其未被安装。 2[credit]：破解任意数量的屏障子进程。 2[credit]：强度+3。
stripped_text: If you have at least 2 link, the memory cost of this program is 0 mu, even if it is not installed. Interface -> 2 credits: Break any number of barrier subroutines. 2 credits: +3 strength.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 分解模块 - 云
flavor_enUS: Boom.
flavor_zhCN: 炸。

text_enUS:
Install only if you have at least 2[link].
When your turn begins, you may lose [click]. If you do, look at the top card of R&D.
text_zhCN:
如果你具有至少2[link]，才能安装。
当你的回合开始时，你可以失去[click]。如果你如此做，查看研发中心顶端的一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Install only if you have at least 2 link. When your turn begins, you may lose click. If you do, look at the top card of R&D.
flavor_enUS: She approached the server, flashed her credentials, and passed straight through. She wondered what it said about her that doing things the legal way felt like cheating.
flavor_zhCN: 她接驳到服务器，刷好凭证，直接通过。所谓合法办事却有欺诈之嫌，她思忖着话中意味。

text_enUS:
Reduce the cost to install Jak Sinclair by 1 for each [link] you have.
When your turn begins, you may make a run. You cannot use programs during this run.
text_zhCN:
你每有1[link]，贾克·辛克莱的安装费用减1。
当你的回合开始时，你可以进行一次潜袭。在本次潜袭中你不能使用程序。
stripped_text: Reduce the cost to install Jak Sinclair by 1 for each link you have. When your turn begins, you may make a run. You cannot use programs during this run.
flavor_enUS: "I got an early start today...or maybe I forgot to go home last night."
flavor_zhCN: “我今天来得可早啦…也可能我昨晚忘了回家。”

text_enUS: This event is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The Corp's identity loses its printed abilities.
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 公司的特性规则文字成为空白。
stripped_text: This event is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The Corp's identity loses its printed abilities.
flavor_enUS: "Are you crazy? We can't send in prisec until the media gets bored and goes home."
flavor_zhCN: “你疯了吗？在媒体厌倦此事并打道回府前，我们不能派出私卫。”

text_enUS: Shuffle your stack. Trash the top card of your stack. Gain X[credit] where X is equal to the install cost of that card.
text_zhCN: 将你的存储栈重洗。销毁你存储栈顶端的一张卡牌。获得X[credit]，X等于该卡牌的安装费用。
stripped_text: Shuffle your stack. Trash the top card of your stack. Gain X credits where X is equal to the install cost of that card.
flavor_enUS: She tried to remember who he was. Not that it mattered anymore.
flavor_zhCN: 她试图追忆他是谁。但那已经不重要了。

text_enUS:
Whenever you install a piece of hardware or a program, place 1[credit] from the bank on Technical Writer.
[click],[trash]: Take all credits from Technical Writer.
text_zhCN:
每当你安装一个硬件或程序时，从银行中放置1[credit]到技术作家上。
[click]，[trash]：从技术作家上拿取所有的信用点。
stripped_text: Whenever you install a piece of hardware or a program, place 1 credit from the bank on Technical Writer. click,trash: Take all credits from Technical Writer.
flavor_enUS: Technically correct: the best kind of correct.
flavor_zhCN: 技术正确：最佳正确。

text_enUS: Make a run. When the run ends, trash 1 piece of ice that was rezzed during this run.
stripped_text: Make a run. When the run ends, trash 1 piece of ice that was rezzed during this run.
flavor_enUS: "While there have been other anti-corporation movements before, like the Maroon Wave, this new one is different. It's organized." -Ramesh Gupta, One World Economy
flavor_zhCN: “虽然反企业运动有过诸如红袭浪潮的先例，但新的这次不一样。它是有组织的。” —拉梅什·古普塔，《世界一体经济》

text_enUS: [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent up to X core damage or net damage. Trash cards from the top of your stack equal to the amount of damage prevented. X is equal to the number of other installed copies of Ramujan-reliant 550 BMI plus 1. Limit 6 per deck.
text_zhCN:
[trash]：防止最多X点网域伤害或脑部伤害。销毁你存储栈顶端的数张卡牌，其数量等于所防止的伤害点数。X等于已安装的拉姆万金550BMI的数量（包括刚销毁的一张）。
每套牌组限制6张。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> trash: Prevent up to X core damage or net damage. Trash cards from the top of your stack equal to the amount of damage prevented. X is equal to the number of other installed copies of Ramujan-reliant 550 BMI plus 1. Limit 6 per deck.

text_enUS: Unbroken subroutines resolve in the order of your choice.
text_zhCN: 未破解的子进程按你所选择的顺序结算。
stripped_text: Unbroken subroutines resolve in the order of your choice.
flavor_enUS: The greatest trick is not the trick itself, but in making someone believe that it is no trick at all. To your average sysop, it's magic. To your average runner, it's a closely held trade secret.
flavor_zhCN: 最厉害的戏法不是戏法本身，而是让人相信它并非戏法。在普通管理员看来，这是魔术。而对普通潜袭者来说，这是少数人的行业机密。

text_enUS: Make a run on a server with at least 1 piece of unrezzed ice. When the run ends, gain 12[credit] if it was successful.
text_zhCN: 对一台至少有一层未激活防火墙的服务器进行一次潜袭。当本次潜袭结束时，如果成功，获得12[credit]。
stripped_text: Make a run on a server with at least 1 piece of unrezzed ice. When the run ends, gain 12 credits if it was successful.

text_enUS: You cannot use this program to break subroutines on more than one ice per run. Interface → 1[credit]: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 2[credit]: +2 strength.
text_zhCN: 每次潜袭你不能使用猫鼬来破解多于一层防火墙上的子进程。 1[credit]：破解最多2个警报子进程。 2[credit]：强度+2。
stripped_text: You cannot use this program to break subroutines on more than one ice per run. Interface -> 1 credit: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 2 credits: +2 strength.
flavor_enUS: It is the hardest thing in the world to frighten a mongoose, because he is eaten up from nose to tail with curiosity. The motto of all the mongoose family is "Run and find out". -Rudyard Kipling, Rikki-Tikki-Tavi
flavor_zhCN: 要吓唬住一只猫鼬是天底下最困难的事情，因为他从鼻子尖到尾巴梢都充满了好奇。所有猫鼬的家族格言是：“快去看看是怎么回事。” —鲁德亚德·吉卜林，《里基-蒂基-塔维》

title_enUS: Jesminder Sareen: Girl Behind the Curtain
title_zhCN: 杰斯敏德·萨林：幕后女孩
stripped_title: Jesminder Sareen: Girl Behind the Curtain
text_enUS: [interrupt] → The first time each run you would take 1 or more tags, prevent 1 tag.
text_zhCN: 避免每次潜袭中的第一枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> The first time each run you would take 1 or more tags, prevent 1 tag.
flavor_enUS: "Mirrormode on."
flavor_zhCN: “镜像模式开启。”

text_enUS: +2[mu] Once per turn → When you finish accessing a card in R&D, you may add that card to the bottom of R&D. If you do, take 1 tag. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +2[mu] 每回合一次，在你从研发中心读取一张卡牌后，你可以立即将该卡牌加入研发中心底端。如果你如此做，拿取1枚锁定标记。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +2 mu Once per turn -> When you finish accessing a card in R&D, you may add that card to the bottom of R&D. If you do, take 1 tag. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: Once per turn → When you encounter a piece of ice, you may choose 1 subtype that is not barrier, code gate, or sentry. That ice gains the chosen subtype for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: 每回合一次，当你遭遇一层防火墙时，你可以使其在本次潜袭的剩余时间内获得除警报，门禁和屏障以外你所选择的一种子类型。
stripped_text: Once per turn -> When you encounter a piece of ice, you may choose 1 subtype that is not barrier, code gate, or sentry. That ice gains the chosen subtype for the remainder of this run.
flavor_enUS: "The basics should be like the stories you learned as a child—unconscious, never forgotten, and suddenly relevant at the most random times." -g00ru
flavor_zhCN: “基础知识就像你小时候听到的那些故事—未曾察觉也不会忘记，却在最不经意的时候突然有了意义。” —精神0袖

text_enUS: Forfeit 1 agenda: Search your stack for 1 program, resource, or piece of hardware. Install that card.
text_zhCN: 废除一个议案：在你的存储栈搜寻一张卡牌并安装它（支付安装费用）。将你的存储栈重洗。
stripped_text: Forfeit 1 agenda: Search your stack for 1 program, resource, or piece of hardware. Install that card.
flavor_enUS: "We can forgive a man for making a useful thing as long as he does not admire it. The only excuse for making a useless thing is that one admires it intensely." -Oscar Wilde
flavor_zhCN: “人制造一件有用之物是可以原谅的，只要他不爱上它。人创造一件无用之物的唯一借口是：他热爱着它。” —奥斯卡·王尔德

text_enUS:
[click]: Place 1 power counter on Chatterjee University.
[click]: Install a program from your grip, lowering the install cost by 1 for each power counter on Chatterjee University. Remove 1 hosted power counter.
text_zhCN:
[click]：放置1枚能量指示物到查特吉大学上。
[click]：从你的操控器安装一个程序，查特吉大学上每有1枚能量指示物，该程序的安装费用减1。移除1枚所附载的能量指示物。
stripped_text: click: Place 1 power counter on Chatterjee University. click: Install a program from your grip, lowering the install cost by 1 for each power counter on Chatterjee University. Remove 1 hosted power counter.
flavor_enUS: Legions of software engineers have been manufactured within its halls.
flavor_zhCN: 自其殿堂诞生出软件工程师的大军团。

text_enUS: The first time the Runner initiates a run each turn, you may draw 1 card or gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每回合潜袭者第一次发起潜袭时，你可以补一张卡牌或获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: The first time the Runner initiates a run each turn, you may draw 1 card or gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: "I don't want a hopper. I've never even owned one. But every time I jack in, that same damn ad loads." -2xTiger
flavor_zhCN: “我不要飞跃车。我甚至从未拥有过一辆。但每次我接入潜袭，那该死的广告又在加载。” —2x虎

text_enUS: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] The Runner cannot use programs for the remainder of this run. [subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, do 1 core damage. [subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, do 1 core damage.
text_zhCN:
潜袭者能花费[click]，以破解维克拉姆1.0上的任一子进程。
[subroutine] 本次潜袭的剩余时间内潜袭者不能使用程序。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，造成1点脑部伤害。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，造成1点脑部伤害。
stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine The Runner cannot use programs for the remainder of this run. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, do 1 core damage. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, do 1 core damage.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 生化人 - 追踪者 - 杀伤

text_enUS: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [jinteki] cards in your deck. Draw 3 cards. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D.
text_zhCN: 如果你的牌组中有6张或更多的非联盟[jinteki]卡牌，本卡牌影响力为0。 补三张卡牌。将一张卡牌从总部加入研发中心顶端。
stripped_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance jinteki cards in your deck. Draw 3 cards. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D.
flavor_enUS: It is only by respecting the past that we can build a better future.
flavor_zhCN: 只有尊重过去，我们才能建设更美好的未来。

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner passes a piece of ice protecting this server, you may swap that ice with another piece of ice protecting this server. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 每当潜袭者通过保护本服务器的一层防火墙时，你可以将该防火墙与保护本服务器的另一层防火墙互换。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner passes a piece of ice protecting this server, you may swap that ice with another piece of ice protecting this server. Limit 1 region per server.

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may look at the top card of the stack. [trash]: The Runner trashes the top card of the stack.
text_zhCN:
当你的回合开始时，你可以查看潜袭者存储栈顶端的一张卡牌。
[trash]：潜袭者销毁他/她存储栈顶端的一张卡牌。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may look at the top card of the stack. trash: The Runner trashes the top card of the stack.
flavor_enUS: "A new property has two, maybe three hours. If it doesn't sell, cut it and move on."
flavor_zhCN: “一项有两个或三个小时的新资产。如果卖不出去，剪掉然后继续。”

text_enUS: [subroutine] For the remainder of this run, as an additional cost to use an icebreaker ability to break subroutines, the Runner must pay 1[credit]. [subroutine] For the remainder of this run, as an additional cost to use an icebreaker ability to break subroutines, the Runner must pay 1[credit]
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 本次潜袭的剩余时间内，每次潜袭者使用破解器来破解至少一个子进程时，他/她必须支付1[credit]作为额外的费用。 [subroutine] 本次潜袭的剩余时间内，每次潜袭者使用破解器来破解至少一个子进程时，他/她必须支付1[credit]作为额外的费用。
stripped_text: Subroutine For the remainder of this run, as an additional cost to use an icebreaker ability to break subroutines, the Runner must pay 1 credit. Subroutine For the remainder of this run, as an additional cost to use an icebreaker ability to break subroutines, the Runner must pay 1 credit

text_enUS: Place 3 advancement tokens on a faceup card. You cannot score that card until your next turn begins.
text_zhCN: 放置3枚推进标记到一张面朝上的卡牌上。你不能计分该卡牌，直到你的下回合开始。
stripped_text: Place 3 advancement tokens on a faceup card. You cannot score that card until your next turn begins.
flavor_enUS: "Never cut the ribbon until you have something to show off." -Eta Shah, VP Global Expansion
flavor_zhCN: “在你有东西可炫耀之前，别急着剪彩。” —全球扩张项目副总裁，埃塔·沙阿

text_enUS:
This card costs 0 influence if you have 15 or fewer ice in your deck.
2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to rez cards.
text_zhCN:
如果你的牌组中有15张或更少的防火墙，本卡牌影响力为0。
2[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于激活卡牌。
stripped_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 15 or fewer ice in your deck. 2 recurring credits Use these credits to rez cards.
flavor_enUS: Those who are the wisest know the least.
flavor_zhCN: 智者浅知。

text_enUS:
This asset costs 0 influence if you have 50 or more cards in your deck.
When your turn begins, you may shuffle 1 card from Archives into R&D.
text_zhCN:
如果你的牌组中有50张或更多的卡牌，本卡牌影响力为0。
当你的回合开始时，你可以将一张卡牌从档案库洗入研发中心。
<errata>勘误自FAQ 3.1</errata>
stripped_text: This asset costs 0 influence if you have 50 or more cards in your deck. When your turn begins, you may shuffle 1 card from Archives into R&D.
flavor_enUS: "And here we see the Polar Bear, once the largest land carnivore on Earth."
flavor_zhCN: “现在我们看到的是北极熊，曾是地球上最大的陆生食肉动物。”

text_enUS: [trash]: The Corp cannot rez more than 1 piece of ice for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only during a run.
text_zhCN: [trash]：本次潜袭的剩余时间内公司不能激活多于一层防火墙。仅能在一次潜袭中使用本能力。
stripped_text: trash: The Corp cannot rez more than 1 piece of ice for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only during a run.
flavor_enUS: "No! Don't set that off HERE!"
flavor_zhCN: “不！别在这里引爆！”

text_enUS:
When you install this program, choose a server. As an additional cost to install a card in the root of or protecting that server, the Corp must pay 1[credit].
When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this program.
text_zhCN:
当迪旺被安装时，选择一台服务器。作为安装一张卡牌到该服务器内或保护该服务器的额外费用，公司必须支付1[credit]。
如果公司清除病毒指示物，销毁迪旺。
stripped_text: When you install this program, choose a server. As an additional cost to install a card in the root of or protecting that server, the Corp must pay 1 credit. When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this program.

text_enUS: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, the Corp adds all cards in HQ to the top of R&D in the order of their choice.
text_zhCN: 对总部进行一次潜袭。如果成功，公司将总部中的所有卡牌按他/她所选择的顺序加入研发中心顶端，代替读取卡牌。
stripped_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, the Corp adds all cards in HQ to the top of R&D in the order of their choice.
flavor_zhCN: 由2013年世冠赛冠军Jens Erickson设计
attribution: Designed by 2013 World Champion Jens Erickson

text_enUS: Whenever you use a [trash] ability, gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每当你使用一个[trash]能力时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever you use a trash ability, gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: "Why would you dispose of perfectly good evidence when you can sell it?"
flavor_zhCN: “既然如此完好的证据能拿去卖，你为何还要处理掉呢？”

text_enUS:
NetChip can host a program with a memory cost less than or equal to the number of copies of NetChip installed. The memory cost of the hosted program does not count against your memory limit.
Limit 6 per deck.
text_zhCN:
网络芯片能被附载一个内存费用小于或等于已安装的网络芯片的数量的程序。所附载的程序的内存费用不计算在你的内存上限中。
每套牌组限制6张。
stripped_text: NetChip can host a program with a memory cost less than or equal to the number of copies of NetChip installed. The memory cost of the hosted program does not count against your memory limit. Limit 6 per deck.

text_enUS: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The Corp has 1 additional bad publicity (even if they have 0).
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 公司具有1枚额外的负面声誉标记（即使其具有0枚）。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The Corp has 1 additional bad publicity (even if they have 0).
flavor_enUS: "We may be outraged, but we're not surprised." -Sunder
flavor_zhCN: “我们或许会愤怒，却并不感到意外。” —桑德

text_enUS: Play only if you have a seedy card installed. The Corp gets -1 allotted [click] for their next turn.
text_zhCN: 如果你具有至少一张已安装的低劣卡牌，才能打出。 公司在他/她的下回合用来花费的[click]减1。
stripped_text: Play only if you have a seedy card installed. The Corp gets -1 allotted click for their next turn.
flavor_enUS: "The corporations may be stronger than any of us, but they are not stronger than all of us." -Akshara Sareen
flavor_zhCN: “公司可能比我们中任何一人都强，但却敌不过我们的集体力量。” —阿刹拉·萨林

text_enUS:
When you rez Advanced Assembly Lines, gain 3[credit].
[trash]: Install a non-agenda card from HQ (paying the install cost). You cannot use this ability during a run.
text_zhCN:
当你激活高级装配线时，获得3[credit]。
[trash]：从总部安装一张非议案卡牌（支付安装费用）。你不能在一次潜袭中使用本能力。

text_enUS: Whenever you rez a card, place 1 power counter on Lakshmi Smartfabrics. X hosted power counters: Reveal an agenda worth X points from HQ. The Runner cannot steal copies of that agenda for the remainder of this turn.
text_zhCN: 每当你激活一张卡牌时，放置1枚能量指示物到吉祥天女智能面料上。 X枚所附载的能量指示物：从总部展示一个价值X点议案分数的议案。本回合的剩余时间内潜袭者不能窃取与该议案相同的议案。
stripped_text: Whenever you rez a card, place 1 power counter on Lakshmi Smartfabrics. X hosted power counters: Reveal an agenda worth X points from HQ. The Runner cannot steal copies of that agenda for the remainder of this turn.

text_enUS: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [haas-bioroid] cards in your deck. Trash a rezzed asset or upgrade. If you do, gain credits equal to its trash cost.
text_zhCN: 如果你的牌组中有6张或更多的非联盟[haas-bioroid]卡牌，本卡牌影响力为0。 销毁一个已激活的资产或升级。如果你如此做，获得与其销毁费用相等的信用点。
stripped_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliancehaas-bioroid cards in your deck. Trash a rezzed asset or upgrade. If you do, gain credits equal to its trash cost.

title_zhCN: 帕拉纳食品：可持续成长
text_enUS: The first time each turn the Runner draws a card, gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每回合潜袭者第一次补牌时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: The first time each turn the Runner draws a card, gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: We Are What We Eat.
flavor_zhCN: 食物决定你我。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, each player draws 1 card.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，每位玩家补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, each player draws 1 card.
flavor_enUS: Expensive to build but dramatically more efficient than traditional farming, agroplexes are emblems of the inevitable corporatization of the food industry.
flavor_zhCN: 造价不菲但效率显著高于传统耕作的农业复合体，是食品行业必然公司化的标志。

text_enUS:
[subroutine] The Runner draws 3 cards and then discards down to their maximum hand size.
[subroutine] The Runner draws 3 cards and then discards down to their maximum hand size.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 潜袭者补三张卡牌，然后弃牌到他/她的手牌上限。
[subroutine] 潜袭者补三张卡牌，然后弃牌到他/她的手牌上限。
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner draws 3 cards and then discards down to their maximum hand size. Subroutine The Runner draws 3 cards and then discards down to their maximum hand size.
flavor_enUS: "We can help others, yet also help ourselves." -Soraiya Suresh, VP Public Programs
flavor_zhCN: “我们帮助他人，同时也帮助了自己。” —公众项目副总裁，索莱雅·苏雷什

text_enUS: Your maximum hand size is increased by 2.
text_zhCN: 你的手牌上限+2。
stripped_text: Your maximum hand size is increased by 2.
flavor_enUS: Data, not food, is one of the biggest exports from the Gujarat district of Mumbad.
flavor_zhCN: 数据才是孟巴德古吉拉特区出口量最大的货物之一，而非食品。

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing this upgrade in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this upgrade, you may add any number of cards from HQ to the bottom of R&D.
text_zhCN:
如果即弃总部从研发中心被读取，潜袭者必须展示它。
当潜袭者读取即弃总部时，你可以将任意数量的卡牌从总部加入研发中心底端。

text_enUS: Install only faceup. (This agenda is neither rezzed nor unrezzed.) Whenever you advance this agenda, you may install 1 card from HQ in the root of a new server. If there are 5 or more hosted advancement counters, rez that card, ignoring all costs.
text_zhCN:
面朝上安装新建工程。
每当你推进新建工程时，你可以从总部安装一张卡牌到一台新的服务器内（或如果新建工程具有5枚或更多的推进标记，则激活该卡牌，忽略所有的费用）。
stripped_text: Install only faceup. (This agenda is neither rezzed nor unrezzed.) Whenever you advance this agenda, you may install 1 card from HQ in the root of a new server. If there are 5 or more hosted advancement counters, rez that card, ignoring all costs.

When your turn begins, place 1 advancement token on Mumbad Construction Co.
2[credit]: Move 1 advancement token from Mumbad Construction Co. to a faceup card.

当你的回合开始时，放置1枚推进标记到孟巴德建设公司上。
2[credit]：从孟巴德建设公司上转移1枚推进标记到一张面朝上的卡牌上。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, place 1 advancement token on Mumbad Construction Co. 2 credits: Move 1 advancement token from Mumbad Construction Co. to a faceup card.

text_enUS:
When you score Corporate Sales Team, place 10[credit] on it.
When each player's turn begins, take 1[credit] from Corporate Sales Team.
text_zhCN:
当你用公司销售组计分时，放置10[credit]到本卡牌上。
当每位玩家的回合开始时，从公司销售组上拿取1[credit]。
stripped_text: When you score Corporate Sales Team, place 10 credits on it. When each player's turn begins, take 1 credit from Corporate Sales Team.

flavor_zhCN: “全都能卖。全都会买。全体共赢。”

text_enUS:
This card costs 0 influence if you have 3 PAD Campaigns in your deck.
[click]: Place 1 advancement token on a card. You cannot score that card until your next turn begins.

如果你的牌组中有3张掌上营销计划，本卡牌影响力为0。

text_enUS: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, host this event on an agenda in the Corp's score area as a condition counter with "Host agenda is worth 1 less agenda point. When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this counter."
text_zhCN: 对档案库进行一次潜袭。如果成功，将政治涂鸦加入公司分数区中的一个议案上，作为所附载的状态指示物，规则文字为“该议案价值的议案分数减1。如果公司清除病毒指示物，销毁政治涂鸦。”，代替读取卡牌。
stripped_text: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, host this event on an agenda in the Corp's score area as a condition counter with "Host agenda is worth 1 less agenda point. When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this counter."

text_enUS: Once per turn → When you encounter a sentry, you may jack out.
text_zhCN: 每回合一次，当你遭遇一个警报时，你可以退出。
stripped_text: Once per turn -> When you encounter a sentry, you may jack out.
flavor_enUS: "Credits spend anywhere in the worlds, but there are other forms of currency."
flavor_zhCN: “信用点在世界各地通用，但还有其他形式的货币。”

text_enUS: +1[mu] +1[link] Whenever you jack out, the Corp reveals 1 card from HQ at random. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu]，+1[link] 每当你退出时，公司从总部随机展示一张卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu +1 link Whenever you jack out, the Corp reveals 1 card from HQ at random. Limit 1 console per player.

flavor_zhCN: “我坚守'唯需知者知'准则。我需要知晓所有的事情。” —尼禄·塞文

text_enUS:
[click]: Look at the top X cards of your stack and arrange them in any order. X is the number of copies of Spy Camera installed.
[trash]: Look at the top card of R&D.
Limit 6 per deck.

[click]：查看你存储栈顶端的X张卡牌，并按任意顺序排列它们。X等于已安装的间谍相机的数量。

stripped_text: Install only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. trash, X credits: Trash 1 rezzed card with trash cost equal to X.

flavor_zhCN: 手段，秘密，特权与影响力都是和信用点一样有价值的货币。当然，信用点也管用。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice with 3 or more subtypes. 1[credit]: +1 strength. 2[credit]: Swap this program with a deva program from your grip.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解具有三种或更多子类型的一层防火墙上的子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。 2[credit]：将瞬生与你操控器中的一个提婆程序互换。

flavor_enUS: The Creator.
flavor_zhCN: 创造者。

text_enUS: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. When you steal an agenda, add "Freedom Through Equality" to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 当你窃取一个议案时，将“平等是自由之路”加入你的分数区，作为一个价值1点议案分数的议案。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. When you steal an agenda, add "Freedom Through Equality" to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.

text_enUS: Each player gets +1 allotted [click] for each of their turns.
text_zhCN: 每位玩家在他/她的回合有一个额外的[click]用来花费。
stripped_text: Each player gets +1 allotted click for each of their turns.
flavor_enUS: "Our shared humanity is our greatest strength. And as we share more broadly, our strength grows, not dwindles."
flavor_zhCN: 我们共有的人性是我们最强大的力量。只要我们更广泛地相通，这力量就只会增强，不会减弱。

text_enUS: Whenever the Corp rezzes an asset or upgrade, you may pay credits equal to its rez cost and trash Councilman. If you do, derez that asset or upgrade. The Corp cannot rez it for the remainder of this turn.
text_zhCN: 每当公司激活一个资产或升级时，你可以支付与其激活费用相等的信用点并销毁地方议员。如果你如此做，关闭该资产或升级。本回合的剩余时间内公司不能激活它。
stripped_text: Whenever the Corp rezzes an asset or upgrade, you may pay credits equal to its rez cost and trash Councilman. If you do, derez that asset or upgrade. The Corp cannot rez it for the remainder of this turn.
flavor_enUS: "Bureaucracy and red tape have been weaponized." -Fake-ir
flavor_zhCN: “官僚体制与繁文缛节已然武器化。” —诽基尔

Place 3 agenda counters on Voting Machine Initiative when you score it.
When the Runner's turn begins, you may spend 1 hosted agenda counter. If you do, the Runner loses [click], if able.
