stripped_text: Place 3 agenda counters on Voting Machine Initiative when you score it. When the Runner's turn begins, you may spend 1 hosted agenda counter. If you do, the Runner loses click, if able.

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may add 1 operation from Archives to HQ if there is no ice protecting this server.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，如果没有防火墙保护本服务器，你可以将一个事务从档案库加入总部。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may add 1 operation from Archives to HQ if there is no ice protecting this server.
flavor_enUS: "Our research says the public views clones as more human than bioroids. Historically, this has been a liability. Let's make it a strength."
flavor_zhCN: “我们的研究表明，公众认为克隆体比生化人更像人类。在过去，这是一个劣势。让我们将其转化为优势。”

text_enUS: When your turn begins, do 1 net damage if there is no ice protecting this server.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，如果没有防火墙保护本服务器，造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, do 1 net damage if there is no ice protecting this server.
flavor_enUS: "There's no conflict of interest here. These are complex issues with highly technical minutiae. It's only natural that the experts should lay down the guidelines."
flavor_zhCN: “此处并无利益冲突。这些复杂问题有着高度技术性的细枝末节。由专家来制定准则是理所当然的。”

text_enUS: Whenever you draw an agenda, you may reveal and install it.
text_zhCN: 每当你补到一个议案时，你可以展示并安装它。
stripped_text: Whenever you draw an agenda, you may reveal and install it.
flavor_enUS: "Politics is a dirty business. But so is business." -Krishnan Sareen
flavor_zhCN: “政治是一门肮脏的生意，但生意不过如此。” —克里施南·萨林

text_enUS: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. When you score an agenda, add "Clones are not People" to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 当你用一个议案计分时，将“克隆体不是人类”加入你的分数区，作为一个价值1点议案分数的议案。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. When you score an agenda, add "Clones are not People" to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may draw 3 cards if there is no ice protecting this server. If you do, add 1 card from HQ to the bottom of R&D.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，如果没有防火墙保护本服务器，你可以补三张卡牌。如果你如此做，将一张卡牌从总部加入研发中心底端。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may draw 3 cards if there is no ice protecting this server. If you do, add 1 card from HQ to the bottom of R&D.
flavor_enUS: Being a Mumbad sensie star means a glamorous life, though it is lived in constant fear of blackmail-or worse-from orgcrime.
flavor_zhCN: 成为一名孟巴德复感影星意味着光鲜亮丽的生活，尽管这生活满是对勒索事件—甚至更糟，对黑社会行为—的恐慌。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, gain 3[credit] if there is no ice protecting this server.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，如果没有防火墙保护本服务器，获得3[credit]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 3 credits if there is no ice protecting this server.
flavor_enUS: "Money is speech and I am listening intently." -Krishnan Sareen
flavor_zhCN: “钱会说话，而我恭听。” —克里施南·萨林

text_enUS: [click]: Search R&D for an alliance card, reveal it, and play or install it (paying all costs). Shuffle R&D.
text_zhCN: [click]：在研发中心搜寻一张联盟卡牌，将其展示，并打出或安装它（支付所有的费用）。将研发中心重洗。
stripped_text: click: Search R&D for an alliance card, reveal it, and play or install it (paying all costs). Shuffle R&D.
flavor_enUS: Mumbad's public city corporation is tightly connected to all the other corporations.
flavor_zhCN: 孟巴德的城市公营公司与其他所有公司紧密相连。

text_enUS:
Whenever the Runner breaks a subroutine on Bailiff, gain 1[credit].
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
每当潜袭者破解执达吏上的一个子进程时，获得1[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner breaks a subroutine on Bailiff, gain 1 credit. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Efficiency means profiting from things everyone was doing anyway.
flavor_zhCN: 效率就是从总有人在做的事情上获利。

text_enUS: Whenever you rez another card in the root of or protecting this server, you may rez 1 card, paying 2[credit] less. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 每当你激活一张本服务器内或保护本服务器的卡牌（不包括苏拉特城际网阵）时，你可以激活另一张卡牌，其激活费用减2。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Whenever you rez another card in the root of or protecting this server, you may rez 1 card, paying 2 credits less. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: The political centre of Mumbad.
flavor_zhCN: 孟巴德的政治中心。

text_enUS:
Play only as your first [click].
Look at the top 6 cards of your stack. You may trash any of those cards and arrange the rest in any order.
text_zhCN:
仅能在你的第一个[click]打出。
查看你存储栈顶端的六张卡牌。你可以销毁其中任意数量的卡牌，并按任意顺序排列余下的卡牌。
stripped_text: Play only as your first click. Look at the top 6 cards of your stack. You may trash any of those cards and arrange the rest in any order.
flavor_enUS: Sometimes in an instant you realize who your friends really are.
flavor_zhCN: 有时你瞬间就会明白，谁才是你真正的朋友。

text_enUS: Access, once per turn → Pay the trash cost of the card you are accessing: Remove that card from the game.
text_zhCN: 每回合一次，当你支付一张被读取卡牌的销毁费用时，将该卡牌移出游戏，代替销毁它。
stripped_text: Access, once per turn -> Pay the trash cost of the card you are accessing: Remove that card from the game.
flavor_enUS: "Underestimate those people at your own peril." -Akshara Sareen
flavor_zhCN: “小看这些人，后果自负。” —阿刹拉·萨林

text_enUS:
Draw 1 card. Gain 1[credit] for each copy of Exclusive Party in your heap.
Limit 6 per deck.
text_zhCN:
补一张卡牌。你的堆阵中每有一张高档宴会，获得1[credit]。
每套牌组限制6张。
stripped_text: Draw 1 card. Gain 1 credit for each copy of Exclusive Party in your heap. Limit 6 per deck.
flavor_enUS: The more parties she attended, the more they trusted her. The more they trusted her, the more entertaining her scams became.
flavor_zhCN: 她出席的宴会越多，他们就越信任她。他们越信任她，她的骗局就越有趣。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice with exactly 1 subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. 2[credit]: Swap this program with a deva program from your grip.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解具有恰好一个子进程的一层防火墙上的子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。 2[credit]：将喜天与你操控器中的一个提婆程序互换。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice with exactly 1 subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. 2 credits: Swap this program with a deva program from your grip.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 智能模块 - 提婆
flavor_enUS: The Preserver.
flavor_zhCN: 保护者。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break up to 2 subroutines. 2[credit]: +1 strength. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, add 1 installed non-virus program to the top of your stack.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解最多2个子进程。 2[credit]：强度+1。 每当一层你使用梵天破解其子进程的防火墙遭遇结束时，将一个已安装的非病毒程序加入你的存储栈顶端。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break up to 2 subroutines. 2 credits: +1 strength. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, add 1 installed non-virus program to the top of your stack.

text_enUS:
When your turn begins, you may choose a server.
The first time each turn you make a successful run on the chosen server, instead of breaching it, draw 2 cards.
text_zhCN:
当你的回合开始时，你可以选择一台服务器。
本回合你第一次对该服务器进行成功的潜袭时，补两张卡牌，代替读取卡牌。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may choose a server. The first time each turn you make a successful run on the chosen server, instead of breaching it, draw 2 cards.
flavor_enUS: "Anyone who can afford dwarf elephants can afford to be my friend." -Fake-ir
flavor_zhCN: “有能力养侏儒小象的人都有能力成为我的朋友。” —诽基尔

text_enUS:
+1[link]
[trash]: Draw 3 cards.
text_zhCN:
+1[link]
[trash]：补三张卡牌。
stripped_text: +1 link trash: Draw 3 cards.
flavor_enUS: "Check out my new ride." -2xTiger
flavor_zhCN: “瞧瞧我的新座驾。”—2x虎

text_enUS: Whenever you install a piece of hardware from your grip, you may install another copy of that hardware from your grip (paying all costs).
text_zhCN: 每当你从你的操控器安装一个硬件时，你可以从你的操控器安装另一个相同的硬件（支付所有的费用）。
stripped_text: Whenever you install a piece of hardware from your grip, you may install another copy of that hardware from your grip (paying all costs).
flavor_enUS: In these days of digital full-sim browsing and widely available nano-assembly, it takes a special kind of crazy person to go shopping in meatspace. There are millions of them.
flavor_zhCN: 在数字化全模拟浏览与纳米级装配被广泛使用的时代，只有一群特别的疯人还在现实世界里购物。有上百万这样的人。

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner searches the stack or installs a card from the heap, they trash 1 card from the grip at random.
text_zhCN: 每当潜袭者在他/她的存储栈进行搜寻或从他/她的堆阵安装一张卡牌时，他/她必须从其操控器随机销毁一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner searches the stack or installs a card from the heap, they trash 1 card from the grip at random.

text_enUS: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [haas-bioroid] cards in your deck. The first time you spend 3[click] on the same action each turn, gain [click].
text_zhCN: 如果你的牌组中有6张或更多的非联盟[haas-bioroid]卡牌，本卡牌影响力为0。 每回合你第一次在相同的行动上花费3[click]时，获得[click]。
stripped_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance haas-bioroid cards in your deck. The first time you spend 3click on the same action each turn, gain click.
flavor_enUS: "Very good, sir."
flavor_zhCN: “好的，阁下。”

text_enUS: This asset costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [jinteki] cards in your deck. Once per turn → When you draw a card, you may lose [click]. If you do, reveal that card and 1 card in Archives of the same type. Swap those cards.
text_zhCN: 如果你的牌组中有6张或更多的非联盟[jinteki]卡牌，本卡牌影响力为0。 每回合一次，当你补一张卡牌时，你可以失去[click]。如果你如此做，展示该卡牌和档案库中一张相同类型的卡牌，然后将这些卡牌互换。
stripped_text: This asset costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance jinteki cards in your deck. Once per turn -> When you draw a card, you may lose click. If you do, reveal that card and 1 card in Archives of the same type. Swap those cards.

text_enUS: [subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, the Runner loses 2[credit]. [subroutine] Resolve a subroutine on a piece of rezzed psi ice.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，潜袭者失去2[credit]。 [subroutine] 结算一层已激活的灵能防火墙上的一个子进程。
stripped_text: Subroutine You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, the Runner loses 2 credits. Subroutine Resolve a subroutine on a piece of rezzed psi ice.
flavor_enUS: "Connect two truths. Connect two programs. All is one."
flavor_zhCN: “二谛相通。程序相连。万物为一。”

text_enUS: Whenever there is a successful trace, gain 1[credit] and the Runner loses 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每当有一次成功的追踪时，获得1[credit]并且潜袭者失去1[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever there is a successful trace, gain 1 credit and the Runner loses 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: "As the world shrinks, communications becomes the most essential technology." -Ramesh Gupta, One World Economy
flavor_zhCN: “随着世界越变越小，通信成为了最关键的科技。” —拉梅什·古普塔，《世界一体经济》

text_enUS: This operation costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [nbn] cards in your deck. Choose a card name. The Runner reveals the grip and trashes all cards with the chosen name revealed this way.
text_zhCN: 如果你的牌组中有6张或更多的非联盟[nbn]卡牌，本卡牌影响力为0。 指定一张卡牌的名称。潜袭者展示他/她的操控器并从中销毁与所指定卡牌相同的卡牌。
stripped_text: This operation costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance nbn cards in your deck. Choose a card name. The Runner reveals the grip and trashes all cards with the chosen name revealed this way.

text_enUS: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [weyland-consortium] cards in your deck. [click]: Search R&D for an executive, sysop, or character, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
text_zhCN: 如果你的牌组中有6张或更多的非联盟[weyland-consortium]卡牌，本卡牌影响力为0。 [click]：在研发中心搜寻一个主管，管理员或人物，将其展示，并加入总部。将研发中心重洗。
stripped_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance weyland-consortium cards in your deck. click: Search R&D for an executive, sysop, or character, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.

text_enUS: Whenever you rez or play an out-of-faction card (including Indian Union Stock Exchange), gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每当你激活或打出一张派系外的卡牌（包括印度联盟证券交易所）时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever you rez or play an out-of-faction card (including Indian Union Stock Exchange), gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: "Wealth wisely invested is wealth earned." -The New Gospel of Wealth
flavor_zhCN: “明智投资的财富是生利的财富。” —《财富之新福音书》

text_enUS:
[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 销毁一个程序。
[subroutine] 造成2点网域伤害。
stripped_text: Subroutine Trash 1 program. Subroutine Do 2 net damage.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 毁灭者 - 杀伤
flavor_enUS: The naja naja is the king of all serpents.
flavor_zhCN: 印度眼镜蛇是蛇中之王。

text_enUS: Search R&D for any number of copies of a card, reveal them, and add them to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
text_zhCN: 在研发中心搜寻一张卡牌任意数量的相同卡牌，将它们展示，并加入总部。将研发中心重洗。
stripped_text: Search R&D for any number of copies of a card, reveal them, and add them to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
flavor_enUS: It's the exact same coffee, but the price sure is different.
flavor_zhCN: 咖啡还是那个咖啡，但价格显然不是那个价格。

text_enUS:
This upgrade costs 0 influence if you have 7 or more assets in your deck.
When the Runner accesses this upgrade while it is installed, they must trash it, if able.
text_zhCN:
如果你的牌组中有7张或更多的资产，本卡牌影响力为0。
如果潜袭者读取已安装的孟巴德虚拟之旅，如可能，他/她必须销毁它。
stripped_text: This upgrade costs 0 influence if you have 7 or more assets in your deck. When the Runner accesses this upgrade while it is installed, they must trash it, if able.

text_enUS: Trash all cards from your grip. Run any server. Whenever you would take damage during that run, prevent all of that damage.
text_zhCN: 销毁你的操控器。进行一次潜袭。在本次潜袭中防止所有的伤害。
stripped_text: Trash all cards from your grip. Run any server. Whenever you would take damage during that run, prevent all of that damage.
flavor_enUS:
"He with nothing to lose has strength beyond imagining."
-The Saffron Sutra
flavor_zhCN: “一无所有之人，力量超乎想象。” —《番红花经》

text_enUS: When your turn begins, gain [click] if you have no cards in your grip.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，如果你的操控器中没有卡牌，获得[click]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain click if you have no cards in your grip.
flavor_enUS:
"They cloak themselves in our shared heritage, in the wisdom of our religions, but make no mistake: they are terrorists and criminals."
-Inspector Lakhani, Cybercrimes Division
flavor_zhCN: “他们用我们共享的传统和我们宗教的智慧来掩藏自己，但请不要搞错：他们是恐怖主义者和罪犯。” —数字犯罪部门，拉卡尼检察官

text_enUS: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, the Corp separates all cards in HQ into 2 facedown piles. Choose 1 of the piles. Access each card in the chosen pile.
text_zhCN: 对总部进行一次潜袭。如果成功，公司将总部中的所有卡牌分成面朝下的两堆，代替读取卡牌。读取其中一堆中的所有卡牌；本次潜袭你不能读取另一堆中的任何卡牌。
stripped_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, the Corp separates all cards in HQ into 2 facedown piles. Choose 1 of the piles. Access each card in the chosen pile.

text_enUS:
Make a run.
When your turn begins, if Out of the Ashes is in your heap, you may remove it from the game to make a run.
Limit 6 per deck.
text_zhCN:
进行一次潜袭。
当你的回合开始时，如果烬中再起在你的堆阵中，你可以将其移出游戏以进行一次潜袭。
每套牌组限制6张。
stripped_text: Make a run. When your turn begins, if Out of the Ashes is in your heap, you may remove it from the game to make a run. Limit 6 per deck.

text_enUS: [click][click][click][click][click], forfeit an agenda: The Corp may forfeit an agenda to remove this resource from the game. If they do not, add this resource to your score area as an agenda worth 2 agenda points.
text_zhCN: [click]，[click]，[click]，[click]，[click]，废除一个议案：将自由信徒加入你的分数区，作为一个价值2点议案分数的议案。公司可以废除一个议案以防止本效果。如果他/她如此做，将自由信徒移出游戏。
stripped_text: click click click click click, forfeit an agenda: The Corp may forfeit an agenda to remove this resource from the game. If they do not, add this resource to your score area as an agenda worth 2 agenda points.
flavor_enUS: "Let go your material attachments and realize that we are all immaterial."
flavor_zhCN: “放下你对物质的依恋，领会你我的非物质性。”

text_enUS: [click]: Place 1 power counter on this resource. Once per turn → Hosted power counter: Gain [click]. Use this ability only during your turn.
text_zhCN: [click]：放置1枚能量指示物到自由心智之殿上。 所附载的能量指示物：获得[click]。仅能在你的回合使用本能力，并且每回合仅能使用一次。
stripped_text: click: Place 1 power counter on this resource. Once per turn -> Hosted power counter: Gain click. Use this ability only during your turn.
flavor_enUS: It is rumored that g00ru himself studied at the temple, applying its teachings to cyberspace. Many runners have followed in his path, but none have reached its end.
flavor_zhCN: 传言精神0袖本尊曾在该殿进修，并将其学说运用到赛博空间。无数潜袭者追随过他的脚步，却从未有人抵达终点。

text_enUS:
Switch your identity with another identity from the same faction. Remove Rebirth from the game instead of trashing it.
Limit 1 per deck.
text_zhCN:
将你的特性与相同派系的另一个特性互换。将重生移出游戏，代替销毁它。
每套牌组限制1张。
stripped_text: Switch your identity with another identity from the same faction. Remove Rebirth from the game instead of trashing it. Limit 1 per deck.
flavor_enUS: "Who were you when you realized everything you knew was a lie?"
flavor_zhCN: “当你意识到你所知道的一切都是谎言时，你是谁？”

text_enUS:
[interrupt] → Whenever you would take net or meat damage, prevent all of that damage.
Whenever this resource prevents 1 or more damage, trash it unless you pay 4[credit].
text_zhCN:
防止所有的网域伤害和肢体伤害。
每当古鲁达温德防止至少1点网域伤害或肢体伤害时，销毁他，除非你支付4[credit]。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> Whenever you would take net or meat damage, prevent all of that damage. Whenever this resource prevents 1 or more damage, trash it unless you pay 4[credit].
flavor_enUS: "This body that we inhabit is fleeting. We, all of us, can live forever."
flavor_zhCN: “我们栖居的此身转瞬即逝。但我们，所有的人，皆可永生。”

text_enUS: Whenever a run on HQ or R&D ends, place 1 power counter on this resource if you stole no agendas during that run. 2 hosted power counters: Choose HQ or R&D. For the remainder of this run, access 1 additional card whenever you breach that server.
text_zhCN: 每当对总部或研发中心的一次潜袭结束时，如果你在本次潜袭中没有窃取过议案，放置1枚能量指示物到转轮上。 2枚所附载的能量指示物：本次潜袭的剩余时间内，从总部或研发中心额外读取一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever a run on HQ or R&D ends, place 1 power counter on this resource if you stole no agendas during that run. 2 hosted power counters: Choose HQ or R&D. For the remainder of this run, access 1 additional card whenever you breach that server.

text_enUS: When the Runner encounters this ice, it gains X "[subroutine] Do 1 core damage." subroutines for the remainder of this run. X is equal to the number of cards in the grip.
text_zhCN: 当潜袭者遭遇头脑风暴时，本次潜袭的剩余时间内潜袭者的操控器中每有一张卡牌，其获得“[subroutine] 造成1点脑部伤害。”
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, it gains X "Subroutine Do 1 core damage." subroutines for the remainder of this run. X is equal to the number of cards in the grip.
flavor_enUS:
has anyone heard from StatiX lately?
-post on Members Only newsgroup
flavor_zhCN: 有谁近来听闻过斯塔提X的消息吗？ —会员讨论专区帖

text_enUS: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Resolve 1 subroutine on another rezzed bioroid ice. [subroutine] Resolve 1 subroutine on another rezzed bioroid ice.
text_zhCN: 失去[click]：破解1条本防火墙上的子进程。只有潜袭者可以使用本能力。 [subroutine] 结算另1层已激活的生化人防火墙上的1条子进程。 [subroutine] 结算另1层已激活的生化人防火墙上的1条子进程。
stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Resolve 1 subroutine on another rezzed bioroid ice. Subroutine Resolve 1 subroutine on another rezzed bioroid ice.

text_enUS: The first time there is a successful run on HQ each turn, you and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, you choose which cards the Runner accesses from HQ for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: 每回合第一次总部进行了成功的潜袭时，你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，本次潜袭的剩余时间内你选择潜袭者从总部读取的卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time there is a successful run on HQ each turn, you and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, you choose which cards the Runner accesses from HQ for the remainder of this run.

text_enUS:
[subroutine] Each player gains 2[credit].
[subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, do 1 net damage for each card in the Runner's grip.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 每位玩家获得2[credit]。
[subroutine] 你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，潜袭者的操控器中每有一张卡牌，造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: Subroutine Each player gains 2 credits. Subroutine You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, do 1 net damage for each card in the Runner's grip.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 杀伤 - 灵能
flavor_enUS: "Feel your consciousness expand and touch his. Now destroy it."
flavor_zhCN: “感受你的意识扩展并接触到他的意识。现在摧毁它。”

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run, you may place 1 advancement token on a card that can be advanced.
text_zhCN: 每当潜袭者进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以放置1枚推进标记到一张能被推进的卡牌上。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run, you may place 1 advancement token on a card that can be advanced.

text_enUS: [subroutine] Trace[5]. If successful, the Runner reveals the grip. Trash each card revealed this way with a play or install cost of X or less. X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] <trace>追踪 5</trace> 如果成功，潜袭者展示他/她的操控器。销毁这些卡牌中每张打出或安装费用等于或小于你追踪强度超过他/她中转强度的差值的卡牌。
stripped_text: Subroutine Trace[5]. If successful, the Runner reveals the grip. Trash each card revealed this way with a play or install cost of X or less. X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.
flavor_enUS: "It's amazing how small we can write the fine print these days."
flavor_zhCN: “如今我们能将附属细则写得如此之小，真令人惊奇。”

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Swap an agenda in your score area with an agenda in the Runner's score area.
text_zhCN:
如果潜袭者被锁定，才能打出。
将你分数区中的一个议案与潜袭者分数区中的一个议案互换。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Swap an agenda in your score area with an agenda in the Runner's score area.

text_enUS: [subroutine] All ice has +3 strength for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 本次潜袭的剩余时间内所有防火墙的强度+3。
stripped_text: Subroutine All ice has +3 strength for the remainder of this run.
flavor_enUS:
Bureaucracy. Noun. A shell-game played by the rich with prosperity as the ball. The trick is that there is no ball.
-The Anarch's Dictionary, Volume Who's Counting?
flavor_zhCN: 官僚主义。名词。富人玩的一场杯球戏法，球是繁荣。伎俩是并没有球。 —反叛者的字典，谁管第几卷

text_enUS: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [weyland-consortium] cards in your deck. As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click]. Search R&D for an operation and play it (paying all costs). Shuffle R&D.
text_zhCN: 如果你的牌组中有6张或更多的非联盟[weyland-consortium]卡牌，本卡牌影响力为0。 作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。 在研发中心搜寻一个事务并打出它（支付所有的费用）。将研发中心重洗。
stripped_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance weyland-consortium cards in your deck. As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Search R&D for an operation and play it (paying all costs). Shuffle R&D.

text_enUS: [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: A brand new invention.
flavor_zhCN: 一个全新的发明。

text_enUS:
Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, reveal any number of copies of Fear the Masses from your grip. The Corp trashes X cards from the top of R&D, where X is equal to 1 plus the number of cards you revealed.
Limit 6 per deck.
text_zhCN:
对总部进行一次潜袭。如果成功，迫使公司销毁研发中心顶端的一张卡牌，代替读取卡牌。你可以从你的操控器展示X张群众可畏，以迫使公司额外销毁X张卡牌。
每套牌组限制6张。
stripped_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, reveal any number of copies of Fear the Masses from your grip. The Corp trashes X cards from the top of R&D, where X is equal to 1 plus the number of cards you revealed. Limit 6 per deck.

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice that has a rez cost of 5 or greater. 1[credit]: +1 strength. 2[credit]: Swap this program with a deva program from your grip.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解激活费用等于或大于5的一层防火墙上的子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。 2[credit]：将无惧与你操控器中的一个提婆程序互换。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice that has a rez cost of 5 or greater. 1 credit: +1 strength. 2 credits: Swap this program with a deva program from your grip.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 智能模块 - 提婆
flavor_enUS: The Destroyer.
flavor_zhCN: 毁灭者。

text_enUS: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, force the Corp to trash the top card of R&D.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次对总部进行成功的潜袭时，迫使公司销毁研发中心顶端的一张卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, force the Corp to trash the top card of R&D.
flavor_enUS: "They don't want to listen, so we'll just have to crank up the volume."
flavor_zhCN: “他们听不进去，所以我们只好调高音量。”

text_enUS:
The Corp cannot win the game except if you are flatlined.
When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on this resource. If there are 3 or more hosted power counters, remove this resource from the game.
Limit 1 per deck.
text_zhCN:
公司不能赢得游戏，除非潜袭者死亡。
当你的回合开始时，放置1枚能量指示物到黑文件上。当黑文件具有3枚或更多的能量指示物时，将其移出游戏。
每套牌组限制1张。
stripped_text: The Corp cannot win the game except if you are flatlined. When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on this resource. If there are 3 or more hosted power counters, remove this resource from the game. Limit 1 per deck.

text_enUS: As an additional cost to play this event, trash 1 installed connection resource. The Corp cannot advance cards during their next turn. Remove this event from the game.
text_zhCN: 作为打出本事件的额外费用，销毁一个已安装的人脉。 公司在他/她的下回合不能推进卡牌。将自由的代价移出游戏，代替销毁它。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, trash 1 installed connection resource. The Corp cannot advance cards during their next turn. Remove this event from the game.

text_enUS: Whenever this program fully breaks a barrier, add that barrier to HQ. Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 在一次遭遇中，如果你使用金刚钩破解一个屏障上的所有子进程，将该屏障加入总部。 2[credit]：破解屏障子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: Whenever this program fully breaks a barrier, add that barrier to HQ. Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.

text_enUS: Secretly spend up to 2[credit]. The Corp guesses how much you spent. Reveal spent credits. If the Corp guessed incorrectly, choose a piece of ice protecting a server and run that server. The first time during this run you encounter the chosen ice, bypass it.
text_zhCN: 秘密花费最多2[credit]。公司猜测你花费的数量。展示所花费的信用点。如果公司猜测错误，进行一次潜袭并选择一层保护被攻击服务器的防火墙。当你遭遇该防火墙时，略过它。
stripped_text: Secretly spend up to 2 credits. The Corp guesses how much you spent. Reveal spent credits. If the Corp guessed incorrectly, choose a piece of ice protecting a server and run that server. The first time during this run you encounter the chosen ice, bypass it.

text_enUS:
When you rez this ice, choose 1 installed program hosted on a piece of ice. Host that program on this ice.
Each hosted program loses all abilities and cannot gain abilities.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
当你激活本防火墙时，选择1个已安装且附载于防火墙上的程序。将该程序附载到本防火墙上。
所附载的程序失去所有能力。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice, choose 1 installed program hosted on a piece of ice. Host that program on this ice. Each hosted program loses all abilities and cannot gain abilities. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: "When the enemy has mastered the battlefield, change the battlefield." -The Playbook
flavor_zhCN: “如果敌方把控了战场，改变战场。” —《战术手册》

text_enUS: Gain 4[credit]. You may install 1 card (paying the install cost).
text_zhCN: 获得4[credit]。你可以安装一张卡牌（支付安装费用）。
stripped_text: Gain 4 credits. You may install 1 card (paying the install cost).
flavor_enUS: "Practical effects are expensive, but worth it. I had to smash seventeen stunt bioroids to get this shot." -Parvati Kapoor, director
flavor_zhCN: “现场特效可贵了，但很值得。就为这一个画面，我得弄碎十七个特技生化人。” —导演帕瓦蒂·卡普尔

text_enUS: When Improved Protein Source is scored or stolen, the Runner gains 4[credit].
text_zhCN: 当改进版蛋白源被计分或窃取时，潜袭者获得4[credit]。
stripped_text: When Improved Protein Source is scored or stolen, the Runner gains 4 credits.
flavor_enUS: They eat us, we eat them, the cycle goes on and on. -Omar Keung, "the Flashpoint"
flavor_zhCN: 它们吃我们，我们吃它们，这循环永不停息。 —奥马尔·姜，《闪点》

text_enUS:
Play only if there is an agenda in the Runner's score area.
You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, trash 1 resource.
text_zhCN:
如果潜袭者的分数区中有议案，才能打出。
你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，销毁一个资源。
stripped_text: Play only if there is an agenda in the Runner's score area. You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, trash 1 resource.

title_enUS: Harishchandra Ent.: Where You're the Star
title_zhCN: 哈里什昌德拉娱乐：你就是明星
stripped_title: Harishchandra Ent.: Where You're the Star
text_enUS: While the Runner is tagged, they play with the grip revealed.
text_zhCN: 如果潜袭者被锁定，他/她以展示其操控器的方式进行游戏。
stripped_text: While the Runner is tagged, they play with the grip revealed.
flavor_enUS: We Know What You Want.
flavor_zhCN: 我们知道你想要什么。

text_enUS:
Full Immersion RecStudio can host up to 2 assets and/or agendas.
The trash cost of Full Immersion RecStudio is increased by 3 for each card hosted on it.
text_zhCN:
全浸影音工作室能被附载最多两个资产和/或议案。
全浸影音工作室上每有一张所附载的卡牌，其销毁费用+3。
stripped_text: Full Immersion RecStudio can host up to 2 assets and/or agendas. The trash cost of Full Immersion RecStudio is increased by 3 for each card hosted on it.
flavor_enUS: The costumes aren't strictly necessary, but they improve the performances of the vactors and sensie stars.
flavor_zhCN: 那些戏服并不是绝对必要的，但它们能提升虚拟演员与复感影星的表现。

text_enUS: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [nbn] cards in your deck. As an additional cost to rez Ibrahim Salem, forfeit an agenda. When your turn begins, name a card type. Look at the Runner's grip and trash 1 card in it of the named type.
text_zhCN: 如果你的牌组中有6张或更多的非联盟[nbn]卡牌，本卡牌影响力为0。 作为激活易卜拉欣·塞勒姆的额外费用，废除一个议案。 当你的回合开始时，指定一种卡牌类型。查看潜袭者的操控器，并从中销毁一张所指定类型的卡牌。
stripped_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance nbn cards in your deck. As an additional cost to rez Ibrahim Salem, forfeit an agenda. When your turn begins, name a card type. Look at the Runner's grip and trash 1 card in it of the named type.

text_enUS: During runs on this server, the Runner cannot use paid abilities on their installed cards except for mid-access abilities and abilities on icebreakers. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 在对本服务器的潜袭中，潜袭者不能使用非破解器卡牌上的付费能力。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: During runs on this server, the Runner cannot use paid abilities on their installed cards except for mid-access abilities and abilities on icebreakers. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: The entertainment capital of Mumbad.
flavor_zhCN: 孟巴德的娱乐之都。

text_enUS:
Zealous Judge can only be rezzed if the Runner is tagged.
[click], 1[credit]: Give the Runner 1 tag.
text_zhCN:
如果潜袭者被锁定，狂热的审判员才能被激活。
[click]，1[credit]：给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: Zealous Judge can only be rezzed if the Runner is tagged. click, 1 credit: Give the Runner 1 tag.

text_enUS: Trash all cards in HQ (minimum of 1). Draw 5 cards.
text_zhCN: 销毁总部中的所有卡牌（至少一张）。补五张卡牌。
stripped_text: Trash all cards in HQ (minimum of 1). Draw 5 cards.
flavor_enUS: "A new administration means we have to start greasing the wheels all over again. Let's get to work."
flavor_zhCN: “政府班子的更替意味着我们要重新疏通关系了。开始干活吧。”

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Play up to 2 operations from HQ (paying all costs), resolving them one at a time.
text_zhCN:
如果潜袭者被锁定，才能打出。
从总部打出最多两个事务（支付所有的费用），依次结算它们。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Play up to 2 operations from HQ (paying all costs), resolving them one at a time.
flavor_enUS: Judicious use of freelancers can increase efficiency and protect the company from legal repercussions. It's what they call a "win-win".
flavor_zhCN: 合理地利用自由职业者可以提高效率并为公司免除法律后果。这就是他们所谓的“共赢”。

text_enUS: Merger is worth 1 additional agenda point while in the Runner's score area.
text_zhCN: 当兼并在潜袭者的分数区时，其额外价值1点议案分数。
stripped_text: Merger is worth 1 additional agenda point while in the Runner's score area.
flavor_enUS: Survival of the fittest' is so outdated; in finance it's 'survival of the fattest.' -Omar Keung, "the Flashpoint"
flavor_zhCN: “适者生存”太过时了；在金融界，“大者生存”。 —奥马尔·姜，《闪点》

text_enUS: This event is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. Whenever the Corp draws 1 or more cards, if it is not the first time they have drawn cards this turn, they lose 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 每当公司补一张或更多的卡牌时，如果这不是本回合他/她第一次补牌，他/她失去1[credit]。
stripped_text: This event is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. Whenever the Corp draws 1 or more cards, if it is not the first time they have drawn cards this turn, they lose 1 credit.

text_enUS: Once per turn → When you encounter a piece of ice, you may trash 1 card from your grip. If you do, that ice gets –2 strength for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: 每回合一次，当你遭遇一层防火墙时，你可以从你的操控器销毁一张卡牌。如果你如此做，本次潜袭的剩余时间内该防火墙的强度减2。
stripped_text: Once per turn -> When you encounter a piece of ice, you may trash 1 card from your grip. If you do, that ice gets -2 strength for the remainder of this run.

text_enUS: Whenever you approach a piece of ice, you may expose it. You may then trash GPI Net Tap to jack out.
text_zhCN: 每当你接驳到一层防火墙时，你可以揭示它。然后你可以销毁GPI网络分接器以退出。
stripped_text: Whenever you approach a piece of ice, you may expose it. You may then trash GPI Net Tap to jack out.
flavor_enUS: Sometimes the itsy-bitsy data is most important.
flavor_zhCN: 有时细小的数据最为重要。

text_enUS: If the Corp has at least 10[credit], as an additional cost to rez each piece of ice, the Corp must spend credits equal to the number of subroutines on that ice.
text_zhCN: 如果公司具有至少10[credit]，作为激活每层防火墙的额外费用，公司必须支付与该防火墙上子进程数量相等的信用点。
stripped_text: If the Corp has at least 10 credits, as an additional cost to rez each piece of ice, the Corp must spend credits equal to the number of subroutines on that ice.
flavor_enUS: "Take it from me, there is a point where you have so much money you stop caring. That's usually right before it all comes tumbling down."
flavor_zhCN: “相信我，等你的钱多到你不在乎的时候，通常就是崩溃的前奏。”

text_enUS: +2[mu] Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may replace 1 spent recurring credit. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +2[mu] 每当你对研发中心进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以重新放置1个已花费的再生信用点。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +2 mu Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may replace 1 spent recurring credit. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: Interface → 2[credit]: Break all subroutines. Use this ability only by spending credits from stealth cards. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 2[credit]：破解所有子进程。仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的信用点来使用本能力。 1[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break all subroutines. Use this ability only by spending credits from stealth cards. 1 credit: +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: In running, as in reality, all elements are connected.
flavor_zhCN: 在潜袭中，正如在现实中，所有要素环环相扣。

text_enUS: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. Whenever you steal an agenda, force the Corp to "Trace[0]. If unsuccessful, the Runner gains credits equal to the number of agenda points in both players' score areas."
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 每当你窃取一个议案时，迫使公司“追踪 0 如果失败，潜袭者获得与双方玩家分数区中的议案分数相等的信用点。”
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. Whenever you steal an agenda, force the Corp to "Trace[0]. If unsuccessful, the Runner gains credits equal to the number of agenda points in both players' score areas."

text_enUS:
Resolve two of the following in any order:
  • Gain 3[credit].
  • Draw 2 cards.
  • Remove 1 tag.
  • Expose 1 piece of ice, then make a run.
text_zhCN:
按任意顺序结算下列中的两项：
  • 获得3[credit]。
  • 补两张卡牌。
  • 移除1枚锁定标记。
  • 揭示一层防火墙，然后进行一次潜袭。
stripped_text: Resolve two of the following in any order: * Gain 3 credits. * Draw 2 cards. * Remove 1 tag. * Expose 1 piece of ice, then make a run.
flavor_zhCN: 由2014年世冠赛冠军Dan D'Argenio设计
attribution: Designed by 2014 World Champion Dan D'Argenio

text_enUS: Choose 1 installed icebreaker and run any server. During that run, the chosen icebreaker gets +2 strength.
text_zhCN: 进行一次潜袭并选择一个破解器。本次潜袭的剩余时间内该破解器的强度+2。
stripped_text: Choose 1 installed icebreaker and run any server. During that run, the chosen icebreaker gets +2 strength.
flavor_enUS: They call it "running" because jacking in is mentally and physically exhausting.
flavor_zhCN: 他们称之为“running”，因为接入使人身心俱疲。

text_enUS: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] The Runner must pay 1[credit] or trash 1 of their installed cards. [subroutine] The Runner must pay 1[credit] or trash 1 of their installed cards.
text_zhCN:
潜袭者能花费[click]，以破解仙童1.0上的任一子进程。
[subroutine] 潜袭者必须支付1[credit]或销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
[subroutine] 潜袭者必须支付1[credit]或销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine The Runner must pay 1 credit or trash 1 of their installed cards. Subroutine The Runner must pay 1 credit or trash 1 of their installed cards.
flavor_enUS: I foresee the end of all things...
flavor_zhCN: 我预见到万物的终结…

text_enUS: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, add 1 installed program to the bottom of the Runner's stack. [subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, add 1 installed program to the bottom of the Runner's stack. [subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag.
text_zhCN:
潜袭者能花费[click][click]，以破解夏洛克2.0上最多2个子进程。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，将一个已安装的程序加入潜袭者的存储栈底端。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，将一个已安装的程序加入潜袭者的存储栈底端。
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: Lose click click: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, add 1 installed program to the bottom of the Runner's stack. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, add 1 installed program to the bottom of the Runner's stack. Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 生化人 - 追踪者

text_enUS: The first time each turn you reveal secretly spent credits, gain that many credits.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次展示秘密花费的信用点时，获得与其数量相等的信用点。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you reveal secretly spent credits, gain that many credits.
flavor_enUS: "I'm telling you, free up the emergency accounts. Something's coming; I haven't seen a reaction like that since the tsunami. My god, the screaming..."
flavor_zhCN: “你听我说，腾出应急账户。有大事要发生；大海啸之后我还没见过像这样的反应。天啊，那尖叫声…”

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing this ice in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this ice anywhere except in Archives, they encounter it.
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
text_zhCN:
如果蝶蛹从研发中心被读取，潜袭者必须展示它。
当潜袭者读取蝶蛹时，他/她遭遇它。如果潜袭者从档案库读取蝶蛹，则忽略本能力。
[subroutine] 造成2点网域伤害。
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this ice in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this ice anywhere except in Archives, they encounter it. Subroutine Do 2 net damage.

text_enUS:
Whenever the Runner makes an unsuccessful run on this server, do 1 net damage.
2[credit]: Move Georgia Emelyov to another server.
text_zhCN:
每当潜袭者对本服务器进行一次失败的潜袭时，造成1点网域伤害。
2[credit]：将乔治娅·叶梅廖夫转移到另一台服务器。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner makes an unsuccessful run on this server, do 1 net damage. 2 credits: Move Georgia Emelyov to another server.
flavor_enUS: "Your mistake is thinking that it's just business, when really it's a war."
flavor_zhCN: “你的错误在于以为这只是一场生意，但其实这是一场战争。”

text_enUS: The rez cost of the first piece of ice you rez each turn is lowered by 1 for each tag the Runner has.
text_zhCN: 潜袭者每有1枚锁定标记，每回合你激活的第一层防火墙的激活费用减1。
stripped_text: The rez cost of the first piece of ice you rez each turn is lowered by 1 for each tag the Runner has.
flavor_enUS: "Person of interest. Noun. Someone who is about to get ****ed by a corp." - Anarch's Dictionary, Volume Who's Counting
flavor_zhCN: 嫌疑人。名词。即将被公司给*了的人。 —反叛者的字典，谁管第几卷

text_enUS:
After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends.
Play only if the Runner made a run during their last turn.
Trace[4]. If successful, give the Runner 4 tags.
text_zhCN:
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
如果潜袭者在他/她的上回合进行过潜袭，才能打出。
<trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者4枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends. Play only if the Runner made a run during their last turn. Trace[4]. If successful, give the Runner 4 tags.

text_enUS: The first time the Runner trashes an installed Corp card each turn, you may trace[4]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag (cannot be avoided).
text_zhCN: 每回合潜袭者第一次销毁一张已安装的公司卡牌时，你可以<trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记（不能被避免）。
stripped_text: The first time the Runner trashes an installed Corp card each turn, you may trace[4]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag (cannot be avoided).

text_enUS: If the Runner is tagged, Crisis Management gains "When your turn begins, do 1 meat damage."
text_zhCN: 如果潜袭者被锁定，危机管理获得“当你的回合开始时，造成1点肢体伤害。”
stripped_text: If the Runner is tagged, Crisis Management gains "When your turn begins, do 1 meat damage."
flavor_enUS: "For the duration of the emergency" is code for "this is the way things are now."
flavor_zhCN: “值此非常时期”的隐义是“这就是新规则”。

text_enUS:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Gain 3[credit] for each agenda in the Runner's score area.
text_zhCN:
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
潜袭者的分数区中每有一个议案，获得3[credit]。
stripped_text: After you resolve this operation, end your action phase. Gain 3 credits for each agenda in the Runner's score area.
flavor_enUS: A stock dropping sharply is bad for shareholders, but not neccessarily bad for the company.
flavor_zhCN: 暴跌的股票对股东不利，但对公司而言未必。

text_enUS: If you have at least 10[credit], each piece of ice has +1 strength for every 5[credit] in your credit pool.
text_zhCN: 如果你具有至少10[credit]，你的信用池中每有5[credit]，每层防火墙的强度+1。
stripped_text: If you have at least 10 credits, each piece of ice has +1 strength for every 5 credits in your credit pool.
flavor_enUS: Money is power.
flavor_zhCN: 金钱就是力量。

text_enUS: Make a run. Trash the first non-agenda card you access during this run at no cost. The Corp can spend credits equal to the rez or play cost of the accessed card to prevent this trash.
text_zhCN: 进行一次潜袭。销毁本次潜袭你所读取的第一张非议案卡牌，无须费用。公司能支付与被读取卡牌的激活或打出费用相等的信用点，以防止本次销毁。
stripped_text: Make a run. Trash the first non-agenda card you access during this run at no cost. The Corp can spend credits equal to the rez or play cost of the accessed card to prevent this trash.

text_enUS: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. Each unique (♦) non-region asset and upgrade loses its printed abilities.
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 每个独有的非区域资产或升级的规则文字成为空白。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. Each unique non-region asset and upgrade loses its printed abilities.
flavor_enUS: "You can have a lot of fun in 23 seconds." -Princess Space Kitten
flavor_zhCN: “二十三秒乐趣多。” —太空喵公主

text_enUS: Whenever this program fully breaks a piece of ice, place 1 power counter on this program. This program gets +1 strength for each power counter on it. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine.
text_zhCN: 当一层你使用奈菲尔破解其所有子进程的防火墙遭遇结束时，放置1枚能量指示物到奈菲尔上。 奈菲尔上每有1枚能量指示物，其强度+1。 1[credit]：破解屏障子进程。
stripped_text: Whenever this program fully breaks a piece of ice, place 1 power counter on this program. This program gets +1 strength for each power counter on it. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine.
flavor_enUS: Balance out the equation.
flavor_zhCN: 等式平衡。

text_enUS: Whenever you encounter a barrier, you may install this program from your heap. X[credit]: +X strength. Then, if this program can interface with the barrier you are encountering, break up to X subroutines.
text_zhCN: 每当你遭遇一个屏障时，你可以从你的堆阵安装回形针（支付其安装费用）。 X[credit]：强度+X。如可能，破解最多X个屏障子进程。
stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a barrier, you may install this program from your heap. X credits: +X strength. Then, if this program can interface with the barrier you are encountering, break up to X subroutines.
flavor_enUS: "It is not wise to call someone crazy until you fully understand what they're trying to say." -Omar Keung
flavor_zhCN: “在充分理解其想说的内容之前，叫别人疯子是不明智的。” —奥马尔·姜

text_enUS: Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 2[credit]: +4 strength. 2[credit], add this program to your grip: Derez 1 sentry this program fully broke during this encounter.
text_zhCN: 2[credit]：破解最多2个警报子进程。 2[credit]：强度+4。 2[credit]，将金雕加入你的操控器：关闭一个警报。在一次遭遇中使用金雕破解该警报上的所有子进程后，才能使用本能力。
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 2 credits: +4 strength. 2 credits, add this program to your grip: Derez 1 sentry this program fully broke during this encounter.
flavor_enUS: The program was as close to a hunting raptor as she could afford...for now.
flavor_zhCN: 这程序就像只猎禽，只要她负担得起…目前如此。

text_enUS:
Choose a server and place 20[credit] from the bank on Temüjin Contract when you install it. When there are no credits left on Temüjin Contract, trash it.
Whenever you make a successful run on the chosen server, take 4[credit] from Temüjin Contract.
text_zhCN:
当你安装铁木真合约时，选择一台服务器，并从银行中放置20[credit]到本卡牌上。当铁木真合约上没有信用点时，销毁本卡牌。
每当你对所选择的服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，从铁木真合约上拿取4[credit]。
stripped_text: Choose a server and place 20 credits from the bank on Temujin Contract when you install it. When there are no credits left on Temujin Contract, trash it. Whenever you make a successful run on the chosen server, take 4 credits from Temujin Contract.
flavor_enUS: "The best part is, it's legal!" -Khan
flavor_zhCN: “最好的一点是，它合法！” —可汗

text_enUS: The first time you pass a piece of ice each turn, you may install an icebreaker from your hand, lowering the install cost by 1.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次通过一层防火墙时，你可以从你的操控器安装一个破解器，其安装费用减1。
stripped_text: The first time you pass a piece of ice each turn, you may install an icebreaker from your hand, lowering the install cost by 1.

text_enUS: Make a run on R&D. If successful, you may make another run on R&D when this run ends.
text_zhCN: 对研发中心进行一次潜袭。如果成功，你可以在本次潜袭结束时对研发中心进行另一次潜袭。
stripped_text: Make a run on R&D. If successful, you may make another run on R&D when this run ends.
flavor_enUS: Once a security flaw is identified, there's only a limited window to exploit it before it's patched. Runners call this period "open season."
flavor_zhCN: 一个安全漏洞一旦被发现，在打上补丁前，利用它的时机是有限的。潜袭者称之为“开放期”。

text_enUS:
When your turn begins, you may move up to 3[credit] from your credit pool to Algo Trading.
When your turn begins, place 2[credit] on Algo Trading from the bank if there are at least 6[credit] on it.
[click],[trash]: Take all credits from Algo Trading.
text_zhCN:
当你的回合开始时，你可以从你的信用池中转移最多3[credit]到算法交易上。
当你的回合开始时，如果算法交易具有至少6[credit]，从银行中放置2[credit]到本卡牌上。
[click]，[trash]：从算法交易上拿取所有的信用点。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may move up to 3 credits from your credit pool to Algo Trading. When your turn begins, place 2 credits on Algo Trading from the bank if there are at least 6 credits on it. click,trash: Take all credits from Algo Trading.

text_enUS:
If the Corp has 5-9[credit] when your turn begins, gain 1[credit].
If the Corp has 10-14[credit] when your turn begins, draw 1 card.
If the Corp has at least 15[credit] when your turn begins, gain [click].
text_zhCN:
如果当你的回合开始时，公司具有5-9[credit]，获得1[credit]。
如果当你的回合开始时，公司具有10-14[credit]，补一张卡牌。
如果当你的回合开始时，公司具有至少15[credit]，获得[click]。
stripped_text: If the Corp has 5-9 credits when your turn begins, gain 1 credit. If the Corp has 10-14 credits when your turn begins, draw 1 card. If the Corp has at least 15 credits when your turn begins, gain click.
flavor_enUS: "Coming to you live from the front lines, for now, unless they kill me..."
flavor_zhCN: “即将为您带来的是前线的实况，现在，除非他们杀了我…”

text_enUS: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] The Runner must pay 2[credit] or trash 1 of their installed cards. [subroutine] The Runner must pay 2[credit] or trash 1 of their installed cards. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage.
text_zhCN:
潜袭者能花费[click][click]，以破解仙童2.0上最多2个子进程。
[subroutine] 潜袭者必须支付2[credit]或销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
[subroutine] 潜袭者必须支付2[credit]或销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
[subroutine] 造成1点脑部伤害。
stripped_text: Lose click click: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine The Runner must pay 2 credits or trash 1 of their installed cards. Subroutine The Runner must pay 2 credits or trash 1 of their installed cards. Subroutine Do 1 core damage.
subtype_zhCN: 门禁 - 生化人 - 杀伤
flavor_enUS: To threaten my treasures is to incur my wrath.
flavor_zhCN: 觊夺我的财宝必将招致我的愤怒。

text_enUS:
[subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, the Runner draws 2 cards.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，潜袭者补两张卡牌。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: Subroutine You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, the Runner draws 2 cards. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.
subtype_zhCN: 门禁 - 灵能 - 杀伤
flavor_enUS: First, blend with the attacker. Then, control the attack.
flavor_zhCN: 首先，融入攻击者。然后，控制攻击。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Trace[3]. If successful, trash an installed card that does not match the faction of the Runner's identity.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
<trace>追踪 3</trace> 如果成功，销毁一张已安装的，并且和潜袭者特性的派系不同的卡牌。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Trace[3]. If successful, trash an installed card that does not match the faction of the Runner's identity.
flavor_enUS: "Eiko here. It's done."
flavor_zhCN: “我是栄子。事已办妥。”

text_enUS: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click]. Trace[5]. If successful, add an installed non-virtual card to the Runner's grip.
text_zhCN: 作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。 追踪 5 如果成功，将一张已安装的非虚拟卡牌加入潜袭者的操控器。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Trace[5]. If successful, add an installed non-virtual card to the Runner's grip.
flavor_enUS: "SELL!! Buy platinum, but GET OUT OF THE TT CREDIT! It is TOXIC!"
flavor_zhCN: “开卖了！！买入白金，远离TT信用点！它有毒！”

text_enUS: Shuffle any number of cards from HQ into R&D. Draw that number of cards.
text_zhCN: 将任意数量的卡牌从总部洗入研发中心。补与其数量相等的卡牌。
stripped_text: Shuffle any number of cards from HQ into R&D. Draw that number of cards.
flavor_enUS: By the time the report of Emelyov's murder was produced, there had already been a dozen more, hitting all the corps.
flavor_zhCN: 等到叶梅廖夫被谋害的报道出来时，早已有了各种版本，冲击着所有的公司。

text_enUS:
When your turn begins, you may move up to 3[credit] from your credit pool to C.I. Fund.
When your turn begins, place 2[credit] on C.I. Fund from the bank if there are at least 6[credit] on it.
2[credit],[trash]: Take all credits from C.I. Fund.
text_zhCN:
当你的回合开始时，你可以从你的信用池中转移最多3[credit]到资本投资基金上。
当你的回合开始时，如果资本投资基金具有至少6[credit]，从银行中放置2[credit]到本卡牌上。
2[credit]，[trash]：从资本投资基金上拿取所有的信用点。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may move up to 3 credits from your credit pool to C.I. Fund. When your turn begins, place 2 credits on C.I. Fund from the bank if there are at least 6 credits on it. 2 credits,trash: Take all credits from C.I. Fund.

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Trash any number of your rezzed cards and gain 3[credit] for each card trashed.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
销毁任意数量的你已激活的卡牌，每销毁一张卡牌，获得3[credit]。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Trash any number of your rezzed cards and gain 3 credits for each card trashed.
subtype_zhCN: 双重 - 灰色行动 - 交易
flavor_enUS: What's a little insurance fraud between friends?
flavor_zhCN: 朋友之间，一点保险欺诈算得了什么？

title_zhCN: 威兰财团：国家的建造者
text_enUS: The first time each turn an encounter with an advanced piece of ice ends, do 1 meat damage.
text_zhCN:
每回合第一次一层具有至少1枚推进标记的防火墙遭遇结束时，造成1点肢体伤害。
<errata>勘误自FAQ 3.1.1</errata>
stripped_text: The first time each turn an encounter with an advanced piece of ice ends, do 1 meat damage.
flavor_enUS: Strength makes leaders.
flavor_zhCN: 实力造就领袖。

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner has at least 6[credit].
The Runner loses 2[credit] for each installed resource. The Runner can trash a resource to prevent this.
text_zhCN:
如果潜袭者具有至少6[credit]，才能打出。
每有一个已安装的资源，潜袭者失去2[credit]。潜袭者能销毁一个资源以防止本效果。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner has at least 6 credits. The Runner loses 2 credits for each installed resource. The Runner can trash a resource to prevent this.
flavor_enUS: She'd never heard her dads argue like this. Not ever. She'd give anything to make it stop.
flavor_zhCN: 她从没听到过自己的爸爸们吵成这样。也从不想听到。她愿意付出自己的一切来停止这争吵。

text_enUS: If the Runner accesses Prisec while installed, you may pay 2[credit] to give the Runner 1 tag and do 1 meat damage.
text_zhCN: 如果潜袭者读取已安装的私卫，你可以支付2[credit]，以给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记并造成1点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: If the Runner accesses Prisec while installed, you may pay 2 credits to give the Runner 1 tag and do 1 meat damage.
flavor_enUS: "While the money pooled at the top, the power went with it, until there were two sets of laws: one for them, one for us" -Omar Keung, the Flashpoint
flavor_zhCN: 随着金钱向顶层汇集，权力也随之而去，直到出现两套法律：他们用的，和我们用的。 —奥马尔·姜，《闪点》

text_enUS: +1[mu] You get +1 maximum hand size for each tag you have. The first time each turn a successful run on HQ or R&D ends, draw 1 card for each time you accessed a card during that run. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu] 你每有1枚锁定标记，你的手牌上限+1。 每回合第一次对研发中心或总部进行的成功的潜袭结束时，你在本次潜袭中每读取过一张卡牌，补一张卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu You get +1 maximum hand size for each tag you have. The first time each turn a successful run on HQ or R&D ends, draw 1 card for each time you accessed a card during that run. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: Whenever you encounter a code gate, you may install this program from your heap. 3[credit]: +2 strength. Then, if this program can interface with the code gate you are encountering, break up to 2 subroutines.
text_zhCN: 每当你遭遇一个门禁时，你可以从你的堆阵安装黑色乐团（支付其安装费用）。 3[credit]：强度+2。如可能，破解最多2个门禁子进程。
stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a code gate, you may install this program from your heap. 3 credits: +2 strength. Then, if this program can interface with the code gate you are encountering, break up to 2 subroutines.
flavor_enUS: "In extremity, your conscience may make you terrible." -Omar Keung, the Flashpoint
flavor_zhCN: 在绝境中，良知或使你变得可怕。 —奥马尔·姜，《闪点》

text_enUS: Once per turn → [click]: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ or R&D for the remainder of that run.
text_zhCN: [click]：对档案库进行一次潜袭。如果成功，将其代替为对另一台中央服务器进行一次成功的潜袭。每回合仅能使用一次本能力。
stripped_text: Once per turn -> click: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ or R&D for the remainder of that run.

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 3[credit]: +3 strength. 2[credit], add this program to your grip: Derez 1 code gate this program fully broke during this encounter.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解门禁子进程。 3[credit]：强度+3。 2[credit]，将游隼加入你的操控器：关闭一个门禁。在一次遭遇中使用游隼破解该门禁上的所有子进程后，才能使用本能力。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 3 credits: +3 strength. 2 credits, add this program to your grip: Derez 1 code gate this program fully broke during this encounter.
flavor_enUS: Khan's avatar lifted her arm and the bird launched itself into the air.
flavor_zhCN: 可汗的虚拟形象抬起手臂，猎禽跃起飞向空中。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +4 strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1 credit from a stealth card.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解门禁子进程。 2[credit]：本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度+4。仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的至少1信用点来使用本能力。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: +4 strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1 credit from a stealth card.
flavor_enUS: My brain is the key that sets my mind free.
flavor_zhCN: 我的头脑是解放我心智的钥匙。

text_enUS: The first time you spend at least 1[credit] from a stealth card each run, place 1[credit] on Net Mercur or draw 1 card. Use credits on Net Mercur for anything.
text_zhCN: 每次潜袭中你第一次花费隐匿卡牌上的至少1[credit]时，放置1[credit]到默库尔网台上或补一张卡牌。 默库尔网台上的信用点用于任意用途。
stripped_text: The first time you spend at least 1 credit from a stealth card each run, place 1 credit on Net Mercur or draw 1 card. Use credits on Net Mercur for anything.
flavor_enUS: "Live, unfiltered, and uncensored: this is Net Mercur, signing off for the night. Stay safe, New Angeles."
flavor_zhCN: “直播，零过滤，无审查：这里是默库尔网台，今晚的广播到此结束。注意安全，新洛杉矶。”

text_enUS:
Whenever you draw a card, reveal that card.
The first time each turn you make a successful run, you may look at the top card of R&D.
text_zhCN:
每当你补牌时，展示所补的卡牌。
每回合你第一次进行成功的潜袭时，你可以查看研发中心顶端的一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever you draw a card, reveal that card. The first time each turn you make a successful run, you may look at the top card of R&D.
flavor_enUS: All bioroids are bound by the Three Directives, but in theory a bioroid could have any number of core directives. Even zero.
flavor_zhCN: 所有生化人都受三指令的约束，但理论上一个生化人可以有任意数量的核心指令。甚至是零。

text_enUS: 2[credit]: Draw 1 card. Use this ability only if you have suffered damage from a Corp card ability this turn.
text_zhCN: 2[credit]：补一张卡牌。如果你本回合已受到过公司卡牌能力造成的伤害，才能使用本能力。
stripped_text: 2 credits: Draw 1 card. Use this ability only if you have suffered damage from a Corp card ability this turn.
flavor_enUS: "Last week, I crossed the street to avoid her. Today, she pulled me out of the rubble. Makes me rethink who the bad guys are."
flavor_zhCN: “上周，我过马路只为躲开她。今天，她将我从瓦砾中救起。这让我反思坏人究竟是谁。”

text_enUS: Lose [click][click][click]: Break up to 3 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] The Runner must pay 3[credit] or trash 1 of their installed cards. [subroutine] The Runner must pay 3[credit] or trash 1 of their installed cards. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage or end the run.
text_zhCN:
潜袭者能花费[click][click][click]，以破解仙童3.0上最多3个子进程。
[subroutine] 潜袭者必须支付3[credit]或销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
[subroutine] 潜袭者必须支付3[credit]或销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
[subroutine] 造成1点脑部伤害或终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Lose click click click: Break up to 3 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine The Runner must pay 3 credits or trash 1 of their installed cards. Subroutine The Runner must pay 3 credits or trash 1 of their installed cards. Subroutine Do 1 core damage or end the run.
subtype_zhCN: 门禁 - 生化人 - 杀伤
flavor_enUS: In battle, I take half the slain.
flavor_zhCN: 在战场上，我带走一半的亡者。

text_enUS: Name a card. Remove all copies of that card in the heap from the game.
text_zhCN: 指定一张卡牌的名称。将堆阵中其所有相同卡牌移出游戏。
stripped_text: Name a card. Remove all copies of that card in the heap from the game.
flavor_enUS: "If you live off-site, please consult the building AI for temporary housing. We regret that your off-site family cannot join you here while we are in lockdown..."
flavor_zhCN: “如果你住在场外，请向建筑人工智能咨询临时住房。封锁期间，我们很遗憾场外的亲属不能与你在此会合。”

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner trashed a card while accessing it during their last turn.
Trace[2]. If successful, trash 2 installed non-program cards. If unsuccessful, take 1 bad publicity.
text_zhCN:
如果潜袭者在他/她的上回合销毁过被读取的公司卡牌，才能打出。
<trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，销毁两张已安装的非程序卡牌。如果失败，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner trashed a card while accessing it during their last turn. Trace[2]. If successful, trash 2 installed non-program cards. If unsuccessful, take 1 bad publicity.
flavor_enUS: "Wait a minute, I don't even have a cat."
flavor_zhCN: “等一下。我根本就没养猫。”

text_enUS: When you score Project Kusanagi, place 1 agenda counter on it for each advancement token on it over 2. Hosted agenda counter: Choose 1 piece of ice to gain "[subroutine] Do 1 net damage." after all its other subroutines for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: 当你用草薙计划计分时，草薙计划上超过2枚推进标记的，每超过1枚，放置1枚议案指示物到本卡牌上。 所附载的议案指示物：选择一层防火墙，本次潜袭的剩余时间内，该防火墙在其它所有子进程后获得“[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。”
stripped_text: When you score Project Kusanagi, place 1 agenda counter on it for each advancement token on it over 2. Hosted agenda counter: Choose 1 piece of ice to gain "Subroutine Do 1 net damage." after all its other subroutines for the remainder of this run.

text_enUS:
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2[credit].
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。潜袭者失去2[credit]。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。潜袭者失去2[credit]。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。潜袭者失去2[credit]。
stripped_text: Subroutine Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2 credits. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2 credits. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: When your ID is flagged with your genetic profile, "privacy"  doesn't really exist.
flavor_zhCN: 当你的身份被打上基因档案的标注，其实也就不存在“隐私”了。

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner takes at least 1 net damage, trash the top card of the stack.
text_zhCN: 每当潜袭者承受至少1点网域伤害时，销毁存储栈顶端的一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner takes at least 1 net damage, trash the top card of the stack.
flavor_enUS: Your better nature.
flavor_zhCN: 人性向善。

text_enUS: [trash]: Shuffle all cards in HQ into R&D. The Runner may pay any number of credits to prevent 1 random card in HQ from being shuffled into R&D for every 2[credit] spent.
text_zhCN: [trash]：将总部中的所有卡牌洗入研发中心。潜袭者可以支付任意数量的信用点，并且其每支付2[credit]，防止总部中的一张随机卡牌被洗入研发中心。
stripped_text: trash: Shuffle all cards in HQ into R&D. The Runner may pay any number of credits to prevent 1 random card in HQ from being shuffled into R&D for every 2 credits spent.
flavor_enUS: "She used to work for me at my chop shop. Now she makes more money than I do." -MacPherson
flavor_zhCN: “她曾经在我的拆卸店为我打工。现在她赚的钱比我还多。” —麦弗逊

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner has fewer than 6[credit].
As an additional cost to play this operation, remove 1 tag.
Trash 1 installed card.
text_zhCN:
如果潜袭者具有少于6[credit]，才能打出。
作为打出本事务的额外费用，移除1枚锁定标记。
销毁一张已安装的卡牌。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner has fewer than 6 credits. As an additional cost to play this operation, remove 1 tag. Trash 1 installed card.
flavor_enUS: Observing is fun, but it's just the appetizer.
flavor_zhCN: 观察很有趣，但它只是一道开胃菜。

text_enUS: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. As an additional cost to run for the first time during their turn, the Runner must spend 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 作为在他/她的回合第一次进行潜袭（即使通过卡牌能力）的额外费用，潜袭者必须花费1[credit]。
stripped_text: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. As an additional cost to run for the first time during their turn, the Runner must spend 1 credit.

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner has at least 2 tags.
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Do 7 meat damage.
text_zhCN:
如果潜袭者具有至少2枚锁定标记，才能打出。
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
造成7点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner has at least 2 tags. As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Do 7 meat damage.
flavor_enUS: Game over.
flavor_zhCN: 游戏结束。

text_enUS: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. When the Runner's turn begins, Trace[1]. If successful, do 1 meat damage if the Runner is tagged; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag.
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 当潜袭者的回合开始时，追踪 1 如果成功，并且潜袭者被锁定，造成1点肢体伤害；否则，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. When the Runner's turn begins, Trace[1]. If successful, do 1 meat damage if the Runner is tagged; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag.

text_enUS: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The install cost of each resource is increased by 2.
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 每个资源的安装费用+2。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The install cost of each resource is increased by 2.
flavor_enUS: The event is now referred to as the Water Tower Massacre. No one was ever indicted, and no one knows who paid the prisec team responsible.
flavor_zhCN: 该事件如今被称作“水塔惨案”。一直没人被控诉，也没人知道是谁给对此事负责的私卫付了酬金。

text_enUS:
Play only if you made a successful run this turn.
Trash 1 unrezzed piece of ice you passed during your last run.
text_zhCN:
只有你本回合已进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
销毁1层你在上一次潜袭中通过的未激活的防火墙。
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run this turn. Trash 1 unrezzed piece of ice you passed during your last run.
flavor_enUS: "When your opponent is weak, strike. If you do not, he will become strong." - the Playbook
flavor_zhCN: “趁你的对手脆弱时，出击。倘若你按兵不动，对方就将变强。” —《战术手册》

text_enUS: Look at the top 10 cards of your stack. If any of those cards are programs, you may install one of them, lowering the install cost by 5. Trash the rest of those cards.
text_zhCN: 查看你存储栈顶端的十张卡牌。如果这些卡牌中有任何程序，你可以安装其中一张，其安装费用减5。销毁这些卡牌中余下的卡牌。
stripped_text: Look at the top 10 cards of your stack. If any of those cards are programs, you may install one of them, lowering the install cost by 5. Trash the rest of those cards.
flavor_enUS: Omar goes through four, five keyboards per week, no two from the same decade.
flavor_zhCN: 奥马尔每周都要用掉四五个键盘，它们全都来自不同年代。

text_enUS: +2[mu] Whenever you breach HQ during a run, access 1 additional card for each piece of ice protecting HQ that you fully broke during that run. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +2[mu] 每当你在潜袭中从总部读取卡牌时，每有一层保护总部的防火墙在本次潜袭中被你破解其所有子进程，额外读取一张卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +2 mu Whenever you breach HQ during a run, access 1 additional card for each piece of ice protecting HQ that you fully broke during that run. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength. 2[credit], add this program to your grip: Derez 1 barrier this program fully broke during this encounter.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解屏障子进程。 2[credit]：强度+2。 2[credit]，将猎隼加入你的操控器：关闭一个屏障。在一次遭遇中使用猎隼破解该屏障上的所有子进程后，才能使用本能力。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2 credits: +2 strength. 2 credits, add this program to your grip: Derez 1 barrier this program fully broke during this encounter.
flavor_enUS: Spiraling even higher, every feature of cyberspace sprawled before it.
flavor_zhCN: “盘旋高飞，赛博空间的所有特征尽展眼前。”

text_enUS: [click],[click]: Draw 3 cards. Shuffle 1 card from your grip into your stack.
text_zhCN: [click]，[click]：补三张卡牌。将一张卡牌从你的操控器洗入你的存储栈。
stripped_text: click,click: Draw 3 cards. Shuffle 1 card from your grip into your stack.
flavor_enUS: "I used to run stims, simsensies, the usual. I was scum. Now I run water. I'm a fragging hero."
flavor_zhCN: “以前我运送兴奋剂和虚拟复感作品，常见的东西。我是个败类。现在我运送水。我特么成了英雄。”

title_enUS: Ele "Smoke" Scovak: Cynosure of the Net
title_zhCN: 艾丽·“浓烟”·斯科娃：网界明星
stripped_title: Ele "Smoke" Scovak: Cynosure of the Net
text_enUS: 1[recurring-credit] Use this credit to pay for using icebreakers.
text_zhCN: 1[recurring-credit] 本信用点用于支付使用破解器。
stripped_text: 1 recurring credit Use this credit to pay for using icebreakers.
flavor_enUS: "Nothing up my sleeve..."
flavor_zhCN: “我可没有袖藏妙计…”

text_enUS: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, instead of breaching R&D, you may choose 1 of the top 5 cards in R&D and access it.
text_zhCN: 每当你对研发中心进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以选择研发中心顶端的五张卡牌中的一张并读取它，代替读取卡牌。本次潜袭你不能读取研发中心的其它任何卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, instead of breaching R&D, you may choose 1 of the top 5 cards in R&D and access it.
flavor_enUS: "I usually find something interesting in there. Just not what I was looking for."
flavor_zhCN: “我经常在那里面发现有趣的事物。只是它们并非我要找的东西。”

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 3[credit]: +4 strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1[credit] from a stealth card.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解屏障子进程。 3[credit]：本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度+4。仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的至少1信用点来使用本能力。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 3 credits: +4 strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1 credit from a stealth card.
flavor_enUS: The personality must be bigger than the prop.
flavor_zhCN: 个人魅力须胜过道具。

text_enUS: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. While secretly spending credits, players cannot spend 2[credit].
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 当秘密花费信用点时，玩家不能花费2[credit]。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. While secretly spending credits, players cannot spend 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: "Take this to Inez Delgado in Netcrimes. No one else."
flavor_zhCN: “把这个带给网络犯罪部的伊内兹·德尔加多。别给其它人。”

text_enUS: When your discard phase ends while you are tagged, the Corp must trace[1]. If unsuccessful, remove 1 tag. [interrupt] → [trash], trash all cards from your grip: Prevent all meat damage.
text_zhCN: 如果当你的回合结束时，你被锁定，迫使公司“追踪 1 如果失败，潜袭者移除1枚锁定标记。” [trash]，销毁你操控器中的所有卡牌：防止所有的肢体伤害。
stripped_text: When your discard phase ends while you are tagged, the Corp must trace[1]. If unsuccessful, remove 1 tag. Interrupt -> trash, trash all cards from your grip: Prevent all meat damage.
flavor_enUS: "The Starlight Meditation Booths are available to refugees for free for the duration of the crisis."
flavor_zhCN: “危机期间，星光冥想室向所有避难者免费开放。”

text_enUS: Host this operation on a rezzed piece of bioroid ice as a condition counter with "Host ice gains '[subroutine] Do 1 core damage.' before all its other subroutines."
text_zhCN: 将湿活改装安装到一层已激活的生化人防火墙上，作为所附载的状态指示物，规则文字为“被附载的防火墙在其它所有子进程前获得'[subroutine] 造成1点脑部伤害。'”
stripped_text: Host this operation on a rezzed piece of bioroid ice as a condition counter with "Host ice gains 'Subroutine Do 1 core damage.' before all its other subroutines."
flavor_enUS: "I let the bioroids do a ride-along via remote, so they can see what pain really looks like." -Agent Valkyrie
flavor_zhCN: “我远程遥控生化人去巡逻，以让他们看到痛苦的真实模样。” —特工瓦尔基里

title_zhCN: 哈斯生化：未来的设计师
text_enUS: The first time each turn the Runner passes a rezzed piece of bioroid ice, you may rez 1 bioroid card, paying 4[credit] less.
text_zhCN: 每回合潜袭者第一次通过一层已激活的生化人防火墙时，你可以激活1张生化人卡牌，其激活费用减4[credit]。
stripped_text: The first time each turn the Runner passes a rezzed piece of bioroid ice, you may rez 1 bioroid card, paying 4 credits less.

text_enUS: Whenever you and the Runner reveal secretly spent credits, do 1 meat damage if you and the Runner spent a different number of credits.
text_zhCN: 每当你和潜袭者展示秘密花费的信用点时，如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，造成1点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: Whenever you and the Runner reveal secretly spent credits, do 1 meat damage if you and the Runner spent a different number of credits.
flavor_enUS: "Does an alliance with the yakuza truly seem so strange? They are honorable businessmen, and women, just like us." -Rin Kimura, Chief NA Security
flavor_zhCN: “和极道会的联盟真的看起来很奇怪吗？他们都是可敬的商人，包括女商人，就像我们一样。” —新洛杉矶防卫队长，木村凛

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, trash the top card of R&D.
Draw 3 cards. Add 3 cards from HQ to the top of R&D in any order.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，销毁研发中心顶端的一张卡牌。
补三张卡牌。将三张卡牌从总部按任意顺序加入研发中心顶端。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, trash the top card of R&D. Draw 3 cards. Add 3 cards from HQ to the top of R&D in any order.
flavor_enUS: "Keep your head down, keep moving, try not to attract attention."
flavor_zhCN: “不要抬头，不要停下，尽量不要引起注意。”

When the Runner encounters this ice, they take 1 tag unless they pay 3[credit].
