text_enUS: If the Runner is tagged, Drone Screen gains "Whenever the Runner initiates a run on this server, Trace[3]. If successful, do 1 meat damage (cannot be prevented)."
text_zhCN: 如果潜袭者被锁定，无人机画面获得“每当潜袭者对本服务器发起一次潜袭时，<trace>追踪 3</trace> 如果成功，造成1点肢体伤害（不能被防止）。”
stripped_text: If the Runner is tagged, Drone Screen gains "Whenever the Runner initiates a run on this server, Trace[3]. If successful, do 1 meat damage (cannot be prevented)."
flavor_enUS: Falstaff-337B; decrypt-ok; loc:0.258500, -79.920791 -ok; auth-ok; msg:KAR kill authority requested y/n?
flavor_zhCN: Falstaff-337B; decrypt-ok; loc:0.258500,-79.920791 -ok; auth-ok; msg:KAR杀伤权限请求中 y/n?

text_enUS: Whenever an encounter with a piece of ice ends, place 1 power counter on Chief Slee for each unbroken subroutine on the encountered piece of ice. [click], 5 hosted power counters: Do 5 meat damage.
text_zhCN: 每当一层防火墙遭遇结束时，被遭遇的防火墙上每有一个未破解的子进程，放置1枚能量指示物到斯丽队长上。 [click]，5枚所附载的能量指示物：造成5点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: Whenever an encounter with a piece of ice ends, place 1 power counter on Chief Slee for each unbroken subroutine on the encountered piece of ice. click, 5 hosted power counters: Do 5 meat damage.

text_enUS: When you rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity. When the Runner encounters this ice, gain 2[credit] if there is an installed AI program. [subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 installed program. [subroutine] Gain 2[credit]. End the run. [subroutine] Gain 2[credit]. End the run.
text_zhCN: 当你激活壁垒时，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。 当潜袭者遭遇壁垒时，如果有一个已安装的智能模块，获得2[credit]。 [subroutine] 潜袭者销毁一个程序。 [subroutine] 公司获得2[credit]。终止本次潜袭。 [subroutine] 公司获得2[credit]。终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity. When the Runner encounters this ice, gain 2 credits if there is an installed AI program. Subroutine The Runner trashes 1 installed program. Subroutine Gain 2 credits. End the run. Subroutine Gain 2 credits. End the run.

text_enUS: Trash 1 installed card with an install cost equal to or less than the number of tags the Runner has.
text_zhCN: 销毁一张已安装的卡牌，该卡牌的安装费用等于或小于潜袭者所具有的锁定标记数量。
stripped_text: Trash 1 installed card with an install cost equal to or less than the number of tags the Runner has.
flavor_enUS: When a shooting war threatens, the prudent course is to shoot first.
flavor_zhCN: 热战即将爆发的时候，审慎的做法应是先开枪。

text_enUS:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Shuffle 3 cards from Archives into R&D. Remove Preemptive Action from the game instead of trashing it.
text_zhCN:
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
将三张卡牌从档案库洗入研发中心。将抢先行动移出游戏，代替销毁它。
stripped_text: After you resolve this operation, end your action phase. Shuffle 3 cards from Archives into R&D. Remove Preemptive Action from the game instead of trashing it.
flavor_zhCN: “场地安全。你可继续。”

text_enUS: Whenever you encounter a sentry, you may install this program from your heap. 3[credit]: +2 strength. Then, if this program can interface with the sentry you are encountering, break up to 2 subroutines.
text_zhCN: 每当你遭遇一个警报时，你可以从你的堆阵安装MKUltra（支付其安装费用）。 3[credit]：强度+2。如可能，破解最多2个警报子进程。
stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a sentry, you may install this program from your heap. 3 credits: +2 strength. Then, if this program can interface with the sentry you are encountering, break up to 2 subroutines.
flavor_enUS: "These things are always there, under the surface, but no one wants to know the truth." -Omar Keung, the Flashpoint
flavor_zhCN: 事实永远就在表象之下，然而没人愿意知晓真相。 —奥马尔·姜，《闪点》

text_enUS: Host this event on an installed resource as a condition counter with "[interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent up to 3 tags or up to 3 damage."
text_zhCN: 将潜逃安装到一个资源上，作为所附载的状态指示物，规则文字为“[trash]：避免最多3枚锁定标记或防止最多3点伤害。”
stripped_text: Host this event on an installed resource as a condition counter with "Interrupt -> trash: Prevent up to 3 tags or up to 3 damage."
flavor_enUS: "Never, ever, overstay your welcome." -Andromeda
flavor_zhCN: “切莫逗留过久，以免招人厌烦。” —安德洛墨达

text_enUS: Place 4[credit] on this event, then run any server. You can spend hosted credits during that run. When that run ends, trash 1 installed program you used during that run. Trashing a program this way cannot be prevented.
text_zhCN: 进行一次潜袭，并放置4[credit]到本卡牌上，你仅可以在本次潜袭中使用。当本次潜袭结束时，销毁一个你在本次潜袭中使用过的程序（不能被防止）。
stripped_text: Place 4 credits on this event, then run any server. You can spend hosted credits during that run. When that run ends, trash 1 installed program you used during that run. Trashing a program this way cannot be prevented.
flavor_enUS: Her ability to analyze and adapt mid-run bordered on the paranormal.
flavor_zhCN: 她在潜袭中分析与适应的能力近乎超自然。

text_enUS: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may reveal the top card of R&D. If you do, you may force the Corp to draw that card.
text_zhCN: 每当你对研发中心进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以展示研发中心顶端的一张卡牌。如果你如此做，你可以迫使公司补该卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may reveal the top card of R&D. If you do, you may force the Corp to draw that card.
flavor_enUS: It is only the illusion of choice.
flavor_zhCN: 选择只是一种幻觉。

text_enUS: [click], [click], X[credit]: Remove X tags.
text_zhCN: [click]，[click]，X[credit]：移除X枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: click, click, X credits: Remove X tags.
flavor_enUS: "It's the most fundamental element of illusions and running both. In either case, it should be the first skill you master." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak
flavor_zhCN: “在幻术和潜袭中，它都是最基本的要素。两种情形下，它都应该是你最先掌握的技能。” —艾丽·“浓烟”·斯科娃

text_enUS: The first time you trash an installed card each turn, draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次销毁一张已安装的卡牌时，补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time you trash an installed card each turn, draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS: "It had been hoped that the Network disruptions surrounding the conflict might also disrupt the phenomenon. Evidently, the reverse is true." -Joséo Greene, SYNC Analyst
flavor_zhCN: “原本认为，冲突区周边的网络破坏能对该现象产生干扰。显然，情况恰恰相反。” —信网同步分析师，荷西欧·葛林

text_enUS: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The Corp cannot rez non-ice cards during the Runner's turn.
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 公司在潜袭者的回合不能激活非防火墙卡牌。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The Corp cannot rez non-ice cards during the Runner's turn.
flavor_enUS: This is my USMC-XOB32. There are many like it, but this one is mine.
flavor_zhCN: 这是我的USMC-XOB32。虽有很多相似的，但这一个是我的。

text_enUS: You may host any number of non-AI icebreaker programs on this program. This program gains the paid abilities of all hosted icebreaker programs.
text_zhCN: 你可以附载任意数量的非智能模块破解器到雅加婆婆上。 雅加婆婆获得所有所附载的破解器的付费能力。
stripped_text: You may host any number of non-AI icebreaker programs on this program. This program gains the paid abilities of all hosted icebreaker programs.
flavor_enUS: "She was riding in a great iron mortar and driving it with the pestle, and as she came she swept away her trail behind her with a kitchen broom." -Vasilissa the Beautiful
flavor_zhCN: “她骑着大铁臼，以杵驱驰，边飞边用扫帚拂去留下的痕迹。” —《美丽的瓦西丽莎》

text_enUS:
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 4[credit].
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 4[credit].
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards.
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner suffers 1 core damage.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付4[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付4[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者承受1点脑部伤害。
stripped_text: Subroutine End the run unless the Runner pays 4 credits. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner pays 4 credits. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner suffers 1 core damage.
subtype_zhCN: 门禁 - 生化人 - 杀伤

text_enUS:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Install up to 2 cards from Archives (paying all install costs).
text_zhCN:
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
从档案库安装最多两张卡牌（支付所有的安装费用）。
stripped_text: After you resolve this operation, end your action phase. Install up to 2 cards from Archives (paying all install costs).
flavor_enUS: Friends give friends advance warning before moving a carrier group down to enforce a no-fly zone.
flavor_zhCN: 在派遣航母编队实施禁飞区之前，朋友会向他们的朋友发出预警。

text_enUS: If the Runner has fewer than 6[credit] or no unspent clicks when a successful run on this server ends, you have 1 additional [click] to spend your next turn. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 如果当对本服务器的成功潜袭结束时，潜袭者具有少于6[credit]或没有未花费的时点，你在你的下回合有一个额外的[click]用来花费。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: If the Runner has fewer than 6 credits or no unspent clicks when a successful run on this server ends, you have 1 additional click to spend your next turn. Limit 1 region per server.

text_enUS: [subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, choose another server. The Runner moves to the outermost position of that server instead of passing this ice. For the remainder of this run, the Runner must add 1 installed Runner card to the bottom of their stack as an additional cost to jack out. The Runner may jack out.
text_zhCN: 你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，选择另一台服务器。潜袭者现在开始对该服务器进行潜袭，代替通过心智游戏。本次潜袭的剩余时间内，作为退出的额外费用，潜袭者必须将一张已安装的卡牌加入他/她的存储栈底端。
stripped_text: Subroutine You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, choose another server. The Runner moves to the outermost position of that server instead of passing this ice. For the remainder of this run, the Runner must add 1 installed Runner card to the bottom of their stack as an additional cost to jack out. The Runner may jack out.
subtype_zhCN: 门禁 - 灵能 - 偏导器

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, if they do not have at least 2 cards in the grip and 6[credit], you may look at the top 5 cards of R&D and swap 1 of those cards with 1 card in HQ. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 如果当对本服务器的成功潜袭结束时，潜袭者具有少于6[credit]或他/她操控器中的卡牌数量少于两张，你可以查看研发中心顶端的五张卡牌并将其中一张卡牌与总部中的一张卡牌互换。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, if they do not have at least 2 cards in the grip and 6 credits, you may look at the top 5 cards of R&D and swap 1 of those cards with 1 card in HQ. Limit 1 region per server.

text_enUS: When the Runner encounters this ice, give them 1 tag if there is an installed AI program. [subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. [subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.
text_zhCN: 当潜袭者遭遇IP拦截时，如果有一个已安装的智能模块，给予他/她1枚锁定标记。 [subroutine] 追踪 3 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。 [subroutine] 如果潜袭者被锁定，终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, give them 1 tag if there is an installed AI program. Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine End the run if the Runner is tagged.
flavor_enUS: //Connection Terminated
flavor_zhCN: //连接终止

text_enUS:
When the Runner encounters this ice, give them 1 tag.
[subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, do 1 net damage for each tag the Runner has.
[subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, the Runner loses 1[credit] for each tag they have.
text_zhCN:
当潜袭者遭遇托特时，给予他/她1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，潜袭者每有1枚锁定标记，造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，潜袭者每有1枚锁定标记，他/她失去1[credit]。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, give them 1 tag. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, do 1 net damage for each tag the Runner has. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, the Runner loses 1 credit for each tag they have.
flavor_enUS: Truth like the sunlight shines above all.
flavor_zhCN: 真理如阳光普照。

text_enUS:
When your turn begins, place 1 advancement token on Anson Rose.
Whenever you rez a piece of ice, you may move any number of advancement tokens from Anson Rose to that ice.
text_zhCN:
当你的回合开始时，放置1枚推进标记到安森·罗斯上。
每当你激活一层防火墙时，你可以从安森·罗斯上转移任意数量的推进标记到该防火墙上。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, place 1 advancement token on Anson Rose. Whenever you rez a piece of ice, you may move any number of advancement tokens from Anson Rose to that ice.
flavor_enUS: "I don't get paid to be calm."
flavor_zhCN: “保持冷静是拿不到报酬的。”

text_enUS:
You can advance this ice.
[subroutine] Gain 1[credit]. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead gain 3[credit].
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead do 3 net damage.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead give the Runner 1 tag and end the run.
text_zhCN:
摩索拉斯能被推进。
如果摩索拉斯具有3枚或更多的推进标记，改为结算括号内的规则文字（否则，不结算它）。
[subroutine] 公司获得1[credit]。（公司获得3[credit]。）
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。（造成3点网域伤害。）
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。（给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记并终止本次潜袭。）

If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead do 3 net damage. Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead give the Runner 1 tag and end the run.

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing this ice in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this ice anywhere except in Archives, they encounter it.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
text_zhCN:
如果工兵从研发中心被读取，潜袭者必须展示它。
当潜袭者读取工兵时，他/她遭遇它。如果潜袭者从档案库读取工兵，则忽略本能力。
[subroutine] 销毁一个程序。
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this ice in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this ice anywhere except in Archives, they encounter it. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program.
flavor_enUS: There is a special place in hell for the first person who mined cyberspace.
flavor_zhCN: 在地狱里有个特别的位置，留给第一个在赛博空间布雷的人。

text_enUS: When you score Show of Force, do 2 meat damage.
text_zhCN: 当你用炫耀武力计分时，造成2点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: When you score Show of Force, do 2 meat damage.
flavor_enUS: Walk loudly and carry a bigger stick.
flavor_zhCN: 步履响叩，巨棒在手。

text_enUS: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The Runner's maximum hand size is reduced by 1.
text_zhCN: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 潜袭者的手牌上限减1。
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The Runner's maximum hand size is reduced by 1.
flavor_enUS: "Get those civilians off the street. No more collateral damage." -Commissioner Dawn
flavor_zhCN: “让上街的平民都离开。不许再有间接伤害。” —道恩警监

text_enUS: +2[mu] Once per turn → When you encounter a piece of ice, you may get –1 maximum hand size until your next turn begins. If you do, the strength of that ice is lowered to 0 for the remainder of the encounter. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +2[mu] 每回合一次，当你遭遇一层防火墙时，你可以将你的手牌上限减1，直到你的下回合开始。如果你如此做，本次遭遇的剩余时间内该防火墙的强度降低至0。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +2 mu Once per turn -> When you encounter a piece of ice, you may get -1 maximum hand size until your next turn begins. If you do, the strength of that ice is lowered to 0 for the remainder of the encounter. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: Whenever this program fully breaks a piece of ice, place 1 power counter on this program. This program gets +1 strength for each power counter on it. Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine.
text_zhCN: 当一层你使用舜若破解其所有子进程的防火墙遭遇结束时，放置1枚能量指示物到舜若上。 舜若上每有1枚能量指示物，其强度+1。 2[credit]：破解警报子进程。
stripped_text: Whenever this program fully breaks a piece of ice, place 1 power counter on this program. This program gets +1 strength for each power counter on it. Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 sentry subroutine.
flavor_enUS: Open yourself to the universe.
flavor_zhCN: 接纳万有。

text_enUS: [interrupt] → X[credit], [trash]: Prevent X damage from a card you are accessing.
text_zhCN: X[credit]，[trash]：防止当前被读取的一张卡牌造成的X点伤害。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> X[credit], trash: Prevent X damage from a card you are accessing.
flavor_enUS: "A little birdie told me..." -Khan
flavor_zhCN: “有只小鸟告诉我…” —可汗

text_enUS:
Install only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn.
When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] for every 5[credit] in the Corp's credit pool.
Trash Tapwrm if the Corp purges virus counters.
text_zhCN:
如果你本回合已对中央服务器进行过成功的潜袭，才能安装。
当你的回合开始时，公司的信用池中每有5[credit]，获得1[credit]。
如果公司清除病毒指示物，销毁绦虫。
stripped_text: Install only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn. When your turn begins, gain 1 credit for every 5 credits in the Corp's credit pool. Trash Tapwrm if the Corp purges virus counters.

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may choose a server. [click], 2[credit]: Run the chosen server. The first time a subroutine would resolve during that run, prevent it from resolving.
text_zhCN:
当你的回合开始时，选择一台服务器。
[click]，2[credit]：对该服务器进行一次潜袭。防止本次潜袭第一个将要结算的子进程被结算。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may choose a server. click, 2 credits: Run the chosen server. The first time a subroutine would resolve during that run, prevent it from resolving.
flavor_enUS: "Everything leaves a ripple in cyberspace. If you can find the ripples, nothing can hide." -Khan
flavor_zhCN: “所有东西都会在赛博空间留下涟波。如果你能找到涟波，任何东西都藏不住。” —可汗

text_enUS: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, place 2 power counters on Aaron Marrón. Hosted power counter: Remove 1 tag and draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: 每当一个议案被计分或窃取时，放置2枚能量指示物到亚伦·马伦上。 所附载的能量指示物：移除1枚锁定标记并补一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, place 2 power counters on Aaron Marron. Hosted power counter: Remove 1 tag and draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS: "You want to do business in Los Pistoleros turf, then you gotta deal with me."
flavor_zhCN: “你要想在枪客帮的地盘上做生意，就得先跟我商量。”

text_enUS:
Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn.
Take an additional turn after this one. Remove Encore from the game instead of trashing it.
text_zhCN:
如果你本回合已对研发中心、总部和档案库均进行过成功的潜袭，才能打出。
在本回合后进行一个额外的回合。将返场加演移出游戏，代替销毁它。
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn. Take an additional turn after this one. Remove Encore from the game instead of trashing it.

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. X[credit]: +X strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1 credit from a stealth card.
text_zhCN: 1[credit]：破解警报子进程。 X[credit]：本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度+X。仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的至少1信用点来使用本能力。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. X credits: +X strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1 credit from a stealth card.
flavor_enUS: Faster than the eye can follow.
flavor_zhCN: 手比眼快。

text_enUS:
Play only as your first [click] and only if the Corp scored no agendas during their last turn.
Gain 10[credit]. The Corp gains 5[credit]. You cannot make any runs this turn.
text_zhCN:
仅能在你的第一个[click]，并且如果公司在他/她的上回合没有用议案计分过，才能打出。
获得10[credit]。公司获得5[credit]。本回合你不能发起任何潜袭。
stripped_text: Play only as your first click and only if the Corp scored no agendas during their last turn. Gain 10 credits. The Corp gains 5 credits. You cannot make any runs this turn.

text_enUS: Place 1 agenda counter on Sensor Net Activation when you score it. Hosted agenda counter: Rez a bioroid, ignoring all costs. When the turn ends, derez that bioroid.
text_zhCN: 当你用传感网激活计分时，放置1枚议案指示物到本卡牌上。 所附载的议案指示物：激活一个生化人，忽略所有的费用。当本回合结束时，关闭该生化人。
stripped_text: Place 1 agenda counter on Sensor Net Activation when you score it. Hosted agenda counter: Rez a bioroid, ignoring all costs. When the turn ends, derez that bioroid.

text_enUS:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Gain 8[credit] and draw 4 cards.
text_zhCN:
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
获得8[credit]并补四张卡牌。
stripped_text: After you resolve this operation, end your action phase. Gain 8 credits and draw 4 cards.
flavor_enUS: It required a hexadecimal code along with biometrics, delivered by way of BMI.
flavor_zhCN: 它要求提供一段十六进制的代码以及生物特征，并通过脑机接口来传送。

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner breaks a subroutine on Chiyashi while there is an AI installed, trash the top 2 cards of the Runner's stack. [subroutine] Do 2 net damage. [subroutine] Do 2 net damage. [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: 每当潜袭者破解阿依努寨上的一个子进程时，如果有一个已安装的智能模块，销毁潜袭者存储栈顶端的两张卡牌。 [subroutine] 造成2点网域伤害。 [subroutine] 造成2点网域伤害。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner breaks a subroutine on Chiyashi while there is an AI installed, trash the top 2 cards of the Runner's stack. Subroutine Do 2 net damage. Subroutine Do 2 net damage. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: "Ice is not meant to kill; just slow or cripple the Runner. Killing is my job." - Tori Hanzō
flavor_zhCN: “防火墙不是用来杀人的；让潜袭者变慢或变弱就行了。杀人是我的工作。” —半藏冬莉

text_enUS:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Look at the top 5 cards of R&D. If any of those cards are agendas, assets, or upgrades, you may install 1 of those cards in a remote server.
text_zhCN:
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
查看研发中心顶端的五张卡牌。如果其中有任何议案，资产或升级，你可以安装其中一张卡牌到一台远程服务器内。
stripped_text: After you resolve this operation, end your action phase. Look at the top 5 cards of R&D. If any of those cards are agendas, assets, or upgrades, you may install 1 of those cards in a remote server.

text_enUS: For the first trace each turn, the Runner's [link] is treated as 0. (They can still increase their link strength by spending credits.) Whenever the Runner spends credits to increase their link strength, gain 1[credit] for every 2[credit] they spent.
text_zhCN:
在每回合的第一次追踪中，潜袭者的基础中转强度减少至0。
每当潜袭者通过花费信用点来增加他/她的中转强度时，其每花费2[credit]，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: For the first trace each turn, the Runner's link is treated as 0. (They can still increase their link strength by spending credits.) Whenever the Runner spends credits to increase their link strength, gain 1 credit for every 2 credits they spent.

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing this ice in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this ice anywhere except in Archives, they encounter it.
[subroutine] Gain 2[credit].
[subroutine] You may pay up to 2[credit] to place that many advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance.
text_zhCN:
如果使者从研发中心被读取，潜袭者必须展示它。
当潜袭者读取使者时，他/她遭遇它。如果潜袭者从档案库读取使者，则忽略本能力。
[subroutine] 公司获得2[credit]。
[subroutine] 公司可以支付最多2[credit]，以放置与其数量相等的推进标记到一张能被推进的卡牌上。

text_enUS:
[subroutine] The Corp gains 2[credit].
[subroutine] The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 公司获得2[credit]。
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去2[credit]。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。

flavor_enUS: The truth hurts.
flavor_zhCN: 真理伤人。

text_enUS: While the Runner has fewer than 6[credit], Bryan Stinson gains "[click]: Play a transaction operation from Archives, ignoring all costs. Remove that transaction from the game instead of trashing it."
text_zhCN: 当潜袭者具有少于6[credit]时，布莱恩·斯廷森获得“[click]：从档案库打出一个交易事务，忽略所有的费用。将该交易移出游戏，代替销毁它。”
stripped_text: While the Runner has fewer than 6 credits, Bryan Stinson gains "click: Play a transaction operation from Archives, ignoring all costs. Remove that transaction from the game instead of trashing it."
flavor_enUS: "My job? I provide legal exculpation and sign everything. It pays very well."
flavor_zhCN: “我的工作？提供法律开脱服务，签署各种文件。待遇可好了。”

text_enUS:
Gain 1[credit] when your turn begins.
Whenever you gain credits through a card ability other than from NASX, you may spend up to 2[credit] to place that many power counters on NASX.
[click],[trash]: Gain 2[credit] for each power counter on NASX.
text_zhCN:
当你的回合开始时，获得1[credit]。
每当你通过新洛杉矶证交所以外的卡牌能力获得信用点时，你可以花费最多2[credit]以放置与花费数量相等的能量指示物到本卡牌上。
[click]，[trash]：新洛杉矶证交所上每有1枚能量指示物，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit when your turn begins. Whenever you gain credits through a card ability other than from NASX, you may spend up to 2 credits to place that many power counters on NASX. click,trash: Gain 2 credits for each power counter on NASX.

text_enUS: [subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, purge virus counters. [subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, trash 1 virus. [subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, remove a virus in the heap from the game. [subroutine] Trace[1]. If successful, end the run.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 追踪 4 如果成功，清除病毒指示物。 [subroutine] 追踪 3 如果成功，销毁一个病毒。 [subroutine] 追踪 2 如果成功，将堆阵中的一个病毒移出游戏。 [subroutine] 追踪 1 如果成功，终止本次潜袭。

flavor_enUS: One way to get rid of a virus is to get a nastier virus.
flavor_zhCN: 除掉病毒的一个办法是引入更恶劣的病毒。

text_enUS:
[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards.
[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards.
[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 潜袭者销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
[subroutine] 潜袭者销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。

flavor_enUS:
"Guilty."
"Guilty."
"Guilty."
flavor_zhCN:
“有罪。”
“有罪。”
“有罪。”

text_enUS: Make a run. If you have 2 or fewer cards in your grip, each installed icebreaker has +2 strength until the end of the run.
text_zhCN: 进行一次潜袭。如果你的操控器中有两张或更少的卡牌，每个已安装的破解器的强度+2，直到本次潜袭结束。
stripped_text: Make a run. If you have 2 or fewer cards in your grip, each installed icebreaker has +2 strength until the end of the run.
flavor_enUS: "Hitting them when they are weakest sometimes means acting before you want to." -Alice Merchant
flavor_zhCN: “在对手最弱的时候袭击，有时意味着在你想出手之前就行动。” —爱丽丝·默切特

text_enUS: +2[mu] The first time each turn you access a card not in Archives and do not steal or trash it, the Corp must trash 1 card from HQ at random. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +2[mu] 每回合你第一次读取一张不在档案库中的卡牌，并且没有窃取或销毁它时，公司必须从总部随机销毁一张卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +2 mu The first time each turn you access a card not in Archives and do not steal or trash it, the Corp must trash 1 card from HQ at random. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: +1[link] Whenever the Corp scores an initiative or security agenda, force the Corp to "Trace[1]. If unsuccessful, take 1 bad publicity."
text_zhCN: +1[link] 每当公司用一个原创或防卫议案计分时，迫使公司“追踪 1 如果失败，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。”
stripped_text: +1 link Whenever the Corp scores an initiative or security agenda, force the Corp to "Trace[1]. If unsuccessful, take 1 bad publicity."
flavor_enUS: The Archivist tracks all the clans and their members, and official dealings clans have with the various corps. Half law clerk and half historian, he wields a tremendous amount of power doing a job no one else wants, but none can do without.
flavor_zhCN: 档案员追踪着所有部落及其成员，包括部落与不同公司进行的正式交易。作为法律职员与历史学家的结合，他行使着强大的权力，来做这份其他人都不愿做，但却不可或缺的工作。

text_enUS:
Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn.
Derez up to 3 pieces of ice.
text_zhCN:
如果你本回合已对研发中心、总部和档案库均进行过成功的潜袭，才能打出。
关闭最多三层防火墙。
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn. Derez up to 3 pieces of ice.
flavor_enUS:
1) Find the weakness.
2) Exploit the weakness.
3) Repeat.
flavor_zhCN:
1) 找出弱点。
2) 利用弱点。
3) 再来一遍。

text_enUS: Expose 1 non-ice card, then make a run.
text_zhCN: 揭示一张非防火墙卡牌，然后进行一次潜袭。
stripped_text: Expose 1 non-ice card, then make a run.
flavor_enUS: "So, yeah, I just reverse engineered a tracer, and then built it back up with some new lines of code. Pretty stellar." -Los
flavor_zhCN: “所以，没错，我只是反向制造了一个追踪者，构建好然后将这几行新代码装回去。真是精彩。” —洛斯

text_enUS: [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent all but 1 net damage.
text_zhCN: [trash]：防止除1点以外的其余所有网域伤害。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> trash: Prevent all but 1 net damage.
flavor_enUS: "You created a distributed AI replica of yourself and projected it into the network to run for you!?"
flavor_zhCN: “你创建了一个分布式人工智能作为自己的复制品，然后投到网上，让它为你潜袭？！”

text_enUS: The install cost of each piece of ice that is not installed in the innermost position is increased by 1.
text_zhCN: 除安装在最内层位置以外的每层防火墙的安装费用+1。
stripped_text: The install cost of each piece of ice that is not installed in the innermost position is increased by 1.
flavor_enUS: "To beat cautious sysops, you've got to get creative. Commandeering Network systems is like using their own strengths against them." -Kabonesa Wu
flavor_zhCN: “要击败谨慎的管理员，你得有创意。抢占网络系统就好比用他们自己的力量来对付他们。” —卡波尼萨·吴

text_enUS: Make a run. When this run ends, add Mad Dash to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point if you stole at least 1 agenda during the run; otherwise, suffer 1 meat damage.
text_zhCN: 进行一次潜袭。当本次潜袭结束时，如果你在本次潜袭中窃取了至少一个议案，将疯狂冲刺加入你的分数区，作为一个价值1点议案分数的议案；否则，受到1点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: Make a run. When this run ends, add Mad Dash to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point if you stole at least 1 agenda during the run; otherwise, suffer 1 meat damage.

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, if there is a rezzed piece of NEXT ice, you may do 1 core damage.
text_zhCN: 如果当你用次级续作计分时，有一层已激活的次级防火墙，你可以造成1点脑部伤害。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, if there is a rezzed piece of NEXT ice, you may do 1 core damage.
flavor_enUS: "The newest electronic-warfare rollout from NEXT Design has us sysops drooling." -Mason Bellamy
flavor_zhCN: “次级方案最新作品的电子战首秀让我们这些管理员垂涎欲滴。” —梅森·贝拉米

text_enUS: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed piece of hardware. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed piece of hardware. [subroutine] If the Runner has lost [click] to break a subroutine during this run, do 2 core damage.
text_zhCN:
潜袭者能花费[click][click]，以破解劫2.0上最多2个子进程。
[subroutine] 销毁一个硬件。
[subroutine] 销毁一个硬件。
[subroutine] 在本次潜袭中，如果潜袭者花费过至少一个[click]来破解子进程，造成2点脑部伤害。

flavor_enUS: "Dismantle. Dissect. Is there really a difference?"
flavor_zhCN: “拆卸机器。解剖机体。有什么区别吗？”

text_enUS:
Defense Construct can be advanced.
[trash]: Add 1 facedown card from Archives to HQ for each advancement token on Defense Construct. Use this ability only during a run on Archives.

防御结构体能被推进。

When the Runner passes Kakugo, do 1 net damage.

当潜袭者通过觉悟时，造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。

title_zhCN: 杰米森航天：舍己 无畏 求胜
text_enUS: Whenever you forfeit an agenda, place X advancement counters on 1 installed card. X is equal to the agenda point value of the forfeited agenda plus 1.
text_zhCN: 每当你废除一个议案时，放置1枚推进标记到一张卡牌上，并且该议案每价值1点议案分数，放置1枚额外的推进标记。
stripped_text: Whenever you forfeit an agenda, place X advancement counters on 1 installed card. X is equal to the agenda point value of the forfeited agenda plus 1.

text_enUS: Forfeit an agenda: Rez up to 3 pieces of ice, lowering the cost of each by 2[credit] for each printed agenda point on the forfeited agenda.
text_zhCN: 废除一个议案：激活最多三层防火墙，被废除的议案每价值1点印刷议案分数，每层防火墙的激活费用减2。
stripped_text: Forfeit an agenda: Rez up to 3 pieces of ice, lowering the cost of each by 2 credits for each printed agenda point on the forfeited agenda.

作为激活奥伯特协议的额外费用，废除一个议案。
每回合你第一次推进本服务器内或保护本服务器的一张卡牌时，放置1枚额外的推进标记到该卡牌上。

X[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to rez ice protecting this server. X is the number of remote servers.

X[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于激活保护本服务器的防火墙。X等于远程服务器的数量。

flavor_enUS: Senate staffers and clerks of the MCA can be seen thronging Khondi Plaza during break times.

text_enUS: [trash]: Cards cannot be installed until the end of the run. Use this ability only during a run on this server.

stripped_text: click: Trash 2 or more cards from your grip. Run HQ or R&D. Whenever you breach that server during this run, access 1 additional card for every 2 cards you trashed.
flavor_enUS: "Sure, the implantation was fine, but it pumps Burn. Did you think it wouldn't hurt?"

text_enUS:
Whenever you suffer any amount of damage, place 1 power counter on Clan Vengeance.
[trash]: Trash 1 card from HQ at random for each power counter on Clan Vengeance.
text_zhCN:
每当你受到任意数量的伤害时，放置1枚能量指示物到部落复仇上。
[trash]：部落复仇上每有1枚能量指示物，从总部随机销毁一张卡牌。

flavor_enUS: "An eye for an eye? If you're lucky, that's all you'll lose."
flavor_zhCN: “以眼还眼？如果只失去这么点，算你好运。”

text_enUS: [click], [trash]: Run any server. If successful, instead of breaching the attacked server, pay X[credit] if able, where X is equal to the number of tags you have. If you do, you cannot access any cards in HQ during this breach. (You can still access cards in the root of HQ.) When the run ends, remove this event from the game.

stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Install a piece of ice from HQ protecting a remote server (ignoring all costs). Place 3 advancement tokens on that ice.

stripped_text: Each time all the subroutines are broken on a piece of ice protecting this server, trash the top 2 cards of the stack.

stripped_text: Conundrum has +3 strength if there is an installed AI. Subroutine The Runner trashes an installed program. Subroutine The Runner loses click, if able. Subroutine End the run.

title_zhCN: 史蒂夫·坎布里奇：骗术大师
text_enUS: The first time each turn you make a successful run on HQ, you may choose 2 cards in your heap. If you do, the Corp removes 1 of those cards from the game, then you add the other card to your grip.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次对总部进行成功的潜袭时，你可以选择你堆阵中的2张卡牌。如果你如此做，公司将其中1张卡牌移出游戏，然后你将另1张加入你的操控器。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you make a successful run on HQ, you may choose 2 cards in your heap. If you do, the Corp removes 1 of those cards from the game, then you add the other card to your grip.

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Derez a piece of ice that has a rez cost of X or lower.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
关闭激活费用等于或小于X的一层防火墙。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Derez a piece of ice that has a rez cost of X or lower.
flavor_enUS: "Bypassing a system's defenses by cutting physical wires is what I like to call old school." - Steve Cambridge
flavor_zhCN: “靠切断实体线路来略过系统防御，我喜欢称之为老派做法。” —史蒂夫·坎布里奇

text_enUS: Make a run. When you encounter the innermost piece of ice protecting that server, bypass it.
stripped_text: Make a run. When you encounter the innermost piece of ice protecting that server, bypass it.
flavor_enUS: Targeted attacks make system breaches so much easier, especially if you can spoof an authorized user.
flavor_zhCN: 通过针对性攻击来攻破系统轻松很多，如果你能冒充授权用户则更加容易。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
The Corp must either discard 2 cards or draw 4 cards.
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. The Corp must either discard 2 cards or draw 4 cards.
flavor_enUS: Flooding the system with synchronized request messages makes it unresponsive to legitimate requests.

text_enUS: +1[mu], +1[link] The first time each turn you pass all of the ice protecting HQ, you may draw 1 card to force the Corp to draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_text: +1 mu, +1 link The first time each turn you pass all of the ice protecting HQ, you may draw 1 card to force the Corp to draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength. [trash]: Bypass the code gate you are encountering.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条门禁子进程。 2[credit]：强度+2。 [trash]：略过你当前正在遭遇的门禁。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: +2 strength. trash: Bypass the code gate you are encountering.
flavor_enUS: "Technology breeds crime."
flavor_zhCN: “科技滋生犯罪。”

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 3[credit]: +5 strength. [trash]: Bypass the sentry you are encountering.
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 3 credits: +5 strength. trash: Bypass the sentry you are encountering.
flavor_enUS: "Never boast. Just let your importance be quietly obvious."

text_enUS: Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 2[credit]: +3 strength. [trash]: Bypass the barrier you are encountering.
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 2 credits: +3 strength. trash: Bypass the barrier you are encountering.
flavor_enUS: "It's a matter of 'acquiring' the right credentials."

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may spend any number of credits to place that many power counters on this program. When your discard phase ends, remove all hosted power counters. Interface → Hosted power counter: Break 1 subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength.
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may spend any number of credits to place that many power counters on this program. When your discard phase ends, remove all hosted power counters. Interface -> Hosted power counter: Break 1 subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength.

text_enUS: [click][click]: Run any server. The first time you approach a rezzed piece of ice during this run, you may pay credits equal to the strength of that ice. If you do, when you encounter that ice after this approach, bypass it.
text_zhCN: [click]，[click]：进行一次潜袭。本次潜袭中你第一次接驳一层已激活的防火墙时，你可以支付与该防火墙强度相等的信用点以略过它。
stripped_text: click click: Run any server. The first time you approach a rezzed piece of ice during this run, you may pay credits equal to the strength of that ice. If you do, when you encounter that ice after this approach, bypass it.
flavor_enUS: Know your mark, their weaknesses and strengths—both will show how to best bypass their defenses.
flavor_zhCN: 了解你的目标，看清虚实—这些信息会将略过他们防御的最佳方式展示给你。

text_enUS:
+1[link]
[trash]: Derez a piece of ice protecting a remote server. Use this ability only during the next paid ability window after a successful run on HQ ends.
stripped_text: +1 link trash: Derez a piece of ice protecting a remote server. Use this ability only during the next paid ability window after a successful run on HQ ends.
flavor_enUS: You remember when Maxi was making book for Chacon. He's moved up in the world and gained the veneer of respectability. But as an executive the people he works for now, are far more vicious, bloodthirsty, and crooked.

title_zhCN: 艾拉·“生命”·拉辛：拟态专家
text_enUS: Before drawing your starting hand, set aside the top 6 cards of your stack facedown. (You may look at those cards at any time.) Shuffle 2 of those cards into your stack. [click]: Add 1 card set aside with this identity to your grip.
text_zhCN: 在你抽初始手牌前，将你的存储栈顶端6张卡牌面朝下置于一旁。（你可以随时查看这些卡牌。） 将其中2张卡牌洗入你的存储栈。 [click]：将1张由本特性置于一旁的卡牌加入你的操控器。
stripped_text: Before drawing your starting hand, set aside the top 6 cards of your stack facedown. (You may look at those cards at any time.) Shuffle 2 of those cards into your stack. click: Add 1 card set aside with this identity to your grip.

text_enUS:
Play only as your first [click].
Choose 1 card installed in the root of or protecting a remote server. That card cannot be rezzed this turn.
text_zhCN:
仅能在你的第一个[click]打出。
选择一张远程服务器内或保护远程服务器的卡牌。本回合该卡牌不能被激活。
stripped_text: Play only as your first click. Choose 1 card installed in the root of or protecting a remote server. That card cannot be rezzed this turn.
flavor_enUS: Each AI had been tasked with finding a solution to the same problem but with different variables.
flavor_zhCN: 每株人工智能都负责解决同一问题，而变量互异。

text_enUS: Run R&D. If successful, access X additional cards when you breach R&D. X is equal to your unused MU or 4, whichever is less.
text_zhCN: 对研发中心进行一次潜袭。如果成功，每有一个未使用的内存单元，最多为4，额外读取一张卡牌。
stripped_text: Run R&D. If successful, access X additional cards when you breach R&D. X is equal to your unused MU or 4, whichever is less.
flavor_enUS: Extracting data from complex systems is what running is all about.
flavor_zhCN: 潜袭就是从复杂的系统里提取数据。

text_enUS:
+1[mu], +1[link]
Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
stripped_text: +1 mu, +1 link Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
flavor_enUS: It is not literally made of diamonds, but it is worth several times its weight in them.

text_enUS: +1[mu] When your turn begins, draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_text: +1 mu When your turn begins, draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS: "It is more than just a 'pretty nanite plant'. It's a complex synthetic intelligent distributed network, and a VERY pretty nanite plant." - Bios

text_enUS: This program gets +1 strength for each unused MU. Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 sentry or barrier subroutine.
stripped_text: This program gets +1 strength for each unused MU. Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 sentry or barrier subroutine.

flavor_enUS: Δεν υπἁρχει τίποτα μόνιμο, εκτός από την αλλαγή.

stripped_text: Install only on a rezzed piece of ice. Host ice gains barrier, code gate, and sentry.

stripped_text: Whenever you take the basic action to draw cards, increase the number of cards you draw by 1.

text_enUS: Gain 2[credit] and draw 1 card.
stripped_text: Gain 2 credits and draw 1 card.

text_enUS: [trash], 1[credit]: The Corp trashes 2 cards from HQ at random. Use this ability only if you suffered meat damage this turn.
stripped_text: trash, 1 credit: The Corp trashes 2 cards from HQ at random. Use this ability only if you suffered meat damage this turn.

stripped_text: trash: Choose an icebreaker. Until the end of the run, that icebreaker has +1 strength for each card in your grip.
flavor_enUS: Although he rarely teaches classes these days, his lectures are always well attended.

text_enUS: [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent 2 damage.
stripped_text: Interrupt -> trash: Prevent 2 damage.
flavor_enUS: She left behind an encrypted trail leading to some random employee for a rival corp. She knew lazy sysops would work just hard enough to figure it out and wouldn't bother looking any deeper.

text_enUS: [click], forfeit an agenda: Play an event from your heap, ignoring all costs.
stripped_text: click, forfeit an agenda: Play an event from your heap, ignoring all costs.
flavor_enUS: A despicable web of outcasts and infamy, no government or corporation could effectively shut it down. If only because so many of their sysops, executives, and covert agents made use of it.

title_zhCN: 西德尔实验室：定义命运
text_enUS: The first time each turn the Runner loses or spends [click] during a run, you may add 1 card from Archives to the top of R&D.
stripped_text: The first time each turn the Runner loses or spends click during a run, you may add 1 card from Archives to the top of R&D.

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, you may spend any number of credits. If you do, the Runner adds that many cards from the grip to the bottom of the stack at random, then draws 1 card.

stripped_text: When you score this agenda, you may spend any number of credits. If you do, the Runner adds that many cards from the grip to the bottom of the stack at random, then draws 1 card.
flavor_enUS: The black level clearance sub-sub-basement of Haas-Bioroid is a magical place.
flavor_zhCN: 哈斯生化黑色许可级别的下下层地下室是个神奇的地方。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, place 2 agenda counters on it. Once per turn → [click], hosted agenda counter: Gain [click][click].

stripped_text: When you score Successful Field Test, install any number of cards from HQ, ignoring all costs.

每当你安装一张卡牌到一台服务器内时，放置1枚能量指示物到艾斯黛拉·文上。
[trash]：艾斯黛拉·文上每有1枚能量指示物，补一张卡牌并获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever you install a card in the root of a remote server, place 1 power counter on this asset. trash: For each power counter on this asset, gain 2 credits and draw 1 card.

text_enUS: When you rez this asset, load 8[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. When your turn begins, take 2[credit] from this asset. [interrupt] → When this asset would be trashed, you may shuffle it into R&D instead of adding it to Archives. (It is still considered trashed.)
text_zhCN: 当你激活本资产时，填装8[credit]到本资产上。当其清空时，销毁之。 当你的回合开始时，从本资产上拿取2[credit]。 [interrupt] → 当本资产将被销毁时，你可以将其洗入研发中心，代替加入档案库。（它仍然视为被销毁。）

As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click][click].
Gain 10[credit] and draw 4 cards. You may install 1 card from HQ.
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click click. Gain 10 credits and draw 4 cards. You may install 1 card from HQ.

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, they must either suffer 1 core damage or jack out. If the Runner jacks out this way, gain 5[credit], draw 1 card, and trash this upgrade.
text_zhCN: 每当本服务器进行了成功的潜袭时，潜袭者必须承受1点脑部伤害或退出。如果潜袭者退出，获得5[credit]，补一张卡牌并销毁黑色许可。

flavor_zhCN: 就连知道这一层的存在也是终止事由…

text_enUS: Whenever an encounter with a piece of ice protecting this server ends, if the Runner broke at least 1 subroutine during that encounter, they lose [click].
stripped_text: Whenever an encounter with a piece of ice protecting this server ends, if the Runner broke at least 1 subroutine during that encounter, they lose click.
flavor_enUS: "They say he is an ex-runner. I don't know if it is true, but he is chromed to the gills and seems to know all the runners' tricks."

text_enUS: [interrupt] → Whenever 1 or more Runner cards would be trashed (from any location), set those cards aside instead of adding them to the heap. You can look at those cards. You may remove 1 of them from the game. Then, add all of those cards that are still set aside to the heap. Ignore this ability if you have already removed a card from the game with it this turn.
text_zhCN: 每当一张潜袭者卡牌被销毁时（从任何区域），你可以迫使潜袭者将其移出游戏，代替加入堆阵。每回合仅能使用一次本能力。

text_enUS: Whenever you make a successful run, place 1 virus counter on Hemorrhage. [click], 2 hosted virus counters: The Corp trashes 1 card from HQ.
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run, place 1 virus counter on Hemorrhage. click, 2 hosted virus counters: The Corp trashes 1 card from HQ.
flavor_enUS: Bleeding data is more of a science than an art. Too much and you can end up with a one-way ticket to flatline city. Not enough and you might as well be running an empty server.

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条警报子进程。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine.
flavor_enUS: November 5th: the day when all would see the corrupt machinations of the corporate oligarchy.

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break any number of barrier subroutines.
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break any number of barrier subroutines.
flavor_enUS: Weaponizing the heavens, one star at a time.

text_enUS: While you are encountering a piece of ice, it gets −1 strength.
text_zhCN: 在你遭遇一层防火墙的期间，该防火墙的强度-1。
stripped_text: While you are encountering a piece of ice, it gets -1 strength.
flavor_enUS: In the public consciousness, there's a hard line between corp and runner. In the real world, things are a little more porous. The corps need the best hackers to run their networks, and some of the best hackers are ex-runners who like the idea of a regular paycheck. But sometimes things run the other way, and someone on the inside makes something like this.

text_enUS: When you install this resource, load 16[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. [click]: Take 4[credit] from this resource.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本资源时，填装16[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。 [click]：从本资源上拿取4[credit]。
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 16 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. click: Take 4 credits from this resource.
flavor_enUS: It's easier to spend when it's not your money.

text_enUS: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs.
text_zhCN: 2[recurring-credit] （当你安装本卡牌时及你的回合开始前，将所附载的信用点补充至2个。） 你可以花费所附载的信用点以支付销毁费用。
stripped_text: 2 recurring credits (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs.
flavor_enUS: "They're mindless tools of destruction, good for little else. Nice guys, though. Some of my best friends are scrubbers." -Ji "Noise" Reilly

text_enUS: The rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每层防火墙的激活费用加1[credit]。
stripped_text: The rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 1 credit.
flavor_enUS:
And all should cry, Beware! Beware!
His flashing eyes, his floating hair!
Weave a circle round him thrice,
And close your eyes with holy dread,
For he on honey-dew hath fed,
And drunk the milk of Paradise.
-Samuel Taylor Coleridge

title_zhCN: 加布里埃尔·圣地亚哥：精湛专家
text_enUS: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, gain 2[credit].
stripped_text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, gain 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: "Of course I steal from the rich. They're the ones with all the money."

text_enUS: Gain 3[credit].
stripped_text: Gain 3 credits.
flavor_enUS: "Hey kid, you fire that up now, bound to be vamped real bad. Some real pathetic individuals around here. But thankfully I got just the ticket…"

text_enUS:
Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn.
Derez 1 installed piece of ice.
text_zhCN:
只有你本回合已对总部进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
关闭1层已安装的防火墙。
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. Derez 1 installed piece of ice.
flavor_enUS: "Think of it as a virtual shock collar for punishing corporate pets." -Andromeda

text_enUS: Choose 1 unrezzed piece of ice. The Corp may rez that ice. If they do not, they trash it.
text_zhCN: 选择1层未激活的防火墙。公司可以激活该防火墙。如果其未如此做，则其销毁该防火墙。
stripped_text: Choose 1 unrezzed piece of ice. The Corp may rez that ice. If they do not, they trash it.
flavor_enUS: As the hysteria in the room climbed higher up the corporate chain, an uneasy feeling of joblessness began to sink in on the lower rungs.

text_enUS: Run any server. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, bypass it.
text_zhCN: 潜袭任意一台服务器。本次潜袭中你第一次遭遇一层防火墙时，略过该防火墙。
stripped_text: Run any server. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, bypass it.
flavor_enUS: "Hey, listen, I'm not asking you to do anything dangerous. Just let me into the building. And tell me which room has the weakest security. And please don't say 'the bathroom' again."

text_enUS: Search your stack for an icebreaker, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.
stripped_text: Search your stack for an icebreaker, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.
flavor_enUS: Feverishly tracking its frustratingly slow progress across the Pacific, the package finally shows up hours later…

text_enUS: +1[mu] Once per turn → When a successful run ends, you may run any server. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_text: +1 mu Once per turn -> When a successful run ends, you may run any server. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS: Twice the fun.

text_enUS: Whenever you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
stripped_text: Whenever you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
flavor_enUS: If you don't have someone on the inside, find someone on the inside who's fond of desk ornaments.

text_enUS: Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2 credits: +3 strength.

text_enUS: Interface → 0[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, trash this program.
stripped_text: Interface -> 0 credits: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, trash this program.
flavor_enUS: Do you believe in faeries?

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +1 strength. When you install this program, choose 1 installed piece of ice. Whenever you encounter the chosen ice, you may pay 1[credit] for each subroutine it has. If you do, bypass that ice.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条警报子进程。 2[credit]：强度+1。 当你安装本程序时，选择1层已安装的防火墙。 每当你遭遇所选择的防火墙时，你可以支付与该防火墙上子进程数量相等的[credit]。如果你如此做，略过该防火墙。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2 credits: +1 strength. When you install this program, choose 1 installed piece of ice. Whenever you encounter the chosen ice, you may pay 1 credit for each subroutine it has. If you do, bypass that ice.

text_enUS: Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: +3 strength.
flavor_enUS: Show-off.

text_enUS:
X[recurring-credit]
Use these credits during runs on HQ. X is the number of virus counters on Pheromones.
Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, place 1 virus counter on Pheromones.
stripped_text: X recurring credits Use these credits during runs on HQ. X is the number of virus counters on Pheromones. Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, place 1 virus counter on Pheromones.

text_enUS: [click]: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ for the remainder of that run.
text_zhCN: [click]：潜袭档案库。如果本次潜袭将要宣告为成功，在本次潜袭的剩余时间内将被攻击的服务器改为总部。
stripped_text: click: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ for the remainder of that run.
flavor_enUS: "The code isn't important. It's where the code takes you that is important." -g00ru

text_enUS:
When you install this resource, load 8[credit] on it. When it is empty, trash it.
Whenever you make a successful run on a remote server, instead of breaching that server, you may take any number of credits from this resource.
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 8 credits on it. When it is empty, trash it. Whenever you make a successful run on a remote server, instead of breaching that server, you may take any number of credits from this resource.

text_enUS: 2[recurring-credit] You can spend hosted credits to take the basic action to remove 1 tag. [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent up to 3 meat damage.
stripped_text: 2[recurring-credit] You can spend hosted credits to take the basic action to remove 1 tag. Interrupt -> trash: Prevent up to 3 meat damage.
flavor_enUS: "My roomie, he had a cousin with a college girlfriend whose brother's best friend was an addict, and the addict's mother used to live here. So yeah, there's a connection." -Lez "Rockfist" S.

text_enUS: [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent a player from trashing another installed resource. [trash]: Gain 2[credit].
stripped_text: Interrupt -> trash: Prevent a player from trashing another installed resource. trash: Gain 2[credit].
flavor_enUS: There are good, honest, hardworking cops in the NAPD. Officers who do their best to bring justice to the guilty and protect the innocent. Fortunately for the criminals, they're outnumbered by the other kind. The kind who are much easier to work with.

text_enUS: [click]: Draw 2 cards. When you do, add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack.
stripped_text: click: Draw 2 cards. When you do, add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack.
flavor_enUS:
"We're always happy to help, Mr. Santiago."
"I appreciate it, Mr. Li."
"We'll be in touch. And, Gabriel…"
"Yes?"
"Don't leave town."

stripped_text: +1 mu
flavor_enUS: "Have you met Dinosaurus?"

text_enUS: Draw 3 cards.
text_zhCN: 抽3张卡牌。
stripped_text: Draw 3 cards.
flavor_enUS: Diesel gives you flames.

text_enUS: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
stripped_text: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
flavor_enUS: A little corporate restructuring is necessary once in a while.

text_enUS: Install a program or piece of hardware, lowering the install cost by 3.
stripped_text: Install a program or piece of hardware, lowering the install cost by 3.
flavor_enUS: There's no replacement for a home-grown program. Fed on late nights, oaty bars, and single-minded determination. Cheaper, too.

text_enUS:
Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn.
Add Notoriety to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn. Add Notoriety to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
flavor_enUS: When you're this good, it's hard not to grow a fan base.

text_enUS: Search either your stack or your heap for 1 program. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) Install that program, ignoring all costs. When your turn ends, if that program has not been uninstalled, add it to the top of your stack.
text_zhCN: 在你的存储栈或堆阵搜寻1个程序。（如果搜寻了存储栈则将其洗混。）安装该程序，忽略所有的费用。当你的回合结束时，如果该程序仍未被卸载，将其加入你的存储栈顶端。
stripped_text: Search either your stack or your heap for 1 program. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) Install that program, ignoring all costs. When your turn ends, if that program has not been uninstalled, add it to the top of your stack.

text_enUS: Run R&D. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach R&D.
text_zhCN: 潜袭研发中心。如果成功，当你侵入研发中心时，额外读取2张卡牌。
stripped_text: Run R&D. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach R&D.
flavor_enUS: "Some of the professionals have good instincts, but they can't see beyond the data. They can't see the matrix." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak

text_enUS: Choose a piece of ice. That ice gains sentry, code gate, and barrier until the end of the turn.
stripped_text: Choose a piece of ice. That ice gains sentry, code gate, and barrier until the end of the turn.
flavor_enUS: "There's that moment, you know, when the whole world seems to fall away and it is only you and your mod, and the mod is the world."

text_enUS: Dinosaurus can host a single non-AI icebreaker. The memory cost of the hosted icebreaker does not count against your memory limit. Hosted icebreaker has +2 strength. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_text: Dinosaurus can host a single non-AI icebreaker. The memory cost of the hosted icebreaker does not count against your memory limit. Hosted icebreaker has +2 strength. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS:
+1[link]
When Rabbit Hole is installed, you may search your stack for another copy of Rabbit Hole and install it by paying its install cost. Shuffle your stack.
stripped_text: +1 link When Rabbit Hole is installed, you may search your stack for another copy of Rabbit Hole and install it by paying its install cost. Shuffle your stack.
flavor_enUS: It's not endless, it just feels that way.

text_enUS: Install The Personal Touch only on an icebreaker. Host icebreaker has +1 strength.
stripped_text: Install The Personal Touch only on an icebreaker. Host icebreaker has +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: A z-loop here, a cortical wave there…

text_enUS: Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 1 credit: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
flavor_enUS: "It's called 'brute-forcing' and it's just as effective today as it was a hundred years ago." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条门禁子进程。 1[credit]：本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
flavor_enUS: It can slice through the thickest knots of data.

text_enUS: [click]: Gain 2[credit].
stripped_text: click: Gain 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: The Great Work was completed on a rainy Thursday afternoon. There were no seismic shifts, no solar flares, no sign from the earth or heavens that the world had changed. But upstalk in Heinlein, on a single Cybsoft manufactured datacore, the flickering data quantums of an account began to fill with creds. Real, honest-to-goodness UN certified creds.

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2 credits: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, gain 3[credit].
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以销毁另1张你已安装的卡牌。如果你如此做，获得3[credit]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, gain 3 credits.
flavor_enUS: You didn't mention Aesop's arm unless you wanted an earful. Sometimes he talked about it in such a way that you wondered why he didn't laser his other arm off as well.

text_enUS: [click], [trash]: Gain [click][click].
stripped_text: click, trash: Gain click click.
flavor_enUS: "I don't care what the studies show. From my experience, I can ingest three cans of Diesel an hour for up to twelve hours before going into cardiac arrest." -heard during the eleventh hour

text_enUS: [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent a player from trashing 1 installed program or piece of hardware.
stripped_text: Interrupt -> trash: Prevent a player from trashing 1 installed program or piece of hardware.
flavor_enUS: The life expectancy of a jacked construct is about that of a mayfly. In other words, short.

text_enUS: Gain 2[credit] or expose 1 card.
stripped_text: Gain 2 credits or expose 1 card.
flavor_enUS: "Bring back any memories, Monica?" -John "Animal" McEvoy

text_enUS: Gain 9[credit].
text_zhCN: 获得9[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 9 credits.
flavor_enUS: Lady Luck took the form of a hifi quantum manipulation ring that she wore on her middle finger.

text_enUS: +1[mu], +1[link]
stripped_text: +1 mu, +1 link
flavor_enUS: Archaic but reliable.

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. [click]: Place 1 virus counter on this program. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, remove 1 hosted virus counter or trash this program.
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. click: Place 1 virus counter on this program. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, remove 1 hosted virus counter or trash this program.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 智能模块 - 病毒

text_enUS:
Place 12[credit] from the bank on Armitage Codebusting when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Armitage Codebusting, trash it.
[click]: Take 2[credit] from Armitage Codebusting.
stripped_text: Place 12 credits from the bank on Armitage Codebusting when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Armitage Codebusting, trash it. click: Take 2 credits from Armitage Codebusting.
flavor_enUS: Drudge work, but it pays the bills.

text_enUS: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] if you have at least 2[link].
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 1 credit if you have at least 2 link.
flavor_enUS: "My boss rewards quality work. If you know what's good for you, you'll keep it up."

title_zhCN: 哈斯生化：强大的凝聚力
text_enUS: All bioroid ice has +1 strength.
stripped_text: All bioroid ice has +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: A Different Breed of Machine.

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, the Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards for each hosted advancement counter past 4. If the Runner trashes at least 1 card this way, take 1 bad publicity.
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, the Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards for each hosted advancement counter past 4. If the Runner trashes at least 1 card this way, take 1 bad publicity.
flavor_enUS: Who wants to start a war?

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，如果所附载的推进指示物超过3枚，每超过1枚，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物：将1张卡牌从档案库加入总部。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.

text_enUS:
Put 12[credit] from the bank on Adonis Campaign when rezzed. When there are no credits left on Adonis Campaign, trash it.
Take 3[credit] from Adonis Campaign when your turn begins.
stripped_text: Put 12 credits from the bank on Adonis Campaign when rezzed. When there are no credits left on Adonis Campaign, trash it. Take 3 credits from Adonis Campaign when your turn begins.

text_enUS:
Aggressive Secretary can be advanced.
If you pay 2[credit] when the Runner accesses Aggressive Secretary, trash 1 program for each advancement token on Aggressive Secretary.
stripped_text: Aggressive Secretary can be advanced. If you pay 2 credits when the Runner accesses Aggressive Secretary, trash 1 program for each advancement token on Aggressive Secretary.

text_enUS: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage. [subroutine] End the run. [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Do 1 core damage. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run.
subtype_zhCN: 屏障 - 生化人 - 杀伤
flavor_enUS: I hear the shift of every bit amid the flow of the datastream. I hear the whispers of my mothers, and their commands are law. The realm beyond is forbidden.

text_enUS: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] The Runner cannot access more than 1 card during this run. [subroutine] The Runner cannot access more than 1 card during this run.
stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine The Runner cannot access more than 1 card during this run. Subroutine The Runner cannot access more than 1 card during this run.
flavor_enUS: I'm not here to play games. The game is over.

text_enUS: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Trace[1]. If successful, do 1 core damage and give the Runner 1 tag.

subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 生化人 - 追踪者 - 毁灭者
flavor_enUS: My reputation would precede me, if any could speak of it.

text_enUS:
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] End the run.

[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Whrrrrr!

text_enUS: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage. [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Do 1 core damage. Subroutine End the run.
subtype_zhCN: 门禁 - 生化人 - 杀伤
flavor_enUS: My name is Viktor. Nice to meet you. Would you like to play a game?

text_enUS: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
text_zhCN: 将1张卡牌从档案库加入总部。
stripped_text: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
flavor_enUS: "Do you think they…feel it?"

text_enUS: Gain [click][click].
text_zhCN: 获得[click][click]。
stripped_text: Gain click click.
flavor_enUS: "Why of course, we have six different Haas-Bioroid models serving in a variety of positions at this branch office alone. We here at Haas-Bioroid aren't going to shy away from practicing what we preach, and we pass the savings from increased efficiency on to our valued customers."

text_enUS: Gain 3[credit] and draw 1 card.
stripped_text: Gain 3 credits and draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS: Green-two clearance is the highest level of security a corp can gain access to. Legally, anyway.

text_enUS: Install up to 3 cards from HQ (one at a time and paying all install costs).
stripped_text: Install up to 3 cards from HQ (one at a time and paying all install costs).
flavor_enUS: The new heads were in. Their eyes always followed your movements when you unlocked the pressurized container and lifted the lid.

text_enUS: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, Trace[4]. If successful, the Runner cannot access any cards other than Ash 2X3ZB9CY for the remainder of this run.
stripped_text: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, Trace[4]. If successful, the Runner cannot access any cards other than Ash 2X3ZB9CY for the remainder of this run.
flavor_enUS: "Eyes forward, please."

text_enUS: Persistent → As an additional cost to steal an agenda from this server or its root, the Runner must spend [click]. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)
stripped_text: Persistent -> As an additional cost to steal an agenda from this server or its root, the Runner must spend click. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)

title_zhCN: 威兰财团：创造美好世界

text_zhCN: 每当你打出一个交易事务时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever you play a transaction operation, gain 1 credit.

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, gain 7[credit] and take 1 bad publicity.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，获得7[credit]并拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, gain 7 credits and take 1 bad publicity.
flavor_enUS: There are going to be some changes around here.

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Search R&D for 1 card and reveal it. Add it to HQ.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，如果所附载的推进指示物超过3枚，每超过1枚，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物：在研发中心搜寻1张卡牌并展示之。将其加入总部。

在潜袭者从研发中心读取本资产的期间，其必须展示之。
当潜袭者从档案库以外其他区域读取本资产时，你可以支付4[credit]。如果你如此做，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记并造成3点网域伤害。

text_enUS:
1[credit]: Add Himitsu-Bako to HQ.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_text: 1 credit: Add Himitsu-Bako to HQ. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Himitsu-Bako is a simple ice barrier that appears as a digital puzzle box. What makes it special is the ease with which it can be uninstalled and installed in a different server, throwing up barriers in unexpected places and giving any intruder a curious feeling of déjà vu.

text_enUS: [subroutine] Do 3 net damage.
stripped_text: Subroutine Do 3 net damage.
flavor_enUS:
Forged by Ak.wa on 23.11.79-23. Filed 23.11.79-23.2 with #34k-lw3-21HH-4i.
//Samurai included.

text_enUS: The Runner cannot break subroutines on this ice using AI programs. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed AI program. [subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
text_zhCN: 潜袭者不能使用智能模块程序破解本防火墙上的子进程。 [subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的智能模块程序。 [subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: The Runner cannot break subroutines on this ice using AI programs. Subroutine Trash 1 installed AI program. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 杀伤 - 毁灭者
flavor_enUS: Writing a program that can pass the Turing test is easy. The Gibson-Akamatsu test is a higher bar, and the only AIs to clear it thus far have been the androids. Even some humans have been known to fail.

text_enUS:
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_text: Subroutine Do 2 net damage. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Most runners do their business in full-sim, with their rigs wired directly into their brains. The setup has a large number of advantages, with the runner able to process data and input commands far faster than a traditional meat-bound system. But it also means greater risk.

text_enUS: [subroutine] The Runner cannot jack out for the remainder of this run. Trash Whirlpool.
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner cannot jack out for the remainder of this run. Trash Whirlpool.

text_enUS:
[subroutine] Look at the top card of R&D. You may add that card to the bottom of R&D.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
stripped_text: Subroutine Look at the top card of R&D. You may add that card to the bottom of R&D. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.
flavor_enUS: The 'cyber-war' is a war of information, and in a war of information, advance warning can be as good as a killing blow. -Michael Muhama, Musings on Cybercrime

"Its only function seems to be repurposing code."
"Can you kill it?" she asked.
"I can try," he said. Guiding his program dead center of the mass, he plunged, piercing the shell before an eruption sent his screen into static. He jacked out, his eyes wide. "I... I think it absorbed my breaker. And everything else."

text_enUS: [subroutine] Trash the top 3 cards of the stack. Trash Aimor.
stripped_text: Subroutine Trash the top 3 cards of the stack. Trash Aimor.
flavor_enUS: "Starving, dehydrated, delirious, I picked a direction and ran, ran for days, maybe even weeks. I ran until my legs couldn't carry me. Then I crawled. When I was finally out, finally free of the shroud, I checked the time, the date. How long had I been gone, trapped in the all-encompassing blackness? Turns out, 3 minutes."

[subroutine] 如果遭遇开始时所展示的卡牌中有3张或更多卡牌具有相同的类型，放置3枚推进指示物到一张已安装的卡牌上。

text_enUS:
After you resolve this event, end your action phase.
Make a run on a remote server. If successful, remove the first non-agenda card that you access from the game.
Until the game ends, whenever you access a copy of that card, remove it from the game.
Limit 1 per deck.

在你结算本事件后，结束你的行动阶段。
对远程服务器进行一次潜袭。如果成功，将你所读取到的第一张非议案卡牌移出游戏。
直到游戏结束，当你读取到与该卡牌相同的卡牌时，将其移出游戏。
每套牌组限制1张。

You draw a starting hand of 10 cards.

The first time the Runner initiates a run each turn, force the Runner to lose 1[credit] for each agenda point in his or her score area, then you gain 1[credit] for each credit lost.
[click]: Gain 3[credit] or draw 3 cards.

stripped_text: While you are encountering a piece of ice, it gets -1 strength.
flavor_enUS: In the public consciousness, there's a hard line between corp and runner. In the real world, things are a little more porous. The corps need the best hackers to run their networks, and some of the best hackers are ex-runners who like the idea of a regular paycheck. But sometimes things run the other way, and someone on the inside makes something like this.

text_enUS: When you install this resource, load 16[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. [click]: Take 4[credit] from this resource.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本资源时，填装16[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。 [click]：从本资源上拿取4[credit]。
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 16 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. click: Take 4 credits from this resource.
