text_enUS: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs.
text_zhCN: 2[recurring-credit] （当你安装本卡牌时及你的回合开始前，将所附载的信用点补充至2个。） 你可以花费所附载的信用点以支付销毁费用。
stripped_text: 2 recurring credits (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs.
flavor_enUS: "They're mindless tools of destruction, good for little else. Nice guys, though. Some of my best friends are scrubbers." -Ji "Noise" Reilly

text_enUS: The rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每层防火墙的激活费用加1[credit]。
stripped_text: The rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 1 credit.
flavor_enUS:
And all should cry, Beware! Beware!
His flashing eyes, his floating hair!
Weave a circle round him thrice,
And close your eyes with holy dread,
For he on honey-dew hath fed,
And drunk the milk of Paradise.
-Samuel Taylor Coleridge

title_zhCN: 加布里埃尔·圣地亚哥：精湛专家
text_enUS: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, gain 2[credit].
stripped_text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, gain 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: "Of course I steal from the rich. They're the ones with all the money."

title_zhCN: 莉拉·帕特尔：受训实用派
text_enUS: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, add 1 unrezzed card to HQ.
stripped_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, add 1 unrezzed card to HQ.
flavor_enUS: "I'd say I do it for the challenge, but the truth is it's not that hard."

text_enUS: Install 1 resource from your grip, paying 3[credit] less.
text_zhCN: 从你的操控器安装1个资源，其安装费用减3[credit]。
stripped_text: Install 1 resource from your grip, paying 3 credits less.
flavor_enUS: "You can help Jinteki shape the future. Your future."

text_enUS: Gain 3[credit].
stripped_text: Gain 3 credits.
flavor_enUS: "Hey kid, you fire that up now, bound to be vamped real bad. Some real pathetic individuals around here. But thankfully I got just the ticket…"

text_enUS:
Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn.
Derez 1 installed piece of ice.
text_zhCN:
只有你本回合已对总部进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
关闭1层已安装的防火墙。
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. Derez 1 installed piece of ice.
flavor_enUS: "Think of it as a virtual shock collar for punishing corporate pets." -Andromeda

text_enUS: As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click]. Search your stack for a connection, reveal it, and add it to your grip. You may install that connection (paying its install cost). Shuffle your stack.
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Search your stack for a connection, reveal it, and add it to your grip. You may install that connection (paying its install cost). Shuffle your stack.

text_enUS: Run any server. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, bypass it.
text_zhCN: 潜袭任意一台服务器。本次潜袭中你第一次遭遇一层防火墙时，略过该防火墙。
stripped_text: Run any server. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, bypass it.
flavor_enUS: "Hey, listen, I'm not asking you to do anything dangerous. Just let me into the building. And tell me which room has the weakest security. And please don't say 'the bathroom' again."

text_enUS: Run HQ. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach HQ.
text_zhCN: 潜袭总部。如果成功，当你侵入总部时，额外读取2张卡牌。
stripped_text: Run HQ. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach HQ.
flavor_enUS: "I work by referral only, with an up-front fee. The fee is reasonable if you value results." -Silhouette

text_enUS: Remove 1 tag. Then, you may pay 1[credit] to add this event to your grip.
text_zhCN: 移除1枚锁定标记。然后你可以支付1[credit]，以将本事件加入你的操控器。
stripped_text: Remove 1 tag. Then, you may pay 1 credit to add this event to your grip.
flavor_enUS: She preferred to do business in a club. Something about the lights and dancers clouded the judgment of the corporate simpletons she met there.

text_enUS: Make a run. When you encounter the innermost piece of ice protecting that server, bypass it.
stripped_text: Make a run. When you encounter the innermost piece of ice protecting that server, bypass it.
flavor_enUS: Targeted attacks make system breaches so much easier, especially if you can spoof an authorized user.

text_enUS: Search your stack for an icebreaker, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.
stripped_text: Search your stack for an icebreaker, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.
flavor_enUS: Feverishly tracking its frustratingly slow progress across the Pacific, the package finally shows up hours later…

text_enUS: Whenever you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
stripped_text: Whenever you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
flavor_enUS: If you don't have someone on the inside, find someone on the inside who's fond of desk ornaments.

text_enUS: +1[mu] The first time you make a successful run each turn, you may gain 1[credit] and look at the top card of your stack. If you do, you may add that card to the bottom of your stack. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_text: +1 mu The first time you make a successful run each turn, you may gain 1 credit and look at the top card of your stack. If you do, you may add that card to the bottom of your stack. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength. [trash]: Bypass the code gate you are encountering.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条门禁子进程。 2[credit]：强度+2。 [trash]：略过你当前正在遭遇的门禁。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: +2 strength. trash: Bypass the code gate you are encountering.
flavor_enUS: "Technology breeds crime."

text_enUS: Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 2[credit]: +3 strength. [trash]: Bypass the barrier you are encountering.
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 2 credits: +3 strength. trash: Bypass the barrier you are encountering.
flavor_enUS: "It's a matter of 'acquiring' the right credentials."

text_enUS: Interface → 0[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, trash this program.
stripped_text: Interface -> 0 credits: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, trash this program.
flavor_enUS: Do you believe in faeries?

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +1 strength. When you install this program, choose 1 installed piece of ice. Whenever you encounter the chosen ice, you may pay 1[credit] for each subroutine it has. If you do, bypass that ice.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条警报子进程。 2[credit]：强度+1。 当你安装本程序时，选择1层已安装的防火墙。 每当你遭遇所选择的防火墙时，你可以支付与该防火墙上子进程数量相等的[credit]。如果你如此做，略过该防火墙。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2 credits: +1 strength. When you install this program, choose 1 installed piece of ice. Whenever you encounter the chosen ice, you may pay 1 credit for each subroutine it has. If you do, bypass that ice.

text_enUS: [click]: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ for the remainder of that run.
text_zhCN: [click]：潜袭档案库。如果本次潜袭将要宣告为成功，在本次潜袭的剩余时间内将被攻击的服务器改为总部。
stripped_text: click: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ for the remainder of that run.
flavor_enUS: "The code isn't important. It's where the code takes you that is important." -g00ru

text_enUS:
When you install this resource, load 8[credit] on it. When it is empty, trash it.
Whenever you make a successful run on a remote server, instead of breaching that server, you may take any number of credits from this resource.
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 8 credits on it. When it is empty, trash it. Whenever you make a successful run on a remote server, instead of breaching that server, you may take any number of credits from this resource.

text_enUS: [click], forfeit 1 agenda: Gain 9[credit].
stripped_text: click, forfeit 1 agenda: Gain 9 credits.
flavor_enUS: Shadier the dealer, better the price. Unless the dealer's too shady. Then there might be a hidden fee after they take your scrip.

stripped_text: +1 mu
flavor_enUS: "Have you met Dinosaurus?"

title_zhCN: 芮尔·“姬特”·佩德拉：超凡入圣
text_enUS: The first time each turn you encounter a piece of ice, it gains code gate for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次遭遇一层防火墙时，该防火墙在本次潜袭的剩余时间内获得门禁。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you encounter a piece of ice, it gains code gate for the remainder of this run.
flavor_enUS: "I was not; I was; I am not; I am all."

text_enUS: Draw 3 cards.
text_zhCN: 抽3张卡牌。
stripped_text: Draw 3 cards.
flavor_enUS: Diesel gives you flames.

text_enUS: Install a program or piece of hardware, lowering the install cost by 3.
stripped_text: Install a program or piece of hardware, lowering the install cost by 3.
flavor_enUS: There's no replacement for a home-grown program. Fed on late nights, oaty bars, and single-minded determination. Cheaper, too.

text_enUS:
Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn.
Add Notoriety to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn. Add Notoriety to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
flavor_enUS: When you're this good, it's hard not to grow a fan base.

text_enUS: Search either your stack or your heap for 1 program. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) Install that program, ignoring all costs. When your turn ends, if that program has not been uninstalled, add it to the top of your stack.
text_zhCN: 在你的存储栈或堆阵搜寻1个程序。（如果搜寻了存储栈则将其洗混。）安装该程序，忽略所有的费用。当你的回合结束时，如果该程序仍未被卸载，将其加入你的存储栈顶端。
stripped_text: Search either your stack or your heap for 1 program. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) Install that program, ignoring all costs. When your turn ends, if that program has not been uninstalled, add it to the top of your stack.

text_enUS: Run R&D. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach R&D.
text_zhCN: 潜袭研发中心。如果成功，当你侵入研发中心时，额外读取2张卡牌。
stripped_text: Run R&D. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach R&D.
flavor_enUS: "Some of the professionals have good instincts, but they can't see beyond the data. They can't see the matrix." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak

text_enUS: Choose a piece of ice. That ice gains sentry, code gate, and barrier until the end of the turn.
stripped_text: Choose a piece of ice. That ice gains sentry, code gate, and barrier until the end of the turn.
flavor_enUS: "There's that moment, you know, when the whole world seems to fall away and it is only you and your mod, and the mod is the world."

stripped_text: +1 mu
flavor_enUS: The Akamatsu company was founded on three principles: first, to make the fastest mem chips on the market, second, to turn a profit, and third, to serve as a front for the manufacture of illegal neural-stimulants. It is the last principle that perhaps explains their rabid brand loyalty.

text_enUS: Dinosaurus can host a single non-AI icebreaker. The memory cost of the hosted icebreaker does not count against your memory limit. Hosted icebreaker has +2 strength. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_text: Dinosaurus can host a single non-AI icebreaker. The memory cost of the hosted icebreaker does not count against your memory limit. Hosted icebreaker has +2 strength. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: Whenever you breach R&D, access 1 additional card.
stripped_text: Whenever you breach R&D, access 1 additional card.
flavor_enUS: Works best at your own desk.

text_enUS: When you install this program, you may spend any number of credits to place that many power counters on it. This program gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter, and it can only interface with ice of exactly equal strength. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本程序时，你可以支付X[credit]，以放置X枚能量指示物到本程序上。 每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，本程序的强度+1，且本程序只能与强度与其相等的防火墙对接。 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条子进程。
stripped_text: When you install this program, you may spend any number of credits to place that many power counters on it. This program gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter, and it can only interface with ice of exactly equal strength. Interface -> 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine.
flavor_enUS: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think.

text_enUS: Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 1 credit: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
flavor_enUS: "It's called 'brute-forcing' and it's just as effective today as it was a hundred years ago." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey

text_enUS: Interface → [trash]: Break any number of AP subroutines. [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent any amount of net damage.
stripped_text: Interface -> trash: Break any number of AP subroutines. Interrupt -> trash: Prevent any amount of net damage.
flavor_enUS: Didn't see that coming.

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条门禁子进程。 1[credit]：本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
flavor_enUS: It can slice through the thickest knots of data.

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2 credits: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, gain 3[credit].
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以销毁另1张你已安装的卡牌。如果你如此做，获得3[credit]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, gain 3 credits.
flavor_enUS: You didn't mention Aesop's arm unless you wanted an earful. Sometimes he talked about it in such a way that you wondered why he didn't laser his other arm off as well.

text_enUS:
Whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice, place 1[credit] on Ice Analyzer.
You may use credits on Ice Analyzer to install programs.
stripped_text: Whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice, place 1 credit on Ice Analyzer. You may use credits on Ice Analyzer to install programs.
flavor_enUS: "If you know the source code you can write to beat it, or just rejigger it a little and make it yours. That works, too." -Exile

text_enUS: [click]: Gain 1[credit] and draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: [click]：获得1[credit]并抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: click: Gain 1 credit and draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS: Sometimes it doesn't matter how expensive your rig is, or how many credits are in your account, or even your skill as a runner. Most of the time, a simple handshake and a name are all you need.

text_enUS: Gain 9[credit].
text_zhCN: 获得9[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 9 credits.
flavor_enUS: Lady Luck took the form of a hifi quantum manipulation ring that she wore on her middle finger.

text_enUS: Run any server. When that run ends, if it was successful, gain 5[credit].
text_zhCN: 潜袭任意一台服务器。当本次潜袭结束时，如果潜袭成功，获得5[credit]。
stripped_text: Run any server. When that run ends, if it was successful, gain 5 credits.
flavor_enUS: The data was better than she could have ever imagined. This Santiago fellow really knew what he was doing. She began to imagine the havoc she could wreak at the upcoming charity dinner…

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. [click]: Place 1 virus counter on this program. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, remove 1 hosted virus counter or trash this program.
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. click: Place 1 virus counter on this program. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, remove 1 hosted virus counter or trash this program.

Place 12[credit] from the bank on Armitage Codebusting when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Armitage Codebusting, trash it.
[click]: Take 2[credit] from Armitage Codebusting.
stripped_text: Place 12 credits from the bank on Armitage Codebusting when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Armitage Codebusting, trash it. click: Take 2 credits from Armitage Codebusting.
flavor_enUS: Drudge work, but it pays the bills.

text_enUS:
When you install this resource, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
When your turn begins, remove 1 hosted power counter and draw 2 cards.

当你安装本资源时，填装3枚能量指示物到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。
当你的回合开始时，移除1枚所附载的能量指示物并抽2张卡牌。
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. When your turn begins, remove 1 hosted power counter and draw 2 cards.

The first time you make a successful run each turn, draw 1 card.
The first time you make an unsuccessful run each turn, take 1 tag.
stripped_text: The first time you make a successful run each turn, draw 1 card. The first time you make an unsuccessful run each turn, take 1 tag.

text_enUS: You cannot use this resource more than once per turn. [click]: Place 3[credit] on this resource. [click]: Take all credits from this resource.
stripped_text: You cannot use this resource more than once per turn. click: Place 3[credit] on this resource. click: Take all credits from this resource.
flavor_enUS: "You aren't the only type of runner in New Angeles."

title_zhCN: 哈斯生化：强大的凝聚力

stripped_text: All bioroid ice has +1 strength.

title_zhCN: 西德尔实验室：定义命运
text_enUS: The first time each turn the Runner loses or spends [click] during a run, you may add 1 card from Archives to the top of R&D.
stripped_text: The first time each turn the Runner loses or spends click during a run, you may add 1 card from Archives to the top of R&D.

text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，如果所附载的推进指示物超过3枚，每超过1枚，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物：将1张卡牌从档案库加入总部。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.

Put 12[credit] from the bank on Adonis Campaign when rezzed. When there are no credits left on Adonis Campaign, trash it.

text_zhCN: 当你激活本资产时，填装8[credit]到本资产上。当其清空时，销毁之。 当你的回合开始时，从本资产上拿取2[credit]。 [interrupt] → 当本资产将被销毁时，你可以将其洗入研发中心，代替加入档案库。（它仍然视为被销毁。）
stripped_text: When you rez this asset, load 8 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. When your turn begins, take 2 credits from this asset. Interrupt -> When this asset would be trashed, you may shuffle it into R&D instead of adding it to Archives. (It is still considered trashed.)

text_enUS: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Trace[1]. If successful, do 1 core damage and give the Runner 1 tag.

[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] End the run.

[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。

text_zhCN: 将1张卡牌从档案库加入总部。
stripped_text: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.

text_enUS: Gain [click][click].
text_zhCN: 获得[click][click]。
stripped_text: Gain click click.
flavor_enUS: "Why of course, we have six different Haas-Bioroid models serving in a variety of positions at this branch office alone. We here at Haas-Bioroid aren't going to shy away from practicing what we preach, and we pass the savings from increased efficiency on to our valued customers."

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Gain 5[credit] and draw 2 cards.
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Gain 5 credits and draw 2 cards.
flavor_enUS: Blue-one level clearance doesn't exist. And if it did exist, you wouldn't be cleared to know about it.

stripped_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, do 1 net damage.

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this agenda anywhere except in Archives, do 2 net damage.
As an additional cost to steal this agenda, the Runner must pay 2[credit].
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this agenda anywhere except in Archives, do 2 net damage. As an additional cost to steal this agenda, the Runner must pay 2 credits.

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: End the run.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物：终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: End the run.

text_enUS:
When you score Philotic Entanglement, do 1 net damage for each agenda in the Runner's score area.
Limit 1 Philotic Entanglement per deck.
stripped_text: When you score Philotic Entanglement, do 1 net damage for each agenda in the Runner's score area. Limit 1 Philotic Entanglement per deck.

text_enUS:
Project Junebug can be advanced.
If you pay 1[credit] when the Runner accesses Project Junebug, do 2 net damage for each advancement token on Project Junebug.
stripped_text: Project Junebug can be advanced. If you pay 1 credit when the Runner accesses Project Junebug, do 2 net damage for each advancement token on Project Junebug.

text_enUS: You can advance this asset. [click], [trash]: Do 3 net damage. Use this ability only if there are 4 or more hosted advancement counters.
text_zhCN: 你可以推进本资产。 [click]，[trash]：造成3点网域伤害。只有所附载的推进指示物有4枚或更多时，才能使用本能力。
stripped_text: You can advance this asset. click, trash: Do 3 net damage. Use this ability only if there are 4 or more hosted advancement counters.
flavor_enUS: "I will serve you…for a time."

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 4[credit]. If you do, give the Runner 1 tag and do 3 net damage.
text_zhCN:
在潜袭者从研发中心读取本资产的期间，其必须展示之。
当潜袭者从档案库以外其他区域读取本资产时，你可以支付4[credit]。如果你如此做，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记并造成3点网域伤害。
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 4 credits. If you do, give the Runner 1 tag and do 3 net damage.

text_enUS: The first time the Runner spends 1 or more [click] during their turn, gain 2[credit]. If those [click] were spent to take an action, the first time during that action a run on this server begins, pay 2[credit].
stripped_text: The first time the Runner spends 1 or more click during their turn, gain 2 credits. If those click were spent to take an action, the first time during that action a run on this server begins, pay 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: As beautiful as it is dangerous. And it's plenty dangerous.

text_enUS:
1[credit]: Add Himitsu-Bako to HQ.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_text: 1 credit: Add Himitsu-Bako to HQ. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Himitsu-Bako is a simple ice barrier that appears as a digital puzzle box. What makes it special is the ease with which it can be uninstalled and installed in a different server, throwing up barriers in unexpected places and giving any intruder a curious feeling of déjà vu.

text_enUS:
The strength of this ice cannot be lowered.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
本防火墙的强度不能被降低。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: The strength of this ice cannot be lowered. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: "Chi resonance mapping has created a whole new field of network security. It is unassailable perfection." -Akitaro Watanabe

text_enUS: [subroutine] Do 3 net damage.
stripped_text: Subroutine Do 3 net damage.
flavor_enUS:
Forged by Ak.wa on 23.11.79-23. Filed 23.11.79-23.2 with #34k-lw3-21HH-4i.
//Samurai included.

text_enUS: The Runner cannot break subroutines on this ice using AI programs. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed AI program. [subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
text_zhCN: 潜袭者不能使用智能模块程序破解本防火墙上的子进程。 [subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的智能模块程序。 [subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: The Runner cannot break subroutines on this ice using AI programs. Subroutine Trash 1 installed AI program. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 杀伤 - 毁灭者
flavor_enUS: Writing a program that can pass the Turing test is easy. The Gibson-Akamatsu test is a higher bar, and the only AIs to clear it thus far have been the androids. Even some humans have been known to fail.

text_enUS:
[subroutine] End the run unless the Corp pays 1[credit].
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
stripped_text: Subroutine End the run unless the Corp pays 1 credit. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.
flavor_enUS: "It's ice so dangerous it has safety protocols. Think about that." -g00ru

text_enUS:
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_text: Subroutine Do 2 net damage. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Most runners do their business in full-sim, with their rigs wired directly into their brains. The setup has a large number of advantages, with the runner able to process data and input commands far faster than a traditional meat-bound system. But it also means greater risk.

text_enUS:
[subroutine] Look at the top card of R&D. You may add that card to the bottom of R&D.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
stripped_text: Subroutine Look at the top card of R&D. You may add that card to the bottom of R&D. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.
flavor_enUS: The 'cyber-war' is a war of information, and in a war of information, advance warning can be as good as a killing blow. -Michael Muhama, Musings on Cybercrime

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Reveal up to 5 cards in HQ. Gain 2[credit] for each card you revealed this way.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
展示总部中的最多5张卡牌。你每以此法展示1张卡牌，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Reveal up to 5 cards in HQ. Gain 2 credits for each card you revealed this way.
flavor_enUS: When Miranda Rhapsody showed up with a teacup giraffe, suddenly everybody wanted one.

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner made a run during their last turn.
Do 1 net damage.
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner made a run during their last turn. Do 1 net damage.
flavor_enUS: The trick isn't hitting the person you were aiming at. It's hitting only the person you were aiming at.

text_enUS: Choose 1 installed card you can advance. Move up to 2 advancement counters from 1 other card to the chosen card.
text_zhCN: 选择1张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌。从另1张卡牌上转移最多2枚推进指示物到所选择的卡牌上。
stripped_text: Choose 1 installed card you can advance. Move up to 2 advancement counters from 1 other card to the chosen card.

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, do 1 net damage. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 每当潜袭者对本服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，造成1点网域伤害。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, do 1 net damage. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: Despite its appearance, the Hokusai Grid is the most notorious research facility at Jinteki.

text_enUS:
2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits during trace attempts.
stripped_text: 2 recurring credits Use these credits during trace attempts.

While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it.

When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 hosted advancement counters past 3.

当你将本议案计分时，如果所附载的推进指示物超过3枚，每超过2枚，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。

stripped_text: Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 追踪者 - 观察者
flavor_enUS:
.//run/hunter-tr/return=true
client/sec256IPv7->confirm? /y
3926:0HB7:1001:2NB1:1601:7784:ERROR

text_enUS: [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_text: Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: "There's nothing worse than seeing that beautiful blue ball of data just out of reach as your connection derezzes. I think they do it just to taunt us." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak

text_enUS: Gain 9[credit].
text_zhCN: 获得9[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 9 credits.
flavor_enUS: Hedge Fund. Noun. An ingenious device by which the rich get richer even while every other poor SOB is losing his shirt. -The Anarch's Dictionary, Volume Who's Counting?

text_enUS:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Gain 13[credit].
stripped_text: After you resolve this operation, end your action phase. Gain 13 credits.

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, trash 1 installed resource.
Gain 7[credit].
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，销毁1个已安装的资源。
获得7[credit]。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, trash 1 installed resource. Gain 7 credits.
flavor_enUS: With each passing day alone, Hoshiko found it harder to think. With each hour, the static grew louder.
flavor_zhCN: 孤独的日子一天天过去，星子愈发觉得思绪受到阻滞。时间一点点流逝，静电的噪音愈发刺耳。
illustrator: Photo Tammy Gann Unsplash. Deep Dream

text_enUS: +1[mu] The trash cost of each Corp card is lowered by 1[credit]. The first time each turn you trash a Corp card, gain 1[credit]. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu] 所有公司卡牌的销毁费用减1。 每回合你第一次销毁一张公司卡牌时，获得1[credit]。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu The trash cost of each Corp card is lowered by 1 credit. The first time each turn you trash a Corp card, gain 1 credit. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS:
Step 1: Apply to Problem.
Step 2: No more Problem!
flavor_zhCN:
步骤1：应用于问题。
步骤2：不再有问题！

text_enUS:
Install only on a piece of ice.
Host ice gets −1 strength for each hosted virus counter.
Whenever you encounter host ice, if its strength is 0 or less, trash it. Otherwise, place 1 virus counter on this program.
text_zhCN:
仅能安装在一层防火墙上。
本程序上每有1枚病毒指示物，被附载的防火墙的强度-1。
每当你遭遇被附载的防火墙时，如果其强度等于或小于0，销毁之。否则，放置1枚病毒指示物到本程序上。
stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. Host ice gets -1 strength for each hosted virus counter. Whenever you encounter host ice, if its strength is 0 or less, trash it. Otherwise, place 1 virus counter on this program.
flavor_enUS: *tap* *tap* *tap*

text_enUS: Once per turn → [click]: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, reveal the top 3 cards of R&D. Trash 1 of the revealed cards.
text_zhCN: 每回合限一次 → [click]：潜袭研发中心。如果成功，展示研发中心顶端的3张卡牌，代替侵入研发中心。销毁所展示的卡牌中的1张。
stripped_text: Once per turn -> click: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, reveal the top 3 cards of R&D. Trash 1 of the revealed cards.
flavor_enUS: “Net space is an abstraction, a white lie protecting fragile comprehensions. Do not limit yourself.” —z\h/r
flavor_zhCN:
“网域中的空间是一个抽象概念，是为了照顾理解力脆弱的人们而编造出的善意谎言。不要自我设限。”
—z\h/r

text_enUS: Interface → X[credit]: Break X code gate subroutines. Use this ability only once per run. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. Use this ability only if you have 3 or more installed virtual resources. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 对接 → X[credit]：破解X条门禁子进程。本能力每次潜袭仅限使用一次。 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条门禁子进程。仅能在你有3个或更多已安装的虚拟资源时使用本能力。 1[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> X credits: Break X code gate subroutines. Use this ability only once per run. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. Use this ability only if you have 3 or more installed virtual resources. 1 credit: +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: Sing, sing as your heart desires!
flavor_zhCN: 唱吧，向心而行一展歌喉！

text_enUS: When your turn begins, remove this resource from the game. Choose a server protected by ice. The Corp may trash 1 piece of ice protecting that server. If they do not, the first time this turn you breach either R&D or HQ, access 2 additional cards.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，将本资源移出游戏。选择一台有防火墙保护的服务器。公司可以销毁1层保护该服务器的防火墙。如果其未如此做，本回合你第一次侵入总部或研发中心时，额外读取2张卡牌。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, remove this resource from the game. Choose a server protected by ice. The Corp may trash 1 piece of ice protecting that server. If they do not, the first time this turn you breach either R&D or HQ, access 2 additional cards.

text_enUS:
When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1[credit] on this resource.
Whenever you make a successful run, you can spend hosted credits for the remainder of that run.
When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, you must pay 1[credit] or trash this resource.
text_zhCN:
当你的回合开始及你窃取一个议案时，放置1[credit]到本资源上。
每当你进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以在本次潜袭的剩余时间内花费所附载的信用点。
当你的回合结束时，如果所附载的信用点有3个或更多，你必须支付1[credit]或者销毁本资源。
stripped_text: When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1 credit on this resource. Whenever you make a successful run, you can spend hosted credits for the remainder of that run. When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, you must pay 1 credit or trash this resource.
flavor_enUS: Friends break your walls.
flavor_zhCN: 挚友击破坚冰。

text_enUS: The first time each turn you install a virus program, place 2 virus counters on this resource. When your turn begins, you may remove any 2 virus counters from your installed cards. If you do, draw 2 cards unless the Corp trashes the top card of R&D.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次安装一个病毒程序时，放置2个病毒指示物到本资源上。 当你的回合开始时，你可以从你已安装的卡牌上移除任意2枚病毒指示物。如果你如此做，抽2张卡牌，除非公司销毁研发中心顶端的卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you install a virus program, place 2 virus counters on this resource. When your turn begins, you may remove any 2 virus counters from your installed cards. If you do, draw 2 cards unless the Corp trashes the top card of R&D.
flavor_enUS: “…well, I’m laughing.”
flavor_zhCN: “……至少我笑了。”

text_enUS:
When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1[credit] on this resource.
You can spend hosted credits to use programs during runs.
When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, you must take 1 tag or trash this resource.
text_zhCN:
当你的回合开始时及你窃取一个议案时，放置1[credit]到本资源上。
你可以花费所附载的信用点以在潜袭中使用程序。
当你的回合结束时，如果所附载的信用点有3个或更多，你必须拿取1枚锁定标记或者销毁本资源。
stripped_text: When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1 credit on this resource. You can spend hosted credits to use programs during runs. When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, you must take 1 tag or trash this resource.
subtype_zhCN: 同伴 - 隐匿 - 虚拟
flavor_enUS: Friends hide your fears.
flavor_zhCN: 挚友藏惧之形。

title_zhCN: 阿兹·麦卡弗瑞：机械奇才
text_enUS: The first job resource, connection resource, or piece of hardware you install each turn costs 1[credit] less to install.
text_zhCN: 每回合你安装的第一个工作资源、人脉资源或硬件的安装费用减1[credit]。
stripped_text: The first job resource, connection resource, or piece of hardware you install each turn costs 1 credit less to install.
flavor_enUS: “You’re not listening.”
flavor_zhCN: “你没在听。”

text_enUS: Run any server. When that run ends, if it was unsuccessful, you may run the attacked server again, ignoring any additional costs to run. During the second run, whenever you encounter the last piece of ice you encountered during the first run, bypass it.
text_zhCN: 潜袭任意一台服务器。当本次潜袭结束时，如果潜袭失败，你可以再次潜袭该服务器，忽略所有的额外费用。在第二次潜袭中，每当你遭遇在第一次潜袭中遭遇的最后一层防火墙时，略过之。
stripped_text: Run any server. When that run ends, if it was unsuccessful, you may run the attacked server again, ignoring any additional costs to run. During the second run, whenever you encounter the last piece of ice you encountered during the first run, bypass it.
flavor_enUS:
“Everyone told me she was reliable in a pinch.”
—Az McCaffrey
flavor_zhCN:
“她在险境中出奇地可靠，每个人都这么说。”
—阿兹·麦卡弗瑞

text_enUS: Look at the top 2 cards of your stack. You may add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack. Draw 2 cards.
text_zhCN: 查看你的存储栈顶端的2张卡牌。你可以将其中的1张加入你的存储栈底端。抽2张卡牌。
stripped_text: Look at the top 2 cards of your stack. You may add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack. Draw 2 cards.
flavor_enUS: Blue flames burn the hottest!
flavor_zhCN: 蓝焰最为炙热！

text_enUS: Use this hardware only during your turn. [trash]: Jack out. [trash]: Remove 1 tag. [interrupt] → [trash]: Reduce the base trace strength of a trace to 0.
text_zhCN: 本硬件仅能在你的回合内使用。 [trash]：退出潜袭。 [trash]：移除1枚锁定标记。 [interrupt] → [trash]：将一次追踪的基础追踪强度降低至0。
stripped_text: Use this hardware only during your turn. trash: Jack out. trash: Remove 1 tag. Interrupt -> trash: Reduce the base trace strength of a trace to 0.
flavor_enUS: BMI switches let runners surface without a true disconnect. Handy for a break… immediately.
flavor_zhCN: BMI开关让潜袭者无需离线即可登出。允许你喘口气……随时随地。

text_enUS: [interrupt] → Remove this hardware from the game: Prevent a Corp card ability from ending the run. Use this ability only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn.
text_zhCN: [interrupt] → 将本硬件移出游戏：防止一次公司卡牌能力导致的终止潜袭。只有你本回合已对总部进行过成功的潜袭时，才能使用本能力。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> Remove this hardware from the game: Prevent a Corp card ability from ending the run. Use this ability only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn.
flavor_enUS: Want to win a coinflip? Use a coin with two heads.
flavor_zhCN: 想知道投硬币稳赢的诀窍么？用两面都是正面的。

text_enUS: +1[mu] The first time each turn you install a piece of hardware, draw 1 card. Whenever a run begins, you may install 1 piece of hardware from your grip, paying 1[credit] more. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu]。 每回合你第一次安装一个硬件时，抽1张卡牌。 每当一次潜袭开始时，你可以从你的操控器安装1个硬件，其安装费用加1[credit]。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu The first time each turn you install a piece of hardware, draw 1 card. Whenever a run begins, you may install 1 piece of hardware from your grip, paying 1 credit more. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS:
v35: Springs to the mount ejectors (new feature)
v36: Reduced power to springs (×5)
flavor_zhCN:
v35：底座喷射器弹簧（新功能）
v36：下调弹簧强度（x5）

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. The first time each turn this program fully breaks a piece of ice, gain 2[credit].
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条警报子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。 每回合你第一次仅使用本程序破解所遭遇防火墙上的所有子进程时，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. The first time each turn this program fully breaks a piece of ice, gain 2 credits.
flavor_enUS:
“Do the job. Get paid. Leave feelings at the door.”
—“Baklan” Bochkin
flavor_zhCN:
“好好干活。拿好报酬。莫得感情。”
—“鸬鹚”·博奇金

text_enUS: The first time you encounter a piece of ice during each run, place 1 power counter on this resource. [trash], X hosted power counters: Derez the ice you are encountering if its strength is X or less. Take 1 tag.
text_zhCN: 每次潜袭你第一次遭遇一层防火墙时，放置1枚能量指示物到本资源上。 [trash]，X枚所附载的能量指示物：如果当前遭遇的防火墙的强度小于或等于X，关闭该防火墙。拿取1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: The first time you encounter a piece of ice during each run, place 1 power counter on this resource. trash, X hosted power counters: Derez the ice you are encountering if its strength is X or less. Take 1 tag.
flavor_enUS:
“Psh, let them gossip. The cat knows whose meat it has eaten.”
—“Baklan” Bochkin
flavor_zhCN:
“啧，让他们扯去吧。猫知道它吃了谁的肉。”
—“鸬鹚”·博奇金

text_enUS:
When a discard phase ends, if you installed this resource this turn, draw 4 cards.
[interrupt] → The first time each turn you would draw any number of cards, look at the top X cards of your stack. Add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack. X is equal to the number of cards you would draw plus 1.
text_zhCN:
当你安装本资源的回合的弃牌阶段结束时，抽4张卡牌。
[interrupt] → 每回合你第一次将要抽牌时，查看存储栈顶端的X张卡牌。将其中的1张加入你的存储栈底端。X等于你即将抽牌的数量加1。
stripped_text: When a discard phase ends, if you installed this resource this turn, draw 4 cards. Interrupt -> The first time each turn you would draw any number of cards, look at the top X cards of your stack. Add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack. X is equal to the number of cards you would draw plus 1.
flavor_enUS: “…but I am without compare.”
flavor_zhCN: “……但我无可比拟。”

text_enUS: When your discard phase ends, if you have the same number of cards in your grip as the Corp has in HQ, you may draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: 当你的弃牌阶段结束时，如果你的操控器中的卡牌数量与公司总部中的卡牌数量相同，你可以抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: When your discard phase ends, if you have the same number of cards in your grip as the Corp has in HQ, you may draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS: Letʼs do it fast fast, then back to mine for tuak.
flavor_zhCN: 让我们搞快点，然后回我那儿喝棕榈酒。

text_enUS:
Play only as your first [click].
For the remainder of this turn, whenever you install a card with a printed install cost of 1[credit] or greater, draw 1 card or gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN:
仅能在你的第一个[click]打出。
本回合的剩余时间内，每当你安装一张印刷费用大于或等于1[credit]的卡牌时，抽1张卡牌或获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Play only as your first click. For the remainder of this turn, whenever you install a card with a printed install cost of 1 credit or greater, draw 1 card or gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: Do you know how many food deliveries I’ve missed this week?
flavor_zhCN: 你知道我这周少拿了多少外卖吗？

text_enUS: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, choose an install cost greater than 0[credit]. The Corp sets aside the top X cards of R&D faceup, where X is equal to the number of your installed cards with that printed install cost, up to 6. Access 1 of the set-aside cards. The Corp shuffles the set-aside cards into R&D.
text_zhCN: 潜袭研发中心。如果成功，选择一个大于0[credit]的安装费用，代替侵入研发中心。公司将研发中心顶端X张卡牌牌面朝上置于一旁，X等于你已安装的卡牌中具有该印刷安装费用的卡牌数量，至多为6。读取1张置于一旁的卡牌。公司将置于一旁的卡牌洗入研发中心。
stripped_text: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, choose an install cost greater than 0 credits. The Corp sets aside the top X cards of R&D faceup, where X is equal to the number of your installed cards with that printed install cost, up to 6. Access 1 of the set-aside cards. The Corp shuffles the set-aside cards into R&D.

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, trash 1 installed program.
Gain 4[credit] and draw 2 cards.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，销毁1个已安装的程序。
获得4[credit]并抽2张卡牌。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, trash 1 installed program. Gain 4 credits and draw 2 cards.
flavor_enUS:
“There is never a wasted program. Someone, somewhere, will have a use for that code. Even corps are scrambling for quick fixes nowadays.”
—Lat
flavor_zhCN:
“从来就没有什么多余的程序。那串代码总会有自己的用武之地。如今就连公司都在争夺现成的补丁。”
—拉特

text_enUS: +2[mu] You get +1 maximum hand size. When your turn ends, if you and the Corp have the same number of credits, you may gain 2[credit]. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +2[mu] 你的手牌上限+1。 当你的回合结束时，如果你与公司拥有相同数量的信用点，你可以获得2[credit]。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +2 mu You get +1 maximum hand size. When your turn ends, if you and the Corp have the same number of credits, you may gain 2 credits. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS: The Net is boundless, but the right access port is worth a road trip.
flavor_zhCN: 网域漫无边际，但是正确的访问端口值得驱车一游。

text_enUS: When you install this program, it gets +3 strength for the remainder of the turn. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本程序时，其在本回合剩余时间内强度+3。 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条屏障子进程。 2[credit]：强度+2。
stripped_text: When you install this program, it gets +3 strength for the remainder of the turn. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2 credits: +2 strength.
flavor_enUS: It is not knowledge, but the act of learning, not possession, but the act of getting there, which grants the greatest enjoyment.
flavor_zhCN: 纸上得来终觉浅，绝知此事要躬行。

text_enUS: When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Once per turn → Hosted virus counter: Choose an ice subtype. The ice you are encountering gains that subtype for the remainder of this encounter.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本程序时，放置2枚病毒指示物到本程序上。 每回合限一次 → 所附载的病毒指示物：选择一种防火墙子类型。本次遭遇的剩余时间内，当前正在遭遇的防火墙获得该子类型。
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Once per turn -> Hosted virus counter: Choose an ice subtype. The ice you are encountering gains that subtype for the remainder of this encounter.
flavor_enUS: It makes sysops see red. And orange, yellow, green…
flavor_zhCN: 管理员的眼前闪烁着走马灯……

text_enUS: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS:
“It takes such simple things to sustain us, the most important of which is to be thankful.”
—Lat
flavor_zhCN:
“我们赖以生存的东西很简单，其中最重要的是心怀感恩。”
—拉特

text_enUS: Once per turn → [click]: Gain 2[credit]. Once per turn → [click]: Install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip, paying 1[credit] less.
text_zhCN: 每回合限一次 → [click]：获得2[credit]。 每回合限一次 → [click]：从你的操控器安装1个程序或硬件，其安装费用减1[credit]。
stripped_text: Once per turn -> click: Gain 2[credit]. Once per turn -> click: Install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip, paying 1[credit] less.
flavor_enUS: “…then let me paint you a picture.”
flavor_zhCN: “……那么请让我为君落笔作画。”

text_enUS:
While you are resolving this event, each playerʼs identity loses all abilities.
Run any server. When that run ends, you may shuffle this event into your stack.
text_zhCN:
在你结算本事件的期间，双方玩家的特性失去其能力。
潜袭任意一台服务器。当本次潜袭结束时，你可以将本事件洗入你的存储栈。
stripped_text: While you are resolving this event, each player's identity loses all abilities. Run any server. When that run ends, you may shuffle this event into your stack.
flavor_enUS: Get into the ducts on the roof and keep crawling till you hit that old network root. Dirty work, I know, but it beats playing by the rules.
flavor_zhCN: 沿着屋顶的管道一路爬行，直到你抵达那老旧的网络根源。我知道这又脏又累，但是总好过循规蹈矩。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, add 1 installed program or piece of hardware to your grip.
Install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip, paying X[credit] less. X is equal to the printed install cost of the card you added to your grip.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，将1个已安装的程序或硬件加入你的操控器。
从你的操控器安装1个程序或硬件，其安装费用减X[credit]。X等于你加入操控器的卡牌的印刷安装费用。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, add 1 installed program or piece of hardware to your grip. Install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip, paying X credits less. X is equal to the printed install cost of the card you added to your grip.
flavor_enUS: I didn’t say your hopper should be hauling garbage. I said it should be hauled away as garbage.
flavor_zhCN: 我可没说你的飞跃车是拖拉机。我说的是，它像是要被拖走的垃圾。

text_enUS: Whenever you make a successful run, you may trash this resource to choose a card name. The next time this run you access an agenda with the chosen name, steal it, ignoring all costs. (You are no longer accessing it.)
text_zhCN: 每当你进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以销毁本资源，以选择一个卡牌名称。本次潜袭中你下一次读取具有该名称的议案时，窃取之，忽略所有的费用。(该议案不再视为被读取。)
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run, you may trash this resource to choose a card name. The next time this run you access an agenda with the chosen name, steal it, ignoring all costs. (You are no longer accessing it.)
flavor_enUS:
“Corporations are made of people; just normal people doing their 6-to-6. The right truths, the right critique, and they can be redeemed.”
—Lat
flavor_zhCN:
“公司也是由人组成的，就是一群朝六晚六的普通上班族。应得的真相加上适时的批判，他们自会前来赎罪。”
—拉特

text_enUS: If the first, second, and third actions you take on your turn are each different from one another, when the third action completes, you may gain 1[credit] or take another different action, paying [click] less.
text_zhCN: 在你的回合内，若你执行的第一、第二和第三个行动皆不相同，当第三个行动结算完毕时，你可以获得1[credit]或执行另外一个不同的行动，减少支付1[click]。
stripped_text: If the first, second, and third actions you take on your turn are each different from one another, when the third action completes, you may gain 1 credit or take another different action, paying click less.
flavor_enUS: Reflection, Not Imitation.
flavor_zhCN: 反射，而不是模仿。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, look at the top 5 cards of R&D. You may install and rez 1 of those cards, ignoring all costs.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，查看研发中心顶端的5张卡牌。你可以安装并激活其中的1张，忽略所有的费用。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, look at the top 5 cards of R&D. You may install and rez 1 of those cards, ignoring all costs.
flavor_enUS:
“Early success should be rewarded, as it will encourage a culture of drive and competition.”
—Corporate Leadership for Dummies
flavor_zhCN:
“早期的成功应该受到奖赏，这有助于形成以自我驱动和竞争为核心的企业文化。”
—傻瓜都能看懂的企业领导概论

text_enUS: Once per turn → [click]: Draw 2 cards. When the Runner trashes this asset, you may draw 2 cards.
text_zhCN: 每回合限一次 → [click]：抽2张卡牌。 当潜袭者销毁本资产时，你可以抽2张卡牌。
stripped_text: Once per turn -> click: Draw 2 cards. When the Runner trashes this asset, you may draw 2 cards.
flavor_enUS: Unit is holding .78 asimovs of stress potential in all three directive logic traps. Psychiatric session mandated during next maintenance cycle.
flavor_zhCN: 该单位在全部三个指令逻辑陷阱悖论中表现出.78阿莫西夫的潜在压力指数。已指令在下一次维修中加入精神诊断。

text_enUS: Once per turn → [click]: Gain 2[credit]. When the Runner trashes this asset, you may gain 2[credit].
text_zhCN: 每回合限一次 → [click]：获得2[credit]。 当潜袭者销毁本资产时，你可以获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Once per turn -> click: Gain 2[credit]. When the Runner trashes this asset, you may gain 2[credit].
flavor_enUS: At the scale where nanobots cut glass, quantum mechanics dictate error. A silicon atom here, an oxygen there, an erbium out of place. Each bioroid is born unique.
flavor_zhCN: 在纳米机器人切割玻璃的微观尺度下，量子效应使得误差在所难免。这里一个硅原子，那里一个氧原子，不知何处又冒出来一个铒原子。所以啊，生化人也是生来独一无二的。

text_enUS: This ice gets −1 strength for each installed icebreaker. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program that is not a decoder, fracter, or killer. [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: 每有1个已安装的破解器，本防火墙的强度-1。 [subroutine] 销毁1个不是解码模块、分解模块或者断路模块的已安装的程序。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: This ice gets -1 strength for each installed icebreaker. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program that is not a decoder, fracter, or killer. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Old warriors have seen all the tricks; be forthright or fail.
flavor_zhCN: 身经百战的战士见识过所有阴谋诡计，要么去强推，要么被摧毁。

text_enUS: Gain 2[credit] or draw 2 cards. Repeat this process for each remote server that has a card in its root and is protected by ice.
text_zhCN: 获得2[credit]或抽2张卡牌。你每有一台根目录中有卡牌且有防火墙保护的远程服务器，便重复一次该进程。
stripped_text: Gain 2 credits or draw 2 cards. Repeat this process for each remote server that has a card in its root and is protected by ice.
flavor_enUS: Haas’ unsecured servers were fortified just before the storm. Are their bioroid oracles that good, or were they tipped off?
flavor_zhCN: 哈斯居然赶在风暴来临前把他们所有未受保护的服务器都进行了加固。他们的生化人先知已经这么先进了么？还是说有人通风报信？

text_enUS:
Resolve 2 of the following in any order:
  • Draw 2 cards.
  • Gain 2[credit].
  • Install 1 non-agenda card from HQ.
  • Gain [click].
text_zhCN:
按任意顺序结算下列中的2项：
  • 抽2张卡牌。
  • 获得2[credit]。
  • 从总部安装1张非议案卡牌。
  • 获得[click]。
stripped_text: Resolve 2 of the following in any order: * Draw 2 cards. * Gain 2 credits. * Install 1 non-agenda card from HQ. * Gain click.
flavor_enUS: Not all secrets lie in vaults.
flavor_zhCN: 并非所有的秘密都躺在密库里。

text_enUS: [click]: Place 1 power counter on this upgrade. As an additional cost to run this server, the Runner must spend [click] and 1[credit] for each hosted power counter. When your turn begins, remove all hosted power counters.
text_zhCN: [click]：放置1枚能量指示物到本升级上。 作为潜袭本服务器的额外费用，每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，潜袭者必须花费[click]与1[credit]。 当你的回合开始时，移除所附载的所有能量指示物。
stripped_text: click: Place 1 power counter on this upgrade. As an additional cost to run this server, the Runner must spend click and 1 credit for each hosted power counter. When your turn begins, remove all hosted power counters.
flavor_enUS: The Net abhors a vacuum. Any unexplained gap must be made.
flavor_zhCN: 网络憎恨真空。所有不合条理的间隙都是有人刻意为之。

text_enUS: The first time each turn you reveal a card, gain 1[credit]. [click]: Reveal 1 card from the grip at random or the top card of the stack.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次展示一张卡牌时，获得1[credit]。 [click]：从操控器随机展示1张卡牌或展示存储栈顶端的卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you reveal a card, gain 1 credit. click: Reveal 1 card from the grip at random or the top card of the stack.
flavor_enUS: No Stone Unturned.
flavor_zhCN: 刨根究底。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Swap 1 card from HQ with 1 card in the root of or protecting the attacked server. The Runner may jack out. Use this ability only during a run.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，如果所附载的推进指示物超过3枚，每超过1枚，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物：从总部将1张卡牌与保护当前被攻击服务器或当前被攻击服务器根目录中的一张卡牌互换。潜袭者可以退出潜袭。本能力仅能在潜袭中使用。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Swap 1 card from HQ with 1 card in the root of or protecting the attacked server. The Runner may jack out. Use this ability only during a run.

text_enUS: When a player scores or steals this agenda, do X net damage. X is equal to 1 plus the number of copies of Sting! in the other playerʼs score area.
text_zhCN: 当一位玩家计分或窃取本议案时，造成X点网域伤害。X等于另一位玩家分数区内名称为蜇！的议案的数量加1。
stripped_text: When a player scores or steals this agenda, do X net damage. X is equal to 1 plus the number of copies of Sting! in the other player's score area.
flavor_enUS:
“‘It is my nature,’ said the scorpion.”
—Conceptual Frameworks in Bio-Ethics and Synthetic Morality, Moser University Press
flavor_zhCN:
“‘这是我的天性啊。’蝎子说道。”
—生命伦理与合成道德概念框架，莫泽大学出版社

text_enUS: When your turn begins, reveal the top card of R&D and gain 2[credit].
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，展示研发中心顶端的卡牌并获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, reveal the top card of R&D and gain 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: Hyoubu is our vanguard in the battle for hearts and minds.
flavor_zhCN: 兵部是保卫我们身心的先驱。

text_enUS: The first time each turn you trash a card that matches the faction of the Runnerʼs identity (from any location), place 1 power counter on this asset. [click], hosted power counter: Do 1 net damage.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次销毁一张与潜袭者特性派系相同的卡牌时（不论从什么位置），放置1枚能量指示物到本资产上。 [click]，所附载的能量指示物：造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you trash a card that matches the faction of the Runner's identity (from any location), place 1 power counter on this asset. click, hosted power counter: Do 1 net damage.
flavor_enUS:
“Memory is a tangle of emotional threads. Pull one, it twists a second, unravels a third!”
—Letheia Nisei
flavor_zhCN:
“记忆是情绪织线的牵引纠缠。只要牵住其中一根，它就会把第二根带出来，连绵不断！”
—莉希亚·次代

text_enUS:
When the Runner encounters this ice, choose a card type. For the remainder of the encounter, whenever you trash a card of the chosen type with net damage from a subroutine on this ice, do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
text_zhCN:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，选择一种卡牌类型。本次遭遇的剩余时间内，每当你以本防火墙子进程的网域伤害销毁一张所选类型的卡牌时，造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, choose a card type. For the remainder of the encounter, whenever you trash a card of the chosen type with net damage from a subroutine on this ice, do 1 net damage. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 杀伤 - 观察者

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner has 3 or more agenda points and they made a successful run during their last turn.
After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends.
Choose a card name, then do 1 net damage. If you trash a card with the chosen name this way, repeat this process.
text_zhCN:
只有潜袭者拥有3点或更多议案分数且在其上回合进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
选择一个卡牌名称，然后造成1点网域伤害。如果你销毁了一张具有所选名称的卡牌，则重复本进程。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner has 3 or more agenda points and they made a successful run during their last turn. After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends. Choose a card name, then do 1 net damage. If you trash a card with the chosen name this way, repeat this process.

text_enUS: The first time the Runner approaches this server during each run, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0–2[credit]. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, you may trash this upgrade. If you do, the Runner moves to the outermost position of this server. They may jack out.
text_zhCN: 每次潜袭中潜袭者第一次接驳本服务器时，进行一次灵能博弈。（双方玩家秘密决定0-2的数值，然后同时宣告并花费所声明数值的[credit]。）如果二者数值不同，你可以销毁本升级。如果你如此做，潜袭者移动到本服务器的最外侧位置。潜袭者可以退出潜袭。
stripped_text: The first time the Runner approaches this server during each run, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0-2 credits. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, you may trash this upgrade. If you do, the Runner moves to the outermost position of this server. They may jack out.

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: Place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物：放置1枚推进指示物到一张已安装的卡牌上。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: Place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.
flavor_enUS:
Scrub-loving devs nerfed cannon rushes cause whiny bronzers complained. Left me four wins down in finals.
Anyway I won.
flavor_zhCN:
那些睿智设计师因为青铜低端局的哀声载道把加农炮速攻削弱了。害得我在决赛中连丢四局。
嘛，虽然我还是赢了。

text_enUS:
Rez only during your action phase.
Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, they gain 2[credit].
When your turn begins, if the Runner did not make a successful run on this server during their last turn, gain 3[credit].
text_zhCN:
仅能在你的行动阶段中激活。
每当潜袭者对本服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，潜袭者获得2[credit]。
当你的回合开始时，如果潜袭者在其上回合未对本服务器进行过成功的潜袭，你获得3[credit]。
stripped_text: Rez only during your action phase. Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, they gain 2 credits. When your turn begins, if the Runner did not make a successful run on this server during their last turn, gain 3 credits.

text_enUS: The first time each turn a run begins, gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每回合第一次潜袭开始时，你获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: The first time each turn a run begins, gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: Subscribe for 12 months to get that premium uplink you need to blaze ahead of the crowd!
flavor_zhCN: 只需订阅全年份，即可享受尊贵抢先体验版！

text_enUS:
When the Runner passes this ice, gain 1[credit].
[subroutine] Gain 2[credit]. The Runner gains 1[credit].
text_zhCN:
当潜袭者通过本防火墙时，你获得1[credit]。
[subroutine] 获得2[credit]。潜袭者获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: When the Runner passes this ice, gain 1 credit. Subroutine Gain 2 credits. The Runner gains 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: You are the ONE BILLIONTH visitor!
flavor_zhCN: 你是第十亿名的幸运访客！

text_enUS:
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 2[credit].
[subroutine] Reveal the top 3 cards of the stack. Add 1 of those cards to the grip and gain X[credit], where X is equal to that cardʼs play or install cost. The Runner shuffles the stack. Trash this ice.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付2[credit]。
[subroutine] 展示存储栈顶端的3张卡牌。将其中的1张加入操控器并获得X[credit]，X等于该卡牌的打出或安装费用。潜袭者将存储栈重洗。销毁本防火墙。
stripped_text: Subroutine End the run unless the Runner pays 2 credits. Subroutine Reveal the top 3 cards of the stack. Add 1 of those cards to the grip and gain X credits, where X is equal to that card's play or install cost. The Runner shuffles the stack. Trash this ice.
flavor_enUS: Though many countries attempted to regulate digital loot boxes in the early 21st century, GameNET has managed to circumvent any such laws via explicit, transparent percentage rates… and some very determined lobbyists.
flavor_zhCN: 尽管在21世纪早期有很多国家试图监管虚拟战利品宝箱，游网却用了一些手段巧妙地避开了这些法律限制，比如公开透明的宝箱爆率……以及一群锲而不舍的游说者。

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn.
Choose a card type, then reveal the grip. Choose a value for X equal to or less than the number of revealed cards of the chosen type. You may pay X[credit] to place X advancement counters on 1 installed card.
text_zhCN:
只有潜袭者在其上回合进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
选择一种卡牌类型，然后展示操控器。选择一个等于或少于被展示卡牌中所选卡牌类型卡牌数量的数值X。你可以支付X[credit]，以放置X枚推进指示物到1张已安装卡牌上。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn. Choose a card type, then reveal the grip. Choose a value for X equal to or less than the number of revealed cards of the chosen type. You may pay X credits to place X advancement counters on 1 installed card.
flavor_enUS: “There’s gonna be catering, right?”
flavor_zhCN: “这活管饭，对吧？”

text_enUS: Play only if the Runner stole an agenda during their last turn. Choose a Runner card type. Trash all installed non-icebreaker cards of the chosen type. For each card that would be trashed this way, the Runner may pay 3[credit] to prevent that card from being trashed. Take 1 bad publicity.
text_zhCN: 只有潜袭者在其上回合窃取过议案时，才能打出。 选择一种潜袭者卡牌类型。销毁所有已安装的该类型的非破解器卡牌。对每张将要因此被销毁的卡牌，潜袭者可以支付3[credit]，以防止其被销毁。 拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner stole an agenda during their last turn. Choose a Runner card type. Trash all installed non-icebreaker cards of the chosen type. For each card that would be trashed this way, the Runner may pay 3 credits to prevent that card from being trashed. Take 1 bad publicity.
flavor_enUS: It is pitch black. You are likely to be eaten by a Troll.
flavor_zhCN: 现在一片漆黑。我估计你应该是当了巨魔的甜点。

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing this upgrade in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this upgrade, remove 1 bad publicity unless they take 1 tag.
text_zhCN:
在潜袭者从研发中心读取本卡牌的期间，其必须展示之。
当潜袭者读取本升级时，移除1枚负面声誉标记，除非潜袭者拿取1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this upgrade in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this upgrade, remove 1 bad publicity unless they take 1 tag.
flavor_enUS: Ultra-Mythic chance ↑!↑!↑! Free Vorpal Tommy Gun [epic] and pinstripe suit [cosmetic] with 10× buy-in!
flavor_zhCN: 闪橙爆率↑！↑！↑！起充10包即送夺命汤米枪[史诗]与细纹套装[装饰]！

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner steals another agenda, you may forfeit this agenda to gain 5[credit] and add the stolen agenda to HQ.
text_zhCN: 每当潜袭者窃取另一个议案时，你可以废除本议案，以获得5[credit]并将被窃取的议案加入总部。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner steals another agenda, you may forfeit this agenda to gain 5 credits and add the stolen agenda to HQ.
flavor_enUS: As the documents show, for eight months they have operated as an entirely independent fiscal entity. We are as appalled at the carelessness as you are, and fully support City Hall’s investigation.
flavor_zhCN: 正如文件所示，他们的财务运作已经独立运行了足有八个月。我们同样对如此重大的疏忽感到震惊，并且一定全力配合支持市政厅的调查。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to steal this agenda, the Runner must trash 1 installed program.
When you score this agenda, trash 1 installed program.
text_zhCN:
作为窃取本议案的额外费用，潜袭者必须销毁1个已安装的程序。
当你将本议案计分时，销毁1个已安装的程序。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to steal this agenda, the Runner must trash 1 installed program. When you score this agenda, trash 1 installed program.
flavor_enUS:
“Drones are precision instruments. Collateral damage is merely an undisclosed target.”
—Chief “Pinchy” Wilson
flavor_zhCN:
“无人机是高精度仪器。所造成的意外伤亡都是些没明说的目标。”
—“死钳”·威尔森队长

text_enUS: [click][click][click]: Gain 6[credit]. You may remove 1 bad publicity.
text_zhCN: [click][click][click]：获得6[credit]。你可以移除1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: click click click: Gain 6 credits. You may remove 1 bad publicity.
flavor_enUS:
“There’s something about the human touch that androids will never replace.”
—Mila Braun
flavor_zhCN:
“总有某些人间关怀，是安卓人永远无法取代的。”
—米拉·布劳恩

text_enUS:
While this ice is protecting HQ, the Runner cannot break more than 1 of its printed subroutines during each encounter.
[subroutine] The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
只要本防火墙保护总部，潜袭者每次遭遇中便不能破解超过1条本防火墙上的印刷子进程。
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去2[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: While this ice is protecting HQ, the Runner cannot break more than 1 of its printed subroutines during each encounter. Subroutine The Runner loses 2 credits. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: A choice occurs. The waveform collapses.
flavor_zhCN: 先做出选择。然后波函数坍缩。

text_enUS:
When the Runner encounters this ice, place 1 virus counter on it.
This ice gets −1 strength for each hosted virus counter.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，放置1枚病毒指示物到本防火墙上。
每有1枚所附载的病毒指示物，本防火墙的强度-1。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, place 1 virus counter on it. This ice gets -1 strength for each hosted virus counter. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Effective, Cheap, Durable. Pick two.
flavor_zhCN: 高效，廉价，耐用。三选其二。

text_enUS:
When you rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed Runner card.
[subroutine] Trace[6]. If successful, the Runner cannot steal or trash Corp cards for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN:
当你激活本防火墙时，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
[subroutine] 销毁1张已安装的潜袭者卡牌。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪6</trace> -如果成功，潜袭者不能在本次潜袭的剩余时间内窃取或销毁公司卡牌。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity. Subroutine Trash 1 installed Runner card. Subroutine Trace[6]. If successful, the Runner cannot steal or trash Corp cards for the remainder of this run.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 非法 - 毁灭者 - 追踪者

text_enUS: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click]. Search R&D for 1 piece of ice and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Install that ice protecting a central server, paying 3[credit] less.
text_zhCN: 作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。 在研发中心搜寻1个防火墙并展示之。（在搜寻研发中心后将其洗混。）安装该防火墙用于保护一台中央服务器，其安装费用减3[credit]。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Search R&D for 1 piece of ice and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Install that ice protecting a central server, paying 3 credits less.
flavor_enUS:
Secure Servers. Contain Infections. Protect Data.
—The SecTech Mantra
flavor_zhCN:
控制服务器。收容感染。保护数据。
—技术安保准则

text_enUS:
When you rez this upgrade, you may pay up to 4[credit] to place that many power counters on it.
As an additional cost to run this server, the Runner must pay 2[credit] for each hosted power counter.
Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on a central server, remove 1 hosted power counter.
text_zhCN:
当你激活本升级时，你可以支付最多4[credit]，以放置等量的能量指示物到本升级上。
作为潜袭本服务器的额外费用，每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，潜袭者必须支付2[credit]。
每当潜袭者对中央服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，移除1枚所附载的能量指示物。
stripped_text: When you rez this upgrade, you may pay up to 4 credits to place that many power counters on it. As an additional cost to run this server, the Runner must pay 2 credits for each hosted power counter. Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on a central server, remove 1 hosted power counter.

text_enUS: You cannot score this agenda if it was installed this turn.
text_zhCN: 你不能在安装本议案的回合计分本议案。
stripped_text: You cannot score this agenda if it was installed this turn.
flavor_enUS: The Fracture was no different from any other crisis. As always, Management’s first instinct was to find someone to blame. Getting food up to Midway or He3 down to power Earthside hospitals are trivialities compared to the important work of salving Executive ego and keeping one’s job.
flavor_zhCN: 此次轨道断裂事故与其他危机并无二致。一如既往，管理层的第一反应是先找一位背锅侠。与保住自己的饭碗和主管的面子相比，把食物送到中途站或者把氦-3送往地球的医院都是些无关紧要的琐事。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS:
“By matching funds on your donations, the Space Elevator Authority has already planted over eight million trees on the Pacific coast. Together we can restore New Angeles to its former glory.”
—Elizabeth Mills
flavor_zhCN:
“有赖于诸位的慷慨解囊，空梯管理局已经在太平洋沿岸上种植了超过八百万棵树。让我们协作起来，一起重现新洛杉矶的往日荣光。”
—伊丽莎白·米尔斯

text_enUS:
During runs against this server, you can rez this ice any time you could rez non-ice cards.
Each piece of ice protecting this server gets +1 strength.
[subroutine] The Runner loses 1[credit].
text_zhCN:
在对本服务器的潜袭中，你可以在任意你可以激活非防火墙卡牌的时机激活本防火墙。
所有保护本服务器的防火墙的强度+1。
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去1[credit]。
stripped_text: During runs against this server, you can rez this ice any time you could rez non-ice cards. Each piece of ice protecting this server gets +1 strength. Subroutine The Runner loses 1 credit.

text_enUS: When your turn ends, if you accessed a card this turn, gain 2[credit] and flip this identity. Back: Hoshiko Shiro: Mahou Shoujo When your turn begins, draw 1 card and lose 1[credit]. When your turn ends, if you did not access any cards this turn, flip this identity.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合结束时，如果你本回合读取过卡牌，获得2[credit]并将本特性翻面。 翻面 白 星子：魔法少女 当你的回合开始时，抽1张卡牌并失去1[credit]。当你的回合结束时，如果你本回合没有读取过卡牌，将本特性翻面。
stripped_text:
When your turn ends, if you accessed a card this turn, gain 2 credits and flip this identity.
Back: Hoshiko Shiro: Mahou Shoujo
When your turn begins, draw 1 card and lose 1 credit. When your turn ends, if you did not access any cards this turn, flip this identity.
flavor_enUS:
Please, let me have this dream.
I’m going to be my own kind of hero.
flavor_zhCN:
拜托了，请让我展开羽翼。
我要用我自己的方式成为英雄。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, trash 3 cards from your grip.
Gain 3[credit] and draw 3 cards.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，从你的操控器销毁3张卡牌。
获得3[credit]并抽3张卡牌。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, trash 3 cards from your grip. Gain 3 credits and draw 3 cards.
flavor_enUS: Let’s start a RIOT.
flavor_zhCN: 暴动亦如是。

text_enUS: Whenever you encounter a piece of ice, you may remove this hardware from the game. If you do, that ice gets −6 strength for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: 每当你遭遇一层防火墙时，你可以将本硬件移出游戏。如果你如此做，该防火墙在本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度-6。
stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a piece of ice, you may remove this hardware from the game. If you do, that ice gets -6 strength for the remainder of this run.
flavor_enUS: A simple little box, brimming with temptation.
flavor_zhCN: 一个小巧的盒子，还有潘多拉的引诱低语。

text_enUS: [trash]: Set aside the top 6 cards of your stack faceup. You may install 1 program or virtual resource from among those cards, paying 2[credit] less. Shuffle 3 of the remaining cards into your stack, then remove the rest from the game.
text_zhCN: [trash]：将你的存储栈顶端的6张卡牌置于一旁。你可以从其中安装1个程序或虚拟资源，其安装费用减2[credit]。将剩余卡牌中的3张洗入你的存储栈，然后将余下的卡牌移出游戏。
stripped_text: trash: Set aside the top 6 cards of your stack faceup. You may install 1 program or virtual resource from among those cards, paying 2 credits less. Shuffle 3 of the remaining cards into your stack, then remove the rest from the game.
flavor_enUS: Win a new friend today!
flavor_zhCN: 今天也来抽一个新玩伴吧！

text_enUS: +2[mu] The first time each turn you install a companion card or spend credits from an installed companion card, gain 1[credit]. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +2[mu] 每回合你第一次安装一张同伴卡牌或者花费一张已安装的同伴卡牌上的信用点时，获得1[credit]。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +2 mu The first time each turn you install a companion card or spend credits from an installed companion card, gain 1 credit. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS: “…and friends hold you close. I vow never to let go of my princess.”
flavor_zhCN: “……挚友伴君前行。我誓将永世守护我的公主殿下。”

text_enUS: Interface → 2[credit]: Break any number of sentry subroutines. Interface → 0[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. Use this ability only if you have 3 or more installed virtual resources. 3[credit]: +3 strength.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 2[credit]：破解任意数量的警报子进程。 对接 → 0[credit]：破解1条警报子进程。本能力仅能在你有3个或更多已安装的虚拟资源时使用。 3[credit]：强度+3。
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break any number of sentry subroutines. Interface -> 0 credits: Break 1 sentry subroutine. Use this ability only if you have 3 or more installed virtual resources. 3 credits: +3 strength.
flavor_enUS: Dance, and forget about time!
flavor_zhCN: 起舞吧，忘却时光纷扰！

text_enUS:
When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1[credit] on this resource.
You can spend hosted credits to play events.
When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, you must trash 1 card from your grip at random or trash this resource.
text_zhCN:
当你的回合开始或你窃取一个议案时，放置1[credit]到本资源上。
你可以花费所附载的信用点以打出事件。
当你的回合结束时，如果所附载的信用点有3个或更多，你必须从你的操控器中随机销毁1张卡牌或者销毁本资源。
stripped_text: When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1 credit on this resource. You can spend hosted credits to play events. When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, you must trash 1 card from your grip at random or trash this resource.
flavor_enUS: Friends lift your spirits.
flavor_zhCN: 挚友慰藉魂灵。

text_enUS: When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1[credit] on this resource. You can spend hosted credits to install non-connection cards. When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, trash 1 of your installed cards.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时及每当你窃取一个议案时，放置1[credit]到本资源上。 你可以花费所附载的信用点以安装非人脉卡牌。 当你的回合结束时，如果所附载的信用点有3个或更多，销毁1张你已安装的卡牌。
stripped_text: When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1 credit on this resource. You can spend hosted credits to install non-connection cards. When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, trash 1 of your installed cards.
flavor_enUS: Friends guard your passions.
flavor_zhCN: 挚友守御热情。

text_enUS: Run a server protected by ice. When that run ends, gain 6[credit] plus 1[credit] for each piece of ice you passed during that run.
text_zhCN: 潜袭一台有防火墙保护的服务器。当本次潜袭结束时，获得等同于本次潜袭中通过防火墙数量加6的[credit]。
stripped_text: Run a server protected by ice. When that run ends, gain 6 credits plus 1 credit for each piece of ice you passed during that run.
flavor_enUS:
“Hold my wine. I’m going in.”
—Red Comyn
flavor_zhCN:
“拿好我的酒，我要开冲了。”
—红发科明

text_enUS: When you install this hardware, choose 1 installed piece of ice. Use this hardware only during encounters with that ice. [trash]: Break up to 2 subroutines. When this run ends, if it was successful, you may shuffle 1 copy of Boomerang from your heap into your stack.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本硬件时，选择1层已安装的防火墙。本硬件仅能在遭遇该防火墙期间使用。 [trash]：破解至多2条防火墙子进程。当本次潜袭结束时，如果潜袭成功，你可以将1张名称为回力镖的卡牌从你的堆阵洗入你的存储栈。
stripped_text: When you install this hardware, choose 1 installed piece of ice. Use this hardware only during encounters with that ice. trash: Break up to 2 subroutines. When this run ends, if it was successful, you may shuffle 1 copy of Boomerang from your heap into your stack.
flavor_enUS: Return to sender.
flavor_zhCN: 退给寄件人。

text_enUS: Use this hardware only by spending credits from stealth cards. Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, you may pay 1[credit] to access 1 additional card when you breach HQ. Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may pay 2[credit] to access 1 additional card when you breach R&D.
text_zhCN: 本硬件仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的信用点来使用。 每当你对总部进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以支付1[credit]。如果你如此做，当你侵入总部时，额外读取1张卡牌。 每当你对研发中心进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以支付2[credit]。如果你如此做，当你侵入研发中心时，额外读取1张卡牌。
stripped_text: Use this hardware only by spending credits from stealth cards. Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, you may pay 1 credit to access 1 additional card when you breach HQ. Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may pay 2 credits to access 1 additional card when you breach R&D.

text_enUS: The first time each turn a run begins, you may look at the top 2 cards of your stack. Once per turn → 1[credit]: Reveal the top card of your stack. If that card is a program or piece of hardware, you may install it.
text_zhCN: 每回合第一次潜袭开始时，你可以查看你的存储栈顶端的2张卡牌。 每回合限一次 → 1[credit]：展示你的存储栈顶端的卡牌。如果该卡牌是一个程序或硬件，你可以安装之。
stripped_text: The first time each turn a run begins, you may look at the top 2 cards of your stack. Once per turn -> 1[credit]: Reveal the top card of your stack. If that card is a program or piece of hardware, you may install it.
flavor_enUS:
“Overinflate a superposition-stack and optimal code forms the negentropy traverse.”
“Aha, like putting too much air into a balloon?!”
flavor_zhCN:
“只要将叠加存储栈过载，最优代码就会形成负熵传输。”
“啊哈，是不是就像气球气打多了一样？！”

text_enUS: +1[mu] The first time each turn you play a run event, gain [click]. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu] 每回合你第一次打出一个潜袭事件时，获得[click]。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu The first time each turn you play a run event, gain click. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS:
“Red ones go faster.”
—Ken “Express” Tenma
flavor_zhCN:
“红的那个跑得更快。”
—肯·“快车”·天马

text_enUS: Once per turn → When you encounter a sentry, you may pay 2[credit] to bypass it. Use this ability only by spending credits from stealth cards. Interface → 1[credit]: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 1[credit]: +2 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.
text_zhCN: 每回合限一次 → 当你遭遇一层警报时，你可以支付2[credit]以略过之。本能力仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的信用点来使用。 对接 → 1[credit]：破解最多2条警报子进程。 1[credit]：强度+2。本能力仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的信用点来使用。
stripped_text: Once per turn -> When you encounter a sentry, you may pay 2[credit] to bypass it. Use this ability only by spending credits from stealth cards. Interface -> 1[credit]: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 1[credit]: +2 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.

text_enUS: Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 2[credit]: +2 strength. The first time each turn this program fully breaks a piece of ice, gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 对接 → 2[credit]：破解最多2条屏障子进程。 2[credit]：强度+2。 每回合你第一次仅使用本程序破解所遭遇防火墙上的所有子进程时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 2 credits: +2 strength. The first time each turn this program fully breaks a piece of ice, gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: “Debt is beautiful… after it is repaid.” —“Baklan” Bochkin
flavor_zhCN:
“负债是如此美妙……当然得在你还清之后。”
—“鸬鹚”·博奇金

text_enUS:
If you made a successful run on HQ this turn, this resource costs 2[credit] less to install.
When you install this resource, load 4[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
You can spend hosted credits during runs.
text_zhCN:
如果你本回合已对总部进行过成功的潜袭，本资源的安装费用减2[credit]。
当你安装本资源时，填装4[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。
你可以在潜袭中花费所附载的信用点。
stripped_text: If you made a successful run on HQ this turn, this resource costs 2 credits less to install. When you install this resource, load 4 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. You can spend hosted credits during runs.
flavor_enUS: Shadow Net marketplaces have such venerability that they differ from legal platforms only in the products offered.
flavor_zhCN: 暗网市场非常可靠，只是提供的商品与正常市场不同而已。

text_enUS: The first time each turn you use a piece of hardware during a run, place 1 power counter on this resource. [click], remove this resource from the game: For each hosted power counter, choose up to 2 cards in your heap with [trash] abilities. Shuffle the chosen cards into your stack.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次在潜袭中使用硬件时，放置1枚能量指示物到本资源上。 [click]，将本资源移出游戏：每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，便从你的堆阵选择最多2张具有[trash]能力的卡牌。将所选卡牌洗入你的存储栈。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you use a piece of hardware during a run, place 1 power counter on this resource. click, remove this resource from the game: For each hosted power counter, choose up to 2 cards in your heap with trash abilities. Shuffle the chosen cards into your stack.
flavor_enUS:
“Junk plus undiscerning buyers equals profit.”
—Az McCaffrey
flavor_zhCN:
“垃圾加上外行买家等于获利。”
—阿兹·麦卡弗瑞

text_enUS:
Choose up to 5 cards with different names in your heap. Shuffle those cards into your stack.
Remove this event from the game.
text_zhCN:
从你的堆阵中选择最多5张名称不同的卡牌。将这些卡牌洗入你的存储栈。
将本事件移出游戏。
stripped_text: Choose up to 5 cards with different names in your heap. Shuffle those cards into your stack. Remove this event from the game.
flavor_enUS: Breathe in and visualise your happy place. Breathe out. It’s safe and calm and all your best days are there. Breathe in. Very good. The cortex scan has finished. Breathe out and open your eyes…
flavor_zhCN: 吸气，想一个让你开心的地方。呼气。那里平静祥和，你度过了美好时光。吸气。非常好。皮质扫描完成。呼气，然后睁开你的眼睛……

text_enUS: +1[mu] The first time each turn an event is trashed (from any location), draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu] 每回合第一次一个事件被销毁时(无论从什么位置)，抽1张卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu The first time each turn an event is trashed (from any location), draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS: Objects are but modulations in a continuous cycle of energy—illusory and impermanent echoes of the Self.
flavor_zhCN: 诸行无常，是生灭法。生灭灭已，寂灭为乐。

text_enUS: As an additional cost to use this hardware, trash 1 installed program. Ignore this cost if an installed program has already been trashed this turn. [trash]: Install 1 program from your heap, paying 3[credit] less.
text_zhCN: 作为使用本硬件的额外费用，销毁1个已安装的程序。如果本回合已经有一个已安装的程序被销毁，忽略该额外费用。 [trash]：从你的堆阵中安装1个程序，其安装费用减3[credit]。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to use this hardware, trash 1 installed program. Ignore this cost if an installed program has already been trashed this turn. trash: Install 1 program from your heap, paying 3 credits less.
flavor_enUS:
“I could let my code evolve something new, but sometimes I just want to remember yesterday’s solution.”
—Lane
flavor_zhCN:
