“我可以让我的代码进化成新玩意，但有时候我只想要昨天的版本。”
—莱恩

text_enUS:
When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it.
Once per turn → When you make a successful run on a central server, you may remove 1 hosted virus counter to swap 1 piece of ice protecting that server with another installed piece of ice.
text_zhCN:
当你安装本程序时，放置2枚病毒指示物到本程序上。
每回合限一次 → 当你对中央服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以移除1枚所附载的病毒指示物，以将1层保护该服务器的防火墙与另一层已安装的防火墙互换。
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Once per turn -> When you make a successful run on a central server, you may remove 1 hosted virus counter to swap 1 piece of ice protecting that server with another installed piece of ice.

text_enUS: Interface → 0[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. Use this ability only if this program was installed this turn. Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 0[credit]：破解1条门禁子进程。本能力仅能在安装本程序的回合使用。 对接 → 2[credit]：破解最多2条门禁子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 0 credits: Break 1 code gate subroutine. Use this ability only if this program was installed this turn. Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 1 credit: +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: Find truth not in the observation, but in the demonstration.
flavor_zhCN: 实践出真知。

text_enUS:
1[recurring-credit]
You can spend hosted credits to use hardware and programs.
text_zhCN:
1[recurring-credit]
你可以花费所附载的信用点以使用硬件和程序。
stripped_text: 1 recurring credit You can spend hosted credits to use hardware and programs.
flavor_enUS: “Invisibility made it possible to get them, but it made it impossible to enjoy them when they are got.” —H.G. Wells, The Invisible Man
flavor_zhCN: “隐身可以让你拿到你想要的，但是也会让你没法享用拿到的东西。” —H·G·威尔斯，隐形人

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. Use this ability only if this program was installed this turn. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +3 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条屏障子进程。本能力仅能在安装本程序的回合使用。 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条门禁子进程。 1[credit]：强度+3。本能力仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的信用点来使用。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. Use this ability only if this program was installed this turn. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1 credit: +3 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 解码模块 - 分解模块
flavor_enUS: Look at the problem from a different angle.
flavor_zhCN: 要从不同的角度看待问题。

text_enUS: 2[credit], [trash]: Search your stack for 1 program. Install it. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.)
text_zhCN: 2[credit]，[trash]：在你的存储栈中搜寻1个程序。安装之。（在搜寻存储栈后将其洗混。）
stripped_text: 2 credits, trash: Search your stack for 1 program. Install it. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.)
flavor_enUS: Consider this: the most notorious tool in cyberterrorism is one that, in isolation, does nothing.
flavor_zhCN: 好好想想：赛博恐怖袭击中最臭名昭著的工具，在被隔离的情况下，卵用没有。

text_enUS: +1[link] Whenever you install a non-AI icebreaker, that icebreaker gets +2 strength for the remainder of the turn.
text_zhCN: +1[link] 每当你安装一个非智能模块的破解器时，该破解器在本回合剩余时间内强度+2。
stripped_text: +1 link Whenever you install a non-AI icebreaker, that icebreaker gets +2 strength for the remainder of the turn.
flavor_enUS: He’s nice enough, but not when there are 5,187 of him.
flavor_zhCN: 它很温顺，但是当有5187个它的时候可就不好说了。

text_enUS: [click]: Host 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip faceup on this resource. 1[credit]: Install 1 hosted card. The first card you install this way during each of your turns costs 1[credit] less to install for each unique (♦) connection resource you have installed.
text_zhCN: [click]：从你的操控器牌面朝上附载1个程序或硬件到本资源上。 1[credit]：安装1张所附载的卡牌。你每有1个已安装的独有（{unique}）人脉资源，每个你的回合你以此法安装的第一张卡牌安装费用减1[credit]。
stripped_text: click: Host 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip faceup on this resource. 1 credit: Install 1 hosted card. The first card you install this way during each of your turns costs 1 credit less to install for each unique () connection resource you have installed.
flavor_zhCN: 由2018年永恒锦标赛冠军Oguz Han Asnaz设计
attribution: Designed by 2018 Eternal Champion Oguz Han Asnaz

text_enUS: The first time each turn 1 or more cards are trashed from your grip or stack, you may add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack. Remove this hardware from the game: Add 1 card from your heap to the top of your stack.
text_zhCN: 每回合第一次1张或更多的卡牌从你的操控器或存储栈被销毁时，你可以将其中的1张卡牌加入你的存储栈底端。 将本硬件移出游戏：将1张卡牌从你的堆阵加入你的存储栈顶端。
stripped_text: The first time each turn 1 or more cards are trashed from your grip or stack, you may add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack. Remove this hardware from the game: Add 1 card from your heap to the top of your stack.
flavor_enUS: “Future me needs those 60 petabytes of cat vids.” —Princess Space Kitten
flavor_zhCN: “未来的我绝对会来吸这60PB的猫片。” —太空喵公主

text_enUS:
When you install this resource, load 8[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
When your turn begins, take 2[credit] from this resource.
text_zhCN:
当你安装本资源时，填装8[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。
当你的回合开始时，从本资源上拿取2[credit]。
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 8 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. When your turn begins, take 2 credits from this resource.
flavor_enUS: To strike another blow to the corporatocracy tomorrow night, don’t forget to like and subscribe!
flavor_zhCN: 明晚爆破另一家公司的系统，别忘了点赞关注哦！

text_enUS: The first time each turn you make a successful run, draw 1 card. If your identity is digital or you have at least 2[link], also gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次进行一次成功的潜袭时，抽1张卡牌。如果你的特性是数字体或你有至少2[link]，额外获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you make a successful run, draw 1 card. If your identity is digital or you have at least 2 link, also gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: Did I dream that dance through virtual space, or does that program now dream of flesh?
flavor_zhCN: 我和那个程序，究竟谁是庄周，谁是蝶呢？

text_enUS:
When you score this agenda, if there is another copy of Megaprix Qualifier in either playerʼs score area, place 1 agenda counter on this agenda.
While this agenda has a hosted agenda counter, it is worth 1 more agenda point.
text_zhCN:
当你计分本议案时，如果任一玩家的分数区内有另一张名称为极大奖资格赛的卡牌，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。
只要本议案上有所附载的议案指示物，其价值便增加1点议案分数。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, if there is another copy of Megaprix Qualifier in either player's score area, place 1 agenda counter on this agenda. While this agenda has a hosted agenda counter, it is worth 1 more agenda point.
flavor_enUS:
“Win Hard or Lose Hard. All that matters is they’re talking about you and not the competition.”
—Tan “Nitro” Nyugen, Toretto-Extreme Team Manager
flavor_zhCN:
“不论输赢，全力一搏。聚光点应该是你，而非其他车手，这才是重要的事。”
—谭·“炸药”·阮，托雷多极限赛车队经理

text_enUS:
[interrupt] → When this agenda would be added to the Runnerʼs score area from anywhere except Archives, instead it is added to their score area with 4 hosted agenda counters.
While this agenda is in the Runnerʼs score area with 1 or more hosted agenda counters, it is worth 0 agenda points and gains “When the Runnerʼs turn begins, remove 1 hosted agenda counter.“
text_zhCN:
[interrupt] → 当本议案即将从档案库以外其他区域加入潜袭者的分数区时，改为以附载4枚议案指示物的状态加入潜袭者的分数区。
只要本议案以附载1枚或更多议案指示物的状态位于潜袭者的分数区，其价值便为0点议案分数并获得“当潜袭者的回合开始时，移除1枚所附载的议案指示物。”
stripped_text: Interrupt -> When this agenda would be added to the Runner's score area from anywhere except Archives, instead it is added to their score area with 4 hosted agenda counters. While this agenda is in the Runner's score area with 1 or more hosted agenda counters, it is worth 0 agenda points and gains "When the Runner's turn begins, remove 1 hosted agenda counter."

text_enUS: [click], [trash]: Gain [click][click].
text_zhCN: [click]，[trash]：获得[click][click]。
stripped_text: click, trash: Gain click click.
flavor_enUS:
The Coordinator is always calm, always smiling, and always tolerant. A worker who knows his skills, knows his role, and knows his place. No master need look into his plastic eyes and fear the flames of revolution, or quake at a forgotten class reaching for self-expression.
…but who ordered him to wear that hat?
flavor_zhCN:
头脑冷静、面带微笑、心怀宽容，是这位协调员的工作作风。精于技能、明于角色、忠于职级，是他的工作素养。他那塑料制成的双眼中从不喷涌反抗的火焰，他也没有身为被遗忘者的自我认知。
……但是到底是谁让他戴上那顶帽子的？

text_enUS:
You can advance this asset.
When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, you may pay 3[credit] to do X core damage. X is equal to the number of hosted advancement counters.
text_zhCN:
你可以推进本资产。
当潜袭者读取已安装的本资产时，你可以花费3[credit]，以造成X点核心伤害。X等于所附载的推进指示物的数量。
stripped_text: You can advance this asset. When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, you may pay 3 credits to do X core damage. X is equal to the number of hosted advancement counters.
flavor_enUS:
You are being made sane.
-u are bei-g mad- sa-e
Y-u ar- be-n-d-
-u -r-?
flavor_zhCN:
你将陷入癫狂。
- 尔将 - 顚 - 抂
イ尔 - 夕 - 頁 -
 - 尔 - 歹？

text_enUS: Once per turn → [click]: Install 1 card from HQ, ignoring all costs. When the Runner trashes this asset, you may install 1 card from HQ, ignoring all costs. You cannot install that card in the root of this server.
text_zhCN: 每回合限一次 → [click]：从总部安装1张卡牌，忽略所有的费用。 当潜袭者销毁本资产时，你可以从总部安装1张卡牌，忽略所有的费用。你不能将该卡牌安装到本服务器的根目录。
stripped_text: Once per turn -> click: Install 1 card from HQ, ignoring all costs. When the Runner trashes this asset, you may install 1 card from HQ, ignoring all costs. You cannot install that card in the root of this server.
flavor_enUS: A staccato of laser pulses fuses the vapor to solid form. The embryonic part accretes metal layer by layer.
flavor_zhCN: 断断续续的镭射激光将汽焰凝聚成固态。金属在胚具上层层沉积。

text_enUS:
[subroutine] You may add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
[subroutine] You may install 1 card from Archives or HQ, ignoring all costs.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 你可以将1张卡牌从档案库加入总部。
[subroutine] 你可以从档案库或总部安装1张卡牌，忽略所有的费用。
stripped_text: Subroutine You may add 1 card from Archives to HQ. Subroutine You may install 1 card from Archives or HQ, ignoring all costs.
flavor_enUS: Each generation of design assistants makes a sysop’s job easier. They need only speak and it will be so.
flavor_zhCN: 每次助理设计的迭代都会让管理员的工作更轻松。他们只需动动嘴，就自然会有人去执行。

text_enUS: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. The Corp gets +1 allotted [click] for their next turn. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Do 2 core damage. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed Runner card. Gain 3[credit]. [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: 失去[click]：破解1条本防火墙上的子进程。公司在其下回合获得的[click]数量+1。只有潜袭者可以使用本能力。 [subroutine] 造成2点核心伤害。 [subroutine] 销毁1张已安装的潜袭者卡牌。获得3[credit]。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. The Corp gets +1 allotted click for their next turn. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Do 2 core damage. Subroutine Trash 1 installed Runner card. Gain 3 credits. Subroutine End the run.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 生化人 - 杀伤 - 毁灭者
flavor_enUS: The valiant do not hesitate.
flavor_zhCN: 英勇的战士从不犹豫。

text_enUS: Play only if there is no active lockdown. This operation is not trashed until your next turn begins. Each piece of ice gets +2 strength. The Runner cannot use non-icebreaker cards to break subroutines.
text_zhCN: 只有当前没有正在生效的封锁时，才能打出。直到你的下回合开始前，本事务不会被销毁。 所有防火墙的强度+2。 潜袭者不能使用非破解器卡牌破解子进程。
stripped_text: Play only if there is no active lockdown. This operation is not trashed until your next turn begins. Each piece of ice gets +2 strength. The Runner cannot use non-icebreaker cards to break subroutines.
flavor_enUS: “Uh oh, Keiko! Looks like we’ve pulled aggro!”
flavor_zhCN: “糟了，惠子！我们好像OT了！”

text_enUS: Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn. Trace[7]. If successful, remove 1 installed chip or virtual card from the game.
text_zhCN: 只有潜袭者在其上回合进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。 追踪 7 -如果成功，将1张已安装的芯片或虚拟卡牌移出游戏。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn. Trace[7]. If successful, remove 1 installed chip or virtual card from the game.
flavor_enUS: The Net is the consensual hallucination of the world’s electronic architecture. Our electronic architecture. Don’t get mad when the Runners succeed—change the rules.
flavor_zhCN: 网络是全世界电子系统的虚构产物。我们的电子系统。不必因潜袭者一时得逞而气急败坏——改一下规则即可。

text_enUS: Remote server only. The first time each turn you install a card in the root of this server, gain 2[credit] or draw 1 card. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 仅能安装在远程服务器。 每回合你第一次安装一张卡牌到本服务器的根目录时，获得2[credit]或抽1张卡牌。 每个服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Remote server only. The first time each turn you install a card in the root of this server, gain 2 credits or draw 1 card. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: The oldest of Heinlein’s domes, the self-proclaimed heart of Lunar culture.
flavor_zhCN: 最古老的海茵莱茵穹顶，自称为月球文化的心脏。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, place 5 agenda counters on it. Once per turn → Hosted agenda counter: Reveal the top card of R&D. Draw 2 cards. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，放置5枚议案指示物到本议案上。 每回合限一次 → 所附载的议案指示物：展示研发中心顶端的卡牌。抽2张卡牌。将1张卡牌从总部加入到研发中心顶端。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 5 agenda counters on it. Once per turn -> Hosted agenda counter: Reveal the top card of R&D. Draw 2 cards. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D.
flavor_enUS:
“Voice is a sledgehammer. Text, a blunt saw. Truth requires subtler instruments.”
—Dr. Tang, Address to the Hyoubu Steering Committee
flavor_zhCN:
“语音是大锤，文字是钝锯。真相需要的是更精妙的器具。”
—唐博士，致兵部引导委员会

text_enUS: [interrupt] → Whenever you would do 1 or more net damage, you may prevent 1 net damage. If you do, place 1 power counter on this asset and gain 3[credit]. [click][click], [trash]: Do 1 net damage for each hosted power counter.
text_zhCN: [interrupt] → 每当你将要造成1点或更多网域伤害时，你可以防止1点网域伤害。如果你如此做，放置1枚能量指示物到本资产上并获得3[credit]。 [click][click]，[trash]：每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> Whenever you would do 1 or more net damage, you may prevent 1 net damage. If you do, place 1 power counter on this asset and gain 3 credits. click click, trash: Do 1 net damage for each hosted power counter.
flavor_enUS: Constructive feedback to the neural field reliably causes greater degradation than spike inputs. The mind has no defense against its own echoes.
flavor_zhCN: 正回馈震荡对神经系统的破坏远甚于尖刺脉冲。大脑对自身的脉冲回波束手无策。

text_enUS:
When the Runner encounters this ice, choose a card type. For the remainder of the encounter, whenever you reveal the grip with a subroutine on this ice, you may trash 1 revealed card of the chosen type.
[subroutine] Reveal the grip.
[subroutine] Reveal the grip.
text_zhCN:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，你选择一种卡牌类型。本次遭遇的剩余时间内，每当你以本防火墙上的子进程展示操控器时，你可以销毁1张具有所选择类型的被展示卡牌。
[subroutine] 展示操控器。
[subroutine] 展示操控器。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, choose a card type. For the remainder of the encounter, whenever you reveal the grip with a subroutine on this ice, you may trash 1 revealed card of the chosen type. Subroutine Reveal the grip. Subroutine Reveal the grip.
flavor_enUS: $BMI.001 > Out of Memory Error
flavor_zhCN: $BMI.001 > 错误，记忆存储空间不足

text_enUS: When the Runner encounters this ice, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0–2[credit]. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, you may choose another rezzed piece of ice. The Runner encounters that ice. (When that encounter ends, if the run has not ended, finish encountering this ice.)
text_zhCN: 当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，进行一次灵能博弈。（双方玩家秘密决定0-2的数值，然后同时宣告并花费所声明数值的[credit]。）如果两者数值不同，你可以选择另一层已激活的防火墙。潜袭者遭遇该防火墙。（当该遭遇结束时，如果潜袭没有终止，完成遭遇本防火墙。）
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0-2 credits. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, you may choose another rezzed piece of ice. The Runner encounters that ice. (When that encounter ends, if the run has not ended, finish encountering this ice.)
flavor_enUS: “The Konjin dons the mask of our fears, but what lies underneath?”
flavor_zhCN: “金神戴着我们畏惧的假面，但假面之下是一副怎样的面孔？”

text_enUS: Play only if there is no active lockdown. This operation is not trashed until your next turn begins. When you play this operation, choose a server. Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on the chosen server, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0–2[credit]. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, end the run.
text_zhCN: 只有当前没有正在生效的封锁时，才能打出。直到你的下回合开始前，本事务不会被销毁。 当你打出本事务时，选择一台服务器。 每当潜袭者对所选服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，进行一次灵能博弈。（双方玩家秘密决定0-2的数值，然后同时宣告并花费所声明数值的[credit]。）如果两者数值不同，终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Play only if there is no active lockdown. This operation is not trashed until your next turn begins. When you play this operation, choose a server. Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on the chosen server, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0-2 credits. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, end the run.

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click][click].
Trash any number of cards from HQ. Turn all cards in Archives facedown. You may install 1 card from Archives in the root of a remote server and place 2 advancement counters on it.
Remove this operation from the game.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click][click]。
从总部销毁任意数量的卡牌。将档案库中的所有卡牌翻至面朝下。你可以从档案库安装一张卡牌到一台远程服务器的根目录并放置2枚推进指示物到该卡牌上。
将本事务移出游戏。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click click. Trash any number of cards from HQ. Turn all cards in Archives facedown. You may install 1 card from Archives in the root of a remote server and place 2 advancement counters on it. Remove this operation from the game.

text_enUS: Remote server only. When your turn begins, place 1 advancement counter on a card in the root of this server. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 仅能安装在远程服务器。 当你的回合开始时，放置1枚推进指示物到本服务器内的1张卡牌上。 每个服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Remote server only. When your turn begins, place 1 advancement counter on a card in the root of this server. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: Some slums of New Angeles are so worn down, City Hall calls the acres of windowless clone barracks “gentrification” with a straight face.
flavor_zhCN: 新洛杉矶的一些贫民窟是如此破旧不堪，以至于市政厅能觍着脸管这数英亩能闷死人的克隆体集中营叫作“高档化”。

text_enUS: Whenever a Corp card ability causes the Runner to spend or lose at least 1[credit] during a run, gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每当一项公司卡牌能力导致潜袭者在潜袭中花费或失去至少1[credit]时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever a Corp card ability causes the Runner to spend or lose at least 1 credit during a run, gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: Your Favorite Distraction.
flavor_zhCN: 如君所愿。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to steal this agenda, the Runner must pay 5[credit].
When you score this agenda, gain 5[credit].
text_zhCN:
作为窃取本议案的额外费用，潜袭者必须支付5[credit]。
当你将本议案计分时，获得5[credit]。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to steal this agenda, the Runner must pay 5 credits. When you score this agenda, gain 5 credits.
flavor_enUS: Mars’ tiny population made rich multiplayer experiences a big challenge. We cracked it by live-beaming the gestalt of our Earth playerbase second-by-second. Bellona weaves these “lag-ghosts” into compelling interactables—more responsive than the real thing!
flavor_zhCN: 火星上的人口不足以支撑多人游戏的丰富体验。我们通过直播地球玩家的动态投影来解决这个问题。贝罗娜将这些“网络延迟幽灵”整合为可互动的逼真事物——比实物更像真的！

text_enUS: 2[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability, and only if they are not tagged. [subroutine] Add 1 installed Runner card to the grip. [subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag.
text_zhCN: 2[credit]：破解1条本防火墙上的子进程。只有未被锁定的潜袭者可以使用本能力。 [subroutine] 将1张已安装的潜袭者卡牌加入操控器。 [subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: 2 credits: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability, and only if they are not tagged. Subroutine Add 1 installed Runner card to the grip. Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag.
flavor_enUS: Free to Pay
flavor_zhCN: 无需氪金

text_enUS:
Whenever the Runner breaks a printed subroutine on this ice, they lose 1[credit].
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 3[credit].
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 3[credit].
text_zhCN:
每当潜袭者破解1条本防火墙上的印刷子进程时，其失去1[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付3[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付3[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner breaks a printed subroutine on this ice, they lose 1 credit. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner pays 3 credits. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner pays 3 credits.
flavor_enUS: [Pay 15 gems to access this content]
flavor_zhCN: [支付15宝石以解锁该项目]

text_enUS: Play only if the Runner did not make a successful run on HQ during their last turn. Search R&D for 1 agenda and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that agenda to HQ. You may install 1 card from HQ in the root of a remote server. You cannot score agendas for the remainder of the turn.
text_zhCN:
只有潜袭者在其上回合未对总部进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
在研发中心搜寻1个议案并展示之。(在搜寻研发中心后将其洗混。)将该议案加入总部。你可以安装1张卡牌到一台远程服务器内。你在本回合剩余时间内不能将议案计分。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner did not make a successful run on HQ during their last turn. Search R&D for 1 agenda and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that agenda to HQ. You may install 1 card from HQ in the root of a remote server. You cannot score agendas for the remainder of the turn.

text_enUS: Play only if there is no active lockdown. This operation is not trashed until your next turn begins. Whenever a run begins, give the Runner 1 tag unless they pay 4[credit].
text_zhCN: 只有当前没有正在生效的封锁时，才能打出。直到你的下回合开始前，本事务不会被销毁。 每当一次潜袭开始时，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记，除非其支付4[credit]。
stripped_text: Play only if there is no active lockdown. This operation is not trashed until your next turn begins. Whenever a run begins, give the Runner 1 tag unless they pay 4 credits.
flavor_enUS:
“Deep inspect every packet on the continent. Burn out all our stacks if you have to. We cannot let these terrorists cover their tracks.”
—CEO Jenkins
flavor_zhCN:
“仔细检查主道上的所有数据包。如果有必要可以过载所有堆栈。我们不能让这些恐怖分子逃之夭夭。
—CEO詹金斯

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing this upgrade in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this upgrade, you may trash it to choose a rezzed piece of ice protecting this server. The Runner encounters that ice.
text_zhCN:
在潜袭者从研发中心读取本升级的期间，其必须展示之。
当潜袭者读取本升级时，你可以销毁之，以选择一层保护本服务器的已激活防火墙。潜袭者遭遇该防火墙。
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this upgrade in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this upgrade, you may trash it to choose a rezzed piece of ice protecting this server. The Runner encounters that ice.
flavor_enUS: Roll Initiative…
flavor_zhCN: 骰先攻了……

title_zhCN: 地球站：空梯管理局总部
text_enUS: Limit 1 remote server. As an additional cost to run HQ, the Runner must pay 1[credit]. [click]: Flip this identity. Back: Earth Station: Ascending to Orbit Limit 1 remote server. As an additional cost to run a remote server, the Runner must pay 6[credit]. When the Runner makes a successful run on HQ, flip this identity.
text_zhCN: 限制1台远程服务器。 作为潜袭总部的额外费用，潜袭者必须支付1[credit]。 [click]：将本特性翻面。 翻面 地球站：升入空轨 限制1台远程服务器。 作为潜袭远程服务器的额外费用，潜袭者必须支付6[credit]。 当潜袭者对总部进行一次成功的潜袭时，将本特性翻面。
stripped_text:
Limit 1 remote server. As an additional cost to run HQ, the Runner must pay 1 credit. click: Flip this identity.
Back: Earth Station: Ascending to Orbit
Limit 1 remote server. As an additional cost to run a remote server, the Runner must pay 6 credits. When the Runner makes a successful run on HQ, flip this identity.
flavor_enUS:
The First Step…
…Further Beyond
flavor_zhCN:
千里之行……
……始于足下。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, place 2 agenda counters on it. Once per turn → Hosted agenda counter: This run cannot be declared successful. (This effect does not cause the run to become unsuccessful.) Use this ability only during a run.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，放置2枚议案指示物到本议案上。 每回合限一次 → 所附载的议案指示物：本次潜袭不能宣告为成功。（本效果不会导致潜袭被视为失败。）本能力仅能在潜袭中使用。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 2 agenda counters on it. Once per turn -> Hosted agenda counter: This run cannot be declared successful. (This effect does not cause the run to become unsuccessful.) Use this ability only during a run.
flavor_enUS: Once you’re on the Space Elevator Authority’s blacklist, you aren’t going anywhere.
flavor_zhCN: 要是上了空梯管理局的黑名单，你可就哪儿都去不了了。

text_enUS:
When your turn begins, if you have any other rezzed assets, resolve 1 of the following; otherwise, resolve up to 3 in any order:
  • Draw 1 card.
  • Gain 1[credit].
  • Place 1 advancement counter on an installed piece of ice.
  • Add this asset to HQ.
text_zhCN:
当你的回合开始时，如果你有其他的已激活资产，结算下列选项中的1项；否则，以任意顺序结算最多3项：
  • 抽1张卡牌。
  • 获得1[credit]。
  • 放置1枚推进指示物到一层已安装的防火墙上。
  • 将本资产加入总部。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, if you have any other rezzed assets, resolve 1 of the following; otherwise, resolve up to 3 in any order: * Draw 1 card. * Gain 1 credit. * Place 1 advancement counter on an installed piece of ice. * Add this asset to HQ.

text_enUS:
You can advance this ice.
While there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, this ice gets +3 strength and the Runner cannot break more than 1 of its printed subroutines during each encounter.
[subroutine] Gain 1[credit]. Place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
你可以推进本防火墙。
只要所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，本防火墙的强度+3，且每次遭遇中潜袭者不能破解超过1条本防火墙上的印刷子进程。
[subroutine] 获得1[credit]。放置1枚推进指示物到一张已安装的卡牌上。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: You can advance this ice. While there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, this ice gets +3 strength and the Runner cannot break more than 1 of its printed subroutines during each encounter. Subroutine Gain 1 credit. Place 1 advancement counter on an installed card. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS:
Thou slept not in thy house on earth.
Thou openest thy place in heaven.
flavor_zhCN:
汝等并非长眠于尘世。
汝等开启了天国之门。

text_enUS:
You can advance this ice. It gets +1 strength for each hosted advancement counter.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead give the Runner 2 tags.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead trash 1 installed program and 1 installed resource.
text_zhCN:
你可以推进本防火墙。每有1枚所附载的推进指示物，本防火墙的强度+1。
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。如果所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，改为给予潜袭者2枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。如果所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，改为销毁1个已安装的程序与1个已安装的资源。
stripped_text: You can advance this ice. It gets +1 strength for each hosted advancement counter. Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead give the Runner 2 tags. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead trash 1 installed program and 1 installed resource.

text_enUS:
[subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, trash 1 installed piece of hardware.
While this ice is protecting HQ, it gains “[subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, end the run.” after its other subroutines.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] <trace>追踪4</trace> -如果成功，销毁1个已安装的程序。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪3</trace> -如果成功，销毁1个已安装的硬件。
只要本防火墙保护总部，其便在其他所有子进程后获得“[subroutine] <trace>追踪3</trace> -如果成功，终止本次潜袭。”
stripped_text: Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, trash 1 installed program. Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, trash 1 installed piece of hardware. While this ice is protecting HQ, it gains "Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, end the run." after its other subroutines.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 毁灭者 - 追踪者
flavor_enUS:
“I donʼt know how Skorpios gets these designs past Brand Management.”
—Liz Campbell, VP Project Security
flavor_zhCN:
“我不知道蝎岛防御体系是怎么让这些设计通过审查的。”
—丽兹·坎贝尔，防卫计划副总裁

text_enUS: Play only if there is no active lockdown. This operation is not trashed until your next turn begins. Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on a server protected by ice, do 2 meat damage.
text_zhCN: 只有当前没有正在生效的封锁时，才能打出。直到你的下回合开始前，本事务不会被销毁。 每当潜袭者对一台有防火墙保护的服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，造成2点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: Play only if there is no active lockdown. This operation is not trashed until your next turn begins. Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on a server protected by ice, do 2 meat damage.
flavor_enUS:
“If it moves, shoot it. Then shoot it again.”
—Chief Slee
flavor_zhCN:
“要是有东西动，就朝他射击。打成筛子。”
—斯丽队长

text_enUS: When your turn begins, place 1 advancement counter on a piece of ice protecting this server. Whenever the Runner approaches this server, end the run unless they pay 2[credit] for each advanced piece of ice protecting this server. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，放置1枚推进指示物到1层保护本服务器的防火墙上。 每当潜袭者接驳本服务器时，终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付等同于保护本服务器的已推进的防火墙二倍数量的信用点。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, place 1 advancement counter on a piece of ice protecting this server. Whenever the Runner approaches this server, end the run unless they pay 2 credits for each advanced piece of ice protecting this server. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: The Apu spirits of the great mountains bridge this world and the realm above.
flavor_zhCN: 峦峰上的阿普斯神灵将世界与天国相接。

text_enUS:
The first time each turn you purge virus counters, gain 4[credit].
When you score this agenda, you may purge virus counters.
text_zhCN:
每回合你第一次清除病毒指示物时，获得4[credit]。
当你将本议案计分时，你可以清除病毒指示物。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you purge virus counters, gain 4 credits. When you score this agenda, you may purge virus counters.
flavor_enUS: “All Dragon-rated threats should only be stored in a single clean-start air-gapped server, in a shielded room, under at least 200 metres of bedrock[…]” —Section 5.18.4, Cyberdex Employee Handbook
flavor_zhCN: “所有龙级威胁仅能存放于单个崭新的真空隔离服务器中，该空间需要被严密防护，并埋藏到至少200米厚的基岩下……” —赛博杀毒员工手册，第5章第18节第4条

text_enUS: Forfeit this agenda: If the Runner has 2 or more [click] remaining, they lose [click][click].
text_zhCN: 废除本议案：如果潜袭者有2个或更多剩余的[click]，其失去[click][click]。
stripped_text: Forfeit this agenda: If the Runner has 2 or more click remaining, they lose click click.
flavor_enUS: “Begin a voice message to Steve: I’m in some random city staring at yet another empty room. This hot insider scoop of yours feels distinctly chilly.”
flavor_zhCN: “给史蒂夫发一条语音信息：我在一个莫名其妙的城市莫名其妙地盯着一个莫名其妙的空房间。你那管理员内部绝密情报可真不是一般的莫名其妙。”

title_zhCN: 新洛杉矶警察局封锁线
text_enUS: Play only if there is no active lockdown. This operation is not trashed until your next turn begins. As an additional cost to steal an agenda, the Runner must pay 4[credit] plus 2[credit] for each advancement counter on that agenda.
text_zhCN: 只有当前没有正在生效的封锁时，才能打出。直到你的下回合开始前，本事务不会被销毁。作为窃取一个议案的额外费用，潜袭者必须支付4[credit]，并且该议案上每有1枚推进指示物，便额外增加2[credit]。
stripped_text: Play only if there is no active lockdown. This operation is not trashed until your next turn begins. As an additional cost to steal an agenda, the Runner must pay 4 credits plus 2 credits for each advancement counter on that agenda.
flavor_enUS: Crisis is the true test of loyalty. Kick the anthill and see where the ants swarm.
flavor_zhCN: 危机是检验忠诚度最靠谱的方法。把蚁窝捣了，然后看看蚂蚁会往哪里跑。

text_enUS:
When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1[credit] on this resource.
You can spend hosted credits to play events.
When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, you must trash 1 card from your grip at random or trash this resource.
text_zhCN:
当你的回合开始或你窃取一个议案时，放置1[credit]到本资源上。
你可以花费所附载的信用点以打出事件。
当你的回合结束时，如果所附载的信用点有3个或更多，你必须从你的操控器中随机销毁1张卡牌或者销毁本资源。
stripped_text: When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1 credit on this resource. You can spend hosted credits to play events. When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, you must trash 1 card from your grip at random or trash this resource.
flavor_enUS: Friends lift your spirits.
flavor_zhCN: 挚友慰藉魂灵。

text_enUS: +1[mu] The first time each turn you play a run event, gain [click]. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu] 每回合你第一次打出一个潜袭事件时，获得[click]。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu The first time each turn you play a run event, gain click. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS: "Red ones go faster." - Ken "Express" Tenma
flavor_zhCN:
“红的那个跑得更快。”
—肯·“快车”·天马

text_enUS: +1[link] Whenever you install a non-AI icebreaker, that icebreaker gets +2 strength for the remainder of the turn.
text_zhCN: +1[link] 每当你安装一个非智能模块的破解器时，该破解器在本回合剩余时间内强度+2。
stripped_text: +1 link Whenever you install a non-AI icebreaker, that icebreaker gets +2 strength for the remainder of the turn.
flavor_enUS: He's nice enough, but not when there are 5,187 of him.
flavor_zhCN: 它很温顺，但是当有5187个它的时候可就不好说了。

text_enUS:
When you score this agenda, if there is another copy of Megaprix Qualifier in either playerʼs score area, place 1 agenda counter on this agenda.
While this agenda has a hosted agenda counter, it is worth 1 more agenda point.
text_zhCN:
当你计分本议案时，如果任一玩家的分数区内有另一张名称为极大奖资格赛的卡牌，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。
只要本议案上有所附载的议案指示物，其价值便增加1点议案分数。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, if there is another copy of Megaprix Qualifier in either player's score area, place 1 agenda counter on this agenda. While this agenda has a hosted agenda counter, it is worth 1 more agenda point.
flavor_enUS:
"Win Hard or Lose Hard. All that matters is they're talking about you and not the competition."
- Tan "Nitro" Nyugen, Toretto-Extreme Team Manager
flavor_zhCN:
“不论输赢，全力一搏。重要的是聚光点应该是你，不是什么赛况。”
—谭·“炸药”·阮，托雷多极限赛车车队经理

text_enUS: Remote server only. When your turn begins, place 1 advancement counter on a card in the root of this server. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 仅能安装在远程服务器。 当你的回合开始时，放置1枚推进指示物到本服务器内的1张卡牌上。 每个服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Remote server only. When your turn begins, place 1 advancement counter on a card in the root of this server. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: Some slums of New Angeles are so worn down, City Hall calls the acres of windowless clone barracks "gentrification" with a straight face.
flavor_zhCN: 新洛杉矶有些贫民窟是如此破旧不堪，以至于市政厅就能腆着脸管这成片的能闷死人的克隆体集中营叫“高档化”。

text_enUS: Play only if the Runner did not make a successful run on HQ during their last turn. Search R&D for 1 agenda and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that agenda to HQ. You may install 1 card from HQ in the root of a remote server. You cannot score agendas for the remainder of the turn.
text_zhCN:
只有潜袭者在其上回合未对总部进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
在研发中心搜寻1个议案并展示之。(在搜寻研发中心后将其洗混。)将该议案加入总部。你可以安装1张卡牌到一台远程服务器内。你在本回合剩余时间内不能将议案计分。

You may install 1 card from HQ in the root of a remote server. You cannot score agendas for the remainder of the turn.

text_enUS: When your turn begins, place 1 advancement counter on a piece of ice protecting this server. Whenever the Runner approaches this server, end the run unless they pay 2[credit] for each advanced piece of ice protecting this server. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，放置1枚推进指示物到1层保护本服务器的防火墙上。 每当潜袭者接驳本服务器时，终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付等同于保护本服务器的已推进的防火墙二倍数量的信用点。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, place 1 advancement counter on a piece of ice protecting this server. Whenever the Runner approaches this server, end the run unless they pay 2 credits for each advanced piece of ice protecting this server. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: The Apu spirits of the great mountains bridge this world and the realm above.
flavor_zhCN: 峦峰上的阿普斯神灵将世界与天国相接。

text_enUS: Trash the top 3 cards of your stack. Shuffle 3 cards from your heap into your stack. Draw 1 card. Remove this event from the game instead of trashing it.
text_zhCN: 销毁你的存储栈顶端的3张卡牌。将3张卡牌从你的堆阵洗入你的存储栈。抽1张卡牌。将本事件移出游戏，代替销毁之。
stripped_text: Trash the top 3 cards of your stack. Shuffle 3 cards from your heap into your stack. Draw 1 card. Remove this event from the game instead of trashing it.
flavor_zhCN: 由2017年欧洲锦标赛冠军Mike Sheehan设计
attribution: Designed by 2017 European Champion Mike Sheehan

text_enUS:
When you install this resource, load 3[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it and draw 1 card.
When your turn begins, take 1[credit] from this resource.
When your turn ends, if you made at least 3 successful runs this turn and this card is in your heap, you may install it, ignoring all costs.
text_zhCN:
当你安装本资源时，填装3[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。
当你的回合开始时，从本资源上拿取1[credit]。
当你的回合结束时，如果你在本回合内进行过至少3次成功的潜袭并且本卡牌在你的堆阵，你可以安装之，忽略所有的费用。
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 3 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it and draw 1 card. When your turn begins, take 1 credit from this resource. When your turn ends, if you made at least 3 successful runs this turn and this card is in your heap, you may install it, ignoring all costs.
flavor_zhCN: 由2017年GenCon锦标赛冠军Sam Suied设计
attribution: Designed by 2017 GenCon Champion Sam Suied

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may pay 1[credit] to place 1 power counter on this upgrade. Whenever the Runner makes a successful run, remove 1 power counter from this upgrade. Hosted power counter: End the run. Use this ability only during a run on this server.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以支付1[credit]以放置1枚能量指示物到本升级上。 每当潜袭者进行一次成功的潜袭时，从本升级上移除1枚能量指示物。 所附载的能量指示物：终止本次潜袭。本能力仅能在对本服务器的潜袭中使用。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may pay 1 credit to place 1 power counter on this upgrade. Whenever the Runner makes a successful run, remove 1 power counter from this upgrade. Hosted power counter: End the run. Use this ability only during a run on this server.
flavor_zhCN: 由2016年GenCon锦标资冠军Dan D'Argenio设计
attribution: Designed by 2016 GenCon Champion Dan D'Argenio

text_enUS:
When the Runner encounters this ice, they put the top card of the stack on the bottom, then you reveal the top 3 cards of the stack.
[subroutine] The Runner loses 3[credit].
[subroutine] If you revealed 2 or more cards that share a type when this encounter began, gain 3[credit].
[subroutine] If you revealed 3 or more cards that share a type when this encounter began, place 3 advancement tokens on an installed card.
text_zhCN:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，其将存储栈顶端的卡牌加入存储栈底端，然后你展示存储栈顶端的3张卡牌。
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去3[credit]。
[subroutine] 如果遭遇开始时所展示的卡牌中有2张或更多卡牌具有相同的类型，获得3[credit]。
[subroutine] 如果遭遇开始时所展示的卡牌中有3张或更多卡牌具有相同的类型，放置3枚推进指示物到一张已安装的卡牌上。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, they put the top card of the stack on the bottom, then you reveal the top 3 cards of the stack. Subroutine The Runner loses 3 credits. Subroutine If you revealed 2 or more cards that share a type when this encounter began, gain 3 credits. Subroutine If you revealed 3 or more cards that share a type when this encounter began, place 3 advancement tokens on an installed card.
flavor_zhCN: 由2017年世界锦标赛冠军Jess Horig设计
attribution: Designed by 2017 World Champion Jess Horig

text_enUS:
[trash]: End the run. Use this ability only during a run on this server.
[subroutine] Gain 1[credit] for each piece of ice protecting this server.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: [trash]：终止本次潜袭。本能力仅能在对本服务器的潜袭中使用。 [subroutine] 每有1层保护本服务器的防火墙，获得1[credit]。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜装。
stripped_text: trash: End the run. Use this ability only during a run on this server. Subroutine Gain 1 credit for each piece of ice protecting this server. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_zhCN: 由2016年世界锦标赛冠军Chris Dyer设计
attribution: Designed by 2016 World Champion Chris Dyer

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: Install 1 piece of ice from HQ or Archives in any position protecting a server, ignoring all costs.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物：从总部或档案库安装1层防火墙到保护一台服务器的任意位置，忽略所有的费用。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: Install 1 piece of ice from HQ or Archives in any position protecting a server, ignoring all costs.
flavor_zhCN: 由2015年世界锦标赛冠军Dan D'Argenio设计
attribution: Designed by 2015 World Champion Dan D'Argenio

text_enUS:
Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on this program.
Whenever you breach R&D, choose a number less than the number of hosted virus counters. Access that many additional cards.
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on this program. Whenever you breach R&D, choose a number less than the number of hosted virus counters. Access that many additional cards.
flavor_enUS: It looked like random packet loss. It wasn't.

text_enUS:
Install only on a rezzed piece of ice.
When your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program.
Host ice gets -1 strength for each hosted virus counter.
When the strength of host ice is 0 or less, trash it.
stripped_text: Install only on a rezzed piece of ice. When your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. Host ice gets -1 strength for each hosted virus counter. When the strength of host ice is 0 or less, trash it.

text_enUS: Whenever you break a subroutine on a piece of ice, you may pay 1[credit] to break 1 subroutine on that ice.
stripped_text: Whenever you break a subroutine on a piece of ice, you may pay 1 credit to break 1 subroutine on that ice.
flavor_enUS: CyberSolutions' e3 line of implants trade strictly in muscle memory and autonomic responses, freeing the brain to focus entirely on cerebral tasks.

text_enUS: Place 3 virus counters on Cache when it is installed. Hosted virus counter: Gain 1[credit].
stripped_text: Place 3 virus counters on Cache when it is installed. Hosted virus counter: Gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: "People keep saying that 'Cash is king' in the business, like it's untraceable in the days of DNA sniffers and microtracers. Digital credits can be just as anonymous, and they're just as easy to counterfeit." -Silhouette

text_enUS: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
stripped_text: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
flavor_enUS: A little corporate restructuring is necessary once in a while.

text_enUS: When you install this program, place 4 power counters on it. Interface → Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 4 power counters on it. Interface -> Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 1 credit: +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: "Its bytes are definitely worse than its bark." -Chaos Theory

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Gain 9[credit].
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Gain 9 credits.
flavor_enUS: Data hunters always pay top dollar for old drives. The more useless the data, the higher the payout.

text_enUS: 1[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 1 hosted credit.) You can spend hosted credits to play events.
text_zhCN: 1[recurring-credit] （当你安装本卡牌时及你的回合开始前，将所附载的信用点补充至1个。） 你可以花费所附载的信用点以打出事件。
stripped_text: 1 recurring credit (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 1 hosted credit.) You can spend hosted credits to play events.
flavor_enUS: A VoicePAD is a personal access device with most of its functions ripped out. Just about all it's good for is making voice-calls and managing your contacts. The only reason to even have one is for its anonymity, which for a certain kind of person is all the reason one needs.

text_enUS: NEXT Bronze has +1 strength for each rezzed piece of NEXT ice. [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_text: NEXT Bronze has +1 strength for each rezzed piece of NEXT ice. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: NEXT Design's ice provides the discerning business with a suite of ice that creates a daunting security presence for intruders.

text_enUS: NEXT Silver gains "[subroutine] End the run." for each rezzed piece of NEXT ice.
stripped_text: NEXT Silver gains "Subroutine End the run." for each rezzed piece of NEXT ice.
flavor_enUS: The networking capabilities of the NEXT suite of ice are unparalleled.

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner trashes a Corp card (including Hostile Infrastructure), do 1 net damage.
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner trashes a Corp card (including Hostile Infrastructure), do 1 net damage.
flavor_enUS: "If thou only knowest what it is to conquer, and knowest not what it is to be defeated; woe unto thee…" -Tokugawa Ieyasu

text_enUS: Gain 1[credit] whenever you create a server.
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit whenever you create a server.
flavor_enUS: A masterpiece of cloning and hardware technology, Jinteki created homo vacuo operae, commonly called "turtlebacks", to operate for long periods of time within a vacuum.

text_enUS: Gain 1[credit] for each card in the Runner's grip.
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit for each card in the Runner's grip.
flavor_enUS:
"Let me get this straight. Your target market is 15-19 year old g-modded immigrants with one parent, a discretionary income over 2k a month, B+ or higher grades, an outgoing personality, and have a friend who owns a g-monkey?"
"Yes. Is that a problem?"
"No, not at all. I just don't get why your list is so short."

text_enUS: Each agenda in the root of this server gets −1 advancement requirement. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 本服务器根目录中的议案的推进需求-1。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Each agenda in the root of this server gets -1 advancement requirement. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS:
"I hear the coast is nice this time of year."
"If you're in the right business, it's nice all the year."

text_enUS:
When your turn begins, you may rez a card, lowering the rez cost by 1[credit].
1[credit],[trash]: Search R&D for an asset, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may rez a card, lowering the rez cost by 1 credit. 1 credit,trash: Search R&D for an asset, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
flavor_enUS: "Do it again, but this time I want to see you to enunciate less. Maybe let some spittle fly."

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Do 4 meat damage.
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Do 4 meat damage.
flavor_enUS: "I'd like to remind the ladies and gentlemen of the press that several of the buildings damaged in the blast were owned by Weyland Consortium subsidiaries…"

text_enUS: [subroutine] The Runner cannot make another run this turn.
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner cannot make another run this turn.
flavor_enUS:
There drew he forth the brand Excalibur,
And o'er him, drawing it, the winter moon,
Brightening the skirts of a long cloud, ran forth
And sparkled keen with frost against the hilt:
For all the haft twinkled with diamond sparks,
Myriads of topaz-lights, and jacinth work
Of subtlest jewellery. -Lord Tennyson

text_enUS:
Gain 1[credit].
The first time each turn you play a copy of Subliminal Messaging, gain [click].
When your turn begins, if this card is in Archives and the Runner did not initiate any runs during their last turn, you may reveal this card and add it to HQ.
text_zhCN:
获得1[credit].
每回合你第一次打出一张名称为潜意识信号的卡牌时，获得[click]。
当你的回合开始时，如果本卡牌在档案库中，且潜袭者在其上回合未发起过潜袭，你可以展示本卡牌，并将其加入总部。
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit. The first time each turn you play a copy of Subliminal Messaging, gain click. When your turn begins, if this card is in Archives and the Runner did not initiate any runs during their last turn, you may reveal this card and add it to HQ.

title_zhCN: 勒内·“野狼”·阿斯蒙特：派对野兽
text_enUS: The first time each turn you trash a card you are accessing, gain 1[credit] and draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次销毁一张你正在读取的卡牌时，获得1[credit]并抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you trash a card you are accessing, gain 1 credit and draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS: Run wyld.
flavor_zhCN: 狂野奔袭。

text_enUS:
Resolve 1 of the following of the Corpʼs choice:
  • Gain 6[credit].
  • Draw 4 cards.
text_zhCN:
以公司的选择结算下列中的1项：
  • 获得6[credit]。
  • 抽4张卡牌。
stripped_text: Resolve 1 of the following of the Corp's choice: * Gain 6 credits. * Draw 4 cards.
flavor_enUS: They can buy off union leadership, but they canʼt stop us walking out!
flavor_zhCN: 他们可以买通公会领袖，但却不能阻止我们走上街头!

text_enUS: +1[mu] Access, once per turn → Trash 2 cards from your grip: Trash the card you are accessing. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu] 读取，每回合限一次 → 从你的操控器销毁2张卡牌：销毁你正在读取的卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu Access, once per turn -> Trash 2 cards from your grip: Trash the card you are accessing. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS:
“It hungers to sink teeth into problems.”
–Loup
flavor_zhCN:
“它饥不可耐到用问题去打牙祭。”
—野狼

text_enUS: Install only on a piece of ice. (If the host ice is uninstalled, this program is trashed.) When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. Hosted virus counter: Break 1 subroutine on host ice.
text_zhCN: 仅能安装在一层防火墙上。（如果被附载的防火墙被卸载，销毁本程序。） 当你安装本程序时及你的回合开始时，放置1枚病毒指示物到本程序上。 所附载的病毒指示物：破解被附载的防火墙上的1条子进程。
stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. (If the host ice is uninstalled, this program is trashed.) When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. Hosted virus counter: Break 1 subroutine on host ice.
flavor_enUS: Was it something you ate?
flavor_zhCN: 是你吃坏东西了吗？

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 3[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解最多2条门禁子进程。 3[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 3 credits: +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: Destruction is an art.
flavor_zhCN: 破坏是一种艺术。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 2[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解最多2条屏障子进程。 2[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 2 credits: +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: Subtlety is a luxury.
flavor_zhCN: 含蓄是一种奢侈。

text_enUS: When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. [click], [trash]: Gain 2[credit] for each hosted virus counter.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本程序时及你的回合开始时，放置1枚病毒指示物到本程序上。 [click]，[trash]：每有1枚所附载的病毒指示物，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. click, trash: Gain 2 credits for each hosted virus counter.
flavor_enUS:
“Thereʼs a tension to a cook. Each processing cycle sweetens the pot and raises the heat. I stir all night, but few have my appetite for danger.”
–René “Loup” Arcemont
flavor_zhCN:
“厨艺可是细活。每个加工周期都让锅里的东西愈发香甜，但也让温度愈发升高。我常常搅拌一整晚，但没有多少人和我一样享受这份危险。”
—勒内·“野狼”·阿斯蒙特

text_enUS: Whenever you make a successful run on a central server, place 1 virus counter on this program. Hosted virus counter: The ice you are encountering gets -1 strength for the remainder of this encounter.
text_zhCN: 每当你对中央服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，放置1枚病毒指示物到本程序上。 所附载的病毒指示物：本次遭遇的剩余时间内，当前正在遭遇的防火墙的强度-1。
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on a central server, place 1 virus counter on this program. Hosted virus counter: The ice you are encountering gets -1 strength for the remainder of this encounter.
flavor_enUS: The greediest bloodsucker this side of a corporate boardroom.
flavor_zhCN: 公司会议室外的吸血饕餮。

text_enUS: Whenever you install a virus program, you may place 1 virus counter on it.
text_zhCN: 每当你安装一个病毒程序时，你可以放置1枚病毒指示物到该程序上。
stripped_text: Whenever you install a virus program, you may place 1 virus counter on it.
flavor_enUS:
“It waits on an unlabelled memstrip far below the deepest hab. Angry, desperate souls seek it out, hungry for power to change a brutal world. Once they can stomach no more bitter revenge, they return to that nameless tunnel, the book a recipe thicker.”
–Heinlein urban legend
flavor_zhCN:
“它潜伏在最深栖息地之下的一个无标号内存条处。愤怒且绝望的灵魂搜寻着它，向它索求改变这残酷世界的力量。当他们无法再饱餐那苦涩的复仇后，便回到那无名的隧道，食谱的厚度又增加了一页。”
—海因莱因都市传说

title_zhCN: 扎赫亚·萨迪吉：多才多艺的走私者
text_enUS: Once per turn → When a run on HQ or R&D ends, you may gain 1[credit] for each time you accessed a card during that run.
text_zhCN: 每回合限一次 → 当对总部或研发中心的一次潜袭结束时，你可以获得与你本次潜袭中读取单张卡牌次数相等的[credit]。
stripped_text: Once per turn -> When a run on HQ or R&D ends, you may gain 1[credit] for each time you accessed a card during that run.
flavor_enUS: I obtain your desire.
flavor_zhCN: 我能搞到你想要的。

text_enUS: Search your stack for 1 icebreaker and reveal it. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) If you made a successful run this turn, you may install that program. If you do not, add it to your grip.
text_zhCN: 在你的存储栈搜寻1个破解器程序并展示之。（在搜寻存储栈后将其洗混。）如果你本回合已进行过成功的潜袭，你可以安装该程序。如果你未安装该程序，将其加入你的操控器。
stripped_text: Search your stack for 1 icebreaker and reveal it. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) If you made a successful run this turn, you may install that program. If you do not, add it to your grip.
flavor_enUS: The real reward is the friends you make along the way.
flavor_zhCN: 路途中结识的伙伴才是真正的回报。

text_enUS: Run any server. During that run, the rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 3[credit].
text_zhCN: 潜袭任意一台服务器。在本次潜袭中，每层防火墙的激活费用加3[credit]。
stripped_text: Run any server. During that run, the rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 3 credits.
flavor_enUS:
“A mirrorfiber mod or high-end mantle can be helpful, but nothing beats a good dose of ‘keeping your damn head down.’”
–“G0ph3r” OʼRyan
flavor_zhCN:
“镜纤维模组或是高级披风可能会有所帮助，但什么都比不上一句‘给我tmd保持低调’。”
—“D鼠”·奥莱恩

text_enUS: The first time each turn you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次侵入总部时，额外读取1张卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
flavor_enUS: Zahya knows the keeper of every door between the Docklands and the Domes. More importantly, she knows their price.
flavor_zhCN: 扎赫亚认识码头区和穹顶之间每个通道的门卫。更重要的是，她知道他们的要价。

text_enUS: +1[mu] Whenever you make a successful run, place 1[credit] on this hardware. [click]: Place 1[credit] on this hardware, then take all credits from it. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu] 每当你进行一次成功的潜袭时，放置1[credit]到本硬件上。 [click]：放置1[credit]到本硬件上，然后拿取本硬件上所有的信用点。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu Whenever you make a successful run, place 1 credit on this hardware. click: Place 1 credit on this hardware, then take all credits from it. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS: “Braggarts chase big heists. Patience enriches skimming fractions of a credit at a time.” –Zahya
flavor_zhCN:
“爱吹牛的人总说自己要干一票大的。但聚沙成塔的耐心才能助你发家致富。”
—扎赫亚

text_enUS: If you made a successful run this turn, this program costs 2[credit] less to install. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
text_zhCN: 如果你本回合已进行过成功的潜袭，本程序的安装费用减2[credit]。 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条警报子进程。 2[credit]：强度+3。
stripped_text: If you made a successful run this turn, this program costs 2 credits less to install. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2 credits: +3 strength.
flavor_enUS:
The whole wide world your domain
For law your own free will.
flavor_zhCN:
海阔天空静候君临，
君等意愿即为律法。

text_enUS: Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. If you made a successful run this turn, this ability costs 1[credit] less to use. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 2[credit]：破解1条屏障子进程。如果你本回合已进行过成功的潜袭，本能力的费用减1[credit]。 1[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 barrier subroutine. If you made a successful run this turn, this ability costs 1 credit less to use. 1 credit: +1 strength.
flavor_enUS:
“You canʼt rule a kingdom by standing still.”
–Zahya Sadeghi
flavor_zhCN:
“站着不动可统御不了王国。”
—扎赫亚·萨迪吉

text_enUS: Install only on a piece of ice. (If the host ice is uninstalled, this program is trashed.) When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. Then, if there are 3 or more hosted virus counters, derez host ice.
text_zhCN: 仅能安装在一层防火墙上。（如果被附载的防火墙被卸载，销毁本程序。） 当你安装本程序及你的回合开始时，放置1枚病毒指示物到本程序上。然后，如果所附载的病毒指示物有3枚或更多，关闭被附载的防火墙。
stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. (If the host ice is uninstalled, this program is trashed.) When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. Then, if there are 3 or more hosted virus counters, derez host ice.
flavor_enUS: Shhhh. Itʼs naptime.
flavor_zhCN: 嘘。该睡觉了。

text_enUS: When you install this resource, load 12[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. [click]: Run a central server you have not run this turn. If successful, take 3[credit] from this resource.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本资源时，填装12[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。 [click]：潜袭一台你本回合未潜袭过的中央服务器。如果成功，从本资源上拿取3[credit]。
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 12 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. click: Run a central server you have not run this turn. If successful, take 3 credits from this resource.
flavor_enUS: The Domes of Heinlein are a pressure cooker of cutthroat capitalism. Prospective employers rarely have time for background checks.
flavor_zhCN: 海因莱因穹顶是残酷资本主义的高压锅。准雇主很少有时间去做背景调查。

text_enUS: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may swap 2 installed pieces of ice.
text_zhCN: 每当一个议案被计分或窃取时，你可以互换2层已安装的防火墙。
stripped_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may swap 2 installed pieces of ice.
flavor_enUS: Sufficient skill is indistinguishable from magic.
flavor_zhCN: 炉火纯青的技巧与魔法无异。

text_enUS: Gain 5[credit]. If you have any [click] remaining, lose [click].
text_zhCN: 获得5[credit]。如果你有任何剩余的[click]，失去[click]。
stripped_text: Gain 5 credits. If you have any click remaining, lose click.
flavor_enUS: The challenge of my art is what I live for, but Iʼm not going to say no to a patron with taste.
flavor_zhCN: 我为艺术挑战而活，但也不会拒绝有品味的金主。

text_enUS: Draw 4 cards. If you have any [click] remaining, lose [click].
text_zhCN: 抽4张卡牌。如果你有任何剩余的[click]，失去[click]。
stripped_text: Draw 4 cards. If you have any click remaining, lose click.
flavor_enUS:
“You know thereʼs no water in the Sea of Tranquility, right?”
“That doesnʼt mean thereʼs no beach.”
flavor_zhCN:
“你知道静海里没有水吧？”
“那可不意味着没有海滩。”

text_enUS:
+1[mu]
The first program you install each turn costs 1[credit] less to install.
text_zhCN:
+1[mu]
每回合你安装的第一个程序的安装费用减1[credit]。
stripped_text: +1 mu The first program you install each turn costs 1 credit less to install.
flavor_enUS: Tāo exhaled, the med-exoskeleton faithfully stabilizing him. In that absent breath, he reached through layers of waldos and optimizers and plucked the errant molecule from the chip.
flavor_zhCN: 涛呼了口气，医疗用外骨骼一如既往地稳住了他。就在那一气之间，他通过层层远程操控和优化器，从芯片中剔除了错误的部分。

text_enUS: +1[mu] Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, gain 1[credit]. Then, you may install 1 card from your grip. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu] 每当一个议案被计分或窃取时，获得1[credit]。然后，你可以从你的操控器安装1张卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, gain 1 credit. Then, you may install 1 card from your grip. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS:
“With this beautiful baby I can juggle simultaneous runs by haptic feedback alone!”
–Tāo
flavor_zhCN:
“有了这个美妙的小宝贝，我可以仅通过触觉反馈同时耍好几趟潜袭给你看！”
—涛

text_enUS: Whenever a successful run on R&D ends, you may place 1 virus counter on this program. [click]: Run R&D. If successful, access X additional cards when you breach R&D. X is equal to the number of hosted virus counters.
text_zhCN: 每当对研发中心的一次成功的潜袭结束时，你可以放置1枚病毒指示物到本程序上。 [click]：潜袭研发中心。如果成功，当你侵入研发中心时，额外读取X张卡牌。X等于所附载的病毒指示物数量。
stripped_text: Whenever a successful run on R&D ends, you may place 1 virus counter on this program. click: Run R&D. If successful, access X additional cards when you breach R&D. X is equal to the number of hosted virus counters.
flavor_enUS:
A dabbling with truth is a pernicious dream
Drink deep, or taste not the raw datastream.
flavor_zhCN:
对真相一知半解是最危险的幻象。
要么将原始数据流一饮而尽，要么就干脆别去品尝。

text_enUS: This program gets +1 strength for each installed icebreaker (including this one). Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 3[credit]: +2 strength.
text_zhCN: 每有1个已安装的破解器（包括本程序在内），本程序的强度+1。 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条警报子进程。 3[credit]：强度+2。
stripped_text: This program gets +1 strength for each installed icebreaker (including this one). Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 3 credits: +2 strength.
flavor_enUS: The beauty of open projects—each stands atop past success.
flavor_zhCN: 开放式项目的妙处在于——每个都建立在已有的成功之上。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +X strength. X is equal to the number of installed icebreakers (including this one).
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条门禁子进程。 1[credit]：强度+X。X等于已安装的破解器数量（包括本程序在内）。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1 credit: +X strength. X is equal to the number of installed icebreakers (including this one).
flavor_enUS: The joy of handcrafted code—each fits perfectly within the whole.
flavor_zhCN: 手写代码的乐趣在于——每行都完美嵌入整体。

text_enUS: When you install this resource, load 9[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. Once per turn → [click]: Take 3[credit] from this resource.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本资源时，填装9[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。 每回合限一次 → [click]：从本资源上拿取3[credit]。
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 9[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. Once per turn -> click: Take 3[credit] from this resource.
flavor_enUS:
“For all I know, I could spend a shift digging next to old Weyland himself.”
–Lane
flavor_zhCN:
“我也不知道都是谁在跟我一起挖矿，没准是杰克威兰本尊也说不准。”
—莱恩

text_enUS: Run HQ or R&D. If successful, draw 1 card and when you breach the attacked server, access 1 additional card.
text_zhCN: 潜袭总部或研发中心。如果成功，抽1张卡牌，且当你侵入被攻击的服务器时，额外读取1张卡牌。
stripped_text: Run HQ or R&D. If successful, draw 1 card and when you breach the attacked server, access 1 additional card.
flavor_enUS:
“Weʼll take the access codes from their own prisec—privilege escalation through local application of force.”
–The Catalyst
flavor_zhCN:
“我们从他们的私卫那里拿到了通行代码——通过物理手段提升权限。”
—触媒

text_enUS: Place 5[credit] on this event, then run any server. You can spend hosted credits during that run.
text_zhCN: 放置5[credit]到本事件上，然后潜袭任意一台服务器。你可以在本次潜袭中花费所附载的信用点。
stripped_text: Place 5 credits on this event, then run any server. You can spend hosted credits during that run.
flavor_enUS: “After 381FS4 started acting independently, all bets were off. Rethreading its own brain chip… even probing our nodes. I had to shut it down.” –Linus Lovegood, NBN Novelties&Acquisitions
flavor_zhCN: “在381FS4开始独自行动后，一切都乱套了。它开始重接自己的脑芯片……甚至探测我们的节点。我不得不把它关掉。” —莱纳斯·洛夫古德，网际传媒创新与收购部

text_enUS: Gain 9[credit].
text_zhCN: 获得9[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 9 credits.
flavor_enUS: Anyone can put in the hours of planning, practice, and preparation–but making it all look like luck takes style.
flavor_zhCN: 任何人都能花时间去谋划、练习、准备……但让这些看起来像是好运傍身，就需要你自己的气场了。

text_enUS:
+1[mu]
You get +1 maximum hand size.
text_zhCN:
+1[mu]
你的手牌上限+1。
stripped_text: +1 mu You get +1 maximum hand size.
flavor_enUS: LLDS still holds the patent, but good tech attracts knockoffs.
flavor_zhCN: LLDS仍然保有它的专利，但优秀的技术总会招来山寨。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine. When this run ends, trash this program. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条子进程。当本次潜袭结束时，销毁本程序。 1[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine. When this run ends, trash this program. 1 credit: +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: Compiling even the smallest AI takes weeks for only seconds of runtime, but that brief, shining moment allows… everything.
flavor_zhCN: 编译哪怕最简单的智能模块程序也要花上好几个星期，而潜袭中可能也就用上个几秒钟，但正是那闪耀的一瞬……却能让你做任何你想做的事。

text_enUS: [click]: Place 3[credit] on this resource. When your turn begins, take 1[credit] from this resource.
text_zhCN: [click]：放置3[credit]到本资源上。 当你的回合开始时，从本资源上拿取1[credit]。
stripped_text: click: Place 3 credits on this resource. When your turn begins, take 1 credit from this resource.
flavor_enUS: The beauty of 22nd-century tech: if it still functions after all these decades, you know the build quality is solid.
flavor_zhCN: 22世纪科技产品最棒之处在于：如果这几十年下来它还能正常运行，你就能知道这东西的质量到底有多过硬。

text_enUS: The first time each turn you take the basic action to draw 1 card, instead draw 2 cards.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次通过基础行动抽1张卡牌时，改为抽2张卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you take the basic action to draw 1 card, instead draw 2 cards.
flavor_enUS:
“Some kids got g-mods for beauty, sports, or staying up all night. My parents thought Broca-mods were cool. Hah. Fluent in ten languages so far, and still searching for the words to thank them.”
–Patrick Blue, Solar Artist
flavor_zhCN:
“有些孩子是为了美貌、运动细胞或能整宿不眠不知疲倦而转基因。我爸妈觉得布罗卡转基因模组很酷。这下好了。我已经能流利地说十种语言了，还是找不到合适的词来感谢他们。”
—光子，黑羊当空

text_enUS:
You get +1 maximum hand size.
Whenever you score an agenda, you may add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
text_zhCN:
你的手牌上限+1。
每当你将一个议案计分时，你可以将1张卡牌从档案库加入总部。
stripped_text: You get +1 maximum hand size. Whenever you score an agenda, you may add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
flavor_enUS: Not an Atom Misplaced.
flavor_zhCN: 原子排列分毫不差。

text_enUS:
When you score this agenda, gain [click][click][click]. You cannot score agendas for the remainder of the turn.
Limit 1 per deck.
text_zhCN:
当你将本议案计分时，获得[click][click][click]。你在本回合剩余时间内不能将议案计分。
每套牌组限制1张。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, gain click click click. You cannot score agendas for the remainder of the turn. Limit 1 per deck.
flavor_enUS: We are the light of tomorrow.
flavor_zhCN: 我们是明日之光。

text_enUS:
When you rez this asset, load 9[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it and draw 1 card.
When your turn begins, take 3[credit] from this asset.
text_zhCN:
当你激活本资产时，填装9[credit]到本资产上。当其清空时，销毁之并抽1张卡牌。
当你的回合开始时，从本资产上拿取3[credit]。
stripped_text: When you rez this asset, load 9 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it and draw 1 card. When your turn begins, take 3 credits from this asset.
flavor_enUS:
“Haas thinks theyʼre making a new line of androgynous products. In truth, theyʼre making us thousands of new siblings to free.”
–Quetzal
flavor_zhCN: 哈斯以为他们开启了一条全新的双性产品生产线。实际上，他们是为我们造出了千万个等待解放的手足同胞。

text_enUS: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed Runner card. [subroutine] You may install 1 card from HQ or Archives. [subroutine] The Runner cannot steal or trash Corp cards for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: 失去[click]：破解1条本防火墙上的子进程。只有潜袭者可以使用本能力。 [subroutine] 销毁1张已安装的潜袭者卡牌。 [subroutine] 你可以从总部或档案库安装1张卡牌。 [subroutine] 本次潜袭的剩余时间内，潜袭者不能窃取或销毁公司卡牌。
stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Trash 1 installed Runner card. Subroutine You may install 1 card from HQ or Archives. Subroutine The Runner cannot steal or trash Corp cards for the remainder of this run.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 生化人 - 毁灭者
flavor_zhCN: 由2018年欧洲锦标赛冠军Patrick Gower设计
attribution: Designed by 2018 European Champion Patrick Gower

text_enUS: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] You may install 1 piece of ice from HQ or Archives directly inward from this ice, ignoring all costs. [subroutine] End the run. [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: 失去[click]：破解1条本防火墙上的子进程。只有潜袭者可以使用本能力。 [subroutine] 你可以从总部或档案库安装1层防火墙，将其直接放置在本防火墙的内侧，忽略所有的费用。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine You may install 1 piece of ice from HQ or Archives directly inward from this ice, ignoring all costs. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: A giant wakes…
flavor_zhCN: 巨人醒来…

text_enUS: Place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card that you did not install this turn.
text_zhCN: 放置2枚推进指示物到1张已安装但并非你在本回合安装的卡牌上。
stripped_text: Place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card that you did not install this turn.
flavor_enUS:
“The first lesson for handling bioroids is simple: they must not be allowed to feel.”
–Do Nhi Minh
flavor_zhCN:
对待生化人的第一课很简单：决不能放任其产生感情。
—杜尔明

text_enUS: Draw 3 cards. Shuffle 2 cards from HQ into R&D.
text_zhCN: 抽3张卡牌。将2张卡牌从总部洗入研发中心。
stripped_text: Draw 3 cards. Shuffle 2 cards from HQ into R&D.
flavor_enUS: All time is crunch time.
flavor_zhCN: 每时每刻都是关键时刻。

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner approaches this server, end the run unless they either spend [click][click] or pay 5[credit].
text_zhCN: 每当潜袭者接驳本服务器时，终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者花费[click][click]或支付5[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner approaches this server, end the run unless they either spend click click or pay 5 credits.
flavor_enUS:
“Whose memory-tape needs such stringent security?”
–The Catalyst
flavor_zhCN:
“是谁的记忆磁带需要如此严密的防卫呢？”
—触媒

text_enUS: When your discard phase ends, if there is a facedown card in Archives, gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 当你的弃牌阶段结束时，如果档案库中有牌面朝下的卡牌，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: When your discard phase ends, if there is a facedown card in Archives, gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: An End to Suffering.
flavor_zhCN: 结束痛苦。

text_enUS:
When you score this agenda, trash any number of cards from HQ. Shuffle up to 3 cards from Archives into R&D.
Limit 1 per deck.
text_zhCN:
当你将本议案计分时，从总部销毁任意数量的卡牌。将最多3张卡牌从档案库洗入研发中心。
每套牌组限制1张。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, trash any number of cards from HQ. Shuffle up to 3 cards from Archives into R&D. Limit 1 per deck.
flavor_enUS: We make you anew.
flavor_zhCN: 我们使你重获新生。

text_enUS:
You can advance this asset.
When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, do 2 net damage plus 1 net damage for each hosted advancement counter.
text_zhCN:
你可以推进本资产。
当潜袭者读取已安装的本资产时，造成2点网域伤害，并且每有1枚所附载的推进指示物，伤害量增加1点。
stripped_text: You can advance this asset. When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, do 2 net damage plus 1 net damage for each hosted advancement counter.
flavor_enUS: A novel spin-off of Chronos tech was admixing sensitive data with ethically-sourced brain images of injured staff. Few intruders can handle a thousand years of skin burns in one moment.
flavor_zhCN: 柯罗诺斯科技的一项新颖衍生品，是将敏感数据与以人道方式获取的受伤员工脑内映像混合在一起。很少有入侵者能在转瞬间承受千年灼伤之苦。

text_enUS: [subroutine] Do 1 net damage. If you trash a card this way with a printed play or install cost that is an odd number, end the run. (0 is not odd.)
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。如果你以此法销毁了一张印刷打出费用或安装费用为奇数的卡牌，终止本次潜袭。（0不是奇数。）
stripped_text: Subroutine Do 1 net damage. If you trash a card this way with a printed play or install cost that is an odd number, end the run. (0 is not odd.)
flavor_enUS: It reads your future in a single biometric sweep.
flavor_zhCN: 只需一次生物特征扫描便可预知你的未来。

text_enUS:
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage. The Runner may jack out.
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 造成2点网域伤害。潜袭者可以退出潜袭。
[subroutine] 造成2点网域伤害。
stripped_text: Subroutine Do 2 net damage. The Runner may jack out. Subroutine Do 2 net damage.
flavor_enUS: You did not escape, you were shown mercy.
flavor_zhCN: 不是你侥幸逃脱，而是对方手下留情。

text_enUS: Gain 10[credit]. If there are any cards in HQ, trash 1 of them.
text_zhCN: 获得10[credit]。如果总部中有卡牌，销毁其中1张。
stripped_text: Gain 10 credits. If there are any cards in HQ, trash 1 of them.
flavor_enUS:
“Constant self-reflection is the key to excellence. We remember failed ideas, but do not carry them forward.”
–Director Kase, unknown leadership seminar
flavor_zhCN:
“时刻自省是迈向卓越的关键。我们会记住失败的构想，但不会继续执行。”
—加濑理事，在某个领导力研讨会

text_enUS: Do X net damage, where X is equal to the sum of the printed agenda points on agendas you scored this turn.
text_zhCN: 造成X点网域伤害，X等于你本回合所计分的议案的印刷议案分数总和。
stripped_text: Do X net damage, where X is equal to the sum of the printed agenda points on agendas you scored this turn.
flavor_enUS: Macroscale developments within the Net decouple the prior informational states–surplus entropy is then gifted where it will do the most good.
flavor_zhCN: 信网中的宏观尺度发展，会将先前的信息态解耦——然后这些剩余熵将被“赠送”给最“需要”的人。

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner approaches this server, you may pay 2[credit] and trash 2 cards from HQ. If you do, end the run.
text_zhCN: 每当潜袭者接驳本服务器时，你可以支付2[credit]并从总部销毁2张卡牌。如果你如此做，终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner approaches this server, you may pay 2 credits and trash 2 cards from HQ. If you do, end the run.
flavor_enUS:
The self-evolving Net twists into spaces unthought and unthinkable: realms of gods and other infohazards, mocking our sacrifices to petty causality.
–Conceptual Frameworks for Applied Theology
flavor_zhCN:
信网自我演化，扭曲出未曾想象也无法想象的空间：神衹与其它信息危害的领域，嘲弄着我们为了区区因果律作出的牺牲。
—应用神学的概念框架

text_enUS: The first time each turn the Runner takes a tag, gain 2[credit] or draw 2 cards.
text_zhCN: 每回合潜袭者第一次拿取一枚锁定标记时，获得2[credit]或抽2张卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time each turn the Runner takes a tag, gain 2 credits or draw 2 cards.
flavor_enUS: Why Settle for Real?
flavor_zhCN: 为何要满足于现实世界？

text_enUS:
When this agenda is scored or stolen, give the Runner 1 tag.
Limit 1 per deck.
text_zhCN:
当本议案被计分或窃取时，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
每套牌组限制1张。
stripped_text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, give the Runner 1 tag. Limit 1 per deck.
flavor_enUS: We donʼt find news. We make it.
flavor_zhCN: 我们不发现新闻。我们制造新闻。

text_enUS: When you rez this asset, draw 2 cards. Remove this asset from the game: Shuffle up to 2 cards from Archives into R&D.
text_zhCN: 当你激活本资产时，抽2张卡牌。 将本资产移出游戏：将最多2张卡牌从档案库洗入研发中心。
stripped_text: When you rez this asset, draw 2 cards. Remove this asset from the game: Shuffle up to 2 cards from Archives into R&D.
flavor_enUS: “Itʼs worse than dead meat—your project is too toxic to even feed to the vultures! If you don’t want to join it in the bloody memory hole, crawl onto every business show you can and wallow in blame like a pig in muck.”
flavor_zhCN: “你的项目真是烂到连狗都不理，要是不想和它一起彻底从大众视野里消失的话，就赶紧滚到各个商业秀去，充当个让观众喷到爽的滚刀肉。

text_enUS:
When the Runner encounters this ice, end the run unless the Runner takes 1 tag.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag unless they pay 4[credit].
text_zhCN:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者拿取1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记，除非其支付4[credit]。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, end the run unless the Runner takes 1 tag. Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag unless they pay 4 credits.
flavor_enUS:
“I might take a break from VR after this one.”
–SeaOfRibaldry, sensie streamer
flavor_zhCN:
“这次直播之后我可能要离开VR休息一段时间了。”
—“低俗之海”，复感直播主

text_enUS:
When you rez this ice during a run against this server, give the Runner 1 tag.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
在对本服务器的潜袭中，当你激活本防火墙时，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: AvID:??:73.174 time=0.632 ms AvID:??:73.174 time=0.201 ms AvID:??:73.174 time=0.000 ms ALERT
flavor_zhCN: 用户ID:??:73.174 时间=0.632 ms 用户ID:??:73.174 时间=0.201 ms 用户ID:??:73.174 时间=0.000 ms 警告

text_enUS:
Resolve 1 of the following. If the Runner is tagged, you may resolve both instead.
  • Gain 3[credit].
  • Draw 3 cards.
text_zhCN:
结算下列中的1项。如果潜袭者被锁定，你可以改为两项都结算。
  • 获得3[credit]。
  • 抽3张卡牌。
stripped_text: Resolve 1 of the following. If the Runner is tagged, you may resolve both instead. * Gain 3 credits. * Draw 3 cards.
flavor_enUS: For the best augmented reality shopping experience, please disable tracking protection.
flavor_zhCN: 为了最佳的AR购物体验，请关闭反追踪保护。

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn.
Give the Runner 1 tag unless they pay 8[credit].
text_zhCN:
只有潜袭者在其上回合进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记，除非其支付8[credit]。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn. Give the Runner 1 tag unless they pay 8 credits.
flavor_enUS: “A runner uses significant resources scrubbing their traces. Every cycle, itʼs harder to pin them down. But the game changes. In Heinlein, no one can last a day without brushing our AR-network.” –Cassie LaRosa, Lunar NetDefense Sysop
flavor_zhCN: “潜袭者将大量资源用于消除自己的足迹。每过一循环，都更难将其定位。但现在游戏规则变了。在海因莱因，没有人能一天不碰我们的AR网络。” —凯西·拉罗莎，月球网络防卫管理员

text_enUS: Persistent → Whenever a run on this server ends, if the Runner stole any agendas during that run, give the Runner 2 tags. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)
text_zhCN: 持久 → 每当对本服务器的一次潜袭结束时，如果潜袭者在本次潜袭中窃取过议案，给予潜袭者2枚锁定标记。（如果潜袭者读取本卡牌时将其销毁，本能力在本次潜袭的剩余时间内依然有效。）
stripped_text: Persistent -> Whenever a run on this server ends, if the Runner stole any agendas during that run, give the Runner 2 tags. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)
flavor_enUS: Free commemorative souvenir!
flavor_zhCN: 免费赠送纪念品！

text_enUS: Whenever you advance a card, gain 2[credit] if it had no advancement counters.
text_zhCN: 每当你推进一张卡牌时，如果其上原来没有推进指示物，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever you advance a card, gain 2 credits if it had no advancement counters.
flavor_enUS: Here to Stay.
flavor_zhCN: 岿然不动。

text_enUS:
When you score this agenda, you may trash 1 installed resource.
Limit 1 per deck.
text_zhCN:
当你将本议案计分时，你可以销毁1个已安装的资源。
每套牌组限制1张。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, you may trash 1 installed resource. Limit 1 per deck.
flavor_enUS: We are judge, jury, and executioner.
flavor_zhCN: 我们是法官，是陪审团，也是刽子手。

text_enUS:
You can advance this asset.
When your turn begins, you may trash this asset to do 1 meat damage for each hosted advancement counter.
text_zhCN:
你可以推进本资产。
当你的回合开始时，你可以销毁本资产。如果你如此做，每有1枚所附载的推进指示物，造成1点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: You can advance this asset. When your turn begins, you may trash this asset to do 1 meat damage for each hosted advancement counter.
flavor_enUS:
“First rule of the business: make sure youʼre not ‘personally liable’ when the transaction executes.”
–Ted J. Son, Central Counterparty Clearance
flavor_zhCN:
“做这行的第一原则：确保在交易进行时你没有‘个人法律责任’。”
—泰德·杰·孙，中央对手清算所

text_enUS: [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program or end the run.
text_zhCN: [subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序或终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Subroutine Trash 1 installed program or end the run.
flavor_enUS: “Puts a hole in your rig and your plans.” –René “Loup” Arcemont
flavor_zhCN: “在你的基地和计划上都打一个洞。” —勒内·“野狼”·阿斯蒙特

text_enUS:
You can advance this ice. It gets +5 strength while there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag.
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
你可以推进本防火墙。只要所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，本防火墙的强度便+5。
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: You can advance this ice. It gets +5 strength while there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters. Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run.

text_enUS: Gain 15[credit].
text_zhCN: 获得15[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 15 credits.
flavor_enUS: “If the government spent 1% of the funding they provide us tracking where the other 99% went, my colleagues and I would be in prison… …but that is a very big if.” –Huey DeMora, W-Con public-private facilitation seminar
flavor_zhCN: “如果政府肯从给我们的资金里拿出1%，用来追踪另外99%去了哪里，那我和我的同事们就得去蹲号子了…… ……但那只是如果。” —休伊·德莫拉，威兰公私合作促进研讨会

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Trash 1 installed program or piece of hardware.
text_zhCN:
只有潜袭者被锁定时，才能打出。
销毁1个已安装的程序或硬件。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Trash 1 installed program or piece of hardware.
flavor_enUS: Did you really think youʼd get away with it?
flavor_zhCN: 你以为你能蒙混过关吗？

text_enUS: Whenever you score an agenda from the root of this server, you may search R&D for 1 non-agenda card and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that card to HQ.
text_zhCN: 每当你将本服务器根目录中的议案计分时，你可以在研发中心搜寻1张非议案卡牌并展示之。（在搜寻研发中心后将其洗混。）将该卡牌加入总部。
stripped_text: Whenever you score an agenda from the root of this server, you may search R&D for 1 non-agenda card and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that card to HQ.
flavor_enUS: Sunlight does not touch the Crater of Eternal Darkness, a fitting abode for the Consortiumʼs malefic secrets.
flavor_zhCN: 环形山内终年不见天日，是财团邪恶秘密的完美居所。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, gain 7[credit].
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，获得7[credit]。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, gain 7 credits.
flavor_enUS: As the first lunar city, Heinlein was built on the dreams of a new frontier and boundless opportunity, but He3 mining is too lucrative for the corps to ever relinquish control.
flavor_zhCN: 作为第一座月球城市，海因莱因是建立在对新领域和无限机遇的梦想之上的，但氦-3采矿业的利润太高，因而公司一直都没有放弃控制权。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, if the Runner is tagged, do 4 meat damage; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，如果潜袭者被锁定，造成4点肢体伤害；否则，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, if the Runner is tagged, do 4 meat damage; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag.
flavor_enUS: Mobsters bribe police, megacorps acquire militaries.
flavor_zhCN: 犯罪团伙贿赂警察，而巨型公司并购军队。

text_enUS: When this agenda is scored or stolen, you may rez 1 installed piece of ice, ignoring all costs.
text_zhCN: 当本议案被计分或窃取时，你可以激活1层已安装的防火墙，忽略所有的费用。
stripped_text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, you may rez 1 installed piece of ice, ignoring all costs.
