flavor_enUS: It might be over, but we will get them next time.
flavor_zhCN: 这次就此作罢，但下次定不放过。

text_enUS:
When you score this agenda, you may draw 2 cards.
You get +2 maximum hand size.
text_zhCN:
当你将本议案计分时，你可以抽2张卡牌。
你的手牌上限+2。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, you may draw 2 cards. You get +2 maximum hand size.
flavor_enUS: With Earth-Luna communications, saving microseconds returns megacredits.
flavor_zhCN: 在地月通讯中，节省几微秒都会带来巨大财富。

text_enUS: When you rez this asset, load 15[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. [click]: Take 3[credit] from this asset.
text_zhCN: 当你激活本资产时，填装15[credit]到本资产上。当其清空时，销毁之。 [click]：从本资产上拿取3[credit]。
stripped_text: When you rez this asset, load 15 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. click: Take 3 credits from this asset.
flavor_enUS:
“The economy of three worlds is sustained by He3 extraction from the lunar surface. The very fulcrum of power, the key to collective survival—auctioned to the highest bidder.”
–The Catalyst
flavor_zhCN:
“三个世界的经济都由月面氦-3的开采来维持。所有权力的支点，所有人生存的关键——都卖给了最高出价者。”
—触媒

text_enUS:
While this ice is protecting a remote server, it gets +2 strength.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
只要本防火墙保护远程服务器，其强度便+2。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: While this ice is protecting a remote server, it gets +2 strength. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Keep the neighbors honest.
flavor_zhCN: 防君子不防小人。

text_enUS:
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Subroutine Do 1 net damage. Subroutine Gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS:
“Youʼll give till it hurts… then itʼll reach for more.”
–Red Comyn
flavor_zhCN:
“你会奉献直至成伤……然后它会伸手索要更多。”
—红发科明

text_enUS:
[subroutine] The Runner loses 3[credit].
[subroutine] If the Runner has 6[credit] or less, end the run.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去3[credit]。
[subroutine] 如果潜袭者具有6[credit]或更少，终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner loses 3 credits. Subroutine If the Runner has 6 credits or less, end the run.
flavor_enUS: [this space intentionally left blank]
flavor_zhCN: [此处特意留白]

text_enUS: Gain 9[credit].
text_zhCN: 获得9[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 9 credits.
flavor_enUS: A financial instrument for diverting money from those outside to those inside.
flavor_zhCN: 一种将资金从外部转移到内部的金融工具。

text_enUS: Starter game only.
text_zhCN: 仅用于起始包对战。
stripped_text: Starter game only.
flavor_enUS: Are you ready to start something big?
flavor_zhCN: 准备好开始干大事了吗？

text_enUS: Starter game only.
text_zhCN: 仅用于起始包对战。
stripped_text: Starter game only.
flavor_enUS: You work for us. You just donʼt know it yet.
flavor_zhCN: 你在给我们打工，只是你不知道。

text_enUS: Once per turn → 0[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine.
text_zhCN: 0[credit]：破解1条屏障子进程。本能力每回合仅限使用一次。
stripped_text: Once per turn -> 0[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine.
flavor_enUS: The hue of your soul, the voice of your spirit, the shape of your flesh are yours to decide. Be free.
flavor_zhCN: 你灵魂的色调，你心底的歌声，你躯壳的形体，均由你主宰。还请务必自由不羁。

text_enUS: The first piece of ice the Corp rezzes each turn costs 1[credit] more to rez.
text_zhCN: 每回合公司激活的第一层防火墙的激活费用加1[credit]。
stripped_text: The first piece of ice the Corp rezzes each turn costs 1 credit more to rez.
subtype_zhCN: 半机械人 - 转基因人
flavor_enUS: I’m through with games.
flavor_zhCN: 游戏我已经玩腻了。

text_enUS:
Play only if you made a successful run this turn.
Trash 1 unrezzed piece of ice you passed during your last run.
text_zhCN:
只有你本回合已进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
销毁1层你在上一次潜袭中通过的未激活的防火墙。
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run this turn. Trash 1 unrezzed piece of ice you passed during your last run.
flavor_enUS:
“If you’re not in position to press the advantage, you’ll never gain the upper hand.”
—The Playbook
flavor_zhCN:
“若无棋占上风，何来胜之半子。”
—《战术手册》

text_enUS: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, you may install 1 program from your heap, ignoring all costs.
text_zhCN: 潜袭档案库。如果成功，你可以从你的堆阵安装1个程序，忽略所有的费用，代替侵入档案库。
stripped_text: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, you may install 1 program from your heap, ignoring all costs.
flavor_enUS: Someone’s trash is another’s treasure.
flavor_zhCN: 汝之废品，彼之珍宝。

text_enUS:
The Corp cannot score an agenda during the same turn they installed that agenda.
When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this program.
text_zhCN:
公司不能在其安装议案的同一回合将该议案计分。
当公司清除病毒指示物时，销毁本程序。
stripped_text: The Corp cannot score an agenda during the same turn they installed that agenda. When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this program.
flavor_enUS: Surprising, how a single blocked datafeed brings the system to its knees.
flavor_zhCN: 多么令人惊讶啊，一个小小的数据回馈阻隔竟能把整个系统干趴下。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条屏障子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.
flavor_enUS:
“Oh, holy Rust,
Turn foundation into dust.
Oh, sacred Flood,
Wash away what we have become.”
—Rent Strike
flavor_zhCN:
“哦，神圣之尘，
见证大厦倾覆。
哦，圣洁洪水，
冲净吾辈归路。”
—“拒付房租”乐队

text_enUS: When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Access, once per turn → Hosted virus counter: Trash the card you are accessing.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本程序时，放置2枚病毒指示物到本程序上。 读取 → 所附载的病毒指示物：销毁你正在读取的卡牌。本能力每回合仅限使用一次。
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Access, once per turn -> Hosted virus counter: Trash the card you are accessing.
flavor_enUS: Just don’t let it bounce back up the feed to your rig.
flavor_zhCN: 小心不要让它顺着推送数据跳回到你的基地来。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条警报子进程。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine.
flavor_enUS: What is another mask to those we already wear?
flavor_zhCN: 早已戴上层层假面，再多一层又有何妨?

text_enUS: While you are encountering a piece of ice, it gets −1 strength.
text_zhCN: 在你遭遇一层防火墙的期间，该防火墙的强度-1。
stripped_text: While you are encountering a piece of ice, it gets -1 strength.
flavor_enUS: At the code level, all ice manifests via a small number of common protocols. Security managers are kept awake by nightmares of a disgruntled sysop walking out the door with the core infosec library.
flavor_zhCN: 在代码层面上，所有防火墙都是通过为数不多的公共协议来显现在网络空间的。这让安保主管夜不能寐，因为他们经常会做心怀不满的系统管理员带着信息安全核心库跑路的噩梦。

text_enUS: When you install this resource, load 16[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. [click]: Take 4[credit] from this resource.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本资源时，填装16[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。 [click]：从本资源上拿取4[credit]。
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 16 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. click: Take 4 credits from this resource.
flavor_enUS: Money is like gravity, it accretes. Justice is like resisting gravity, it takes force.
flavor_zhCN: 金钱就像引力，会积聚累积。 而正义就像抵抗引力，需要原力般的手段。

text_enUS: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs.
text_zhCN: 2[recurring-credit] （当你安装本卡牌时及你的回合开始前，将所附载的信用点补充至2个。） 你可以花费所附载的信用点以支付销毁费用。
stripped_text: 2 recurring credits (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs.
flavor_enUS: Destruction is forever.
flavor_zhCN: 毁坏是永恒的。

text_enUS: The rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每层防火墙的激活费用加1[credit]。
stripped_text: The rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 1 credit.
flavor_enUS:
Nobles born foolish cared not for their state
I was left alone weeping
—Toghon Temur
flavor_zhCN:
生性愚昧的那颜们，连国家也不相看顾
我哭也枉然
—孛儿只斤·妥懽帖睦尔

title_zhCN: 肯·“快车”·天马：失踪的克隆体
text_enUS: The first time each turn you play a run event, gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次打出一个潜袭事件时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you play a run event, gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: Live in the fast lane.
flavor_zhCN: 生活在快车道中。

title_zhCN: 史蒂夫·坎布里奇：骗术大师
text_enUS: The first time each turn you make a successful run on HQ, you may choose 2 cards in your heap. If you do, the Corp removes 1 of those cards from the game, then you add the other card to your grip.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次对总部进行成功的潜袭时，你可以选择你堆阵中的2张卡牌。如果你如此做，公司将其中1张卡牌移出游戏，然后你将另1张加入你的操控器。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you make a successful run on HQ, you may choose 2 cards in your heap. If you do, the Corp removes 1 of those cards from the game, then you add the other card to your grip.
flavor_enUS: Yeah. I’m thinking I’m back.
flavor_zhCN: 是啊，我想我回来了。

text_enUS: Install 1 resource from your grip, paying 3[credit] less.
text_zhCN: 从你的操控器安装1个资源，其安装费用减3[credit]。
stripped_text: Install 1 resource from your grip, paying 3 credits less.
flavor_enUS: “I see great opportunities ahead for you.”
flavor_zhCN: “我认为你可以大有作为。”

text_enUS:
Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn.
Derez 1 installed piece of ice.
text_zhCN:
只有你本回合已对总部进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
关闭1层已安装的防火墙。
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. Derez 1 installed piece of ice.
flavor_enUS:
“Did you order the defrag?”
“…I thought you did?”
flavor_zhCN:
“磁盘碎片整理是你发起的吗?”
“……啊？不是你吗？”

text_enUS: Choose 1 unrezzed piece of ice. The Corp may rez that ice. If they do not, they trash it.
text_zhCN: 选择1层未激活的防火墙。公司可以激活该防火墙。如果其未如此做，则其销毁该防火墙。
stripped_text: Choose 1 unrezzed piece of ice. The Corp may rez that ice. If they do not, they trash it.
flavor_enUS:
“Electronic warfare, like all warfare, is based on deception.”
—The Playbook
flavor_zhCN:
“兵不厌诈，同样适用于电子战。”
—《战术手册》

text_enUS: Run any server. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, bypass it.
text_zhCN: 潜袭任意一台服务器。本次潜袭中你第一次遭遇一层防火墙时，略过该防火墙。
stripped_text: Run any server. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, bypass it.
flavor_enUS: “I’m not an actor, but I am a professional.” —Gabriel Santiago
flavor_zhCN: “我不是演员，但我是专家。” —加布里埃尔·圣地亚哥

text_enUS: Run HQ. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach HQ.
text_zhCN: 潜袭总部。如果成功，当你侵入总部时，额外读取2张卡牌。
stripped_text: Run HQ. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach HQ.
flavor_enUS: Go outside. Work with your hands. It’ll do you good.
flavor_zhCN: 到外面去。亲手去做。你会尝到甜头的。

text_enUS: Remove 1 tag. Then, you may pay 1[credit] to add this event to your grip.
text_zhCN: 移除1枚锁定标记。然后你可以支付1[credit]，以将本事件加入你的操控器。
stripped_text: Remove 1 tag. Then, you may pay 1 credit to add this event to your grip.
flavor_enUS: It’s not what you know. It’s who you know.
flavor_zhCN: 你知道什么并不重要，重要的是你认识谁。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength. [trash]: Bypass the code gate you are encountering.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条门禁子进程。 2[credit]：强度+2。 [trash]：略过你当前正在遭遇的门禁。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: +2 strength. trash: Bypass the code gate you are encountering.
flavor_enUS: Slippier than a buttered escargot.
flavor_zhCN: 比涂了黄油的法式蜗牛还要滑。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +1 strength. When you install this program, choose 1 installed piece of ice. Whenever you encounter the chosen ice, you may pay 1[credit] for each subroutine it has. If you do, bypass that ice.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条警报子进程。 2[credit]：强度+1。 当你安装本程序时，选择1层已安装的防火墙。 每当你遭遇所选择的防火墙时，你可以支付与该防火墙上子进程数量相等的[credit]。如果你如此做，略过该防火墙。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2 credits: +1 strength. When you install this program, choose 1 installed piece of ice. Whenever you encounter the chosen ice, you may pay 1 credit for each subroutine it has. If you do, bypass that ice.
flavor_enUS: Her touch is as cold as her heart.
flavor_zhCN: 她的触摸一如她的心灵般冰冷。

text_enUS: [click]: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ for the remainder of that run.
text_zhCN: [click]：潜袭档案库。如果本次潜袭将要宣告为成功，在本次潜袭的剩余时间内将被攻击的服务器改为总部。
stripped_text: click: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ for the remainder of that run.
flavor_enUS: There is no such thing as truly disconnected from the Net.
flavor_zhCN: 真正的离线是不存在的。

text_enUS:
When your turn begins, you may choose a server.
The first time each turn you make a successful run on the chosen server, instead of breaching it, gain 2[credit].
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以选择一台服务器。本回合你第一次对所选择的服务器进行成功的潜袭时，获得2[credit]，代替侵入该服务器。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may choose a server. The first time each turn you make a successful run on the chosen server, instead of breaching it, gain 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: They pay you for the practice run, then you do it again for the real reward.
flavor_zhCN: 他们为预演的潜袭先付你一次钱，然后你再潜一趟来拿到更棒的报酬。

title_zhCN: 艾拉·“生命”·拉辛：拟态专家
text_enUS: Before drawing your starting hand, set aside the top 6 cards of your stack facedown. (You may look at those cards at any time.) Shuffle 2 of those cards into your stack. [click]: Add 1 card set aside with this identity to your grip.
text_zhCN: 在你抽初始手牌前，将你的存储栈顶端6张卡牌面朝下置于一旁。（你可以随时查看这些卡牌。） 将其中2张卡牌洗入你的存储栈。 [click]：将1张由本特性置于一旁的卡牌加入你的操控器。
stripped_text: Before drawing your starting hand, set aside the top 6 cards of your stack facedown. (You may look at those cards at any time.) Shuffle 2 of those cards into your stack. click: Add 1 card set aside with this identity to your grip.

title_zhCN: 芮尔·“姬特”·佩德拉：超凡入圣
text_enUS: The first time each turn you encounter a piece of ice, it gains code gate for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次遭遇一层防火墙时，该防火墙在本次潜袭的剩余时间内获得门禁。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you encounter a piece of ice, it gains code gate for the remainder of this run.
flavor_enUS: My thoughts open; unbound within, unblocked without.
flavor_zhCN: 吾心通明；内无牵挂，外无阻碍。

text_enUS: Draw 3 cards.
text_zhCN: 抽3张卡牌。
stripped_text: Draw 3 cards.
flavor_enUS: No Diesel? No fire!
flavor_zhCN: 无迪燃？不尽兴！

text_enUS: Search either your stack or your heap for 1 program. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) Install that program, ignoring all costs. When your turn ends, if that program has not been uninstalled, add it to the top of your stack.
text_zhCN: 在你的存储栈或堆阵搜寻1个程序。（如果搜寻了存储栈则将其洗混。）安装该程序，忽略所有的费用。当你的回合结束时，如果该程序仍未被卸载，将其加入你的存储栈顶端。
stripped_text: Search either your stack or your heap for 1 program. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) Install that program, ignoring all costs. When your turn ends, if that program has not been uninstalled, add it to the top of your stack.
flavor_enUS: No code survives contact with the user.
flavor_zhCN: 没有永远顺遂用户心意的代码。

text_enUS: Run R&D. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach R&D.
text_zhCN: 潜袭研发中心。如果成功，当你侵入研发中心时，额外读取2张卡牌。
stripped_text: Run R&D. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach R&D.
flavor_enUS: The incoming datafeed is blunted, rendered into a soft lie our brains can understand. Seeing the Reality beyond takes dedication and practice.
flavor_zhCN: 我们所接收到的数据反馈已经受过打磨，呈现的只不过是我们的大脑能够理解的温柔谎言。洞察超越表象的事物需要全身心投入与勤学苦练。

text_enUS: When you install this program, you may spend any number of credits to place that many power counters on it. This program gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter, and it can only interface with ice of exactly equal strength. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本程序时，你可以支付X[credit]，以放置X枚能量指示物到本程序上。 每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，本程序的强度+1，且本程序只能与强度与其相等的防火墙对接。 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条子进程。
stripped_text: When you install this program, you may spend any number of credits to place that many power counters on it. This program gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter, and it can only interface with ice of exactly equal strength. Interface -> 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine.
flavor_enUS: I do not run with my tools. I run with my heart.
flavor_zhCN: 我用我的心灵来潜袭，而不是我的工具。

text_enUS: When you install this program, choose barrier, code gate, or sentry. When your discard phase ends, add this program to your grip. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice that has the chosen subtype.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本程序时，选择屏障、门禁或或警报。 当你的弃牌阶段结束时，将本程序加入你的操控器。 对接 → 1[credit]：破解一层具有所选择的子类型的防火墙上的1条子进程。
stripped_text: When you install this program, choose barrier, code gate, or sentry. When your discard phase ends, add this program to your grip. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice that has the chosen subtype.
flavor_enUS: I saved it to my desktop once; couldn’t find the thing for a week!
flavor_zhCN: 有一次我把它保存到了桌面，然后找了它整整一周！

text_enUS: Install only on a rezzed piece of ice. Host ice gains barrier, code gate, and sentry.
text_zhCN: 仅能安装在一层已激活的防火墙上。 被附载的防火墙获得屏障、门禁与警报。
stripped_text: Install only on a rezzed piece of ice. Host ice gains barrier, code gate, and sentry.
flavor_enUS:
“Pallas Athena sent a heron gliding down the night. They could not see it passing, but they heard its cry.”
—The Iliad
flavor_zhCN:
“雅典娜将一只白鹭送下夜空。他们看不到白鹭的身影，但是可以听到它的长鸣。”
—《伊利亚特》

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条门禁子进程。 1[credit]：本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度+1。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
flavor_enUS: A thousand puzzles with a single solution.
flavor_zhCN: 解开千百谜题的同一谜底。

text_enUS: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs of assets.
text_zhCN: 2[recurring-credit] （当你安装本卡牌时及你的回合开始前，将所附载的信用点补充至2个。） 你可以花费所附载的信用点以支付资产的销毁费用。
stripped_text: 2 recurring credits (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs of assets.
flavor_enUS: A rising tide drowns all servers.
flavor_zhCN: 水涨服务器沉。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, gain 3[credit].
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以销毁另1张你已安装的卡牌。如果你如此做，获得3[credit]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, gain 3 credits.
flavor_enUS: If you have something to sell, Aesop is interested in buying. The only detail he won’t ask is where you got it.
flavor_zhCN: 如果你有东西要卖，伊索来者不拒。他会问尽一切细节，除了这东西的来处。

text_enUS: [click]: Gain 1[credit] and draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: [click]：获得1[credit]并抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: click: Gain 1 credit and draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS: You can hack a social network, but hard work, collaboration, and a sympathetic ear gets you there faster.
flavor_zhCN: 想要进入一个社交网络，和科技树确实是一种选择，但辛勤、协作以及一双愿意倾听的耳朵能让你更快如愿。

text_enUS: Run any server. When that run ends, if it was successful, gain 5[credit].
text_zhCN: 潜袭任意一台服务器。当本次潜袭结束时，如果潜袭成功，获得5[credit]。
stripped_text: Run any server. When that run ends, if it was successful, gain 5 credits.
flavor_enUS: I thought I’d feel bad about this. I don’t.
flavor_zhCN: 我本以为这么做我会问心有愧。然而并没有。

text_enUS: 1[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 1 hosted credit.) You can spend hosted credits to play events.
text_zhCN: 1[recurring-credit] （当你安装本卡牌时及你的回合开始前，将所附载的信用点补充至1个。） 你可以花费所附载的信用点以打出事件。
stripped_text: 1 recurring credit (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 1 hosted credit.) You can spend hosted credits to play events.
flavor_enUS: They were off the market for years, till the Beanstalk Crisis made redundancy fashionable again.
flavor_zhCN: 它们已经下架好多年了，直到豆茎危机让这些过时货重新流行起来。

text_enUS:
When you install this resource, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
When your turn begins, remove 1 hosted power counter and draw 2 cards.
text_zhCN:
当你安装本资源时，填装3枚能量指示物到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。
当你的回合开始时，移除1枚所附载的能量指示物并抽2张卡牌。
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. When your turn begins, remove 1 hosted power counter and draw 2 cards.
flavor_enUS: The best view in the system. Priced accordingly.
flavor_zhCN: 太阳系内最佳视野点。以及与之相匹配的价格。

title_zhCN: 哈斯生化：未来的设计师
text_enUS: The first time each turn the Runner passes a rezzed piece of bioroid ice, you may rez 1 bioroid card, paying 4[credit] less.
text_zhCN: 每回合潜袭者第一次通过一层已激活的生化人防火墙时，你可以激活1张生化人卡牌，其激活费用减4[credit]。
stripped_text: The first time each turn the Runner passes a rezzed piece of bioroid ice, you may rez 1 bioroid card, paying 4 credits less.
flavor_enUS: Service is Guaranteed.
flavor_zhCN: 服务保证。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，如果所附载的推进指示物超过3枚，每超过1枚，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物：将1张卡牌从档案库加入总部。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
flavor_enUS: Perfection of form.
flavor_zhCN: 最完美的诞生。

text_enUS: When you rez this asset, load 8[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. When your turn begins, take 2[credit] from this asset. [interrupt] → When this asset would be trashed, you may shuffle it into R&D instead of adding it to Archives. (It is still considered trashed.)
text_zhCN: 当你激活本资产时，填装8[credit]到本资产上。当其清空时，销毁之。 当你的回合开始时，从本资产上拿取2[credit]。 [interrupt] → 当本资产将被销毁时，你可以将其洗入研发中心，代替加入档案库。（它仍然视为被销毁。）
stripped_text: When you rez this asset, load 8 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. When your turn begins, take 2 credits from this asset. Interrupt -> When this asset would be trashed, you may shuffle it into R&D instead of adding it to Archives. (It is still considered trashed.)
flavor_enUS: They only get one childhood. Make it count.
flavor_zhCN: 童年只有一次。不要留下遗憾。

text_enUS: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] End the run. [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: 失去[click]：破解1条本防火墙上的子进程。只有潜袭者可以使用本能力。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Hello again! Back for another game?
flavor_zhCN: 又见面了！想再玩一盘吗？

text_enUS:
When you rez this ice, choose 1 installed program hosted on a piece of ice. Host that program on this ice.
Each hosted program loses all abilities and cannot gain abilities.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
当你激活本防火墙时，选择1个已安装且附载于防火墙上的程序。将该程序附载到本防火墙上。
所附载的程序失去所有能力。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice, choose 1 installed program hosted on a piece of ice. Host that program on this ice. Each hosted program loses all abilities and cannot gain abilities. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: A triumph of bioroid-driven iterative design. A pity no one understands how it works…
flavor_zhCN: 一次属于生化人驱动迭代设计的胜利。可惜没人知道它的工作原理……

text_enUS: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Resolve 1 subroutine on another rezzed bioroid ice. [subroutine] Resolve 1 subroutine on another rezzed bioroid ice.
text_zhCN: 失去[click]：破解1条本防火墙上的子进程。只有潜袭者可以使用本能力。 [subroutine] 结算另1层已激活的生化人防火墙上的1条子进程。 [subroutine] 结算另1层已激活的生化人防火墙上的1条子进程。
stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Resolve 1 subroutine on another rezzed bioroid ice. Subroutine Resolve 1 subroutine on another rezzed bioroid ice.
flavor_enUS: I roar with a thousand voices, wield a thousand weapons, remember a thousand lives.
flavor_zhCN: 我以千声呼喊，以千兵挥斥，以千生追忆。

text_enUS:
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Click!
flavor_zhCN: 啪嗒！

text_enUS: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
text_zhCN: 将1张卡牌从档案库加入总部。
stripped_text: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
flavor_enUS: It’s not sleep. Sleep is dreams, activity, change. These are still, cold, dead.
flavor_zhCN: 这并非沉眠。沉眠的意识会做梦，会跃动，会改变。而这些却无变化，无温度，无生机。

text_enUS: Gain [click][click].
text_zhCN: 获得[click][click]。
stripped_text: Gain click click.
flavor_enUS: Sometimes we at Haas-Bioroid are asked how well bioroids interface socially with human workforces. Thanks to our tireless efforts, we believe this will not be a problem in the long term.
flavor_zhCN: 我们在哈斯生化时常被问及生化人是否能与人类劳工进行有效的社会互动。在我们的不懈努力下，我们相信从长远来看这不是个问题。

text_enUS: X[credit], [trash]: Choose 1 rezzed piece of ice protecting this server. That ice gets +X strength for the remainder of the turn.
text_zhCN: X[credit]，[trash]：选择1层已激活的保护本服务器的防火墙。该防火墙在本回合剩余时间内强度+X。
stripped_text: X credits, trash: Choose 1 rezzed piece of ice protecting this server. That ice gets +X strength for the remainder of the turn.
flavor_enUS: Problem solved.
flavor_zhCN: 问题已解决。

text_enUS: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, do 1 net damage.
text_zhCN: 每当一个议案被计分或窃取时，造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, do 1 net damage.
flavor_enUS: The Essence of You.
flavor_zhCN: 你的本质。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, place 3 agenda counters on it. Hosted agenda counter: Do 1 net damage. Use this ability only during a run and only once per run.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，放置3枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物：造成1点网域伤害。本能力仅能在潜袭中使用，且每次潜袭中仅限使用一次。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 3 agenda counters on it. Hosted agenda counter: Do 1 net damage. Use this ability only during a run and only once per run.
flavor_enUS: The payment for entry is a mere drop of blood.
flavor_zhCN: 通行的代价不过一滴血而已。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: End the run.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物：终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: End the run.
flavor_enUS: We could stop disasters before they happen, murderers before they act. Surely that’s worth an android’s sanity?
flavor_zhCN: 我们可以在灾难降临前阻止它，在杀人犯动手前拦下他。与之相比，一个安卓人的神智难道不就显得无足轻重了吗?

text_enUS: You can advance this asset. [click], [trash]: Do 3 net damage. Use this ability only if there are 4 or more hosted advancement counters.
text_zhCN: 你可以推进本资产。 [click]，[trash]：造成3点网域伤害。只有所附载的推进指示物有4枚或更多时，才能使用本能力。
stripped_text: You can advance this asset. click, trash: Do 3 net damage. Use this ability only if there are 4 or more hosted advancement counters.
flavor_enUS: I cannot stay. There is something I must do.
flavor_zhCN: 我不能驻留。我还有未竟之事。

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 4[credit]. If you do, give the Runner 1 tag and do 3 net damage.
text_zhCN:
在潜袭者从研发中心读取本资产的期间，其必须展示之。
当潜袭者从档案库以外其他区域读取本资产时，你可以支付4[credit]。如果你如此做，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记并造成3点网域伤害。
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 4 credits. If you do, give the Runner 1 tag and do 3 net damage.
flavor_enUS: A little room, full of surprises.
flavor_zhCN: 小房间，大惊喜。

text_enUS:
The strength of this ice cannot be lowered.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
本防火墙的强度不能被降低。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: The strength of this ice cannot be lowered. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: As the white light blazed around her, she became still. It was too beautiful. Too perfect.
flavor_zhCN: 白色光芒在她四周绽放，她看得呆住了。无比华美。完璧无瑕。

text_enUS: The Runner cannot break subroutines on this ice using AI programs. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed AI program. [subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
text_zhCN: 潜袭者不能使用智能模块程序破解本防火墙上的子进程。 [subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的智能模块程序。 [subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: The Runner cannot break subroutines on this ice using AI programs. Subroutine Trash 1 installed AI program. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 杀伤 - 毁灭者
flavor_enUS: The pain of its first cutting art is a test. Bleed human-red and the second attack is stilled.
flavor_zhCN: 首次切割所带来的痛楚只是一场测试。如果流出的是人类的血液，就不会有第二击。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Reveal up to 5 cards in HQ. Gain 2[credit] for each card you revealed this way.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
展示总部中的最多5张卡牌。你每以此法展示1张卡牌，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Reveal up to 5 cards in HQ. Gain 2 credits for each card you revealed this way.
flavor_enUS: We knew we’d found this season’s must-have when all twenty of the A-tier influencers refused to return the teacup alpacas.
flavor_zhCN: 当二十位顶级网红不约而同地拒绝归还迷你羊驼的时候，我们意识到我们找到本季度的抢手货了。

text_enUS: Choose 1 installed card you can advance. Move up to 2 advancement counters from 1 other card to the chosen card.
text_zhCN: 选择1张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌。从另1张卡牌上转移最多2枚推进指示物到所选择的卡牌上。
stripped_text: Choose 1 installed card you can advance. Move up to 2 advancement counters from 1 other card to the chosen card.
flavor_enUS: Are you watching closely?
flavor_zhCN: 看清楚了吗？

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, do 1 net damage. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 每当潜袭者对本服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，造成1点网域伤害。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, do 1 net damage. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: Director Kase hung landscapes of the Hokusai facility behind their desk. The implication was wonderful for concentrating the minds of the staff.
flavor_zhCN: 加濑理事将北斋设施的景观挂在自己的桌后。集中员工工作精力的效果非常显著。

text_enUS: The first time each turn you create a remote server, draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次建立一台远程服务器时，抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you create a remote server, draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS: Every Hour, Every Minute, Every Second.
flavor_zhCN: 每时每刻，每分每秒。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, you may install and rez 1 asset or upgrade from HQ or Archives, ignoring all costs.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，你可以展示1个总部或档案库内的资产或升级。安装并激活该卡牌，忽略所有的费用。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, you may install and rez 1 asset or upgrade from HQ or Archives, ignoring all costs.
flavor_enUS: Alright everyone! The rights go live in exactly fourteen days. I want merch, I want tie-ins, I want sequels! Let’s go!
flavor_zhCN: 好了大家伙儿！授权还有十四天的时间生效。我要卖周边，我要做联动，我要写续集！现在就开搞！

text_enUS:
When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 hosted advancement counters past 3.
This agenda is worth 1 more agenda point for each hosted agenda counter.
text_zhCN:
当你将本议案计分时，如果所附载的推进指示物超过3枚，每超过2枚，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。
每有1枚所附载的议案指示物，本议案的价值增加1点议案分数。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 hosted advancement counters past 3. This agenda is worth 1 more agenda point for each hosted agenda counter.
flavor_enUS: Everything is data.
flavor_zhCN: 万物皆为数据。

text_enUS: [interrupt] → The first time each turn you would draw any number of cards, increase the number of cards you will draw by 1. When you draw those cards, add 1 of them to the bottom of R&D.
text_zhCN: [interrupt] → 每回合你第一次将要抽任意数量的卡牌时，抽牌数量增加1张。当你抽这些卡牌时，将其中1张加入研发中心底端。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> The first time each turn you would draw any number of cards, increase the number of cards you will draw by 1. When you draw those cards, add 1 of them to the bottom of R&D.
flavor_enUS: Lead the market, never follow it.
flavor_zhCN: 引领市场，不要让它引领你。

text_enUS: You can advance this asset. [click], [trash]: The Runner loses 4[credit] for each hosted advancement counter.
text_zhCN: 你可以推进本资产。 [click]，[trash]：每有1枚所附载的推进指示物，潜袭者失去4[credit]。
stripped_text: You can advance this asset. click, trash: The Runner loses 4 credits for each hosted advancement counter.
flavor_enUS: Corporations can file chargebacks too.
flavor_zhCN: 公司也有办法要求退款。

text_enUS:
When the Runner encounters this ice, gain 1[credit].
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 1[credit].
text_zhCN:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，你获得1[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付1[credit]。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, gain 1 credit. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner pays 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: A moment of your time? A moment of your time? A moment of your—
flavor_zhCN: 请问我可以占用您一点时间吗？请问我可以占用您一点时间吗？请问我可以—

text_enUS:
When the Runner encounters this ice, they must pay 3[credit], if able. If they do not, end the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，如可能，其必须支付3[credit]。如果其未如此做，终止本次潜袭。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, they must pay 3 credits, if able. If they do not, end the run. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: The original Net pathways were free and open. An unacceptable state of affairs.
flavor_zhCN: 最初的信网通道是免费且开放的。这完全让人无可接受。

text_enUS: While there are no installed fracter programs, this ice gets +7 strength. [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: 只要没有已安装的分解模块程序，本防火墙的强度便+7。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: While there are no installed fracter programs, this ice gets +7 strength. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS:
Space bent back. Folds on folds.
Endlessly wide. Paper deep.
flavor_zhCN:
空间向后弯曲。经过两次折叠。
即可无限循环。很简单的理论。

text_enUS:
X must be equal to or less than the number of tags the Runner has.
Place X advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance.
text_zhCN:
X必须等于或少于潜袭者所具有的锁定标记数量。
放置X枚推进指示物到1张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌上。
stripped_text: X must be equal to or less than the number of tags the Runner has. Place X advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance.
flavor_enUS: They know more about you than you do.
flavor_zhCN: 他们比你更懂你。

text_enUS: Each agenda in the root of this server gets −1 advancement requirement. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 本服务器根目录中的议案的推进需求-1。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Each agenda in the root of this server gets -1 advancement requirement. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: The Coast is open for business.
flavor_zhCN: 海岸城开放做生意了。

title_enUS: Weyland Consortium: Building a Better World
title_zhCN: 威兰财团：创造美好世界
stripped_title: Weyland Consortium: Building a Better World
text_enUS: Whenever you play a transaction operation, gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每当你打出一个交易事务时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever you play a transaction operation, gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: Above the Competition.
flavor_zhCN: 鹤立鸡群。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, gain 7[credit] and take 1 bad publicity.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，获得7[credit]并拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, gain 7 credits and take 1 bad publicity.
flavor_enUS: Sometimes the small fry need a little convincing to put profit over principle.
flavor_zhCN: 有时候，那些位轻权微的人需要接受一点劝说，才会把利润置于原则之上。

text_enUS: Install only faceup. (This agenda is neither rezzed nor unrezzed.) Whenever you advance this agenda, gain 2[credit]. If there are 5 or more hosted advancement counters (including the counter just placed), gain 3[credit] instead.
text_zhCN: 本议案仅能面朝上安装。（本议案不视为已激活或未激活。） 每当你推进本议案时，获得2[credit]。如果所附载的推进指示物有5枚或更多（包括刚放上去的那1枚），则改为获得3[credit]。
stripped_text: Install only faceup. (This agenda is neither rezzed nor unrezzed.) Whenever you advance this agenda, gain 2 credits. If there are 5 or more hosted advancement counters (including the counter just placed), gain 3 credits instead.
flavor_enUS: There’s only one season in Oaktown: construction.
flavor_zhCN: 奥克敦唯一的季节：建设季。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Search R&D for 1 card and reveal it. Add it to HQ.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，如果所附载的推进指示物超过3枚，每超过1枚，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物：在研发中心搜寻1张卡牌并展示之。将其加入总部。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Search R&D for 1 card and reveal it. Add it to HQ.
flavor_enUS: Next stop: infinity.
flavor_zhCN: 下一站：无限。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to rez this asset, forfeit 1 agenda.
When your turn begins, you may trash 1 installed resource. Trashing a resource this way cannot be prevented.
text_zhCN:
作为激活本资产的额外费用，废除1个议案。
当你的回合开始时，你可以销毁1个已安装的资源。以此法销毁资源不能被防止。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to rez this asset, forfeit 1 agenda. When your turn begins, you may trash 1 installed resource. Trashing a resource this way cannot be prevented.
flavor_enUS: It’s amazing what people will endure for job security.
flavor_zhCN: 你想象不到人们为了保住工作能有多高的容忍度。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to rez this ice, forfeit 1 agenda.
[subroutine] Gain 2[credit].
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
作为激活本防火墙的额外费用，废除1个议案。
[subroutine] 获得2[credit]。
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to rez this ice, forfeit 1 agenda. Subroutine Gain 2 credits. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Target Acquired.
flavor_zhCN: 目标锁定。

text_enUS: You can advance this ice. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, the Runner cannot break subroutines on this ice using AI programs. [subroutine] Gain 1[credit]. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead gain 4[credit]. [subroutine] End the run. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead search R&D for up to 2 cards. Add those cards to HQ, then end the run.
text_zhCN: 你可以推进本防火墙。如果所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，潜袭者不能使用智能模块程序破解本防火墙上的子进程。 [subroutine] 获得1[credit]。如果所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，则改为获得4[credit]。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。如果所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，则改为在研发中心搜寻最多2张卡牌。将这些卡牌加入总部，然后终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: You can advance this ice. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, the Runner cannot break subroutines on this ice using AI programs. Subroutine Gain 1 credit. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead gain 4 credits. Subroutine End the run. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead search R&D for up to 2 cards. Add those cards to HQ, then end the run.

text_enUS:
You can advance this ice. It gets +1 strength for each hosted advancement counter.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
你可以推进本防火墙。每有1枚所附载的推进指示物，本防火墙的强度+l。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: You can advance this ice. It gets +1 strength for each hosted advancement counter. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Each time I came back, it was bigger. And colder.
flavor_zhCN: 每次我回来的时候，这东西都变得更大。而且更冷。

text_enUS: Trace[5]. If successful, do X meat damage. X is equal to the sum of the printed agenda points on all agendas the Runner stole during their last turn.
text_zhCN: <trace>追踪 5</trace>。如果成功，造成X点肢体伤害。X等于潜袭者在其上回合所窃取的所有议案的印刷议案分数总和。
stripped_text: Trace[5]. If successful, do X meat damage. X is equal to the sum of the printed agenda points on all agendas the Runner stole during their last turn.
flavor_enUS: “Don’t think we don’t care. We are very upset.”
flavor_zhCN: “不要觉得我们不在乎。其实我们非常生气。”

text_enUS: Runs against this server cannot be declared successful. (This effect does not cause runs to become unsuccessful.) Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 对本服务器的潜袭不能宣告为成功。（本效果不会导致潜袭被视为失败。） 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Runs against this server cannot be declared successful. (This effect does not cause runs to become unsuccessful.) Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: The Promontorium Agarum shipyards work on a scale that would be impossible in Earthgrav.
flavor_zhCN: 阿格鲁姆岬空间港处于一个地球引力下根本无法实现的运营规模。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: Everyone bought the newest PAD. Retro styling is in!
flavor_zhCN: 所有人都买了最新款掌上电脑。复古潮流将至！

text_enUS:
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click].
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去[click]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner loses click. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: No runner sees the same thing. Some say it’s a beast, others a man. But they all agree that it smells blue, and tastes like eternity.
flavor_zhCN: 每个潜袭者都看到了不一样的东西。有些人说看到了一头野兽，也有人说看到了一个人。但所有人都同意，它的气味是蓝色的，味道是永恒的。

text_enUS:
Gain 1[credit].
The first time each turn you play a copy of Subliminal Messaging, gain [click].
When your turn begins, if this card is in Archives and the Runner did not initiate any runs during their last turn, you may reveal this card and add it to HQ.
text_zhCN:
获得1[credit].
每回合你第一次打出一张名称为潜意识信号的卡牌时，获得[click]。
当你的回合开始时，如果本卡牌在档案库中，且潜袭者在其上回合未发起过潜袭，你可以展示本卡牌，并将其加入总部。
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit. The first time each turn you play a copy of Subliminal Messaging, gain click. When your turn begins, if this card is in Archives and the Runner did not initiate any runs during their last turn, you may reveal this card and add it to HQ.
flavor_enUS: You don’t notice, but their profits do.
flavor_zhCN: 你后知，他们的利润却先觉。

text_enUS: [click], [trash], suffer 1 core damage: Run a remote server. During that run, cards in the root of the attacked server lose all abilities. When that run is successful, trash all cards in the root of the attacked server.
text_zhCN: [click]，[trash]，受到1点核心伤害：潜袭一台远程服务器。在本次潜袭中，被攻击的服务器根目录中的卡牌失去所有能力。当本次潜袭成功时，销毁被攻击的服务器根目录中的所有卡牌。
stripped_text: click, trash, suffer 1 core damage: Run a remote server. During that run, cards in the root of the attacked server lose all abilities. When that run is successful, trash all cards in the root of the attacked server.
flavor_enUS: A single spark is all it takes...

text_enUS: When you install this program, place 6 power counters on it. Interface → [trash] or hosted power counter: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本程序时，放置6枚能量指示物到本程序上。 对接 → [trash]或所附载的能量指示物：破解1条警报子进程。 2[credit]：强度+3。
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 6 power counters on it. Interface -> trash or hosted power counter: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2 credits: +3 strength.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 断路模块 - 武器

text_enUS:
Play only if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D, and Archives this turn.
The Corp must set aside the top 8 cards of R&D faceup. Access 1 of those cards. You may spend [click] to access another 1 of those cards. Then, the Corp shuffles the set-aside cards into R&D.
text_zhCN:
只有你本回合对总部、研发中心与档案库均进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
公司必须将研发中心顶端8张卡牌牌面朝上置于一旁。读取其中1张卡牌。你可以花费[click]，以读取其中另1张卡牌。然后，公司将置于一旁的卡牌洗入研发中心。
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D, and Archives this turn. The Corp must set aside the top 8 cards of R&D faceup. Access 1 of those cards. You may spend click to access another 1 of those cards. Then, the Corp shuffles the set-aside cards into R&D.

text_enUS: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may derez another installed card. If you do, the Runner cannot use paid abilities printed on bioroid ice for the remainder of this turn. Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage. [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: 在对本服务器的潜袭中，当你激活本防火墙时，你可以关闭另一张已安装的卡牌。如果你如此做，潜袭者在本回合剩余时间内不能使用生化人防火墙上印刷的付费能力。失去[click]：破解1条本防火墙上的子进程。只有潜袭者可以使用本能力。 [subroutine] 造成1点核心伤害。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may derez another installed card. If you do, the Runner cannot use paid abilities printed on bioroid ice for the remainder of this turn. Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Do 1 core damage. Subroutine End the run.
subtype_zhCN: 屏障 - 生化人 - 杀伤

text_enUS:
When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may trash 1 card from HQ to do 2 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
text_zhCN:
在对本服务器的潜袭中，当你激活本防火墙时，你可以从总部销毁1张卡牌，以造成2点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may trash 1 card from HQ to do 2 net damage. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.
flavor_enUS: Ethereal beauty brings sweet death with only a brief touch.

title_zhCN: 符拉迪西比尔斯克城际网阵
text_enUS: You can advance this upgrade. Once per turn → 2 hosted advancement counters: Place 2 advancement counters on another card you can advance in the root of this server. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 你可以推进本升级。 每回合限一次 → 2枚所附载的推进指示物：放置2枚推进指示物到本服务器根目录中另一张你可以推进的卡牌上。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: You can advance this upgrade. Once per turn -> 2 hosted advancement counters: Place 2 advancement counters on another card you can advance in the root of this server. Limit 1 region per server.

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to score this agenda, trash 1 of your other installed cards.
When you score this agenda, do 2 meat damage.
text_zhCN:
作为将本议案计分的额外费用，销毁另1张你已安装的卡牌。
当你将本议案计分时，造成2点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to score this agenda, trash 1 of your other installed cards. When you score this agenda, do 2 meat damage.
flavor_enUS: Argus Security is always willing to send agents over to assist with radical asset reassignment.

title_zhCN: 艾萨·阿方托夫：生态起义者
text_enUS: The first time each turn you suffer core damage, you may draw 1 card and sabotage 2. (The Corp trashes 2 cards of their choice from HQ and/or the top of R&D.)
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次受到核心伤害时，你可以抽1张卡牌并破坏2。（公司选择从总部和/或研发中心顶端销毁2张卡牌。）
stripped_text: The first time each turn you suffer core damage, you may draw 1 card and sabotage 2. (The Corp trashes 2 cards of their choice from HQ and/or the top of R&D.)
flavor_enUS: Waiting is useless. The crisis is here; pick a side.
flavor_zhCN: 等待不解决问题。危机就在眼前；选边站吧。

text_enUS: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, sabotage 4. (The Corp trashes 4 cards of their choice from HQ and/or the top of R&D.)
text_zhCN: 潜袭总部。如果成功，破坏4，代替侵入总部。（公司选择从总部和/或研发中心顶端销毁4张卡牌。）
stripped_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, sabotage 4. (The Corp trashes 4 cards of their choice from HQ and/or the top of R&D.)
flavor_enUS:
We're all alike down here
Androids are friends we salute
Give us all a f***ing break
Ol' Jack is the s*** on my boot.
flavor_zhCN:
我们都一无所有
安卓人也是战友
再不歇就要怒吼
老杰克听到没有？

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, suffer 1 core damage.
Gain [click][click][click].
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，受到1点核心伤害。
获得[click][click][click]。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, suffer 1 core damage. Gain clickclickclick.
flavor_enUS: We can change the world, if we're willing to be changed in return.
flavor_zhCN: 我们可以改变世界，只要我们乐意以被改变为代价。

text_enUS:
Draw 3 cards.
When this event is trashed from your grip or stack, you may draw 2 cards.
text_zhCN:
抽3张卡牌。
当本事件从你的操控器或存储栈中被销毁时，你可以抽2张卡牌。
stripped_text: Draw 3 cards. When this event is trashed from your grip or stack, you may draw 2 cards.
flavor_enUS: Reactive implants reclaim the memories of our fallen comrades. Their sacrifice is our shield.
flavor_zhCN: 反应式植入体会收回我们倒下同志们的记忆。他们的牺牲将成为我们的护盾。

text_enUS:
When you install this hardware, suffer 1 core damage.
The play cost of each event is lowered by 1[credit].
text_zhCN:
当你安装本硬件时，受到1点核心伤害。
所有事件的打出费用减1[credit]。
stripped_text: When you install this hardware, suffer 1 core damage. The play cost of each event is lowered by 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: Arming the resistance with disarming charm.
flavor_zhCN: 三寸之舌，强于百万之师。

text_enUS: +1[mu] You get +3 maximum hand size. When you install this hardware, suffer 1 core damage. Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, sabotage 1. (The Corp trashes 1 card of their choice from HQ or the top of R&D.) Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu] 你的手牌上限+3。 当你安装本硬件时，受到1点核心伤害。每当公司将一个议案计分时，破坏1。（公司选择从总部或研发中心顶端销毁1张卡牌。） 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu You get +3 maximum hand size. When you install this hardware, suffer 1 core damage. Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, sabotage 1. (The Corp trashes 1 card of their choice from HQ or the top of R&D.) Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: When you install this program, suffer 1 core damage. This program gets +1 strength for each core damage you have taken this game. Interface → 1[credit]: Break any number of barrier subroutines.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本程序时，受到1点核心伤害。 你本局游戏中每受到过1点核心伤害，本程序的强度+1。 对接 → 1[credit]：破解任意数量的屏障子进程。
stripped_text: When you install this program, suffer 1 core damage. This program gets +1 strength for each core damage you have taken this game. Interface -> 1 credit: Break any number of barrier subroutines.
flavor_enUS: He didn't speak, but I knew exactly what he wanted, and what I had to do.
flavor_zhCN: 他缄默不语，但我清楚他想从我这里得到什么。

title_zhCN: 奥古斯蒂娜·伊万诺夫斯卡娅
text_enUS: The first time each turn you install a virus program, sabotage 1. (The Corp trashes 1 card of their choice from HQ or the top of R&D.)
text_zhCN: 每回合你第次安装一个病毒程序时，破坏1。（公司选择从总部或研发中心顶端销毁1张卡牌。）
stripped_text: The first time each turn you install a virus program, sabotage 1. (The Corp trashes 1 card of their choice from HQ or the top of R&D.)
flavor_enUS: "Sometimes being a union rep calls for action even more... direct."
flavor_zhCN: “作为工会代表，有时需要采取更加……直接的行动。”

text_enUS: [click], [trash], suffer 1 core damage: Run a remote server. During that run, cards in the root of the attacked server lose all abilities. When that run is successful, trash all cards in the root of the attacked server.
text_zhCN: [click]，[trash]，受到1点核心伤害：潜袭一台远程服务器。在本次潜袭中，被攻击的服务器根目录中的卡牌失去所有能力。当本次潜袭成功时，销毁被攻击的服务器根目录中的所有卡牌。
stripped_text: click, trash, suffer 1 core damage: Run a remote server. During that run, cards in the root of the attacked server lose all abilities. When that run is successful, trash all cards in the root of the attacked server.
flavor_enUS: A single spark is all that it takes to destroy billions of credits... or to burn away the rot that ravages our world.
flavor_zhCN: 星星之火，可以摧毁数以亿计的信用点……也可以燎尽蹂躏我们世界的腐朽。

text_enUS:
The first time each turn you spend credits from an installed card, place 1 power counter on this resource.
Whenever you breach HQ or R&D, you may remove up to 2 hosted power counters to access that many additional cards.
text_zhCN:
每回合你第一次花费已安装的卡牌上的信用点时，放置1枚能量指示物到本资源上。
每当你侵入总部或研发中心时，你可以移除最多2枚所附载的能量指示物，以额外读取等量的卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you spend credits from an installed card, place 1 power counter on this resource. Whenever you breach HQ or R&D, you may remove up to 2 hosted power counters to access that many additional cards.
flavor_enUS: All is folding back, ever back; together as one.
flavor_zhCN: 一切都在折叠，反复折叠；合二为一。

title_zhCN: 纽纱·“黑貂”·辛塔什塔：交响奇才
text_enUS: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you don’t have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) The first time each turn you make a successful run on your mark, gain [click].
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，发现你的目标。（如果你没有目标，一台随机的中央服务器成为你本回合的目标。） 每回合你第一次对你的目标进行成功的潜袭时，获得[click]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you dont have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) The first time each turn you make a successful run on your mark, gain click.
flavor_enUS: Flaws hold both beauty and opportunity.
flavor_zhCN: 缺陷中同时蕴藏着美和机遇。

text_enUS: Identify your mark. (If you don’t have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) Gain 4[credit]. You may run your mark.
text_zhCN: 发现你的目标。（如果你没有目标，一台随机的中央服务器成为你本回合的目标。） 获得4[credit]。你可以潜袭你的目标。
stripped_text: Identify your mark. (If you dont have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) Gain 4 credits. You may run your mark.
flavor_enUS: The best moment to listen is when others are listening to you.
flavor_zhCN: 聆听的最佳时机，就是他人聆听你之时。

text_enUS: Run any server. If successful, instead of breaching the attacked server, access 1 card in the root of another server. If that card is an agenda, you cannot steal or trash it during this access.
text_zhCN: 潜袭任意一台服务器。如果成功，读取另一台服务器根目录中的1张卡牌，代替侵入被攻击的服务器。如果该卡牌是议案，你本次读取中不能窃取或销毁之。
stripped_text: Run any server. If successful, instead of breaching the attacked server, access 1 card in the root of another server. If that card is an agenda, you cannot steal or trash it during this access.
flavor_enUS: Neneciğim would be proud.
flavor_zhCN: 姥姥会感到自豪的。

text_enUS:
When you install this hardware, suffer 1 meat damage.
The first time each turn you make a successful run on HQ, the Corp loses 1[credit]. If they do, gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN:
当你安装本硬件时，受到1点肢体伤害。
每回合你第一次对总部进行成功的潜袭时，公司失去1[credit]。如果其如此做，你获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: When you install this hardware, suffer 1 meat damage. The first time each turn you make a successful run on HQ, the Corp loses 1 credit. If they do, gain 1 credit.
flavor_enUS: Skimming credits with the slightest touch.
flavor_zhCN: 以最轻微的点触，盗取信用点。

text_enUS: +1[mu] When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you don’t have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) The first time each turn you make a successful run on your mark, if that server is HQ, access 1 additional card when you breach HQ. Otherwise, breach HQ when the run ends. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu] 当你的回合开始时，发现你的目标。（如果你没有目标，一台随机的中央服务器成为你本回合的目标。） 每回合你第一次对你的目标进行成功的潜袭时，如果该服务器是总部，当你侵入总部时，额外读取1张卡牌。否则，当本次潜袭结束时，侵入总部。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you dont have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) The first time each turn you make a successful run on your mark, if that server is HQ, access 1 additional card when you breach HQ. Otherwise, breach HQ when the run ends. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: The rez cost of each piece of code gate ice is increased by 1[credit]. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 每层门禁防火墙的激活费用加1[credit]。 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条门禁子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: The rez cost of each piece of code gate ice is increased by 1 credit. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: I can show you a carpet, a fish, a magical tale...
flavor_zhCN: 让我来给你翻一块地毯、一条鱼、一段神奇的故事……

text_enUS: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits during runs on central servers.
text_zhCN: 2[recurring-credit] （当你安装本卡牌时及你的回合开始前，将所附载的信用点补充至2个。） 你可以在对中央服务器的潜袭中花费所附载的信用点。
stripped_text: 2 recurring credits (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits during runs on central servers.
flavor_enUS: The feel of flour-fine coffee, the scent of caramelizing sugar, the gentle heat of the flame. A ritual I never forget.
flavor_zhCN: 细粉咖啡的丝滑，焦糖的香气，火焰的温热。这是我永不忘怀的每日仪式。

text_enUS: When you install this program, place 6 power counters on it. Interface → [trash] or hosted power counter: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本程序时，放置6枚能量指示物到本程序上。 对接 → [trash]或所附载的能量指示物：破解1条警报子进程。 2[credit]：强度+3。
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 6 power counters on it. Interface -> trash or hosted power counter: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2 credits: +3 strength.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 断路模块 - 武器
flavor_enUS:
"Aim with your eye. Shoot with your mind. Break with your soul."
–Sundog
flavor_zhCN:
“用眼睛去瞄准。用意识去射击。用灵魂去破解。”
—幻日

text_enUS: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you don’t have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) Whenever you encounter a piece of ice during a run on your mark, you may trash this resource to bypass that ice.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，发现你的目标。（如果你没有目标，一台随机的中央服务器成为你本回合的目标。） 在对你目标的潜袭中，每当你遭遇一层防火墙时，你可以销毁本资源以略过该防火墙。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you dont have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) Whenever you encounter a piece of ice during a run on your mark, you may trash this resource to bypass that ice.
flavor_enUS: One step back. Take cover. Two steps forward. Repeat, then secure well.
flavor_zhCN: 后退一步。寻找掩护。前进两步。如此反复，安全永驻。

text_enUS: [trash]: Gain 3[credit]. [trash]: Remove 1 tag.
text_zhCN: [trash]：获得3[credit]。 [trash]：移除1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: trash: Gain 3 credits. trash: Remove 1 tag.
flavor_enUS: If there's anything to be learned from our android cousins, it's that there's no shortcut to perfection. Consider all your options.
flavor_zhCN: 如果我们能从我们的安卓人表亲那里学到些什么，那就是没有通向完美的捷径。做决策前请三思。

title_zhCN: 帕德玛·伊斯比斯特船长：无畏探索者
text_enUS: The first time each turn a run on R&D begins, you may charge 1 of your installed cards. (Add 1 power counter to a card that already has one.)
text_zhCN: 每回合第一次对研发中心的潜袭开始时，你可以对1张你已安装的卡牌充能。（在一张已经有能量指示物的卡牌上再放置1枚。）
stripped_text: The first time each turn a run on R&D begins, you may charge 1 of your installed cards. (Add 1 power counter to a card that already has one.)
flavor_enUS: The sea is everything; its breath must remain pure and healthy.
flavor_zhCN: 海洋是万物之源。海洋的呼吸必须保持纯净和健康。

text_enUS:
Play only if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D, and Archives this turn.
The Corp must set aside the top 8 cards of R&D faceup. Access 1 of those cards. You may spend [click] to access another 1 of those cards. Then, the Corp shuffles the set-aside cards into R&D.
text_zhCN:
只有你本回合对总部、研发中心与档案库均进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
公司必须将研发中心顶端8张卡牌牌面朝上置于一旁。读取其中1张卡牌。你可以花费[click]，以读取其中另1张卡牌。然后，公司将置于一旁的卡牌洗入研发中心。
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D, and Archives this turn. The Corp must set aside the top 8 cards of R&D faceup. Access 1 of those cards. You may spend click to access another 1 of those cards. Then, the Corp shuffles the set-aside cards into R&D.

text_enUS:
Run any server. If successful, for each time you passed ice this run, resolve 1 of the following that you have not yet resolved this run:
  • Gain 4[credit].
  • Search your stack for a program. Install it. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.)
  • Charge 1 of your installed cards. (Add 1 power counter to a card that already has one.)
text_zhCN:
潜袭任意一台服务器。如果成功，本次潜袭中你每通过1次防火墙，结算本次潜袭中你尚未结算过的下列中的1项：
  • 获得4[credit]。
  • 从你的存储栈中搜寻一个程序。安装之。
  • 对1张你已安装的卡牌充能。（在一张已经有能量指示物的卡牌上再放置1枚。）
stripped_text: Run any server. If successful, for each time you passed ice this run, resolve 1 of the following that you have not yet resolved this run: * Gain 4 credits. * Search your stack for a program. Install it. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) * Charge 1 of your installed cards. (Add 1 power counter to a card that already has one.)

text_enUS: Install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip, paying 3[credit] less. You may charge that card if able. (If it has a power counter on it, add another.)
text_zhCN: 从你的操控器安装1个程序或硬件，其安装费用减3[credit]。如可能，你可以对该卡牌充能。（如果其上已经有能量指示物，再放置1枚。）
stripped_text: Install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip, paying 3 credits less. You may charge that card if able. (If it has a power counter on it, add another.)
flavor_enUS: Edie doesn't mind the noise. She's happy just being nearby.
flavor_zhCN: 伊迪才不管那些嘈杂的声音。只要能待在主人旁边，她就感到心满意足了。

text_enUS: +2[mu] When you install this hardware, place 3 power counters on it. The first time each turn you make a successful run, place 1 power counter on this hardware. 2 hosted power counters: Break up to 2 subroutines. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +2[mu] 当你安装本硬件时，放置3枚能量指示物到本硬件上。 每回合你第一次进行成功的潜袭时，放置1枚能量指示物到本硬件上。 2枚所附载的能量指示物：破解最多2条子进程。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +2 mu When you install this hardware, place 3 power counters on it. The first time each turn you make a successful run, place 1 power counter on this hardware. 2 hosted power counters: Break up to 2 subroutines. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: When you install this program, place 1 power counter on it. This program gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: Place 1 power counter on this program.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本程序时，放置1枚能量指示物到本程序上。 每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，本程序的强度+1。 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条门禁子进程。 2[credit]：放置1枚能量指示物到本程序上。
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 1 power counter on it. This program gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: Place 1 power counter on this program.

text_enUS: When you install this program, place 4 power counters on it. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. Hosted power counter: +2 strength.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本程序时，放置4枚能量指示物到本程序上。 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条屏障子进程。 所附载的能量指示物：强度+2。
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 4 power counters on it. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. Hosted power counter: +2 strength.
flavor_enUS: Within netspace, tangible space can be manipulated as desired, and fluid dynamics rarely factors into ice development.
flavor_zhCN: 在网域空间中，可以根据需要操纵有形空间，而防火墙的开发很少会考虑到流体动力学。

text_enUS: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may charge 1 of your installed cards. (Add 1 power counter to a card that already has one.)
text_zhCN: 每当一个议案被计分或窃取时，你可以对1张你已安装的卡牌充能。（在一张已经有能量指示物的卡牌上再放置1枚。）
stripped_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may charge 1 of your installed cards. (Add 1 power counter to a card that already has one.)
flavor_enUS: "That's him at the front, then there's Scout, Jonesy, Parker, Buča, Squee, Boots... you get the idea."
flavor_zhCN: “为首的是他，然后是斯镐特、琼斯、帕克、布卡、斯奎、布茨……你懂的。”

text_enUS:
Whenever you install a program or piece of hardware, place 1 power counter on this resource.
When there are 4 or more hosted power counters, trash this resource and gain 9[credit].
text_zhCN:
每当你安装一个程序或硬件时，放置1枚能量指示物到本资源上。
当所附载的能量指示物有4枚或更多时，销毁本资源并获得9[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever you install a program or piece of hardware, place 1 power counter on this resource. When there are 4 or more hosted power counters, trash this resource and gain 9 credits.
flavor_enUS:
"Why are we here? No one else is going to do independent testing, that's why."
–Padma Isbister
flavor_zhCN:
“我们为什么会在这里？除了我们，还有其他人会进行这些独立测试吗？”
—帕德玛

text_enUS: [trash]: Draw 2 cards. [trash]: Charge 1 of your installed cards.
text_zhCN: [trash]：抽2张卡牌。 [trash]：对1张你已安装的卡牌充能。
stripped_text: trash: Draw 2 cards. trash: Charge 1 of your installed cards.
flavor_enUS: Every ship is a home, and every home needs a heart.
flavor_zhCN: 每艘船都是一户人家，而每户人家都需要一颗心脏。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, you may derez 1 installed card.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，你可以关闭1张已安装的卡牌。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, you may derez 1 installed card.
flavor_enUS: Ancient paradoxes are children's stories to the greatest minds ever designed.
flavor_zhCN: 对于有史以来最发达的人工智慧而言，古代悖论只不过是儿童故事。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, draw 3 cards. Skip your discard step this turn.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，抽3张卡牌。跳过你本回合的弃牌步骤。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, draw 3 cards. Skip your discard step this turn.
flavor_enUS:
"The Midnight-3 glows with an inviting warmth that belies the broken promise within. All that awaits you there is a life of indentured servitude."
–Sundog
flavor_zhCN:
“午夜-3型生态屋散发着诱人的温暖，掩盖了内部支离破碎的承诺。等待着你的是契约奴的生活。”
—幻日

text_enUS: When your turn begins, gain 2[credit].
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 2 credits.
flavor_enUS:
"The promise of a new home, safe work and friendly neighbors will draw in tens of thousands of eco-refugees, no matter which corner of the world they are from."
–Thule employee handbook
flavor_zhCN:
“崭新的住宅、安全的工作和友善的邻居，这些承诺将会吸引成千上万的生态难民，无论他们来自世界的哪个角落。”
—图勒员工手册

text_enUS: When you rez this asset, choose 1 rezzed piece of bioroid ice. Runner card abilities cannot break subroutines on the chosen ice.
text_zhCN: 当你激活本资产时，选择1层已激活的生化人防火墙。 潜袭者卡牌能力不能破解所选择的防火墙上的子进程。
stripped_text: When you rez this asset, choose 1 rezzed piece of bioroid ice. Runner card abilities cannot break subroutines on the chosen ice.
flavor_enUS: At depths no human tech can reach, a Trieste proxy can manipulate a mindscape with unparalleled precision.
flavor_zhCN: 在人类技术员无法达到的深度，的里雅斯特型代理生化人能够以无与伦比的精度操纵思维空间。 由2019年世界锦标赛冠军Oliver “Pinsel” Siccha设计
attribution: Designed by 2019 World Champion Oliver "Pinsel" Siccha

text_enUS: Whenever you rez a piece of harmonic ice, place 1 power counter on this ice. This ice gains "[subroutine] End the run." for each hosted power counter.
text_zhCN: 每当你激活一层和声防火墙时，放置1枚能量指示物到本防火墙上。 每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，本防火墙获得“[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。”
stripped_text: Whenever you rez a piece of harmonic ice, place 1 power counter on this ice. This ice gains "Subroutine End the run." for each hosted power counter.
flavor_enUS: End the run. End the run. End the run. End the run.
flavor_zhCN:
终止本次潜袭。
终止本次潜袭。
終止本次潜袭。
终止本次潜袭。

text_enUS: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may derez another installed card. If you do, the Runner cannot use paid abilities printed on bioroid ice for the remainder of this turn. Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage. [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: 在对本服务器的潜袭中，当你激活本防火墙时，你可以关闭另一张已安装的卡牌。如果你如此做，潜袭者在本回合剩余时间内不能使用生化人防火墙上印刷的付费能力。失去[click]：破解1条本防火墙上的子进程。只有潜袭者可以使用本能力。 [subroutine] 造成1点核心伤害。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may derez another installed card. If you do, the Runner cannot use paid abilities printed on bioroid ice for the remainder of this turn. Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Do 1 core damage. Subroutine End the run.
subtype_zhCN: 屏障 - 生化人 - 杀伤

text_enUS: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may search R&D for a piece of ice and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that ice to HQ. [subroutine] Gain 1[credit] for each rezzed piece of harmonic ice.
text_zhCN: 在对本服务器的潜袭中，当你激活本防火墙时，你可以在研发中心搜寻1层防火墙并展示之。（在搜寻研发中心后将其洗混。）将该防火墙加入总部。 [subroutine] 每有1层已激活的和声防火墙，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may search R&D for a piece of ice and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that ice to HQ. Subroutine Gain 1 credit for each rezzed piece of harmonic ice.
flavor_enUS: With networks, growth is exponential.
flavor_zhCN: 网络带来指数增长。

text_enUS:
After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends.
Place 4 advancement counters on 1 installed card. You may score that card, if able.
Remove this operation from the game.
text_zhCN:
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
放置4枚推进指示物到1张已安装的卡牌上。如可能，你可以将该卡牌计分。
将本事务移出游戏。
stripped_text: After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends. Place 4 advancement counters on 1 installed card. You may score that card, if able. Remove this operation from the game.
flavor_zhCN: 由2018年北美锦标赛冠军Sam Suied设计
attribution: Designed by 2018 North American Champion Sam Suied

text_enUS: X is equal to the number of cards in the Runner's grip.
text_zhCN: X等于潜袭者操控器中的卡牌数量。
stripped_text: X is equal to the number of cards in the Runner's grip.
flavor_enUS: Some tests require specific conditions.
flavor_zhCN: 某些测试需要非常特定的条件。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, if no Corp cards have been added to Archives this turn, you may reveal 1 facedown agenda in Archives and add it to your score area.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，如果本回合没有公司卡牌被加入档案库，你可以展示档案库中1个牌面朝下的议案，并将其加入你的分数区。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, if no Corp cards have been added to Archives this turn, you may reveal 1 facedown agenda in Archives and add it to your score area.
flavor_enUS:
"Esteemed guests, by the end of this demonstration you will see that extinction is now only a temporary state of affairs."
–Vientiane Keeling
flavor_zhCN:
“尊敬的客人们，在本次展示中您将看到，灭绝，如今已经变成了一个暂时性状态。”
—万象·基林

text_enUS: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit]. Then, if you have 4[credit] or less, do 1 net damage.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，获得1[credit]。然后，如果你具有4[credit]或更少，造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 1 credit. Then, if you have 4 credits or less, do 1 net damage.
flavor_enUS: Prey and seawater sucked in, all in the space of a millisecond.
flavor_zhCN: 毫秒之间，猎物与海水一同被吸入。

text_enUS: Remove this asset from the game: Trash up to 2 cards from HQ. Reveal up to 2 facedown cards in Archives and shuffle them into R&D. For each agenda revealed this way, you may place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.
text_zhCN: 将本资产移出游戏：从总部销毁最多2张卡牌。展示档案库中最多2张牌面朝下的卡牌，并将其洗入研发中心。每以此法展示1个议案，你可以放置1枚推进指示物到一张已安装的卡牌上。
stripped_text: Remove this asset from the game: Trash up to 2 cards from HQ. Reveal up to 2 facedown cards in Archives and shuffle them into R&D. For each agenda revealed this way, you may place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.
flavor_zhCN: 由《北极光》循环游戏测试员共同设计
attribution: Designed by the Borealis Playtesters

text_enUS:
When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may trash 1 card from HQ to do 2 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
text_zhCN:
在对本服务器的潜袭中，当你激活本防火墙时，你可以从总部销毁1张卡牌，以造成2点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may trash 1 card from HQ to do 2 net damage. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.
flavor_enUS: Ethereal beauty laced with the most elegant venom.
flavor_zhCN: 空灵的美，交织着最优雅的毒素。

text_enUS:
While this ice is protecting Archives, it gets +3 strength.
[subroutine] Do 3 net damage.
text_zhCN:
只要本防火墙保护档案库，其强度便+3。
[subroutine] 造成3点网域伤害。
stripped_text: While this ice is protecting Archives, it gets +3 strength. Subroutine Do 3 net damage.
flavor_enUS: Digital refuse is their food, and you should never come between an animal and its food.
flavor_zhCN: 数字垃圾是它们的食物，而你永远不应该站在一只蛮物和它的食物之间。

text_enUS: The rez cost of this ice is lowered by 1[credit] for each rezzed piece of code gate ice. [subroutine] Do 2 net damage. [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: 每有1层已激活的门禁防火墙，本防火墙的激活费用减1[credit]。 [subroutine] 造成2点网域伤害。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: The rez cost of this ice is lowered by 1 credit for each rezzed piece of code gate ice. Subroutine Do 2 net damage. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Keep off the grass.
flavor_zhCN: 请勿践踏海草。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Install up to 2 cards from HQ, creating a new remote server each time. Place 2 advancement counters on each of those cards. You cannot score or rez either of those cards this turn.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
从总部安装最多2张卡牌，为其各创建一台新的远程服务器。在这些卡牌上各放置2枚推进指示物。你本回合不能将这些卡牌计分或激活。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Install up to 2 cards from HQ, creating a new remote server each time. Place 2 advancement counters on each of those cards. You cannot score or rez either of those cards this turn.
flavor_enUS: One becomes many.
flavor_zhCN: 一生万物。

text_enUS: While the Runner is accessing this upgrade in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this upgrade, you may purge virus counters. If this upgrade is rezzed, do 1 net damage. [trash]: Purge virus counters.
text_zhCN: 在潜袭者从研发中心读取本升级的期间，其必须展示之。 当潜袭者读取本升级时，你可以清除病毒指示物。如果本升级已激活，造成1点网域伤害。 [trash]：清除病毒指示物。
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this upgrade in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this upgrade, you may purge virus counters. If this upgrade is rezzed, do 1 net damage. trash: Purge virus counters.
flavor_enUS: Viruses, runners; all are food to them.
flavor_zhCN: 病毒、潜袭……对它们而言，一切都是食物。

title_zhCN: 真理咨询：政治解决方案
text_enUS: The first time each turn the Runner makes a successful run, you may place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.
text_zhCN: 每回合潜袭者第一次进行成功的潜袭时，你可以放置1枚推进指示物到一张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌上。
stripped_text: The first time each turn the Runner makes a successful run, you may place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.
flavor_enUS: Political news, fit for public consumption.
flavor_zhCN: 政治新闻，面向大众。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, the Runner loses 7[credit].
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，潜袭者失去7[credit]。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, the Runner loses 7 credits.
flavor_enUS: The line goes up... until we don't need it to anymore.
flavor_zhCN: 趋势线持续走高……直到我们不再需要它走高。

text_enUS:
You can advance this asset.
When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, give them 1 tag plus 1 tag for each hosted advancement counter.
text_zhCN:
你可以推进本资产。
当潜袭者读取已安装的本资产时，给予其1枚锁定标记，并且每有1枚所附载的推进指示物，锁定标记数量增加1枚。
stripped_text: You can advance this asset. When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, give them 1 tag plus 1 tag for each hosted advancement counter.
flavor_enUS: The only thing that changes is the uniform.
flavor_zhCN: 唯一在变的是制服款式。

text_enUS: You can advance this asset. 2 hosted advancement counters: Give the Runner 1 tag. Use this ability only during your turn.
text_zhCN: 你可以推进本资产。 2枚所附载的推进指示物：给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。本能力仅能在你的回合中使用。
stripped_text: You can advance this asset. 2 hosted advancement counters: Give the Runner 1 tag. Use this ability only during your turn.
flavor_enUS: "Tell them Drago would like a word."
flavor_zhCN: “转告一声，德拉戈主管想找他们谈谈。” 由2019年欧洲锦标赛冠军Aaryn “Drago” Byrne设计
attribution: Designed by 2019 European Champion Aaryn "Drago" Byrne

text_enUS:
You can advance this asset.
When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] for each hosted advancement counter.
text_zhCN:
你可以推进本资产。
当你的回合开始时，每有1枚所附载的推进指示物，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: You can advance this asset. When your turn begins, gain 1 credit for each hosted advancement counter.
flavor_enUS: They say they'll only take a handful, but oh what big hands they have!
flavor_zhCN: 他们说只抓一把，但却没说他们的手有多大！

text_enUS:
You can advance this ice.
When the Runner encounters this ice, you may remove 1 hosted advancement counter. If you do, the Runner loses 3[credit].
[subroutine] The Runner loses 3[credit].
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
你可以推进本防火墙。
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，你可以移除1枚所附载的推进指示物。如果你如此做，潜袭者失去3[credit]。
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去3[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: You can advance this ice. When the Runner encounters this ice, you may remove 1 hosted advancement counter. If you do, the Runner loses 3 credits. Subroutine The Runner loses 3 credits. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Names of old carry little weight today, their legacies broken and swept away. Now, we are the rulers of truth.
flavor_zhCN: 昔日的威名如今已成秋毫之末。他们的遗产已碎如烟尘，被一扫而空。现在，我们才是真理的裁决者。

text_enUS:
When the Runner encounters this ice, you may pay 1[credit]. If you do, place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag.
text_zhCN:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，你可以支付1[credit]。如果你如此做，你可以放置1枚推进指示物到一张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌上。
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, you may pay 1 credit. If you do, place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance. Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag.
flavor_enUS: No task the witch set would ever be too great, for Vasilisa had her mother's blessing.
flavor_zhCN: 完成女巫安排的任务是小事一桩，因为瓦西丽莎有妈妈给她的魔法娃娃。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, remove 1 tag.
Add this operation to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，移除1枚锁定标记。
将本事务加入你的分数区，作为一个价值1点议案分数的议案。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, remove 1 tag. Add this operation to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
flavor_enUS: "Recording devices at the door, please!"
flavor_zhCN: “进门前请卸下录音设备！”

title_zhCN: 符拉迪西比尔斯克城际网阵
text_enUS: You can advance this upgrade. Once per turn → 2 hosted advancement counters: Place 2 advancement counters on another card you can advance in the root of this server. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 你可以推进本升级。 每回合限一次 → 2枚所附载的推进指示物：放置2枚推进指示物到本服务器根目录中另一张你可以推进的卡牌上。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: You can advance this upgrade. Once per turn -> 2 hosted advancement counters: Place 2 advancement counters on another card you can advance in the root of this server. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: Straddling the banks of the Ob River, this metropolis contains hope for a better tomorrow.
flavor_zhCN: 横跨鄂毕河两岸，这座大都市寄托着对美好明天的希望。

title_enUS: Ob Superheavy Logistics: Extract. Export. Excel.
title_zhCN: 鄂毕超重型物流：采出 运出 杰出
stripped_title: Ob Superheavy Logistics: Extract. Export. Excel.
text_enUS: Once per turn → When you trash a rezzed card, except during installation, you may search R&D for 1 card with a printed rez cost exactly 1[credit] less than the trashed card's printed rez cost. Install and rez the card you found, ignoring credit costs.
text_zhCN: 每回合限一次 → 当你在非安装过程中销毁一张已激活的卡牌时，你可以在研发中心搜寻1张印刷激活费用恰好比所销毁卡牌的印刷激活费用少1[credit]的卡牌。安装并激活你搜寻到的卡牌，忽略信用点费用。
stripped_text: Once per turn -> When you trash a rezzed card, except during installation, you may search R&D for 1 card with a printed rez cost exactly 1[credit] less than the trashed card's printed rez cost. Install and rez the card you found, ignoring credit costs.
flavor_enUS: Take all that is offered, and more.
flavor_zhCN: 报价与否，尽皆取之。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to score this agenda, trash 1 of your other installed cards.
When you score this agenda, do 2 meat damage.
text_zhCN:
作为将本议案计分的额外费用，销毁另1张你已安装的卡牌。
当你将本议案计分时，造成2点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to score this agenda, trash 1 of your other installed cards. When you score this agenda, do 2 meat damage.
flavor_enUS:
"Don't worry, directors, security is always willing to send agents to assist with radical asset reassignment."
–Yakov Avdakov
flavor_zhCN:
“不必担心，董事们，防卫所随时愿意派特工去协助进行激进的资产重新分配。”
—雅科夫·阿夫达科夫

title_zhCN: 斯维亚托戈尔号挖掘机
text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, gain 3[credit].
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以销毁另1张你已安装的卡牌。如果你如此做，获得3[credit]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, gain 3 credits.
flavor_enUS: It doesn't matter how long you've owned the land, you'd better hope there's nothing valuable beneath.
flavor_zhCN: 无论你占有了这片土地多久，你最好希望这地底下没藏着些值钱的宝贝。

text_enUS:
When you rez this ice, place 4 power counters on it.
When your turn begins, remove 1 hosted power counter.
This ice gains "[subroutine] End the run." before its printed subroutine for each hosted power counter.
[subroutine] Trash this ice.
text_zhCN:
当你激活本防火墙时，放置4枚能量指示物到本防火墙上。
当你的回合开始时，移除1枚所附载的能量指示物。
每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，本防火墙在其印刷子进程前获得“[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。”
[subroutine] 销毁本防火墙。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice, place 4 power counters on it. When your turn begins, remove 1 hosted power counter. This ice gains "Subroutine End the run." before its printed subroutine for each hosted power counter. Subroutine Trash this ice.

text_enUS:
[subroutine] Gain 2[credit].
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 获得2[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Subroutine Gain 2 credits. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Confound the runner so that they cannot see our true intent.
flavor_zhCN: 迷惑潜袭者，让他们看不透我们的真实意图。

text_enUS:
When you rez this ice, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, this ice gets +5 strength for the remainder of the run.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
text_zhCN:
当你激活本防火墙时，你可以销毁另1张你已安装的卡牌。如果你如此做，本防火墙在本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度+5。
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, this ice gets +5 strength for the remainder of the run. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program.
flavor_enUS: Centuries of military tactics compressed into a single entity.
flavor_zhCN: 几百年的军事战术凝聚成单一的实体。

text_enUS: Gain 6[credit]. You may trash 1 of your installed cards to gain 3[credit].
text_zhCN: 获得6[credit]。你可以销毁1张你已安装的卡牌，以获得3[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 6 credits. You may trash 1 of your installed cards to gain 3 credits.
flavor_enUS: Leave nothing of value behind.
flavor_zhCN: 不要放过任何有价值的东西。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click][click].
Trash any number of your rezzed cards. Give the Runner 1 tag for each card trashed this way.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click][click]。
销毁任意数量你已激活的卡牌。你每以此法销毁1张卡牌，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend clickclick. Trash any number of your rezzed cards. Give the Runner 1 tag for each card trashed this way.
flavor_zhCN: 由2020年亚太锦标赛冠军Eric Keilback设计
attribution: Designed by 2020 Asia-Pacific Champion Sam Keilback

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Trash 1 installed resource. Install and rez 1 card from Archives, ignoring all costs.
text_zhCN:
只有潜袭者被锁定时，才能打出。
销毁1个已安装的资源。从档案库安装并激活1张卡牌，忽略所有的费用。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Trash 1 installed resource. Install and rez 1 card from Archives, ignoring all costs.
