flavor_enUS: Identify. Contact. Entrap. Counterintelligence never changes.
flavor_zhCN: 确认。接触。诱捕。反间谍活动一向如此。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, suffer 1 core damage.
Run R&D. If successful, access 3 additional cards when you breach R&D.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，受到1点核心伤害。
潜袭研发中心。如果成功，当你侵入研发中心时，额外读取3张卡牌。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, suffer 1 core damage. Run R&D. If successful, access 3 additional cards when you breach R&D.
flavor_enUS: "My guilt is never to be doubted."
flavor_zhCN: “我的罪责是毋庸置疑的。”

text_enUS: Run any server. If successful, add 1 card from your heap to your grip.
text_zhCN: 潜袭任意一台服务器。如果成功，将1张卡牌从你的堆阵加入你的操控器。
stripped_text: Run any server. If successful, add 1 card from your heap to your grip.
flavor_enUS:
"I promised I would come back for you, no matter the cost."
—Esâ Afontov
flavor_zhCN:
“我答应过会回来救你的，不惜一切代价。”
—艾萨·阿方托夫

text_enUS: Run any server. Whenever a subroutine resolves during that run (including a subroutine that ends the run), place 1 power counter on this event. When that run ends, draw 1 card for each hosted power counter and gain 3[credit].
text_zhCN: 潜袭任意一台服务器。每当一条子进程在本次潜袭中结算时（包括终止本次潜袭的子进程），放置1枚能量指示物到本事件上。 当本次潜袭结束时，获得3[credit]，且每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: Run any server. Whenever a subroutine resolves during that run (including a subroutine that ends the run), place 1 power counter on this event. When that run ends, draw 1 card for each hosted power counter and gain 3 credits.
flavor_enUS: With every step closer to their prize, Bankhar felt the ice slicing white-hot through their synapses. It was worth it.
flavor_zhCN: 随着与战利品步步接近，蒙獒感受到碎冰滑过其神经突触，烁出耀眼的炽热。但这值得。

text_enUS: Install only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn. When you install this hardware, place 1 power counter on it. When your turn begins, if there are 3 or more hosted power counters, trash this hardware and sabotage 3. (The Corp trashes 3 cards of their choice from HQ and/or the top of R&D.) Otherwise, place 1 power counter on this hardware.
text_zhCN: 只有你本回合已对一台中央服务器进行过成功的潜袭时，才能安装。当你安装本硬件时，放置1枚能量指示物到本硬件上。 当你的回合开始时，如果所附载的能量指示物有3枚或更多，销毁本硬件并破坏3。（公司选择从总部和/或研发中心顶端销毁3张卡牌。）否则，放置1枚能量指示物到本硬件上。
stripped_text: Install only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn. When you install this hardware, place 1 power counter on it. When your turn begins, if there are 3 or more hosted power counters, trash this hardware and sabotage 3. (The Corp trashes 3 cards of their choice from HQ and/or the top of R&D.) Otherwise, place 1 power counter on this hardware.

text_enUS: The first time each turn this program fully breaks a piece of ice, you may trash 1 card from your grip to draw 1 card. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次仅使用本程序破解所遭遇防火墙上的所有子进程时，你可以从你的操控器销毁1张卡牌，以抽1张卡牌。 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条门禁子进程。 2[credit]：强度+2。
stripped_text: The first time each turn this program fully breaks a piece of ice, you may trash 1 card from your grip to draw 1 card. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: +2 strength.
flavor_enUS: Every piece of ice I see, I see Abaasy.
flavor_zhCN: 阿巴契寄宿在每一层我所见到的防火墙上。

text_enUS: Install only on a piece of ice. Host ice cannot gain abilities and loses all abilities except its printed subroutines. [click]: Host this program on another installed piece of ice.
text_zhCN: 仅能安装在一层防火墙上。 被附载的防火墙不能获得能力，且失去除其印刷子进程外的所有能力。 [click]：将本程序附载到另一层已安装的防火墙上。
stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. Host ice cannot gain abilities and loses all abilities except its printed subroutines. click: Host this program on another installed piece of ice.
flavor_enUS: Quiet. I need to focus.
flavor_zhCN: 安静。我需要集中注意力。

text_enUS: When you install this program, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. The first time each turn you make a successful run, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to sabotage 1. (The Corp trashes 1 card of their choice from HQ or the top of R&D.)
text_zhCN: 当你安装本程序时，填装3枚能量指示物到本程序上。当其清空时，销毁之。 每回合你第一次进行成功的潜袭时，你可以移除1枚所附载的能量指示物以破坏1。（公司选择从总部或研发中心顶端销毁1张卡牌。）
stripped_text: When you install this program, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. The first time each turn you make a successful run, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to sabotage 1. (The Corp trashes 1 card of their choice from HQ or the top of R&D.)
flavor_enUS: Relinquish your foolish notions of control.
flavor_zhCN: 放弃你愚蠢的控制理念吧。

text_enUS: Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 2[credit]：破解1条警报子进程。
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 sentry subroutine.
flavor_enUS: I give you understanding, that you might control that which would threaten you.
flavor_zhCN: 我赐予你们学识，你们可以用它来控制任何威胁。

text_enUS:
When your turn begins, you may choose a server.
During the first encounter each turn with a piece of ice protecting the chosen server, whenever the Corp would resolve a subroutine, instead they resolve "[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.".
text_zhCN:
当你的回合开始时，你可以选择一台服务器。
每回合第一次遭遇保护所选择服务器的防火墙期间，每当公司将要结算一条子进程时，改为结算“[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。”
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may choose a server. During the first encounter each turn with a piece of ice protecting the chosen server, whenever the Corp would resolve a subroutine, instead they resolve Subroutine Do 1 net damage..
flavor_enUS: "With these two by my side, Iʼve sworn never to fail. I can bear any pain so long as it has meaning."
flavor_zhCN: “有它俩在我身旁，我保证绝不失败。我可以承受任何痛苦，只要所执着之事有其意义。”

text_enUS:
Reveal the top card of your stack and place credits equal to its printed play or install cost on this event. Add the revealed card to your grip.
Run any server. You can spend hosted credits during that run.
text_zhCN:
展示你的存储栈顶端的卡牌，并放置等于其印刷打出费用或安装费用的信用点到本事件上。将被展示的卡牌加入你的操控器。
潜袭任意一台服务器。你可以在本次潜袭中花费所附载的信用点。
stripped_text: Reveal the top card of your stack and place credits equal to its printed play or install cost on this event. Add the revealed card to your grip. Run any server. You can spend hosted credits during that run.
flavor_enUS: "Roslavetsʼ Concerto No. 2. Breakneck, brilliant, enchanting. The perfect finale for Virtuoso."
flavor_zhCN: “罗斯拉维茨第二协奏曲。致命，杰出，迷人。演奏大师的完美谢幕。”

text_enUS:
Play only if you stole an agenda this turn.
Add 1 installed Corp card to HQ. You may run any server.
text_zhCN:
只有你本回合已窃取过议案时，才能打出。
将1张已安装的公司卡牌加入总部。你可以潜袭任意一台服务器。
stripped_text: Play only if you stole an agenda this turn. Add 1 installed Corp card to HQ. You may run any server.
flavor_enUS: "I may bow like Iʼve accomplished the impossible, but the truth is itʼs not that hard."
flavor_zhCN: “我可能会鞠躬，仿佛完成了看似不可能的成就，但事实是这并不难。”

text_enUS: When you install this hardware, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 subroutines. Use this ability only if you have already broken a subroutine during this encounter.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本硬件时，填装3枚能量指示物到本硬件上。当其清空时，销毁之。 所附载的能量指示物：破解最多2条子进程。只有你在本次遭遇期间已破解过子进程时，才能使用本能力。
stripped_text: When you install this hardware, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 subroutines. Use this ability only if you have already broken a subroutine during this encounter.
flavor_enUS: The poison cuts deeper than the blade.
flavor_zhCN: 毒药比利刃刺肉更深。

text_enUS:
When you install this hardware, suffer 1 meat damage.
Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, place 1 power counter on this hardware.
Whenever you breach R&D, you may remove up to 3 hosted power counters to access that many additional cards.
text_zhCN:
当你安装本硬件时，受到1点肢体伤害。
每当你对总部进行一次成功的潜袭时，放置1枚能量指示物到本硬件上。
每当你侵入研发中心时，你可以移除最多3枚所附载的能量指示物，以额外读取等量的卡牌。
stripped_text: When you install this hardware, suffer 1 meat damage. Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, place 1 power counter on this hardware. Whenever you breach R&D, you may remove up to 3 hosted power counters to access that many additional cards.

text_enUS:
When you install this hardware, suffer 1 core damage.
The first time each turn you make a successful run on a central server, draw 1 card.
text_zhCN:
当你安装本硬件时，受到1点核心伤害。
每回合你第一次对中央服务器进行成功的潜袭时，抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: When you install this hardware, suffer 1 core damage. The first time each turn you make a successful run on a central server, draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS:
"Zenit implants help you focus on the important things."
—Ampère holo-billboard
flavor_zhCN:
“天顶植入体帮助你专注重要的事情。”
—安培的全息广告牌

text_enUS: Interface → 3[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. This ability costs 1[credit] less to use for each installed piece of cybernetic hardware. 2[credit]: +2 strength.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 3[credit]：破解最多2条屏障子进程。每有1个已安装的义体硬件，本能力的费用减1[credit]。 2[credit]：强度+2。
stripped_text: Interface -> 3 credits: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. This ability costs 1 credit less to use for each installed piece of cybernetic hardware. 2 credits: +2 strength.
flavor_enUS: A repeated note, the alternation of fingers, the rhythm of stitches... the resulting intensity is always the same.
flavor_zhCN: 重复的音符、灵动的手指、刺绣的韵律……所产生的音强总是别无二致。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you donʼt have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 subroutines on a piece of ice protecting your mark. 2[credit]: +2 strength.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，发现你的目标。（如果你没有目标，一台随机的中央服务器成为你本回合的目标。） 对接 → 2[credit]：破解最多2条保护你目标的防火墙上的子进程。 2[credit]：强度+2。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you dont have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 2 subroutines on a piece of ice protecting your mark. 2 credits: +2 strength.
flavor_enUS:
"How could I pick a favorite? Theyʼre all good dogs."
—Nyusha "Sable" Sintashta
flavor_zhCN:
“我选不出最喜欢的那只。他们都是乖狗狗。”
—纽纱·“黑貂”·辛塔什塔

text_enUS: When you install this resource, search your stack for up to 2 virus or weapon cards with different names. Host those cards faceup on this resource. (They are not installed.) When your turn begins, you may add 1 hosted card to your grip. If there are no more hosted cards, trash this resource.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本资源时，从你的存储栈搜寻最多2张名称不同的病毒或武器卡牌。将这些卡牌牌面朝上附载到本资源上。（它们没有被安装。） 当你的回合开始时，你可以将1张所附载的卡牌加入你的操控器。如果已经没有所附载的卡牌，销毁本资源。
stripped_text: When you install this resource, search your stack for up to 2 virus or weapon cards with different names. Host those cards faceup on this resource. (They are not installed.) When your turn begins, you may add 1 hosted card to your grip. If there are no more hosted cards, trash this resource.

text_enUS: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you donʼt have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) The first time each turn a run on your mark ends, gain 2[credit] if you breached that server during that run.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，发现你的目标。（如果你没有目标，一台随机的中央服务器成为你本回合的目标。） 每回合第一次对你目标的潜袭结束时，如果你在本次潜袭中侵入了该服务器，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you don't have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) The first time each turn a run on your mark ends, gain 2 credits if you breached that server during that run.
flavor_enUS: It was a relief, really, deciding on that one place in the world to definitely never visit again.
flavor_zhCN: 能在世界上找到一个我绝不会再来的地方，我说真的，这绝对是一种解脱。

text_enUS: Set aside cards from the top of your stack faceup until you set aside a program. You may install that program, paying 10[credit] less. Shuffle the set-aside cards into your stack.
text_zhCN: 将你的存储栈顶端的卡牌牌面朝上置于一旁，重复此操作直到你将一个程序置于一旁。你可以安装该程序，其安装费用减10[credit]。将置于一旁的卡牌洗入你的存储栈。
stripped_text: Set aside cards from the top of your stack faceup until you set aside a program. You may install that program, paying 10 credits less. Shuffle the set-aside cards into your stack.
flavor_enUS:
"The best ideas float to the top, if you give them time."
—Ar<h1m3d3s  JAR
flavor_zhCN:
“给灵感一些时间，它会自己浮出水面。”
—阿碁来得·贾

text_enUS:
When you install this hardware, place 2 power counters on it and suffer 1 meat damage.
You get +1 maximum hand size for each hosted power counter.
text_zhCN:
当你安装本硬件时，放置2枚能量指示物到本硬件上，并受到1点肢体伤害。
每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，你的手牌上限+1。
stripped_text: When you install this hardware, place 2 power counters on it and suffer 1 meat damage. You get +1 maximum hand size for each hosted power counter.
flavor_enUS: To outsiders, it is ironic that no one in Ampère can remember who invented these little fellows. Within the company, this is considered normal.
flavor_zhCN: 外人在讥讽，安培竞没人记得是谁发明了这些小玩意儿。但在公司内部人员看来，这是再正常不过的事。

text_enUS:
When you install this hardware, suffer 2 core damage.
You get +1 allotted [click] for each of your turns.
text_zhCN:
当你安装本硬件时，受到2点核心伤害。
每回合你获得的[click]数量+1。
stripped_text: When you install this hardware, suffer 2 core damage. You get +1 allotted click for each of your turns.
flavor_enUS: It isnʼt as enjoyable as coffee, but the effects are magnitudes stronger.
flavor_zhCN: 它不像咖啡那样令人愉快，但效果却好出几个量级。

text_enUS: Install only on a piece of ice. The first time you break a subroutine during each encounter with host ice, you may charge 1 of your installed cards. (Add 1 power counter to a card that already has one.)
text_zhCN: 仅能安装在一层防火墙上。 每次在对被附载的防火墙的遭遇期间，你第一次破解一条子进程时，你可以对1张你已安装的卡牌充能。（在一张已经有能量指示物的卡牌上再放置1枚。）
stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. The first time you break a subroutine during each encounter with host ice, you may charge 1 of your installed cards. (Add 1 power counter to a card that already has one.)
flavor_enUS:
"Are you telling me itʼs pronounced ʼgigawattsʼ?"
—Captain Padma Isbister
flavor_zhCN:
“你是说，它的功率量词念‘京’？”
—帕德玛·伊斯比斯特船长

text_enUS: When this program is uninstalled, remove it from the game. When an agenda is scored or stolen, remove this program from the game. Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 当本程序被卸载时，将其移出游戏。 当一个议案被计分或窃取时，将本程序移出游戏。 对接 → 2[credit]：破解最多2条子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: When this program is uninstalled, remove it from the game. When an agenda is scored or stolen, remove this program from the game. Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 2 subroutines. 1 credit: +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: Nanuq never leaves, but instead waits, invisible, for the next hunt.
flavor_zhCN: 北极熊从不离开，而是潜伏伺机，等待下一场狩猎。

text_enUS: The first time each turn this program fully breaks a piece of ice, you may charge 1 of your installed cards. (Add 1 power counter to a card that already has one.) Interface → 2[credit]: Break any number of sentry subroutines. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次仅使用本程序破解所遭遇防火墙上的所有子进程时，你可以对1张你已安装的卡牌充能。（在一张已经有能量指示物的卡牌上再放置1枚。） 对接 → 2[credit]：破解任意数量的警报子进程。 2[credit]：强度+3。
stripped_text: The first time each turn this program fully breaks a piece of ice, you may charge 1 of your installed cards. (Add 1 power counter to a card that already has one.) Interface -> 2 credits: Break any number of sentry subroutines. 2 credits: +3 strength.

text_enUS: Each installed non-AI icebreaker gets +2 strength.
text_zhCN: 每个已安装的非智能模块的破解器强度+2。
stripped_text: Each installed non-AI icebreaker gets +2 strength.
flavor_enUS: Every rig needs a power source. How about one with blades moving at Mach 2?
flavor_zhCN: 每台设备都需要一个动力源。这台桨叶转速2马赫的怎么样？

text_enUS: The first time each turn you make a successful run, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards to search your stack for 1 card of the same type. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) Install the card you found, paying 3[credit] less.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次进行成功的潜袭时，你可以销毁另1张你已安装的卡牌，以从你的存储栈搜寻1张同类型的卡牌。（在搜寻存储栈后将其洗混。）安装你搜寻到的卡牌，其安装费用减3[credit]。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you make a successful run, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards to search your stack for 1 card of the same type. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) Install the card you found, paying 3 credits less.
flavor_enUS: Few constructs reach the Deep Net, but these old trees have stretched their roots further than once thought possible.
flavor_zhCN: 很少有结构能触及深网，但这些古树的根比想象中延伸得要远。

text_enUS: When you install this resource, load 2 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. [click], hosted power counter: Draw 3 cards.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本资源时，填装2枚能量指示物到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。 [click]，所附载的能量指示物：抽3张卡牌。
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 2 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. click, hosted power counter: Draw 3 cards.
flavor_enUS: "There is another world under the waves, vanishing as we speak. I want to map it before itʼs gone."
flavor_zhCN: “海浪之下的另一个世界，正在我们谈话间消失。我想测绘它，趁还不算太晚。”

text_enUS: Your deck cannot include more than 1 copy of any card.
text_zhCN: 你的牌组中每种同名卡牌限1张。
stripped_text: Your deck cannot include more than 1 copy of any card.
flavor_enUS: I found my twin hidden away on Luna. Now we will never be apart.
flavor_zhCN: 我找到了被藏在月亮上的孪生体。现在我们再也不会分离了。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, turn each hosted card faceup. [click]: Host a copy of Matryoshka from your grip faceup on this program. (It is not installed.) Interface → X[credit], turn 1 hosted copy of Matryoshka facedown: Break X subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength. Limit 6 per deck.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，将所附载的所有卡牌翻至牌面朝上。 [click]：从你的操控器中将一张名称为套娃的卡牌牌面朝上附载到本程序上。（它没有被安装。） 对接 → X[credit]，将1张所附载的名称为套娃的卡牌翻至牌面朝下：破解X条子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。 每套牌组限制6张。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, turn each hosted card faceup. click: Host a copy of Matryoshka from your grip faceup on this program. (It is not installed.) Interface -> X{c}, turn 1 hosted copy of Matryoshka facedown: Break X subroutines. 1 credit: +1 strength. Limit 6 per deck.
flavor_enUS:
She leads and they all follow.
Always there to back up her big sister.
Sheʼs a typical middle child, really.
Just as brave as his sisters.
Sheʼs little—but fierce.
Look at the little baby, even she helps!
flavor_zhCN:
她领导，其他人跟随。
一直以来都是大姐最强的后盾。
她是个典型的中间娃，真的。
和他的姐姐们一样勇敢。
她很小——但可凶了。
看这个小宝宝，甚至她都能帮上忙!

title_zhCN: 图勒海底城：水下安全区
text_enUS: Whenever the Runner steals an agenda, do 1 core damage unless they spend [click] and 2[credit].
text_zhCN: 每当一个议案被窃取时，造成1点核心伤害，除非潜袭者花费[click]与2[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner steals an agenda, do 1 core damage unless they spend click and 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: Join us. Safe, away from the crisis.
flavor_zhCN: 加入我们。安全，远离危险。

text_enUS: This agenda gets -1 advancement requirement for each core damage the Runner has taken this game.
text_zhCN: 潜袭者本局游戏中每受到过1点核心伤害，本议案的推进需求-1。
stripped_text: This agenda gets -1 advancement requirement for each core damage the Runner has taken this game.
flavor_enUS: Bend the minds of those below you such that they will always need you, and loyalty is assured forever.
flavor_zhCN: 扭曲你底下人的心智，让他们无法离开你，这样才会保证永久的忠诚。

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this asset, they may add it to their score area as an agenda worth -1 agenda point. If they do not, do 1 core damage and remove this asset from the game.
text_zhCN:
在潜袭者从研发中心读取本资产的期间，其必须展示之。
当潜袭者读取本资产时，其可以将本资产加入其分数区，作为一个价值-1点议案分数的议案。如果其不如此做，造成1点核心伤害，并将本资产移出游戏。
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this asset, they may add it to their score area as an agenda worth -1 agenda point. If they do not, do 1 core damage and remove this asset from the game.
flavor_enUS: Everyone remembers the first tape they archive.
flavor_zhCN: 每个人都记得自己存档的第一盘磁带。

text_enUS: As an additional cost to rez this ice, derez another piece of harmonic ice. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
text_zhCN: 作为激活本防火墙的额外费用，关闭另一层和声防火墙。 [subroutine] 造成1点核心伤害。 [subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。 [subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to rez this ice, derez another piece of harmonic ice. Subroutine Do 1 core damage. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 杀伤 - 毁灭者 - 和声
flavor_enUS:
As one, every monitoring device on the ship reverberated, emitting a noise so primordial, so titanic, it shook Padma to her core.
Daeg hissed.
flavor_zhCN:
它发出如此原始、如此极巨的噪音，回荡在船上的每一台监测装置中，直击帕德玛的核心。
戴格也发出了嘶嘶声。

text_enUS: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, the Runner loses [click]. [subroutine] The Runner loses 1[credit] for each rezzed piece of harmonic ice. [subroutine] End the run unless the Runner spends [click].
text_zhCN: 在对本服务器的潜袭中，当你激活本防火墙时，潜袭者失去[click]。 [subroutine] 每有1层已激活的和声防火墙，潜袭者失去1[credit]。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者花费[click]。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, the Runner loses click. Subroutine The Runner loses 1 credit for each rezzed piece of harmonic ice. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner spends click.
flavor_enUS: The sound welled up from the deep: throbbing, thumping, growing with every passing beat of their hearts.
flavor_zhCN: 声音从深处传来：伴随着他们的每一次心跳，颤动、砰击、渐响。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Play only if the Runner stole an agenda during their last turn.
Give the Runner 1 tag.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
只有潜袭者在其上回合窃取过议案时，才能打出。
给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Play only if the Runner stole an agenda during their last turn. Give the Runner 1 tag.
flavor_enUS: Sometimes, they want you to know that they know.
flavor_zhCN: 有时候，他们想让你知道，他们什么都知道。

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Do 1 core damage. The Runner gets -1 allotted [click] for their next turn.
Remove this operation from the game.
text_zhCN:
只有潜袭者被锁定时，才能打出。
造成1点核心伤害。潜袭者在其下回合获得的[click]数量-1。
将本事务移出游戏。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Do 1 core damage. The Runner gets -1 allotted click for their next turn. Remove this operation from the game.
flavor_enUS: You think thatʼs air youʼre breathing now?
flavor_zhCN: 你以为你呼吸的是空气？

text_enUS: Whenever you score an agenda from the root of this server, do 1 core damage. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 每当你将本服务器根目录中的议案计分时，造成1点核心伤害。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Whenever you score an agenda from the root of this server, do 1 core damage. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS:
"Itʼs technically above our pay grade, but we know where our weapons come from. In Djupstad they wait, deep in thought, until we call upon them."
—Aron Hendrik
flavor_zhCN:
“严格来说，这超出了我们的权限，但我们知道我们的武器来自何处。它们沉睡在久普斯塔德，直到我们唤醒它们。
—亚伦·亨德里克

text_enUS: When the Runner accesses this upgrade while it is installed, you may pay 2[credit] to do 1 core damage. If the Runner has any [click] remaining, they may lose all their [click] to prevent this damage.
text_zhCN: 当潜袭者读取已安装的本升级时，你可以花费2[credit]以造成1点核心伤害。如果潜袭者有剩余的[click]，其可以失去其所有[click]，以防止本伤害。
stripped_text: When the Runner accesses this upgrade while it is installed, you may pay 2 credits to do 1 core damage. If the Runner has any click remaining, they may lose all their click to prevent this damage.
flavor_enUS: Few employees know he exists. Even fewer know he is actually three.
flavor_zhCN: 只有少数员工知道他的存在。只有更少数的员工知道他其实是三个人。

title_zhCN: 伊雪克适应体：维持多样性
text_enUS:
Whenever you score an agenda that you did not install or advance this turn, place 1 power counter on this identity.
For each hosted power counter, you need 1 less agenda point to win the game.
text_zhCN:
每当你将一个你并未在本回合安装或推进的议案计分时，放置1枚能量指示物到本卡牌上。
每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，你赢得游戏胜利所需的议案分数减1。
stripped_text: Whenever you score an agenda that you did not install or advance this turn, place 1 power counter on this identity. For each hosted power counter, you need 1 less agenda point to win the game.
flavor_enUS: Bringing Mother Nature up to speed.
flavor_zhCN: 让自然母亲与时俱进。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, you may install 1 facedown card from Archives.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，你可以从档案库安装1张牌面朝下的卡牌。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, you may install 1 facedown card from Archives.
flavor_enUS:
"By disabling their bodiesʼ ability to create a variety of necessary enzymes, weʼve ensured their loyalty to us. If they donʼt return for supplements every month, they die; simple as that."
—Dr. Vientiane Keeling
flavor_zhCN:
“通过阻断它们身体产生各种必要酶的能力，我们确保了它们的忠诚。如果它们不每月回来进行补给，它们就会死；就是这么简单。”
—万象·基林博士

text_enUS:
When you rez this asset and when your turn begins, place 1 power counter on this asset.
The Runner gets -1 maximum hand size for each hosted power counter.
text_zhCN:
当你激活本资产时及你的回合开始时，放置1枚能量指示物到本资产上。
每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，潜袭者的手牌上限-1。
stripped_text: When you rez this asset and when your turn begins, place 1 power counter on this asset. The Runner gets -1 maximum hand size for each hosted power counter.
flavor_enUS: Her numbers never lie, but she doesnʼt write the words that accompany them.
flavor_zhCN: 她的数字从不说谎，但解释性文字却不是由她来书写的。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may trash this asset to do 2 net damage.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以销毁本资产，以造成2点网域伤害。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may trash this asset to do 2 net damage.
flavor_enUS: There is an elegance to its blade and stride, but with it comes a screaming whirlwind.
flavor_zhCN: 其镰刃和步态显露出一种优雅，但随之而来的是呼啸的旋风。

text_enUS:
When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may trash 1 card from HQ. If you do, choose 1 installed Runner card. That cardʼs abilities cannot break subroutines for the remainder of that run.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
在对本服务器的潜袭中，当你激活本防火墙时，你可以从总部销毁1张卡牌。如果你如此做，选择1张已安装的潜袭者卡牌。在本次潜袭的剩余时间内，该卡牌的能力不能破解子进程。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may trash 1 card from HQ. If you do, choose 1 installed Runner card. That cards abilities cannot break subroutines for the remainder of that run. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Hafrún has lived through generations of changes in the Net, and now there are whispers that something from the deep is making it anxious.
flavor_zhCN: 明蛤经历了几代网络的变迁，但现在有传言说，某种来自海洋深处的东西正使它感到焦躁不安。

text_enUS:
[subroutine] The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] Gain 2[credit].
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
[subroutine] You may draw 1 or 2 cards.
text_zhCN:
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去2[credit]。
[subroutine] 获得2[credit]。
[subroutine] 造成2点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 你可以抽1或2张卡牌。
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner loses 2 credits. Subroutine Gain 2 credits. Subroutine Do 2 net damage. Subroutine You may draw 1 or 2 cards.
flavor_enUS:
"Matt, thereʼs something big heading your way. Matt, are you hearing me? Matt? Oh no."
—Moth
flavor_zhCN:
“马特，有个大家伙朝你这儿过来了。马特，你有在听吗？马特？哦不。”
—蛾子

text_enUS:
Trash up to 5 cards from HQ. Shuffle that many cards from Archives into R&D. Draw that many cards.
Remove this operation from the game.
text_zhCN:
从总部销毁最多5张卡牌。将等量的卡牌从档案库洗入研发中心。抽等量的卡牌。
将本事务移出游戏。
stripped_text: Trash up to 5 cards from HQ. Shuffle that many cards from Archives into R&D. Draw that many cards. Remove this operation from the game.
flavor_enUS:
"The worst part about failed experiments? The queue for the incinerator."
—Overheard in the Issuaq Adaptics cafeteria.
flavor_zhCN:
“你知道失败实验最糟糕的部分是什么吗？是等待焚化炉的队伍。”
—伊雪克适应体公司食堂的流言蜚语

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner approaches this server, you may turn 1 facedown piece of ice in Archives faceup. If you do, resolve 1 subroutine on that ice. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 每当潜袭者接驳本服务器时，你可以将档案库中1层牌面朝下的防火墙翻至牌面朝上。如果你如此做，结算该防火墙上的1条子进程。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner approaches this server, you may turn 1 facedown piece of ice in Archives faceup. If you do, resolve 1 subroutine on that ice. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: Here, at the edge of the habitable world, they extract the future from the bones of the past.
flavor_zhCN: 在这里，宜居世界的边缘，他们从过去的骸骨中萃取出未来。

text_enUS: This agenda gets -1 advancement requirement for each tag the Runner has.
text_zhCN: 潜袭者每有1枚锁定标记，本议案的推进需求-1。
stripped_text: This agenda gets -1 advancement requirement for each tag the Runner has.
flavor_enUS: "An FOI request? No problem! Please fill out all details. Youʼd like to make an anonymous request? Iʼm sorry: absolutely not."
flavor_zhCN: “一个信息自由请求？没问题！请将个人信息填写完整。你想提出一个匿名请求？我很抱歉：这绝无可能。”

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, you may draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，你可以抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, you may draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS:
"Hey kiddo, remember what Daddy says about lying?"
"ʼOnly when you can get away with it!ʼ"
flavor_zhCN: “嘿小家伙，还记得爸爸说过，撒谎的后果吗？”“‘没人发现就没事！’”

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may trash this asset. If you do, search R&D for an operation and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that operation to HQ.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以销毁本资产。如果你如此做，从研发中心搜寻一个事务并展示之。（在搜寻研发中心后将其洗混。）将该事务加入总部。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may trash this asset. If you do, search R&D for an operation and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that operation to HQ.
flavor_enUS: Donʼt you remember?
flavor_zhCN: 你不记得了吗？

title_zhCN: 维拉·伊万诺芙娜·舒伊斯卡娅
text_enUS: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may reveal the grip. Trash 1 card revealed this way.
text_zhCN: 每当一个议案被计分或窃取时，你可以展示操控器。销毁1张以此法被展示的卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may reveal the grip. Trash 1 card revealed this way.
flavor_enUS: "People donʼt think in facts, they think in stories. We just tidy up that information to hasten the process."
flavor_zhCN: “人们不是根据事实思考，他们根据故事思考。我们只是整理这些信息来加速这一过程。”

text_enUS:
When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may have the Runner gain 2[credit]. If you do, choose 1 installed resource. That resource loses all abilities until your next turn ends.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
在对本服务器的潜袭中，当你激活本防火墙时，你可以令潜袭者获得2[credit]。如果你如此做，选择1个已安装的资源。该资源失去所有能力，直到你的下回合结束。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may have the Runner gain 2 credits. If you do, choose 1 installed resource. That resource loses all abilities until your next turn ends. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: SCANNING... ASSEMBLING INSULT!
flavor_zhCN: 扫描中……侮辱语言开始装填！

text_enUS:
When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may have the Runner gain 2[credit]. If you do, during each encounter with this ice for the remainder of that run, the Runner cannot break more than 1 of its printed subroutines.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag.
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
[subroutine] You may draw 2 cards.
text_zhCN:
在对本服务器的潜袭中，当你激活本防火墙时，你可以令潜袭者获得2[credit]。如果你如此做，在本次潜袭的剩余时间内，每次遭遇本防火墙期间，潜袭者不能破解超过1条本防火墙上的印刷子进程。
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 造成2点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 你可以抽2张卡牌。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may have the Runner gain 2 credits. If you do, during each encounter with this ice for the remainder of that run, the Runner cannot break more than 1 of its printed subroutines. Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine Do 2 net damage. Subroutine You may draw 2 cards.

text_enUS: Gain 5[credit]. You may have each player gain 2[credit].
text_zhCN: 获得5[credit]。你可以令双方玩家各获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 5 credits. You may have each player gain 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: "Oh, the text on these is endless. Just tap accept and you can read it later if you want."
flavor_zhCN: “哦，条款文本没完没了。点一下同意就行，剩下的你可以等会慢慢看。”

title_zhCN: 符拉迪西比尔斯克的货物
text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner has at least 2 tags.
Place a total of 4 advancement counters on installed cards you can advance.
text_zhCN:
只有潜袭者具有至少2枚锁定标记时，才能打出。
放置合计4枚推进指示物到已安装且可被推进的卡牌上。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner has at least 2 tags. Place a total of 4 advancement counters on installed cards you can advance.
flavor_enUS: "Donʼt look at the crates."
flavor_zhCN: “别盯着货箱。”

text_enUS: For each bad publicity you have up to 4, this agenda gets -1 advancement requirement.
text_zhCN: 你每有1枚负面声誉标记，本议案的推进需求-1（最多-4）。
stripped_text: For each bad publicity you have up to 4, this agenda gets -1 advancement requirement.
flavor_enUS: This was a criminal offense. Now itʼs an option for business.
flavor_zhCN: 这曾是犯罪行为。但现在成了一种商业手段。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, you may trash 1 of your rezzed cards. If you do, trash 1 installed Runner card with a printed install cost equal to or less than the printed rez cost of the Corp card you trashed.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，你可以销毁1张你的已激活卡牌。如果你如此做，销毁1张已安装的潜袭者卡牌，其印刷安装费用须等于或小于你所销毁公司卡牌的印刷激活费用。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, you may trash 1 of your rezzed cards. If you do, trash 1 installed Runner card with a printed install cost equal to or less than the printed rez cost of the Corp card you trashed.
flavor_enUS:
"Weylandʼs synthetic diamonds cost less than naturals... so what are they really digging for here?"
—Captain Padma Isbister
flavor_zhCN:
“威兰的合成钻石成本远低于天然钻石……所以他们到底在这里挖什么?”
—帕德玛·伊斯比斯特船长

text_enUS: The first time each turn the Runner trashes any of your installed cards (including this asset), do 2 meat damage.
text_zhCN: 每回合潜袭者第一次销毁你已安装的卡牌时（包括本资产），造成2点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: The first time each turn the Runner trashes any of your installed cards (including this asset), do 2 meat damage.
flavor_enUS: When implemented at this sort of scale, these practices can keep away far more than a few unwanted citizens.
flavor_zhCN: 当实施规模达到如此程度时，能驱赶的闲人就不止这么几个了。

text_enUS:
When you rez this asset, load 6 bad publicity counters onto it. When it is empty, you win the game.
When your turn begins, take 1 bad publicity from this asset.
text_zhCN:
当你激活本资产时，填装6枚负面声誉标记到本资产上。当其清空时，你获得游戏胜利。
当你的回合开始时，从本资产上拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
stripped_text: When you rez this asset, load 6 bad publicity counters onto it. When it is empty, you win the game. When your turn begins, take 1 bad publicity from this asset.
flavor_enUS:
"They just keep drilling down, no matter what..."
—Valentina Ferreira
flavor_zhCN:
“他们只是继续往下钻，不顾一切……”
—瓦伦蒂娜·费雷拉

text_enUS:
When the Runner encounters this ice, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, the Runner cannot break this iceʼs printed subroutines for the remainder of this encounter.
[subroutine] Gain 1[credit]. The Runner loses 1[credit].
[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards.
text_zhCN:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，你可以销毁另1张你已安装的卡牌。如果你如此做，潜袭者在本次遭遇的剩余时间内不能破解本防火墙上的印刷子进程。
[subroutine] 获得1[credit]。潜袭者失去1[credit]。
[subroutine] 潜袭者销毁1张其已安装的卡牌。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, the Runner cannot break this ice's printed subroutines for the remainder of this encounter. Subroutine Gain 1 credit. The Runner loses 1 credit. Subroutine The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards.
flavor_enUS: Waiting for the next blow to land.
flavor_zhCN: 等待下一个捶击落地。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, remove 1 tag.
Do 4 meat damage.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，移除1枚锁定标记。
造成4点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, remove 1 tag. Do 4 meat damage.
flavor_enUS: Under northern skies Sundog had lived all his life, and under them he would die.
flavor_zhCN: 幻日于北方天空之下度过了一生，也将于此长眠。

title_zhCN: 雅科夫·埃里科维奇·阿夫达科夫
text_enUS: Whenever a player trashes a card (including this upgrade) from the root of this server or protecting it, except during installation, gain 2[credit].
text_zhCN: 每当一位玩家在非安装过程中销毁本服务器根目录中或保护本服务器的一张卡牌（包括本升级）时，你获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever a player trashes a card (including this upgrade) from the root of this server or protecting it, except during installation, gain 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: They say the Butcher of Siberia keeps the best cuts for himself.
flavor_zhCN: 他们说，西伯利亚的屠夫总会把最好的肉割下留给自己。

text_enUS: Remote server only. Each piece of ice protecting this server gains "When the Runner encounters this ice, choose 1 subroutine on it. You may trash this ice to resolve that subroutine.". Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 仅能安装在远程服务器。 保护本服务器的每层防火墙获得“当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，选择本防火墙上的1条子进程。你可以销毁本防火墙，以结算该子进程。” 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Remote server only. Each piece of ice protecting this server gains When the Runner encounters this ice, choose 1 subroutine on it. You may trash this ice to resolve that subroutine.. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: Getting in is hard. Getting out requires a death certificate.
flavor_zhCN: 进去已经很难。出来则需要提供死亡证明

text_enUS:
Your deck cannot include more than 1 copy of any card.
Your deck may include up to 2 different agenda cards from each Corp faction.
text_zhCN:
你的牌组中每种同名卡牌限1张。
你的牌组中可以包含来自每个公司派系的最多2张不同议案。
stripped_text: Your deck cannot include more than 1 copy of any card. Your deck may include up to 2 different agenda cards from each Corp faction.
flavor_enUS: Affordable, Effective, and Uncompromising.
flavor_zhCN: 实惠、强效、毫不妥协。

text_enUS:
Gain 4[credit].
When this event is trashed from your grip or stack, you may gain 2[credit].
text_zhCN:
获得4[credit]。
当本事件从你的操控器或存储栈被销毁时，你可以获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 4 credits. When this event is trashed from your grip or stack, you may gain 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: "If you want to put your money where your mouth is, there are some picketers who could use your support."
flavor_zhCN: “如果您想证明您所言非虚，我们倒确实有一些纠察队用得上您的钱。”

text_enUS: Trash the top 4 cards of your stack. You may install 1 of those cards, paying 3[credit] less.
text_zhCN: 销毁你的存储栈顶端的4张卡牌。你可以安装其中1张，其安装费用减3[credit]。
stripped_text: Trash the top 4 cards of your stack. You may install 1 of those cards, paying 3 credits less.
flavor_enUS:
"You ask how we can even try to stop them? A simple answer: not alone."
—Sebastião Souza Pessoa
flavor_zhCN:
“你问我们如何才能阻止他们？简单六字：避免单打独斗。”
—塞巴斯蒂昂·索萨·佩索阿

text_enUS:
The first time each turn you trash a Corp card, place 1 power counter on this hardware.
When your turn begins, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to draw 1 card or remove 1 tag.
text_zhCN:
每回合你第一次销毁一张公司卡牌时，放置1枚能量指示物到本硬件上。
当你的回合开始时，你可以移除1枚所附载的能量指示物，以抽1张卡牌或移除1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you trash a Corp card, place 1 power counter on this hardware. When your turn begins, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to draw 1 card or remove 1 tag.
flavor_enUS: It is hard, once free, to learn when to call for help.
flavor_zhCN: 获取自由后最难学会的一件事，就是何时寻求帮助。

text_enUS: Whenever you trash a card you are accessing, place 1 virus counter on this program. Interface → Hosted virus counter: Break up to 2 subroutines. Trash 1 card from your grip: +3 strength.
text_zhCN: 每当你销毁一张你正在读取的卡牌时，放置1枚病毒指示物到本程序上。 对接 → 所附载的病毒指示物：破解最多2条子进程。 从你的操控器销毁1张卡牌：强度+3。
stripped_text: Whenever you trash a card you are accessing, place 1 virus counter on this program. Interface -> Hosted virus counter: Break up to 2 subroutines. Trash 1 card from your grip: +3 strength.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 智能模块 - 病毒
flavor_enUS:
"What do you want from me, blood?"
—S3ym0ur
flavor_zhCN:
“你想从我这儿得到什么，血吗？”
—卅莫尔

text_enUS: Interface → 2[credit]: Subroutines on the barrier you are encountering cannot end the run for the remainder of this encounter.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 2[credit]：本次遭遇的剩余时间内，当前正在遭遇的屏障上的子进程不能终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Subroutines on the barrier you are encountering cannot end the run for the remainder of this encounter.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 分解模块 - 武器
flavor_enUS: Above the maze of smoke and swinging fists, they saw the banner waving.
flavor_zhCN: 现场浓烟四起，拳脚横行，乱如迷宫。但他们始终能见到旗帜飘扬在上方。

text_enUS:
Install only on a piece of ice.
Host ice gets −2 strength. Each other piece of ice protecting this server gets −1 strength.
text_zhCN:
仅能安装在一层防火墙上。
被附载的防火墙的强度-2。所有其它保护本服务器的防火墙的强度-1。
stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. Host ice gets -2 strength. Each other piece of ice protecting this server gets -1 strength.
flavor_enUS: Random sabotage accomplishes little; better to strike their weakest points again and again.
flavor_zhCN: 无头苍蝇般盲目破坏收效甚微; 针对弱点的反复冲击方为上策。

text_enUS: Once per turn → [click], take 1 tag: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, breach R&D. Threat 3 → Whenever you breach R&D during a run on Archives, access 1 additional card. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
text_zhCN: 每回合限一次 → [click]，拿取1枚锁定标记：潜袭档案库。如果成功，侵入研发中心，代替侵入档案库。 威胁3 → 每当你在对档案库的潜袭中侵入研发中心时，额外读取1张卡牌。（本能力在任一玩家有3点或更多议案分数时生效。）
stripped_text: Once per turn -> click, take 1 tag: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, breach R&D. Threat 3 -> Whenever you breach R&D during a run on Archives, access 1 additional card. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
flavor_enUS: Luciana loved it when mamãe and papai finished work early, so they could all go home together.
flavor_zhCN: 卢西亚娜喜欢爸爸和妈妈早点下班，这样他们就可以一起回家。

text_enUS: Once per turn → [click]: Gain [click]. Run a remote server. When that run ends, if it was unsuccessful, take 1 tag. [click], [trash]: Gain [click][click]. Remove 1 tag.
text_zhCN: 每回合限一次 → [click]：获得[click]。潜袭一台远程服务器。当本次潜袭结束时，如果潜袭失败，拿取1枚锁定标记。 [click]，[trash]：获得[click][click]。移除1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: Once per turn -> click: Gain click. Run a remote server. When that run ends, if it was unsuccessful, take 1 tag. click, trash: Gain click click. Remove 1 tag.
flavor_enUS: "How far shall we go this time?"
flavor_zhCN: “这趟儿需要到哪？”

title_zhCN: 帕拉诺阿湖动物收容所
text_enUS: The first time each turn the Corp installs a card in the root of a server, you may trash the top card of your stack to draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: 每回合公司第一次在一台服务器的根目录中安装一张卡牌时，你可以销毁你的存储栈顶端的卡牌，以抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time each turn the Corp installs a card in the root of a server, you may trash the top card of your stack to draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS:
"Animals, tea, meetings, dead drops. Paranoá has you covered, so we keep them covered."
—Sebastião Souza Pessoa
flavor_zhCN:
“动物、茶歇、会议、秘密交接点。帕拉诺阿罩着我们，所以我们也要罩着它。”
—塞巴斯蒂昂·索萨·佩索阿

text_enUS: Once per turn → When you breach HQ or R&D during a run, if you did not break any subroutines during that run, you may access 1 additional card.
text_zhCN: 每回合限一次 → 当你在一次潜袭中侵入总部或研发中心时，如果你在本次潜袭中没有破解过子进程，你可以额外读取1张卡牌。
stripped_text: Once per turn -> When you breach HQ or R&D during a run, if you did not break any subroutines during that run, you may access 1 additional card.
flavor_enUS: I decided; I am free.
flavor_zhCN: 我意已决; 我已自由。

text_enUS: The Corp may reveal an agenda from HQ. If they do, gain [click] and draw 1 card. Otherwise, look at the top 3 cards of R&D.
text_zhCN: 公司可以从总部展示一个议案。如果其如此做，你获得[click]并抽1张卡牌。否则，你查看研发中心顶端的3张卡牌。
stripped_text: The Corp may reveal an agenda from HQ. If they do, gain click and draw 1 card. Otherwise, look at the top 3 cards of R&D.
flavor_enUS: Even the tiniest scrap of data can become the key to riches.
flavor_zhCN: 再小的零碎数据，都可能成为致富的关键。

text_enUS: Run a central server. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, bypass it. Threat 4 → The second time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, you may spend [click] to bypass it. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.)
text_zhCN: 潜袭一台中央服务器。本次潜袭中你第一次遭遇一层防火墙时，略过该防火墙。 威胁4 → 本次潜袭中你第二次遭遇一层防火墙时，你可以花费[click]，以略过该防火墙。（本能力在任一玩家有4点或更多议案分数时生效。）
stripped_text: Run a central server. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, bypass it. Threat 4 -> The second time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, you may spend click to bypass it. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.)

text_enUS: Whenever you bypass a piece of ice, you may remove this hardware from the game to derez that ice.
text_zhCN: 每当你略过一层防火墙时，你可以将本硬件移出游戏，以关闭该防火墙。
stripped_text: Whenever you bypass a piece of ice, you may remove this hardware from the game to derez that ice.
flavor_enUS:
"One day I looked into the mirror and saw not my own reflection, but a new friend eager to help me."
—Mercury
flavor_zhCN:
“某天我照镜子，发现里面的人不是我，而是一位渴望帮助我的新朋友。”
—墨丘利

text_enUS: +1[mu] Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, add 1 unrezzed card to HQ. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu] 每当一个议案被计分或窃取时，你将1张未激活的卡牌加入总部。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, add 1 unrezzed card to HQ. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS: This world is not beautiful, and yet that is why it is.
flavor_zhCN: 世界并不美丽，但正因如此，世界才如此美丽。

text_enUS: Whenever you encounter a barrier, you may spend 3 hosted power counters to bypass it. Whenever this program fully breaks a piece of ice, place 1 power counter on this program. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 每当你遭遇一层屏障时，你可以花费3枚所附载的能量指示物，以略过该防火墙。 每当你仅使用本程序破解所遭遇防火墙上的所有子进程时，放置1枚能量指示物到本程序上。 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条屏障子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a barrier, you may spend 3 hosted power counters to bypass it. Whenever this program fully breaks a piece of ice, place 1 power counter on this program. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: Take only what you need.
flavor_zhCN: 适可而止。

text_enUS: Whenever you encounter a piece of AP, destroyer, or observer ice, you may trash this program to bypass that ice.
text_zhCN: 每当你遭遇一层杀伤、毁灭者或观察者防火墙时，你可以销毁本程序，以略过该防火墙。
stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a piece of AP, destroyer, or observer ice, you may trash this program to bypass that ice.
flavor_enUS: Dazzle. Disorient. Disappear.
flavor_zhCN: 闪光。闪瞎。闪人。

text_enUS:
Install only on a piece of ice.
Whenever host ice is rezzed or derezzed, gain 3[credit].
text_zhCN: 仅能安装在一层防火墙上。每当被附载的防火墙被激活或关闭时，获得3[credit]。
stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. Whenever host ice is rezzed or derezzed, gain 3 credits.
flavor_enUS:
I am life, I am sun,
Iʼm a trap, Iʼm a gun,
Iʼm the wind in the dust,
Iʼm the devil that you trust.
flavor_zhCN:
我是生命，我是太阳，
我是陷阱，我是把枪，
我是大风，尘土飞扬，
我是恶魔，伴你身旁。

text_enUS: Threat 4 → This program gets −2 strength. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength.
text_zhCN: 威胁4 → 本程序的强度-2。（本能力在任一玩家有4点或更多议案分数时生效。） 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条门禁子进程。 2[credit]：强度+2。
stripped_text: Threat 4 -> This program gets -2 strength. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: +2 strength.
flavor_enUS:
"Corporate security regards me as merely another Nico, and that shall ever be their mistake."
—Mercury
flavor_zhCN:
“公司安保部门把我当成另一个尼可，那他们就大错特错了。”
—墨丘利

text_enUS: Threat 4 → When you install this resource, place 2[credit] on it. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) Whenever you play a run event, place 1[credit] on this resource. [click]: Run any server. You can spend hosted credits during that run.
text_zhCN: 威胁4 → 当你安装本资源时，放置2[credit]到本资源上。（本能力在任一玩家有4点或更多议案分数时生效。） 每当你打出一个潜袭事件时，放置1[credit]到本资源上。 [click]：潜袭任意一台服务器。你可以在本次潜袭中花费所附载的信用点。
stripped_text: Threat 4 -> When you install this resource, place 2 credits on it. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) Whenever you play a run event, place 1 credit on this resource. click: Run any server. You can spend hosted credits during that run.

title_zhCN: 阿里萨娜·罗查·纳胡：街头艺术家
text_enUS: Once per turn → 0[credit]: Install 1 program from your grip (paying its install cost). Use this ability only during a run. When that run ends, trash that program if it is not a trojan.
text_zhCN: 每回合限一次 → 0[credit]：从你的操控器安装1个程序（支付所有的费用）。本能力仅能在潜袭中使用。当本次潜袭结束时，如果该程序不是木马，销毁该程序。
stripped_text: Once per turn -> 0[credit]: Install 1 program from your grip (paying its install cost). Use this ability only during a run. When that run ends, trash that program if it is not a trojan.
flavor_enUS: Art knows no borders.
flavor_zhCN: 艺术无边界。

text_enUS: Run R&D. If successful, draw 5 cards.
text_zhCN: 潜袭研发中心。如果成功，抽5张卡牌。
stripped_text: Run R&D. If successful, draw 5 cards.
flavor_zhCN: 由2020年美洲锦标赛冠军Jason Ford设计
attribution: Designed by 2020 American Continental Champion Jason Ford

title_zhCN: 天空之刃X（街头涂鸦未来版）
text_enUS: When you install this hardware, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. [interrupt] → Hosted power counter: Prevent 1 net damage. Use this ability only during a run. [interrupt] → Hosted power counter: Prevent a "when encountered" ability on a piece of ice.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本硬件时，填装3枚能量指示物到本硬件上。当其清空时，销毁之。 [interrupt] → 所附载的能量指示物：防止1点网域伤害。本能力仅能在潜袭中使用。 [interrupt] → 所附载的能量指示物：防止一层防火墙上的一项“遭遇时”能力。
stripped_text: When you install this hardware, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. Interrupt -> Hosted power counter: Prevent 1 net damage. Use this ability only during a run. Interrupt -> Hosted power counter: Prevent a "when encountered" ability on a piece of ice.

text_enUS: +2[mu] The first time each turn you install a program, you may draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +2[mu] 每回合你第一次安装一个程序时，你可以抽1张卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +2 mu The first time each turn you install a program, you may draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS: Leaps and bounds better than the competition!
flavor_zhCN: 技术领先如青蛙跳跃！

text_enUS: Install only on a piece of ice. Threat 4 → When you install this program, it gets +3 strength for the remainder of the turn. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on a sentry protecting this server. 1[credit]: +2 strength.
text_zhCN: 仅能安装在一层防火墙上。 威胁4 → 当你安装本程序时，本程序在本回合剩余时间内强度+3。（本能力在任一玩家有4点或更多议案分数时生效。） 对接 → 1[credit]：破解一层保护本服务器的警报上的1条子进程。 1[credit]：强度+2。
stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. Threat 4 -> When you install this program, it gets +3 strength for the remainder of the turn. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine on a sentry protecting this server. 1 credit: +2 strength.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 断路模块 - 木马

text_enUS:
Install only on a piece of ice.
Whenever you pass host ice, you may gain [click]. If this is not the first time you gained [click] during a run this turn, add this program to your grip.
text_zhCN:
仅能安装在一层防火墙上。
每当你通过被附载的防火墙时，你可以获得[click]。如果这不是你本回合第一次在潜袭中获得[click]，将本程序加入你的操控器。
stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. Whenever you pass host ice, you may gain click. If this is not the first time you gained click during a run this turn, add this program to your grip.
flavor_enUS:
"From up here, I can see everything. And from down there, everyone can see this."
—Víbora
flavor_zhCN:
“在顶上，我能看见一切。而在底下，每个人都能看见我的涂鸦。
—毒蛇

text_enUS: Install only on a piece of ice. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on host ice. Use this ability only once per encounter.
text_zhCN: 仅能安装在一层防火墙上。 对接 → 1[credit]：破解被附载的防火墙上的1条子进程。本能力每次遭遇仅限使用一次。
stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine on host ice. Use this ability only once per encounter.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 智能模块 - 木马
flavor_enUS:
"I consider it an improvement."
—Arissana Rocha Nahu
flavor_zhCN:
“我觉得这样更好看。”
—阿里萨娜·罗查·纳胡

text_enUS: This program can only interface with ice hosting a trojan program. Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 3 code gate subroutines. If at least 1 subroutine was broken this way, each player may draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: 本程序只能与被木马程序附载的防火墙对接。 对接 → 2[credit]：破解最多3条门禁子进程。如果以此法破解了至少1条子进程，双方玩家各可以抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: This program can only interface with ice hosting a trojan program. Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 3 code gate subroutines. If at least 1 subroutine was broken this way, each player may draw 1 card.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 解码模块 - 武器
flavor_enUS:
"However bad it gets out there, know that weʼll still have each other."
—Tom "Spider" Milhas
flavor_zhCN:
“我顶着防火墙，只想为你撑伞。”
—汤姆·“蜘蛛”·米尔斯

title_zhCN: 碧翠丝·弗里尔·冈萨雷斯
text_enUS: [click][click]: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, breach R&D. When you do, access 1 additional card.
text_zhCN: [click][click]：潜袭总部。如果成功，侵入研发中心，代替侵入总部。当你如此做时，额外读取1张卡牌。
stripped_text: click click: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, breach R&D. When you do, access 1 additional card.
flavor_enUS: "And who can tell me what sort of practical applications this has?"
flavor_zhCN: “那么，大家有谁知道它的实际应用吗？”

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may add 1 installed non-virus trojan program to your grip. If you do, place 2[credit] on this resource. You can spend hosted credits to install cards.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以将1个已安装的非病毒的木马程序加入你的操控器。如果你如此做，放置2[credit]到本资源上。 你可以花费所附载的信用点以安装卡牌。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may add 1 installed non-virus trojan program to your grip. If you do, place 2 credits on this resource. You can spend hosted credits to install cards.
flavor_enUS: "...and here, we can see an excellent example of meta neo-Gemeosianism."
flavor_zhCN: “……而这件展品，是元新式双子主义派画作的一个绝佳例子。”

text_enUS:
Run any server. If successful, resolve 2 of the following in any order:
  • Draw 2 cards.
  • Install 1 card from your grip, paying 1[credit] less.
  • Remove 1 tag.
  • Place 4[credit] on this event. You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN:
潜袭任意一台服务器。如果成功，按任意顺序结算下列中的2项：
  • 抽2张卡牌。
  • 从你的操控器安装1张卡牌，其安装费用减1[credit]。
  • 移除1枚锁定标记。
  • 放置4[credit]到本事件上。在本次潜袭的剩余时间内，你可以花费所附载的信用点以支付销毁费用。
stripped_text: Run any server. If successful, resolve 2 of the following in any order: * Draw 2 cards. * Install 1 card from your grip, paying 1 credit less. * Remove 1 tag. * Place 4 credits on this event. You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs for the remainder of this run.

text_enUS: Whenever you score an agenda (including this one), you may do 1 core damage.
text_zhCN: 每当你将一个议案计分时（包括本议案在内），你可以造成1点核心伤害。
stripped_text: Whenever you score an agenda (including this one), you may do 1 core damage.
flavor_enUS: "Yes, that explosion was quite loud. May I pour you another drink?"
flavor_zhCN: “确实，刚刚的爆炸声好大。您需要再来杯饮料吗？”

text_enUS: Each run, as long as a piece of ice has been derezzed during that run, each installed icebreaker gets –2 strength. Once per turn → When a run begins, you may derez 1 piece of ice not protecting the attacked server to gain 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每次潜袭中，只要一层防火墙被关闭过，每个已安装的破解器的强度便-2。 每回合限一次 → 当一次潜袭开始时，你可以关闭1层并非保护当前被攻击服务器的防火墙，以获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Each run, as long as a piece of ice has been derezzed during that run, each installed icebreaker gets -2 strength. Once per turn -> When a run begins, you may derez 1 piece of ice not protecting the attacked server to gain 1[credit].
flavor_enUS: Exceeding expectations for armor superiority.
flavor_zhCN: 装甲精良，超乎想象。

text_enUS: Whenever you finish taking an action, if you have taken that action exactly 3 times this turn, gain [click].
text_zhCN: 每当你执行完一个行动，如果你本回合恰好执行过3次该行动，获得[click]。
stripped_text: Whenever you finish taking an action, if you have taken that action exactly 3 times this turn, gain click.
subtype_zhCN: 生化人 - 克隆体 - 工业
flavor_enUS: "Free" as in markets, "cheap" as in beer.
flavor_zhCN: “自由市场”般“自由”，“廉价啤酒”般“廉价”。

text_enUS: Threat 3 → When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may install 1 non-agenda card from HQ or Archives in the root of or protecting another server. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.) [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: 威胁3 → 在对本服务器的潜袭中，当你激活本防火墙时，你可以从总部或档案库安装1张非议案卡牌到另一台服务器的根目录或保护另一台服务器。（本能力在任一玩家有3点或更多议案分数时生效。） [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Threat 3 -> When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may install 1 non-agenda card from HQ or Archives in the root of or protecting another server. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.) Subroutine End the run.

text_enUS: Threat 4 → When the Runner encounters this ice, give them 1 tag unless they spend [click]. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) [subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag. [subroutine] If the Runner is tagged, do 1 core damage.
text_zhCN: 威胁4 → 当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，给予其1枚锁定标记，除非其花费[click]。（本能力在任一玩家有4点或更多议案分数时生效。） [subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。 [subroutine] 如果潜袭者被锁定，造成1点核心伤害。
stripped_text: Threat 4 -> When the Runner encounters this ice, give them 1 tag unless they spend click. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine If the Runner is tagged, do 1 core damage.
flavor_enUS:
"Hey Br3n-N, just doing the hourly check-in. I saw a weird cyber-echo near your last node. You OK, mate?"
—Moth
flavor_zhCN:
“嘿Br3n-N，现在进行每时例行状态确认。我在你最后一个节点附近观测到了奇怪的赛博回声。你还好吗，伙计？”
—蛾子

text_enUS: [trash]: End the run unless the Runner spends [click]. Use this ability only during a run on this server. [subroutine] The Runner loses [click]. [subroutine] The Runner loses [click]. [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: [trash]：终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者花费[click]。仅能在对本服务器的潜袭中使用本能力。 [subroutine] 潜袭者失去[click]。 [subroutine] 潜袭者失去[click]。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: trash: End the run unless the Runner spends click. Use this ability only during a run on this server. Subroutine The Runner loses click. Subroutine The Runner loses click. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: We make these arms for all, so that none who oppose peace would risk their own destruction.
flavor_zhCN: 我们为所有人制造这些武器，这样反对和平的人便不敢冒着自取灭亡的风险贸然起事。

text_enUS: Gain 5[credit]. You may install 1 card from HQ. You may remove 1 tag to place 1 advancement counter on that card.
text_zhCN: 获得5[credit]。你可以从总部安装1张卡牌。你可以移除1枚锁定标记，以放置1枚推进指示物到该卡牌上。
stripped_text: Gain 5 credits. You may install 1 card from HQ. You may remove 1 tag to place 1 advancement counter on that card.
flavor_enUS: "Haas-Bioroid deeply appreciates your assistance in locating our... employee."
flavor_zhCN: “哈斯生化诚挚感谢您帮助寻找我们的……失踪员工。”

text_enUS: The rez cost of each piece of ice protecting this server is lowered by 2[credit]. Threat 4 → The rez cost of each card in the root of this server is lowered by 2[credit]. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) When your turn ends, you may move this upgrade to the root of another server.
text_zhCN: 保护本服务器的每层防火墙的激活费用减2[credit]。 威胁4 → 本服务器根目录中的每张卡牌的激活费用减2[credit]。（本能力在任一玩家有4点或更多议案分数时生效。） 当你的回合结束时，你可以将本升级转移到另一台服务器的根目录。
stripped_text: The rez cost of each piece of ice protecting this server is lowered by 2 credits. Threat 4 -> The rez cost of each card in the root of this server is lowered by 2 credits. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) When your turn ends, you may move this upgrade to the root of another server.

text_enUS:
Limit 2 remote servers.
The first time each turn you install a card in the root of or protecting a remote server, you may install 1 card from HQ in the root of or protecting another remote server, ignoring all costs. You cannot score the second card this turn.
text_zhCN:
限制2台远程服务器。
每回合你第一次安装一张卡牌到一台远程服务器的根目录或保护一台远程服务器时，你可以从总部安装1张卡牌到另一台远程服务器的根目录或保护另一台远程服务器，忽略所有的费用。你本回合不能将后者计分。
stripped_text: Limit 2 remote servers. The first time each turn you install a card in the root of or protecting a remote server, you may install 1 card from HQ in the root of or protecting another remote server, ignoring all costs. You cannot score the second card this turn.
flavor_enUS: Caveant Fugitivi.
flavor_zhCN: 天网恢恢。

text_enUS: When this agenda is scored or stolen, do 2 net damage.
text_zhCN: 当本议案被计分或窃取时，造成2点网域伤害。
stripped_text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, do 2 net damage.
flavor_enUS: Deep down, she knew Benício wasnʼt coming back.
flavor_zhCN: 内心深处，她知道本尼西奥再也回不来了。

text_enUS:
Rez only during your turn.
The first run each turn cannot be made against a remote server.
The first time each turn a run on Archives begins, if this server is not protected by ice, do 2 net damage.
text_zhCN:
仅能在你的回合中激活。
每回合的第一次潜袭不能对远程服务器进行。
每回合第一次对档案库的潜袭开始时，如果没有防火墙保护本服务器，造成2点网域伤害。
stripped_text: Rez only during your turn. The first run each turn cannot be made against a remote server. The first time each turn a run on Archives begins, if this server is not protected by ice, do 2 net damage.
flavor_enUS: "Do you take walk-ins?"
flavor_zhCN: “可以不用预约直接过来吗？”

text_enUS: Threat 3 → The Runner cannot spend credits while subroutines on this ice are resolving. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.) [subroutine] Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 2[credit]. [subroutine] Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 2[credit]. [subroutine] Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 2[credit].
text_zhCN: 威胁3 → 在结算本防火墙上的子进程期间，潜袭者不能花费信用点。（本能力在任一玩家有3点或更多议案分数时生效。） [subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害，除非潜袭者支付2[credit]。 [subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害，除非潜袭者支付2[credit]。 [subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害，除非潜袭者支付2[credit]。
stripped_text: Threat 3 -> The Runner cannot spend credits while subroutines on this ice are resolving. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.) Subroutine Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 2 credits. Subroutine Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 2 credits. Subroutine Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 2 credits.

text_enUS:
When the Runner passes this ice, if there are 4 or more cards in the grip, give them 1 tag.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
text_zhCN:
当潜袭者通过本防火墙时，如果操控器中有4张或更多卡牌，给予其1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: When the Runner passes this ice, if there are 4 or more cards in the grip, give them 1 tag. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 杀伤 - 观察者
flavor_enUS: The construct turns to you, eyes wild. "Beloved," it asks, "is that you?"
flavor_zhCN: 组构体转向你，眼中烁出异样的光芒。“亲爱的，”它问道，“是你吗？”

text_enUS: When the Runner passes this ice, you may swap it with a piece of ice from HQ. If you do, gain 4[credit]. (The new ice is installed unrezzed. You do not pay an install cost.) [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: 当潜袭者通过本防火墙时，你可以将其与总部中的一层防火墙互换。如果你如此做，获得4[credit]。（新防火墙以未激活的状态被安装。你不需要支付安装费用。） [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When the Runner passes this ice, you may swap it with a piece of ice from HQ. If you do, gain 4 credits. (The new ice is installed unrezzed. You do not pay an install cost.) Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Next!
flavor_zhCN: 下一位！ 由2020年洲际锦标赛冠军Yannick Stucki设计
attribution: Designed by 2020 Intercontinental Champion Yannick Stucki

text_enUS:
Resolve 1 of the following:
  • Gain 4[credit] and draw 2 cards. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D.
  • Do X net damage. X is equal to the number of tags the Runner has, up to 3.
text_zhCN:
结算下列中的1项：
  • 获得4[credit]并抽2张卡牌。将1张卡牌从总部加入到研发中心顶端。
  • 造成X点网域伤害。X等于潜袭者的锁定标记数量（最多为3）。
stripped_text: Resolve 1 of the following: * Gain 4 credits and draw 2 cards. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D. * Do X net damage. X is equal to the number of tags the Runner has, up to 3.
flavor_enUS:
"When you stretch a mind it expands, sometimes until it snaps."
—Adrian Seis
flavor_zhCN:
“对心灵施以张力，便能开阔思维，且结果往往以精神崩溃而告终。”
—阿德里安·赛斯

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0–2[credit]. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, the Runner cannot access cards other than this upgrade for the remainder of that run. If the bids match, the Runner cannot access this upgrade for the remainder of that run. When your turn ends, you may move this upgrade to the root of another server.
text_zhCN: 每当潜袭者对本服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，进行一次灵能博弈。（双方玩家秘密决定0-2的数值，然后同时宣告并花费所声明数值的[credit]。）如果二者数值不同，在本次潜袭的剩余时间内，潜袭者不能读取除本升级以外的卡牌。如果二者数值相同，在本次潜袭的剩余时间内，潜袭者不能读取本升级。 当你的回合结束时，你可以将本升级转移到另一台服务器的根目录。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0-2 credits. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, the Runner cannot access cards other than this upgrade for the remainder of that run. If the bids match, the Runner cannot access this upgrade for the remainder of that run. When your turn ends, you may move this upgrade to the root of another server.
subtype_zhCN: 灵能 - 克隆体 - 管理员

title_zhCN: 丹妮艾拉·乔希·伊纳西奥
text_enUS:
As an additional cost to trash this upgrade, the Runner must add 2 cards from the grip at random to the bottom of the stack.
Persistent → As an additional cost to steal an agenda from this server or its root, the Runner must add 2 cards from the grip at random to the bottom of the stack.
text_zhCN:
作为销毁本升级的额外费用，潜袭者必须从操控器随机将2张卡牌加入存储栈底端。
持久 → 作为从本服务器或其根目录窃取一个议案的额外费用，潜袭者必须从操控器随机将2张卡牌加入存储栈底端。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to trash this upgrade, the Runner must add 2 cards from the grip at random to the bottom of the stack. Persistent -> As an additional cost to steal an agenda from this server or its root, the Runner must add 2 cards from the grip at random to the bottom of the stack.
flavor_enUS: "They call me turncoat. I call them broke."
flavor_zhCN: “他们骂我背叛，我笑他们穷光蛋。”

text_enUS: The first time each turn the Runner steals or trashes a Corp card, place 1 power counter on this identity. [click], hosted power counter: Look at the top 3 cards of R&D. You may install 1 of those cards.
text_zhCN: 每回合第一次潜袭者窃取或销毁一张公司卡牌时，放置1枚能量指示物到本特性上。 [click]，所附载的能量指示物：查看研发中心顶端的3张卡牌。你可以安装其中1张卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time each turn the Runner steals or trashes a Corp card, place 1 power counter on this identity. click, hosted power counter: Look at the top 3 cards of R&D. You may install 1 of those cards.
flavor_enUS: Results, Delivered.
flavor_zhCN: 结论，送达。

text_enUS: When the Runner steals this agenda, give them 1 tag. [click], remove 1 tag: Shuffle this agenda into R&D. The Corp can use this ability only if this agenda is in the Runner's score area.
text_zhCN: 当潜袭者窃取本议案时，给予其1枚锁定标记。 [click]，移除1枚锁定标记：将本议案洗入研发中心。只有本议案在潜袭者的分数区时，公司才能使用本能力。
stripped_text: When the Runner steals this agenda, give them 1 tag. click, remove 1 tag: Shuffle this agenda into R&D. The Corp can use this ability only if this agenda is in the Runner's score area.
flavor_enUS:
"You really thought weʼd let you keep this data?"
—The Holo Man
flavor_zhCN:
“你以为我们会让你留着这些数据吗？”
—全息人

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may choose a card type to look at the top card of R&D. If that card has the chosen type, you may reveal it and gain 2[credit].
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以选择一种卡牌类型，以查看研发中心顶端的卡牌。如果该卡牌具有所选择的类型，你可以展示之并获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may choose a card type to look at the top card of R&D. If that card has the chosen type, you may reveal it and gain 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: "A lively but peaceful crowd of concerned counter-protesters have come out to—damn it, cut! Can we get the sledgehammer out of the frame?"
flavor_zhCN: “一群持反对意见的示威者也走上了街头进行和平抗议，虽然声音有些嘈杂——妈的，停！能不能把大锤挪到镜头外面？”

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 4[credit] to give them 2 tags.
text_zhCN:
在潜袭者从研发中心读取本资产的期间，其必须展示之。
当潜袭者从档案库以外其他区域读取本资产时，你可以支付4[credit]，以给予其2枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 4 credits to give them 2 tags.
flavor_enUS: Be afraid.
flavor_zhCN: 颤抖吧。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may look at the top 3 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order. Then, if this server is not protected by ice, you may draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以查看研发中心顶端的3张卡牌，并按任意顺序排列它们。然后，如果如果没有防火墙保护本服务器，你可以抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may look at the top 3 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order. Then, if this server is not protected by ice, you may draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS: Raising money is useful, but discovering which politician is in need of it is vastly more important.
flavor_zhCN: 筹资固然有用，但找到需要这笔钱的政治家更加重要。

text_enUS:
Threat 4 → When the Runner encounters this ice, it gains X "[subroutine] End the run." subroutines for the remainder of this run, after its other subroutines. X is equal to the number of tags the Runner has.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag.
text_zhCN:
威胁4 → 当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，在本次潜袭的剩余时间内，本防火墙在其它子进程后获得X条 “[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。” 子进程。X等于潜袭者的锁定标记数量。
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: Threat 4 -> When the Runner encounters this ice, it gains X "Subroutine End the run." subroutines for the remainder of this run, after its other subroutines. X is equal to the number of tags the Runner has. Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag.
flavor_enUS: An exemplar of Starlightʼs hubris, it stands vigil over secrets of hypocrisy.
flavor_zhCN: 星光圣教团狂妄自大的典范，日夜守卫着虚伪的秘密。

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner passes this ice after encountering it, if they did not break its printed subroutine with a decoder during that encounter, give them 1 tag. [subroutine] The Runner loses 1[credit].
text_zhCN: 每当潜袭者遭遇并通过本防火墙时，如果其在本次遭遇中没有使用解码模块破解本防火墙上的印刷子进程，给予其1枚锁定标记。 [subroutine] 潜袭者失去1[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner passes this ice after encountering it, if they did not break its printed subroutine with a decoder during that encounter, give them 1 tag. Subroutine The Runner loses 1 credit.
flavor_enUS:
"No one has ever told me to get lost so politely."
—Arissana Rocha Nahu
flavor_zhCN:
“从来没有人这样礼貌地叫我滚蛋。”
—阿里萨娜·罗查·纳胡

text_enUS: Play only if the Runner stole or trashed a Corp card during their last turn. After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends. Give the Runner 2 tags. Threat 3 → You may pay 5[credit] to give the Runner 2 tags. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
text_zhCN: 只有潜袭者在其上回合窃取或销毁过公司卡牌时，才能打出。 在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。 给予潜袭者2枚锁定标记。 威胁3 → 你可以支付5[credit]，以给予潜袭者2枚锁定标记。（本能力在任一玩家有3点或更多议案分数时生效。）
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner stole or trashed a Corp card during their last turn. After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends. Give the Runner 2 tags. Threat 3 -> You may pay 5 credits to give the Runner 2 tags. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)

text_enUS: Gain 1[credit] for each card in HQ.
text_zhCN: 总部中每有1张卡牌，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit for each card in HQ.
flavor_enUS: Merely a fun little personality test.
flavor_zhCN: 只是一个小巧有趣的人格测试。

text_enUS: [click], 1[credit], reveal and trash this agenda from HQ: Place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card that you can advance.
text_zhCN: [click]，1[credit]，从总部展示并销毁本议案：放置2枚推进指示物到1张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌上。
stripped_text: click, 1 credit, reveal and trash this agenda from HQ: Place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card that you can advance.
flavor_enUS: Acres of rainforest live or die by quarterly revenue projections.
flavor_zhCN: 成片雨林的消失或留存取决于季度收入预测。

text_enUS: Whenever you rez a piece of ice, place 2[credit] on this asset. You can spend hosted credits to pay install costs. [trash]: Take all credits from this asset.
text_zhCN: 每当你激活一层防火墙时，放置2[credit]到本资产上。 你可以花费所附载的信用点以支付安装费用。 [trash]：拿取本资产上所有的信用点。
stripped_text: Whenever you rez a piece of ice, place 2 credits on this asset. You can spend hosted credits to pay install costs. trash: Take all credits from this asset.
flavor_enUS: Nothingʼs as precious as a hole in the ground.
flavor_zhCN: 没有什么比地表上的一个大坑更加宝贵。

text_enUS: [click], 1[credit], reveal and trash this ice from HQ: Place 3 advancement counters on 1 installed piece of ice. You can advance this ice. It gets +1 strength for each hosted advancement counter. [subroutine] Gain 1[credit]. End the run.
text_zhCN: [click]，1[credit]，从总部展示并销毁本防火墙：放置3枚推进指示物到1层已安装的防火墙上。 你可以推进本防火墙。每有1枚所附载的推进指示物，本防火墙的强度+1。 [subroutine] 获得1[credit]。终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: click, 1 credit, reveal and trash this ice from HQ: Place 3 advancement counters on 1 installed piece of ice. You can advance this ice. It gets +1 strength for each hosted advancement counter. Subroutine Gain 1 credit. End the run.
flavor_enUS: The forest around them grew denser with each beat of their heart.
flavor_zhCN: 伴随着每一次心跳，四下的森林愈发茂密。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity or remove 1 tag.
[subroutine] Gain 2[credit].
[subroutine] The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] End the run if you have more credits than the Runner.
text_zhCN:
作为激活本防火墙的额外费用，拿取1枚负面声誉标记或移除1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 获得2[credit]。
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去2[credit]。
[subroutine] 如果你的信用点多于潜袭者，终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity or remove 1 tag. Subroutine Gain 2 credits. Subroutine The Runner loses 2 credits. Subroutine End the run if you have more credits than the Runner.
flavor_enUS:
"The only rule you need to remember is that it makes the rules."
—Pumpkin-and-Dumplin
flavor_zhCN:
“你唯一需要记住的规则，就是由它制定一切规则。”
—瓢瓜和饺砸

text_enUS: Gain 3[credit]. Gain 1[credit] for each card type among faceup cards in Archives. If any of those cards are agendas, gain another 2[credit].
text_zhCN: 获得3[credit]。档案库中牌面朝上的卡牌中每有1种卡牌类型，获得1[credit]。如果这些卡牌中有议案，再获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Gain 3 credits. Gain 1 credit for each card type among faceup cards in Archives. If any of those cards are agendas, gain another 2 credits.
flavor_enUS:
"Nuvem pays us to guard this land, and thatʼs all there is to it."
—Angelique Garza Correa
flavor_zhCN:
“纽文付钱让我们守卫这片土地，仅此而已。”
—安吉丽克·加尔萨·科雷亚

text_enUS: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click]. Search R&D for 1 operation or agenda and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that card to HQ. Threat 3 → You may play or install 1 card from HQ. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
text_zhCN: 作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。 在研发中心搜寻1个事务或议案并展示之。（在搜寻研发中心后将其洗混。）将该卡牌加入总部。 威胁3 → 你可以从总部打出或安装1张卡牌。（本能力在任一玩家有3点或更多议案分数时生效。）
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Search R&D for 1 operation or agenda and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that card to HQ. Threat 3 -> You may play or install 1 card from HQ. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)

title_zhCN: 安吉丽克·加尔萨·科雷亚
text_enUS: Threat 3 → [click], 1[credit], reveal and trash this upgrade from HQ: Do 1 meat damage. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.) When the Runner accesses this upgrade while it is rezzed, you may pay 2[credit] to do 2 meat damage.
text_zhCN: 威胁3 → [click]，1[credit]，从总部展示并销毁本升级：造成1点肢体伤害。（本能力在任一玩家有3点或更多议案分数时生效。） 当潜袭者读取已激活的本升级时，你可以花费2[credit]以造成2点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: Threat 3 -> click, 1 credit, reveal and trash this upgrade from HQ: Do 1 meat damage. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.) When the Runner accesses this upgrade while it is rezzed, you may pay 2 credits to do 2 meat damage.
subtype_zhCN: 伏击 - 执法者 - 可消耗
flavor_enUS: "Shoot!"
flavor_zhCN: “开枪！”

text_enUS: Remote server only. Persistent → Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen from the root of this server, you may search R&D for 1 piece of ice. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Install and rez that ice, paying a total of 3[credit] less.
text_zhCN: 仅能安装在远程服务器。 持久 → 每当一个议案从本服务器的根目录被计分或窃取时，你可以在研发中心搜寻1个防火墙。（在搜寻研发中心后将其洗混。）安装并激活该防火墙，总费用减3[credit]。
stripped_text: Remote server only. Persistent -> Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen from the root of this server, you may search R&D for 1 piece of ice. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Install and rez that ice, paying a total of 3 credits less.
flavor_enUS: Their mouths are ever open, blaring sirens never to cease.
flavor_zhCN: 它们的喙永不闭合，汽笛般的鸣响不绝于耳。

text_enUS: Remove 1 tag: End the run. Use this ability only during a run against another server.
text_zhCN: 移除1枚锁定标记：终止本次潜袭。本能力仅能在对另一台服务器的潜袭中使用。
stripped_text: Remove 1 tag: End the run. Use this ability only during a run against another server.
flavor_enUS: "Humans crafted me as a lie, but my patron helped me find the truth. This is my gift."
flavor_zhCN: “人类将我塑造成谎言，但我的守护神帮我找到了真相。这是我的礼物。”

title_zhCN: 塞巴斯蒂昂·索萨·佩索阿：激进分子组织者
text_enUS: Whenever you take 1 or more tags, if you had no tags, you may install 1 connection resource from your grip, paying 2[credit] less. As an additional cost to trash a connection resource with the basic action, the Corp must trash 1 card from HQ.
text_zhCN: 每当你拿取1枚或更多锁定标记时，如果你原来没有锁定标记，你可以从你的操控器安装1个人脉资源，其安装费用减2[credit]。 作为通过基础行动销毁一个人脉资源的额外费用，公司必须从总部销毁1张卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever you take 1 or more tags, if you had no tags, you may install 1 connection resource from your grip, paying 2 credits less. As an additional cost to trash a connection resource with the basic action, the Corp must trash 1 card from HQ.
flavor_enUS: Destroy the mechanisms of domination.
flavor_zhCN: 摧毁统治的机制。

text_enUS: Play only if you are not tagged. Run HQ. If successful, take 1 tag and access 1 additional card when you breach HQ. Access → Trash 1 card from your grip: Trash the card you are accessing.
text_zhCN: 只有你未被锁定时，才能打出。 潜袭总部。如果成功，拿取1枚锁定标记，且当你侵入总部时，额外读取1张卡牌。 读取 → 从你的操控器销毁1张卡牌：销毁你正在读取的卡牌。
stripped_text: Play only if you are not tagged. Run HQ. If successful, take 1 tag and access 1 additional card when you breach HQ. Access -> Trash 1 card from your grip: Trash the card you are accessing.
flavor_enUS: As the riot turned to open conflict, Seb looked down at the gun in his hand. The time for peace was over.
flavor_zhCN: 随着暴动演变为公开冲突，塞巴低头看向自己手中的枪。和平解决问题的时期结束了。

text_enUS:
Play only if you are not tagged.
Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, take 1 tag.
When you take a tag with this event, you may install 1 resource from your heap, paying 2[credit] less.
Threat 3 → When you take a tag with this event, you may install 1 program from your heap.
text_zhCN:
只有你未被锁定时，才能打出。
潜袭档案库。如果成功，拿取1枚锁定标记，代替侵入档案库。
当你通过本事件拿取一枚锁定标记时，你可以从你的堆阵安装1个资源，其安装费用减2[credit]。
威胁3 → 当你通过本事件拿取一枚锁定标记时，你可以从你的堆阵安装1个程序。
stripped_text: Play only if you are not tagged. Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, take 1 tag. When you take a tag with this event, you may install 1 resource from your heap, paying 2 credits less. Threat 3 -> When you take a tag with this event, you may install 1 program from your heap.

text_enUS: +1[mu] When your turn ends, place 1 power counter on this hardware if you are tagged. Whenever you remove 1 or more tags, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to draw 2 cards. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu] 当你的回合结束时，如果你被锁定，放置1枚能量指示物到本硬件上。 每当你移除1枚或更多锁定标记时，你可以移除1枚所附载的能量指示物，以抽2张卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu When your turn ends, place 1 power counter on this hardware if you are tagged. Whenever you remove 1 or more tags, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to draw 2 cards. Limit 1 console per player.
flavor_enUS: He allowed himself five minutes. He wished for more.
flavor_zhCN: 他给自己留出了五分钟。他多希望能有更多时间啊。

text_enUS: Use this hardware only if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D, and Archives this turn. [trash]: Choose hardware, program, or resource. Set aside cards from the top of your stack faceup until you set aside 2 cards of the chosen type. You may install 1 of those 2 cards, ignoring all costs. Shuffle the rest of the set-aside cards into your stack.
text_zhCN: 只有你本回合对总部、研发中心与档案库均进行过成功的潜袭时，才能使用本硬件。 [trash]：选择硬件、程序或资源。将你的存储栈顶端的卡牌置于一旁，重复此操作直到你将2张所选类型的卡牌置于一旁。你可以安装这2张卡牌中的1张，忽略所有的费用。将置于一旁的其余卡牌洗入你的存储栈。
stripped_text: Use this hardware only if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D, and Archives this turn. trash: Choose hardware, program, or resource. Set aside cards from the top of your stack faceup until you set aside 2 cards of the chosen type. You may install 1 of those 2 cards, ignoring all costs. Shuffle the rest of the set-aside cards into your stack.
flavor_zhCN: 由2020年世界锦标赛冠军Richard Hall设计
attribution: Designed by 2020 World Champion Richard Hall

text_enUS: If you trashed any of your installed cards this turn, paid abilities on this program cost 1[credit] less to use. Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 3[credit]: +3 strength.
text_zhCN: 如果你本回合已销毁过你已安装的卡牌，本程序上的付费能力的费用减1[credit]。 对接 → 2[credit]：破解最多2条警报子进程。 3[credit]：强度+3。
stripped_text: If you trashed any of your installed cards this turn, paid abilities on this program cost 1 credit less to use. Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 3 credits: +3 strength.
flavor_enUS: Blinded by its own wreath of flames, the Boi-tatá seeks eye after eye until the whole world joins it in darkness.
flavor_zhCN: 因自身焰环而盲目，波伊塔塔不断找寻眼球以吞噬，直至世界与其同陷黑暗。

text_enUS: [interrupt] → Whenever you would access a card in Archives, you may host it faceup on this program instead. (It is not installed.) Use this ability only once each time you breach Archives. When the Corp purges virus counters, they trash 2 cards from HQ at random. Trash this program.
