text_zhCN: [interrupt] → 每当你将要读取一张档案库中的卡牌时，你可以改为将其牌面朝上附载到本程序上。（它没有被安装。）你每次侵入档案库期间，本能力仅限使用一次。 当公司清除病毒指示物时，其从总部随机销毁2张卡牌。销毁本程序。
stripped_text: Interrupt -> Whenever you would access a card in Archives, you may host it faceup on this program instead. (It is not installed.) Use this ability only once each time you breach Archives. When the Corp purges virus counters, they trash 2 cards from HQ at random. Trash this program.
flavor_enUS: Even a barren server can provide a feast, if you are patient enough.
flavor_zhCN: 只要你足够有耐心，即使是荒无一物的服务器也能提供一顿佳肴。

text_enUS: Once per turn → Take 1 tag: The ice you are encountering gets –2 strength for the remainder of this encounter. [trash], 2[credit]: Trash the ice you are encountering if its strength is 0 or less.
text_zhCN: 每回合限一次 → 拿取1枚锁定标记：本次遭遇的剩余时间内，当前正在遭遇的防火墙的强度-2。 [trash]，2[credit]：如果当前正在遭遇的防火墙的强度等于或小于0，销毁该防火墙。
stripped_text: Once per turn -> Take 1 tag: The ice you are encountering gets -2 strength for the remainder of this encounter. trash, 2[credit]: Trash the ice you are encountering if its strength is 0 or less.
flavor_enUS: “You might have been the spark, Seb, but we're the flame.”
flavor_zhCN: 也许最初是你点燃了星火，塞巴，但如今我们已经燎原。”

text_enUS: [click], [trash]: Gain 5[credit] and remove 1 tag. [click], [trash]: Gain 9[credit] and take 1 tag. Use this ability only if you are not tagged.
text_zhCN: [click]，[trash]：获得5[credit]并移除1枚锁定标记。 [click]，[trash]：获得9[credit]并拿取1枚锁定标记。只有你未被锁定时，才能使用本能力。
stripped_text: click, trash: Gain 5 credits and remove 1 tag. click, trash: Gain 9 credits and take 1 tag. Use this ability only if you are not tagged.
flavor_enUS:
“I've been a pack runner since I was ten. My uncle got me started after Eduardo took a bullet to the hip. It's only recently that people have started cheering when I leave a cop lying in the dirt.”
—Gabi Saka
flavor_zhCN:
“我从十岁就开始搞私运了。是我叔叔拉我入的伙，自从爱德华多屁股中了一枪以后。不过撂倒一个条子后居然能听到大家欢呼喝彩，倒是最近才开始有的事情。”
—加比·萨卡

text_enUS: Whenever you breach HQ or R&D while you are tagged, access 1 additional card. Threat 3 → As an additional cost to trash this resource with the basic action, the Corp must trash 1 card from HQ. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
text_zhCN: 每当你在被锁定状态下侵入总部或研发中心时，额外读取1张卡牌。 威胁3 → 作为通过基础行动销毁本资源的额外费用，公司必须从总部销毁1张卡牌。（本能力在任一玩家有3点或更多议案分数时生效。）
stripped_text: Whenever you breach HQ or R&D while you are tagged, access 1 additional card. Threat 3 -> As an additional cost to trash this resource with the basic action, the Corp must trash 1 card from HQ. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
flavor_enUS: “Some info from our mutual friends, Professor. Now, about my daughter's grades…”
flavor_zhCN: “教授，这是一些来自我们共同朋友的情报。那么，关于我女儿分数的事情……”

text_enUS: Choose connection or virtual. You may search your stack for 1 resource with the chosen subtype and reveal it. Add that card to your grip. Reveal any number of cards with the chosen subtype in your grip. Gain 1[credit] for each card revealed this way.
text_zhCN: 选择人脉或虚拟。你可以在你的存储栈搜寻1个具有所选子类型的资源并展示之。将该卡牌加入你的操控器。 展示操控器中任意数量的具有所选择的子类型的卡牌。每以此法展示1张卡牌，获得1[credit]。
stripped_text: Choose connection or virtual. You may search your stack for 1 resource with the chosen subtype and reveal it. Add that card to your grip. Reveal any number of cards with the chosen subtype in your grip. Gain 1 credit for each card revealed this way.
flavor_enUS: “You'll find a way, little sibling.”
flavor_zhCN: “你会找到办法的，小同志。”

text_enUS:
You may install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip.
Run any server. When that run begins, derez 1 piece of ice protecting that server. When that run ends, the Corp may rez the ice derezzed this way, ignoring all costs.
text_zhCN:
你可以从你的操控器安装1个程序或硬件。
潜袭任意一台服务器。当本次潜袭开始时，关闭1层保护该服务器的防火墙。当本次潜袭结束时，公司可以激活以此法关闭的防火墙，忽略所有的费用。
stripped_text: You may install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip. Run any server. When that run begins, derez 1 piece of ice protecting that server. When that run ends, the Corp may rez the ice derezzed this way, ignoring all costs.
flavor_enUS: There's a crack in everything. That's how the light gets in.
flavor_zhCN: 万物皆有裂隙。那是光照进来的地方。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may run HQ. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, you may spend [click][click] to bypass it.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以潜袭总部。本次潜袭中你第一次遭遇一层防火墙时，你可以花费[click][click]，以略过该防火墙。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may run HQ. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, you may spend click click to bypass it.
flavor_enUS: Rise and shine. Time to f**k up a corpie's day.
flavor_zhCN: 起床啦！该去毁掉一个公司员工的一天啦！

text_enUS: When your turn ends, if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D, and Archives this turn, you may add this hardware to your score area as an assassination agenda worth 0 agenda points. Then, if you have 3 assassination agendas in your score area, you win the game. Threat 3 → Whenever you bypass a piece of ice, you may spend [click] to install this hardware from your heap.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合结束时，如果你本回合对总部、研发中心与档案库均进行过成功的潜袭，你可以将本硬件加入你的分数区，作为一个价值0点议案分数的刺杀议案。然后，如果你的分数区中有3个刺杀议案，你获得游戏胜利。 威胁3 → 每当你略过一层防火墙时，你可以花费[click]，以从你的堆阵安装本硬件。
stripped_text: When your turn ends, if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D, and Archives this turn, you may add this hardware to your score area as an assassination agenda worth 0 agenda points. Then, if you have 3 assassination agendas in your score area, you win the game. Threat 3 -> Whenever you bypass a piece of ice, you may spend click to install this hardware from your heap.

text_enUS: Limit 1 hosted card. Access → 1[credit]: Host the non-agenda card you are accessing faceup on this program. (If it was installed, it becomes uninstalled.) Whenever you breach HQ, if this program has a hosted Corp card, you may pay 1[credit] and trash this program to access 2 additional cards.
text_zhCN: 限制1张所附载的卡牌。 读取 → 1[credit]：将你正在读取的非议案卡牌牌面朝上附载到本程序上。（如果该卡牌原来处于已安装状态，卸载之。） 每当你侵入总部时，如果本程序具有所附载的公司卡牌，你可以支付1[credit]并销毁本程序，以额外读取2张卡牌。
stripped_text: Limit 1 hosted card. Access -> 1 credit: Host the non-agenda card you are accessing faceup on this program. (If it was installed, it becomes uninstalled.) Whenever you breach HQ, if this program has a hosted Corp card, you may pay 1 credit and trash this program to access 2 additional cards.

text_enUS:
When you install this program, load 2 power counters onto it. When it is empty, remove it from the game.
Once per turn → When you encounter a piece of ice, if its strength is 3 or less, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to bypass it.
Threat 4 → Whenever you encounter a piece of ice, you may remove this program from the game to bypass it.
text_zhCN:
当你安装本程序时，填装2枚能量指示物到本程序上。当其清空时，将其移出游戏。
每回合限一次 → 当你遭遇一层防火墙时，如果其强度等于或小于3，你可以移除1枚所附载的能量指示物，以略过该防火墙。
威胁4 → 每当你遭遇一层防火墙时，你可以将本程序移出游戏，以略过该防火墙。
stripped_text: When you install this program, load 2 power counters onto it. When it is empty, remove it from the game. Once per turn -> When you encounter a piece of ice, if its strength is 3 or less, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to bypass it. Threat 4 -> Whenever you encounter a piece of ice, you may remove this program from the game to bypass it.

text_enUS: Install only on a piece of ice. Whenever you encounter host ice, if it is not a barrier, you may pay 1[credit] for each subroutine it has. If you do, bypass that ice. When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this program.
text_zhCN: 仅能安装在一层防火墙上。 每当你遭遇被附载的防火墙时，如果其不是屏障，你可以支付与该防火墙上子进程数量相等的[credit]。如果你如此做，略过该防火墙。 当公司清除病毒指示物时，销毁本程序。
stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. Whenever you encounter host ice, if it is not a barrier, you may pay 1 credit for each subroutine it has. If you do, bypass that ice. When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this program.
flavor_enUS: It finds a route, eventually.
flavor_zhCN: 它终究会找到一条路径。

text_enUS:
Whenever a run on HQ or R&D ends, if you accessed 3 or more cards during that run, place 1 power counter on this resource.
When your turn begins, you may remove 3 hosted power counters and trash this resource. If you do, the Corp loses 10[credit].
text_zhCN:
每当对总部或研发中心的一次潜袭结束时，如果你在本次潜袭中读取过3张或更多卡牌，放置1枚能量指示物到本资源上。
当你的回合开始时，你可以移除3枚所附载的能量指示物并销毁本资源。如果你如此做，公司失去10[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever a run on HQ or R&D ends, if you accessed 3 or more cards during that run, place 1 power counter on this resource. When your turn begins, you may remove 3 hosted power counters and trash this resource. If you do, the Corp loses 10 credits.
flavor_zhCN: 由2021年美洲锦标赛冠军Jonas Wilson设计
attribution: Designed by 2021 American Continental Champion Jonas Wilson

text_enUS:
When you install this resource, load 4 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
The first time each turn you take an action on an installed resource, remove 1 hosted power counter and gain [click].
text_zhCN:
当你安装本资源时，填装4枚能量指示物到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。
每回合你第一次执行已安装的资源上的行动时，移除1枚所附载的能量指示物并获得[click]。
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 4 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. The first time each turn you take an action on an installed resource, remove 1 hosted power counter and gain click.
flavor_enUS: The Moreira sisters couldn't be any less alike, each taking after her own father, but together they are a force unto themselves.
flavor_zhCN: 莫雷拉姐妹性格迥异，各自都随自己的亲生父亲，但只要两人联手便是一股洪荒之力。

text_enUS: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, reveal 3 cards in HQ at random. Add 2 of the revealed cards to the top and/or bottom of R&D.
text_zhCN: 潜袭总部。如果成功，随机展示总部中的3张卡牌，代替侵入总部。将所展示卡牌中的2张加入研发中心顶端和/或底端。
stripped_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, reveal 3 cards in HQ at random. Add 2 of the revealed cards to the top and/or bottom of R&D.
flavor_enUS:
“They‘ll be talking about me for years.”
—Arissana Rocha Nahu
flavor_zhCN:
“接下来几年我都会活在他们嘴边。”
—阿里萨娜·罗查·纳胡

text_enUS: Place 3 power counters on this event, then run any server. Hosted power counter: Host 1 installed trojan program on a piece of ice protecting the attacked server.
text_zhCN: 放置3枚能量指示物到本事件上，然后潜袭任意一台服务器。 所附载的能量指示物：将1个已安装的木马程序附载到一层保护当前被攻击服务器的防火墙上。
stripped_text: Place 3 power counters on this event, then run any server. Hosted power counter: Host 1 installed trojan program on a piece of ice protecting the attacked server.
flavor_enUS: Sometimes an artist will be seized by the uncontrollable urge to create.
flavor_zhCN: 艺术家时常会遭遇无法抑制的创作冲动。

text_enUS:
Place 4[credit] on this event. You can spend hosted credits during runs.
Run R&D. If successful, place 2[credit] on this event and access 1 additional card when you breach R&D.
When that run ends, you may run a remote server.
text_zhCN:
放置4[credit]到本事件上。你可以在潜袭中花费所附载的信用点。
潜袭研发中心。如果成功，放置2[credit]到本事件上，且当你侵入研发中心时，额外读取1张卡牌。
当本次潜袭结束时，你可以潜袭一台远程服务器。
stripped_text: Place 4 credits on this event. You can spend hosted credits during runs. Run R&D. If successful, place 2 credits on this event and access 1 additional card when you breach R&D. When that run ends, you may run a remote server.
flavor_enUS: 8 billion, corner office.
flavor_zhCN: 80亿，来角落办公室。

text_enUS: When you install this hardware, load 2 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, instead of breaching R&D, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to look at the top 4 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order. [click], hosted power counter: Breach R&D. Use this ability only if you made a successful run on R&D this turn.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本硬件时，填装2枚能量指示物到本硬件上。当其清空时，销毁之。 每当你对研发中心进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以移除1枚所附载的能量指示物，以查看研发中心顶端的4张卡牌并按任意顺序排列它们，代替侵入研发中心。 [click]，所附载的能量指示物：侵入研发中心。只有你本回合已对研发中心进行过成功的潜袭时，才能使用本能力。
stripped_text: When you install this hardware, load 2 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, instead of breaching R&D, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to look at the top 4 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order. click, hosted power counter: Breach R&D. Use this ability only if you made a successful run on R&D this turn.

text_enUS: When you install this program, place 2 power counters on it. Hosted power counter: Gain 2[credit]. Use this ability only during your turn.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本程序时，放置2枚能量指示物到本程序上。 所附载的能量指示物：获得2[credit]。本能力仅能在你的回合中使用。
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 2 power counters on it. Hosted power counter: Gain 2 credits. Use this ability only during your turn.
flavor_enUS:
Breathe in.
Be as the dew rolling down a leaf; let yourself go.
Breathe out.
flavor_zhCN:
吸气。
把自己想象成露珠，在叶片上缓缓流下; 让自己往下流。
呼气。

text_enUS: When you install this program and whenever it fully breaks a code gate, place 1 power counter on this program. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. Interface → X[credit], hosted power counter: Break X barrier subroutines. 1[credit]: +2 strength.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本程序时，及每当你仅使用本程序破解所遭遇门禁上的所有子进程时，放置1枚能量指示物到本程序上。 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条门禁子进程。 对接 → X[credit]，所附载的能量指示物：破解X条屏障子进程。 1[credit]：强度+2。
stripped_text: When you install this program and whenever it fully breaks a code gate, place 1 power counter on this program. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. Interface -> X credits, hosted power counter: Break X barrier subroutines. 1 credit: +2 strength.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 解码模块 - 分解模块

text_enUS: When you install this program, search your stack, heap, or grip for 1 non-daemon program. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) If that program is a trojan, install it on a piece of ice. Otherwise, install it on this program.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本程序时，在你的存储栈、堆阵或操控器搜寻1个非后台程序。（在搜寻存储栈后将其洗混。）如果该程序是木马，将其安装到一层防火墙上。否则，将其安装到本程序上。
stripped_text: When you install this program, search your stack, heap, or grip for 1 non-daemon program. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) If that program is a trojan, install it on a piece of ice. Otherwise, install it on this program.
flavor_enUS: Vó, mentor, angel. Murdered by porcos. Never forgotten.
flavor_zhCN: 祖母，导师，天使。被条子杀死。誓不罢止。

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength. Threat 4 → 2[credit]: +9 strength. Use this ability only once per run. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.)
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条屏障子进程。 2[credit]：强度+3。 威胁4 → 2[credit]：强度+9。本能力每次潜袭仅限使用一次。（本能力在任一玩家有4点或更多议案分数时生效。）
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2 credits: +3 strength. Threat 4 -> 2 credits: +9 strength. Use this ability only once per run. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.)
flavor_enUS:
“If stress hurts, then it must be a weapon.”
— Beatriz Friere Gonzalez
flavor_zhCN:
“如果压力能伤人，那它必然是一把武器。”
—碧翠斯·弗里尔·冈萨雷斯

text_enUS: Whenever you breach R&D, if you are allowed to access 2 or more cards in R&D during this breach, you may access 1 additional card.
text_zhCN: 每当你侵入研发中心时，如果本次侵入中你被允许读取研发中心中的2张或更多卡牌，你可以额外读取1张卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever you breach R&D, if you are allowed to access 2 or more cards in R&D during this breach, you may access 1 additional card.
flavor_enUS: “Listen up, garotinha, maybe you'll learn something.”
flavor_zhCN: “好好听着，小可爱，说不定你能学到点东西呢。”

text_enUS:
Shuffle your grip and heap into your stack, then remove the top 5 cards of your stack from the game. Draw 5 cards.
Remove this event from the game.
text_zhCN:
将你的操控器与堆阵洗入你的存储栈，然后将你的存储栈顶端的5张卡牌移出游戏。抽5张卡牌。
将本事件移出游戏。
stripped_text: Shuffle your grip and heap into your stack, then remove the top 5 cards of your stack from the game. Draw 5 cards. Remove this event from the game.
flavor_enUS: Their victory became her coronation.
flavor_zhCN: 他们的胜利成就了她的加冕。

title_zhCN: 瓦伦蒂娜·费雷拉·卡瓦略
text_enUS: Whenever you remove 1 or more tags, gain 1[credit]. Threat 3 → When you install this resource during your turn, you may remove 1 tag or gain 2[credit]. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
text_zhCN: 每当你移除1枚或更多锁定标记时，获得1[credit]。 威胁3 → 当你在你的回合中安装本资源时，你可以移除1枚锁定标记或获得2[credit]。（本能力在任一玩家有3点或更多议案分数时生效。）
stripped_text: Whenever you remove 1 or more tags, gain 1 credit. Threat 3 -> When you install this resource during your turn, you may remove 1 tag or gain 2 credits. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
flavor_enUS: “I came home from Siberia to find a better purpose for myself.”
flavor_zhCN: “我从西伯利亚回到家乡，是为了寻求一个更好的人生目标。”

text_enUS: Whenever you rez a piece of AP or destroyer ice during a run, that ice gets +1 strength and gains “[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards.” after its other subroutines for the remainder of that run.
text_zhCN: 每当你在潜袭中激活一层杀伤或毁灭者防火墙时，在本次潜袭的剩余时间内，该防火墙的强度+1并在其它子进程后获得“[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者销毁1张其已安装的卡牌。”
stripped_text: Whenever you rez a piece of AP or destroyer ice during a run, that ice gets +1 strength and gains "Subroutine End the run unless the Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards." after its other subroutines for the remainder of that run.
flavor_enUS: Strength in the palm of your hand.
flavor_zhCN: 万钧之力，尽在掌握。

text_enUS:
When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it.
Whenever a run begins, you may remove 1 hosted agenda counter to rez up to 2 pieces of ice protecting the attacked server, ignoring all costs. When this turn ends, derez 2 pieces of ice protecting that server.
text_zhCN:
当你将本议案计分时，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。
每当一次潜袭开始时，你可以移除1枚所附载的议案指示物，以激活最多2层保护当前被攻击服务器的防火墙，忽略所有的费用。当本回合结束时，关闭2层保护该服务器的防火墙。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Whenever a run begins, you may remove 1 hosted agenda counter to rez up to 2 pieces of ice protecting the attacked server, ignoring all costs. When this turn ends, derez 2 pieces of ice protecting that server.
flavor_enUS: Where ideas strike twice!
flavor_zhCN: 灵感两度迸发之地！

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may install 1 card from HQ. You cannot score that card this turn. If this server is not protected by ice, you may derez this asset to derez another installed card.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以从总部安装1张卡牌。你本回合不能将该卡牌计分。如果没有防火墙保护本服务器，你可以关闭本资产，以关闭另一张已安装的卡牌。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may install 1 card from HQ. You cannot score that card this turn. If this server is not protected by ice, you may derez this asset to derez another installed card.
flavor_enUS: “I missed you last week! Come, we have lots to talk about. How was little Sarita's piano recital?”
flavor_zhCN: “我从上周就开始想你了！来，我有一堆话想找你聊！小萨丽塔的个人钢琴秀咋样了？”

text_enUS: Whenever you rez a card (including this asset), place 1 power counter on this asset. [click], hosted power counter: Gain 3[credit]. [click], 5 hosted power counters: Gain 6[credit]. Add 1 installed resource to the top of the stack.
text_zhCN: 每当你激活一张卡牌时（包括本资产在内），放置1枚能量指示物到本资产上。 [click]，所附载的能量指示物：获得3[credit]。 [click]，5枚所附载的能量指示物：获得6[credit]。将1个已安装的资源加入存储栈顶端。
stripped_text: Whenever you rez a card (including this asset), place 1 power counter on this asset. click, hosted power counter: Gain 3 credits. click, 5 hosted power counters: Gain 6 credits. Add 1 installed resource to the top of the stack.
flavor_enUS: “Just tilt your head a little to the right; the suit will soon sync with your cortical profile.”
flavor_zhCN: “脑袋再往右偏一点点。这套装备马上就能跟你的皮质轮廓同步了。”

text_enUS: When you rez this ice, choose 1 or more subtypes among barrier, code gate, and sentry. This ice gains the chosen subtypes while it remains rezzed. When a turn ends, derez this ice. [subroutine] If this ice is a code gate, the Runner loses [click] and 1[credit]. [subroutine] If this ice is a sentry, trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] If this ice is a barrier, gain 1[credit] and end the run.
text_zhCN: 当你激活本防火墙时，从屏障、门禁与警报中选择1个或更多子类型。在本防火墙处于激活状态的期间，其获得所选择的子类型。 当回合结束时，关闭本防火墙。 [subroutine] 如果本防火墙是门禁，潜袭者失去[click]与1[credit]。 [subroutine] 如果本防火墙是警报，销毁1个已安装的程序。 [subroutine] 如果本防火墙是屏障，获得1[credit]并终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice, choose 1 or more subtypes among barrier, code gate, and sentry. This ice gains the chosen subtypes while it remains rezzed. When a turn ends, derez this ice. Subroutine If this ice is a code gate, the Runner loses click and 1 credit. Subroutine If this ice is a sentry, trash 1 installed program. Subroutine If this ice is a barrier, gain 1 credit and end the run.

text_enUS:
You cannot trash more than 1 installed Runner card with this ice during each encounter.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed resource.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed piece of hardware.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
text_zhCN:
每次遭遇期间，你不能以本防火墙销毁多于1张已安装的潜袭者卡牌。
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的资源。
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的硬件。
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。
stripped_text: You cannot trash more than 1 installed Runner card with this ice during each encounter. Subroutine Trash 1 installed resource. Subroutine Trash 1 installed piece of hardware. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program.
flavor_enUS: At Thunderbolt, we ask: why not turn plowshares to swords?
flavor_zhCN: 在雷霆军工厂，我们提问：为什么不能化犁为剑呢？

text_enUS: Play only if the Runner stole or trashed a Corp card during their last turn. After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends. You may install 1 card from HQ. The Runner gets −1 allotted [click] for their next turn. Threat 3 → You may pay 2[credit]. If you do, the Runner gets −1 allotted [click] for their next turn. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
text_zhCN: 只有潜袭者在其上回合窃取或销毁过公司卡牌时，才能打出。 在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。 你可以从总部安装1张卡牌。潜袭者在其下回合获得的[click]数量-1。 威胁3 → 你可以支付2[credit]。如果你如此做，潜袭者在其下回合获得的[click]数量-1。（本能力在任一玩家有3点或更多议案分数时生效。）
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner stole or trashed a Corp card during their last turn. After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends. You may install 1 card from HQ. The Runner gets -1 allotted click for their next turn. Threat 3 -> You may pay 2 credits. If you do, the Runner gets -1 allotted click for their next turn. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Gain 6[credit] and draw 2 cards. Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
获得6[credit]并抽2张卡牌。将1张卡牌从档案库加入总部。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Gain 6 credits and draw 2 cards. Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
flavor_enUS: If you wait in the Thunderbolt corporate box long enough, everyone who is anyone comes by.
flavor_zhCN: 只要你在雷霆军工厂的团体包厢等得够久，是个有头有脸的人物你都能见得到。

text_enUS: Once per turn → When you rez a piece of ice during a run against this server, you may derez another installed piece of ice. If you do, the rezzed ice gets +3 strength for the remainder of that run. Limit 1 region per server.
text_zhCN: 每回合限一次 → 在对本服务器的潜袭中，当你激活一层防火墙时，你可以关闭另一层已安装的防火墙。如果你如此做，被激活的防火墙在本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度+3。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
stripped_text: Once per turn -> When you rez a piece of ice during a run against this server, you may derez another installed piece of ice. If you do, the rezzed ice gets +3 strength for the remainder of that run. Limit 1 region per server.
flavor_enUS: Thunderbolt naturally offered city hardening solutions.
flavor_zhCN: 雷霆军工厂当然能提供城市强化的解决方案。

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, give the Runner 1 tag. Play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0–2[credit]. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, do 1 core damage. If the bids match, do 1 net damage.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。进行一次灵能博弈。（双方玩家秘密决定0-2的数值，然后同时宣告并花费所声明数值的[credit]。）如果二者数值不同，造成1点核心伤害。如果二者数值相同，造成1点网域伤害。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, give the Runner 1 tag. Play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0-2 credits. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, do 1 core damage. If the bids match, do 1 net damage.
flavor_enUS:
“Be patient. When the prey panics, they lead you right to their friends.”
—Adrian Seis
flavor_zhCN:
“保持耐心。恐惧的猎物自会带你去找他的同伴们。”
—阿德里安·塞斯

text_enUS: The first time each turn the Runner passes a rezzed code gate or sentry, you may pay 1[credit] or trash 1 card from HQ. If you do, the Runner encounters that ice again.
text_zhCN: 每回合潜袭者第一次通过一层已激活的门禁或警报时，你可以支付1[credit]或从总部销毁1张卡牌。如果你如此做，潜袭者再次遭遇该防火墙。
stripped_text: The first time each turn the Runner passes a rezzed code gate or sentry, you may pay 1 credit or trash 1 card from HQ. If you do, the Runner encounters that ice again.
flavor_enUS:
“Every mind can be dulled by repetition, even our prey’s. Strike when they get complacent, but before you get bored.”
—Charlotte's fifth lesson
flavor_zhCN:
“一切头脑都会因重复而变得迟钝，我们的猎物也不例外。趁他们得意忘形时予以打击。”
—夏洛特的第五课

text_enUS: You can advance this asset. When your turn begins, you may remove 1 hosted advancement counter to gain 4[credit] and draw 1 card. [trash], hosted advancement counter: Gain 3[credit].
text_zhCN: 你可以推进本资产。 当你的回合开始时，你可以移除1枚所附载的推进指示物，以获得4[credit]并抽1张卡牌。 [trash]，所附载的推进指示物：获得3[credit]。
stripped_text: You can advance this asset. When your turn begins, you may remove 1 hosted advancement counter to gain 4 credits and draw 1 card. trash, hosted advancement counter: Gain 3 credits.
flavor_enUS: “They offered me a desk job, but dammit, I just love working in the field.”
flavor_zhCN: “他们给了我一份坐着的工作，但我他妈只想干可以站着的活。”

text_enUS:
When your turn begins, you may resolve 1 of the following:
  • Trash 1 card from HQ. If you do, gain 2[credit] and draw 1 card.
  • Turn 1 facedown card in Archives faceup. If you do, place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.
text_zhCN:
当你的回合开始时，你可以结算下列中的1项：
  • 从总部销毁1张卡牌。如果你如此做，获得2[credit]并抽1张卡牌。
  • 将档案库中1张牌面朝下的卡牌翻至牌面朝上。如果你如此做，放置1枚推进指示物到一张已安装的卡牌上。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may resolve 1 of the following: * Trash 1 card from HQ. If you do, gain 2 credits and draw 1 card. * Turn 1 facedown card in Archives faceup. If you do, place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.
flavor_enUS: The best families grow, learn, and hunt together.
flavor_zhCN: 完美的家庭中，大家共同成长，共同学习，共同狩猎。

text_enUS: Threat 4 → This ice gets +2 strength. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) [subroutine] Do 2 net damage. [subroutine] You may trash 1 card from HQ to end the run. [subroutine] You may trash 1 card from HQ to end the run.
text_zhCN: 威胁4 → 本防火墙的强度+2。（本能力在任一玩家有4点或更多议案分数时生效。） [subroutine] 造成2点网域伤害。 [subroutine] 你可以从总部销毁1张卡牌以终止本次潜袭。 [subroutine] 你可以从总部销毁1张卡牌以终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Threat 4 -> This ice gets +2 strength. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) Subroutine Do 2 net damage. Subroutine You may trash 1 card from HQ to end the run. Subroutine You may trash 1 card from HQ to end the run.
flavor_enUS: They live forever in the rivers of the Net.
flavor_zhCN: 它们在网域长河中永生。

text_enUS:
Whenever an encounter with this ice ends, if it was rezzed this turn, trash 1 installed Runner card unless the Runner takes 2 tags or suffers 3 net damage.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed Runner card.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 2 tags.
[subroutine] Do 3 net damage.
text_zhCN:
每当对本防火墙的遭遇结束时，如果本防火墙是在本回合中被激活的，销毁1张已安装的潜袭者卡牌，除非潜袭者拿取2枚锁定标记或受到3点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 销毁1张已安装的潜袭者卡牌。
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者2枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 造成3点网域伤害。
stripped_text: Whenever an encounter with this ice ends, if it was rezzed this turn, trash 1 installed Runner card unless the Runner takes 2 tags or suffers 3 net damage. Subroutine Trash 1 installed Runner card. Subroutine Give the Runner 2 tags. Subroutine Do 3 net damage.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 杀伤 - 毁灭者 - 观察者
flavor_enUS: Don’t let it catch your scent.
flavor_zhCN: 别让它嗅到你的气味。

text_enUS: The first time each turn a run begins, you may move this ice to the outermost position protecting the attacked server. (The Runner will approach this ice.) [subroutine] You may draw 1 card. You may install 1 piece of ice from HQ protecting another server, ignoring all costs. [subroutine] Each piece of ice gets +2 strength for the remainder of this run.
text_zhCN: 每回合第一次潜袭开始时，你可以将本防火墙转移到保护被攻击的服务器的最外侧位置。（潜袭者将接驳本防火墙。） [subroutine] 你可以抽1张卡牌。你可以从总部安装1层防火墙保护另一台服务器，忽略所有的费用。 [subroutine] 本次潜袭的剩余时间内，每层防火墙的强度+2。
stripped_text: The first time each turn a run begins, you may move this ice to the outermost position protecting the attacked server. (The Runner will approach this ice.) Subroutine You may draw 1 card. You may install 1 piece of ice from HQ protecting another server, ignoring all costs. Subroutine Each piece of ice gets +2 strength for the remainder of this run.

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner stole or trashed a Corp card during their last turn.
After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends.
Reveal and add 2 cards at random from the grip to the top of the stack.
Threat 3 → You may pay 2[credit] to reveal 1 card in the grip at random. The Runner shuffles it into the stack.
text_zhCN:
只有潜袭者在其上回合窃取或销毁过公司卡牌时，才能打出。
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
从操控器随机展示2张卡牌，并将其依次加入存储栈顶端。
威胁3 → 你可以支付2[credit]，以随机展示操控器中的1张卡牌。潜袭者将其洗入存储栈。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner stole or trashed a Corp card during their last turn. After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends. Reveal and add 2 cards at random from the grip to the top of the stack. Threat 3 -> You may pay 2 credits to reveal 1 card in the grip at random. The Runner shuffles it into the stack.

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, draw up to 3 cards. You may add 1 agenda worth 1 or less agenda points from HQ to your score area.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，抽最多3张卡牌。你可以从总部将1个价值1点或更少议案分数的议案加入你的分数区。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, draw up to 3 cards. You may add 1 agenda worth 1 or less agenda points from HQ to your score area.
flavor_enUS:
“We are close, so close, to the endgame now, my friends. If we can convert just three more, the Automata Initiative is all but through the senate.”
—The Holo Man
flavor_zhCN:
“我们离收官已经很接近很接近了，我的朋友。只要能再转化三个议员，参议院通过自动机倡议已成定局。”
—全息人

text_enUS:
When you score this agenda, gain 3[credit] and place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.
When you install this agenda from anywhere except HQ, you may reveal it. If you do, gain 2[credit] and place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.
text_zhCN:
当你将本议案计分时，获得3[credit]并放置1枚推进指示物到一张已安装的卡牌上。
当你从总部以外其他区域安装本议案时，你可以展示之。如果你如此做，获得2[credit]并放置1枚推进指示物到一张已安装的卡牌上。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, gain 3 credits and place 1 advancement counter on an installed card. When you install this agenda from anywhere except HQ, you may reveal it. If you do, gain 2 credits and place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.
flavor_enUS: “Up next: President Tavares' state funeral.”
flavor_zhCN: “即将播出：塔瓦雷斯总统的国葬。”

text_enUS: When your turn begins, place 3[credit] on this asset. [click], add this asset to HQ: Take all credits from this asset. You may install 1 card from HQ.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，放置3[credit]到本资产上。 [click]，将本资产加入总部：拿取本资产上所有的信用点。你可以从总部安装1张卡牌。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, place 3 credits on this asset. click, add this asset to HQ: Take all credits from this asset. You may install 1 card from HQ.
flavor_enUS: She loved being part of the rough and tumble of politics and fundraising—from the calm of her own home.
flavor_zhCN: 她喜欢参与政治和筹款的风风雨雨——在自身足不出户的前提下。

text_enUS:
While the Runner is tagged, this ice gets +2 strength.
[subroutine] Gain 1[credit] for each tag the Runner has.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
只要潜袭者被锁定，本防火墙的强度便+2。
[subroutine] 潜袭者每有1枚锁定标记，获得1[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: While the Runner is tagged, this ice gets +2 strength. Subroutine Gain 1 credit for each tag the Runner has. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Sebastião gritted his teeth as more and more indicators glowed red.
flavor_zhCN: 指示灯逐个转红，塞巴斯蒂安咬紧牙关。

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity or remove 1 tag.
[subroutine] You may draw 1 card.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] End the run if there are more cards in HQ than in the grip.
text_zhCN:
作为激活本防火墙的额外费用，拿取1枚负面声誉标记或移除1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 你可以抽1张卡牌。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 如果总部中的卡牌数量多于操控器，终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity or remove 1 tag. Subroutine You may draw 1 card. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. Subroutine End the run if there are more cards in HQ than in the grip.
subtype_zhCN: 门禁 - 非法 - 杀伤
flavor_enUS: Eat, grow, deny. A truly ravenous generation.
flavor_zhCN: 撕咬，疯长，将入侵者拒之门外。真是如狼似虎的一代。

text_enUS:
When the Runner encounters this ice, they lose 3[credit] unless they suffer 2 net damage or take 1 tag.
[subroutine] The Runner loses 3[credit].
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag.
text_zhCN:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，其失去3[credit]，除非其受到2点网域伤害或拿取1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去3[credit]。
[subroutine] 造成2点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, they lose 3 credits unless they suffer 2 net damage or take 1 tag. Subroutine The Runner loses 3 credits. Subroutine Do 2 net damage. Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 杀伤 - 观察者 - 深网
flavor_enUS:
“Starlight called it a gift. I call it providence.”
—The Holo Man
flavor_zhCN:
“星光称之为礼物。我称之为天意。”
—全息人

text_enUS: Draw 2 cards. You may play 1 non-terminal operation from HQ. Threat 3 → If this operation is the first mandate you played this turn, you may pay 3[credit] to gain [click]. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
text_zhCN: 抽2张卡牌。你可以从总部打出1个非终止事务。 威胁3 → 如果本事务是你本回合打出的第一个命令，你可以支付3[credit]，以获得[click]。（本能力在任一玩家有3点或更多议案分数时生效。）
stripped_text: Draw 2 cards. You may play 1 non-terminal operation from HQ. Threat 3 -> If this operation is the first mandate you played this turn, you may pay 3 credits to gain click. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
flavor_enUS: Epiphany employees learned not to make weekend plans.
flavor_zhCN: 超觉分析的员工早就知道，周末不能留给自己。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may move this upgrade to the root of another server. Once per turn → [click], 4[credit]: Place 2 advancement counters on 1 card in the root of or protecting this server. If you have not installed any cards from HQ this turn, instead place 3 advancement counters on that card.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以将本升级转移到另一台服务器的根目录。 每回合限一次 → [click]，4[credit]：放置2枚推进指示物到本服务器根目录中或保护本服务器的一张卡牌上。如果你本回合没有从总部安装过卡牌，则改为放置3枚推进指示物到该卡牌上。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may move this upgrade to the root of another server. Once per turn -> click, 4[credit]: Place 2 advancement counters on 1 card in the root of or protecting this server. If you have not installed any cards from HQ this turn, instead place 3 advancement counters on that card.
subtype_zhCN: 学术 - 主管 - 管理员

title_enUS: Nuvem SA: Law of the Land
title_zhCN: 纽文股份有限公司：土地之法
stripped_title: Nuvem SA: Law of the Land
text_enUS: Whenever you finish resolving an operation or an action on an expendable card, look at the top card of R&D. You may trash that card. The first time you trash a card from R&D during each of your turns, gain 2[credit].
text_zhCN: 每当你结算完一个事务或一张可消耗卡牌上的一个行动，查看研发中心顶端的卡牌。你可以销毁该卡牌。 每个你的回合中，你第一次从研发中心销毁一张卡牌时，获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Whenever you finish resolving an operation or an action on an expendable card, look at the top card of R&D. You may trash that card. The first time you trash a card from R&D during each of your turns, gain 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: Our fist shall hold the world.
flavor_zhCN: 我们的铁拳将掌控世界。

text_enUS: [click], 1[credit], reveal and trash this agenda from HQ: Install and rez 1 card from HQ, paying a total of 5[credit] less. When you score this agenda, you may search R&D for 1 card. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Install and rez that card, ignoring all costs.
text_zhCN: [click]，1[credit]，从总部展示并销毁本议案：从总部安装并激活1张卡牌，总费用减5[credit]。 当你将本议案计分时，你可以在研发中心搜寻1张卡牌并展示之。（在搜寻研发中心后将其洗混。）安装并激活该卡牌，忽略所有的费用。
stripped_text: click, 1 credit, reveal and trash this agenda from HQ: Install and rez 1 card from HQ, paying a total of 5 credits less. When you score this agenda, you may search R&D for 1 card. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Install and rez that card, ignoring all costs.
flavor_enUS: Young Gael Oliveira agreed to stay on and manage the farm, for a fee.
flavor_zhCN: 年轻的盖尔·奥利维拉同意作为雇员，留下来继续管理农场。

text_enUS: When the Runner steals this agenda, you may add 1 card from Archives to HQ. When you score this agenda, place 2 agenda counters on it. Once per turn → Hosted agenda counter, trash the top card of R&D: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
text_zhCN: 当潜袭者窃取本议案时，你可以将1张卡牌从档案库加入总部。 当你将本议案计分时，放置2枚议案指示物到本议案上。 每回合限一次 → 所附载的议案指示物，销毁研发中心顶端的卡牌：将1张卡牌从档案库加入总部。
stripped_text: When the Runner steals this agenda, you may add 1 card from Archives to HQ. When you score this agenda, place 2 agenda counters on it. Once per turn ->  Hosted agenda counter, trash the top card of R&D: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
flavor_enUS:
High above, Braganza schemes,
Of force, fire, and basalt dreams.
flavor_zhCN:
尖塔之上，布拉甘萨正擘画。
火石之间，庞然要塞来征伐。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, you may move 1 advancement counter from an installed card to an installed card you can advance. If this server is not protected by ice, you may also place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，你可以从一张已安装的卡牌上转移1枚推进指示物到一张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌上。如果没有防火墙保护本服务器，你还可以放置1枚推进指示物到一张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌上。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may move 1 advancement counter from an installed card to an installed card you can advance. If this server is not protected by ice, you may also place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.
flavor_enUS:
“General, for a successful coup d'état, you need the people on your side.”
—CEO Braganza
flavor_zhCN:
“将军，想政变成功，您要得民心才行。”
—CEO布拉甘萨

text_enUS: [click], 1[credit], reveal and trash this ice from HQ: Draw 1 card. Reveal up to 2 agendas in HQ and/or Archives and shuffle them into R&D. When your turn begins, you may add this ice to HQ. [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: [click]，1[credit]，从总部展示并销毁本防火墙：抽1张卡牌。展示总部和/或档案库中的最多2个议案，并将其洗入研发中心。 当你的回合开始时，你可以将本防火墙加入总部。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: click, 1 credit, reveal and trash this ice from HQ: Draw 1 card. Reveal up to 2 agendas in HQ and/or Archives and shuffle them into R&D. When your turn begins, you may add this ice to HQ. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: A little circular reasoning never hurt anybody.
flavor_zhCN: 一点点循环论证不会有什么害处的。

text_enUS: During each encounter with this ice, the Runner cannot break more than 1 of its printed subroutines except using killers. [subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed resource or piece of hardware. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program that is not a decoder, fracter, or killer.
text_zhCN: 每次遭遇本防火墙期间，潜袭者不能以使用断路模块以外的其他方式破解超过1条本防火墙上的印刷子进程。 [subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。 [subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的资源或硬件。 [subroutine] 销毁1个不是解码模块、分解模块或断路模块的已安装的程序。

Subroutine Trash 1 installed resource or piece of hardware. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program that is not a decoder, fracter, or killer.
subtype_zhCN: 警报 - 毁灭者 - 观察者
flavor_enUS: The final blow is struck.
flavor_zhCN: 最后一击锤下。

text_enUS:
You can advance this ice. It gets +1 strength for each hosted advancement counter.
When you rez this ice, place 1 advancement counter on it plus 1 advancement counter for each card type among faceup cards in Archives.
[subroutine] Gain 2[credit]. End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.

你可以推进本防火墙。每有1枚所附载的推进指示物，本防火墙的强度+1。
当你激活本防火墙时，放置1枚推进指示物到本防火墙上，并且档案库中牌面朝上的卡牌中每有1种卡牌类型，推进指示物数量增加1枚。
[subroutine] 获得2[credit]。终止本次潜袭。

[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。

text_enUS:
Resolve 1 of the following:
  • Place 1 advancement counter on each of up to 2 installed cards you can advance.
  • Remove all virus counters from 1 installed card.
Threat 3 → You may also resolve the other mode. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
text_zhCN:
结算下列中的1项：
  • 在最多2张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌上各放置1枚推进指示物。
  • 从1张已安装的卡牌上移除所有病毒指示物。
威胁3 → 你还可以结算另一项。（本能力在任一玩家有3点或更多议案分数时生效。）
stripped_text: Resolve 1 of the following: * Place 1 advancement counter on each of up to 2 installed cards you can advance. * Remove all virus counters from 1 installed card. Threat 3 -> You may also resolve the other mode. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
flavor_enUS: Don’t think about it. You’ll sleep better.
flavor_zhCN: 少操心，多睡觉。

text_enUS:
Each advanced piece of ice protecting this server gets +2 strength.
Whenever this upgrade moves to the root of a server, you may place 1 advancement counter on a piece of ice protecting that server that has no advancement counters.
When your turn ends, you may move this upgrade to the root of another server.
text_zhCN:
所有保护本服务器的已推进的防火墙的强度+2。
每当本升级转移到一台服务器的根目录时，你可以放置1枚推进指示物到一层保护本服务器且没有推进指示物的防火墙上。
当你的回合结束时，你可以将本升级转移到另一台服务器的根目录。
stripped_text: Each advanced piece of ice protecting this server gets +2 strength. Whenever this upgrade moves to the root of a server, you may place 1 advancement counter on a piece of ice protecting that server that has no advancement counters. When your turn ends, you may move this upgrade to the root of another server.

text_enUS: Whenever you score an agenda, you may install 1 card from HQ or Archives, ignoring all costs.
text_zhCN: 每当你将一个议案计分时，你可以从总部或档案库安装1张卡牌，忽略所有的费用。
stripped_text: Whenever you score an agenda, you may install 1 card from HQ or Archives, ignoring all costs.
flavor_enUS:
“I followed every lead, and found the rot ran deep from Epiphany, worming into every branch of gov'. I saw my imperative, clear as day: these three had to die. And I had to find a way to do it.”
—Mercury
flavor_zhCN:
“我跟踪了每一条线索，发现腐败现象已经从超觉分析深处蔓延到了政府的每个部门。我非常清楚我的使命：这三个人必须死。我得找到完成这件事的办法。”
—墨丘利

title_enUS: Ryō “Phoenix” Ōno: Out of the Ashes
stripped_title: Ryo "Phoenix" Ono: Out of the Ashes
text_enUS: The first time each turn a run becomes successful after a subroutine resolved during that run, gain 1[credit] and the Corp trashes 1 card from HQ.
text_zhCN: 每回合第一次，当结算过子进程的潜袭成功时，获得1[credit]并且公司从总部销毁1张卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time each turn a run becomes successful after a subroutine resolved during that run, gain 1 credit and the Corp trashes 1 card from HQ.
flavor_enUS: Light up, flame out, and burn it all down.
flavor_zhCN: 燃亮，炽灭，焰焚万象。
narrative_enUS:
Phoenix waved goodbye as his parents ‘enrolled’ xim in Nebula’s Protostar program for young performers. For the next decade, Nebula controlled eir education, diet, health, dress, and friends, modeling her to be the next big pop idol.
Under pressure to succeed and the absolute control of NBN, ze went supernova. It ran away from everything, escaping to the slums of Kota Kalimantan. Now, their only goal in life is to burn down everything Nebula stands for, before burning out emself.

text_enUS: Once per turn → [click]: Install 1 card from your grip, paying 2[credit] less. When you install that card, suffer 1 meat damage.
text_zhCN: 每回合限一次 → [click]：从你的操控器安装1张卡牌，其安装费用减2[credit]。当你安装该卡牌时，受到1点肢体伤害。
stripped_text: Once per turn -> click: Install 1 card from your grip, paying 2 credits less. When you install that card, suffer 1 meat damage.
flavor_enUS: Whatever it takes for us to survive.
flavor_zhCN: 生存所需，在所不惜。
narrative_enUS:
It was the ormas family violence shelter that took Topan in and gave them time to rediscover themself. Now an ormas leader, Topan helps achieve their goal: empowering Dayak people.
Some question Topan’s methods. “Too preman,” people mutter, as Topan uses standover tactics that rival a prisec team. “Too girly,” others say, watching Topan extract information with a wink and a low-cut blouse. Topan doesn’t care. Dayaks are losing their forest to a space elevator, their livelihoods to androids. It’s no time for ‘proper’ methods.

text_enUS: Run Archives. When that run ends, you may trash 1 rezzed copy of a card you accessed in Archives during that run.
text_zhCN: 潜袭档案库。当本次潜袭结束时，你可以销毁1张与你本次潜袭中从档案库读取过的一张卡牌同名的已激活卡牌。
stripped_text: Run Archives. When that run ends, you may trash 1 rezzed copy of a card you accessed in Archives during that run.
flavor_enUS: “I’ll use what I have to get what I want.”
flavor_zhCN: “我不介意用尽手段得到所求。”

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Install 1 program from your heap. You may add 1 program from your heap to the bottom of your stack.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，花费[click]。
从你的堆阵安装1个程序。你可以将1个程序从你的堆阵加入你的存储栈底端。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Install 1 program from your heap. You may add 1 program from your heap to the bottom of your stack.
flavor_enUS:
“99% of everything is trash. That’s why I pay someone else to search it for me.”
—Sturg3on_General
flavor_zhCN:
“世间万物99%都是垃圾，所以我雇人替我筛选。”
—鲟将军

text_enUS: Run any server. The first time the Corp would end that run, prevent the run from ending unless the Corp reveals and trashes X cards from HQ at random. X is equal to the number of cards in the root of the attacked server.
text_zhCN: 潜袭任意一台服务器。公司第一次将要终止本次潜袭时，防止潜袭被终止，除非公司从总部随机展示并销毁X张卡牌。X等于被攻击服务器根目录中的卡牌数量。
stripped_text: Run any server. The first time the Corp would end that run, prevent the run from ending unless the Corp reveals and trashes X cards from HQ at random. X is equal to the number of cards in the root of the attacked server.
flavor_enUS: The volume is the message.
flavor_zhCN: 音量即是宣言。

text_enUS: +1[mu] Whenever you install a card without spending credits, you may host the top card of your stack faceup on this hardware. (It is not installed.) You can play or install hosted cards as if they were in your grip. When your discard phase ends, trash all hosted cards. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu] 每当你安装一张卡牌且未花费信用点时，你可以将你的存储栈顶端的卡牌牌面朝上附载到本硬件上。（它没有被安装。） 你可以打出或安装所附载的卡牌，如同其在你的操控器中。 当你的弃牌阶段结束时，销毁所附载的所有卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu Whenever you install a card without spending credits, you may host the top card of your stack faceup on this hardware. (It is not installed.) You can play or install hosted cards as if they were in your grip. When your discard phase ends, trash all hosted cards. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: Access → [trash]: Trash the non-agenda card you are accessing. If you do, draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: 读取 → [trash]：销毁你正在读取的非议案卡牌。如果你如此做，抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: Access -> trash: Trash the non-agenda card you are accessing. If you do, draw 1 card.

text_enUS: When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. Hosted virus counter: +2 strength.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本程序时，放置2枚病毒指示物到本程序上。 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条警报子进程。 所附载的病毒指示物：强度+2。
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. Hosted virus counter: +2 strength.
subtype_zhCN: 破解器 - 断路模块 - 病毒
flavor_enUS:
“I’m on retainer for monthly purges on thirty-six different servers.”
—Ratu Maharani, pawang virus
flavor_zhCN:
“我为三十六台不同的服务器提供每月杀毒服务。”
—拉图·玛哈拉尼，病毒驯师

text_enUS: This program gets +1 strength for each fracter in your heap. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
text_zhCN: 你的堆阵中每有一个分解模块，本程序的强度+1。 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条屏障子进程。 1[credit]：强度+1。
stripped_text: This program gets +1 strength for each fracter in your heap. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.
flavor_enUS: The waters begin to roil, and bit by bit they swell.
flavor_zhCN: 水面开始翻腾，暗潮逐渐汹涌。

text_enUS: The first time each turn you steal or trash a Corp card, place 1 power counter on this resource. When your action phase ends, you may remove 2 hosted power counters to sabotage 3. (The Corp trashes 3 cards of their choice from HQ and/or the top of R&D.)
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次窃取或销毁公司卡牌时，放置1枚能量指示物到本资源上。 当你的行动阶段结束时，你可以移除2枚所附载的能量指示物以破坏3。（公司选择从总部和/或研发中心顶端销毁3张卡牌。）
stripped_text: The first time each turn you steal or trash a Corp card, place 1 power counter on this resource. When your action phase ends, you may remove 2 hosted power counters to sabotage 3. (The Corp trashes 3 cards of their choice from HQ and/or the top of R&D.)
flavor_enUS:
“Nil SIR, black noise, lost girls, drowned boys!”
—Ryō “Phoenix” Ōno
flavor_zhCN:
“朱雀立，黑噪起，男俱溺，女皆迷！”
—大野·“凤凰”·燎

text_enUS: [click][click][click],[trash]: Gain 9[credit].
text_zhCN: [click][click][click]，[trash]：获得9[credit]。
stripped_text: click click click,trash: Gain 9 credits.
flavor_enUS: “In the end, they raised the rent and we were out on the street. But the riots had tanked property values so much we moved back in—with a better deal!”
flavor_zhCN: “最后他们涨了房租赶我们走，但暴动让房价暴跌——我们搬回来了，还谈了个好价钱！”

title_zhCN: 巴里·“巴兹”·王：三和党老江湖
text_enUS: Whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice, you may install 1 resource or piece of hardware from your grip.
text_zhCN: 每当公司激活一层防火墙时，你可以从你的操控器安装1个资源或硬件。
stripped_text: Whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice, you may install 1 resource or piece of hardware from your grip.
flavor_enUS: Try me.
flavor_zhCN: 比划比划？
narrative_enUS:
The Tri-Maf has been in Kota Kali from the beginning, and Baz right along with it. In a megacity on the rise, no one noticed his own brutal, bloody elevation until he’d entrenched himself at the top. Now, he does business with the wealthy and powerful, as likely to shake hands with an exec as he is to get his hands dirty on the streets.
Yeah, sometimes that business means turning on the corp he did a favor for last week. So what? They’ll need him again, eventually, and all will be forgiven. Things move fast in Kota Kali.

title_zhCN: 穆斯莉哈特：多面营销专家
text_enUS: When your turn begins, look at the top card of your stack. If that card is an icebreaker or a run event, you may reveal it and add it to your grip.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，查看你的存储栈顶端的卡牌。如果该卡牌是一个破解器或潜袭事件，你可以展示之，并将其加入你的操控器。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, look at the top card of your stack. If that card is an icebreaker or a run event, you may reveal it and add it to your grip.
flavor_enUS: Peer pressure works.
flavor_zhCN: 同行压力最有效。
narrative_enUS: When MuslihaT graduated from KKU with top marks, she never expected to be rejected from her dream job at NBN. She tried again: rejected, and the same from every other megacorp. So, she set up her own one-woman marketing firm. Using botnets, aliases, and borrowed avatars, the local businesses she promoted suddenly gained traction. Meanwhile, their competitors experienced scathing reviews and faulty orders. MuslihaT was out to prove herself. She’d be plucky, clever and win against the powerful—just like her beloved Sang Kancil.

text_enUS: Run any server. If successful, gain 6[credit].
text_zhCN: 潜袭任意一台服务器。如果成功，获得6[credit]。
stripped_text: Run any server. If successful, gain 6 credits.
flavor_enUS:
“…one-hundred and twenty-seven rounds fired, and two police hoppers totaled. Miraculously, no officers were hurt, though the suspect remains at large.”
—Abdul el-Sattar, KKN 6
flavor_zhCN:
“……一百二十七发子弹，两辆警用飞跃车报废。奇迹般无警员伤亡，嫌犯仍在逃。”
—阿卜杜勒·萨塔尔，KKN 6

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click]. Resolve 1 of the following:
  • Draw 4 cards.
  • Remove up to 2 tags.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，花费[click]。
结算下列中的1项：
- 抽4张卡牌。
- 移除最多2枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Resolve 1 of the following: * Draw 4 cards. * Remove up to 2 tags.
flavor_enUS: “Pity the money’s being spent here, when I could be buying hiasan for my apartment.”
flavor_zhCN: “真可惜钱花在了这里，本可以打扮一下我的公寓。”

text_enUS: As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click]. Run Archives. When you would approach Archives (after passing all ice), instead change the attacked server to HQ and approach HQ.
text_zhCN: 作为打出本事件的额外费用，花费[click]。 潜袭档案库。当你将要接驳档案库时（通过所有防火墙后），将被攻击的服务器改为总部并接驳总部。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Run Archives. When you would approach Archives (after passing all ice), instead change the attacked server to HQ and approach HQ.
flavor_enUS:
“Don’t let self-respect get in the way of a good shortcut.”
—“G0ph3r” OʼRyan
flavor_zhCN:
“别让自尊心挡住捷径。”
—“D鼠”·奥莱恩

text_enUS: Run HQ. If successful, take 1 tag and the Corp loses 3[credit]. Gain 2[credit] for each credit lost this way.
text_zhCN: 潜袭总部。如果成功，拿取1枚锁定标记并且公司失去3[credit]。公司每以此法失去1个信用点，你获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: Run HQ. If successful, take 1 tag and the Corp loses 3 credits. Gain 2 credits for each credit lost this way.
flavor_enUS:
“In KK, we say ‘harimau mati karena belangnya’. It means don't tell the world how much money you have if you plan on keeping it.”
—JokoR
flavor_zhCN:
“加里曼丹城有句老话，‘虎死于斑纹’——有钱就别显摆。”
—佐哥

text_enUS: +1[mu] The first time each turn you make a successful run on HQ, you may host 1 card from HQ at random faceup on this hardware. (It is not installed or rezzed.) [click], add 2 hosted cards to HQ: The Runner may access 1 card in HQ at random. Any player can use this ability. Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: +1[mu] 每回合你第一次对总部进行成功的潜袭时，你可以从总部随机将1张卡牌牌面朝上附载到本硬件上。（它没有被安装或激活。） [click]，将2张所附载的卡牌加入总部：潜袭者可以随机读取总部中的1张卡牌。双方玩家都可以使用本能力。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: +1 mu The first time each turn you make a successful run on HQ, you may host 1 card from HQ at random faceup on this hardware. (It is not installed or rezzed.) click, add 2 hosted cards to HQ: The Runner may access 1 card in HQ at random. Any player can use this ability. Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, you may trash this hardware to derez 1 installed Corp card.
text_zhCN: 每当你对总部进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以销毁本硬件，以关闭1张已安装的公司卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, you may trash this hardware to derez 1 installed Corp card.
flavor_enUS:
“You think I’ve finished messing with you?
Yeah, nah.”
—Barry “Baz” Wong
flavor_zhCN:
“真当老子收拾够你们了？
想得美。”
—巴里·“巴兹”·王

text_enUS: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 3[credit]: +2 strength. If a run event is active, this ability costs 2[credit] less to use.
text_zhCN: 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条门禁子进程。 3[credit]：强度+2。如果一个潜袭事件正在生效，本能力的费用减2[credit]。
stripped_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 3 credits: +2 strength. If a run event is active, this ability costs 2 credits less to use.
flavor_enUS: Consequences only matter if they catch you.
flavor_zhCN: 只要不被抓到，后果就无所谓。

text_enUS: The rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 1[credit]. Whenever you encounter a piece of ice, if the Corp has 15[credit] or more, you may trash this resource to bypass that ice. (Pass that ice. No subroutines or further "when encountered" abilities resolve.)
text_zhCN: 每层防火墙的激活费用加1[credit]。 每当你遭遇一层防火墙时，如果公司有15[credit]或更多，你可以销毁本资源以略过该防火墙。（通过该防火墙。不再结算子进程或其他“遭遇时”能力。）
stripped_text: The rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 1 credit. Whenever you encounter a piece of ice, if the Corp has 15 credits or more, you may trash this resource to bypass that ice. (Pass that ice. No subroutines or further "when encountered" abilities resolve.)
flavor_enUS:
“She’s learned from the best: me. When I retire, the KK Tri-Maf’ll be in good hands.”
—Barry “Baz” Wong
flavor_zhCN:
“她有个最好的师傅：我。等我退休后，KK三和党将会交给一把好手。”
—巴里·“巴兹”·王

text_enUS: When you install this resource, load 6[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. You can spend hosted credits to install connection and job resources. When your turn begins, take 1[credit] from this resource.
text_zhCN: 当你安装本资源时，填装6[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。 你可以花费所附载的信用点，以安装人脉与工作资源。 当你的回合开始时，从本资源上拿取1[credit]。
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 6 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. You can spend hosted credits to install connection and job resources. When your turn begins, take 1 credit from this resource.
flavor_enUS:
“That kepo NBN gang makes trillions off incidental data scraping. So what if I use it to network?”
—MuslihaT
flavor_zhCN:
“NBN那帮好管闲事的靠数据刮削赚了上万亿，凭啥我不能用它开发新客户？”
—穆斯莉哈特

title_zhCN: 德薇·苏布罗托普特里：教学引戏人
text_enUS: Whenever you make a successful run, if your [mu] is full, you may flip this identity and gain 1[credit]. Back: Dewi Subrotoputri: Shadow Guide Whenever you make a successful run, if you have at least 1 unused [mu], you may flip this identity and draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: 每当你进行一次成功的潜袭时，如果你没有剩余的[mu]，你可以将本特性翻面并获得1[credit]。 翻面 德薇·苏布罗托普特里：暗影引路人 每当你进行一次成功的潜袭时，如果你有至少1个剩余的[mu]，你可以将本特性翻面并抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text:
Whenever you make a successful run, if your  mu is full, you may flip this identity and gain 1 credit.
Back: Dewi Subrotoputri: Shadow Guide
Whenever you make a successful run, if you have at least 1 unused  mu, you may flip this identity and draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS:
Who else will teach the stories of good and evil?
We can’t leave the corps’ dirty deeds in the shadows.
flavor_zhCN:
还有谁会来讲述这些善恶的故事呢？
我们不能让公司的肮脏勾当继续隐藏在暗影之中。
narrative_enUS:
Everyone knew Dewi was destined to be a performer. But what sort? A Shortstok influencer? Holo artist? Sensie streamer? She tried them all; none felt right. Finally, she found her calling in Solo’s 1000-year-old style of wayang kulit.
The clear morality and timeless characters allow her to pass judgment on current events. When the audience has her back, she can improvise, splice in some corp secrets.
Traditions that can adapt are traditions that survive, and through Dewi, they might even thrive.

title_zhCN: 玛格达琳·凯诺-切穆泰：幕后建筑师
text_enUS: Whenever you discard cards to reach your maximum hand size, you may install 1 program or piece of hardware from among those cards.
text_zhCN: 每当你弃牌到你的手牌上限时，你可以从所弃除卡牌中安装1个程序或硬件。
stripped_text: Whenever you discard cards to reach your maximum hand size, you may install 1 program or piece of hardware from among those cards.
flavor_enUS: Good design is invisible—but I’ll never settle for ‘good’.
flavor_zhCN: 好的设计是无形的——但我从不仅仅满足于“好”。
narrative_enUS:
Magdalene was an architect on the Nalubaale elevator, which earned them the top spot for OSEAN’s own Mahkota Langit. But when Mag’s hacktivist past was revealed, she were ousted. Now, she uses her old hacking skills to maintain control of the project. Adjusting blueprints by night; manipulating workers by day. Magdalene will see her vision realized.
And when it’s finished? If an engineering project like that was easy, what’s to stop Mag from slowly, secretly reshaping a megacity in their own image? Or a continent? Or a planet?

text_enUS: Run R&D. If successful, install up to 3 cards from your grip (one at a time), paying 1[credit] less for each.
text_zhCN: 潜袭研发中心。如果成功，从你的操控器安装最多3张卡牌（每次一张），每张安装费用减1[credit]。
stripped_text: Run R&D. If successful, install up to 3 cards from your grip (one at a time), paying 1 credit less for each.
flavor_enUS: “Won’t she get in trouble for putting that in the show? And how did she even find out?!”
flavor_zhCN: “她把这编进节目不怕惹事？而且她是怎么发现这件事的？！”

text_enUS: Draw 1 card for each [click] you have remaining.
text_zhCN: 你每有一个剩余的[click]，抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: Draw 1 card for each click you have remaining.
flavor_enUS: Every day starts the same: tea, news, a threedee puzzle. Then it’s off to work. Magdalene won’t let being fired get in the way of completing her masterpiece.
flavor_zhCN: 每一天都以相同的方式开始：喝茶、看新闻、一幅三维拼图。然后开始干活。玛格达琳不会让被解雇这件事阻碍她完成自己的杰作。

text_enUS: When you install this hardware and when your turn begins, you may host this hardware on an installed non-AI icebreaker. Host icebreaker gets +1 strength. Abilities that increase its strength last for the remainder of the run (instead of any shorter duration).
text_zhCN: 当你安装本硬件时及你的回合开始时，你可以将本硬件附载到一个已安装的非智能模块的破解器上。 被附载的破解器强度+1。增加其强度的能力持续到潜袭结束（而不是只持续更短时间）。
stripped_text: When you install this hardware and when your turn begins, you may host this hardware on an installed non-AI icebreaker. Host icebreaker gets +1 strength. Abilities that increase its strength last for the remainder of the run (instead of any shorter duration).

text_enUS: [click]: Host any number of programs from your grip faceup on this hardware. (They are not installed.) Once per turn → 0[credit]: Install 1 hosted program (paying its install cost). Limit 1 console per player.
text_zhCN: [click]：从你的操控器将任意数量的程序牌面朝上附载到本硬件上。（它们没有被安装。） 每回合限一次 → 0[credit]：安装1个所附载的程序（支付其安装费用）。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
stripped_text: click: Host any number of programs from your grip faceup on this hardware. (They are not installed.) Once per turn -> 0 credits: Install 1 hosted program (paying its install cost). Limit 1 console per player.

text_enUS: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this program and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs.
text_zhCN: 2[recurring-credit]（当你安装本程序时及你的回合开始前，将所附载的信用点补充至2个。） 你可以花费所附载的信用点以支付销毁费用。
stripped_text: 2 recurring credits (When you install this program and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs.
flavor_enUS:
“For my children’s sake, I’ll endure any pain.”
—Dewi Subrotoputri, as Dyah Kunthi
flavor_zhCN:
“为了我的孩子们，我愿意忍受任何痛苦。”
—德薇·苏布罗托普特里 饰 蒂娅·昆蒂

text_enUS: Install only on a piece of ice. Host ice gains barrier, code gate, and sentry.
text_zhCN: 仅能安装在一层防火墙上。 被附载的防火墙获得屏障、门禁与警报。
stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. Host ice gains barrier, code gate, and sentry.
flavor_enUS:
“The Net operates almost as much on dream logic as it does digital logic. If you believe something to be true, it often is.”
—The Encyclopedia Silica
flavor_zhCN:
“信网的运作既基于数字逻辑，也基于梦想逻辑。如果你相信某件事是真的，那么它往往就是真的。”
—《硅基百科》

text_enUS:
When you install this program, place 2 power counters on it.
Whenever you breach R&D, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to access 1 additional card.
text_zhCN:
当你安装本程序时，放置2枚能量指示物到本程序上。
每当你侵入研发中心时，你可以移除1枚所附载的能量指示物，以额外读取1张卡牌。
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 2 power counters on it. Whenever you breach R&D, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to access 1 additional card.
flavor_enUS:
“I still have friends on the inside.”
—Magdalene Keino-Chemutai
flavor_zhCN:
“我在里面还有些朋友。”
—玛格达琳·凯诺-切穆泰

text_enUS: This program costs 1[credit] less to install for each other installed icebreaker. (Programs trashed as part of installing this program don’t count.) Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength.
text_zhCN: 每有一个已安装的其他破解器，本程序的安装费用减1[credit]。（安装本程序时销毁的程序不计算在内。） 对接 → 1[credit]：破解1条屏障子进程。 2[credit]：强度+2。
stripped_text: This program costs 1 credit less to install for each other installed icebreaker. (Programs trashed as part of installing this program don't count.) Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2 credits: +2 strength.
flavor_enUS: On the shoulders of giants.
flavor_zhCN: 站在巨人的肩膀上。

text_enUS: The first time each turn a run begins, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, gain credits equal to its printed install cost and draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: 每回合第一次潜袭开始时，你可以销毁另1张你已安装的卡牌。如果你如此做，获得等同于其印刷安装费用的信用点并抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time each turn a run begins, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, gain credits equal to its printed install cost and draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS: There are a hundred currencies in the undercity, and Knickknack takes them all. Creds and rupiah get you noodles. For his secret menu, he’ll take your burnt-out rigs, your sterilized virii. But to taste his smoked vatchicken stew, bring him what he values most: your story.
flavor_zhCN: 下城区流通百种货币，“珍奇阁主”来者不拒。信用点和印尼盾能换来面条。想点他的隐藏菜单，就得用烧焦设备和灭活病毒。若想尝那道烟熏培养鸡，请带上他最看重的硬通货——你的故事。

text_enUS:
When you install this resource and whenever a run begins, place 1[credit] on this resource.
When there are 6 or more hosted credits, take all credits from this resource, trash it, and draw 1 card.
text_zhCN:
当你安装本资源时及每次潜袭开始时，放置1[credit]到本资源上。
当所附载的信用点有6个或更多时，从本资源上拿取所有信用点，销毁之，并抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: When you install this resource and whenever a run begins, place 1 credit on this resource. When there are 6 or more hosted credits, take all credits from this resource, trash it, and draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS:
“They were fast, friendly, and efficient. ★★★★☆.”
—satisfied customer
flavor_zhCN:
“服务快狠准 ★★★★☆”
—满意客户

title_zhCN: 利奥建工：劳工解决方案
text_enUS: Once per turn → Trash 1 rezzed bioroid card in the root of or protecting the attacked server: End the run.
text_zhCN: 每回合限一次 → 销毁1张被攻击服务器根目录中或保护该服务器的已激活的生化人卡牌：终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: Once per turn -> Trash 1 rezzed bioroid card in the root of or protecting the attacked server: End the run.
flavor_enUS: Workers of the World, Delivered.
flavor_zhCN: 寰宇劳工，使命必达。
narrative_enUS:
There’s nowhere on, below, or above the Earth that LEO Construction can’t get things built.
Beginning as an R&D arm of Haas-Bioroid building low-grav laborers to compete directly with Jinteki’s adapted clonelines, LEO made a name for themselves as developers of extremophile bioroids. LEO has workers for every possible environment and hazard, and they are not afraid to stretch the bounds of what a bioroid is “supposed to be.“ The Ottos are the perfect example of this: flexible, adaptable, and incapable of complaint.

title_enUS: Poétrï Luxury Brands: All the Rage
stripped_title: Poetri Luxury Brands: All the Rage
text_enUS:
Whenever you score an agenda, look at the top 3 cards of R&D. You may install 1 non-agenda card from among them.
Whenever an agenda is stolen, you may install 1 non-agenda card from HQ.
text_zhCN:
每当你将一个议案计分时，查看研发中心顶端的3张卡牌。你可以安装其中1张非议案卡牌。
每当一个议案被窃取时，你可以从总部安装1张非议案卡牌。
stripped_text: Whenever you score an agenda, look at the top 3 cards of R&D. You may install 1 non-agenda card from among them. Whenever an agenda is stolen, you may install 1 non-agenda card from HQ.
flavor_enUS: Fashion fades. Poétrï is eternal.
flavor_zhCN: 风尚轮流转，珀依诗永流传。
narrative_enUS:
Everything the public knows about Tabitha Poétrï is carefully curated by the fashion empire she left behind. Her place of birth, her parents, her real name—all of it scrubbed from the Net.
Poétrï Luxury Brands does not stop at tailoring the past. The future is entirely under their control, as well—at least when it comes to fashion. “You want to know what the future looks like?“ Tabitha allegedly asked a competitor. “A Poétrï sharksplice leather, knee-high, twelve centimeter heel boot, stomping down the runway—forever.“

text_enUS: The first time the Runner trashes an installed Corp card during each of their turns, they may spend [click]. If they do not, you get +1 allotted [click] for your next turn.
text_zhCN: 潜袭者在其每个回合中第一次销毁一张已安装的公司卡牌时，其可以花费[click]。如果其未如此做，你在下回合获得的[click]数量+1。
stripped_text: The first time the Runner trashes an installed Corp card during each of their turns, they may spend click. If they do not, you get +1 allotted click for your next turn.
flavor_enUS: “Don’t tell me you were at the gala, darling? I must not have seen you!”
flavor_zhCN: “亲爱的，你不会也参加了那场晚宴吧？我肯定没看到你！”

text_enUS: Dividends 1 (When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each excess advancement counter.) When your discard phase ends, you may remove 1 hosted agenda counter to install 1 card from Archives, ignoring all costs.
text_zhCN: 红利1（当你将本议案计分时，每有一枚多余的推进指示物，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。） 当你的弃牌阶段结束时，你可以移除1枚所附载的议案指示物，以从档案库安装1张卡牌，忽略所有的费用。
stripped_text: Dividends 1 (When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each excess advancement counter.) When your discard phase ends, you may remove 1 hosted agenda counter to install 1 card from Archives, ignoring all costs.

text_enUS: [click][click][click], [trash]: Gain 4[credit] and draw 3 cards. Install up to 2 cards from HQ (one at a time). You may play 1 operation from HQ.
text_zhCN: [click][click][click]，[trash]：获得4[credit]并抽3张卡牌。从总部安装最多2张卡牌（每次一张）。你可以从总部打出1个事务。
stripped_text: click click click, trash: Gain 4 credits and draw 3 cards. Install up to 2 cards from HQ (one at a time). You may play 1 operation from HQ.
flavor_enUS: “Deploying in T-minus 5…”
flavor_zhCN: “配置倒计时，5……”

text_enUS:
When you rez this asset, load 6[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it and gain [click][click].
When your turn begins, take 2[credit] from this asset.
text_zhCN:
当你激活本资产时，填装6[credit]到本资产上。当其清空时，销毁之并获得[click][click]。
当你的回合开始时，从本资产上拿取2[credit]。
stripped_text: When you rez this asset, load 6 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it and gain click click. When your turn begins, take 2 credits from this asset.

flavor_zhCN: “小朋友们，不要怕空蛸。他们在建造我们的未来！”

只要本防火墙是保护本服务器的唯一防火墙，其强度便+4。

flavor_enUS:
“It is a fallacy that conscious observation can change reality. The consciousness of the observer isn’t required at all.”
—The Encyclopedia Silica
flavor_zhCN:
“所谓意识观测能改变现实，是对于观测者效应的错误理解。观测即可改变现实，跟观测者是否有意识并无关系。”
—《硅基百科》

text_enUS: Gain [click][click].
text_zhCN: 获得[click][click]。
stripped_text: Gain click click.
flavor_enUS:
“I am a very reasonable manager. I do not expect my staff to do anything I could not do.”
—Bass CH1R180G4
flavor_zhCN:
“我是个非常通情达理的管理者。我绝不会要求下属做我自己都做不到的事情。”
—巴斯 CH1R180G4

text_enUS: Draw 2 cards. Install up to 2 cards from HQ (one at a time).
text_zhCN: 抽2张卡牌。从总部安装最多2张卡牌（每次一张）。
stripped_text: Draw 2 cards. Install up to 2 cards from HQ (one at a time).
flavor_enUS:
“The instability of human braintapes is directly proportional to the number of limbs on a given bioroid, so we’ve begun phasing them out for something better-equipped. A human braintape could be working beside an octopus for weeks and never have an inkling.”
—Maía Mínervudóttir, R&D
flavor_zhCN:
“人类脑磁带的故障率与给定生化人的肢体数量成正比，因此我们已开始逐步淘汰它们，转而采用更加适合的解决方案。一个人类脑磁带可能与一只章鱼共事数周而没有丝毫察觉。”
—梅娅·米涅尔杜蒂尔，研发中心

text_enUS: When your action phase ends, you may install 1 piece of ice from HQ, paying 1[credit] less. If you do, move this upgrade to the root of the server that piece of ice is protecting.
text_zhCN: 当你的行动阶段结束时，你可以从总部安装1层防火墙，其安装费用减1[credit]。如果你如此做，将本升级转移到该防火墙保护的服务器根目录。
stripped_text: When your action phase ends, you may install 1 piece of ice from HQ, paying 1 credit less. If you do, move this upgrade to the root of the server that piece of ice is protecting.
flavor_enUS: “My predecessor had passion, imagination, ambition. I assure you, I possess no such flaws.”
flavor_zhCN: “我的前任有激情、想象力和野心。请放心，我完美规避了这些缺点。”

title_enUS: AU Co.: The Gold Standard in Clones
title_zhCN: 傲金公司：克隆体的黄金标准
stripped_title: AU Co.: The Gold Standard in Clones
text_enUS:
Whenever you do damage or trash 1 or more cards from HQ, place 1 power counter on this identity.
When your turn begins, you may remove 2 hosted power counters to look at the top 3 cards of R&D. Trash 1 of those cards and add the rest to HQ.
text_zhCN:
每当你造成伤害或从总部销毁1张或更多卡牌时，放置1枚能量指示物到本特性上。
当你的回合开始时，你可以移除2枚所附载的能量指示物，以查看研发中心顶端的3张卡牌。销毁其中1张并将余下的卡牌加入总部。
stripped_text: Whenever you do damage or trash 1 or more cards from HQ, place 1 power counter on this identity. When your turn begins, you may remove 2 hosted power counters to look at the top 3 cards of R&D. Trash 1 of those cards and add the rest to HQ.
pronunciation_approx: As you would say the letters “A” and “U”, and the abbreviation “Co.” (of “company”)
narrative_enUS:
Clones have often been seen as luxury goods, but with advances in gengineering technology, Jinteki’s product lines have become more and more affordable for the average consumer. AU Co., however, does not cater to the average consumer.
CEO Phật Gioan Baotixita has succeeded in restoring the image of owning a clone as a mark of true wealth. Small batch crèches are tended with all the care of a master hòn non bộ. The result is a specific clone grown and bred for a specific purpose—namely, whatever your heart desires.

title_zhCN: 丝链有限公司：生命基石
text_enUS: When your discard phase ends, if there are 3 or fewer cards in HQ, you may pay 1[credit] to place 1 advancement counter on an unrezzed card you can advance. (You cannot score that card this turn.)
text_zhCN: 当你的弃牌阶段结束时，如果总部中的卡牌数量为3张或更少，你可以支付1[credit]以放置1枚推进指示物到一张你可以推进的未激活卡牌上。（本回合你不能将该卡牌计分。）
stripped_text: When your discard phase ends, if there are 3 or fewer cards in HQ, you may pay 1 credit to place 1 advancement counter on an unrezzed card you can advance. (You cannot score that card this turn.)
flavor_enUS: The Looming Future.
flavor_zhCN: 织就未来。
narrative_enUS:
It’s an oft-retold myth that silk is stronger than steel, but what if it were actually true? This is the question that the executives at PT Untaian dared to ask their scientists. And those questions were answered beyond their wildest dreams—and stock projections.
PT Untaian’s Mycele is the first biologically-produced space-grade material, and it is being used to build what speculators are calling the last great space elevator. What nature inspired, Jinteki has perfected.

text_enUS: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: The Runner moves to the outermost position of Archives. (They approach any ice in that position.) Use this ability only during a run.
text_zhCN: 当你将本议案计分时，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物：潜袭者移动到档案库最外层位置。（如果该位置有防火墙，潜袭者接驳之。）本能力仅能在潜袭中使用。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: The Runner moves to the outermost position of Archives. (They approach any ice in that position.) Use this ability only during a run.
flavor_enUS: We rely too much on spatial cognition. What happens when that system receives a null signal?
flavor_zhCN: 我们过度仰仗空间认知。当该系统突获空信号，意识图景将何以自持？

text_enUS: Dividends 1 (When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each excess advancement counter.) When your discard phase ends, you may remove 1 hosted agenda counter to place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card. (You cannot score that card this turn.)
text_zhCN: 红利1（当你将本议案计分时，每有一枚多余的推进指示物，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。） 当你的弃牌阶段结束时，你可以移除1枚所附载的议案指示物，以放置2枚推进指示物到1张已安装的卡牌上。（本回合你不能将该卡牌计分。）
stripped_text: Dividends 1 (When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each excess advancement counter.) When your discard phase ends, you may remove 1 hosted agenda counter to place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card. (You cannot score that card this turn.)

text_enUS:
While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 4[credit]. If you do, give the Runner 1 tag and do 3 net damage.

在潜袭者从研发中心读取本资产的期间，其必须展示之。
当潜袭者从档案库以外其他区域读取本卡牌时，你可以支付4[credit]。如果你如此做，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记并造成3点网域伤害。

flavor_enUS: You thought you were safe?
flavor_zhCN: 你以为你安全了？
