stripped_text: The Runner cannot break the printed subroutine on this ice except using a fracter. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner suffers 3 net damage.
flavor_enUS: The silence of the forest is the surest sign of danger.
flavor_zhCN: 林寂最是凶兆。

text_enUS:
Reveal all but 1 card in HQ.
Gain 7[credit]. You may install 1 card from HQ in the root of a remote server.
text_zhCN:
展示总部除1张卡牌以外的所有卡牌。
获得7[credit]。你可以从总部安装1张卡牌到一台远程服务器的根目录。
stripped_text: Reveal all but 1 card in HQ. Gain 7 credits. You may install 1 card from HQ in the root of a remote server.
flavor_enUS: Peer reviews are the difference between living in the arcs and living in the slums. Cloneline gengineering never made anything as vicious or cutthroat as a Jinteki scientist.
flavor_zhCN: 住在生态屋还是贫民窟？全看同行评议。克隆体基因工程的产物再凶残，也比不上人间会社科学家的阴狠毒辣。

text_enUS: Whenever the Runner approaches a piece of ice protecting this server, you may trash this upgrade. If you do, gain 3[credit] and you may swap the ice being approached with a piece of ice from Archives or HQ.
text_zhCN: 每当潜袭者接驳一层保护本服务器的防火墙时，你可以销毁本升级。如果你如此做，获得3[credit]并且你可以将潜袭者接驳的防火墙与档案库或总部中的一层防火墙互换。
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner approaches a piece of ice protecting this server, you may trash this upgrade. If you do, gain 3 credits and you may swap the ice being approached with a piece of ice from Archives or HQ.
flavor_enUS: Spring-loaded minds, kept in suspension to be launched into the net at any incursion.
flavor_zhCN: 紧绷的思维，保持待命状态，随时准备应对入侵而投入网络。

text_enUS: When your action phase ends, if you played an operation this turn, gain 1[credit] and flip this identity. Back: Gemilang Arena: Burning Bright The first time each turn you play an operation, gain [click]. When the Runner makes a successful run on HQ or R&D, flip this identity.
text_zhCN: 当你的行动阶段结束时，如果你本回合打出过事务，获得1[credit]并将本特性翻面。 翻面 辉煌舞台：熠熠生辉 每回合你第一次打出一个事务时，获得[click]。 当潜袭者对总部或研发中心进行一次成功的潜袭时，将本特性翻面。
stripped_text:
When your action phase ends, if you played an operation this turn, gain 1 credit and flip this identity.
Back: Gemilang Arena: Burning Bright
The first time each turn you play an operation, gain click. When the Runner makes a successful run on HQ or R&D, flip this identity.
flavor_enUS:
Igniting your potential.
Never stop shining.
flavor_zhCN:
点燃潜能。
永续闪耀。
narrative_enUS:
Want a recipe for success? From one population eager for opportunity, extract the young and talented. Fold in hands-on training, with a pinch of g-modding and behavioral conditioning, and mix it all together using NBN’s realtime trend-mapping. Watch it rise, and pop any bubbles of individuality when you see them.
Nebula’s idols sell out the supermassive Gemilang Arena every night of the week. With full creative control over hundreds of assets, Nebula has a star for every would-be fan. And when one star burns out, another is just warming up.

text_enUS: The first time each turn a tag is removed, you may reveal and install 1 card from HQ, ignoring all costs. [click], remove 1 tag: Gain 2[credit].
text_zhCN: 每回合第一次一枚锁定标记被移除时，你可以从总部展示并安装1张卡牌，忽略所有的费用。 [click]，移除1枚锁定标记：获得2[credit]。
stripped_text: The first time each turn a tag is removed, you may reveal and install 1 card from HQ, ignoring all costs. click, remove 1 tag: Gain 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: Every Impulse Monitored.
flavor_zhCN: 每道冲动皆被监控。
narrative_enUS:
Hi-immersion Net access used to be only for the wealthy, but Kota Kalimantan is the city of tomorrow. Every day, millions of Kali residents jack in for free at Synapse Net Access Points for top-tier Net service.
While they do, Synapse is keeping the city safe. Not a bit travels in or out of the city without brushing against Synapse’s servers, where it is cross-referenced, analyzed, and catalogued in a vast security network. OSEAN’s investors won’t let the last great space elevator fail—and Synapse gives them the intelligence they need.

text_enUS: Dividends 2 (When you score this agenda, place 2 agenda counters on it for each excess advancement counter.) When your discard phase ends, you may remove 1 hosted agenda counter to search R&D for 1 operation and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that operation to the top of R&D.
text_zhCN: 红利2（当你将本议案计分时，每有一枚多余的推进指示物，放置2枚议案指示物到本议案上。） 当你的弃牌阶段结束时，你可以移除1枚所附载的议案指示物，以从研发中心搜寻1个事务并展示之。（在搜寻研发中心后将其洗混。）将该事务加入研发中心顶端。
stripped_text: Dividends 2 (When you score this agenda, place 2 agenda counters on it for each excess advancement counter.) When your discard phase ends, you may remove 1 hosted agenda counter to search R&D for 1 operation and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that operation to the top of R&D.

text_enUS: When this agenda is scored or stolen, place 1 agenda counter on it. [click], hosted agenda counter: Draw 4 cards. Shuffle any number of cards from HQ into R&D. The Corp can use this ability even if this agenda is in the Runner's score area.
text_zhCN: 当本议案被计分或窃取时，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 [click]，所附载的议案指示物：抽4张卡牌。将任意数量的卡牌从总部洗入研发中心。即使本议案在潜袭者的分数区，公司也能使用本能力。
stripped_text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, place 1 agenda counter on it. click, hosted agenda counter: Draw 4 cards. Shuffle any number of cards from HQ into R&D. The Corp can use this ability even if this agenda is in the Runner's score area.
flavor_enUS: That’s so fifteen minutes ago.
flavor_zhCN: 这都十五分钟前的潮流了。

text_enUS:
You can advance this asset.
When your turn begins, you may trash this asset. If you do, for each hosted advancement counter, gain 3[credit] and the Runner loses 2[credit].
text_zhCN:
你可以推进本资产。
当你的回合开始时，你可以销毁本资产。如果你如此做，每有一枚所附载的推进指示物，获得3[credit]并且潜袭者失去2[credit]。
stripped_text: You can advance this asset. When your turn begins, you may trash this asset. If you do, for each hosted advancement counter, gain 3 credits and the Runner loses 2 credits.
flavor_enUS: You don’t really want to know what makes you unique as a person. It’s so much less than you think.
flavor_zhCN: 你根本不想知道自己的独特性有多廉价。

text_enUS: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit]. Threat 2 → When the Runner trashes this asset (while it is rezzed), give them 1 tag.
text_zhCN: 当你的回合开始时，获得1[credit]。 威胁2 → 当潜袭者销毁（已激活的）本资产时，给予其1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 1 credit. Threat 2 -> When the Runner trashes this asset (while it is rezzed), give them 1 tag.
flavor_enUS:
“Give me five minutes of a user’s Access Plaza traffic and I’ll tell you where they’re having lunch tomorrow. Give me another ten, and I’ll have their bibi’s secret rendang recipe.”
—Luzviminda Reyes, Synapse Sales
flavor_zhCN:
“给我某个用户在接入广场五分钟的数据，我能算出他明天在哪吃午饭。再给十分钟，连他外婆的仁当秘方都弄到手。”
—卢兹维明达·雷耶斯，突触销售

text_enUS:
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage if the Runner has at least 2 tags.

They know what makes you tick.
And ticked-off.

他们洞悉你所欲的。
以及你所惧的。

flavor_enUS:
”On the Net, we hold the power.”
 —Arnold Teoh, NBN technologist
flavor_zhCN:
“在信网中，能量由我们掌控。”

text_enUS:
Play only if the Runner is tagged. Resolve 1 of the following:
  • Give the Runner 1 tag.
  • Remove any number of tags. The Runner loses 5[credit] for each tag removed this way. Gain credits equal to the number of credits the Runner lost.
text_zhCN:
只有潜袭者被锁定时，才能打出。
结算下列中的1项：
- 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
- 移除任意数量的锁定标记。你每以此法移除1枚锁定标记，潜袭者失去5[credit]。获得等同于潜袭者失去信用点数量的信用点。
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Resolve 1 of the following: * Give the Runner 1 tag. * Remove any number of tags. The Runner loses 5 credits for each tag removed this way. Gain credits equal to the number of credits the Runner lost.

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, remove X tags.
Install 1 agenda from the Runner’s score area with a printed agenda point value equal to X. If the Runner is still tagged, place 1 advancement counter on that agenda.
text_zhCN: 作为打出本事务的额外费用，移除X枚锁定标记。从潜袭者分数区安装1个印刷议案分数等于X的议案。如果潜袭者依然被锁定，放置1枚推进指示物到该议案上。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, remove X tags. Install 1 agenda from the Runner's score area with a printed agenda point value equal to X. If the Runner is still tagged, place 1 advancement counter on that agenda.
flavor_enUS: “I believe you have something of ours.”
flavor_zhCN: “你拿了我们的东西。”

text_enUS:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance. If you do, choose a card type and reveal the grip. Choose up to 2 revealed cards of that type. The Runner shuffles those cards into the stack.
text_zhCN:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
放置2枚推进指示物到1张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌上。如果你如此做，选择一种卡牌类型并展示操控器。选择最多2张展示出的该类型卡牌。潜袭者将这些卡牌洗入存储栈。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance. If you do, choose a card type and reveal the grip. Choose up to 2 revealed cards of that type. The Runner shuffles those cards into the stack.
flavor_enUS: “Your Star Power is in the toilet, kid. We need a fresh face.”
flavor_zhCN: “孩子，你的明星效应早过气了。我们需要一副新面孔。”

title_zhCN: 邦贡工团：灾害突临之时
text_enUS: You may install agendas faceup. (This does not make their abilities active.) Whenever the Runner accesses a faceup installed agenda, do 2 meat damage and give the Runner 1 tag.
text_zhCN: 你可以牌面朝上安装议案。（这不会使其能力生效。） 每当潜袭者读取一张牌面朝上的已安装议案时，造成2点肢体伤害并给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
stripped_text: You may install agendas faceup. (This does not make their abilities active.) Whenever the Runner accesses a faceup installed agenda, do 2 meat damage and give the Runner 1 tag.
flavor_enUS: We’ll be there.
flavor_zhCN: 我们会在。
narrative_enUS:
As part of OSEAN’s efforts to fund the Mahkota Langit, many government-owned companies were sold to corporate interests. Among those was the Agensi Pembangunan Pasca Bencana, renamed BANGUN by its adopted parent company.
At one time, BANGUN had been Indonesia’s disaster response agency, supporting victims and rebuilding communities in the aftermath of tragedy. Thankfully, and with the efficiency to be expected of a privatized public service, BANGUN now arrives even before disaster strikes.

text_enUS: The first time each turn you gain credits through an ability on an agenda or operation, you may draw 1 card.
text_zhCN: 每回合你第一次通过议案或事务上的能力获得信用点时，你可以抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: The first time each turn you gain credits through an ability on an agenda or operation, you may draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS: Action at a distance.
flavor_zhCN: 超距作用。
narrative_enUS:
The Weyland Consortium is a vast, unconquerable labyrinth of corporations, subsidiaries, micronations, and shell companies. Throughout this maze are certain unlit corridors; locked, nameless offices; entire windowless floors of corporate headquarters that exude an aura of somebody else’s problem.
It is within those oubliettes that the Zwicky Group can be found, should they allow it. It is from those darkened corners that their grasp extends, silently alighting wherever Weyland cannot be seen to be.

text_enUS:
When you score this agenda, gain 2[credit].
When you forfeit this agenda, gain 4[credit].
text_zhCN:
当你将本议案计分时，获得2[credit]。
当你废除本议案时，获得4[credit]。
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, gain 2 credits. When you forfeit this agenda, gain 4 credits.
flavor_enUS: “It’s been a real pleasure doing business with you.”
flavor_zhCN: “与你合作真愉快。”

text_enUS: Dividends 1 (When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each excess advancement counter.) When your discard phase ends, you may remove 1 hosted agenda counter to search R&D for 1 card and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) You may install that card, ignoring all costs. If you do not, add it to HQ.
text_zhCN: 红利1（当你将本议案计分时，每有一枚多余的推进指示物，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。） 当你的弃牌阶段结束时，你可以移除1枚所附载的议案指示物，以从研发中心搜寻1张卡牌并展示之。（在搜寻研发中心后将其洗混。）你可以安装该卡牌，忽略所有的费用。如果你未如此做，将其加入总部。
stripped_text: Dividends 1 (When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each excess advancement counter.) When your discard phase ends, you may remove 1 hosted agenda counter to search R&D for 1 card and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) You may install that card, ignoring all costs. If you do not, add it to HQ.

text_enUS:
When you rez this asset, load 8[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
When your turn begins, take 4[credit] from this asset and draw 1 card.
text_zhCN:
当你激活本资产时，填装8[credit]到本资产上。当其清空时，销毁之。
当你的回合开始时，从本资产上拿取4[credit]并抽1张卡牌。
stripped_text: When you rez this asset, load 8 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. When your turn begins, take 4 credits from this asset and draw 1 card.
flavor_enUS:
“If you lived here, you’d be at work by now!”
—Weyland recruiter
flavor_zhCN:
“住这里早上工！”
—威兰招聘员

text_enUS: As an additional cost to rez this asset, forfeit 1 agenda or reveal and trash 3 cards from HQ. When your turn begins, you may play 1 transaction operation from Archives. After it resolves, remove it from the game.
text_zhCN: 作为激活本资产的额外费用，废除1个议案或从总部展示并销毁3张卡牌。 当你的回合开始时，你可以从档案库打出1个交易事务。结算后将其移出游戏。
stripped_text: As an additional cost to rez this asset, forfeit 1 agenda or reveal and trash 3 cards from HQ. When your turn begins, you may play 1 transaction operation from Archives. After it resolves, remove it from the game.
flavor_enUS: “Rejoice, executives! The Net has sent unto us a profit!”
flavor_zhCN: “欢欣吧，高管们！信网赐予了我们利润！”

text_enUS:
You can forfeit 1 agenda as you rez this ice to pay for 10[credit] of its rez cost.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program or end the run.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed resource or end the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
激活本防火墙时，你可以废除1个议案以支付其激活费用中的10[credit]。
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序或终止本次潜袭。
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的资源或终止本次潜袭。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。

flavor_enUS:
“Dammit, Moth! Where are you? This thing is way bigger than you s—”
—C0nr4d
flavor_zhCN:
“妈的！蛾子，你在哪？这玩意比你说的大多——”
—康拉d

text_enUS: The Runner cannot trash this ice (while it is rezzed). [subroutine] End the run. [subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN: 潜袭者不能销毁（已激活的）本防火墙。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: The Runner cannot trash this ice (while it is rezzed). Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS:
“The detritus of failed incursions accumulates. Instead of sweeping it all away, the parsimonious sysop should nudge this debris into defensive positions in the server’s metagravity well.”
—Moira Virtue, Ice Engineering, KKU
flavor_zhCN:
“失败袭击的残骸不断累积。与其将其全部清除，节俭的系统管理员应将这些碎片推入服务器超重力井中的防御位置。”
—莫伊拉 ·弗丘，防火墙工程系，KKU

text_enUS:
You can advance this ice.
When the Runner encounters this ice, if it has 3 or more hosted advancement counters, you may place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.
[subroutine] You may place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.
[subroutine] The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
text_zhCN:
你可以推进本防火墙。当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，如果所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，你可以放置1枚推进指示物到一张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌上。
[subroutine] 你可以放置1枚推进指示物到一张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌上。
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去2[credit]。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。

text_enUS:
Resolve 2 of the following in any order:
  • Draw 1 card. Shuffle 1 card from HQ into R&D.
  • Install 1 piece of ice from HQ, ignoring all costs.
  • Place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.
  • Gain 2[credit].
text_zhCN:
按任意顺序结算下列中的2项：
- 抽1张卡牌。将1张卡牌从总部洗入研发中心。
- 从总部安装1层防火墙，忽略所有的费用。
- 放置1枚推进指示物到一张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌上。
- 获得2[credit] 。
stripped_text: Resolve 2 of the following in any order: * Draw 1 card. Shuffle 1 card from HQ into R&D. * Install 1 piece of ice from HQ, ignoring all costs. * Place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance. * Gain 2 credits.
flavor_zhCN: 由2023年世界锦标赛冠军William “Sokka” Huang设计
attribution: Designed by 2023 World Champion William “Sokka” Huang

text_enUS:
Play only if the threat level is 4 or greater, and only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn.
Do 4 meat damage unless the Runner pays 8[credit].
text_zhCN:
只有威胁等级为4或更高且潜袭者在其上回合进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
造成4点肢体伤害，除非潜袭者支付8[credit]。
stripped_text: Play only if the threat level is 4 or greater, and only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn. Do 4 meat damage unless the Runner pays 8 credits.
flavor_enUS:
“We would like to reassure our shareholders that none of the buildings damaged in the blast were owned by Weyland Consortium subsidiaries…”
—Luana Campos, Weyland spokesperson
flavor_zhCN:
“请股东放心，爆炸损毁建筑均非威兰子公司所有……”
—卢安娜·坎波斯，威兰发言人

text_enUS:
When you rez this ice during a run against this server, purge virus counters.
[subroutine] End the run.
text_zhCN:
在对本服务器的潜袭中，当你激活本防火墙时，清除病毒指示物。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, purge virus counters. Subroutine End the run.
flavor_enUS: Stop that.
flavor_zhCN: 别烦。

text_enUS:
When an agenda is scored or stolen from this server or its root, trash this ice.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag unless they pay 3[credit].
[subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.

当一个议案从本服务器或其根目录被计分或窃取时，销毁本防火墙。
[subroutine]给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记，除非其支付3[credit]。

只有你本回合尚未完成一个行动时，才能打出。

text_enUS: 2[recurring-credit] (When you rez this upgrade and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to rez assets in the root of this server and ice protecting this server. Persistent → The trash cost of each asset in the root of this server is increased by 2[credit]. Limit 1 region per server.
